Nnanna Ikpo bụ onye edemede Naịjirịa bi na mba Amerịka
A kacha mara ya nke ọma maka akwụkwọ akụkọ 2017 ya Fim Sl Forever, nke bụ onye emechiri emechi Lambda Literary Award final for Gay Fiction na 30th Lambda Literary Awards na 2018
Ọ bụkwa onye edemede nke Lambda Literary Award finalist Award for Gay Fiction na 30th Akwụkwọ onyinye Lambda na 2018
Nne bụ nne nne nke nwa
Enwere ike iwere nwanyị dị ka nne site na ịmụ nwa, site na azụlite nwa nke nwere ike ma ọ bụ na ọ gaghị abụ nwa ya, ma ọ bụ site na inye ya àkwá maka ime ime ime na ihe gbasara ime ime ime ime
Nne nkuchi bụ nwanyị nke ghọrọ nne na nna nwa ahụ site na usoro iwu nke nkuchi
Nne nke anụ ahụ bụ nwanyị na-enye aka na imepụta nwa ọhụrụ, site na mmekọahụ ma ọ bụ onyinye àkwá
Nne nwere ike ịnwe ọrụ iwu n'ebe nwa ọ zụlitere, dị ka ọrụ nkwado ego
Nne a na-ekwu na ọ bụ nwanyị nke a na-ebo ebubo na ya na nwatakịrị nwere mmekọrịta ma emeghị ya
Nne nne bụ nwanyị lụrụ nna nwatakịrị ma ha nwere ike ịmepụta ezinụlọ, mana na ozuzu ha enweghị ikike na ibu ọrụ nke nne na nna n'ihe gbasara nwatakịrị ahụ
Nna bụ nwoke yiri nne
A pụrụ ịkpọ ụmụ nwanyị dị ime dị ka ndị nne dị ime ma ọ bụ ndị nne ga-abụ, ọ bụ ezie na aha ndị dị otú ahụ anaghị adị mfe itinye aka na ndị nna (biological) ma ọ bụ nne na nna nkuchi
A na-akpọ usoro nke ịghọ nne 'matrescence'
Adjective 'nne' na-ezo aka na nne ma jiri ya tụnyere 'nna' maka nna
Ngwaa 'nne' pụtara ịmụ nwa ma ọ bụ ịmụ nwa, ma ọ bụ ilekọta nwa, nke sitere na aha 'nne'
Okwu ndị metụtara ịhụnanya bụ nne (mama, mommy), mama (mother), mothery, mamacita (ma, mam) na mama
A na-akpọ ihe nlereanya nwanyị nke ụmụaka nwere ike ile anya mgbe ụfọdụ dị ka nne
NneNne Iwuji-Eme bu British diplomat

Na ime onwa March na afor 2018, amara okwa na oya ga bu onye ohu High Commissioner of the United Kingdom to Mozambique e kwuru na oga ebido oru na onwa July na afor 2018 Obu nwayi isi oji nke mbu ahoputara na okwa high commissioner site na aka ndi obodo United Kingdom
Amuru Iwuji-Eme na ime obodo Truro, Cornwall, England
Nne na nna muru NneNne Iwuji-Eme na aru oru na United Nations Oguru akwukwor na ulor akwukwor obibi Suffolk
Oguru economics na University nor na Manchester
Obanyere Department for the Environment, Food and Rural Affairs (DEFRA) na afor 1999 ka onye na enye ndumodu gbasara ego
Na afor 2002, ogara na ulo oru Foreign and Commonwealth Office (FCO) dika Onye Isi na Africa, Middle East na Transition Economies in its Economic Policy Department
Nnedi Okorafor (Aha Nnedimma Nkemdili Okorafor; onye nke ejiri Nnedi Okorafor-Mbachu mara; a muru ya na April 8, na afo 1974) bụ nwa afọ Naijiriya nke amụrụ na mba Amerika
Ọ na ede ihe gbasara echiche nke na enweghi atụ nke bekee na akpọ fantasy, agbara bekee nke enwekwara ike kpọ sayensi na kwa akụkọ ifo ndi ozo
A mụrụ Nnedi Okorafor na mba Amerika
Nne na nna ya bu ndi Igbo nke di na obodo Naijiriya

Ọdi na mbụ abiarute Naijiriya site na mgbe ọ di na nwata Mgbe ọ bidoro gụba akwụkwụ na ụlọ akwụkwụ nke Homewood-Flossmoor High School, e jiri i pia egwuregwu aka nke bekee na akpọ tennis jiri mara Okorafor
Nwa ada nkea pụrụ iche na agba kwa ezigbo mbo na ihe gbasara agbara bekee nke enwekwara ike kpọ sayensi
Okorafor na ekwu na ihe gbasara agụma akwụkwọ bụ ihe nke ọ hụrụ na anya karia ihe nke ana agbara mbọ
Ihe ọria ndachi nke bekee na akpọ scoliosis biara danyere Okoroafor ma mekwa ka ije ya na i pia egwuregwu aka nke bekee na akpọ tennis wee kwụsi ma mekwa ya ka ọna atụ ụkwụ ma ọgawa ije
Oge nkea ka Okoroafor biara leba anya na ime onwe ya bia kọwaharia onwe ya maka ije ya na i pia egwuregwu aka nke bekee na akpọ tennis biara kwụsi
Mgbe Okoroafor gbakewere na ọria, o bidoro dewe nderende na akwụkwọ
Akwụkwụ nke Okoroafor na ede na egosipụta mgbọrọgwụ ya na West African na kwa Amerika
Okorafor gụrụ akwụkwu na Clarion Writers Workshop nke Lansing, Michigan ma pụtakwa na afọ 2001
Onwekwara asambodo nke PhD na asụsụ bekee nke ana akpọ English na mahadum nke University of Illinois, Chicago
Nnedi bụ kwa onye nkuzi nke ọkachamara na ihe nderede nke bekee na akpọ creative writing na literature na mahadum nke University at Buffalo, (SUNY)
Okorafor na ezi na ụlọ ya bi na etiti Buffalo na Olympia Fields, Illinois
Nneka bu aha ndi igbo, ihe oputara na asusu igbo na Nnemkadi
Ndị ama ama nwere aha ahụ gụnyere
Nneka Egbuna (a mụrụ n’abalị iri abụọ na anọ nke ọnwa Disemba na afọ 1980 ) bụ onye Naijiria na-agụ egwú, na-ede abụ ma bụkwara onye na-eme ihe nkiri
Ọ na-abụ abụ na bekee, Igbo na Nigerian Pidgin nke bụ ngwakọta asụsụ Naijiria dị iche iche na bekee
2Amụrụ Nneka Egbuna ma zụlite ya na Warri, na Delta State, Nigeria
Nne ya bụ onye Germany ebe nna ya bụkwa onye Nigeria
Na afọ 1999, ọ kwagara na obodo Hamburg, Germany ka ọ mụọ Anthropology na mahadum ebe ahụ
Ọmalitere ịme egwuregwu n'ọgba egwu nke okpuru ala iji nweta ego iji kwụọ ụgwọ ụlọ akwụkwọ nzere ya

Nneka nwetara nlebara anya ọha na mbụ n'afọ 2004 ka ọ na-arụ ọrụ mmeghe maka onye na eti egwu akpọrọ Sean Paul na Hamburg Stadtpark, nke a nyere ya otuto dị ukwuu, ma mee ka o kwupụta ebumnobi ya idekọ nchịkọta egwu mbụ ya
Mgbe o wepụtachara ọba egwu mbụ ya, The Uncomfortable Truth, ọ mere njem mbụ ya dị ka onye na-egwu n'ọnwa Eprel n'afọ 2005, ma mee ihe ngosi na obodo Germany, Austria na Switzerland
N'afọ 2005, e wepụtara nchịkọta egwu mbụ nke Nneka, Victim of Truth, n'ofe Europe, Nigeria na Japan
N'ịchọta egwu nke a nwetara nlebanya dị egwu sitere na mgbasa ozi akwụkwọ akụkọ nke Sunday Times na obodo UK nke mechara kwupụta na Victim of Truth 'abụ nke afọ a nke ịleghaara ya anya bụ mpụ'
N'agbanyeghị otuto zuru ụwa ọnụ, ndekọ ahụ abanyeghị na chaatị egwu
Ka o sina dị, Nneka mere njem nlegharị anya nke gara nke ọma, ya na onye otu ya bụ Patrice Bart-Williams

N'oge njem ya, ọ bụrụ abụ ya na Chiemsee Reggae Summer, Haarlem (Bevrijdingsfestival), The Hague (Park Pop) na Saint-Brieuc (Art Rock Festival), na ebe ndị a na-akwanyere ùgwù, dị ka La Maroquinerie na New Morning na Paris, Tivoli na Utrecht, Paradiso na Amsterdam, na Cargo na ULU na London
Ọ kwadokwara ndị nka dịka Femi Kuti, Bilal, Seeed, na Gnarls Barkley
N'afọ 2006, Nneka rụkwara ọrụ na netwọk telivishọn nke ndị German akpọrọ WDR, ebe ọ bụrụ otu egwu ya aha ya bụ 'Gypsy', ebe otu egwu gbara usoro ịgba egwu emere maka maka egwu Nneka ahụ
Ndị otu Schlauberger kwadoro otu egwu
N'ọnwa Febụwarị n'afọ 2008, ọ wepụtara nchịkọta egwu nke abụọ ya, No Longer at Ease
Ewepụtara aha nchịkọta egwu ahụ site na akwụkwọ akụkọ nke nwere otu aha ahụ nke Chinua Achebe dere nke na-egosipụta ọdịnaya egwu nke ndekọ ahụ
Ọtụtụ n'ime egwu na-ekwu maka ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị, na-ekwu maka ọnọdụ ọjọọ nke Niger Delta na nrụrụ aka dị n’ala nna Nneka
No Longer at Ease na-ejikọta akụkọ ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị na nke onwe ' ngwakọta egwu nke mkpụrụ obi, nke pụtara n'ụdị dị iche iche gụnyere hip-hop na reggae'
Isi otu egwu sitere na ndekọ ahụ, 'Heartbeat', ghọrọ abụ mbụ nke Nneka batara na egwu iri ise kacha elu na obodo Germany

N'ọnwa Septemba afọ 2009, egwu ahụ banyere na UK Singles Chart ọ we di n'ebe ahụ na ọnu-ọgugu iri-na-abua Emegharịrị egwu 'Heartbeat' ọtụtụ oge, ọkachasị site na aka Chase & Status, Rita Ora tinye kwara egwu ahụ na nchịkọta egwu nke ya nke a na-ewu ewu nke ukwuu akpọrọ 'RIP'
N'ọnwa ndị sochirinụ, Nneka gara njem n'ime France, Italy na Portugal, ebe ọ kwadokwara Lenny Kravitz mgbe ọmere njem na obodo France n'ọnwa Eprel n'afọ 2009
A họpụtara Nneka n'ụdị atọ maka Channel O Music Video Awards nke afọ 2009 and won an award for Best African Act at the 2009 MOBO Awards
Na ebe njedebe nke afọ 2009, a họpụtara ya dị ka otu n'etiti ndị iri ise na-apụta apụta, ndị na-emepụta ihe site n'aka ndị akwụkwọ akụkọ Beyond Race
Nke a mere ka a kpọtụrụ ya aha n'akwụkwọ akụkọ nke ahụ nke ọnụọgụgụ iri na otu (ya na Bodega Girls na J
Cole na mkpuchi akwụkwọ akụkọ ahụ), yana ajụjụ na azịza pụrụiche maka saịtị akwụkwọ akụkọ
N'ọnwa Nọvemba n'afọ 2009, Nneka malitere njem egwu mbụ ya na mba United States, ebe ọ mere ihe ngosi na New York City, Vienna (Washington DC), Boston, Philadelphia, Los Angeles, na San Francisco
Ọzọkwa, ọ bụ onye ọbịa pụrụ iche na The Roots
Nke ahụ bụ mmemme maka ndị egwu
Egwu izizi ya na mba US, Concrete Jungle, ka ewepụtara n'ụbọchị nke abụọ nke ọnwa Febrụwarị n'afọ 2010
E nyere egwu ahụ onye nke iri ise na asaa n'mkpokọta ọnụọgụ egwu nke Top R&B/Hip-Hop albums, na onye nke iri na asatọ n'mkpokọta ọnụọgụ egwu nke Heatseekers Albums, ebe ọ nọrọ izu ise n'ọnọdụ ahụ
Ejikwa egwu ya nke ọkpọrọ 'Kangpe' mee egwu ndabere na ihe egwuregwu vidiyo EA Sports, FIFA 10

N'ọnwa Jenụarị nke afọ 2010, Nneka pụtara na mmeme Late Show ya na David Letterman na obodo New York tupu ya aga njem US, na n'ime ọnwa Juun na-eso ya, o jiri egwu egwu ya, 'Africans' nwe mmerina ngalaba reggae nke Museke Online Africa Music Award 2010
Nneka so Nas na Damian Marley gagharịa maka ọba egwu ha akpọrọ Distant relatives
Nas na Nneka gwakọtara egwu ya nke nwere nnukwu ọkwa akpọrọ, 'Heartbeat'
Ewepụtara ya site na iTunes na ụbọchị ise nke ọnwa Ọktoba n'afọ 2010
O sonyere na ihe mmeme Lilith Fair Concert nke afọ 2010, ebe ndị egwu ndị ọzọ dị ka Tegan na Sara, Sarah McLachlan, Kelly Clarkson, Jill Scott, Erykah Badu, Corinne Bailey Rae, Mary J
Blige, Rihanna tiri egwu
N'oge njem ya na US maka egwu Concrete Jungle, ọ rụkwara ọrụ na Washington, Raleigh na Charlotte na oge ahụ
Nneka dere egwu maka asọmpi Iko Mbaụwa nke afọ 2010 na South Africa nke akpọrọ 'Viva Africa'; egwu a bụ nkwanye ugwu maka mgbe egwuregwu Iko Mbaụwa biara na ala Africa
N'afọ 2010, Nneka nwetara ihe nrite maka onye omenkà, onye egwu kacha mma na Naijiria na Nigerian Entertainment Awards, nke emere na obodo New York
Kemgbe ahụ ọ nwetago nturu ugo NEA maka onye omenkà mba ụwa kacha mma ọtụtụ oge
Nneka sonyere na ihe nkiri ejije, na Nigeria nke Andy Amadi Okoroafor mebere ma duzie ya
Relentless pụtara na ụbọchị iri na atọ nke ọnwa Ọktoba n'afọ 2010 na BFI London Film Festival
N'afọ 2011, Nneka soro Ziggy Marley bụọ abụ akpọrọ 'Express Yourself', nke emepụtara maka ihe nkiri Beat the World
Na ọnwa Maachị n'afọ 2012, ọ pụtara na BET 106 na Park Music Matters
Na ihe nkiri ahụ ọ bụrụ abụ ya na otu onye egwu oge ochie nke Naijiria bụ Clef nite na Black Thought bụ onye rapper maka otu egwu hip hop a ma ama The Roots
Ọ pụtara kwara na MTV Iggy, ebe ọ bụrụ abụ ya na Clef nite onye nke kpọrọ ya ụbọ akwara
Nneka dekọrọ ọba egwu ya nke akpọrọ Soul Is Heavy in Nigeria
Ewepụtara ya na ọnwa March n'afọ 2012
Ndekọ egwu ahụ ghọrọ ihe ama ama na France, Austria, Germany, Switzerland, wee nọrọ na ọnụọgụgụ iri atọ na asatọ na ihe ngụkọ na nke UK R&B
Otu egwu kacha aga nke ọma na ndekọ egwu ahụ bụ 'Shining Star', nke nọrọ na ọnụọgụgụ iri itoolu na asaa na UK Singles Chart
Nke ahụ bụkwa abụ ya nke abụọ na nke ikpeazụ nwetara ịnọ n'ọnọdụ ahụ
Ihe ndekọ ahụ nwetara nzaghachi dị oke egwu, ma nweta akara nke iri asaa na Metacritic
N'afọ 2012, Nneka na ndị na eme akpụkpọ ụkwụ na uwe ndị America akpọrọ Reebok nwere njikọ aka
Na ọnwa Mee n'afọ 2013, ọ pụtara na ihe nkiri arụsị ụgha site na aka Tricky

N'agbanyeghị na Nneka na-abụ abụ karịa ka ọ na-abụ egwu rap, ọ na-akpọ hip hop dị ka mgbọrọgwụ egwu ya nke bụkwa isi ihe mkpali kachasị mkpa, ebe ọ na-ehota ndị egwu dịka Fela Kuti na Bob Marley nakwa ndị rap nke oge a Mos Def, Talib Kweli, na Lauryn Hill dịka ndị bụ isi mkpali na ihe banyere iti egwu
Egwu ya na-egosipụta ọtụtụ akụkọ ihe mere eme ya na ndụ ya na Nigeria yana oge ọ nọrọ na Western Europe
Egwu ya na ekwu okwu gbasara ikekete ego, ịda ogbenye na agha ma na-ejikarị ozi nke Akwụkwọ Nsọ na ntụnyere aka
Ụfọdụ ndị na-akọwa egwu ya ma na-atụnyere ya Erykah Badu, Neneh Cherry, na Floetry
N'afọ 2012, Nneka kwadoro Rope Foundation, n'akụkụ Ahmed 'Genda' Nyei

Rope Foundation na-eje ozi dị ka ikpo okwu maka ndị na-eto eto na ndị inyom na-egosipụta onwe ha site na nkà, ha na arụ ọrụ ebere ma na-elekwasịkwa anya n'ịrụ ọrụ ebe ụmụ nwanyị ndị nke a na-emetọ mmekọahụ na WAGA (War Affected Girls & Adults) Foundation, nke dị na mpaghara Bo Town nke mba Sierra Leone
Nneka kọwara Rope Foundation dịka ndị na-arụ ọrụ 'iji nye ohere maka inyere ndị mmadụ aka ikwupụta obi ha na okwu gbasara ọha mmadụ'
Nneka na-ejekwa ozi dịka onye nnọchi anya Arts for the African Women Development Fund [AWDF] na mba Ghana
Ọ na-arụ ọrụ nke ukwuu na ọrụ ebere na nka na Sierra Leone
Nneka Abulokwe, OBE ( / ŋneka ˈabuːlɔːkwei / ) bụ onye Naijiria si Britain amaara maka ọrụ ya dịka onye ochụnta ego banyere ọrụ nchịkwa dijitalụ
Ọ bụ onye gụzọbere na onye isi ụlọ ọrụ nke MicroMax Consulting, yana otu n'ime ndị ọkachamara Afro-Caribbean nọ na UK sonyere na kọmitii nke nzukọ dijitalụ kachasị elu
Na 2019, onye isi ya bụ Queen Elizabeth II kwanyeere ya ugwu dịka onye ọrụ nke Alaeze Ukwu Britain (Officer of the British Empire (OBE)) maka ọrụ ya banyere azụmahia
A mụrụ ya na London
Nna nna ya si Naijiria na nne ya si Jamaica ma o tolitere n'obodo Port Harcourt, Nigeria
Na 1991, o nwetara nzere bachelọ na mmuta ihe mere eme site na Mahadum Port Harcourt
O mechara nweta nzere mastas na Mahadum London ya na asambodo maka mmuta ọrụ ndụzi na azụmahia na Cranfield University School of Management
Abulokwe bu onye okike ihe ọhụrụ teknuzu, onye ochụnta ego banyere ọrụ nchịkwa dijitalụ na onye isi oche
O nwere ihe karịrị afọ iri abụọ na ise na ahụmịhe na ọrụ oyibo
Ọ bụ onye guzọbere na onye isi, MicroMax Consulting
Na 2013, o sonyere na kọmitii/ndị isi oche nke Sopra Steria dị ka onye isi oche ha
N’afọ 2017, Nneka ghọrọ onye isi oche, Board Nomination Committee Information Systems Audit and Control Association (ISACA)
Dika onye isi oche nke ndi otu ahụ, o webatara usoro nhoputa ndi oru site na oru ndi ochichi
Ọ kwalitere ndị-iche na itinye oganihu n'etiti njikwa nke nzukọ a
Na 2020 a họpụtara ya dịka onye isi, Mahadum Cambridge
Na 2019, a kwanyere ya ugwu dị ka onye isi nke Order of the British Empire site n'aka onye isi mba Britain; Queen Elizabeth II maka ọrụ Azụmaahịa ya
Na 2018, a họọrọ ya onye nke anọ na Financial Times Top 100 Black Asian Minority Ethnic (BAME) Tech Leaders
Ọ sokwa na ndepụta ikpeazụ nke Governance Professional of the Year 2018 Award site n'aka Governance Institute
Na 2019, e gosipụtara Abulokwe na Power-list 100 dịka otu n'ime ndị isi ahịa azụmaahịa di ojii kachasị emetụta ọha, tinyekwa ya n'etiti ndị isi ojii 100 kachasị nwee mmetụta na UK
Edepụtara Abulokwe n'ime mmadụ 100 kachasị si Afrika na Caribbean nke dị na UK
Nneka Colleen Egbujiobi bụ onye ọkaiwu si obodo Naijiria
Ọ bụ onye Afrika nke Amerika, onye amaara nke ọma dịka onye guzọbere Hello Africa ma bụrụ onye isi oche ya

Egbujiobi gụsịrị akwụkwọ na Mahadum nke Michigan nweta asambodo maka asụsụ Bekee na akwụkwọ ọgụgụ, tupu ya agaa Mahadum mmuta iwu nke Wisconsin Law ebe ọ natara akara ugo mmụta na iwu na 2012 wee bụrụ onye ọkaiwu, na-arụ ọrụ na Pasadena, California
N’oge ya na Mahadum Michigan, ọ bụ onye nta akụkọ mahadum nke CNN
Mgbe ọ na-arụ dika okaiwu maka afọ ole na ole, ọ guzọbere Hello Africa, ngwa mkpakọrịta nwoke na nwaanyị n'ịntanetị
Egbujiobi rụrụ ọrụ dịka onye ntaakụkọ maka Beloit Daily News
Ọ rụrụ Judy Robson ọrụ mgbe ọ bụbụ onye isi ndị ụlọ nnọchite anya nke Wisconsin State Senate
A mụrụ Egbujiobi na Boston, Massachusetts ma o tolitere na Wisconsin
O si Okija, Ihiala na Anambra Steetị
Nna ya bụ Leo Egbujiobi, onye dọkịta na-ahụ maka ọrịa gbasara obi na onye ọrụ ebere
Nne ya bụ Bridget Egbujiobi
N’afọ 1979, nne na nna ya si Naịjirịa kwaga Amerịka
Nneka Isaac Moses bụ onye mgbasa ozi Naịjirịa, onye na-emepụta ejiji
Ọ bụkwa onye na-akwado ihe gbasara omenala nke mere oji bụrụ sokwa onyeisi nchịkwa nke ngosi ọdịnala Africa a'na akpọ, Goge Africa
Nneka gara mahadum nke Lagos site na afọ 1987 ruo n'afọ 1990 ebe ọ nwetara akara mmụta bachelor na asụsụ Bekee na akwụkwọ nke kpọrọ English and Literature na bekee
Ọ bidoro ma tọọ ntọala Akenn
G Limited, ụlọ ejiji na Surulere, Lagos ebe ọ na-azụ ahịa uwe maka ndị na-eme ihe nkiri, mkpọsa ahia na onyonyo na ndị chọrọ uwe maka ihe ma ọbụ oge pụrụ iche
Nneka hibere Goge Africa na afọ1999, ya na di ya Isaac, na afọ atọ ka ha lụ di na nwunye
Emere mmemme nke izizi Goge Africa n’abalị mbụ nke ọnwa Ọktoba, ka ọ dabara n’ụbọchị nnwere onwe Naịjirịa
Ihe karịrị nde mmadụ iri anọ na-ele ya na ụzọ iri na ise eji agbasa ozi na nyonyo
Ndị otu Goge Africa agala gburugburu ihe karịrị mba iri atọ na abụọ n'Africa
Nneka lụrụ Isaac n’afọ 1996
N'ajụjụ ọnụ o nyere Naijcom ọ kọwara n'oge mbụ ha zutere na ọ mara ya ụra mgbe ọ nwara isutu ya ọnụ ka ha na eme ihe ngosi nke ihe nkiri
Ọ mechara bia na-arịọ ka ya na ya kpakọrịta ma rịọ ya mgbaghara
Ha na abụọ site n'oge ahụ wee ghọọ enyi
Ọ mụrụ nwa ya nwoke Kamamra ka afọ iri na atọ gachasi ka alụchara di
Ọ nweta nmeri dị ka Onye Ntorobịa Maka Udo na afọ 2011

Nnemkadi Chinwe Victoria 'Nneka' Ogwumike bụ onye (/ˈnɛkə oʊˈɡwuːmɪkeɪ/; amụrụ na Julaị 2, 1990) bụ onye Naijiria-Amerịka na-agba bọọlụ maka Los Angeles Sparks nke Women's National Basketball Association (WNBA), mgbe edepụtara ya na No
1 n'ozuzu na 2012 WNBA Draft
N'oge na-adịghị anya mgbe edepụtara ya, Ogwumike bịanyere aka na nkwekọrịta nkwado na Nike
Ọ bụ nwanne nwanyị nke Chiney Ogwumike, onye na-egwuri egwu maka Sparks
A kpọrọ Ogwumike WNBA MVP maka oge WNBA nke afọ 2016 wee merie WNBA Finals n'otu afọ ahụ A kpọrọ aha ya na ndepụta W25 nke ndị egwuregwu 25 kachasị elu nke afọ iri abụọ na ise mbụ ya, na 2021
Ọ na-egwuri egwu maka Dynamo Kursk nke Russia Aha ya 'Nneka' pụtara 'Nne bụ Onye Kasị Elu' n'asụsụ Igbo nke Naijiria - ebe ezinụlọ ya si
Ọ dị 6'2' ma na-eme ihe ike n'ihu
Ọ gara Cy-Fair High School na Cypress, Texas ma duru ha gaa 5A State Championship na oge ikpeazụ ya
Mgbe ọ nọ na Mahadum Stanford, o nyeere Kadinal aka iru Final Four ugboro anọ
A họpụtara Ogwumike ka ọ bụrụ onye isi oche nke WNBA Players Association n'afọ 2016 ma họpụta ya ọzọ maka afọ atọ ọhụrụ n'afọ 2019
A kpọrọ Ogwumike onye WBCA All-American
O sonyere na 2008 WBCA High School All-America Game, ebe o nwetara akara iri na asaa , jidere rebounds isii ma nweta MVP nsọpụrụ maka ndị White
Ọ nwetara akara 168, 80 rebounds, 18 assists, 24 steals na 08 blocks kwa egwuregwu n'oge oge 2007 na Cy-Fair High School
Ogwumike họọrọ Stanford karịa Baylor, Duke, Connecticut, Tennessee na Notre Dame
Ọ bụ onye otu USA Under 18 Team nke ritere ọla edo na Argentina na July 23-27, 2008
Nneka nwetara akara iri abụọ na rebounds iri na ise na egwuregwu mmeri nke Under-18 FIBA Americas
Ọ duuru ndị otu USA gaa na ndekọ 5-0 mgbe ọ na-eduga ndị otu ahụ n'ịgba goolu na ịwụghachi
A kpọrọ ya MVP nke asọmpi a na Argentina
Nneka sokwa nwanne ya nwanyị, Chiney Ogwumike na Stanford
Na ụbọchị iri abụọ na atọ n'ọnwa Jenụwarị 2010, Ogwumike mebiri ihe ndekọ nke Cardinal maka rebounds n'egwuregwu na iri abụọ na atọ iji soro akara iri atọ na mmeri 100-80 na Oregon

N'abalị iri abụọ n'ọnwa Disemba n'afọ 2011, Ogwumike nwetara akara iri anọ na abụọ kachasị elu na iri na itoolu maka ịgba égbè iri abụọ na asaa mgbe ọ na-ejikwa rebounds iri na asaa na mmeri iri itoolu na asaa na Tennessee Lady Vols nke isii
N'ụbọchị asaa n'ọnwa Jenụwarị, 2012, Ogwumike gafere ma akara 2,000 na 1,000 rebound thresholds maka ọrụ ya na 33-point, rebound iri na isii arụmọrụ megide Oregon State
Ogwumike hapụrụ Stanford Cardinal dị ka onye nke abụọ na-ebute akara maka mmemme basketball ụmụ nwanyị, n'azụ naanị Candice Wiggins
Ogwumike bụ onye otu USA Women's U18 team nke meriri nrite ọla edo na FIBA Americas Championship na Buenos Aires, Argentina
E mere ihe omume ahụ na Julaị 2008, mgbe ndị otu USA meriri Argentina iji merie asọmpi ahụ
Ogwumike nyeere ndị otu ahụ aka imeri egwuregwu ise niile, malite egwuregwu ise niile ma na-eduga ndị niile na-agba bọọlụ na 126 n'egwuregwu ọ bụla
Ọ bụkwa onye na-ebute ụzọ na 8 kwa egwuregwu
Ogwumike dekọrọ 15 rebounds na egwuregwu ikpeazụ megide Argentina, ndekọ U18
Ogwumike gara n'ihu na otu USA Women's U19 nke nọchitere anya US na 2009 U19 World's Championship, nke emere na Bangkok, Thailand na July na August 2009

Ọ bụ ezie na ndị otu USA meriri egwuregwu mmeghe na Spain, ha gara n'ihu merie egwuregwu asaa ha sochirinụ iji nweta mmeghachi omume megide Spain na ngwụcha, wee merie egwuregwu 81-71 iji nweta ọla edo
Ogwumike malitere egwuregwu itoolu niile ma bụrụ onye na-ebute akara n'otu egwuregwu ahụ, na akara 136 kwa egwuregwu
Ọ bụ onye na-ebute ụzọ na ihe fọrọ nke nta ka ọ bụrụ iri n'egwuregwu ọ bụla, a kpọkwara ya aha na otu egwuregwu niile
Ogwumike gbara na otu na-egosi US na 2011 World University Games nke emere na Shenzhen, China, ya na nwanne ya nwanyị, Chiney Ogwumike
Ndị otu ahụ, nke Bill Fennelly zụrụ, meriri egwuregwu isii niile iji nweta ihe nrite ọla edo
Ogwumike nwetara akara 132 na 57 rebounds kwa egwuregwu, ha abụọ bụ nke abụọ na otu ahụ n'azụ Elena Delle Donne
Ogwumike gbakwara Team USA bọọlụ na 2014 FIBA World Championship for Women, na-enyere Team USA aka imeri Spain 77·64 na egwuregwu ọla edo
N' ụbọchị iri na isii n'ọnwa April 2012, Los Angeles Sparks họọrọ Ogwumike nke mbụ n'ozuzu na 2012 WNBA Draft
Ọ ghọrọ onye egwuregwu nke abụọ site na Cypress-Fairbanks High School ka edepụtara No
1 n'ozuzu ya na WNBA n'azụ Lindsey Harding na 2007
N'abalị iri na abụọ n'ọnwa Julaị n'afọ 2012, Ogwumike setịpụrụ ọkwa kachasị elu na rebounds na iri abụọ iji soro akara iri abụọ na abụọ na mmeri 77-74, onye mmeri WNBA Indiana Fever
N'abalị iri na atọ n'ọnwa Septemba n'afọ 2012, o nwetara akara iri atọ n'ime iri na ise iji soro rebounds iri na otu na mmeri 86z77 na Chicago Sky

Na ngwụcha oge na Septemba bu ubochi iri abụọ na 2012, Ogwumike dakọtara na onye otu ya Candace Parker maka ọkwa dị elu na isi abụọ na rebounds na onye ọkpụkpọ ọ bụla na-enweta 22 na 11, n'otu n'otu, na mmeri 92 76 na onye na-agbachitere onye mmeri WNBA Minnesota Lynx
Ogwumike bụ iri maka iri na atọ site n'ọhịa
A kpọrọ Ogwumike WNBA Rookie of the Month ugboro anọ n'ime ise n'oge rookie ya
N'October ụbọchị asaa 2012, e nyere Ogwumike dị ka 2012 WNBA Rookie of the Year
Ọ bụ afọ nke ise n'usoro na onye mbụ a họọrọ meriri ihe nrite ahụ

N'oge afọ 2014, Ogwumike mere nkezi 158 ppg ma họpụta ya dị ka WNBA All-star maka oge nke abụọ n'ọrụ ya ya na nwanne ya nwanyị Chiney Ogwumike, na-aghọ ụmụnne nwanyị abụọ mbụ a họpụtara n'ime egwuregwu WNBA All
N'afọ 2016, Ogwumike bịanyere aka na Sparks ozugbo nkwekọrịta ọhụrụ ya gwụrụ
N'oge oge ahụ, a kpọrọ Ogwumike onye egwuregwu AP WNBA nke Afọ, mgbe ọ na-emecha nke atọ na league na akara (197 ppg), nke atọ naleague na rebounding (91 rpg) na nke mbụ na pasentị goolu (665)
Ọrụ oge ya ga-enyekwa ya aka inweta 2016 WNBA Most Valuable Player Award

N'oge oge ahụ, Ogwumike setịpụrụ ihe ndekọ WNBA maka ọtụtụ ihe mgbaru ọsọ n'usoro (23 ihe mgbarugwụ n'usoro n'ime egwuregwu atọ) ma setịpụ ihe ndekọ ọhụrụ WNBA maka otu egwuregwu maka ọtụtụ mgbalị n'ọhịa na-enweghị njehie nke o nwetara akara iri atọ na abụọ na iri abụọ na abụọ nke iri abụọ na abụọ n'ọgbọ egwuregwu na mmeri 97 - 73 na Dallas Wings
N'abalị iri atọ n'ọnwa Juun n'afọ 2016, o nwetara akara iri atọ na asatọ na rebounds iri na otu na mmeri 84-75 megide Atlanta Dream

Na mgbakwunye, o setịpụrụ ndekọ basketball maka ọnụ ọgụgụ kachasị elu nke ezigbo ịgba égbè site na iru 737% n'oge oge ahụ, na-aghọ onye na-agba égbè kachasị mma n'akụkọ ihe mere eme nke basketball ọkachamara
Site na nkwado nke Candace Parker na Kristi Toliver, Sparks bụ onye na-asọ mpi mmeri na league na ndekọ 26-8
Site na usoro egwuregwu ọhụrụ nke WNBA, Sparks bụ mkpụrụ nke abụọ na league na-asị abụọ gaa na ọkara ikpeazụ (agba ikpeazụ tupu WNBA Finals) na-eche Chicago Sky ihu
Sparks meriri Sky 3-1 na usoro ahụ, na-aga n'ihu na WNBA Finals maka oge mbụ kemgbe 2003
Na WNBA Finals, ọ bụ oge nke abụọ n'akụkọ ihe mere eme nke league ka ìgwè abụọ sitere n'otu nzukọ ahụ chere ihu na ibe ha na Final n'ihi usoro egwuregwu ọhụrụ
Na Minnesota Lynx na-agbachitere asọmpi ahụ, Sparks meriri asọmpi ahụ na usoro egwuregwu ise siri ike, merie asọmpi mbụ ha kemgbe afọ 2002
Ogwumike meriri n'asọmpi WNBA nke mbụ ya

N'egwuregwu nke ise nke usoro ahụ, Ogwumike nwere akara iri na abụọ yana rebounds iri na abụọ ma gbaa bọọlụ mmeri egwuregwu mgbe o jidere mmeghachi omume mmegide iji mee ka Sparks ruo 77- 76 na sekọnd atọ fọdụrụ na egwuregwu ahụ
Ogwumike ghọrọ onye egwuregwu nke asaa n'akụkọ ihe mere eme nke WNBA iji merie ma ihe nrite MVP na asọmpi n'otu oge ahụ
N'afọ 2017,bu Ogwumike bịanyere aka na nkwekọrịta nkwekọrịta na Sparks
N'oge oge 2017, a họpụtara Ogwumike n'ime egwuregwu WNBA All-Star nke afọ 2017, na-eme ka ọ bụrụ ọrụ ya nke anọ
N'abalị iri na asatọ n'ọnwa Ọgọstụ n'afọ 2017, Ogwumike nwetara akara iri atọ na abụọ kachasị elu n'oge egwuregwu yana rebounds iri na mmeri okpukpu abụọ nke oge mgbakwunye na Chicago Sky

Ka ọ na-erule ngwụcha oge ahụ, Ogwumike duziri Sparks n'ịgba goolu maka oge nke abụọ n'usoro, na-eme nkezi 188 ppg na Sparks mechara dị ka mkpụrụ nke abụọ maka afọ nke abụọ n'usoro na otu ndekọ ahụ, na-enweta okpukpu abụọ na ọkara ikpeazụ
Sparks ga-aga n'ihu na ngwụcha maka oge nke abụọ n'usoro, mgbe ha merisịrị Phoenix Mercury na egwuregwu atọ, na-eguzobe mmeghachi omume na Lynx
Otú ọ dị, Sparks ga-efunahụ na egwuregwu ise, na-emerighị asọmpi azụ azụ
Iji malite n'afọ 2018, Ogwumike nwetara akara iri abụọ na ise kachasị elu n'oge mmeri iri asatọ na asaa na iri asaa na Indiana Fever
Ka oge na-aga, a họpụtara Ogwumike n'ime 2018 WNBA All-Star Game mana ọ ga-ahapụ egwuregwu ahụ n'ihi ike ọgwụgwụ, nke mere ka ọ nọrọ ihe karịrị otu izu n'etiti ọnwa Julaị
Ogwumike laghachiri n'ụbọchị nke abụọ n'ọnwa Ọgọstụ n'afọ 2018, megide Minnesota Lynx wee nweta akara iri na ise na mmeri 79-57
Ogwumike mechiri oge ahụ na 155 ppg
Sparks ji ọnụọgụ isii na league mechie 19 - 15 N'egwuregwu mmeri nke mbụ, ha meriri Minnesota Lynx na-agbachitere asọmpi ahụ
N'egwuregwu nke abụọ, Sparks meriri Washington Mystics na 96-64
N'abalị anọ n'ọnwa Julaị n'afọ 2019, bụ Ogwumike nwetara akara iri atọ na otu kachasị elu n'oge ya yana rebound iri na mmeri 98 na 1981 na Washington Mystics
Ogwumike ga-ahọpụta n'ime 2019 WNBA All-Star Game, na-eme ka ọ bụrụ nke isii ya
Sparks mechiri oge ahụ dị ka mkpụrụ nke atọ na ndekọ 221012, na-enweta bye na agba nke abụọ
N'egwuregwu nke abụọ, Sparks meriri ndị na-agbachitere Seattle Storm 92[[69
Na ọkara ikpeazụ, e wepụrụ Sparks na egwuregwu atọ nke Connecticut Sun
N'afọ 2020, e yigharịrị oge ahụ ma mee ka ọ dị mkpirikpi ruo egwuregwu iri abụọ na abụọ na bọọlụ na IMG Academy n'ihi ọrịa COVID-19
N'abalị iri na abụọ n'ọnwa Septemba n'afọ 2020, Ogwumike nwetara akara iri abụọ na anọ n'ime mmeri Las Vegas Aces
Ogwumike gbara egwuregwu iri na asatọ n'ime egwuregwu iri abụọ na abụọ (na-anọpụ egwuregwu anọ na mmerụ ahụ azụ)
Sparks mechiri oge 15-7 dị ka mkpụrụ nke atọ, na-enweta bye na agba nke abụọ, mana Connecticut Sun wepụrụ ha ọzọ n'egwuregwu mwepụ, Ogwumike enweghị ike igwu egwu maka egwuregwu ahụ n'ihi ọrịa
Na Jenụwarị 2021,bụ Ogwumike bịanyere aka na Sparks maka nkwekọrịta ọtụtụ afọ
N'oge nke 2021

nke 25 nke WNBA, a kpọrọ aha ya na W25 dị ka otu n'ime ndị egwuregwu iri abụọ na ise kachasị elu n'akụkọ ihe mere eme nke league, na ngwụcha oge ahụ a họpụtara ya maka WNBA's Kim Perrot Sportsmanship Award maka afọ nke atọ n'usoro
N'afọ 2012 na-abụghị oge egwuregwu, Ogwumike gbara bọọlụ na Poland maka CCC Polkowice wee merie otu mmeri na otu ahụ Kemgbe afọ 2014, Ogwumike agbaala bọọlụ atọ na Russia maka Dynamo Kursk
Klọb ahụ meriri Euroleague nke afọ 2017
Na ngwụcha afọ 2017, Ogwumike laghachiri na Dynamo Kursk maka oge ezumike WNBA nke afọ 2017
Ogwumike bụ onye Katọlik

Nneka Onuorah amuru n’afọ 1988 bu onye isi nduzi na ndi mmeputa nke Amerika
A maara ya nke ọma maka izizi onye isi ya,The Same Difference O mere n'afọ 2015, gender roles na obodo ndị nwanyị na-ahụkarị nwanyị
A họpụtara ihe nkiri a maka ihe nrite GLAAD n'ụdị 'Akwụkwọ kacha mma'
Onuorah amuru na Queens , New York tolitere na agbata obiLeFrak City
Nna ya bụ onye Naijiria ma nne ya bụ Afrika na Amerika
Ọ kwagara Atlanta ka ya na nne nne ya biri na klas nke ise ma laghachi Queens maka agụm akwụkwọ sekọndrị
Ọ mụtara ịgba egwu na Broadway Dance Center, ma mesịa nweta akara ugo mmụta mmekọrịta ya na LaGuardia Community College
Onuorah gara ọmụmụ ọrụ na BET n'afọ 2009 ma mechaa goro ya dika onye na emeputa ihe
Ọ rụrụ ọrụ n'ihe egwu nkiri Black Girls Rock! na akwukwo egwu ndi ọzọ di iche iche
Mgbe afọ isii gachara, Onuorah hapụrụ ndi otu ya ahụ ka ọ rụọ ọrụ na ihe nkiri izizi ya bụ The Same Difference
Ihe o kwuru mere o ji meputa ihe omuma a bu ụkọ nke ndi nnochi anya ndi LGBTQIA na ndi ọrụ mgbasa ozi

Onuorah bidoro ozi ndonye ukwu Kickstarter iji nweta ego o ji mee ihe nkiri The Same Difference , nke bụ akwụkwọ banyere akparamàgwà n' studs and femmes n' obodo isi oji ebe nwanyị n'edina nwanyi ibe ya
O kwuola maka nkatọ o wetara n,aka ụmụnwayi n,edina nwayi ibe ha banyere otu o si enyi efe ụmụnwanyi karia nke ụmụnwoke
Onuorah enwetaghi ego ọ chọrọ oge o mere ozi ndọnye ukwu, kama o ji ego nke ya nwe mee ihe nkiri ahu
E meputaraThe Same Difference na ọnwa june n,afọ 2015
Ọ haziri ọrụ Netflix bụ First and Last , ma-meputakwa My House otu usoro ihe nkiri ndi Viceland bụ maka ndi ballroom bụ isi oji na Latin bi na New York
Ọ gara ballroom n'oge uto ya ma jee ije na ngalaba Butch

Na 2019, o kwuputara oru ngo nke Giselle Bailey na-ahazi ma na-emekorita banyere ndi LGBTQ nke Naijiria ndi hapuru obodo a na-acho mgbapu n'ihi iwu mgbochi LGBTQ N'afọ ahụ, ha wepụtara otu akwụkwọ akpọrọ Burn Down The House banyere onye Parisian na-agba egwu Kiddy Smile, nke bidoro na NewFest LGTBQ Film Festival
Nneka Onyeali-Ikpe (amuru Julaị 28, 1964) bu onye isi azumahia nke Naijiria na onye nchuaja
Ọ bụ nwanyị mbụ managing director na onye isi ụlọ ọrụ Fidelity Bank Nigeria
A mụrụ Nneka Onyeali-Ikpe na Awka, Anambra State, na Isiten Naijiria
O birikwa na Owerri, Imo Steeti, ebe o guru akwukwo na Federal Government Girls College
Onyeali-Ikpe nwere nzere iwu na Mahadum Naijiria, Nsukka
O nwekwara nzere masta na iwu site na King's College London
Ọ malitere ọrụ ụlọ akụ ya dịka onye ọrụ iwu na Afrịkan Continental
Bank
O sonyezie First African Trust Bank dị ka onye ọrụ nchekwa ego
O mechara banye Zenith Bank na Standard Chartered Bank n'otu n'otu
N'afọ 2011, ọ sonyeere ụlọ akụ Enterprise dịka onye isi ụlọ ọrụ na-ahụ maka ọrụ ụlọ akụ na Lagos na ebe ndị ọzọ na mpaghara Sawutu-Weesti na Naijiria
Onyeali-Ikpe sonyeere ụlọakụ azụmahịa Fidelity dịka onye isi isi na Jenụwarị 2015
Fidelity Bank kwuputara Onyeali-Ikpe ka ọ bụrụ onye isi njikwa ya na Disemba 2020
Onyeali-Ikpe aluru nwunye
Nneka Obiamaka Onyejekwe (a mụrụ 18 August, 1989 na Hațeg) bụ ọkaibe n’egwuregwu volleybọọlụ si Romanian na-agbaara otu ndị CS Volei Alba-Blaj na Romania national team
A mụrụ ya na Hațeg na nne si Romania na nna si Naijiria, ha bụ ndị ọgụgụ isi, o tolitere na Cluj-Napoca
Otu n’ime ụmụnne ya nwoke, Chike, na-agba egwuregwu handbọọlụ
Nneka Ukuh (amuru na onwa Novemba 20, 1987) bu nwanyi na-eme egwuregwu egwu na ogige nke si Naijiria
Ọ bụ ọkachamara na mmemme ịgba elu dị elu, a makwaara ya nke ọma maka imeri ihe nrite ọla edo maka obodo ya dị n'Ebe Ọdịda Anyanwụ Africa na 2003 All-Africa Games

A na-ewere ya dị ka ihe nkiri Nollywood malitere usoro akụkọ gbasara ndị mmụọ ọjọọ ji ndị ụkọchukwu sachara
Nneka The Pretty Agwọ na- esochi akụkọ otu nwanyị nke chọsiri ike ịmụ nwa nke ya
Iji tụụrụ ime, ọ zutere chi nwanyị osimiri (nke a na-akpọkwa Mami Wata ) maka enyemaka
O kwere nkwa inyefe nwa ahụ nye chi nwanyị osimiri maka enyemaka ya
Nwanyị a tụụrụ ime wee mụọ nwa nwanyị aha ya bụ Nneka
Nneka nwere ikike karịrị nke mmadụ nke ọ na-eji eme ihe ọjọọ; ebumnobi ya bụ ịrata ndị nwoke a ma ama n’alụmdi na nwunye iji were ego na mkpụrụ obi ha
Omume ọjọọ ya na-ebute nbibi nke Tony na mkpochapụ nke ezinụlọ Chima Ogbonna

N'ụbọchị ugbu a, Nneka bụ onye Onyencheere nwanyi na-arụkọ ọrụ na onye isi dị egwu, Gbenga na Onyencheere nwanyi ibe ya, Ada
Ọ na -achụ nwoke na -azụ ahịa ha aha ya bụ Tony Okechukwu
Ọ na -arọ nrọ maka nne ya ma ọ eleta onye na -agba afa ka ọ nweta azịza gbasara nrọ ya

Mgbe ọ nwetasịrị ike ya, nne eze nwanyị na -apụta n'ihu Nneka n'enyo wee kọọrọ ya otu (eze nwanyi nne) ọ siri tụfuo ike ya nye onye ọ matara mbụ na otú nne Nneka sị bụrụ onye otu ọgbụgba ndụ ha
Nneka na -eziga ozi na ala ihe omimi ebe ọ na -ezute Eze Nwanyị nne nke na -enye ya ndụmọdụ
Onye ọ na -achụ bụ nwoke akpọrọ Udoka Ojukwu na ndị mmekọ ya na mmepe agwaetiti

Inspector Daniel bidoro nyocha ya na Ojukwus
Kpa nke Eze nwanyi nne na -mụbaa na ọnwụ ọ bụla

Nwanne nwanyị Tony, Tessy pụtara wee nye Nneka ihe isi ike
Nneka tinyere ọgwụ na unere nke Tessy na -eri ma yie ka ọ na -enwe mgbanwe uche banyere Nneka
Ka ọ dị ugbua, Eze nwanyi nne na -enye nneka ndụmọdụ ka o gbuo Alhaji Abdullahi onye n'esote; ọ banyere n'ụgbọelu nkeonwe ya na Nneka pụtara dị ka onye nnabata
Ọnwụ nke njide obi ya na onye nnabata ikuku na -efuefu na -ama ọkwa na akụkọ
Tony webatara Nneka nye Tega Oghenekaro dịka 'enyi nwanyị ya na nwunye ọ ga -abịa n'ọdịnihu'
Ọ na -eso Tega gaa n'ulo ọrụ ya, ọ tụrụ ya n'anya ịhụ ya, wee gbuo ya
Nneka bidoro ụlọ ọrụ ya, Brickwood Housing wee tụba soiree ebe iwe na -ewe Tony maka ọnwụ nwanne nna ya
Onye nyocha Daniel gosipụtara ka ọ jụọ Tony ajụjụ gbasara alibi ya
Nneka na -enye onye nyocha ahụ mkpịsị odee nke yiri nke ọ hụrụ n'etiti ihe Udoka Ojukwu
Nke a na -adọrọ mmasị ya
Ọ pụtara n'ụlọ Tony wee zute naanị Nneka, ọ chọpụtara na ọ nọ ya wee na -alụ ọgụ mana ọ gburu ya
Tony na -akpọ Nneka ka ya na ezinaụlọ ya rie nri abalị
Nna ya bụ Anthony Okechukwu, onye ọzọ ọ ga -achụ
Ọ na -egosipụta nchegbu nye eze nwanyị nne dịka ọ ga -ekpebi n'etiti igbu nna nke ma ọ bụ ịlụ ịhụnanya nke ndụ ya
Eze nwanyi nne dọrọ Nneka aka na ntị na Anthony bụ nwoke siri ike
Nneka zutere Anthony n'ụlọ ụka ya wee chụpụ mmụọ ọjọọ ya
Iji hụ na Eze nwanyị Nne enwetaghị ike ya, Anthony mara onwe ya mma

Anthony na -agwa ya na ọ bụ Eze nwanyị Nne tozuru oke, na ọ ga -ewepụ oche Eze nwany Nneị na ụbọchị ọmụmụ ya nke iri atọ na abụọ

Nneka mepere ụlọ oriri iji sọpụrụ Ada ma Richard Williams bụ otu n'ime ndị ahịa mbụ
Emere nyocha maka ọrụ Nneka na Federal Capital Territory, Nigeria na Owerri, Imo State na Maachị 2020

Nnenna Ijeoma Elendu Ukeje bụ onye na anọchite anya ndi Bende, Abia State, Nigeria na gburugburu nke Etiti

A họpụtara ya ọzọ na ọkwa nka na ọnwa nke ise na afọ 2011, enye kwara ya okwa nke onye isi oche na ahụ maka nmekọrita anyi na mba di ọzọ Na ndọrọ ndọrọ nke afọ 2015 ahọpụtara ya ọzọ ma nyekwa ya onye isi oche na ahụ maka nmekọrita anyi na mba di ọzọ
Ukeje bụ onye Alayi na Abia State, ọ gụrụ sekọndịrị na ụlọ akwụkwọ a na akpọ Federal Government Girls College, Owerri, Imo State
Ọgụkwara akwụkwọ na mmahadụm nke Benin nọ na Edo State tụpụ ya aga weta asambodo na Mahadụm nke a na akpọ University of Lagos Asambodo nke oritere bụ na ngalaba ndi na ahụ maka ihe mmụta
Tụpụ ya ebido ọrụ ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị, ọ gbara mbọ na ọrụ njikwa ụlọ-oriri na nkwari

Ụkeje mere ka ndi mmadụ mara na mmasi ya maka ihe gbasara ọrụ ohanaeze si na aka papa ya nwụrụ awụ bụ Kaptin Elendu-Ụkeje, onye etụrụ ụgo na okwa ya (Onye na anya ụgbọelu) na ụlọ ọrụ ya na Naijiria Air Fọsụ ya na Naijirian Airwes tụpụ ọga ezụmike-nka
Mama Ụkeje aha ya bụ Roseline Ukeje, jere ozi na ọnọdụ Onyeisi Ikpe na Ụlọ-Ikpe elu nke Etiti tụpụ ọ laa ezụmike-nka
Mgbe Ukeje dabatara na ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchichi na afọ 2007 , o were ọkwa onye nochitere anya ndi Bende na agbụrụ Gomentị Etiti, Abia Steetị na People's Democratic Party (Nigeria)
A họpụtaghariri ya ọzọ na afọ 2011
Nnenna Freelon (amụrụ n'abalị iri abụọ na asatọ nke ọnwa Julaị afọ 1954) bụ onye America na-agụ egwu jazz, onye na-ede egwu, onye na'emepụta ihe, na onye nhazi
A mụrụ Freelon Chinyere Nnenna Pierce nye Charles na Frances Pierce na Cambridge, Massachusetts, ebe a zụlitere ya
O nwere nwanne nwoke Melvin na nwanne nwanyị aha ya bụ Debbie
Dị ka nwa agbọghọ, ọ bụrụ abụ nke ukwuu na obodo ya na Union Baptist Church na St
Paul AME
Ọ chetara, 'Amalitere m ịbụ abụ n'ụlọ ụka, dị ka ọtụtụ ndị ọzọ' Nnenna gụsịrị akwụkwọ na Simmons College na Boston nke onwetara nzere na nlekọta ahụike
Ruo oge ụfọdụ ọ rụrụ ọrụ na Durham County Hospital Corporation, Durham, North Carolina
Ọ na-atụpụta na mmetụta ya gụnyere ọtụtụ 'ndị na-amaghị ama' tinyere Nina Simone na Billy Eckstine, onye nne na nna ya na-akpọ egwu ya n'ụlọ
'Ọ dị mkpa imeghe ụmụ gị anya na agburugburu ebe egwu sara mbara', ka ọ na-ekwu
' emerem ihe nne m gwara m 'Chawapụ ebe isi malite isi ije gi, 'abala ụgbọala gaa New York ma ọ bụ LA, bụọ abụ ebe ị nọ'
N'afọ 1990, Nnenna Freelon gara nzukọ jazz nke Southern Arts Federation wee zute Ellis Marsalis
'Nke ahụ bụ nnukwu mgbanwe
N'oge ahụ, anọwo m na-ịbụ abụ kemgbe afọ asaa
Ellis bụ onye nkuzi ma ọ chọrọ ịzụlite ma nye aka
Ihe m na-amaghị n'oge ahụ bụ na George Butler nke Columbia Records na-achọ nwanyị na-agụ egwu
Ellis gwara okwu m maka ihe ngosi ọmụmatụ
Enwere m obere ihe obibi akwụkwọ m na obere teepu ma enwere egwu mbụ
Afọ abụọ ka e mesịrị, a bịanyere m aka na nkwekọrịta nke Columbia Records
Ọ nọ na ngwụcha afọ iri atọ ya mgbe o mere CD mbụ ya, Nnenna Freelon, maka Columbia n'afọ 1992
Akara ahụ wepụrụ ya na 1994, Concord Records nabatara ya n'afọ 1996
Ya na Ray Charles, Ellis Marsalis, Al Jarreau, Anita Baker, Aretha Franklin, Dianne Reeves, Diana Krall, Ramsey Lewis, George Benson, Clark Terry, Herbie Hancock, na Terence Blanchard arụkọla ọrụ
Ọ rụrụ ọrụ na Carnegie Hall, Hollywood Bowl, Ellington Jazz Festival, Monterey Jazz Festival, Apollo Theater, Montreux Jazz Festival, John F
Kennedy Center for the Performing Arts

Freelon bụ ọnụ na-ekwuchitere mba nke National Association of Partners in Education, otu nzukọ nwere ihe karịrị ụlọ akwụkwọ narị puku anọ na mmemme mmekọrịta obodo na ngafe United States, tinye ichu naagụmakwụkwọ nka
Freelon anọgidewo na-ejikọta ya na ọrụ ụlọ ọgwụ ya ka ọrụ jazz ya na-aga nke ọma
Ọmụmụ ihe Babysong ya, nke ọ malitere na Duke University Medical Center n'afọ 1990, na-akụziri ndị nne na-eto eto na ndị na-ahụ maka ahụike mkpa olu mmadụ dị maka ọgwụgwọ na nzụlite
Ọ na-ekwusi ike na mkpa ndị nne na nna na-ịbụ abụ nye ụmụaka iji bulie uto ụbụrụ
N'afọ 1979, ọ lụrụ onye na-ese ụkpụrụ ụlọ bụ Philip Freelon
Ya na di ya zụlitere ụmụ atọ, bụ Deen, Maya na Pierce, tupu ya ekpebie ịrụ ọrụ dịka onye na-agụ egwu jazz

Nwa ha nwoke Pierce Freelon bụ onye na agụ egwú hip hop, Prọfesọ Nleta nke Sayensị ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị na Mahadum North Carolina Central na onye guzobere ebe nrụọrụ weebụ Blackademics, nke ọ gbara ọtụtụ ndị ama ama dịka Angela Davis, Maya Angelou, Nikki Giovanni, na Jesse Jackson ajụjụ ọnụ
Deen Freelon bụ osote prọfesọ na Hussman School of Journalism na Media na Mahadum North Carolina na Chapel Hill na-amụ mgbasa ozi mmekọrịta na ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị
Nwa nwanyị Maya Freelon Asante bụ onye na-ese ihe osise
Nnenna Njoku|url=http //wwwolympediaorg/athletes/73960%7Caccess-date=2020-11-14%7Cwebsite=wwwolympediaorg}}
Nnenna sooro na asọmpi nke 1972 Summer Olympics nke ọ nọchitere anya Naịjirịa na mita 4 × 100, Relay, ụmụ nwanyị, women's high jump nakwa women's shot put
Nnenna Nwakanma bụ onye ndọrọndọrọ FOSS nke Naịjirịa, onye nhazi obodo, ma onye ndụmọdụ mmepe obodo
Ọ rụrụ ọrụ afọ iri na ise na United Nations dị ka onye isi na-ahụ maka amụma maka ihe gbasara World Wide Web Foundation
Nwakanma rụrụ ọrụ afọ iri na ise na United Nations
Ọ bụ onye nsote ndị bidoro otu akpọrọ Free Software na Open Source Foundation maka Africa nke ọ bụ kwa osote onye isi Na mbụ Nwakanma so bụ ndị isi na atu alo na Open Source Initiative
O jikọtara aka ya na ndị ọzọ wee malite The Africa Network of Information Society Actors, na African Civil Society maka Ozi Society nke ọ na-eje ozi na ya ]
Ọ bukwa onye nsote onye isi oche na otu Digital Solidarity Fund Na mbụ, ọ rụrụ ọrụ dị ka onye ozi na-ahụ maka ozi nke Africa na Helen Keller Foundation

Nwakanma ekwuola okwu na nzukọ maka Open Source na Free Software na isiokwu ndị ọzọ gụnyere O'Reilly's OSCON, ndị Free and Open Source Developers European Meeting (FOSDEM), Yale University 's Access to Knowledge Conference, Ghana- India Kofi Annan centre maka Ọkachamara na ICT, Open World Forum, na Nzukọ Ọchịchị ntanetị
N'ihe dị ka n'afọ 2019, ọ bụ onye ntụzịaka Onye Nduzi nke maka World Wide Web Foundation ebe ọ na-akwado ọrụ na Alliance for Affordable Internet na Weebụ Anyị Chọrọ
Nwakanma na asụ asụsụ Bekee, French na asụsụ ole na ole n'Afrika
O bi na Abidjan, Côte d'Ivoire Ọ bi go kwa na'ebe ole na ole dịkarịa ala mba ise dị iche iche n'Afrika
Nnenna Okore (amuru na Australia, n'afo 1975) bu onye osise ihe n'aru oru n'obodo Nigeria na mba United States

Otutu oru aka ya, bu ihe nkiti akpulu akpu sitere na mkpalite ihe ederede, agba di iche iche na udi di iche iche ndi gbaraya okirikiri ebe obibi ya Nchota uru n'ihe ndi abaghizi uru, Okore n'etinye n'uju olu ya, otutu akara ihe nwere nghota site na uzo di iche iche ndi mara ya ahu ma dikwa omimi
Mgbe ufodu O n'atukwasi obi n'otutu ihe ndi atufuru atufu, ndi ana agbanwe n'udi ihe okpukpu gbagoro agbago na nrunye di iche iche site na usoro di ugboro ugboro na nke kpu oku n'onu

Otutu usoro ya bu ndi gunyere iji aka kpa akwa, ikwa akwa, ngaghari, mgbago na nchaghari bu ihe ndi omutara site n'ikiri umu ama ala Naijiria ndi obu olu aka ha kwa ubochi Otutu oru Okore nyochara nkowa zuru ezu n'elu na nhazi ihe omumu
Nnenna Nnannaya Oti (a mụrụ na abalị iri na ise ọnwa Nọvemba (15 Novemba) 1958) bụ onye prọfesọ na Naijiria na-osote onye isi nke mahadum Federal University of Technology Owerri

Oti meriri Ikechukwu Dozie na abalị iri na atọ nke ọnwa Eprel afọ puku abụọ na ịrị abụọ na otu ( 13 Eprel 2021) wee malitekwa ọrụ dịka osote onye isi oche nke asatọ nke ụlọ akwụkwọ ahụ na abalị iri na itoolu nke ọnwa Juun afọ puku abụọ na ịrị abụọ na otu (19 June 2021)
A mụrụ Nnenna Oti na Afikpo North, Steeti Ebonyi , Nigeria
Ọ natara nzere B
Agric

na sayensị ala site na Mahadum Nigeria, o jiri akwụkwọ klaasi mbụ (nke bekee kpọrọ First class honor) wee gụchaaỌ gara n'ihu wee nweta nzere masta na social science nke lekwasịrị anya na bayọlọji ala(soil biology) na bayọkemịstrị(biochemistry) site na otu mahadum Naịjirịa
Ọ gakwara n'ihu gaa mahadum Katọlik dị na Leuven ebe ọ nwetara diplọma postgraduate na injiniarịn mmiri, nweta ọpụrụiche
O nwetara akara ugo mmụta dọctọrete na nchekwa ala na gburugburu ebe obibi na mahadum Federal University of Technology Owerri
Oti bụ onye isi ugboro atọ na ngalaba sayensị na teknụzụ ala n'ụlọ akwụkwọ nke ọrụ ugbo na teknụzụ ugbo na mahadum Federal University of Technology Owerri
Ọ bụbu onye isi oche ngalaba amụma nwoke na nwanyị nakwa onye isi ụlọ akwụkwọ ndi postgrajuete n'oge nke abụọ ya
Ọ bụ nnukwu ọka mmụta (prọfesọ) nke sayensị ala na nchekwa gburugburu ebe obibi

Na abalị iri na atọ nke ọnwa Eprel afọ puku abụọ na iri abụo na otu (13 Eprel 2021), a họpụtara Oti dịka osote onye isi oche nke mahadum Federal University of Technology Owerri ka ọ nọchie Francis Chukwuemeka Eze mgbe ọchịchị ya ga-agwụ na abalị iri na itoolu nke ọnwa Juun afọ puku abụọ na iri abụọ na otu (19 June 2021)
Ọ meriri mmadụ isii ndị ọzọ wee nweta pasentị iri asaa na ise na ụma (755 %) wee merie onye ya na ya na-akpachi anya bụ Ikechukwu Dozie bụ onye nwetara pasentị iri isii na iteolu na ụma (697%)
Ugbu a ọ bụ nwanyị mbụ na-anọ dika osote onye isi oche nke ụlọ akwụkwọ ahụ naka onye bụbu osote onye isi oche, ngalaba agụmakwụkwọ
N'afọ puku abụọ na iri abụọ na otu (2021, nchịkwa ya chere nkatọ maka ịhọpụta Minista Nkwukọrịta na Akụnaụba Dijitalụ, Isa Ali Pantami nnukwu onye ọka mmụta Prọfesọ na-agbasoghị usoro ziri ezi
Otu ndi gụrụ na mahadum ahụ nke a kpọrọ Alumni Association of Federal University of Technology Owerri (FUTO) kpọrọ ihe nrite a aghụghọ ma kpọkuo ndị isi mahadum ka ha chegharịa echiche na nhọpụta ahụ
Otu Academic Staff Union of Universities (ASUU) kọwakwara nkwalite Ali Isa Pantami, na ọkwá onye prọfesọ dị ka nke “iwu akwadoghị” ma kwe nkwa na ya ga-enye Oti ntaramahụhụ
Oti lụrụ Nnannaya Oti ma ha mụrụ ụmụ atọ
As of 2006[update], Nnewi nwere ihe ruru mmadụ 391,227 dịka ọnụọgụgụ Naịjirịa siri dị
Atụmatụ ọnụ ọgụgụ ndị mmadụ n'afọ 2019 na-egosi na Nnewi nwere ihe karịrị 900,000
Obodo a gbasara ala ihe karịrị square kilomita 200 (520 km2) na steeti Anambra
Mpaghara Nnewi Obodo ukwu na obodo satịlaịtị ya bụ ebe obibi ihe fọrọ nke nta ka ọ bụrụ nde 25 As of 2005[update]
N'akụkụ ya, Nnewi nwere nnukwu oke n'akụkụ ngalaba ndị ọzọ niile, n'ihi na ọnụ ọgụgụ ọnụọgụgụ 1953 ghọtara dị ka obodo kachasị n'ime ime obodo nke ndị ọzọ niile na steeti ọwụwa anyanwụ nke Naijịrịa
Atụmatụ ịbụ obodo nke iri na abụọ na-eto ngwa ngwa na kọntinent Africa n'ime 2020 na 2025, na-enwe uto 518%
Na akụkọ ifọ na ejije nke Nnewi , 'ewi' ( Igbo )rụrụ nnukwu ọrụ n'ịzọpụta ndị malitere Nnewi n'oge agha
N'ime akụkọ ya niile, Nnewi ejirila ike agha ya na-echekwa oke ya n'ihi nke a, igbu ma ọ bụ iri ewi na Nnewi by alu ruo taa
Nnewi dịịrị dị ka alaeze kwụụrụ onwe ya site na narị afọ nke 15 ruo 1904, mgbe ọchịchị ndị Briten na-achị
E kewara alaeze Nnewi n'akụkụ anọ (nnukwu obodo), bụ Otolo, Uruagu, Umudim, na Nnewichi
E kewara obodo ọ bụla ka ọ bụrụ otu ezinụlọ akpọrọ 'umunna'
Umunna obula nwere ezi na ulo nke amara dika 'obi'
Akụkụ anọ ndị a bụ aha mbụ ụmụ Edo Otolo bụ ọkpara na Nnewichi bụ ọdụdụ n'ime ụmụ Obi nke Nnewi
Na mgbe gboo ndị Igbo biri n'ebe ọwụwa anyanwụ Naijiria nke oge a, ha na ndị isi atọ bịarutere, abụọ bụ ndị ndu mmụọ na nke ọdụdụ n'ime atọ ahụ bụ Eze eketa nke a na-akpọ Obi a Eze site n'ọkwa
Nke mbụ bụ Eze Nri nke Awka eze nchụaja, nke abụọ Eze Aro nke Arochukwu eze na nke atọ Obi nke Nnewi bụ onye ọchịchị na agha
Ndị Onitsha bụ ndị ọbịa ma mechaa biri n’ala Igbo
Ndị Aros ma akụkọ ihe mere eme a (Nnewi bụ onye mmekọ na onye ndu n'etiti ndị Igbo) nke a so n'ihe kpatara na enweghị obodo Aro na Nnewi
Obi nke Nnewi Obi Okoli na 1780s tụfuru ocheeze ya mgbe n'ime ndọrọndọrọ ọchịchị nke na-adabere na omenala ewepụ ya
Iwu eze ọdịnala nwere na Onye isi ala ga-emerịrị ikike olili ozu Obi tupu e kpube ya okpueze, Obi Okoli anọghị ya wee bata n'ụlọ naanị mgbe e liri onye nwụrụ anwụ Obi Okoli 1st
Nwanne nna ya (Onye nwụrụ anwụ Obi Okoli nke mbụ) mere ikike olili ozu n'ọnọdụ ya wee weghara ya dị ka Igwe Nnewi ọ pụghị ịchịkwa ya dịka Obi (nke pụtara nwa mbụ)
Ezinụlọ Obi Okoli ka a manyere n’ala ọzọ, ha gbabara na Umune-Alam nke dị n’Umudim, Nnewi ebe ha ka nọ ruo taa
Ezinụlọ Obi Okoli ka na-agba Ofor Nnewi ruo taa
Edo bu chi kachasi elu nke ndi Alusi nile (Igbo chi) na obodo Anaedo
Ụlọ nsọ dị na etiti na ejiko alusi niile onu dị na Ǹkwọ Nnewi, ahịa nke etiti
Enwere chi anọ ọzọ na Nnewi Ana, Ezemewi, Eze na Ele
Ndị Europe malitere Iso Ụzọ Kraịst n'afọ 1885 ma ọtụtụ ndị Nnewi na-emezi Iso Ụzọ Kraịst ugbu a
Nnewi, Ichi na Oraifite mebere steeti Anaedo
Obodo Anaedo nwere otu agbụrụ nna, nkwenye na usoro uru ọdịnala
Nnewi bụ nnukwu ụlọ ahịa na mmepụta ihe na Naijiria
N'ihi nnukwu ọrụ azụmahịa ya, obodo ahụ adọtala ọtụtụ nde ndị si na steeti na mba ndị ọzọ kwa
Ofala Nnewi bụ mmemme omenaala a na-eme kwa afọ obula iji na-eme emume ochichi nke Igwe Nnewi
Iwa ji ọhụrụ ( New yam festival ) na Ikwuaru sokwa n'ememme omenala a na-eme kwa afọ obula na Nnewi
Alaeze Nnewi nwekwara aha ọzọ ana akpo ya bụ Anaedo nke pụtara ala ọla edo(Chi kachasị elu na chi nwanyị Nnewi)
N'ọdịdị ala, Nnewi na-adaba n'ime mpaghara oke mmiri ozuzo nke Nigeria
N'agbanyeghi na ọ na-ata ahụhụ site na ntapu ala na mbuze nke mere ka ala dị n'akụkụ ụfọdụ gaa n'ebe ájá ájá siri ike, ọ ka bụ mpaghara ihe ọkụkụ bara ụba na ebe mbụ azụmahịa azụmahịa
Obodo a dị n'akụkụ ọwụwa anyanwụ nke osimiri Naịja, na ihe dịka kilomita iri abụọ na abụọ na ndịda ọwụwa anyanwụ Ọnịcha na steeti Anambra, Naijiria
A na-akpọ eze ọdịnala Nnewi Igwe
Igwe dị n'alaeze Nnewi bụ tupu ndị Europe abịarute, mere ka ọ bụrụ eze pụrụ iche n'ala Igbo
A ma ndị Igbo ka ndị na adịghị enwe eze, ya mere ndị Igbo na-ewu ewu na-asị Igbo é nwě Eze, nke pụtara 'ndị Igbo enweghị eze'
N'agbụrụ Igbo ndị ọzọ, ndị ọchịchị Briten na-achị achị kere ndị isi akwụkwọ ikike wee weghara ọkwa na aha Igwe wee họpụta ya ruo taa
Na Nnewi, Igwe bụ isi obi (onye isi ndị Obi ) ya mere Igwe, nke sụgharịrị n'ụzọ nkịtị dị ka eluigwe ma ọ bụ elu dịka ọ na-ejide Ofo, akara okpukperechi na ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị
A mụrụ ya ma emeghị ya ma ọ bụ họpụta ya, na ụlọ ọrụ nketa bụ ikike na ihe ùgwù ọdịnala
A naghị ebufe ọnọdụ ahụ ma ọ bụ nwee mkparịta ụka
Obukwa onye Obi
Obi bụ aha ndị isi na-achị achị; ọ bụ ihe nhata nke onye isi na ndị isi
Onye na-achị ugbu a bụ Eze Igwe Kenneth Onyeneke Orizu III ; ọ bụ eze kacha ogologo oge na Naijiria na ọ bụ eze nke iri abụọ na usoro ọmụmụ eze Nnofo
Igwe Kenneth Orizu III bụ onye isi klaasị mbụ na steeti Anambra site na Nnewi nakwa osote onye isi oche nke Ụlọ Nzukọ Alaeze Anambra
Onwere Obis n'ezigbo ano nke mebere Nnewi
Obi kachasị elu na nke kacha elu bụ Obi nke Ọtọlo, bụkwa Igwe nke Nnewi
Chief Afamefuna Obi, Obi Bennett Okafor na Obi George Onyekaba bucha obi nke Uruagu, Umudim, and Nnewichi, ugbua
Obi atọ ndị a na Igwe Orizu, III dịka onyeisi oche bụ Igwe-in-Council na ha kpachapụrụ anya maka ihe gbasara mmụọ, ọdịnala na obodo, na Nnewi
Enwekwara otu obodo na-arụsi ọrụ ike nke a na-akpọ Nzuko-Ora Nnewi
Ọ bụ ọgbakọ ndị okenye Nnewi (afọ iri na asatọ ma ọ bụ karịa) ga-esi na-atụnye aka na nkwalite Obodo Nnewi
E kere otu a iji kwado na kwalite nguzobe nke ụlọ na akụrụngwa ga-akwalite ma kwalite ụdị ndụ ndị mmadu na ebi na Nnewi
Usoro iwu ochie nke Nnewi adabereghị n'iwu e dere ede
Ọ bụ naanị iwu okike, metụtara omenala, ọdịnala na ikpe obodo na mpụ
Usoro iwu na Nnewi gafere site na labyrinth nke usoro ezinaụlọ
Akọ akụkọ megide onye mejọrọ ma ọ bụ onye omekome na mbụ, a ga-emerịrị onye isi ezinụlọ ya n'ụlọ nna nna ya nke a maara dị ka obi

Onye isi ezi na ụlọ ga-akpọ ndị okenye na ụmụ obere obi sitere na ezinụlọ ya ka ha nọrọ ọdụ n'ikpe, ebe onye mkpesa ga-akpọkwa ndị okenye na ụmụ obere obi sitere n'akụkụ ezinụlọ ya, ma ọ bụrụ na ha abụọ esiteghị na otu ezinụlọ
Obi a ga-ejekwa ozi dị ka ụlọikpe nke mbụ, dabere, n’ezie, n’ụdị mmebi iwu ma ọ bụ mpụ eboro ebubo e mere

Ikpe a nwere ike kwụsị ebe a, ma ọ bụrụ na ma onye mkpesa na onye eboro ebubo nwere afọ ojuju na ikpe e nyere, ma ọ bụ na ha nwere ike ibuga ikpe ahụ n'aka onye na-esote onye òtù ezinụlọ nke otu ezinụlọ, n'usoro nrịgo, ruo mgbe, ma eleghị anya, okwu ahụ ruru
obi kacha elu n'usoro
Ọ bụrụ na onye mkpesa ahụ enweghị afọ ojuju n'oge a, ọ ga-akpọku obi nke nkeji iri na ise na ndị isi ezinụlọ ya nwere ike ịkpọchitere ikpe ha
Site na usoro iwu a, ikpe ọmụma ma ọ bụ ịdị ọcha onwe nwere ike ịmalite ngwa ngwa, n'ihi na mkpebi ahụ dabere na ikpe ziri ezi sitere n'okike
Enyere ntaramahụhụ maka mmejọ na mpụ gbasara ike mmeye ha
Nwoke a mara ikpe dị oké njọ nwere ike ọ gaghị enwe ihe ọzọ ọ ga-eme karịa ka e resị ya n'ịbụ ohu ma ọ bụ chụpụ ya n'obodo ruo ndụ ya niile
Agaghị egbu ya maka na ogbugbu e gburu mmadụ megidere iwu chi Edo
Usoro ikpe na Nnewi yiri ka ọ mara ọkwa ikpe atọ, obere mpụ, ezi ikpe mpụ, na ikpe obodo nke ụgwọ, ọnụ ahịa nwunye na ala
Nbibi iwu bụ n'ezie mmejọ megide ụfọdụ juju, yabụ na a ga-eji achụ àjà wepụ ya
Ọ dịka ọmụmaatụ, amachibidoro igbu agwọ 'eke', ụdị python, ma ọ bụ iri 'ewi,' òké ezinụlọ oke bekee
O yikarịrị ka ọ dịghị mgbe e ji ọchịchọ obi mebie iwu ndị a, ọ bụrụkwa na e mebie ya na mberede, onye ahụ dara iwu ga-achụ àjà ozugbo n'enweghị ụdị ikpe ikpe ọ bụla
Usoro mpụ n'ihe gbasara mpụ dị oke njọ, dịka ọ dị na Nnewi ka emebere karịa ebe ndị ọzọ n'ala Igbo
E nwere ụdị mmebi iwu asaa, nke a maara dị ka 'ori-obi,' mmejọ megide obi, n'ihi na a na-eme nyocha ha mgbe niile na obi nke nkeji iri na ise
Nnewi etinyela aka n'ụzọ ziri ezi nke ndị isi na ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị Naijiria

AA Nwafor Orizu ; onyeisi ụlọ ọgbakọ omebe iwu Naijiria na mba mbụ ma mechaa, onye na-achị achị tupu ọchichi ọchịchị mbụ nke 1966, MCK Ajuluchukwu; onye na-akwado mba, onye na-emegide ọchịchị na onye na-eme iwu obodo mbụ, Chief ZC Obi (Onunekwuluigbo Igbo); onye ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị republik nke mbụ, Sir Louis Odumegwu Ojukwu, OBE, Chukwuemeka Odumegwu Ojukwu (Ikemba Nnewi); Onye bụbu Gọvanọ ndịagha nke Ọwụwa Anyanwụ Naijiria na onyeisiala mba Biafra dara ada, Comrade Dr
Edward Ikem Okeke ; Osote onye isi oche nke PRP na onye ndụmọdụ pụrụ iche nye President (Second Republic), Mr
FC Nwokedi; odeakwụkwọ na-adịgide adịgide nke mbụ na Naijiria, Dr

Dozie Ikedife (Ikenga Nnewi); mbụ onye isi ala ndi Ohanaeze Ndigbo, Professor ABC Nwosu; Kọmishọna na-ahụ maka ahụike na East Central steeti na Anambra steeti bụ Dọkịnta Chu Okongwu; Onye bụbu minista na-ahụ maka ego; Dr David Bennet Anagwu Ofomata;mbụ onye ntụzi-aka n'ihe gbasara ahụike, Nigerian Railway Corporation, First CEO/Onye isi oche Anambra Health Management Board & Chairman old Nnewi LGA;
Nnewi bụkwa ụlọ nna ndị ama ama na Naijiria gụnyere ndị a na-akwanyere ùgwù edepụtara n'okpuru ebe a
Hụ (Ndị mmadụ)
Agbo Edo, bụ ala ọhịa nke chi Edo Nnewi, ka a kpọchara ka ọ rụpụta ahịa ọhụrụ a na-akpọ ahịa Nkwo Nnewi
Mmepe nke ahịa a mere ka mmepe ngwa ngwa nke akụ na ụba obodo
Dị ka obodo na-emepe emepe ngwa ngwa yana nnukwu ụlọ ọrụ mmepụta ihe na azụmahịa n'Africa, Nnewi na-ahụ maka ọrụ ego dị ukwuu, ya mere ọ na-akwado nnukwu ụlọ akụ na ụlọ ọrụ ego ndị ọzọ
Ụlọ ọrụ dị iche iche dị gburugburu obodo na obodo ndị dị nso
A na-emepụta mmanụ nkwụ, ihe ịchọ mma, ugbo ala, na akụkụ ọgba tum tum, akwụkwọ, na ngwa akwụkwọ, textiles, cable eletrik, na ihe ndị ọzọ n'ahịa na mpaghara ahụ

Ndị isi azụmaahịa gụnyere ahịa Nkwo Nnewi ebe ana ere akụkụ ọgba tum tum (ahịa akụkụ ọgba tum tum nke kachasi na Africa) Agbọ-Edo motor spare parts market, Nwagbala market, Generator parts market, ahịa akụkụ ihe ndị eletrik , ahịa izugbe nke Nkwọ Nnewi (Ime) Afia),ahia nkụ ndị Nnewi (Ọgbọ osisi), ahịa Nwafor, ahịa Eke Amaobi, Eke Ochie, ahia Eke Ichi , ahia Orie otube, ahịa OkpunoegbU etc
Isi ọrụ ndị Nnewi na-arụ bụ ịzụ ahịa, mmepụta na ọrụ ugbo, ya mere ha na-adabere na azụmahịa, ịzụ ahịa na ọrụ ugbo maka ihe ha na-eri kwa ụbọchị
Most Ndị Nnewi (Nnewi people) have mbụbọ (home gardens) and ubi (out-station gardens) where they usually cultivate their farm products
A na-ebukarị ihe ubi ndị a mgbe a na-ewe ihe ubi n'ahịa maka ọrịre
Ọtụtụ n'ime ihe ọkụkụ a na-enwetakarị gụnyere nkwụ mmanụ, nkwụ raffia, groundnut, egusi, owu, koko, rọba, ọka, na cetera
A na-amịpụtakwa ihe ọkụkụ dị ka ji, akpu, kokoyam, mkpụrụ osisi bred, na ji akwụkwọ atọ n'ụba
Ebe Nnewi dị n'ime oke ọhịa mmiri ozuzo na-enye ya ntọala gburugburu ebe obibi maka imepụta ụdị ihe ọkụkụ dị iche iche nke ebe okpomọkụ nwere ikike zuru oke maka mgbakọ ụlọ ọrụ mmepụta ihe

Nnewi bụ ebe ọtụtụ nnukwu ụlọ ọrụ na-emepụta ihe gụnyere Ibeto Group of Companies, Cutix na ADswitch, Uru Industries Ltd, Omata Holdings Ltd, Cento Group of Companies, Coscharis of Companies Group, Innoson Group of Companies, Ebunso Nig
Ltd, John White Industries, Ejiamatu Group of Companies, Chicason Group, Louis Carter Group, wdg

Ọnụ ọgụgụ ka ukwuu nke ndị na- emepụta ihe na ụyọkọ nke ụlọ mmepụta ihe na Nnewi bụkwa ndị ahịa, na ọtụtụ n'ime ndị ahịa ndị a na-emepụta otu ma ọ bụ karịa n'ime ngwaahịa ndị ha na-azụ ahịa dị ka ndị ahịa (na-emekarị akụkụ ụgbọ ala), ọtụtụ malitere site n'ikesa nke ha
ngwaahịa site na netwọk nkesa ha dịbu adị
Nnewi bụ akụkụ nke ọwụwa anyanwụ Nigeria axis mmepụta ihe
Obodo a nwere site na ụlọ ọrụ gbadoro ụkwụ n'ọdịbendị nke na-eme dị ka netwọk ọkaibe gbasapụrụ ka ọ gụnye akụkụ mba ụwa site na mmekọrịta azụmahịa na ndị na-ebupụ si Eshia
N'ime afọ iri gara aga, obodo Nnewi enwetala nrụpụta ngwa ngwa ngwa ngwa
N'ime ihe karịrị ụlọ ọrụ 20 nke etiti ruo nnukwu ka emebela n'akụkụ dị iche iche
Kemgbe 1970, ndị bi na Nnewi ejirila ihe dị ka pasentị 80 ruo 90 nke ịzụ ahịa akụkụ moto na Naijiria
Ahịa Nkwo Nnewi bụ isi ebe a na-ebubata ma na-ere ahịa maka akụrụngwa akụrụngwa na Nigeria
Ndị na-emepụta ihe na Nnewi na-eme ka nkà na ụzụ mba ọzọ kwekọọ na mkpa obodo, na-enye ọtụtụ puku ọrụ ọrụ, na-emepụta ngwa ahịa na ọrụ ndị dị mkpa maka mkpa ụmụ amaala Naijiria
Ụlọ ọrụ mmepụta ụgbọ ala nke mbụ dị n'ime obodo ahụ, ebe ọ bụ ụlọ ọrụ National Agency for Science and Engineering Infrastructure (NASENI) rụrụ ọgba tum tum Made-in-Nigeria na Nnewi
Nnewi bu obodo nke amaa ama maka ụlọ ọrụ ụgbọ di egwu ala n'ime obodo, nwoke mbụ na-anya ụgbọ ala bu Sir Louis Ojukuwu, bụ nna Dim Chukwuemeka Odumegwu Ojukuwu in 1912
N'ebe afọ 1940, Ndi mmadu bicha na Nnewi nocha n'etiti azụmahịa nke ụwa na mba niile nke mejupụtara ọzụzụ akụkụ ụgbọ ala na Naijiria
Obodo a bia burukwa etiti azụmahịa na ụlọ ọrụ, ma nwerekwa ahịa akụkụ ụgbọ nke kachasi na Afrịka
Obodo Nnewi bụ ihe mepụta na agbagwoju anya
Ma Nnukwu ụlọ ọrụ na nke n'eso ya anoroocha go na Obodo a na emepụta Ihe maka ahịa Naijiria ma opechaa mpe ma ahịa ụwa na mba ọzọ
Nrụpụta n'obodo ahụ malitere n'afọ 1970 mgbe ndị na-azụ ahịa akụkụ moto Nnewi malitere ire ngwaahịa aha nke ha kama imepụtagharị akụkụ 'nke mbụ'
Enwere ọtụtụ ndị na-ere ngwa ngwa ụgbọ ala na ọgba tum tum na Nnewi; A na-amakwa ahịa akụrụngwa ọgbara ọhụrụ nke Nnewi nke ọma na West Africa dum

Dịka Nnewi bụ ọdụ ụgbọ ala nke Africa, obodo ahụ nwere ọtụtụ ahịa ebe a na-ere ụgbọ ala ma n'ahịa ma n'ahịa

Nnewi dị ka obodo nwere akụkọ ihe mere eme nwere ọtụtụ mmemme na ebe a na-eme mmemme na ihe ncheta omenala ndị gụnyere Edo Na Ezemewi shrine, Udoogwugwu shrine (Ichi), Kamanu shrine (Ichi), na ọtụtụ ụlọ arụsị ndị ọzọ dị n'akụkụ niile nke obodo Nnewi
Nnewi na-anabata ọtụtụ mmemme, ọkachasị n'etiti ha bụ New ji ( Afiolu, nke a makwaara dị ka ememme Ifejioku) nke akụkụ niile nke obodo ahụ na-esonye na ndị isi obodo niile na-esonye na ya
Ememme a na-adọta ụdị mmemme na emume dị iche iche nke ndị Nnewi na-akwanyere ugwu kacha elu
N'ụlọ nkezi nke nwa amaala Nnewi ọ bụla, ha na-edebekarị kola nuts, àkwá ubi na ahụekere bọta na friji ha ma ọ bụrụ na onye ọ bụla bịara abịa ma ọ bụ onye ọbịa ga-eleta ụlọ ha
Nleta ọ bụla n'ụlọ ha na-amalite site n'inye onye ọbịa kola nuts
Mkpụrụ kola na-egosi na a na-anabata onye ọbịa ahụ nke ọma
Emume nke onyinye nke kola nut sitere n'ike mmụọ nsọ site n'inye n'ekpere na ngọzi ma ọ bụ ịkwado Chineke kachasị elu na chi ndị ọzọ, maka nchebe nke onye ọbịa na onye ọbịa
O yiri ka ọ bụ omenala nye ndị Nnewi n'emume ọdịnala ha ọ bụla
Ndị na-ese ihe na mpaghara na-eme nke ọma n'ime ime obodo a
Ọrụ nka ndị a na-emepụta na mpaghara ahụ gụnyere, ọnụ ụzọ ndị a kpụrụ akpụ, osisi e ji eje ije nke ụdị dị iche iche, ihe ọkpụkpụ, ọjà, ngwa osisi na pestles, gong, na ịgbà okwu ama ama
A na-arụ ọrụ igwe na ụdị mmepụta dị iche iche na mpaghara

Ndị Nnewi dị ka ndị Igbo ọ bụla nwere ụdị egwu ha na-eji na-etinye ihe egwu dị iche iche udu, nke e si na ite ụrọ kpụọ; ekwe, nke a na-esi n'osisi gbawara agbawa pụta; na ogene, mgbịrịgba aka emebere site na igwe akpara akpa
Ngwa ndị ọzọ gụnyere opi, ngwa ikuku yiri ọjà, ịgbà, na ịchaka
Alụmdi na nwunye ọdịnala

Enwere ụdị alụm di na nwunye atọ na Nnewi dịka a na-eme n'ogbe Nigeria alụmdi na nwunye ọdịnala a na-eme n'ụlọ nwanyị; agbamakwụkwọ agbamakwụkwọ, nke a na-eme na ụlọ ọrụ ndekọ na nke na-enye ohere naanị otu nwunye; na alụmdi na nwunye okpukpe
A na-akpọ emume alụmdi na nwunye 'Igbankwu', nke bụ okwu Igbo maka emume alụmdi na nwunye ọdịnala
Nnewi enweghị emume 'njikọ aka'
Kama nke ahụ, Igbankwu na-ebute usoro ihe omume n'oge nke ezinụlọ onye nwere ike ịlụ nwanyị ọhụrụ na nwoke na-alụ nwanyị ọhụrụ na-etinye aka na ibe ha iji kwurịta okwu nke alụmdi na nwunye ahụ
Ikekwe a pụrụ ịkọwa nke a dị ka nkwa ọlụlụ
Biko rịba ama na Naịjirịa nwere agbụrụ 250 na nke ọ bụla dịgasị iche na ọdịnala alụmdi na nwunye
Ọzọkwa, n'ime ìgwè enwere ike inwe ọdịiche ka ukwuu
Uwe ọdịnala maka ụmụ nwoke bụ uwe elu na-ejupụta ma ọ bụ uwe ogologo aka nke a na-eyi n'elu ihe mkpuchi gooji, nke a na-ekekọta n'úkwù, na-agbada ruo n'ikpere ụkwụ
Uwe a na-ejikọta ya na okpu na mkpanaka na-eje ije, nke na-enyere aka dị ka ngwá ọrụ nkwado na nchebe
Uwe ọdịnala maka ụmụ nwanyị bụ blouse, nke a na-eyi n'elu ákwà azụ
Uwe nwanyị a na-aga na mgbaaka ntị na olu ma ọ bụ olu ọdịnala
Na Nnewi, oge Iri-ji ọhụrụ (iri-yam ọhụrụ) bụ ememme ọdịbendị n'ihi mkpa ọ pụtara
Ndị Nnewi na-eme ememe ji ọhụrụ ha na-emekarị na njedebe nke ọnwa Ọgọstụ n'oge a na-eme ememe dị iche iche na-egosi iri ji ọhụrụ

Emume ndị a na-agụnyekarị ọtụtụ ntụrụndụ dị iche iche gụnyere ime emume emume site n'aka Igwe (Eze), ịgba egwu omenala nke ụmụ nwoke, ụmụ nwanyị na ụmụ ha nke Igbo yana ngosipụta nke ihe omume ọdịbendị Igbo n'ụdị ihe ngosi nke oge a, ịgba egwu masquerade, na oriri na nnukwu ọnụ ọgụgụ na nri dịgasị iche iche mejupụtara menu nke ndị Igbo
N'ụbọchị mbụ nke ememme ahụ, Igwe nke Nnewi ga-eme emume ekele owuwe ihe ubi n'obí ya ebe a na-ebu ụzọ nye chi na ndị nna nna ya tupu ekesaara ha ndị obodo ahụ
Mgbe ekpere ekele nye chi gasịrị, Igwe na-eri ji mbụ n'ihi na ekwenyere na ọnọdụ ya na-enye ya ihe ùgwù nke ịbụ ndị ogbugbo n'etiti obodo Nnewi na chi nke ala ahụ
Emume ndị a na-etinye aka na iri ji ọhụrụ bụ iji gosipụta ekele obodo nwere n'ebe chi dị iche iche nọ maka ime ka owuwe ihe ubi nke ji ha kwe omume
Ya mere, nke a na-akọwa akụkụ atọ nke echiche ụwa nke ndị Igbo, na ha bụ ndị na-arụ ọrụ, okpukpe na ndị nwere ekele

A na-eme emume a kemgbe ọtụtụ narị afọ ma dị ka ọ na-enye mgbe niile ọnọdụ kwesịrị ekwesị maka mmadụ niile na ndị ọzọ, ndị ezinụlọ na ndị enyi ka ha zukọta iji gosipụta nkwa ha na ịdị n'otu ha na obodo ha
N'ihi eziokwu a, ndị Igbo n'ebe ọ bụla n'ụwa na-eme emume a n'ụzọ na-adọrọ adọrọ iji chebe ma na-eme emume ọdịbendị ọdịbendị nke ndị ya

Nke a bara uru maka nnukwu ụka na omume okpukpe dị n'obodo ahụ
Ndị Nnewi bụ 96% Ndị Kraịst, nwere obere akụkụ nke okpukpe ndị ọzọ 2% omenala, 02% ndị Juu, 03% ndị Alakụba na 15% ndị ọzọ

Enwere arụmụka mepere emepe ugbu a maka iweghachi otu ndị agha mpụ na-ama mpụ na mpaghara a na-akpọ Bakkassi Boys, bụ ndị nwere ọtụtụ afọ na Nnewi na ngwụcha 1990s mgbe mpụ na-abawanye
Otu a nwere usoro operandi nke ọtụtụ ndị chere na ọ bụ arụrụala mana ọ dị mkpa – Egburu ndị ohi a mara ikpe n’ihu ọha site n’iji mma dị nkọ kụbie akụkụ ahụ ha ma kpọọ ha ọkụ

Ihe omume nke otu ndị nwoke a nwere ikike nke Gọvanọ steeti ahụ bụ ndị na-ahụ maka ihe ndị ruuru mmadụ na ndị na-ahụ maka ikike mmadụ na -ahụta dị ka mmebi nke ikike ụmụ mmadụ ma gbasaa megide omume ha
N'oge na-adịbeghị anya, Nnewi dịtụ jụụ ma ewezuga ihe dịpụrụ adịpụ nke ịtọrọ ụmụ amaala ama ama maka nnukwu ihe mgbapụta
Ụzọ mbu eji eme njem na Nnewi bụ ọgba tum tum
Ihe fọrọ nke nta ka ọ bụrụ ezinụlọ ọ bụla nwere opekata mpe otu ọgba tum tum na ọgba tum tum azụmahịa dịkwa kwa
Enwekwara ụgbọ ala na igwe kwụ otu ebe na-akwado ọgba tum tum dị ka ụzọ ụgbọ njem dị n'ofe obodo ahụ
A makwaara Nnewi nke ọma dị ka ebe ọtụtụ ụlọ ọrụ ụgbọ njem na ngwa ngwa kemgbe njedebe nke Agha Ụwa nke Abụọ
Philip Odumegwu Ojukwu bụ otu n'ime ndị na-ebu njem na Naịjirịa na kamgbe ahụ, ọtụtụ ndị njem esila Nnewi pụta

Ndị Nnewi nwekwara ọmarịcha omenala egwuregwu, ọkachasị n'egwuregwu bọọlụ

Nnimmo Bassey (nke a mụrụ n'ụbọchị nke ịrị na otu n'ọnwa Juun n'afọ 1958) bụ onye Naijiria na-ewu ụlọ, onye na-akwado gburugburu ebe obibi, onye edemede na onye na-ede uri, onye isi oche nke Friends of the Earth International site n'afọ 2008 ruo afọ 2012 ma bụrụ onye isi nchịkwa nke Environmental Rights Action ruo afọ iri abụọ
Ọ bụ otu n'ime Heroes of the Environment nke magazin Time na 2009
N'afọ 2010, a kpọrọ Nnimmo Bassey Laureate of the Right Livelihood Award, na 2012, e nyere ya Rafto Prize
O nwetakwara nzere doctorate na Mahadum nke York, UK, n'afọ 2019
Ọ na-eje ozi na kọmitii ndụmọdụ ma bụrụ onye isi nke Health of Mother Earth Foundation, ụlọ ọrụ na-eche echiche gburugburu ebe obibi na nzukọ nkwado
A mụrụ Nnimmo Bassey na 11 June, 1958
Ọ gụrụ ihe owuwu ụlọ, rụọ ọrụ na ngalaba ọha na eze ruo afọ iri ma mesịa gaa n'ihu na ọrụ onwe ya
Ọ nọ na-arụsi ọrụ ike n'ihe gbasara ikike mmadụ n'afọ 1980 mgbe ọ rụrụ ọrụ na Board of Directors nke Nigeria's Civil Liberties Organization

N'afọ 1993, o sonyere n'òtù NGO nke Naijiria (Non-governmental organization) nke a maara dị ka Environmental Rights Action (Friends of the Earth Nigeria) iji kwado, kụziere ma hazie ihe gbasara ikike mmadụ na gburugburu ebe obibi na Nigeria

Kemgbe afọ 1996, Bassey na Environmental Rights Action duziri Oilwatch Africa ma, malite n'afọ 2006, duziri Global South Network, Oilwatch International, na-agbasi mbọ ike ịkwalite obodo megide mgbasawanye nke mmịpụta mmanụ ala
Bassey jere ozi na kọmitii nke Oilwatch International na mpaghara mpaghara, Oilwatch Africa kemgbe ọ malitere
Oilwatch Africa nwere ndị otu na Nigeria, Chad, Cameroon, Congo Democratic Republic, Ghana, Uganda, South Africa, Togo, Kenya, Swaziland, Mozambique, Mali, Sudan, South Sudan na ndị ọzọ
Ndị otu Oilwatch International na-agbasa na South America, Ndịda Ọwụwa Anyanwụ Eshia, Africa, Europe na North America
Netwọk ahụ na-arụ ọrụ iji guzogide ọrụ mmịpụta mmanụ, gas na coal
Ọ na-achọ mgbanwe ngwa ngwa site na mmepeanya nke mmanụ ala na-eweta
N'afọ 2011, Bassey hiwere ụlọ ọrụ na-ahụ maka gburugburu ebe obibi, Health of Mother Earth Foundation na-akwalite ikpe ziri ezi gburugburu ebe obibi na ikike nri na Nigeria na Africa
Na 2009 United Nations Climate Change Conference na Copenhagen, Bassey - n'agbanyeghị na a kwadoro ya - 'e mere ka ọ pụọ' na nzukọ
O duuru ndị enyi nke Earth International site na 2008 ruo 2012 ma ruo afọ iri abụọ, ọ bụ onye isi nchịkwa nke Environmental Rights Action
Ọ bụ onye nduzi nke Health of Mother Earth Foundation ma jee ozi na
Akwụkwọ ndị ọzọ Bassey dere gụnyere
2009 Times Magazine's Hero Of Environment
2010 Laureate Right Livelihood Award winner
Onye mmeri Rafto Prize 2012
Nzere Doctorate, Mahadum nke York, UK
Nnorom Azuonye // (na-ege ntị) (amụrụ na 12 Julaị 1967, na Biafra) bụ onye na-ebipụta akwụkwọ, onye nduzi ihe nkiri, onye na-ede egwuregwu, onye na'ede uri na onye na-ahụ maka mgbasa ozi
Ọ bụkwa onye nkwusa Metọdist Local Preacher na Chọọchị Metọdist na Britain ma na-eje ozi dị ka onye isi Networker, Global Calvary Network
O dere Letter To God & Other Poems na 2003, The Bridge Selection Poems for the Road (2005 & 2012) na Funeral of the Minstrel na 2015)

Onye guzobere Publishing Director & Chief Executive Officer, SPM Publications Ltd, Azuonye bụ onye guzobere na onye nchịkwa nke Sentinel Poetry Movement na onye guzobere ma bipụta magazin Nollywood Focus, Sentinel Literary Quarterly, Sentiner Nigeria na Sentinel Champions

Nnorom Azuonye bụ nwa afọ Isuikwuato, nke dị na Abia Steeti nke Naijiria, mana a mụrụ ya na Enugu, ugbu a na Enugu Steeti nke Nigeria, na ọnwa iri na abuo nke Julaị na afọ otu puku narị iteolu na iri isii na asaa
Ọ bụ nwa ikpeazụ nke Stephen Onyemaechi Azuonye MON, MBE, na Hannah Egwuime Azuonye
Ọ gara Ụlọ akwụkwọ gọọmentị nke dị na Steeti Umuahia, Capital College, London, na Mahadum Nigeria, Nsukka, ebe ọ gụrụ Dramatic Arts

N'afọ puku abụọ na abụọ, Azuonye guzobere Sentinel Poetry Movement - otu mba ụwa nke ndị edemede na ndị na-ese ihe na-enye mmekọrịta na mbipụta maka uri, akụkọ ifo, ihe nkiri, edemede, ajụjụ ọnụ na nyocha nke nka
Ọ bụ onye nchịkọta akụkọ nke Sentinel Literary Quarterly - magazin nke akwụkwọ ụwa nke Sentinal Poetry Movement bipụtara

Ọ bụkwa onye na-ebipụta magazin Sentinel Nigeria - magazin dị n'ịntanetị nke ederede Naijiria nke oge a Sentinel bipụtara akwụkwọ abụọ gara aga, Sentinel Poetry (Gbanye) na Sentinel poetry Quarterly, agbakọtawo n'ime otu akwụkwọ Sentinel Literary Quarterly

E bipụtara Azuonye n'ọtụtụ mba na akwụkwọ akụkọ, akwụkwọ akụkọ na anthologies gụnyere Agenda, DrumVoices Revue, Eclectica, Orbis, World Haiku Review, Nigerians Talk, African Writing, African Writers, Sketchbook, Poetry Monthly, Opon Ifa, Theatre Forum, Voices Against Racism 100 Poems Against Racism, and Poems for a Liminal Age (Mandy Pannett ed)
Nnorom lụrụ Thelma Amaka Azuonye (née Mbomi) n'afọ puku abụọ na isii
Ha bi na Obodo London, United Kingdom, ya na ụmụ ha Arinzechukwu, Nwachiamanda, Obinna na Ugochukwu
Giants, Monsters & Dragons An Encyclopedia of Folklore, Legend and Myth bụ encyclopedia nke ndị dike, akụkọ ọdịnala, myths, na akụkọ mgbe ochie nke Carol Rose chịkọtara
Akwụkwọ a nwere obere ndenye gbasara nnukwu anụ mmiri, akụkọ ọdịnala, akụkọ ifo na akụkọ ifo sitere na gburugburu ụwa, ma gụnye ọtụtụ ihe atụ
TM Supermarket bụ nnukwu ụlọ ahịa dị na Zimbabwe
Ha nwere alaka n'obodo niile na n'ọtụtụ obodo Zimbabwe
Ha bụ akụkụ nke otu ụlọ ọrụ Meikles, n'agbanyeghị Pick n Pay Stores, onye na-ere ahịa South Africa, weghaara pasenti iri anọ na itoolu nke ụlọ ahịa TM
A na-ahụkarị ha na obodo Zimbabwe

A Big Fix Radical Solutions for Australia's Environmental Crisis bụ akwụkwọ afọ 2005 nkè Ian Lowe dere nke na-ekwu na ịdọ aka ná ntị sitere n'aka ndị ọkà mmụta sayensị gburugburu ebe obibi dị ngwa ma doo anya

Prọfesọ Lowe na-atụ aro na a na-eji ihe onwunwe eme ihe ngwa ngwa, usoro gbụrụ-gbúrụ ébé obibi na-emebi, na ọha mmadụ na-eme ka ọ ghara ịdị mma site na ọdịiche na-arịwanye elu n'etiti ndị ọgaranya na ndị ogbenye
Lowe na-atụ aro ọtụtụ ngwọta siri ike

Ọ na-akwado mgbanwe dị mkpa na ụkpụrụ onwé anyị na ụlọ ọrụ mmekọrịta mmadụ na ibe ya ma na-enye ọhụụ nké ọha mmadụ dị mma karịa nke mmadụ, na-ewere usoro gburugburu ebe obibi, na-ewe echiche ogologo ógè, ma na-akwanyere usoro okike ùgwù

The Big Necessity Ụwa a na-apụghị ịkọwa akọwa nke mkpofu mmadụ na ihe kpatara ya (nke e bipụtara na United Kingdom dị ka nnukwu mkpa Adventures in the World of Human Waste), nke Rose George dere, bụ nkọwa nkọwa nke akụkọ ihe mere eme, ọganihu, omenala
mgbanwe, ihe ngwọta, na mkpa mba ụwa nke ịdị ọcha
Ọrụ a, nke e dere maka ebumnuche zuru ụwa ọnụ banyere ịdị ọcha, na-egosipụta ọnọdụ ugbu a nke nsogbu zuru ụwa ọnụ
George na-enye nghọta banyere otú ịdị ọcha gburugburu ụwa si egosipụta ụkpụrụ ibi ndụ n'ógbè ahụ
George na-eji ahụmịhe nke ya dị ka ihe atụ kọwaa ọnọdụ ịdị ọcha nke mpaghara gburugburu ụwa
N'ụwa niile, ijeri mmadụ 26 (40% nke ndị bi n' ụwa) enweghị ụlọ mposi ma ọ bụ usoro iji kpochapụ ihe mkpofu
Nnyocha na-egosi na 95% nke ihe mkpofu mmadụ na ọdọ mmiri, osimiri, na olulu mmiri na mba ndị na -emepe emepe
George na-atụle enweghị mkpofu na ụlọ mposi maka ihe ka ọtụtụ n'ụwa na nje na mmiri na ya na na'ihi na ọ na - na 10% nke ọrịa na
Nnukwu mkpa akwụkwọ na-enye ihe ọmụma nke na-eme ka a mara ụzọ dị iche iche ndị mmadụ gburugburu ụwa si ewepụ nsị ha
Akwụkwọ a na-eme ka a mata ụfọdụ eziokwu dị ka na ịnweta ụlọ mposi na-agbakwụnye afọ 20 na nkezi ndụ
The Great Sphinx ma ọ bụrụ na Giza bụ ihe oyiyi limestone nke Sphinx na-eri nri, anụ akụkọ ifo nwere isi mmadụ, na ahụ nke ọdụm

Na-eche ihu kpọmkwem site n'ebe ọdịda anyanwụ gaa n'ebe ọwụwa anyanwụ, Ọ dị na Giza Plateau nke dị n'akụkụ ọdịda anyanwụ nke osimiri Naịl na Giza, Egypt Ihu nke Sphinx yiri ka ọ na-anọchi anya pharaoh Khafre
A na-egbutu ọdịdị mbụ nke Sphinx site na nkume, ma kemgbe ahụ e weghachiri ya na ọkwa nke blọk limestone
Ọ na-atụle 73 (240 ft) n'ogologo site na ụkwụ ruo n'ọdụ, 20 (66 ) n'ịdị elu site na ala ruo n'elu isi na 19 m (62 ) n-obosara n'azụ ya
ejighị n'aka ihe kpatara sphnixs gbajiri imi
N'akụkọ ifo na-ewu ewu, mgbọ ndị agha Napoleon Bonaparte gbabara gbajiri imi Sphinx n'otu n'ime agha ndị France na-alụ na Egypt na 1798Otú ọ dị, ọtụtụ isi mmalite na-agbagha nke a tupu ọmụmụ Napoleon

Ọ bụghị naanị na e nwere ihe osise sitere na narị afọ nke iri na asaa nke na-egosi Sphinx n'ụzọ a mana onye Arab na-akọ akụkọ ihe mere eme na narị afọ iri na ise al-Maqrīzī kwetara na ọ gbajiri imi ya, na-ekwu na ọ bụ onye Sufi Muslim na-emebiga ihe ókè a na-akpọ Mohamed Sa'm al-Dahr onye o kwuru na ọ gbawara ya na 1378 ma mesịa gbuo ya maka imebi ihe

Otú ọ dị, nke a yighị ka ọ ga-abụ eziokwu dịka nyocha ihe ochie nke Mark Lehner mere kwubiri na ọ bụ ezie na a kpachaara anya gbajie imi Sphinx, kama imebi ya site na ihu igwe na corrosion, ọ mere n'oge ụfọdụ n'etiti narị afọ nke atọ na nke iri
Sphinx bụ ihe a tụrụ atụ kachasị ochie a maara n'Ijipt na otu n'ime ihe oyiyi a ma ama n'ụwa
Ihe akaebe nke ihe mgbe ochie na-egosi na ọ bụ ndị Ijipt oge ochie nke Alaeze Ochie kere ya n'oge ọchịchị Khafre (ihe dị ka 2558-2532 BC)
Iji wuo ụlọ nsọ ahụ, a ghaghị imebi mgbidi dị n'ebe ugwu nke ụlọ nsọ Khafre Valley, ya mere ọ na-apụta na ụlọ olili ozu Khafre bu ụzọ mepụta Sphinx na ụlọ nsọ ya
Ọzọkwa, akụkụ na ọnọdụ nke mgbidi ndịda nke ogige ahụ na-egosi na ụzọ jikọtara Pyramid na Valley Temple dịlarị tupu a hazie Sphinx
Ntọala ala nke ụlọ nsọ Sphinx na-egosikwa na ọ bụghị tupu ụlọ nsọ Valley
Gemma Tumelty (amụrụ 20 Ọktoba 1980), bụ onye ọrụ otu ndị ọrụ Britain na ndị na-ahụ maka azụmaahịa, onye bụ onye isi oche nke National Union of Students (NUS) site na 2006 ruo 2008
Ọ bụ onye odeakwụkwọ mba NUS site na 2005 ruo 2006, bụrụkwa onye otu
nke National Executive Committee maka afọ abụọ tupu nke ahụ￼

A mụrụ Tumelty na Weston-Super-Mare, ma tolite na Burnham n'oké osimiri N'ịbụ onye a zụlitere n'ezinụlọ naanị nne ma ọ bụ nna, ọ gụrụ akwụkwọ na Cheddar Ezinụlọ ahụ kwagara Hertfordshire n'oge ọ dị afọ iri na ụma, mana laghachiri na Somerset ozugbo Gemma na nwanne ya nwanyị tọrọ ya gara mahadum Tumelty gụsịrị akwụkwọ na akparamaagwa na Mahadum Liverpool John Moores na 2005
Tumelty bụbu onye ọrụ ụmụ nwanyị na osote onye isi oche welfare na Liverpool Students' Union
A họpụtara ya dị ka odeakwụkwọ mba nke NUS n'ọnwa Eprel afọ 2005 na NUS Conference na Blackpool
Mgbe ọ hapụrụ NUS, Tumelty sonyeere Million+, ụlọ ọrụ na-eche echiche na mahadum na-anọchite anya mahadum polytechnic dị ka Press and Public Affairs Manager
Ọ rụkwara ọrụ dị ka onye otu kọmitii njikwa nke Compass - otu ndị na-eme ka mmadụ nwee nrụgide n'aka ekpe

Gemma Tumelty malitere ịrụ ọrụ na Ngalaba Mba Nile nke TUC na 2009 wee rụọ ọrụ na Ngalọ Ọrụ Mgbasa Ozi na Mmekọrịta, na-ahazi ụlọ, ọtụtụ n'ime ha bụ ngalaba ọha na eze, mkpọsa mgbochi na nzukọ TUC kwa afọ

Atmospheric super-rotation bụ steeti ébé ikuku nkè mbara ala na-agbagharị ngwa ngwa karịa mbara ala n'onwe ya
Ikuku nke Venus bụ otu ihe atụ nkè oke oke ntụgharị; ikuku Venusian na-agba mbara ala gbụrụ-gbúrụ naanị n'ime ụbọchị ụwa anọ, ngwa ngwa karịa ụbọchị Venus nke ụbọchị ụwa narị abụọ na iri anọ na atọ
A hụwokwa oke okirikiri ikuku na Titan, ọnwa kachasị ukwuu na Saturn
Ekwenyere na thermosphere nke ụwa nwéré obere net super-rotation karịa ọsọ ntụgharị elu, ọ bụ ezie na atụmatụ nkè nha nke ihe omume ahụ dịgasị iche iche
Ọtụtụ ụdị na-atụ aro na okpomọkụ ụwa nwèrè ike ịkpata mmụba na super-rotation n'ọdịnihu, gụnyere oke-rotation nke ifufe elu
Nnukwu Pyramid nke Giza[lower-alpha 1] Bụ pyramid Ijipt kasị ukwuu ma jee ozi dị ka ili Fero Khufu, onye chịrị n'okpuru usoro eze nke alaeze ochie
E wuru ya na mmalite narị afọ nke 26 BC, n'ime ihe dị ka afọ 27, Pyramid ahụ bụ nke kacha ochie n'ime ihe ebube asaa nke ụwa ochie, na naanị ihe ịtụnanya na-adịgide adịgide
, ọ bụkwa naanị ihe ịtụnanya nke ka dị
Ọ bụ ihe ncheta a ma ama nke Giza pyramid complex, nke bụ akụkụ nke UNESCO Ebe ihe nketa ụwa bụ Memphis na ọ bụ Necropol'
Ọ dị na nsọtụ ugwu nke ahịrị pyramid na Giza
E wuru ya site n'igwu ala ihe dị ka nde 23 nke nnukwu blọk, nke dị nde tọn 6 n'ozuzu
Ihe ka ọtụtụ n'ime nkume ndị ahụ abụghị otu n'ibu ma ọ bụ ọdịdị, a na-ejikwakwa ha eme ihe
A na-ejikọta mpempe akwụkwọ ndị dị n'èzí
A na-eji nkume limestone nke Giza Plateau mee ihe maka iwu ya
A na-eji ụgbọ mmiri ebubata blọk ndị ọzọ na Naịl nkume limestone na-acha ọcha site na Tura maka mkpuchi, na blọk granite site na Aswan, nke dị ihe ruru tọn 80, maka 'King's Chamber'
A gbasaa ebe ili ozu ahụ ruo n'ọchịchị nke isii ma jiri ya mee ihe ugboro ugboro mgbe nke ahụ gasịrị
Aha mbụ nke akara akara bụ nke Khufu, nke kachasị ọhụrụ nke Pepi nke Abụọ
E dere ihe odide ndị ọrụ na ụfọdụ n'ime nkume ndị dị n'ili ahụ; dịka ọmụmaatụ, 'Mddw' (aha Horus nke Khufu) na mastaba nke Chufunacht, ma eleghị anya nwa nwa Khufu
Ihe a na-akpọ 'nkume nkwado' kwadoro mkpuchi ahụ nke (n'adịghị ka blọk ndị bụ isi) a na-eyi nke ọma ma na-ejikọta ya na mkpuchi ahụ na ụrọ
[ odide dị mkpa] Ugbu a, nkume ndị a na-enye ihe owuwu ahụ ọdịdị ya a na-ahụ anya, na-esote nkwụsịtụ nke pyramid na Middle Ages

N'etiti ala ọma jijiji dị n'ebe ugwu Ijipt, ndị ọrụ (ma eleghị anya ụmụ nke ndị jere ozi Al-Mamun) wepụrụ ọtụtụ nkume ndị dị n'èzí, nke a sịrị na Bahri Sultan An-Nasir Nasir-ad-Din al-Hasan buuru ya na 1356 maka iji ya mee ihe na Cairo dị nso
