Noga Levy-Rapoport (amụrụ na 25 Nọvemba 2001) bụ onye na-agba mbọ maka ọdịmma nke ihu igwe na Britain, ọkà okwu, na onye ọrụ afọ ofufo n'ime ọgbaghara ihu igwe Bekee na UK Student Climate Network
A mụrụ Noga Levy-Rapoport na 25 Nọvemba 2001 na Tel Aviv
Ha kwagara UK dị ka nwata
Levy-Rapoport abụghị nke abụọ

N'abalị iri na ise n'ọnwa Febụwarị n'afọ 2019, ha sonyere na ngagharị iwe ihu igwe mbụ nke London, tupu ha abanye na UK Student Climate Network dị ka onye ọrụ afọ ofufo maka mgbasa ozi ụlọ akwụkwọ na ịhazi gburugburu Green New Deal na GND UK

Ha nyere aka hazie ọgbaghara ihu igwe na London maka ụbọchị ọgbaghara ụwa na 15 Maachị 2019 na 24 Mee 2019, yana ịnabata na ịkpọsa n'ihu ọha nkwado UKSCN maka Green New Deal maka UK na ọgbaghara ọnọdụ ihu igwe na Londres na 12 Eprel 2019
Kemgbe ọnwa Febụwarị, onye ahụ dị afọ iri na asaa ekwuola okwu n'ọtụtụ ogige, ihe omume, ọgbaghara na ngagharị iwe gburugburu UK
Na 7 Mee 2019, Noga kwuru okwu na International Maritime Organization na London iji kpọọ maka njedebe na ọsọ ụgbọ mmiri iji belata ikuku na Campaign Against Climate Change group na ndị ọzọ na-eme ihe
A kọwara okwu ahụ dị ka 'ọgwụgwọ Greta Thunberg' maka IMO, onye, dị ka òtù UN, bụ onye a gbara egbe n'oge gara aga maka na ọ naghị etinye aka iji belata ikuku ha

N'ọnwa Julaị 2019, Levy-Rapoport meghere isi okwu na Nzukọ Mgbasa Ozi Ụmụaka kwa afọ, na-arụ ụka na nguzozi ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị nke mgbasa ozi gbalịrị itinye na mgbasa ozi ụmụaka mgbe ịmepụta ọdịnaya nke kpuchiri mgbanwe ihu igwe adịghị arụ ọrụ ma nwee ike ime ka ndị na-eto eto dị njikere ime ihe na mgbanwe ihu igwe

N'ịbụ onye a kọwara dị ka 'adreesị dị ịrịba ama', onye na-eme ihe ike, nke a kpọrọ aha dị ka otu n'ime 'Changemakers' nke afọ nke CMC, kwuru n'ụzọ doro anya na e nwere 'ọkpụkpọ zuru ụwa ọnụ maka ụmụaka ịghọ ndị isi nke taa', nke a ga-amalite na mgbasa ozi ha

N'abalị iri abụọ n'ọnwa Septemba n'afọ 2019, ha kwadoro ọgbaghara ihu igwe zuru ụwa ọnụ nke London, nke kachasị njọ n'akụkọ ihe mere eme nke UK, na otu narị puku ndị na-eme ngagharị iwe n'isi obodo na pụkụ narị atọ na ịrị ise na-aga ọgbaghara na mba ahụ

N'otu ọnwa ahụ, e tinyere atụmatụ ha jikọrọ aka maka bọọdụ ihu igwe na ụlọ ọrụ ILOVEYOU maka asọmpi 'Design of the Year' nke Beazley na Design Museum, nke Levy-Rapoport na ndị ọrụ ibe ha họọrọ ịghara ịkwụsị, mkpebi ọ mechara kọwaa n'otu edemede maka It's Nice That
N'ọnwa Ọktoba 2019, London Evening Standard họọrọ ha dị ka otu n'ime ndị kacha nwee mmetụta na London na 2019 dị ka akụkụ nke ndepụta Progress 1000 nke ha na-eme kwa afọ
N'otu ọnwa ahụ, ha na Clive Lewis kwurịtara nsogbu ihu igwe na ndị ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị maka Huck Magazine
Onye na-eme mkpọsa ahụ ewerewo ọrụ ọnụ na-ekwuru ndị ntorobịa na UK ma gbaa ya ajụjụ ọnụ maka ọtụtụ ụlọ ọrụ mgbasa ozi, mpaghara na mba, yana ide maka The Guardian, Ọ dị mma, na Fabian Society
Levy-Rapoport bụkwa ọnụ na-ekwuchitere Labour for a Green New Deal

Noko Alice Matlou (amụrụ n'abalị iri atọ n'ọnwa Septemba n'afọ 1985) bụ onye na-agba bọọlụ na South Afrika nke na-agba bọọlụ dị ka onye na-eme egwuregwu maka ndị otu Spanish Segunda División Pro SD Eibar
Ọ nọchitere anya ndị otu ụmụ nwanyị nke mba South Africa ma dị ka onye na-agba ọsọ ma onye na-eche nche
N'afọ 2008, Matlou ghọrọ onye South Africa mbụ a kpọrọ African Women's Footballer of the Year
Na klọb, ọ na-egwuri egwu maka MaIndies
Ọ na-egwuri egwu maka Development Ladies, Brazilian Ladies na Mahadum Johannesburg
N'ime ndị na-agba bọọlụ, a na-akpọ ya 'Beep-Beep'

Matlou na ndị egwuregwu bọọlụ nwoke na-azụ onwe ha iji bulie egwuregwu ya 'Ana m azụ mgbe niile na klọb ụmụ nwoke dị n'ógbè ahụ ma mgbe m na ụmụ nwanyị na-abanye n'ọgbọ egwuregwu ha enweghị ike imetụ m aka
Matlou mere nke mbụ ya maka otu egwuregwu bọọlụ ụmụ nwanyị nke mba South Africa ('Banyana Banyana') na Disemba 2006
N'ọnwa Septemba afọ 2009, onye na-ekpe ikpe mere Matlou 'nnyocha' nwoke na nwanyị n'ihu onyeisi ndị mmegide, tupu egwuregwu South Afrika na Ghana na Caledonian Stadium, Pretoria
E nyere ya ohere igwu egwu na egwuregwu ahụ mgbe a kwadoro ya dị ka nwanyị
Matlou bịara bụrụ onye a ma ama n'ime ndị otu mba site n'ịgba goolu isii na 2008 African Women's Championship
A họrọla ya maka ndị otu maka asọmpi dịgasị iche iche, gụnyere na 2012 Summer Olympics na London, United Kingdom
N'afọ 2014, onye nkuzi South Afrika Vera Pauw zigara Matlouá dị ka onye na-agba ọsọ, dị ka onye nche
N'afọ 2008, ọ ghọrọ onye South Afrika mbụ a kpọrọ African Women's Footballer of the Year site na Confederation of African Football
Nokomis 3 bụ ngwakọta nke kemịkal ndị ọkà mmụta sayensị mepụtara n'afọ 1971, nke e mere kpọmkwem iji mụbaa mgbasa nke mmanụ a wụfuru n'ime mmiri
Nhazi synergetic nke kemịkalụ bụ mmiri dabere na enweghị ọkụ
Ndị agha mmiri United States ejirila ngwaahịa a, State of California Fish and Game na United States Environmental Protection Agency (EPA)
Marlin Supply Inc
bụ onye na-ekesa ngwaahịa a nwere ụlọ nyocha na San Francisco, Texas, Florida na Mexico
E gosipụtara Nokomis 3 na nyocha iji mụbaa ọnụego biodegradation nke hydrocarbons mmanụ na otu nyocha na-ahụ ọnụego mmebi mụbara ruo 507 ± 037 mg L−1 ụbọchị−1 site na 239 ± 022 mg L− 1 ụbọchị−1
Mgbe a tọhapụrụ ngwaahịa ahụ site na ụgbọelu ma ọ bụ ikuku, ọ nwere ọnụ ọgụgụ dị ukwuu, na-eme ka ohere ka mma ka ọ rute n'ala
Emebere ngwaahịa a nke ọma iji hichaa mmanụ mmanụ 2 n'ime mmiri
Nokomis 3 bụ ntọala n'ọ̀tụ̀tụ̀ pH na ọ bụ mmiri na-agbaze kpam kpam
Ngwaahịa a kpọmkwem nke Nokomis 3 bụ colloid nke mmiri

Enwere ike itinye Nokomis 3-AA site na spray nozzles na ụgbọ mmiri ma ọ bụ ụgbọ mmiri na maka ojiji kachasị mma propeller nke ụgbọ mmiri nwere ike inye aka na ịgwakọta ngwaahịa ahụ n'ime mmiri maka mmetụta kachasị
Nhazi nke abụọ nke Nokomis 3 bụ Nokomis 3-F4
A na-eme ya na viscosity dị elu, na-amụba ohere na ngwaahịa zuru ezu na-eru n'elu mmiri
Ọ bụghị ụgbọ elu anaghị etinye ya mgbe niile mana enwere ike fesa ya site na nozzles ruo n'elu mmiri ahụ
Dabere na ọnọdụ na nha nke mmanụ a wụfuru, enwere ike itinye ya ma ọ bụ na-agbanye ma ọ bụ n'ike zuru oke
Nokuthula Ledwaba (a mụrụ n'afọ 1983), bụ onye na-eme ihe nkiri na South Africa
A maara ya nke ọma maka ọrụ ya na usoro ihe nkiri Rhythm City na The River
A mụrụ ya n'afọ 1983 na mpaghara Mofolo na Soweto, South Africa
Nne ya, Grace Vilakazi-Ledwaba mụrụ ya mgbe ọ dị obere
Nna ya mechara nwụọ afọ 33 gara aga mgbe nne ya ka dị ime
Ebe ọ bụ na ọ mụrụ ụmụ mgbe ọ dị obere, nne ya nwere oge siri ike ịzụlite ha
Ya mere, o nyefere Nokuthala n'aka nwanne nne ya
Mgbe ahụ, ya na nwanne nne ya tolitere na Soshanguve, Northern Pretoria
Mgbe ọ ghọsịrị nwa agbọghọ dị afọ iri na ụma, ọ matara banyere ezinụlọ ya yana nna ya aha ya bụ Mavuso
Mgbe ahụ ọ gara ịhụ nne ya ma soro ya biri
Otú ọ dị, nne ya nwụrụ na Septemba afọ 2015
Ọ malitere ọrụ ya mgbe ọ dị afọ iri na itoolu ebe o mere ọtụtụ ihe nkiri ụmụaka na agụmakwụkwọ nke gara South Africa na UK
Ọrụ mbụ ya bụ na ihe ngosi Wild Child Lu
Mgbe ahụ, ọ rụrụ ọrụ na ihe nkiri telivishọn a ma ama Rhythm City n'afọ 2007 ebe ọ rụrụ ọrụ a ma ama nke 'Tshidi Khuse'
N'afọ 2009, a họpụtara ya dịka onye na-akwado nkiri kacha mma n'oge 3rd South African Film and Television Awards (SAFTAs)
N'afọ 2018, a kpọrọ ya ka ọ rụọ ọrụ na usoro telivishọn The River
N'usoro ihe omume ahụ, ọ rụrụ ọrụ 'Angel' ma gaa n'ihu na-arụ ọrụ ahụ na oge mbụ na nke abụọ nke ngosi ahụ
[citation needed] Ewezuga usoro telivishọn ndị a a ma ama, ọ rụrụ na usoro Abomama dịka 'Mapule' na na Ambitions dịka 'Thembi'
[citation mkpa] Ọ rụkwara ọrụ nkwado na usoro Hard Copy, Backstage, Umlilo na Scandal!
N'ime mmezigharị nke mbụ 1977 nke American mini-series Roots, Nokuthula rụrụ ọrụ dị ka 'nne Kunta Kinte'
N'ihe nkiri etv Umlilo, ọ rụrụ ọrụ dịka 'Dumile', nwa agbọghọ obodo a mụrụ ma zụlite na Soweto onye bụ nwunye nke abụọ n'alụmdi na nwunye
Nokuzola Gladys Tolashe bụ onye ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị South Africa na onye omeiwu (MP) maka African National Congress
Na 5 Septemba 2016, a ṅụrụ Tolashe iyi dị ka onye otu ANC Member of Parliament na National Assembly
Ọ nọchiri Raesibe Eunice Nyalungu, onye nwụrụ
N'oge mbụ ya na National Assembly, ọ rụrụ ọrụ na Kọmitii Portfolio na Agriculture, Forestry na Fisheries, Kọmitii Porfolio na Labour, Kọmiti Portfolio na Communications
Ọ gbara arụkwaghịm na National Assembly na 25 Febụwarị 2018 ma Daniel Jabu Kabini nọrọ n'oche ya
N'abalị iri abụọ na isii n'ọnwa Febụwarị n'afọ 2018, a họpụtara ya dị ka onye isi obodo nke Enoch Mgijima Local Municipality
A họpụtara Tolashe ka ọ laghachi na National Assembly na ntuli aka 2019 site na ndepụta nke ANC nke Eastern Cape
Àtụ Current MPs of South Africa
Nokwanda Pearl (Nox) Makunga bụ Prọfesọ nke Biotechnology na Mahadum Stellenbosch
Makunga tolitere na Alice na Eastern Cape, wee gaa ụlọ akwụkwọ nkeonwe ebe a na-ebi ebi dị na Grahamstown
Nna ya, Oswald, bụ ọkà mmụta ihe ọkụkụ nke pụrụ iche na Iridaceae
O tolitere na ịda ogbenye nke ime obodo wee nweta ohere ịgụ akwụkwọ na Mahadum Fort Hare
Ọ gara mahadum dị na Pietermaritzburg
Ọ gụchara nweta nzere PhD na Mahadum KwaZulu-Natal na 2004, na-arụ ọrụ na bayoloji ihe ọkụkụ
Na 2005 e nyere Makunga ọkwa na Mahadum Stellenbosch
Ọrụ ya na-ele anya ịchọpụta usoro nke mkpụrụ ndụ ihe nketa na usoro mkpụrụ ndụ ihe nkedo nke abụọ na osisi ọgwụ
Ọ na-agakarị n'ime ime obodo ka ya na ndị dibịa amaala kwurịta okwu
O nyere aka na akwụkwọ abụọ Protocols for Somatic Embryogenesis in Woody plant and Floriculture, Ornamental and Plant Biotechnology Advances and Topical Issues
Na 2010 o kwuputara okwu TED na ike nke Medicinal Wonderland
Ọ rụrụ ọrụ dị ka odeakwụkwọ, osote onye isi oche na onye isi otu South Africa Association of Botanists Council
Ọ ritere ihe nrite National Science and Technology Forum Distinguished Young Black Researcher award n'afọ 2011
Ọ nwetakwara TW Kambule Award
Na 2017 ọ bụ onye ọkà mmụta Fulbright na Mahadum Minnesota, Minneapolis
Ya na Jerry Cohen rụkọrọ ọrụ na osisi ọgwụ sitere na Eastern Cape
Ọ gụrụ akwụkwọ osisi
Ọ na-ejide ikike maka ịgbasa ahịhịa
Makunga bụ onye na-ekwurịta okwu sayensị na-anụ ọkụ n'obi
Ya na Tanisha Williams na Beronda Montgomery na-eduzi izu ụka Black Botanists kwa afọ
Nokwanda Mngeni bụ onye South Africa onye ndekọ ego na onye isi azụmaahịa

Ọ bụ onye isi oche nke Eskom Uganda Limited (EUL), ụlọ ọrụ na-ahụ maka ọkụ eletrik, na-ahụ maka ọdụ ọkụ eletrik abụọ nke gọọmentị nwere, maka nkwekọrịta afọ iri abụọ n'okpuru usoro nchịkwa gọọmentị Uganda
EUL bụ ụlọ ọrụ enyemaka nke Eskom, ụlọ ọrụ ike South Africa
A mụrụ ya na Eastern Cape, South Africa, ihe dịka 1962, nye Mercy Nisipho na Belton Bonsile
Ọ bụ nwa nke anọ n'ime ezinụlọ nwere ụmụnne asatọ
Ọ gụrụ akwụkwọ na Mahadum Fort Hare, wee gụchaa nweta nzere bachelọ nke azụmahịa
Ọ gafere na Mahadum South Africa, ebe ọ nwetara nzere bachelọ nke Accounting Science
Ka oge na-aga, ọ nwetara nzere Executive na Strategic Management na Advanced Certificate in Auditing na Mahadum City nke New York na United States
Ọrụ Nokwanda malitere na 1993 mgbe ọ sonyeere Eskom dị ka onye na-akwụ ụgwọ ego
Ọ gbagoro n'ọkwa, na-eje ozi dị ka onye njikwa ego, wee bụrụ onye nduzi n'ihe gbasara ego
Ebufere ya n'ụlọọrụ enyemaka nke Eskom, Eskom Uganda Limited na 2003, ebe ọ na-eje ozi dị ka onye isi n'ihe gbasara ego ruo 2008, mgbe akpọrọ ya onye isi oche nke EUL
N'oge ọ nọ n'isi nke EUL, a na-akwado ya maka ịmepụta mmemme njikwa talent na ụlọ ọrụ ahụ
Ihe omume a na-achọpụta ndị ọrụ ruru eru, bụ ndị a na-azu azụ ka ha bata n'ọrụ nduzi na mpaghara ike
Kemgbe 2003, a zụrụ ihe karịrị mmadụ iri bu ndị e were n'ọrụ ma ọ bu jigide na EUL
A na-akwadokwa ya na ntọala nke Electricity Generators and Distributors of Uganda (EGADOU), otu òtù na-akwalite omume kachasị mma na ịkekọrịta ozi n'etiti ndị ọrụ na ụlọ ọrụ ahụ

N'ime Mee 2015, aha Nokwanda Mngeni n'etiti 'mmadụ iri isii kachasị enwe mmetụta na ngalaba nke ike na mpaghara ọwụwa anyanwụ na ọdịda anyanwụ nke Afrịka' site na ESI Africa, Portal Africa maka ike na ndị na-ahụ maka ọrụ
Nolitha Ntobongwana (amụrụ na 22 Ọktoba 1969) bụ onye nkuzi na onye ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị South Africa
Ọ na-eje ozi ugbu a dị ka onye isi oche nke Kọmitii Portfolio na Ọrụ Ọha na Infrastructure na National Assembly
Onye otu African National Congress, ọ bụ onye omeiwu kemgbe 2019
Ntobongwana jere ozi na Eastern Cape Provincial Legislature
A mụrụ Ntobongwana na 22 Ọktoba 1969 na Qumbu na Cape Province
O nwere diplọma onye nkuzi nke sekọndrị na Bachelor of Commerce na Accounting
O nwetara nzere masta na Public Administration na Mahadum Fort Hare

Ọ rụrụ ọrụ dị ka osote odeakwụkwọ nke South African Democratic Teachers Union (SADTU) alaka na Qumbu, dị ka odeakwụkwọ alaka nke alaka ANC's Maqhutyana na Mhlontlo Sub-Region na OR Tambo Region, dị ka onye na-ahụ maka akụ na ụba mpaghara ANC's OR Tambo, dị ka nhazi ọrụ nke African National Congress Women's League na mpaghara OR Tambo nakwa dị ka odeakụkọ mpaghara nke ANC Women's league na Eastern Cape
Ntobongwana jere ozi dị ka onye kansụl ANC na Mhlontlo Local Municipality site na 2006 ruo 2011, wee bụrụ onye kansụla ANC na OR Tambo District Municipality Site na 2011 ruo 2015
Ọ bụ onye isi whip nke OR Tambo District Municipality n'oge ọ nọ na kansụl ahụ
Ọ rụkwara ọrụ na Eastern Cape Provincial Legislature dị ka onye nnọchi anya ANC
A họpụtara Ntobongwana ka ọ bụrụ onye omeiwu mba na ntuli aka 2019 site na ndepụta nke ANC nke Eastern Cape
Ọ bụ onye isi oche nke Kọmitii Portfolio na Ọrụ Ọha na Infrastructure ugbu a
Àtụ Current MPs of South Africa
Nollywood bụ aha otutu nke a kporo ụlọ ihe nkiri ihe nkiri Naịjirịa na mbu
Mmalite nke okwu ahụ malitere na mbido afo puku abuo, ọ sitere na akụkọ na New York Times
N'ihi akụkọ ihe mere eme nke ntụgharị na ọnọdụ na-agbanwe agbanwe, enweghị nkọwa doro anya ma ọ bụ nkwekọrịta maka okwu a, nke mere ka ọ bụrụ isiokwu nke ọtụtụ arụmụka
Isi okwu a bụ 'Nollywood' ka edochaghị anya; Jonathan Haynes chọpụtara na okwu a ka Matt Stelasslass jiri mee ihe na afo puku abuo na abuo na New York Times, ebe e jiri ya kọwaa sinima Naijiria
Charles Igwe kwuru na Norimitsu Onishi jikwa aha ahụ mee ihe n'onwa Septemba afo puku abuo na abuo nke o dere maka New York Times
The okwu na-aga n'ihu na-eji na mgbasa ozi na-ezo aka naụlọ ọrụ ihe nkiri Naijiria, na ya nkowa emere e chere na o bu portmanteau nke okwu 'Naijiria' na ' Hollywood ', isi ihe nkiri ndị Amerika
Nkọwa nke ihe nkiri a na -ele anya na Nollywood bụ isiokwu arụmụka

Alex Eyengho kọwara Nollywood dị ka 'ngụkọta ihe na -eme na ụlọ ihe nkiri Naịjirịa, ma ọ bụrụ n'asụsụ Bekee, Yoruba, Hausa, Igbo, Itsekiri, Edo, Efik, Ijaw, Urhobo ma ọ bụ ihe ọ bụla n'ime ihe karịrị narị asụsụ atọ Naịjirịa '
N'ime ọtụtụ afọ, ejirila okwu Nollywood na-arụtụ aka na ụlọ ọrụ ihe nkiri ndị ọzọ nwere mmekọ, dị ka sinima na-asụ Bekee nke Ghana, nke ndị Naijiria na-emekọkarị ihe nkiri ya na/ma ọ bụ kesaa ya
Ejikwala okwu a maka ihe nkiri ndị ala Naịjirịa/Afrịka a na -ahụta na ha nwere mmekọ na Naịjirịa ma ọ bụ mee ya kpọmkwem iji jide mmasi ndị Naịjirịa
Enweghị nkọwa akọwapụtara nke ọma etu 'ihe nkiri' Naịjirịa ga -esi bụrụ nke a ga -akpọ Nollywood
Ụfọdụ ndị na -ekerịta ihe ekwuputala mgbe niile enweghị nkwekọrịta ha maka okwu ahụ; na -enye ihe kpatara dịka eziokwu ahụ bụ na onye mba ọzọ chepụtara okwu, dị ka ụdị ọzọ nke alaeze ukwu
Enwekwara arụmụka na okwu a bụ nitationomi ihe dị adị ( Hollywood ) kama ịbụ njirimara n'onwe ya, nke ahụ bụ nke mbụ na ọpụrụiche n'Afrịka
A na-eke ihe nkiri na Naịjirịa n'ụzọ mpaghara, yana agbụrụ na okpukperechi
Yabụ, enwere ụlọ ọrụ ihe nkiri dị iche iche - nke ọ bụla na -achọ igosipụta nchegbu nke ngalaba na agbụrụ ọ na -anọchite anya ya
Agbanyeghị, enwere ụlọ ọrụ ihe nkiri na-asụ Bekee nke bụ ite na-agbaze maka ịse ihe nkiri site na ọtụtụ ụlọ ọrụ mpaghara
A na -ahụta ndị na -eme ihe nkiri n'akụkụ ụfọdụ ka ha bụrụ ndị mbụ na -eme fim na Naịjirịa
Ndị nkuzi dịka Ola Balogun, Duro Ladipo na Adeyemi Afolayan (Ade Love) rụrụ ọrụ dị mkpa mgbe ha pụtara na 'Ajani Ogun' na 1976
Otu n'ime ndị na -eme ngọngọ site na Naịjirịa, sitere na ụlọ ọrụ na -asụ asụsụ Yoruba; ọmarịcha ịma atụ bụ Mosebolatan (1985) nke Moses Olaiya wepụtara gross 107,000 (ihe ruru
2015 ₦ 442) million) n'ime ụbọchị ise ewepụtara ya
Ndị agha ochie dịka Dalhatu Bawa na Kasimu Yero bụ ndị bidoro ihe nkiri ejije nke bịara bụrụ ndị ama ama na mpaghara ugwu

N'afọ ndị 1990 hụrụ mgbanwe dị egwu na sinima nke ugwu Naịjirịa, na -achọsi ike ịdọta ọtụtụ ndị na -ege ntị na -achọta ihe nkiri Bollywood na -adọrọ mmasị karịa, Kannywood; njikọta ihe nkiri nke omenala ndị India na Hausa malitere wee bụrụ nke a ma ama nke ukwuu
Turmin Danya ('The Draw'), 1990, na -abụkarị ihe nkiri Kannywood gara nke ọma n'ahịa
Ndị ọzọ sochiri ya ngwa ngwa dịka Gimbiya Fatima na Kiyarda Da Ni
Sunusi Shehu nke akwụkwọ akụkọ Tauraruwa mepụtara okwu 'Kannywood' na 1999 ma n'oge na -adịghị anya ọ ghọrọ okwu nrụpụta ama ama maka ụlọ ọrụ ahụ
Ka ọ na -erule afọ 2012, e debara aha ihe karịrị ụlọ ọrụ ihe nkiri 2000 aha na ndị na -ese ihe nkiri nke steeti Kano
N'ime ọtụtụ afọ a na-ejikwa okwu Nollywood na-arụtụ aka na ụlọ ọrụ ihe nkiri ndị ọzọ nwere mmekọ, dị ka sinima asụsụ Bekee nke Ghana

N'ihe dị ka afọ 2006 ruo 2007, onye na -eme ihe nkiri Naịjirịa Frank Rajah Arase bịanyere aka n'akwụkwọ nkwekọrịta na ụlọ ọrụ na -emepụta ihe na Ghana, Venus Films, nke gụnyere inye aka webata ndị na -eme ihe nkiri Ghana n'ime Nollywood
Mmekọrịta a mechara bute oke egwu nke ụfọdụ ndị na -eme ihe nkiri Ghana, dị ka Van Vicker, Jackie Appiah, Majid Michel, Yvonne Nelson, John Dumelo, Nadia Buari na Yvonne Okoro

Ọzọkwa, kemgbe ọtụtụ afọ, n'ihi oke ọnụ ahịa imepụta ihe nkiri na Naịjirịa, a manyere ndị na -eme ihe nkiri Naịjirịa ime ihe nkiri na mpụga Lagos iji belata ọnụ ahịa, na -egosipụta ọpụpụ nke ịse ihe nkiri na Hollywood site na Los Angeles gaa n'obodo ndị dị ka Toronto na Albuquerque, ihe a maara dị ka mmepụta ọsọ ọsọ

Ọtụtụ ndị na -emepụta ihe, n'ihi nke a, malitere ịgba égbè n'obodo ndị dị ka Accra, Ghana, na -ekesa ego echekwara na itinye ego na akụrụngwa ka mma, ọtụtụ n'ime ha na -anwa ị nweta fim ha na nnukwu ihuenyo
Mmepe a emepụtala ụdị njikọta n'etiti ụlọ ihe nkiri Naịjirịa na Ghana, na ọtụtụ ihe nkiri Bekee sitere na Ghana malitekwara ịza mkpado 'Nollywood'
Nke a bụ n'ihi mmụba nke mmekorita ihe nkiri ndị a na-enweta, na ịdị mfe ha na-esi echekwa nkesa gbasara ụlọ mmepụta ihe nkiri Naịjirịa

Nke a bụkwa tumadi n'ihi na ọtụtụ ndị na-abụghị ndị ọdịda anyanwụ Afrịka enweghị ike ịkpa oke n'etiti ihe nkiri ndị a na ihe nkiri Naịjirịa, ebe ọ bụ ihe ama ama maka nnukwu ihe nkiri si Naịjirịa ka ndị na-eme ihe nkiri na Naịjirịa na Ghana
Nollywood USA bụ okwu sara mbara, nke a na -eji ekwu maka ihe nkiri Naịjirịa emere na mba ofesi
Agbanyeghị na a na-akpọ ha Nollywood USA, ihe nkiri ndị a nwere ike gbaa na obodo ọ bụla na-abụghị Afrịka
Ọ bụ ndị na -eme ihe nkiri Naịjirịa bi na mba ofesi na -eme fim ndị a, a na -emekarị ya maka ndị Naịjirịa na -ege ntị
Dị ka okwu 'Nollywood', nkọwa nke 'Nollywood USA' edoghị anya
Na 2012, ekwuputara na Nollywood ga-eme emume ncheta afọ iri abụọ ya
Afọ a kara akara afọ iri abụọ ka ahapụchara ihe nkiri vidio na- ebi ndụ na agbụ (1992), nke a na-enyo enyo gosipụtara ọganihu na oge ihe nkiri vidiyo
Emechara mee emume ncheta ahụ na June 2013

E mechara kpughee ihe omume ahụ ka ọ bụrụ mkpebi nke akụkụ nke ụlọ ọrụ na ọ bụghị ihe a kwadoro na nkwekọrịta; Association nke ndị na -emepụta ihe nkiri (AMP) haziri ihe omume a, otu jikọtara ndị na -emepụta ihe nkiri vidiyo
Kemgbe ekwuputara mmemme 'Nollywood @ 20' na 2012 ruo emume ya n'afọ 2013, ihe omume a akpalitela arụmụka site n'aka ọtụtụ ndị ọ metụtara; Ọtụtụ n'ime ha kwenyere na ụlọ ọrụ ahụ akarịala afọ 20

Ebe ọ bụ na Nollywood abụrụla aha ụlọ ọrụ ihe nkiri Naịjirịa niile, a na -arụrịta ụka na enweghị ike ibi na Bondage iji mee mmemme ụlọ ọrụ ihe nkiri Naịjirịa, na -ekwupụta na ihe nkiri abụghị n'ezie ihe nkiri vidiyo Naịjirịa mbụ, ọ bụghịkwa ya
ihe nkiri vidiyo 'nke ọma' nke mbụ, pere mpe ihe nkiri Naịjirịa nke mbụ

Ememe a na -ese okwu mekwara ka akụkọ pụta na ngalaba ọzọ nke ụlọ ọrụ ahụ, 'Association of Nigeria Theatre Arts Practitioners (ANTP)' na -eme atụmatụ ịkpọgharị ụlọ ọrụ ahụ ka ọ bụrụ okwu ọzọ nke ga -agbakọ akụkọ ihe mere eme niile nke ụlọ ọrụ ihe nkiri Naịjirịa, kemgbe okwu a
A na -ekwu na a na -akọwapụta ihe nkiri Nollywood na agbụrụ

Ọ bụ ezie na ndị na-akwado ihe omume a rụrụ ụka na ọ bụ 'Nollywood brand' ka a na-eme emume na ọ bụghị ụlọ ọrụ, arụpụtara arụmụka na okwu ahụ bụ 'Nollywood' malitere naanị n'afọ 2000, yabụ achọrọ nkọwa na ka enwere ike ịgbatị 'Nollywood Brand' ruo afọ 1992 nke na -adịghị mkpa n'ụzọ ọ bụla, yana gịnị kpatara na ọ bụghị naanị na fim mbụ Naịjirịa emere
Alex Eyengho kwuru n'edemede 2012 na okwu a bụ 'Nollywood' anọghị n'oge afọ ihe nkiri nke oge ihe nkiri vidiyo na nke Golden Age
Seun Apara, n'edemede ya na 360Nobscom kwuru, sị 'Ọ bụ ma ọ bụ ndị na -akwalite ihe omume ahụ emeghị nyocha ha nke ọma ma ọ bụ na ha akpachaghị anya chọọ ịgụta akụkọ ihe mere eme'
Adegboyega Oyeniya kwuru 'Amaghị m ihe ha na -ekwu maka ya site na ime mmemme 'Nollywood @ 20'; ha na -eme Ramsey Tokunbo Nouah ka ọ bụ Genevieve Nnaji ? Eleghị anya, ha na -eme nnukwu ego
Ndị a kwesịrị ịkwụsị ịghọgbu ndị Naịjirịa '

Ụfọdụ ụlọ ọrụ mgbasa ozi kọkwara na ihe omume a bụ n'ihi anyaukwu na ọdịmma onwe onye, dịka ndị nhazi gara leta ndị ndọrọndọrọ ọchịchị ka ha rịọ ego n'aha ụlọ ọrụ, mana ebubo na ha kesara ego ha nwetara n'etiti onwe ha
Ihe ọzọ ewelitere ịkatọ ihe omume a bụ na enwetaghị nsọpụrụ 'ndị rụzuru' na Nollywood, kama na -asọpụrụ ndị na -eme ihe fọrọ nke nta ka ọ bụrụ otu na ndị na -ahazi ihe omume a sị na ọ bụ ezughị oke

Ọtụtụ ndị na -eme ihe nkiri na ndị na -eme ihe nkiri gosipụtara iwe ha maka emumme ụgha e chere; Kunle Afolayan kwuru, sị “Echiche niile nke Nollywood na afọ iri abuo enweghị isi nye m n'ihi na Nollywood m maara karịrị afọ iri abụọ
Echetara m na nna m gbara ihe nkiri ihe dị ka afọ iri ato na asaa gara aga, mụ onwe m tokwara na ụlọ ọrụ ahụ
N'ihe gbasara m, ọ bụ ihe nzuzu
' N'ajụjụ ọnụ ọzọ, o kwuru 'Ọ bụrụ na Nollywood bụ aha ndị mmadụ kpebiri ịkpọ ụlọ ọrụ ihe nkiri na Naịjirịa, a bụ m akụkụ ya
Ọ bụrụ na Nollywood bụ ihe ha na -ekwu bụ afọ iri abụọ, mgbe ahụ esoghị m na Nollywood ahụ maka na m na -eme ahịa ihe nkiri kemgbe ihe karịrị afọ iri atọ ugbu a ”
Jide Kosoko kwukwara, sị “Ulọ ọrụ ihe nkiri Naịjirịa dịka m siri hụ abụghị afọ iri abụọ
Ọ bụrụ n'ezie na anyị niile bụ otu ụlọ ọrụ, mgbe ahụ ụlọ ọrụ m nwere abụghị afọ iri abuo
Ọ dị mkpa ịgwa ụwa akụkọ nke ụlọ ọrụ anyị nke ọma ma emebisila ndị ọsụ ụzọ
N'ihe gbasara m, ihe ha na -eme bụ ibi n'agbụ ọ bụghị Nollywood '
Tunde Kelani kwuru 'kedu ka Nollywood ga -esi mee ememme afọ iri abụọ ma m gafere afọ iri anọ n'ụlọ ọrụ a?'

Onye isi oche ndị na -eme ihe nkiri Guild nke Naịjirịa n'oge ahụ, Ibinabo Fiberesima, kwetara na Nollywood karịrị afọ iri abụọ, mana o nyere ihe e weere dị ka okwu na -enweghị isi maka ihe kpatara mmemme ahụ, na -ekwupụta 'Ọ bụ maka ime mmemme nke anyị n'agbanyeghị na Nollywood karịrị Afọ iri abuo
Ọ dịla anya ndị mmadụ na -eme emumme mana ugbu a, anyị na -eme emumme anyị ma na -enyeghachi ọha mmadụ ọtụtụ nza
Ọ bụ ezigbo nzọụkwụ anyị ewerela ugbu a na àgwà nke ihe nkiri anyị ka mma '
Na mgbakwunye na nnukwu mgbasa ozi nke Nollywood site na mgbasa ozi mgbasa ozi na Naịjirịa, ya bụ, TV, Redio, na Bipute, akwụkwọ ole na ole dị n'ịntanetị na -ebipụta ọdịnaya naanị na ụlọ ọrụ
Ndị a gụnyere

Akwụkwọ edemede ezubere iwebata Nollywood na ndị na -ege ntị ọdịda anyanwụ bụ nnabata Jamie Meltzer na Nollywood (2007) (USA), Nke a bụ Nollywood ( Franco Sacchi, Robert Caputo, n'afo 2007) (Nigeria) na Nollywood Babylon ( Ben Addelman, Samir Mallal, n'afo 2008) (Canada)
Nollywood Movies bụ ihe ndenye aha nkiri telivishọn ọwa ntaneeti, bipụtara mbu na United Alaeze na Sky ọwa 327
Kwa ọnwa, ọwa ahụ na-enye ihe nkiri 30 dị iche iche na ihe nkiri Naijiria ewepụtara na nso nso a, awa 24 kwa ụbọchị
Ọ bụ ọwa mbụ na-arụ ọrụ na UK
A na-akwado ọwa ahụ site na ndenye aha na mgbasa ozi
Nolly Awards, nke bụbu ihe Nollywood Movies Awards, bụ ihe nrite ihe nkiri Naịjirịa kwa afọ nke Nollywood Movies TV iji sọpụrụ ọmarịcha ihe ịga nke ọma na ụlọ ọrụ ihe nkiri Naijiria
E mere mbipụta mmalite mbu ya a na Civic Centre, Lagos na 2 June 2012
Ememme kachasị ọhụrụ bụ nke emere na 18 October 2014 na ụlọ oriri na ọṅụṅụ Intercontinental ọhụrụ a na-enye ọrụ, nke bụ ụlọ oriri na ọṅụṅụ kachasị mma na West Africa
Na 2016, a na-emegharị ihe nrite ahụ na The Nolly Awards, na mbipụta 2016 emere na May 1, Otú ọ dị, ememe ahụ emeghị na afọ abụọ n'usoro
Site na afọ 2013, ihe nrite Nollywood Movie Awards nwere ụdị iri abụọ na asaa
Nollywood Reinvented, nke a makwaara dị ka NR, bụ weebụsaịtị ewepụtara na 2011 ma raara onwe ya nye na nyocha ihe nkiri
Ọ na-enyekwa ozi gbasara ihe nkiri, ndị na-eme ihe nkiri, ndị na-emepụta ihe nkiri na ihe nkiri ndị ọzọ
Ọ bụ otu n'ime usoro nyocha nke mbụ raara nye Nollywood
Weebụsaịtị ahụ na-enye ụdị nyocha ihe nkiri abụọ dị mkpa (nlebanya sinima na nyocha vidiyo ụlọ) yana nyocha ihe ngosi TV na ọkwa
Emepụtara webụsaịtị Nollywood Reinvented na 22 Jenụwarị 2011
Emepụtara ya iji nyere aka melite ọnụnọ Cinema Naijiria na ịntanetị yana ka ọ bụrụ ntụaka maka ndị na-ekiri ihe nkiri Naijiria
N'ihe karịrị 100 ihe nkiri Naijiria na Ghana enyochara ma na-agụta, NR na-enyere aka ịmepụta ikpo okwu na ntụaka maka nollywood na webụ
Nollywood TV bụ ọwa telivishọn asụsụ French mbụ a raara nye sinima Naijiria, nke a na-akpọkwa Nollywood
Thema mebere ya na 2012, Nollywood TV nwere mmemme ihe nkiri awa 750, sitere na ọwa onyonyo South Africa Africa Magic (otu M-Net / MultiChoice)

Nomafrench Mbombo (amụrụ na 6 Septemba, na afọ 1966) bụ onye agụmakwụkwọ na onye ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị South Africa bụ onye bụ Minista Ahụike nke Western Cape Provincial kemgbe afọ 2015 na onye otu Western Cape Províncial Parliament kemgbe afọ 2014
Ọ rụrụ ọrụ dị ka Minista na-ahụ maka ọdịbendị na egwuregwu na Western Cape Provincial site na afo 2014 ruo afọ 2015
Mbombo bụ onye isi ala nke Democratic Alliance Women's Network site na afọ 2018 ruo afọ 2021
A mụrụ Mbombo na 6 Septemba na afọ 1966
Ọ nọrọ n'oge ọ bụ nwata na Mdantsane, East London na Cape Province
O nwetara PhD na ngalaba nke Gender na Human Rights na Mahadum nke Western Cape
Mbombo nwetara nzere masta na ahụike nne na nwa na Mahadum KwaZulu-Natal, na Bachelors ya na Nursing Science na Mahadim Fort Hare
Ọ rụrụ ọrụ na ngalaba ahụike nke Eastern Cape na KwaZulu-Natal na mpaghara gọọmentị mpaghara
Tupu ọ banye na ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị, ọ rụrụ ọrụ dị ka osote Onye Ọkachamara na Ngalaba nke Community and Health Sciences nke Mahadum Western Cape
Ọ rụkwara ọrụ dị ka onye otu dị iche iche, dị ka National Committee of Confidential Enquiries on Maternal Death, NEPAD, na UN Office of Human Rights Women & Gender Directorate
Mbombo, onye na-akwado African National Congress, sonyeere DA na 2013, mgbe ọ gachara nzukọ DA maka ndị ọkachamara ojii
A họpụtara Mbombo ka ọ bụrụ onye omeiwu nke Western Cape Provincial na ntuli aka nke 8 Mee, na afọ 2014 ma ṅụọ iyi dị ka onye otu na 21 Mee, na afọ 2014
Ọ na-anọchite anya mpaghara Filipaị nke obodo Cape Town
Praịm Minista Helen Zille họpụtara Mbombo ka ọ bụrụ Minista na-ahụ maka ọdịbendị na egwuregwu na Western Cape Provincial
A ṅụrụ ya iyi dị ka Minista Provincial na 26 Mee, na afọ 2014
N'ọnwa Disemba afọ 2014, onye isi ala Zille mara ọkwa na Theuns Botha na Mbombo ga-agbanwere ọkwa ndị minista
Mbombo ga-aghọ Minista Ahụike nke Western Cape Provincial, ebe Botha ga-ewere ọnọdụ ya
Mgbanwe ndị ahụ malitere na 1 Jenụwarị na afy2015
N'afọ 2018, onye isi nke Democratic Alliance Women's Network Federal Leader Denise Robinson kwupụtara na ọ gaghị achọ ka a họpụta ya ọzọ
Mbombo mechara kwupụta na ọ bụ onye na-azọ ọkwa ma họpụta ya na Federal Congress nke pati ahụ na 7 Eprel, na afy 2018
N'ọnwa Mee, na afọ 2019, onye isi ala a họpụtara ọhụrụ bụ Alan Winde kwupụtara na ọ nọgidere na Mbombo n'ọkwa ya dị ka Minista Ahụike nke Provincial
N'ọnwa Ọktoba, na afọ 2019, o kwupụtara na ọ bụ onye isi oche nke Democratic Alliance na-esote arụkwaghịm Athol Trollip
Ivan Meyer meriri ya
N'ọnwa Disemba, na afọ 2020, a katọrọ Mbombo maka ide na Facebook na ọ nọ ezumike na Limpopo, n'etiti oke nke abụọ nke ọrịa COVID-19 na Western Cape
O kwuru na ọ bụ 'oge ezumike kwesịrị ekwesị, ogologo oge'
N'abalị iri abụọ na asatọ n'ọnwa Eprel na afọ 2021, Mbombo gbara arụkwaghịm dị ka onye isi gọọmentị etiti nke DA's Women's Network
Ọ gbara arụkwaghịm mgbe Bonginkosi Madikizela gbara arụkwapụ dị ka onye isi mpaghara DA na Minista Na-ahụ Maka Njem na Ọrụ Ọha
N'ọnwa Machị, na afọ 2020, Mbombo zutere onye nnọchi anya France bụ Laurent Amar bụ onye a chọpụtara na ọ nwere COVID-19
N'ihi ya, ọ banyere na nkewa onwe ya ma mesịa nwalee na ọ bụghị

Nomagugu Simelane-Zulu (amụrụ n'abalị iri abụọ na abụọ n'ọnwa Ọgọstụ n'afọ 1976) bụ onye ọka iwu South Africa na onye ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị African National Congress (ANC) nke na-eje ozi dị ka KwaZulu-Natal MEC (Member of the Executive Council) maka ahụike kemgbe Mee 2019
Ọ ghọrọ onye otu KwaZulu-Natal Legislature na Mee 2014
Ọ bụ onye isi oche nke Kọmitii Ọrụ Ugbo nke ndị omeiwu site na 2014 ruo 2019
Simelane-Zulu sonyere na African National Congress Youth League (ANCYL)
A mụrụ Nomagugu Simelane na 22 Ọgọstụ 1976 na Dobsonville, Johannesburg, na mpaghara Transvaal
O nwetara nzere BA na iwu wee nweta nzere LLB na Mahadum Natal, nke bụzi Mahadum KwaZulu-Natal
O nwere asambodo na Gọọmenti site na Mahadum nke Witwatersrand
Simelane-Zulu na-amụ ugbu a maka nzere masta na sayensị ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị
Simelane-Zulu sonyeere ANCYL mgbe ọ dị afọ iri na isii na 1992 ma bụrụ onye na-ahụ maka akụ na ụba nke otu ndị ntorobịa na Dobsonville site na 1992 ruo 1993
Mgbe ọ na-agụ akwụkwọ na Mahadum nke Natal's Pietermaritzburg campus, ọ bụ onye isi oche nke South African Students Congress site na 1997 ruo 1998
Ọ bụ onye isi oche nke ngalaba ANC Youth League nke mahadum site na 1999 ruo 2001
Ọ bụ odeakwụkwọ nke Law Student Society nke mahadum site na 1999 ruo 2000
Simelane-Zulu mechara bụrụ onyeisi oche nke Black Lawyers Association na mahadum ahụ ma nọrọ n'ọkwa ahụ site na 2000 ruo 2001
Ọ bụ odeakwụkwọ alaka site na 2002 ruo 2004
Ọ bụ onye na-ahụ maka akụ na ụba nke ANC Youth League site na 2003 ruo 2010
Site na 2010 ruo 2011, ọ bụ onye na-ahụ maka akụ na ụba mpaghara nke alaka ANC Abaqulusi
N'oge na-adịghị anya, e buliri ya elu ka ọ bụrụ onye isi oche mpaghara ma jee ozi n'ọkwa ahụ site na 2011 ruo 2014
A họpụtara ya ka ọ bụrụ onye otu ANC Provincial Executive Committee na 2015
A họpụtara Simelane-Zulu dị ka onye MPL na Mee 2014 ma bụrụ onyeisi oche nke Kọmitii Ọrụ Ugbo nke ndị omeiwu ruo 2019
Onye isi ala Sihle Zikalala họpụtara ya dị ka MEC maka ahụike na Mee 2019
Na Septemba 2021, Simelane-Zulu rịọrọ mgbaghara n'ihu ọha mgbe ya na ndị ọbịa ya mebiri iwu COVID-19 n'oge oriri ncheta ọmụmụ ya na August
Democratic Alliance na KwaZulu-Natal boro ya ebubo mpụ
Tupu nnọkọ ntuli aka nke mpaghara ANC, ANC na mpaghara eThekwini, mpaghara kachasị ukwuu nke pati ahụ na KwaZulu-Natal, kwadoro mkpọsa Simelane-Zulu maka osote onyeisi oche mpaghara
Ọ nọ na ANC MPL na onye na-azọ ọkwa onye isi oche mpaghara, Siboniso Duma's 'Taliban' slate, otu ndị na-azọrọ na onye bụbu onye isi ala Jacob Zuma

N'abalị iri abụọ na atọ n'ọnwa Julaị n'afọ 2022, a họpụtara Simelane-Zulu dị ka osote onye isi oche mpaghara nke ANC, na-emeri MEC Kwazi Mshengu na ntuli aka nke gara 927 Xi661 ka 'Taliban' slate mere ka ọ dị ọcha n'ọkwá ndị isi mpaghara niile
Zikalala gbara arụkwaghịm dị ka onye isi ala na 5 Ọgọstụ 2022 ma họpụta Finance MEC Nomusa Dube-Ncube ka ọ nọchie ya
N'abalị iri na otu n'ọnwa Ọgọstụ afọ 2022, Dube-Ncube họpụtara ndị isi ya, ebe Simelane-Zulu nọgidere dị ka MEC maka ahụike
Simelane lụrụ di
Ọ bi na Newcastle, KwaZulu-Natal

Nomaindiya Mfeketo bụ onye ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị South Africa onye jere ozi dị ka Minista nke Ebe Obibi Mmadụ site n'afọ 2018 ruo afọ 2019, osote Minista nke Mmekọrịta na Imekọ ihe ọnụ, osote onye isi oche nke National Assembly nke South Africa site n'afọ 2009 ruo afọ 2014, na onye isi obodo Cape Town site n'afọ 1998 ruo afọ 2000 na ọzọ site n'afọ 2002 ruo afọ 2006
Tupu ọ banye na ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị, Mfeketo rụrụ ọrụ maka ọtụtụ òtù na-abụghị nke gọọmentị (NGO)
Site n'afọ 1981 ruo afọ 1991 Mfeketo rụrụ ọrụ maka NGO ọzụzụ ọrụ ugbo ZAKH mgbe nke ahụ gasịrị ọ rụrụ ọrụ maka Social Change Assistance Trust (SCAT) site na 1991 ruo 1992
Site n'afọ 1992 ruo afọ 1994, Mfeketo rụrụ ọrụ maka Development Action Group (DAG) na ọrụ ụlọ ọha na eze
Nomalungelo Gina bụ onye ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị ndị South Africa bụ onye bụ onye omeiwu (MP) maka African National Congress kemgbe afọ 2003
Ọ bụ osote minista nke azụmahịa, ụlọ ọrụ na asọmpi ugbu a
Dị ka minista, ọ kwadoro mbupụ ugbo n'oge COVID-19
Nomantu Nkomo-Ralehoko (amụrụ na 8 June 1966) bụ onye ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị South Africa na onye otu African National Congress
Ọ na-eje ozi dị ka Gauteng MEC (Member of the Executive Council) maka ahụike na ahụike kemgbe Ọktoba 2022
Ọ bụ MEC maka ego na e-Government site na Mee 2019 ruo Ọktoba 2022
A họpụtara Nkomo-Ralehoko ka ọ bụrụ onye omeiwu Gauteng Provincial na June 1999
Ọ rụrụ ọrụ nwa oge dị ka MEC nke Mmụta na Mee 2019
Ọ bụ osote onye isi oche nke ndị omeiwu Gauteng site na Machị 2018 ruo Mee 2019
Nkomo-Ralehoko bụkwa Gauteng MEC maka Ọrụ Ugbo na Mmepe Ime Obodo n'etiti Mee na June 2009
A mụrụ Nkomo-Ralehoko na 1966 na Ngcobo na Cape Province
Ọ gụrụ akwụkwọ na Nyanga Senior Secondary School
Mgbe ọ gụsịrị akwụkwọ, ọ kwagara na Transvaal Province ebe nna ya bi
Ọ gụrụ ọrụ nchịkwa n'ọfịs na kọleji Vaal N'afọ 1988, ọ malitere ịrụ ọrụ n'ụlọ Cosatu
Nwanne ya nwanyị rụrụ ọrụ maka Construction and Allied Workers Union
Ọ nọchiri nwanne ya nwanyị mgbe ọ nọ na ezumike ịmụ nwa
Mgbe ọ na-arụ ọrụ maka Cosatu, ọ nwere mmasị na ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị
Ọ rụrụ ọrụ dị ka onye nchịkwa na South African Railways and Harbours Union
Mgbe ọ na-arụ ọrụ n'ebe ahụ, ọ gara Russia ịmụ ihe n'ụlọ akwụkwọ ndị ọrụ
Mgbe ọ laghachiri South Africa, ọ malitere ịrụ ọrụ dị ka onye ọrụ agụmakwụkwọ ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị n'otu ụlọ ọrụ ahụ
N'afọ ndị 1990, ọ rụrụ ọrụ n'ọfịs Nosiviwe Mapisa-Nqakula
Ọ rụrụ ọrụ dị ka onye na-enyere Baleka Mbete aka, mgbe ọ ka bụ odeakwụkwọ ukwu nke African National Congress Women's League
Ọ rụkwara ọrụ na ndị isi nke league ụmụ nwanyị mgbe Winnie Madikizela-Mandela bụ onye isi oche league
N'afọ 1995, ọ sonyeere ndị omeiwu Gauteng Provincial dị ka onye nchịkwa
Na ntuli aka 1999, a họpụtara ya ka ọ bụrụ onye omeiwu dị ka onye nnọchi anya ANC
A họpụtara Nkomo-Ralehoko ka ọ bụrụ Gauteng MEC maka Ọrụ Ugbo na Mmepe Ime Obodo na 8 Mee 2009 mgbe ntuli aka 2009 gasịrị
Ọ banyere n'ọfịs na 13 Mee
N'ihi esemokwu dị n'etiti ya na onye isi ala Nomvula Mokonyane, ọ gbara arụkwaghịm dị ka MEC na 5 June
A họpụtara ya ka ọ bụrụ onyeisi oche nke kọmitii okporo ụzọ na njem na ndị omeiwu
Mgbe ntuli aka 2014 gasịrị, Nkomo-Ralehoko ghọrọ oche oche nke ndị omeiwu
A họpụtara ya ka ọ bụrụ osote onye isi oche nke ndị omeiwu na Machị 2018
Na 21 June 2018, a họpụtara ya ka ọ bụrụ osote odeakwụkwọ mpaghara nke ANC
Mgbe ntuli aka 2019 e mere na 8 Mee, praịm David Makhura họọrọ ya ka ọ bụrụ MEC ọhụrụ nke agụmakwụkwọ, na-anọchi Panyaza Lesufi, onye e mere MEC maka ego na e-Government
A ṅụrụ ya iyi na 30 Mee
N'ihi mkpesa ọha na eze, Makhura gbanwere ndị isi ya otu ụbọchị ka e mesịrị ma mee ka Nkomo-Ralehoko na Lesufi gbanwee ọnọdụ
Na 27 June 2022, a họpụtara Nkomo-Ralehoko, onye jere ozi dị ka osote odeakwụkwọ mpaghara nke ANC, dị ka osota onyeisi oche mpaghara
Mgbe a họpụtara Panyaza Lesufi dị ka onye isi ala Gauteng n'ọnwa Ọktoba 2022, a họpụtara ya ka ọ bụrụ MEC maka ahụike na ahụike
Nkomo-Ralehoko nwere ụmụ nwoke abụọ
Ọ bụ onye na-akwado Orlando Pirates

Nomatemba Gugulethu Pudnixia Olivia Tambo (Nke a maara dị ka Thembi Tambo, amụrụ n'afọ 1957) bụ onye nnọchi anya mba Briten na South Africa na onye ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị, onye na-eje ozi ugbu a dị ka Kọmishọna Ukwu nke South Africa na United Kingdom
Tambo nwere BA na akụkọ ihe mere eme na Bekee na Mahadum Roehampton na London
Nke a sochiri akara ugo mmụta iwu na Mahadum nke Witwatersrand n'afọ 2002
N'afọ 2007, ọ gụsịrị ọzụzụ ya na mmekọrịta mba na mba
Tambo bụ akụkụ nke Anti-Apartheid Movement
Tambo bụ nwa nwanyị Oliver Tambo
Ọ gara nraranye nke ihe oyiyi nye ya n'afọ 2019
A mụrụ Nomaza Nongqunga Coupez na South Africa na 1981
Ọ bụ onye guzobere ụlọ ọrụ Undiscover Canvass nke na-akwalite ndị Africa na-ese ihe na France
Kemgbe Ọgọstụ 2017, ọ bụkwa onye otu Presidential Council for Africa
Coupez nwere nzere bachelọ na Bloemfontein Tecknikon
Ọ kwagara France na 2009, ebe ọ malitere ịkwalite omenala Africa na inyere ndị na-eto eto Africa aka ibu ndị a ga-ahụta nke ọma n'ahịa Europe
Na 2015, o gosipụtara ihe ngosi nka mbụ ya
Coupez mechara hiwe Undiscover Canvass iji kwalite ndị Africa na-ese ihe na France, yana imekọ ihe na ụlọ ọrụ ihe nkiri na mmanya na South Africa
O sonyeere Presidential Council for Africa, otu ndụmọdụ nke onye isi ala France Emmanuel Macron mebere

Nombulelo Lilian Hermans (1 Jenụwarị na afọ 1970 - 18 Jenụwarị na afo 2021) bụ onye ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị South Africa nke African National Congress onye jere ozi dị ka onye otu National Assembly of South Africa site na afo 2019 ruo mgbe ọ nwụrụ na afọ 2021
N'afọ 1985, Hermans sonyeere Colesberg Youth Organisation
Mgbe ịkpa ókè agbụrụ gasịrị, ọ sonyere na nguzobe alaka African National Congress na Colesberg
A họpụtara Hermans ka ọ bụrụ onye isi kọmitii Pixley ka Seme nke ANC na afọ 2002 ma jee ozi na kọmitii ọrụ mpaghara
E mechara họpụta Hermans dị ka onye na-ahụ maka akụ na ụba mpaghara ANC tupu ọ bụrụ osote onyeisi oche mpaghara
Ọ rụkwara ọrụ na kọmitii na-ahụ maka mpaghara na kọmiti na-arụ ọrụ nke ANC na Northern Cape
Hermans bụ onye isi obodo nke Umsobomvu Local Municipality (oche Colesberg) maka oge abụọ ma bụrụ ọkà okwu nke Pixley ka Seme District Municipality
Ọ rụkwara ọrụ dị ka osote onyeisi oche nke abụọ nke South African Local Government Association

E debere Hermans na 111th na ndepụta mba nke pati ahụ maka ntuli aka 8 Mee 2019; nke a ezughi oke maka ya iji merie oche na National Assembly na ntuli aka ka ANC meriri oche 108 site na ndepụta mba, Otú ọ dị, Sylvia Lucas jụrụ oche ya ma ANC họọrọ Hermans dị ka onye nọchiri ya
A ṅụrụ ya iyi na 13 Juun, na afọ 2019, ihe karịrị otu ọnwa mgbe ntuli aka ahụ gasịrị
N'abalị iri abụọ na asaa n'ọnwa Juun afọ 2019, a kpọrọ Hermans aha na Kọmitii Portfolio na Ọrụ na Ọrụ
Ọ ghọrọ onye otu Joint Standing Committee on Intelligence n'ọnwa Ọktoba, na afọ 2019
Hermans nwụrụ site na nsogbu COVID-19 na 18 Jenụwarị, na afọ 2021, n'oge ọrịa COVID-19 na South Africa
Nomcebo Nothule Zikode (amụrụ n'afọ 1985), bụ onye South Africa na-agụ egwu na onye na-ede egwu
A mụrụ ya na Hammarsdale, Zikode bụ onye na-agụ egwu ruo ọtụtụ afọ
Ya na DJ Ganyani arụkọla ọrụ na egwu ha dara ụda 'Emazulwini' (2018)

N'ịbịanye aka na nkwekọrịta ndekọ na Open Mic Production, o so dee ma gosipụta ya na Master KG's chart-topping single 'Jerusalema' (2019), nke malitere dika nke mbụ na chatti Billboard Music na chatti Apple Music
E wepụtara abọm mbụ ya bụ Xola Moya Wam' n'afọ 2020, nke nwere egwu abụọ gara nke ọma 'Xola Moya wam' na 'Bayabuza'
A mụrụ Zikode na Hammarsdale, KwaZulu-Natal
Ọ gụrụ akwụkwọ na Ukusa High School, mesịa debanye aha na Havatech College, ma nweta nzere Information Technology
Mgbe ọ hapụsịrị ụlọ iji chụsoo ọrụ egwu, ọ rụrụ ọrụ dịka onye na-agụ egwu nkwado ruo ihe karịrị afọ iri na ise
Ya na ndị nwere nka ihe omume na South Africa, gụnyere Deborah Fraser, Zahara, Lundi Tyamara, na Nhlanhla Nciza rụkọrọ ọrụ
Ganyani Entertainment bịanyere aka maka nsonye, na-enye olu nke egwu gụnyere 'NTO', 'Jabulile', na 'Emazulwini', nke natara nhọpụta nke Record of the Year na onyinye SAMA
Ebe ọ bụ na ọbughi ya nwe egwu ndị ahụ, ekweghị ka ọ rụọ ha na-enweghị nkwenye nke akara ahụ

N'ịbụ onye bịanyere aka na nkwekọrịta ndekọ na Open Mic Productions, ọ nwetara ọmụma n'ụwa niile mgbe ya na Master KG rụchara ọrụ na egwu ya nke afọ 2019 'bu Jerusalema' ma mesịa bụrụ nke Burna Boy guhariri ma chikọta, nke pụtara nke mbụ na chaatị egwu Billboard
N'abalị iri na anọ n'ọnwa Ọgọstụ n'afọ 2020, e wepụtara egwu ya bụ 'Xola Moya Wam' nke gosipụtara Master KG ma wepụta egwu a dị ka isi egwu dị na Albọm
Egwú ahụ nwetara asambodo ọla edo site na Recording Industry nke South Africa n'ime izu abụọ mbụ
Otu egwu ahụ ruru nọmba nke mbụ na chaati Apple Music na chaati iTunes
Na mbido Ọgọstụ, e mere ka albọm akwụọ ụgwọ tupu Mpụta dị
E wepụtara abọm studio mbụ ya bụ Xola Moya Wam n'abalị iri abụọ na otu n'ọnwa Ọgọstụ afọ 2020
gosiputaraMaster KG, Makhadzi na Bongo Beats
A kwadoro abọm ahụ platinum mgbe otu ọnwa gachara ka e wepụtara ya na ahịa nke edere ọnụ ọgụ narị puku na iri ise
N'afọ 2020, Zikode bịanyere aka na nkwekọrịta ndekọ gburugburu ụwa na ntinye aka nke Sony / ATV Music
N'abalị́ atọ nke ọnwa Disemba afọ 2020, ọ meriri na 1st KZN Entertainment Awards nke KZN ntụrụndụ Awards maka Best Female Artist category
N' oge 27th South African Music Awards, a họpụtara Xola Moya Wam dị ka Albọm egwu kacha mma bụ Best dance Album
N'abalị iri abụọ na iteghete n'ọnwa Julaị afọ 2021, ọ ga-amalite njem ga Europe
Na ngwụcha afọ 2021, ọ ga-eme ngosi egwu nke mbụ ya na ihuenyo dị ka onye ọbịa na Love and Hip Hop franchise
N'ọnwa Nọvemba 2019, e gosipụtara ya na 'Jerusalem' nke Master KG ma gbasaa na mbido afọ 2020, Burna Boy wepụtara remix ya
N'abalị iri na otu nke ọnwa Julaị afọ 2021, Nomcebo kpughere na a kwụghị ya ụgwọ maka ihe ngosi ya na egwu ahụ site na akara ya Open Mic Productions
N'afọ 2021, Nomcebo kwadoro Good Ambassador maka AIDONIC
Zikode lụrụ di ma nwee ụmụ abụọ
(Master KG featuring Nomcebo Zikode & Burna Boy)
Nomfunelo Rose-Mary Mabedla bụ onye ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị South Africa na-anọchite anya African National Congress (ANC) na onye otu ọrụ
Ọ bụbu onye omeiwu nke National Assembly n'etiti afọ 2009 na afọ 2014
Mabedla malitere ọrụ ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị ya dị ka onye nnọchi anya ntuli aka nke ANC na afọ 1994

Mgbe nke ahụ gasịrị, ọ ghọrọ onye na-elekọta ụlọ ahịa maka National Education, Health and Allied Workers' Union site na afo 1996 ruo na afọ 2003 tupu ọ bụrụ odeakwụkwọ mpaghara maka Congress of South African Trade Unions
Mgbe nke a gasịrị na afọ 2005, ọ ghọrọ osote onye isi oche nke ANC maka alaka Joe Gqabi District Municipality yana ịghọ onye na-ahụ maka akụ ha
A họpụtara Mabedla dị ka onye omeiwu na ntuli aka South Africa nke afọ 2009 na mpaghara Pixley ka Seme na Northern Cape
N'oge ọ nọ na Nzukọ Ndị Omeiwu, a họpụtara ya dịka onye otu kọmitii nchekwa
N'afọ 2012, ọ duziri mkpọsa iji wepụ ọkọlọtọ South Africa n'elu mgbidi nke Castle of Good Hope na Cape Town

N'oge gara aga, ọkọlọtọ ochie ahụ na-efe n'akụkụ ọkọlọtọ South Africa nke ugbu a na ọkọlọtọ United Kingdom, ọkọlọlọtọ Prince na ọkọlọlọkụ Netherlands, na-ezo aka n'akụkọ ihe mere eme maka ike ndị chịrị South Africa
Mabedla kwuru na ọkọlọtọ na-efe efe were ya iwe n'ihi na o chere na ha na-anọchiteanya ọchịchị agbụrụ nke ndị South Africa na-abụghị ndị ọcha nakwa na ha kwesịrị ịnọ na ebe ngosi ihe mgbe ochie
Na nzaghachi, e kwekọrịtara na a ga-ewepụ ọkọlọtọ niile ma e wezụga ọkọlọtọ South Africa dị ugbu a na mgbidi ma tinye ya n'ime ebe ngosi ihe mgbe ochie nke ụlọ ahụ
N'afọ 2014, ọ guzoro maka nhọpụta ọzọ na ndepụta mba ANC na nọmba 160
Otú ọ dị, ọ tụfuru oche ya na Nzukọ Ndị Omeiwu na ntuli aka South Africa nke afọ 2014 na Democratic Alliance
Nomfusi Gotyana, nke a maara dịka Nomfusi, bụ onye South Africa na-agụ egwu na onye na-eme egwu Afro-Soul
A mụrụ ya n'obodo KwaZakhele dị na Eastern Cape
Nne ya Kwazibani ('Who Knows?' na Bekee) zụlitere ya mgbe nna ya nọ n'ụlọ mkpọrọ afọ iri abụọ na otu
Onye na-arụ ọrụ n'ụlọ n'ehihie, Kwazibani bụ onye sangoma (nwanyị Africa n'enye ọgwụ) Onye nwere onyinye amara egwu
Nomfusi so nne ya gaa emume sangoma kwa izu ('Intlombe') ebe Nomfusi mepụtara egwu ya
Ọ bụ onye a họpụtara ugboro abụọ na SAMA, onye a họpụtara na Metro FM Award ma mee ngosipụta nka n' ọtụtụ njem obodo na mba ụwa
Kemgbe ọ malitere ọrụ ịbụ abụ ya n'afọ 2009, Nomfusi gosipụtara na mmemme gụnyere WOMAD na England, FMM Sines na Portugal
Ndị ntinye ọnụ na mpaghara na mba ofesi akọwawo arụmọrụ ya dị ka 'ọgba aghara zuru oke iji lelee ma nụ', 'mgbawa ume ọhụrụ nke ike'
The Swazi Observer kpọrọ ya 'onye nka n'eme ihe kachasị mma n'usoro na nchịkọta' na 2011 Bushfire Festival
E meela ya na telivishọn na ụlọ akụkọ
Ọ rụrụ ọrụ Mpụta ihe na 'LIVE AMP' (SABC1), AFROCAFE, MORNING LIVE, na isiokwu bụ Drum, True Love, Destiny, 'Fair Lady, na Cosmopolitan
A họpụtara Nomfusi ka ọ bụrụ Miriam Makeba na ihe nkiri banyere Nelson Mandela nke a na-akpọ Mandela Long Walk to Freedom
Onye mmepụta ihe nkiri a bụ Anant Singh kwuru na ihe nkiri nke afọ 2014 a ga-abụ 'mmepụta South Africa kachasị ukwuu'

Chris Blackwell, onye guzobere Island Records, onye chọpụtara Bob Marley, Angelique Kidjo na US, kwuru banyere Nomfusi, 'Lee onye na-eto eto nwere nka dị egwu, ezi nchegbu ya maka obodo ya na ndị ọzọ na-abịa si ike
Ọ nwere ike ịga n'ụzọ niile
N'afọ 2009, Nomfusi wepụtara abọm mbụ ya bụ Kwazibani ya na ndị otu egwu ya bụ 'The Lucky Charms'
Kwazibani gosipụtara egwu abụọ nke nwetara mmụọ ndị na-ege ya ntị na mpaghara obodo na mba ụwa
Egwu 'Nontsokolo' mere ka ọ nweta nhọpụta SAMA mbụ ya
Abọm ahụ nwetara Nomfusi awọd nhọpụta Metro FM maka nwanyí kacha mma n'egwu a Albọm kacha mma bụ Best Female Singer na Best Album
O wepụtara abọm nke abụọ ya n'afọ 2012, bụ Take Me Home, nke lekwasara anya n'aka ndị na-ege ntị na Mzansi
Abọm ahụ mepụtara egwu dị otu bụ 'Uthando Lwam' ('Qam Qam') na duet ya na Ringo, 'Kunjalo' nke gosipụtara na ọtụtụ ụlọ ọrụ redio
Ringo Madlingozi so dee ma mepụta ọtụtụ n'ime abọm ahụ, ebe M'Jakes, Robbie Malinga na DJ Clock bụ ndị na-ahụ maka egwu isii ọzọ
Abọm ahụ nwetara nhọpụta SAMA ọzọ, nke Best Adult African category
Nompumelelo Ngoma (amụrụ n'afọ 1984) bụ onye na-ese ihe na onye na-ebi akwụkwọ
Ọrụ ya dị ná nchịkọta na-adịgide adịgide nkè Smithsonian's National Museum of African Art
N'afọ 2016, ọ natara ònyìnyé Cassirer Welz
A mụrụ Ngoma nà Soweto, Jabulani nà South Africa
Ngoma gárá South West Gauteng College ébé ọ gụrụ Fine Art
Ọ gụsịrị akwụkwọ afọ atọ na Artist Proof Studio ma nweta nzèrè Honours nà Visual Art nà Mahadum Johannesburg nà 2012
Monoprint ya, Take Care of Me, bụ nkè National Museum of African Art zụrụ na 2014 mà gosipụta ya na ihe ngosi nka I AmỤmụ nwanyị na-ese ihe n'oge a n'Africa
Ihe ngosi mbụ nke Ngoma bụ THULA MFAZI! na Circa Johannesburg na 2017
N'afọ 2021, a gụnyere ọrụ Ngoma na North-West University (NWU) Gallery's online exhibit Mantariana Mbokodo Musings lekwasịrị ányá na ụmụ nwanyị ise na-ese ihe na South Africa
Ngoma bị mà ná arụ ọrụ na Johannesburg
Nompumelelo Ntuli Zuma bụ onye bụbu nwanyị mbụ nke South Africa, ọ bụkwa nwunye nke abụọ ugbu a n'alụmdi na nwunye karịa otu nwanyị na Jacob Zuma, onye bụbu onye isi ala nke South Africa

Zumaz nke anọ na nwunye nke abụọ ugbu a, Nompumelelo Ntuli (MaNtuli) bụ nne nke atọ n'ime ụmụ ya, tupu ọ lụọ ya na 2008 n'ememe ọdịnala nke nwetara ọtụtụ nlebara anya mgbasa ozi na mbido Zumaz maka ọkwa onye isi ala
O nwere ụmụ atọ Manqoba Kholwani, Sinqobile, Thandisiwe
N'afọ 2015, e boro ya ebubo na ọ bụ akụkụ nke atụmatụ igbu di ya, onye isi ala Jacob Zuma n'oge ahụ
N'ihi ya, a machibidoro ya iwu n'ụlọ Nkandla
Ụlọ Ọrụ Nchebe Steeti jidere ya, na-ekwu na ọ bụghị iwu na-akwadoghị, a tọhapụrụ ya mgbe e mesịrị
Nnyocha ndị e mere mgbe e mesịrị achọtaghị ihe akaebe nke nsị ahụ ma ọ bụ ọrụ ya na ya
A na-enyocha kpọmkwem ọnọdụ nke njide ya
Àtụ Jacob Zuma
Nomthunzi Mashalaba (amụrụ n'afọ 1979) bụ ónyé na-ese ihe na ónyé na-eme ihe nkiri na South Africa
Íhé osise ya egosila na ihe ngosi mba ụwa gụnyere Map of the New Art nà Venice, Crossing Boundaries na Qatar na The Art of Humanity nà Pratt Institute nà New York
A mụrụ Mashalaba n'afọ 1979
Ọ gàrà Mahadum Nkà na Ụzụ nke Tshwane, ébé ọ nwetara diplọma mba na Fine Art n'afọ 2004 wee gụsịrị akwụkwọ n'afọ 2006, na nzere bachelọ na Fine Art
Mgbè ọ gụsịrị akwụkwọ na Mahadum Nkà na Ụzụ nke Tshwane, Mashalaba malitere isonye n' ihe ngosi na ogbako
O sonyere n'ọtụtụ ihe ngosi otu na South Africa na ogbako mba ụwa na Madagascar
N'afọ 2007, o mere ihe ngosi nke mbụ ya nke akpọrọ, Square na n'afọ 2012, o mere nke abụọ ya akpọrọ Mamiya
Nomvelo Makhanya (amụrụ 24 Eprel 1996), bụ onye ome ihe nkiri na onye na-agụ egwu nke South Africa
A maara ya nke ọma maka ọrụ ya na ihe nkiri telivishọn bụ Isibaya, Soul City na Scandal!
A mụrụ ya N'onwa Eprel abalị iri abụọ na anọ nke afọ 1996 na Nkandla, KwaZulu-Natal, South Africa
Mgbe afọ ole na ole gachara, ya na ndị mụrụ ya kwagara Johannesburg
N'afọ 2016, a chọpụtara na ọ nwere ịda mbà n'obi na nchekasị
Otú ọ dị, mgbe ọ nwetasiri ọtụtụ oge ndụmọdụ, ọ meriri ịda mbà n'obi nke uche
N’ọnwa Jenụwarị afọ 2019, onye eboro ebubo bụ ọkwọ ụgbọ ala mmanya na-egbu dabara n’ụgbọ ala Nomvelo dọwara
N’ọnwa Febụwarị afọ 2019, o kwuputara ozi mmetụta uche ya site na mgbasa ozi ọha, na a na-akpagbu ya n’ihi isi ya
Ọ sonyere na National School of Arts (NSA) na Braamfontein, Johannesburg n'okpuru nduzi nke nne ya
Mgbe ahụ, ọ rụrụ na musical 'Sarafina' ma chee ịchụso dị ka ọkachamara omenkà
Mgbe e mesịrị, ọ sonyeere ọtụtụ omume ihe nkiri dị ka The Bald Prima Donn, African Reflections na Maybe This Time
N'afọ 2016, ọ rụrụ ọrụ 'Lindiwe Ngema', na usoro ihe nkiri eTV bụ Scandal!

Mapula Nomvula 'Nomi' Kgoale (a mụrụ n'abali iri abụo nke ọnwa Nọvemba n'afọ 1995) bụ onye egwuregwu bọọlụ South Africa nke na-agbara ndị otu ụmụ nwanyị South Africa bọọlụ dị ka onye nchekwa maka onyinye goolu
Kgoale gara Lindsey Wilson College, Tyler Junior College na Louisiana Tech University, ha abụọ bucha na United States
Kgoale nọchitere anya South Africa na 2010 FIFA U-17 Women's World Cup
O gbara ọgbụgba bọọlụ mbụ ya N'abalị iri na abụọ nke ọnwa Mee afọ 2019 na mmeri enyi na enyi emeriri ha nke ọkpụ atọ ha na asataghị otu na United States

Nomvula Paula Mokonyane (Amụrụ na 28 June 1963, Kagiso, Gauteng) bụ Minista na-ahụ maka gburugburu ebe obibi na South Africa, nke a họpụtara n'ụbọchị 22 Nọvemba 2018 n'okpuru Onye isi ala Cyril Ramaphosa

A họpụtara ya na mbụ na kansụl nke South Africa n'ọnwa Mee 2014 n'okpuru Onye isi ala Jacob Zuma, na-eje ozi dị ka Minista na Ngalaba Mmiri na Mmiri na Ịdị ọcha, wee bụrụ Minista nke nkwukọrịta n'okpuru onye isi ala Cyril Ramaphosa n'ọnwa Jenụwarị 2018
Tupu ọ rụọ ọrụ na Cabinet, ọ bụ onye isi ala nke mpaghara Gauteng, nke a họpụtara mgbe ntuli aka South Africa nke afọ 2009 gasịrị
Ọ bụkwa onye isi oche nke SA-China People's Friendship Association
A mụrụ Mokonyane na West Rand township nke Kagiso, nwa ikpeazụ n'ezinụlọ dị mmadụ iri na abụọ, ya na ụmụnne nwanyị isii na ụmụnne nwoke ise
Ọ gụrụ akwụkwọ na Mosupatsela High School, Kagiso
Ọ bụ onye Katọlik ma ka bụ onye otu na-arụsi ọrụ ike na klọb netwọk mmekọrịta ya
Ọrụ ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị ya malitere na mbido afọ 1980 dị ka onye na-eme ihe gbasara ụmụ akwụkwọ
N'oge ahụ, ọ ghọrọ onye otu Young Christian Students (YCS) na onye guzobere Congress of South African Students (Cosas)

Ọ bụkwa odeakwụkwọ mgbasa ozi nke alaka Krugersdorp nke United Democratic Front na onye nhazi nke Federation of Transvaal Women (Fedtaw), otu na-akwado ezinụlọ ndị e jidere na ndị ntorobịa n'ọgụ ha maka ndị nnọchi anya ụmụ akwụkwọ ọchịchị onye kwuo uche ya
Nomvuzo Francisca Shabalala (29 Eprel 1960 26 Disemba 2020) bụ onye ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị South Africa
Ọ bụ onye otu African National Congress na South African Communist Party
Site na 2011 ruo 2016 ọ bụ osote onye isi obodo nke eThekwini Metropolitan Municipality
N'afọ 2018, a ṅụrụ Shabalala iyi dị ka onye otu National Assembly
A mụrụ Shabalala na 29 Eprel 1960
Ọ gụsịrị naanị klas iri na otu mgbe ọ na-aga akwụkwọ
Ọ gụrụ mmemme na nhazi okwu na Mangosuthu Technikon wee jikwaa ihe mkpofu na Natal Technikon
Na Durban Commercial College, ọ gụrụ ndekọ ego na ndekọ ego na nhazi okwu dị elu
Shabalala mezuru ọmụmụ idu ndú na Mahadum Pretoria
Shabalala jere ozi dị ka osote onyeisi oche nke mpaghara Durban South nke ANC n'etiti afọ 2001 na 2002
N'afọ 2011, a họpụtara ya ka ọ bụrụ osote onye isi obodo nke eThekwini Metropolitan Municipality, na-anọchi Logie Naidoo
N'afọ sochirinụ, a họpụtara ya na Kọmitii Nchịkwa nke ANC
Shabalala hapụrụ ANC PEC n'afọ 2015
N'afọ 2015, a họpụtara Shabalala dị ka osote onye isi oche mpaghara nke South African Communist Party
N'ọnwa Febụwarị 2016, Shabalala kwuru na mmegharị #FeesMustFall bụ 'mgbasa ozi ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị nke ndị agha mba ụwa kwadoro chọrọ igosi otu isi'
N'ọnwa Ọgọstụ 2016, a họpụtara Fawzia Peer ka ọ nọchie ya dị ka osote onye isi obodo nke eThekwini
A họpụtara Shabalala ka ọ bụrụ onye otu Central Committee nke SACP na nnọkọ mba nke iri na anọ nke pati ahụ na Julaị 2017
N'abalị iri na anọ n'ọnwa Ọgọstụ n'afọ puku abụọ na iri na asatọ , a ṅụrụ Shabalala iyi dị ka onye omeiwu na National Assembly
Mgbe ahụ, e mere ya onye ọzọ so na Kọmitii Portfolio na Home Affairs na onye otu Portfolio Committee on Cooperative Governance and Traditional Affairs
Nomalungelo Gina nọchiri ya dị ka osote onye isi oche mpaghara nke SACP na nnọkọ mpaghara ya n'ikpeazụ n'ọnwa Ọgọstụ 2018
Na ntuli aka nke Mee 2019, a họpụtara Shabalala maka oge zuru ezu dị ka onye omeiwu
E kenyere ya na Kọmitii Jikọrọ Aka na Omume na Mmasị Ndị Mmekọrịta na Kọmiti Portfolio na Mmụta Ọdịdị
Shabalala nwụrụ site na ọrịa metụtara COVID-19 na 26 Disemba 2020, n'oge ọrịa COVID-19 na South Africa
Nomzamo Mbatha (a mụrụ na 13 Julaị 1990), bụ onye na-eme ihe nkiri na South Africa, onye na-ahụ maka telivishọn, onye ọchụnta ego, onye na'ahụ maka ego na onye na-agbachitere ikike mmadụ

A mụrụ Nomzamo Mbatha na 13 Julaị 1990 na KwaMashu Township, ihe dịka kilota 21 (13 mi), site n'okporo ụzọ, n'ebe ugwu ọdịda anyanwụ nke obodo Durban, na KwaZulu Natal Province ma bụrụkwa onye agbụrụ Zulu
Ọ gara Rippon Primary School na Durban na Bechet High School, ebe ọ nwetara diplọma ụlọ akwụkwọ sekọndrị ya
N'afọ 2018, ọ gụsịrị akwụkwọ na Mahadum nke Cape Town na nzere Bachelor of Commerce ọkachamara na ndekọ ego
Mbatha gara nyocha maka ihe ngosi telivishọn n'ọnwa July afọ 2012
Ọ malitekwara ime ihe nkiri na Isibaya ma ghọtakwa onye isi
Ọchụchọ ahụ, nke e mere na Cape Town, dọtara ihe karịrị ndị asọmpi 600
O tinyere n'elu 70 ma mesịa bụrụ n'elu 10
Ọ bụ otu n'ime ndị atọ kachasị elu
N'afọ 2014, a gbanwere ihe ngosi nke Mbatha gosipụtara ka ọ bụrụ Tell Me Sweet Something kwa ụbọchị, na ihe ngosi telivishọn Umlilo
N'otu afọ ahụ, ọ malitere ịnabata ihe ngosi njem nke a na-akpọ 'Holiday Swap', na South African Broadcasting Corporation
N'afọ 2015, a họpụtara ya ka ọ nọchite anya Neutrogena, ebe ọ bụ onye South Africa mbụ na ọrụ ahụ
N'afọ 2021, ọ pụtara na ihe nkiri Coming 2 America Ọ ga-eme ihe nkiri Die Like Lovers
N'afọ gara aga, Mbatha bịanyere aka na ụlọ ọrụ nlekọta nkà Creative Artists Agency
N'afọ 2018, a matara Mbatha dịka otu n'ime OkayAfrika 100 Women 2018 Honorees, site na OkayAfrica Digital Media
N'afọ 2018, ọ nọrọ oge na-agagharị n'ogige ndị gbara ọsọ ndụ Kenya, n'ọrụ ya dịka onye nnọchi anya UNHCR
Ọ natara Africa Movie Academy Award maka nhọpụta Best Actress maka igwu egwu 'Moratiwa' na Tell Me Sweet Something (2015)
N'ọnwa Jenụwarị afọ 2019, a họpụtara ya ka ọ bụrụ onye nnọchi anya UNHCR Goodwill
N'ọnwa Ọktoba 2019, a nabatara ya na Golden Key International Honour Society dịka otu n'ime ndị otu ya
Ka ọ na-erule 2019, Mbatha bi na Los Angeles, California
Nondumiso Tembe (amụrụ na 15 Disemba 1987), bụ onye na-eme ihe nkiri na South Africa, onye na-agụ egwu, onye na-ede egwu, onye Na-agba egwu na odee
A maara ya nke ọma maka ọrụ ya n'ọtụtụ ihe nkiri telivishọn Hollywood dịka; NCIS Los Angeles, True Blood, Castle na Six
A mụrụ Nondumiso na 15 Disemba 1987 na Durban, South Africa
Nne ya bụ Linda Bukhosini ebe nna ya bụ Bongani Tembe, ha abụọ bụ ndị na-agụ egwu opera
Ọ hapụrụ mba ahụ n'oge ịkpa ókè agbụrụ ma mesịa laghachi mgbe ịkpa ókè agbụrụ gasịrị
Ọ gụrụ ihe nkiri egwu na American Musical and Dramatic Academy (AMDA)
Mgbe ahụ ọ gụsịrị akwụkwọ na Mahadum New York New School na nzere bachelọ na Fine Arts na Theatre ma mesịa mechaa nweta nzere masta ya na sayensị ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị
N'ọnwa Eprel 2021, nwa nwanne ya nwoke nke obere aha ya bụ Anele Tibet si na ụlọ elu nke iri nke họtel Cape Town daa wee nwụọ
Anele kwere onye na-eti egwu a ma ama, AKA nkwa ọlụlụ
Mgbe ọnwụ ahụ gasịrị, Nondumiso wepụtara ozi na-emetụ n'ahụ na mgbasa ozi mmekọrịta banyere ọnwụ ya
Ọ malitere ime ihe nkiri na opera na ihe nkiri na USA mgbe ọ dị afọ isii
Mgbe ahụ, ọ rụrụ ọrụ dị mkpa na egwuregwu Annie
Site na egwuregwu ahụ, ọ ghọkwara onye isi ojii mbụ na-eme ihe nkiri iji duzie ọtụtụ agbụrụ na nnukwu ihe nkiri na South Africa mgbe ịkpa ókè agbụrụ gasịrị
Mgbe ahụ ọ rụrụ ọrụ 'Maria' na egwuregwu Leopard Skin na ọrụ 'Thobile' na egwuregwu Mata-Mata Na ụlọ ihe nkiri Los Angeles, ọ rụrụ ọrụ na egwuregwu Romeo na Juliet na ọrụ 'Josephine Baker'
N'afọ 2011, o mere ihe nkiri telivishọn mbụ ya na ọrụ dị ka 'ghost Mavis' na usoro True Blood
N'ọnwa Disemba afọ 2013, ọ sonyeere ndị na-eme ihe nkiri na-ewu ewu, Generations na ọrụ 'Phumelele Miya'
N'afọ 2015, o mere ọrụ nkwado na Hollywood blockbuster Avengers Age of Ultron
E nyere ya ihe nrite Best Lead Actress na Musical Mercury Theatre Awards maka ọrụ ya na egwu Cinderella nke Rogers na Hammerstein mepụtara
O nwetakwara ihe nrite Best Actress na Supporting Role category n'oge Naledi Theatre Awards maka ọrụ ya, 'Susan' na David Mametāns play
Dị ka onye na-agụ egwu, o mere abọm izizi ya akpọrọ IZWI LAMI; My Voice, nke e wepụtara na Jenụwarị 2011
Ọ sonyeere emume ncheta ọmụmụ nke afọ irí itoolu nke Nelson Mandela n'ụlọ ya na Qunu dị ka onye na-eme ihe nkiri

Helen Nontando (Noni) Jabavu (20 Ọgọst afo 1919 - 19 June afo 2008) bụ onye odee na onye nta akụkọ South Africa, otu n'ime ụmụ nwanyị Africa mbụ gbasoro ọrụ agụmagụ na-aga nke ọma na nwanyị South Africa ojii izizi bipụta akwụkwọ akụkọ ndụ

N'ịbụ onye gụrụ akwụkwọ na Britain site na afọ iri na ato, ọ ghọrọ nwanyị Africa mbụ ghọrọ onye nchịkọta akụkọ nke akwụkwọ akụkọ Britain mgbe na afo 1961 ọ malitere nhazi nke New Strand, mbipụta nke Strand Magazine, nke mechiri na afo 1950
N'okwu nke onye na-ede uri Makhosazana Xaba ' Naanị otu onye ga-agụ akwụkwọ ya abụọ ( Drawn in Color and The Ocher People ) iji ghọta otú o si nwee nkà dị ka onye na-echeta ihe
Akwụkwọ akụkọ kọlụm ya na-egosipụta ụdị ntụgharị nke ga-abụrịrị ihe a na-adịghị ahụkebe maka oge ya
Mgbe m na-agba Wally Serote bụ́ onye bi na Botswana ajụjụ ọnụ n’otu oge ahụ ya na Noni nọ, amụtara m otu ihe kwadoro echiche mbụ m banyere ya
Ọ sịrị, 'Anyị ndị nwoke amaghị ka anyị na ya ga-esi na-akpakọrịta (Noni)
Ọ bụ nwaanyị dịrị ndụ tere aka tupu oge anyị a' Nke a na-ekwu ọtụtụ ihe na-atụle Serote n'onwe ya bụ nnukwu akwụkwọ edemede na omenala maara ihe n'ụwa'

A mụrụ Noni Jabavu na Middledrift na Eastern Cape n'ime ezinụlọ ndị nwere ọgụgụ isi, alụmdi na nwunye nke nne na nna ya na-emekọ ọnụ n'etiti ezinụlọ abụọ a ma ama nke Ndị Kraịst na Eastern Cape n'oge ahụ

Nne ya bụ Thandiswa Florence Makiwane, onye nchoputa nke Zenzele Women's Self-Mprovement Association; nna ya bụ onye ndọrọ ndọrọ na onye edemede Davidson Don Tengo Jabavu, na nna nna ya John Tengo Jabavu, bụ onye nchịkọta akụkọ mbụ nke South Africa nke e dere na Xhosa, Imvo Zabantsundu (Opinion Black)
Nne nne ya bụ Cecilia Makiwane, onye nọọsụ mbụ n'Africa debanyere aha na South Afrika na onye n'oge mbụ na mgba maka ikike ụmụ nwanyị

Site na afọ iri na ato, Noni gụrụ akwụkwọ na England, n'okpuru nlekọta nke Margaret na Arthur Bevington Gillett (n'akụkụ Mohan Kumaramangalam na nwanne ya nwanyị Parvati Krishnan ), ebe ọ ga-anọgide na-ebi n'ebe ahụ ruo ọtụtụ afọ

O mechara cheta, sị 'Dị ka nwa ojii na-ahụkarị n'oge ahụ, mgbe m dị afọ iri na ato, enwechaghị m mmasị na mkparịta ụka ahụ na-aghaghị ịga n'ihu n'etiti nne na nna m na ndị mụrụ m, banyere ndụ ha na-eme atụmatụ maka m nke m
ga-amụta n'afọ ndị na-abịa, ga-abụ ihe ngosi bara uru nke ọgbọ nke ọbụbụenyi n'etiti ezinaụlọ
Amụtara m mgbe ahụ na atụmatụ bụ ka a zụọ m dị ka dọkịta ijere ndị m ozi
Ma o mejọrọ ya, n'ihi na dọkịta bụ otu ihe m na-achọghị ịbụ
Amaghị m ihe m chọrọ ịbụ' Ọ gụrụ akwụkwọ na mbụ na The Mount School, York, ma mesịa mụọ na Royal Academy of Music nke London
Tupu Agha Ụwa nke Abụọ, ọ naghị enwe mmasị na Royal Academy of Music ma tinye uche na ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị ụmụ akwụkwọ aka ekpe
N'afọ 1938, ọ nọ na concert Prom na Ụlọ Nzukọ Queen nke a kwụsịrị ka a gwa ya maka ' udo maka oge anyị ' Neville Chamberlain
Na ntiwapụ nke Agha Ụwa nke Abụọ, ọ kwụsịrị ịmụ ihe ka ọ bụrụ onye na-ese ihe nkiri ma zụọ ya ka ọ bụrụ onye injinia nwere nkà na oxyacetylene welder, na-arụ ọrụ na akụkụ engine nke bọmbụ
Ọ gara nleta ogologo oge na South Afrika ruo mgbe alụmdi na nwunye ya na onye ntụzi ihe nkiri Bekee Michael Cadbury Crosfield na afo 1951
Alụmdi na nwunye ha mebiri iwu mgbagha nke South Afrika, n'ihi na n'ihi Iwu Omume rụrụ arụ nke dị n'oge ahụ, ọ pụghị iso ya
Mgbe nke ahụ gasịrị, ọ gara njem ma biri na Mozambique, Zimbabwe na Uganda
Jabavu malitere ide ihe n'ime afọ ndị ọ nọ na Uganda
Na afo 1955, ọ laghachiri na South Afrika maka ịnọ ọnwa atọ, na-ede njem ahụ n'ime ndetu onye edemede nke akwụkwọ mbụ ya, Drawn in Color African Contrasts (1960)
Anọ m n’ụwa abụọ nwere ntụkwasị obi abụọ South Afrika, bụ́ ebe a mụrụ m, na England, bụ́ ebe m gụrụ akwụkwọ
Mgbe m nwetara eriri nna m zipụrụ, agbagoro m na South Africa ka m sonye na ndị Bantu m, hapụ di m Bekee na Lọndọn
Ka e mesịrị n'afọ ahụ, mụ na ya gara biri n'Ebe Ọwụwa Anyanwụ Africa, na-abịaru nanị otu nwanne m nwanyị lụrụ di n'ebe ahụ nso
Agwara m ebe a ihe gbasara nzụlite m na ọnọdụ m
Nke a bụ akụkọ onwe onye gbasara ahụmịhe na echiche onye Africa nwere maka ndịiche dị n'etiti East na South Africa na kọntaktị ha na Westernization
A na- ese na Agba tụlere nke ọma n'akụkụ abụọ nke Atlantic
Dị ka Kirkus Reviews si kwuo 'Akwụkwọ a kwesịrị nnọọ ka otuto dị elu ọ nwetara n'England bụ ebe e bipụtara ya na mbụ

Onye edemede ahụ, onye lụrụ onye nduzi ihe nkiri Britain, na-akọ maka njem njem na South Africa maka olili nwanne ya nwoke nke otu ndị otu ndị omekome gburu na Jo'burg, na mgbalị efu o mere iji chekwaa alụmdi na nwunye nwanne ya nwanyị
nye otu nwoke na Uganda
Ọ bụ ezie na ọ na-eche banyere ọdachi ezinụlọ abụọ, akụkọ ahụ adịghị ewute ma ọ bụ na-adịghị njọ
Ọtụtụ nkọwa gbasara ndụ ndị Africa na omenala na nkọwa nkọwa nke obodo ahụ n'onwe ya na-eme ka onye na-agụ ya na-atụgharị uche mgbe ọ bụla ndị isi na-eme ihe nkiri na-ahapụ ebe ahụ nwa oge
Asụsụ Xhosa na-atọ ya ụtọ nke ukwuu, nke sụgharịrị ihe fọrọ nke nta ka ọ bụrụ uri Elizabethan English
Onye edemede ahụ adịghị echekwa onwe ya ma ọ bụ ndị ya n'ịmekọ ihe gbasara agbụrụ, n'ihi na ajọ mbunobi dị n'akụkụ niile, ọbụlagodi n'etiti ndị na-agba agba na ndị gbara ọchịchịrị nke otu ebo

Onye na-agụ ga-ekere òkè n'ahụmahụ dị ukwuu nke mmadụ ma n'otu oge ahụ nweta nghọta ka ukwuu nke mba ndị na-enwere onwe ha' Edere ya na agba ugboro ise n'ime afọ mbụ nke mbipụta ya, ma bipụtakwara ya n'asụsụ Italian na Milan n'okpuru aha Il colore della pelle
Mgbe ọtụtụ afọ bichara na Uganda, Jabavu ya na di ya laghachiri England, na site na mmalite nke afo 1961 ọ bụ onye ọrụ nke akwụkwọ akụkọ edemede John O'London's Weekly

Ọ rụkwara ọrụ nchịkọta akụkọ maka The New Strand (ụdị eweghachite nke narị afọ nke ama ama kwa ọnwa maka ibipụta Conan Doyle ), tupu ahọpụta ya dị ka onye nchịkọta akụkọ ya, nhọrọ onye nwe ya bụ Ernest Kay kọwara site n'ịsị ' Miss Jabavu ebiela ụdị ndụ dị iche iche nke na ọ ga-eweta echiche ọhụrụ kpamkpam na magazin ahụ

O doro anya na ọ gaghị adị mma ma ọ bụrụ na ọ nwara' Ọ malitere ọrụ na Disemba afo 1961, n'agbanyeghị na ọ gbara arụkwaghịm ka ọnwa asatọ gachara, na-ekpebi na ọ masịrị ya ịbụ onye edemede karịa onye nchịkọta akụkọ

N'ịkọwa onwe ya dị ka 'nwanyị lụrụ di na mbụ na nwanyị na-arụ ọrụ nke abụọ', o mechara kwaga Jamaica, ebe na afo 1961 họpụtara di ya ka ọ bụrụ onye ndụmọdụ gọọmentị maka ihe nkiri, na-alaghachi London na afo 1963
(Ntụle ọ ga-ede afọ iri abụọ ka e mesịrị nke akwụkwọ njem njem VS Naipaul The Middle Passage na-ekpughe ahụ erughị ala ya n'oge njem Caribbean a '
Enwere m obi nkoropụ, ọ na-ewute m ịhụ onwe m na enweghị ike ibi ndụ n'àgwàetiti a mara mma nke ukwuu na-ewute m
Mgbọrọgwụ enweghị mgbọrọgwụ, echiche nke enweghị akụkọ ihe mere eme, enweghị ọdịnala, ịchọ njirimara - njirimara ndị a masịrị m mgbe mụ na ndị West India na-akparịta ụka
Dị ka onye Africa, enwere m ihe nketa nke gụnyere n'asụsụ m, iguzosi ike n'ihe agbụrụ, akụ akụ nke akụkọ ifo, ihe omume
Ọ bụ na ndị a anaghị enye onye Africa ọ bụla ọmarịcha echiche nke ịga n'ihu? Ihe ọ bụla mwepu apartheid na-amanye anyị na obodo nke m, ndị a enweghị ike iwepụ ike na ọdịnala nke ndị anyị' )

Akwụkwọ nke abụọ nke Jabavu, The Ocher People Scenes from a South African Life, nke e bipụtara na afo 1963, bụkwa ihe ncheta, nke o kwuru banyere ya, sị 'Ọ bụ akụkọ onwe onye nke ahụmahụ onye Africa na echiche nke ọdịiche dị n'etiti ndị East na South Africa
na kọntaktị ha na Westernization' Ekwanyere ya otuto, nke ndị nkatọ na-eto ya dị ka 'ọ mara mma' na 'na-adọrọ mmasị'

Ntụleghachi ahụ dị na magazin Ebony kwuru, sị 'N'ịchọgharị omenala na ọdịnala bara ụba nke South Africa Bantu ndabere ya, onye edemede ahụ gosipụtara nrụgide na-enwe mgbe a ghaghị imeziwanye ụzọ ochie iji dozie nsogbu ọhụrụ'

N'ime oge nọrọ na South Africa na 1976-77, na-eme nchọpụta akwụkwọ gbasara nna ya, Jabavu bipụtara akwụkwọ akụkọ kwa izu na East London (Eastern Cape) Daily Dispatch, n'okpuru nchịkọta akụkọ nke Donald Woods

Onye bụbu Minista Arts and Culture Pallo Jordan nyere ya ihe nrite nturu ugo nke ndụ ya, yana onyinye akwụkwọ kacha mma na Eastern Cape site n'aka onye minista egwuregwu, nka na omenala, Nosimo Balindlela
Noni Jabavu nwụrụ mgbe ọ dị afọ 88 na June 2008, na Lynette Elliott Frail Care Home, wee lie ya na East London, South Africa

A kọrọ na ezinụlọ Jabavu nọ n'usoro ime ihe nkiri akụkọ banyere ndụ ya, nke Duma kaNdlovu (onye mepụtara ihe ngosi telivishọn Muvhango ) malitere, mgbe ego nke Eastern Cape Arts Culture Council nyere gwụchara
Akpọrọ Jabavu dị ka ihe atụ site n'aka Margaret Busby, nwanyị mbụ Black Africa chọtara ụlọ ọrụ na-ebipụta akwụkwọ na UK, na 1967
Jabavu so na Busby's 1992 anthology ụmụ nwanyị Africa
Noni Salma, onye bụbu Habeeb Babtunde Lawal, bụ onye na -eme ihe nkiri, onye edemede, na onye na -eme ihe nkiri
Ọ bịarutere United States America ịga nweta akara ugo mmụta bachelor na sinima na New York Film Academy
Noni Salma nwetara akara ugo mmụta bachelor ya na nka na Mahadum Lagos, ebe ọ rụrụ ọrụ nka
O mechara gaa mụọ ịse ihe nkiri na New York Film Academy na New York, ebe ọ nwetara nzere ma duzie ya na nsọpụrụ
Obere mkpirisi ya 'Alibi', nke ọ duziri, meriri 'Mystery Kachasị Mpụ' na Ememme Nkiri Manhattan 2016

E nyere Salma nke mbụ na asọmpi ihe nkiri ụmụ akwụkwọ nke Treasure Coast International Film Festival maka asambodo NYFA PhD ya, 'Morning after Midnight' Ọ mepụtara ma duzie obere akwụkwọ akụkọ 'Veil Of Silence,' nke a makwaara dị ka 'Ihe mkpuchi nke Silence,' nke malitere na Machị 2014 na BFI Flare London LGBT Film Festival na London, United Kingdom; Veil Of Silence enyochaala na United Nations, Egale Canada, na Ofesi Ofesi German, n'etiti ndị ọzọ

Na -esochi nke ahụ, Veil Of Silence nyochara n'ọtụtụ ememme ihe nkiri, gụnyere Queer Screen Film Festival, CineHomo Film Festival, Valladoid, Spain na Eprel 2015, ebe ọ meriri ebe nke abụọ maka akwụkwọ akụkọ kacha mma, yana ịnata nzaghachi dị mma site na ndị na -ege ntị
A họpụtara Noni Salma maka 'The Future Awards Africa Prize for Producer Producer' na 2018
Asụsụ Noni, nkè á na-akpọkwa Noone, bụ asụsụ Beboid nke Ọwụwa Anyanwụ nkè ezinụlọ Niger Congo ná Cameroon
Á na-ewere ụdị Noone, Ncane, ná Mungong mgbè ụfọdụ dị kà asụsụ Noni atọ dị iche iche
Ethnologue na-akọ ná Ncare bụ 88% yiri Noone, na 84% na Saari (Nsari)
Noni bụ asụsụ ala nkè mmadụ 40,000 nọ ná Mba ahụ, ọkachasị ná North West Province, Bui Division ná Northwest Kumbo Subdivision
Á na-eji aha ọma mee dị kà asụsụ nzuzo na Indiana Jones
