Nonk progressi Ntomboxolo Pieters bụ onye ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị na onye nkuzi South Africa bụ onye otu Eastern Cape nke Executive Council (MEC) maka mmepe ime obodo na mgbanwe ala kemgbe 2021 na onye otu Eastern Cap Provincial Legislature kemgbe 2019, na-anọchite anya African National Congress (ANC)
Ọ rụrụ ọrụ dị ka MEC maka Human Settlements site na 2019 ruo 2021
Pieters jere ozi dị ka ọkà okwu nke Cacadu District Municipality (nke e mechara kpọwa Sarah Baartman District Municipacipality) site na 2006 ruo 2018
N'afọ 2022 ọ na-ezube imeziwanye ime obodo n'ihe gbasara mmepụta osisi na mmemme mmepụta anụmanụ
A mụrụ Pieters na Somerset East
Ọ gara ụlọ akwụkwọ na Somerset East
N'agbata afọ 1988 na 1990 ọ gụrụ akwụkwọ na Cape College of Education ma gụsịrị akwụkwọ na diplọma ndị nkuzi
Pieters nwetara asambodo na Maths 1 na Mahadum Port Elizabeth na 1999
Ọ gụrụ akwụkwọ na Mahadum Rhodes n'etiti afọ 1998 na 2001 wee gụsịrị akwụkwọ na diplọma ọzọ na agụmakwụkwọ na 1999 na nzere nsọpụrụ na agụmakmakwụkwọ na 2001
Na Wits Business School, o mere mmemme asambodo na mmepe nchịkwa (CPMD Municipal Finance) na 2010 na mmemme asambodo maka mmepe ndu (CPLD) na 2011
N'afọ 2015, Pieters nwetara Master of Public Administration na Mahadum Fort Hare
Pieters rụrụ ọrụ dị ka onye nkuzi na Johnson Nqonqoza Senior Secondary School site na 1991 na 2006 ma bụrụkwa onye isi nke Bosberg Adult Centre site na 1997 ruo 1999
N'afọ 1984, Pieters ghọrọ Congress of South African Students wee sonye na Somerset East Youth Congress n'afọ sochirinụ
Ọ rụrụ ọrụ dị ka onye isi nke Somerset East Woman Organization (nke mechara bụrụ akụkụ nke African National Congress Women's League)

Pieters bụ onye otu South African National Students Congress (SANSCO) (nke a maara ugbu a dị ka South African Students Congress (SASCO)) ma bụrụkwa onye na-ahụ maka klas ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị na ebe obibi ya na Cape College of Education n'etiti 1988 na 1990
Site na 1991 ruo 2006, ọ bụ onye otu South African Democratic Teachers Union (SADTU) ma jee ozi n'ọkwa ndị a

Ọ bụ odeakwụkwọ alaka nke ngalaba Somerset East nke nzukọ ahụ site na 1991 ruo 1994, onye nhazi oche nwoke na nwanyị nke alaka SADTU site na 1994 ruo 2003, na onye isi oche nke alaka SAD TU Somerset Este na Western Region site na 1999 ruo 2003
Pieters bụ odeakwụkwọ alaka nke South African Communist Party (SACP) Somerset East Branch site na 1991 ruo 1993 ọ bụkwa onye isi nke SACP's former Eastern Cape Region site na 1993 ruo 1995
N'afọ 2006, a họpụtara ya dị ka ọkà okwu nke Cacadu District Municipality
A gbanwere aha obodo nta ahụ ka ọ bụrụ Sarah Baartman n'afọ 2015

Pieters jere ozi dị ka onye ndụmọdụ ngalaba ahụike site na 2006 ruo 2007, mgbe a họpụtara ya dị ka onye kansụl ngalaba maka ọfịs onye isi obodo, ọkwá ọ nọ na ya ruo 2009 mgbe a kpọrọ ya aha dị ka onye isi oche maka ọrụ ego na ụlọ ọrụ
Ọ bụ onye kansụl na-ahụ maka ngalaba ahụ ruo n'afọ 2016
Pieters jere ozi dị ka ọkà okwu ruo ihe fọrọ nke nta ka ọ bụrụ afọ iri na abụọ tupu ọ gbaa arụkwaghịm iji were ọkwa onye nnọchi anya ndị omeiwu na Ngalaba nke Human Settlements na Disemba 2018
A họpụtara Pieters dị ka onye otu ndị omeiwu nke Eastern Cape Provincial na 2019
A họpụtara Pieters ka ọ bụrụ onye otu Executive Council (MEC) maka Human Settlements site n'aka onye isi ala a họpụtara ọhụrụ, Oscar Mabuyane
Na Machị 2021, a họpụtara ya dị ka MEC na-ahụ maka mmepe ime obodo na mgbanwe ala, na-anọchi Nomakhosazana Meth, onye a họpụtara MEC ahụike
Àtụ Members of the Eastern Cape Provincial Legislature
Nonkululeko bụ aha enyere
Ndị ama ama nwere aha gụnyere
Nonkululeko Gobodo (a mụrụ n'ụbọchị nke 10 n'ọnwa Ọktoba n'afọ 1960, Mthatha, Eastern Cape) ghọrọ nwanyị ojii mbụ Chartered Accountant na South Africa n'afọ 1987
Mgbe ọ gụsịrị akwụkwọ, Nonkululeko kwuru okwu na KPMG, ma nye ya mmekorita, nke ọ jụrụ
Mgbe ahụ, ọ rụrụ ọrụ na Transkei Development Corporation, emesịa bụrụ onye isi ego
N'ịgbaso nke ahụ, ọ tọrọ ntọala ụlọ ọrụ ndekọ ego ya Gobodo Incorporated
O nyere aka n'iduzi njikọ nke Gobodo Incorporated na SizweNtsaluba VSP n'afọ 2011 iji mepụta SizweNtsalubaGobodo, ụlọ ọrụ na-ahụ maka ego ojii kachasị ukwuu na South Africa
N'afọ 2014, ọ kwụsịrị ọrụ nke onye isi oche nke ụlọ ọrụ ahụ
N'afọ 2016, ọ malitere Nkululeko Leadership Consulting (NLC), ụlọ ahịa, ụlọ ọrụ ndụmọdụ ndị isi ojii nwere ma na-elekọta ya na Sandton, Johannesburg
Ugbu a, ọ bụ onye isi oche na onye isi nke Leadership Consulting na NLC
Ọ bụkwa onye isi na-abụghị onye isi na PPC Ltd
na Clicks Group Limited
Nonkululeko Merina Cheryl Nyembezi-Heita, bụkwa Nku (amụrụ 22 Maachị 1960), bụ onye isi azụmaahịa South Africa bụ onye na-arụsi ọrụ ike na igwe, nkwukọrịta na ego
Kemgbe Maachị 2014, ọ bụbu onye isi oche nke otu ndị na-egwupụta akụ Dutch, IchorCoal NV
A mụrụ Nyembezi-Heita na Pietermaritzburg, South Africa, nye nna Aubrey, onye ọka iwu na nne Debiya Nyembezi, onye nọọsụ si Pietermaritzburg
O nwere nwanne nwoke tọrọ ya (Manqoba Nyembezi) na nwanne nwanyị nke nta (Nontando Nyembezi)
Azụlitere ya n'ezinụlọ Methodist, ọ gara ụlọ akwụkwọ praịmarị Bantu na Clermont, KwaZulu-Natal, tupu ọ malite ụlọ akwụkwọ sekọndrị na Inanda Seminary School dị nso na Durban
Ọ nwetara mpụtara dị mma na sayensị na mgbakọ na mwepụ, na-aghọ nwa akwụkwọ kacha elu na South Africa n'afọ ule asambodo nke nta ya
Mgbe ọ natachara Asambodo Senior ya, e nyere ya ihe nzere Anglo American Corporation Open Scholarship
Ọ gara n'ihu wee gusia akwụkwọ na injinịa eletrịkị na Mahadum Manchester Institute of Science and Technology wee nweta nzere Master of Science na California Institute of Technology
O nwekwara MBA site na Open University Business School
Ka ya na IBM rụsịrị ọrụ n'ọkwa dị iche iche na United States na South Africa (1986–98), ọ kwagara Alliance Capital Management ebe ọ chikwara isi ọrụ ego
Na 2008, a họpụtara ya onye isi nchịkwa nke ArcelorMittal South Africa ebe ọ nọrọ afọ isii
Na Maachị 2014, ọ sonyeere IchorCoal dị ka CEO
Nyembezi-Heita arụwokwa ọrụ na bọọdụ nke ọtụtụ ụlọ ọrụ ndị ọzọ
Na 2012, e deputara Nyembezi-Heita dika onye nke iri itoolu na asaa na ndepụta Forbes maka ụmụ nwanyị otu nari kachasị ike n'ụwa
nonso bu aha nwoke Naijiria nyere aha ndị ama ama nwere aha gụnyere
Nonso Amadi (amụrụ na Septemba 1, na afọ 1995) bụ onye na-agụ egwu, onye na-ede egwu na onye na-emepụta egwu na Naijiria
Ọ bụ onye na-ede egwu na onye na-emepụta egwu nke malitere ọrụ egwu ya na 2012, mgbe ọ nọ na Mahadum Ọgbụgba ndụ, ebe ọ gụrụ injinia kemịkal
A mụrụ Nonso Amadi na Septemba 1, na afọ 1995, nne na nna ya bụ ndị Naijiria
Ọ bụ onye nke atọ n'ime ezinụlọ nke mmadụ asaa ma too na Naịjirịa tupu ọ kwaga United Kingdom
Ọ gara Chrisland College Idimu, Lagos ma gụsịrị akwụkwọ na afọ 2009
Ọ gụrụ injinia kemịkal na Mahadum Covenant, na na afọ 2014 ọ gara n'ihu na ọmụmụ ya na Mahadim Swansea United Kingdom
O nwere nzere masta na Mahadum McMaster, Canada
Nonso / ( / ˈnɒns oʊ ˈ n oʊz i eɪ / ; a mụrụ ya na 17 Nọvemba 1978 ) bụ onye omee ejije Britain rụrụ ọrụ n'okwgo, ejije na ihe onyonyo
A mụrụ Anozie na London, England, onye Igbo Naijiria
[ na-abụghị isi ihe a chọrọ ] Anozie gara St Aloysius College na Highgate, London

Ọ gụsịrị akwụkwọ na Central School of Speech and Drama n'afọ 2002, na n'oge okpomọkụ nke otu afọ ahụ, ọ jijere otu agwa n'akwụkwọ ejije William Shakespeare 's King Lear, wee nweta ihe nrite Ian Charleson n' afọ 2004 maka ihe mmepụta ya na Othello
E goro Anozie n'afọ 2006 ka ọ weta olu maka anụ ọhịa bea Iorek Byrnison na mmegharị ihe nkiri nke Philip Pullman 's Northern Lights
Ian McKellen nọchiri Anozie ọnwa abụọ tupu ewepụta ejije ahụ
Onye isi ihe nkiri ahụ, Chris Weitz, gwara Empire 'Ọ bụ mkpebi ụlọ ọrụ
Ị nwere ike ịghọta ihe mere ị ga-eji tụba Ian McKellen maka ihe ọ bụla
Mana ịhapụ Nonso bụ otu n'ime ihe kacha wute m na ihe nkiri a
Achọrọ m ikwu banyere Nonso na ọ bụ otu n'ime ndị maara ejije eme m zutere na England kemgbe m na-arụ ọrụ ebe a n'ihi na ugbu a ọ bụ ya na-esote Mike Leigh [ejije]
Mana ọ bụ, ee, nke ahụ bụụrụ m ụdị ụbọchị ọjọọ
Achọrọ m igospụta ịhụnanya mụ n'ebe ọrụ Nonso nọ
ya ka m mere'
Anozie rụrụ obere ọrụ dị ka Think Tank na ejije Guy Ritchie RocknRolla na Frank Mace na Joe Wright 's Atonement
Ọ gbara onye ndu na Cass ejije mpụ Britain nke 2008 na-ejiji ndụ Cass Pennant
Na 2011, ọ ji jiri Artus, onye omekome Zamoran na ezigbo enyi Conan, na Conan the Barbarian
N'afọ ahụ, a chọrọ ya ka ọ rụọ ọrụ nke Xaro Xhoan Daxos na usoro HBO Game of Thrones ma nye ya agwa dị ka Jackson Burke na The Grey
Ọ na-ejiji Samson na ejije TV nke History Channel nke Akwụkwọ Nsọ
Na 2013, Anozie pụtara na ejije Ender's Game dị ka Sergeant Dap, site n'afọ 2013 ruo 2014 ọ rụrụ ọrụ Renfield na usoro NBC Dracula
Na Nọvemba 2014, Anozie soro mee ejije na CBS Summer drama Zoo, nke e nwetara n'akwụkwọ akụkọ James Patterson na Michael Ledwidge
E wepụtara Zoo na June 30, 2015
N'afọ 2019, Anozie gosipụtara onye mmegide, Cargo, n'ejije Amazon Prime Video nke Guava Island, nke ndị so mee ya bụ Donald Glover na Rihanna
Chukwunonso Bassey,Àtụ IPAc-en nke a na-akpọ Nonso Bassey, bụ onye Naijiria na-agụ egwú, onye na-agụ abụ, onye na-eme ihe nkiri na ihe nlereanya
Ọ gụchara dị ka onye ikpeazụ 8 kacha elu na mbipụta mbụ nke Voice Nigeria wee bịanye aka na Universal Music Group Nigeria
Ọ bụkwa onye isi ihe nkiri na telenovella Africa Magic TV, Battleground,Àtụ IPAc-en
A mụrụ Bassey na Calabar site na nna Igbo si Imo na nne Efik si Cross River Steeti
N'afọ 2000, ọ banyere na Mahadum nke Calabar International Secondary School, Calabar ma gụsịrị akwụkwọ n'afọ 2006

Ọ gara Mahadum Covenant, ebe ọ gụsịrị akwụkwọ na klas nke abụọ na Bekee na Literary Studies mgbe nke ahụ gasịrị, ọ rụrụ ọrụ National Youth Service (NYSC) dị ka onye ọrụ obodo na ngalaba ụgbọelu na Imo Steeti
Bassey malitere ọrụ egwu ya mgbe e gosipụtara ya na egwu, My Dream na VJ Adams na rapper MI na afọ 2015
N'afọ 2016, ọ gara nyocha maka oge mbụ nke The Voice Nigeria, ma mee ya na ihe ngosi, ebe ọ gụsịrị dị ka onye ikpeazụ asatọ kachasị elu ma Universal Music Group bịanyere aka na ya
N'afọ 2017, a họpụtara ya ka ọ rụọ ọrụ Dr Emeka Kalu na telenovela Africa Magic, Battleground ebe ya na onye na-eme ihe nkiri Ini Dima-Okojie nwere nyocha dị mma site n'aka ndị nkatọ
N'ọnwa Eprel afọ 2017, o meghere maka Aṣa na egwu ya na Lagos
N'otu afọ ahụ, Bassey pụtara na ihe nkiri Wurukum Roundabout ya na ọtụtụ ndị ama ama na-eme ihe nkiri Africa, gụnyere Juliet Ibrahim, Gbenro Ajibade, Susan Peters na Keppy Young
Na ọnwa Febụwarị afọ 2018, Nonso Bassey wepụtara egwu izizi ya 411, nke Johny Drille mepụtara

A nabatara egwu ahụ nke ọma na onye na-enyocha Native Magazine, Edwin Okolo chịkọtara nyocha ya nke otu egwu ahụ na-ekwu, 'Ọ bụ naanị ole na ole n'ime ndị egwu Naịjirịa mepụtara ballads dị ike nke na ha nwere ike izuru anyị pụọ na hypnotic thump nke njem Afrobeat anyị na-adịghị akwụsị akwụsị, na '411', Nonso Bassey yiri ka ọ dị njikere isonyere ndị ahụ dị elu
N'ọnwa Eprel afọ 2019, Bassey wepụtara egwu ya nke abụọ n'okpuru Universal Music Group Nigeria, egwu na-enye obi ụtọ For You nke Yekini 'Tiwezi' Temitayo mepụtara na vidiyo nke Adesua Okosun duziri
N'ọnwa Ọktọba 2019, a họpụtara Bassey maka onyinye maka Best Vocal Performance (Male) maka egwu izizi ya, 411 na mbipụta nke iri na atọ nke Headies Award
A họpụtara ya na Johnny Drille, Wurld, Funbi na Tay Iwar
Nonso Diobi (amụrụ na Julaị 17, afọ 1976) // (ege ntị) bụ onye na-eme ihe nkiri na onye nduzi ihe nkiri na Naijiria
Mgbe ọ na-amụ ihe nkiri nka na Mahadum nke Naịjirịa, O mere ihe ngosi mbụ ya na ihe nkiri afọ 2001 nke akpọrọ Border Line sochiri arụmọrụ pụtara ìhè na ihe nkiri a kpọrọ 'Hatred'
Ọ gara n'ihu mee ihe nkiri dị egwu na ihe nkiri 'Across the bridge' nke nyere ya ọganihu mgbe nke ahụ gasịrị, ọ ghọrọ aha ụlọ n'ofe Afrịka
Diobi bụ nwa afọ Nawfia, obere obodo dị na Anambra Steeti, Naịjirịa
Ọ bụ onye guzobere na onye isi oche nke Goldentape media, ụlọ ọrụ na-emepụta ihe nkiri/igwe onyonyo na Afrịka
Nonso Diobi bụ onye nnọchi anya udo nke UN yana onye nnọchi anya ndị nkụzi na-enweghị ókèala
O meela ihe nkiri karịrị iri asaa na isii
Nontsikelelo Mutiti (amụrụ na mkpụrụ ụbọchị iri atọ na otu n afọ 1982) bụ onye mmebe eserese na onye nkuzi
Ọrụ ya na-elekwasị anya na imewe weebụ, ihe onyonyo, mbipụta na nka akwụkwọ
Ọ na-a gụnyekarịkwa ọrụ ike isi n'ọrụ nhazi ya, ma 'na-enwe mmasị na ọdịiche dị n'etiti omenala ndi isi ojii'
Ọrụ ya gụnyere akụrụngwa ndị e bipụtara maka Black Lives Matter
Mutiti gụsịrị akwụkwọ na Zimbabwe Institute of Vigital Arts na diploma na nkà mgbasa ozi na afọ 2007
Ọ gụsịrị akwụkwọ na Yale School of Art na ntinye uche MFA na eserese eserese na afọ 2012
A mụrụ Mutiti na afọ 1982 na Harare, Zimbabwe
Ọ bụ otu n ime ndị hibere ọtu ogbakọ ọdịnala mba
Zimbab na Detroit, nke nyere ndị n eme ihe omume n etiti Detroit na Zimbabwe agbamume
rụpụtara ụlọ ọrụ omenala Zimbabwe na Detroit, nke na-akwado nkwado n'etiti ndị na-ese ihe na Detroit na Zimbabwe
Ọ bụ otu onye n ime ndị wubere Black Chalk & Co
Ọ bụ onye nduzi nka na onye nchoputa nke Ihe ọgụgụ Zimbabwe, nke e guzobere na njedebe afọ 2016, ebe nchekwa dijitalụ nke akwụkwọ Zimbabwe
Mutiti bụ osote prọfesọ na Mahadum Virginia Commonwealth na ngalaba eserese grafik Ọ bi ma na-arụ ọrụ na New York City na Richmond, Virginia
A maara Mutiti nke ọma maka nyocha nka pụrụ iche na omume ọha mmadụ nke ike ntutu isi na ejiji onwe ya na mba Africa
Dịka ọmụmaatụ, na ihe ngosi 2014 na Recess Art, Mutiti nwetara mkpali site na oghere nke ntutu isi nke Africa, dị ka enwere ike ịhụ ya na New York City ma ọ bụ Harare

Mutiti megharịrị ihe nrịbama mma dị ka 'mgbidi e sere na akwụkwọ ndụ akwụkwọ ndụ acid ma ọ bụ ucha oroma na-egbuke egbuke, akwụkwọ akụkọ e gbupụrụ ndị na-eme ememme, ụdị ntutu isi, akwụkwọ ozi na akwụkwọ mmado sitere na chọọchị ndị na-ekwusa ozi ọma… [na] obere ihe onyonyo ojii nke dị n'ebe niile n'elu ụlọ nke na-eme
N'afọ 2015, dị ka akụkụ nke Performa, ọ na-arụkọ ọrụ ọnụ na Chimurenga na Pan African Space Station ịmepụta mmapụta salon nke kwadoro usoro mkparịta ụka

Nontsikelelo 'Lolo' Veleko (amụrụ n'abalị iri na itoolu n'ọnwa Ọgọstụ n'afọ 1977) bụ onye na-ese foto na South Africa nke a kachasị mara màkà ngosipụta ya nkè njirimara ndị isi ojii, ime obodo na ejiji na South Africa mgbe ịkpa ókè agbụrụ gasịrị
A mụrụ Veleko na (úbọchị iri na itoolu n'ọnwa Ọgọst n'afọ 1977 na Bodibe, North West (South African province))
Ọ gụrụ akwụkwọ site n'afọ 1995 ruo afọ 2003 na Cape Teknion na Cape Town wee gaa Luhlaza High School na Khayelitsha N'afọ 1995, ọ gụrụ ihe osise na Cape Technikon
Mgbè ọ kwagara Johannesburg, ọ gụrụ foto na Market Theatre Photo Workshop (afọ 1999 rụọ afọ 2004), ụlọ ọrụ nke David Goldblatt haziri, onye na-enye ndị na-ese foto na-eto eto ọzụzụ
N'afọ 2003, Veleko dere ihe odide na Cape Town na Johannesburg, usoro ọ kpọrọ The ones on top won't make it Stop! na ngosi izizi ya na Johannesburg Art Gallery
Foto ndị a gosipụtara ọnọdụ mmekọrịta mmadụ na ibe ya na ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị nke South Africa ógè ịkpa ókè agbụrụ gasịrị
N'otu afọ a, a họpụtara Veleko maka MTN New Contemporaries Arts Awards
Asọmpi a na-akọwa ndị omenkà South Africa anọ na-arị elu ma họrọ onye mmeri
N'ime afọ abụọ sochirinụ, e gosipụtara ọrụ ya na ihe ngosi dị iche iche na South Africa, Europe na Australia
N'afọ 2006, foto ya bụ akụkụ nkè ihe ngosi Snap Judgments New Positions in Contemporary African Photography, na International Center of Photography (ICP) na New York

Ọrụ a na-egosipụta karịsịa, na-akọwa Velekońs na-arụ ọrụ na stereotypes nke jikọtara ya na okike na agbụrụ na-egosi ụdị okporo ámá South Africa site na usoro ya Beauty is in the Eye of the Beholder site na (afọ 2003) dọtara uche dị ukwuu na otuto mba ụwa, na-agbanwe echiche gara aga banyere Africa n'ozuzu ya na mba ụwa
Veleko na-akọwa na ọ na-ele anya na ejiji na otu o si emepụta njirimara, n'ihi na ejiji nwere njirimara

Site n'aha usoro ahụ, ọ na-ekwu, sị 'Echere m na ụzọ m si ele ịma mma anya na ụzọ m ga-esi ghọta ịma mma nwere ike ịdị iche na onye ọzọ nọ n'akụkụ mYa mere, a na-akpọ ọrụ ahụ Beauty is in the Eye of the Beholder, n'ihi na nye m ha mara mma
Ọbụna ọ na-enye ihe dị iche iche kpatara ọrụ a

Mgbe ndị mmadụ lere ndị ahụ yi uwe dị iche iche anya, ha ga-ajụ, sị Olee otú ị ga-esi kpuchie uwe ogologo na-acha odo odo na obere uwe na-acha akwụkwọ ndụ akwụkwọ ndụ nwere akara? Ọ na-aghọta echiche ya n'ụzọ dị iche nke bụ ọrụ a na-akpọ Beauty Is In The Eyes Of The Beholder, n'ihi na maka ya ọ bụ maka ịdọrọ uche gaa n'ihe gbasara ịma mma site na ijide ndị mmadụ n'ezie
Ọ bụkwa maka ejiji n'okporo ámá ka ọ na-echeghị na ha na-akwalite onwe ha, nke ọ na-egosipụta ebe ọ biri ma bụrụ otu n'ime ndị ahụ
N'ikwu ya n'ụzọ dị nkenke, o doro anya na ọ bụ ya mepụtara ihe oyiyi n'ihi nhọrọ agba na ihu ihu nke ihe odide ahụ na onye na-ekiri ya
N'akụkụ nke a, Veleko etinyewokwa uwe na ọrụ ya 'iji kpachara anya na-agbagha echiche nke njirimara dabere na ọdịdị na akụkọ ihe mere eme'
Nke a pụtara ìhè na ọrụ onwe ya site n'afọ 2002, wwwnotblackenoughlolo, nke gosipụtara nyocha nke ọdịbendị na agbụrụ ngwakọta site na ejiji dị iche iche nke egwuregwu

N'ikwu ókwú banyere foto ya, Mark Stevens dere na New York Magazine Art Review, 'Ọ bụ ihe ijuanya- ihe ijuanya na-eme ka mmadụ teta- ịbịakwute agba ndị na-agba agba nke ógè a nke ndị na-eyi ejiji nke Nonts Hand 'Lolo' Veleko gosipụtara n'okporo ámá Johannesburg'

Ónyé nkatọ Leslie Camhi ejikọtala isiokwu ndị maara ejiji nke ihe osise Veleko n'okporo ámá na onyinyo a na-ahụkarị nke 'hipsters' 'na-eyi eletrik, agba Kool-Aid [nke] na-enweghị mgbagha na ihe oyiyi ọdịda anyanwụ
na-akpọ ha ndị nketa nke Ke dandified Bamakois bourgeoisie'
Leslie Camhi nke The Village Voice (afọ 2006) gara n'ihu kwuo, sị
Nontsizi Mgqwetho ( fl
afo 1920s) bụ onye na-ede uri South Afrika, 'onye mbụ na naanị otu onye na-ede uri nwanyị dere na Xhosa '
E bipụtara uri ya na Umteteli wa Bantu, akwụkwọ akụkọ Johannesburg na-asụ ọtụtụ asụsụ kwa izu nke hiwere na afo 1920
Noora Salem Jasim (amụrụ na 27 Nọvemba afọ 1996) bụ onye egwuregwu Bahraini na -asọ mpi ọkachasị na gbaa nke shot put
Ọ nọchitere anya obodo ya na asọmpi mba ụwa 2017 n’enweghị ntozu nke ikpeazu
N'èzí
Ime ụlọ

Noorani (Arabic نوراني) bụ aha nna Alakụba, nke sitere na nurani Persian, nke pụtara 'ọkụ' ma ọ bụ 'na-egbuke egbuke', site na nur Arabic, nke pụtara 'ìhè' Ntụgharị asụsụ ọzọ gụnyere Noorany, Nourani na Nurani Aha ahụ nwere ike na-ezo aka

Awolowo Oreoluwa Racheal (mụrụ March 2, 1999) aha ajị maara bụ Nora Awolowo o bụ Nigerian film director, cinematographer, akwụkwọ echebe, na-emeputa na iduzi ihe A họpụtara ya maka nturu ugo ọdịnihu nke Africa na nturu ugo maka ihe nkiri
A mụrụ Nora na Lagos, ebe o biri ndụ ya niile wee gaa ụlọ akwụkwọ praịmarị na nke sekọndrị, ọ mụtara Accounting na Mahadum Ekiti State
Nora nwèrè mmasị maka iduzi ihe mụtara site na nkuzi ịntanetị (kuziri onwe ya)
N'afọ 2019, ahọpụtara obere akwụkwọ ntụzịaka ya 'Life at the Bay' na mmemme ihe nkiri mba ụwa nke Africa
Ọ mepụtala, duzie ihe onyonyo na ihe nkiri dịka Symphonies, Life At The Bay, David, Baby Blues na All Lives Matter
Norah Bigirwa-Nyendwoha (amụrụ na 19 Ọktoba, na afọ 1968) bụ onye ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị Uganda na nwanyị so na ndị omeiwu
N'afọ 2016, a họpụtara ya dị ka onye nnọchi anya nwanyị na nzuko omeiwu maka mpaghara Buliisa
Na ntuli aka nke afọ 2021 na Uganda, a họpụtara ya ọzọ maka ọkwa yiri ya
Ọ bụ onye otu National Resistance Movement na-achị
N'afọ 1992, Norah nwetara diplọma na Business Studies na National College of Business Studies nke dị na Nakawa
N'afọ 1995, ọ nwetara asambodo Accounting Technician site na Uganda Management Institute
Otu ụlọ akwụkwọ ahụ ebe ọ nwetara diplọma ndị isi ego mgbe afọ anọ gasịrị
N'afọ 2003, ọ gụsịrị akwụkwọ na Mahadum Ndejje na nzere bachelọ nke Business Administration na Kampala
Norbert Shamuyarira (a mụrụ n'afọ 1962) bụ onye Zimbabwe na-akpụ ihe
Ọ bu onye obodo Chinhoyi
Nne Shamuyarira nwụrụ mgbe ọ dị afọ itoolu; n'oge na-adịghị anya mgbe ọ nwụsịrị, nna ya gbahapụrụ ezinụlọ ahụ
Nwanne ya nwoke mechara gbuo onwe ya
Ọ malitere ịkpụ ihe na 1979, ya na Bernard Takawira rụkọrọ ọrụ afọ anọ na Chitungwiza
Noria Muelwa Mabasa (née Luvhimbi) (amụrụ n'afọ 1938, Shigalo (Xigalo), Malamulele, South Africa) bụ ónyé na-ese ihe na Venda, Ónyé na-arụ ọrụ karịsịa na ite na osisi
A mụrụ Noria Mabasa Noria Muelelwa Luvhimbi n'ubochí irí n'ọnwa Mee, 1938 n'ọbọdọ Shigalo, Limpopo
Ọ bụ nwa nke atọ amụrụ n'ezinụlọ ya na ụmụnne nwanyị abụọ tọrọ ya
N'afọ 1955, ọ lụrụ Jim Mabasa ónyé si n'ọbọdọ Ha-Mutsha, Limpopo
Ọ kewara na Jim Mabasa na 1965 mgbè ọ dara ọrịa dị omimi
O nweghị ndidi n'ebe ọ nọ ma nye ya iwu ka ọ hapụ ụlọ ya
Ọ laghachiri n'ọbọdọ Shigalo
N'ịbụ ónyé gụrụ akwụkwọ n'onwe ya, Mabasa bi ugbu a n'ọbọdọ Tshino na mpaghara Vuwani nke Venda, ebe ọ na-elekọta ụlọ akwụkwọ nka ebe ọ na'ịkụzi ụmụ akwụkwọ ya na nka nke ite na ime ihe ọkpụkpụ
Ọ bịdọrọ iji ụrọ rụọ ọrụ na 1974 ma afọ abụọ ka e mesịrị, na 1976, ọ ghọrọ nwanyị Tsonga mbụ na-arụ ọrụ na osisi
Ọ natara ọzụzụ n'ógbè
Noria Mabasa gụsịrị otu afọ nke agụmakwụkwọ n'ụlọ akwụkwọ dị awa atọ site n'ụlọ ya mgbè ọ bụ nwata, mana ọ kwụsịrị ịga akwụkwọ n'ihi ọrụ ụlọ
N'afọ 1965, ọ malitere inwe nrọ ugboro ugboro nke otu agadi nwanyị nke gọ́siri ya otu esi arụ ọrụ na ụrọ, ma kpalie ya ịnata ọzụzụ mpaghara na ọrụ ọdịnala
Ihe osise ụrọ mbụ ya na-adịkarị obere ma na-enyekarị ụmụaka ọbọdọ ahụ
Ọ na-aga n'ihu na-emepụta ọrụ sitere na ozi na ọhụụ nke nrọ ya
Mabasa anọwo na-arụ ọrụ dị ka ónyé na-ese ihe kemgbe afọ 1976
A gbárá ya ume ịmalite ịkpụ osisi mgbè ónyé na-ese ihe na Venda bụ Nelson Makhuba tụchara aro ya n'afọ 1983
A na-eji ihe oyiyi ụrọ na osisi matano eme ihe n'ememe mmalite
Mabasa nwetara mmata na mbụ na ihe nkiri nka nke mbà na nke mbà ụwa n'afọ ndị 1980 site na ihe oyiyi ceramic ya nke e ji ágbá enamel see
A na-ewu ihe oyiyi ya ma na-agba ya ọkụ n'ọkụ
Ọrụ ya ugbu a na-ejikọta ihe atụ na ọrụ; ite na-enwekarị ọdịdị nke nwanyị ma ọ bụ ihu ihu
Ọrụ ndị Mabasa na-elekwasị ányà na metaphysical na nke nwanyị, ọkachasị ókwú metụtara ụmụ nwanyị, ya na isiokwu nke akụkọ ifo Venda na ime mmụọ
Ọ na-ejikarị ụrọ si n'akụkụ osimiri ya na osisi arụ ọrụ màkà ihe osise ya
A na-ekwukwa ihe ọkpụkpụ osisi ya site na ịdị irè - o kwuru na osisi adịghị ike dị ka ụrọ
Ka ọ dị ugbu a, Mabasa nwere ụlọ ngosi na-arụ ọrụ n'ụlọ ya nke obodo Tshino, nke dị na mpụga obodo Thohoyandou
Perryer (2004)
10 Years 100 Artists Art In A Democratic South Africa

Noria Sosala (amụrụ n'ụbọchị iri abụọ na ise n'ọnwa Disemba n'afọ 1988) bụ onye Zambia na-agba bọọlụ nke na-agba ọsọ maka otu egwuregwu bọọlụ ụmụ nwanyị nke mba Zambia
Ọ bụ otu n'ime ndị otu na afọ 2014 African Women's Championship
N'ọkwa klọb ọ gbara bọọlụ maka National Assembly FC
na mba Zambia
Norma Morgan (1928 - 2017) bụ ónyé America na-ebi akwụkwọ na ónyé na-ese ihe
A na-ahụ ọrụ ya na nnukwu nchịkọta n'ụwa niile ma a makwaara ya nke ọma maka ihe osise ya na ihe osise, ọtụtụ n'ime ha sitere n'ike mmụọ nsọ site na ógè ọ nọrọ na Great Britain
A mụrụ Norma Gloria Morgan na New Haven, Connecticut, na 1929
Ọ bụ ónyé Africa-America
Nné ya zụlitere ya, mgbè nna ya nwụsịrị n'oge, ma rụọ ọrụ dị ka onye ọrụ ụlọ, onye na-akwa akwa, na onye na-ese ihe
Morgan gosipụtara mmasị na nka site na nwata, na-ese ihe osise mgbidi ụlọ klas mgbè ọ dị afọ iri na atọ ma nweta nkwanye ùgwù màkà ihe osise ya, Reflections, nke ọ rụchara mgbe ọ dị iri na asaa
Ọ gụrụ akwụkwọ afọ abụọ na Art Students League nke New York, na Hans Hofmann na mbido afọ 20, ma mesịa na Stanley Hayter
Ọ bụ Hayter kụziiri ya ihe osise
Morgan natara fellowship iji mụọ na England mgbè ọ dị afọ iri abụọ ma jiri ọtụtụ oge ya na-enyocha ndị Moors
Oge a kpaliri ọrụ nke na-elekwasị ányà na ihe oyiyi okike, ọkachasị igwe na igwe ojii
Ọ laghachiri na Great Britain na 1961 ma nọrọ ebe ahụ ruo 1966
A họpụtara ọrụ ya ka ọ nọchite ányà United States na First World Festival of Negro Arts, nke emere na Dakar, Senegal, n'ọnwa Eprel 1966
Ndị America ndị ọzọ na-ese ihe gụnyere na ngosi a gụnyere Barbara Chase-Riboud (nke a maara n'oge ahụ dị ka Barbara Chase), Emilio Cruz, Sam Gilliam, Richard Hunt, Jacob Lawrence, na Charles White

Norman Baynard (amụrụ n'afọ 1908- rụọ afọ1986), bụ onye Amerịka na-ese foto nke ọrụ ya dekọrọ ndụ ọha na eze na nke obodo nke ndị Afrịka-Amerịka na mpaghara Logan Heights nke San Diego site n'afọ 1940 ruo afọ 1980s

Nnukwu nchịkọta ya nke negatives na prints, nke o nyere na San Diego History Center n'afọ 1991, ghọrọ ihe ndabere maka akụkọ ihe mere eme na ọrụ njirimara foto nke kọrọ ahụmahụ ndị Afrịka-Amerịka na San Diego site na mmekọrịta ya na ụmụ amaala obodo
A mụrụ Baynard n'ọnwa Eprel 10, nke afọ 1908 na Pontiac, Michigan, n'aka ndị Canada si mba ọzọ John na Minnie (née Chandler) Baynard
Nne na nna ya gbara alụkwaghịm mgbe ọ bụ nwata, Baynard na nna ya kwagara California na mbido afọ 1920
N'ime afọ ndị 1930, ọ rụrụ ọrụ dịgasị iche iche, gụnyere onye na-elekọta ubi na onye na-agụ egwú
Ruo afọ abụọ ọ rụrụ ọrụ maka ụlọ ọrụ ụgbọ elu Consolidated Aircraft (nke e mechara mara dị ka Convair) na ngalaba mmepe foto
Ọ lụrụ Frances H
(née Barnett) Russ n'afọ 1936
Ọ gbara ya ume ka ọ malite ise foto, n'afọ 1939, ọ meghere N
Studio n'ụlọ ha na Clay Avenue na mpaghara Logan Heights
Mgbe e mesịrị, ụlọ ọrụ ahụ kwagara na mpaghara azụmahịa nke Imperial Avenue ma kpọgharịa ya Baynard Studio
Baynard nwụrụ n'ọnwa Jenụwarị 9 nke afọ 1986 na San Diego, California
Foto azụmahịa nke Baynard bụ isi na portraiture

N'oge ọrụ afọ 46, o dere ndụ mmekọrịta mmadụ na ibe ya, ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị, na okpukpe nke ndị bi na mpaghara Logan Heights nke San Diego, na-ese foto ndị otu obodo, azụmaahịa, na ihe omume ndụ (baptizim, ngụsị akwụkwọ, agbamakwụkwọ)

Ihe osise ya dị ka puku iri na abụọ na-anọchite anya ihe ndekọ pụrụ iche nke obodo ndị Afrịka-Amerịka na San Diego n'etiti narị afọ nke iri abụọ, na-egosi ma isiokwu dịgasị iche iche na 'ihe a kapịrị ọnụ na-elekwasị anya na nrọ California' nke ndị ahịa Baynard na-aga n'elu
N'afọ 2011, San Diego History Center gosipụtara ihe ngosi ahụ, Portrait of a Proud Community Norman Baynard's Logan Heights 1939 Xi1985, nke gosipụtara foto 120 site na nchịkọta ahụ
Onyinye National Endowment for the Arts na ego ndị ọzọ mere ka ebe ngosi ihe mgbe ochie nwee ike digitize ma depụta ihe oyiyi 500 site na Norman Baynard Collection
Norman Catherine (amụrụ na Septemba 1949 na East London, South Afrika) bụ onye Omenkà South Afrika nke ọrụ ya gbasara eserese, ihe ọkpụkpụ, mbipụta na mgbasa ozi
Ya na onye na-ese ihe na South Africa bụ Walter Battiss rụkọrọ ọrụ nke ọma na echiche Fook Island site na 1973
'N'ime afọ iri atọ na-agafe ihe ọ rụpụtara n'oge gara aga na nke ugbu a, akara ngosi nke Catherine gụnyere ụdị ọchị na-atọ ọchị na nke na-atụ ụjọ, nke a sụgharịrị na agba katọn

Ọhụụ ya na-enweghị atụ - ngwakọta nke ọchịchịrị cynicism na ọchị ọchị, yana ojiji ọhụrụ ya nke ihe kwa ụbọchị, emeela ka ọ nọrọ n'ihu nka ọgbara ọhụrụ nke South Afrika Hazel Friedman na Norman Catherine
Ọ na-ebi ma na-arụ ọrụ site n'ụlọ ya, aha ya bụ Fook Manor, dị nso na Hartbeespoort Dam na mpụga Pretoria
Norman Wilfred Lewis (ubochí irí abụọ na atọ n'ọnwa Julaị, 1909 rụọ úbọchị irí abụọ na asaá n'ọnwa Ọgọst, 1979) bụ ónyé America na-ese ihe, ọkà mmụta, na onye nkụzi
Lewis, ónyé bụ ónyé Africa-America na onye Bermudian, jikọtara ya na abstract expressionism, ma jiri usoro nnọchiteanya lekwasị anya na ndụ ndị isi ojii na ọgụ ọbọdọ ya
A mụrụ Norman Wilfred Lewis na úbọchị irí abụọ na atọ n'ọnwa Julaị, 1909 na mpaghara Harlem na New York City, New York
A zụlitere ya na 133rd Street, n'etiti 7th na 8th Avenues
Nné na nnà ya abụọ si Bermuda, nna ya Wilfred Lewis, bụ ónyé ọkụ azụ ma mesịa bụrụ onye isi ọdụ ụgbọ mmiri na nne ya Diane Lewis, bụ onyeisi ụlọ achịcha ma mesịa ghọọ onye ọrụ ụlọ

O nwere ụmụnne nwoke abụọ na Norman bụ nwa nke etiti, nwanne ya nwoke nke okenye Saul Lewis ghọrọ onye na-eme violin, mgbe e mesịrị na-akpọ egwu jazz na ndị egwu ama ama dị ka Count Basie na Chick Webb
Lewis gara ụlọ akwụkwọ ọha na eze nke 5, nke n'oge ahụ bụ ụmụ akwụkwọ ọcha
Ọ na-enwe mmasị mgbe niile na nka, mana o gosighị ya n'oge ọ bụ nwata n'ihi enweghị ihe onwunwe na nwanne ya nwoke tọrọ ya nwere nkà egwu kpuchiri ya

Mgbè o si n'oké osimiri lọta, ọ nwetara ọrụ dị ka ónyé na-emepụta ákwà na uwe n'ụlọ ọrụ ndị na-akwa ákwà ma ọ bụ n'ebe ahụ ka ọ zutere onye na-ese ihe Augusta Savage, ónyé ụlọ ọrụ nka ya dị n'okpuru ala nke ụlọ ahịa ndị na-akpụ ákwà
Ọ mụrụ nka na Augusta Savage na Savage Studio of Arts and Crafts na Harlem
Savage bụ ónyé dị mkpa na mbido nke nyere ya ohere oghere oghere na Harlem Community Art Center
Lewis bụ ónyé otu Group narị atọ na isii na 1934, nchịkọta nke ndị na-ese ihe na ndị edemede Africa America na-atụle ọrụ nka na ọha mmadụ
Ụfọdụ ndị otu a ma ama bụ Augusta Savage, Romare Bearden, Ralph Ellison, Jacob Lawrence, na Richard Wright, yana Charles Alston, onye kwadoro nzukọ na ụlọ ọrụ ya
N'afọ 1935, ọ bụ ónyé guzobere Harlem Artists Guild, nke ndị otu ya gụnyere Romare Bearden, Selma Burke, na Beauford na Joseph Delaney
Lewis malitere ọrụ ya n'afọ 1930, na mbụ ọrụ ihe atụ na mmekọrịta mmadụ na ibe ya

Na mbụ, o sere ihe ọ hụrụ, nké sitere na Meeting Place (1930), ebe a na-ahụ màkà nzukọ, na The Yellow Hat (1936), ihe osise Cubist, na Dispossessed (1940), ebe a chụpụrụ, na Jazz Musicians (1948), ihe ngosi nke egwu bebop nke a na-akpọ na Harlem
E ji 'ụdị ihe atụ, na-egosi akara achịcha, nchụpụ, na obi ọjọọ ndị uwe ojii see ya'
Lewis kwùrù na ọ gbalịrị igosipụta esemokwu mmekọrịta mmadụ na ibe ya na nka ya, mana n'afọ ndị ikpeazụ ya, lekwasịrị anya na ịma mma
'Ihe mgbaru ọsọ nke ónyé na-ese ihe ga-abụ mmepe mara mma, 'ọ gwara onye na-akọ akụkọ ihe méré eme Kellie Jones, 'na n'echiche zuru ụwa ọnụ, inye aka na ọdịbendị n'ụzọ nke ya
Na ngwụcha afọ 1940, ọrụ ya ghọrọ ihe na-enweghị atụ
Ntinye aka ya zuru oke na abstract expressionism bụ n'ihi nkụda mmụọ ya na America mgbè ahụmahụ agha ya na Agha Ụwa nke Abụọ gasịrị
O yiri ka ọ bụ ihu abụọ na America na-alụ ọgụ 'megide ónyé iro nke echiche agbụrụ ya na-ekwughachi n'ụlọ site n'eziokwu nke ndị agha na-ekewapụ onwé ha'
N'ịhụ na nka enweghị ike ịgbanwe ọnọdụ ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị nke ọha mmadụ nọ na ya, o kpebiri na ndị mmadụ kwesịrị ịzụlite nkà mara mma ha karịa, kama ilekwasị anya na nka ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị
Tenement I (1952), Harlem Turns White (1955), na Night Walker No
2 (1956) niile bụ ihe atụ nke ụdị ya
Twilight Sounds (1947) na Jazz Band (1948) bụ ihe atụ nke mmasị ya n'ibute egwu
N'afọ 1975, ọ lụrụ enyi ya nwanyị ogologo oge, Ouida Bramwell
O nweghị ụmụ nke ya, mana ọ bụ nna Tarin Fuller, nwá nwanyị Bramwell
Ọ nwụrụ na mberede n'ubochí irí abụọ na asaá n'ọnwa Ọgọst, 1979 mgbè ọ dị afọ irí asaá, na New York City
Ọrụ ya gụnyere ihe osise, eserese, na mgbidi

Ọ bụ ezie na Willard Gallery nọchitere ányá ya, naanị nnọchiteanya ya, ọ bụkwa onye natara ọtụtụ onyinye na nyocha dị mma, ọrụ ya ereghị ihe fọrọ nke nta ka ọ bụrụ ndị ọzọ Abstract Expressionists ya na Mark Tobey ma ọ bụ Mark Rothko gosipụtara

E tinyeghị ya na akwụkwọ ndị dị mkpa màkà Abstract Expressionism nke oge ahụ, gụnyere The Triumph of American Painting A History of Abstract expressionism (1970) na The New York School The Painters and Sculptors of the Fifties (1978) nke Irving Sandler dere ma ọ dịghị mgbè a kpọtụrụ ya aha n'ihe odide Dore Ashton
Nnukwu ihe ngosi mbụ Lewis bụ na 1934 na Metropolitan Museum of Art, ebe ọ natara aha nsọpụrụ màkà ihe osise ya akpọrọ The Wanderer (Johnny)
N'afọ 1946, a nabatara ya na Marian Willard Gallery dị na New York, nke bụ ebe o nwere ihe ngosi mbụ ya afọ atọ ka e mesịrị

A na-etinye ọrụ ya n'ọtụtụ ihe ngosi nka ọha na eze gụnyere Museum of Modern Art (MoMA), Smithsonian American Art Museum, Metropolitan Museum of Art, Art Institute of Chicago, Blanton Museum of Art، High Museum of Art
Maka Congress of Industrial Organization na 1943, ọ meriri asọmpi site n'ịmepụta ihe ngosi enyemaka agha
Na Pittsburgh International Exhibition na Carnegie Institute na 1955, ndị ọbịa nyere ihe osise ya Migrating Birds (1953) ihe nrite Popularity Prize
N'afọ 1972, ọ natara onyinye site na Mark Rothko Foundation na Fellowship site na National Endowment for the Arts (NEA)
N'afọ 1975, ọ natara Guggenheim Fellowship maka eserese
E depụtara ya site na ụbọchị ịrịgo
Norman Parish (amụrụ na New Orleans, zụlitere na Chicago n'ubochí irí abụọ na isii n'ọnwa Ọgọst, 1937 rụo ụbọchị asatọ n'ọnwa Julaị, 2013) bụ ónyé America na-ese ihe na ónyé na-ere ihe osise
Ọ bụ ónyé guzobere na ónyé nduzi nke Parish Gallery (nke e guzobere na 1991) na mpaghara Georgetown nke Washington, DC
The Washington Post kọwara gallery ahụ dị ka gallery nka 'nke gosipụtara ndị na-ese ihe n'Afrịka n'oge mgbè gallery ole na ole ndị ọzọ lekwasịrị anya n'igosi ọrụ ha'
Parish gụrụ akwụkwọ na Art Institute of Chicago na Mahadum Chicago

Na mbido ọrụ ya dị ka ónyé na-ese ihe na Chicago, Parish so n'òtù ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị nke ndị na-ese egwu Africa America na Chicago, ụfọdụ n'ime ha mechara bụrụ akụkụ nkè otu AfriCOBRA (African Commune of Bad Relevant Artists) nke ndị na'ese ihe Wadsworth Jarrell na Jeff Donaldson guzobere na 1968, ha abụọ kụziri na Mahadum Howard

Na ngwụcha afọ 1960, Parish na ihe karịrị ndị na-ese ihe na ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị iri na abụọ nke ndị Africa America na-arụsi ọrụ ike na Chicago mepụtara ihe osise na-ese okwu n'oge ahụ, nke a maara dị ka The Wall of Respect, na Chicago South Side nke afọ iri anọ ka e mesịrị 'kwuru ugbu a na-akpali okike nke ihe osise agbụrụ ndị ọzọ gburugburu ụwa'
Ónyé na-ede uri nke nwetara ihe nrite Pulitzer bụ Gwendolyn Brooks mekwara emume mgbidi ahụ n'otu n'ime uri ya
Parish kwagara Washington, DC na 1988 wee mepee Parish Gallery na 1991
N'ihi na achọpụtala m ọtụtụ ndị na-ese ihe dị mkpa, Norman na-ekwu
Ha dị mma, dị mma n'ezie
Mànà ha chọrọ ónyé ga-enyere aka ime ka ọrụ ha banye n'ụwa, ọ chetara n'ajụjụ ọnụ n'afọ 2013
Na mbụ, ọtụtụ n'ime ndị na-ese ihe anyị gosipụtara amaara m site na ụlọ akwụkwọ nka, ọ gbakwunyere n'otu ajụjụ ọnụ ahụ
Ma n'ihe dị ka irí itoolu na atọ na irí itoolu na anọ, ndị na-ese ihe ndị ọzọ malitere ịbịakwute m
Ndị a bụ ndị na-ese ihe na-enweghị ohere n'ihi na ọ dịghị onye na-achọ ha, ọ dịghị ónyé nọ n'ebe ahụ na-akwalite ọrụ ha

Ụlọ ngosi ihe nkiri Georgetown nke Norman Parish 'ghọrọ otu n'ime ụlọ ngosi ihe osise ndị isi ojii a ma ama, na-elekwasị ányá na ọrụ ndị Africa America na ndị ọzọ na-ese ihe nke ihe a maara dị ka ndị Africa diaspora

N'ime afọ ndị e meghere gallery ahụ, ọ gosipụtara ọrụ nke ihe karịrị ndị omenkà otu narị na iri asaa sitere na United States, Nigeria, Ethiopia, Ghana, South Africa na Morocco, tinyere ndị si Gris, Turkey, Brazil, Spain, na France, gụnyere ndị omenkọ a ma ama dị ka Sam Gilliam, Richard Mayhew, Lou Stovall, Percy Martin, Evangeline Montgomery, Victor Ekpuk, Lois Mailou Jones, na Wadsworth Jarrell

North Giziga bụ asụsụ Afro-Asia nkè á na-asụ n'ebe ugwu Cameroon

Á na-asụ North Giziga (20,000 ndị na-asụrụ ya) ná Tchéré na Mogazang massifs ná àlà dị larịị dị nso (Dogba) dị n'ebe ùgwù Maroua (na Tchéré, Godola, ná Mambang cantons, Meri commune, Diamaré department, Far North Region)
Ndị bi ná mpaghara Tchéré, nkè á na-akpọ 'Mofous de Tchéré' mgbè ụfọdụ, anabatala asụsụ Giziga, ọ bụ ezie ná enwere ike ịsụ asụsụ 'Tchéré' oge ochie n'oge gara aga
Ndị na-asụ South Giziga na-akpọ North Giziga 'Giziga tókó-tókó', site na tókó 'bụ nkè ahụ abụghị', nkè South Giziga kpọrọ [takwa]
North Mofu bụ asụsụ Afro-Asia nkè á na-asụ n'ebe ugwu Cameroon
Asụsụ bụ Douroun ná Wazan

Enweghị glossonym (aha asụsụ) na-ekpuchi asụsụ ndị dị nsó nkè Douroum, Wazang ná Douvangar massifs, mà ọ bụ ethnonym kwekọrọ; ndị na-ekwu okwu na-ezo aka n'onwe ha dị ka 'ndị ugwu', na-akọwapụta massif mgbe ọ dị mkpa
N'ezie, ndị na-asụ asụsụ ndị a anaghị amata Mofu, mà e wezụga ndị nkè agbụrụ ndịda, Mofaw [mofaw]

Á na-asụ Douvangar Mofu (North Mofu) ná massifs dị site ná ndịda Meri ruo Osimiri Tsanaga (canton nke Douvangar, Dourourn, ná Ouazzang nkè obodo Meri, ngalaba nkè Diamaré, Far North Region) site ná ndị ọkà okwu 27,500
Asụsụ North Omotic (Nomotic) ma ọ bụ Ta-Ne Omotic, bụ ngalaba Omotic nke ezinụlọ Afro-Asiatic ma na-asụ ya na Etiopia
A na-ahapụ Dizoid na nhazi ọkwa ọzọ, mana etinyere na nke mbụ
Enyere ndepụta okwu ntule zuru oke na Václav Blažek (2008)
Mpaghara anọ Ta-Ne Omotic (North Omotic) nke Güldemann nyere (2018) bụ
Ntụnyere nke ọnụọgụ n'asụsụ ọ bụla

Na nhazi ala Guthrie, ha dabara n'ime mpaghara Bantu G na E

Asụsụ Northern Berber bụ olumba na-aga n'ihu na-asụ n'ofe Maghreb, mebere otu obere ngalaba Berber nke ezinụlọ Afroasiatic
Agbajila ọganiihu ha site na mgbasa nke Arabic, yana nke dị ntakịrị site n'aka otu Zenati nke Northern Berber
Akpaalaokwu Zenati na-ekerịta ụfọdụ ihe ọhụrụ a na-ahụghị n'asụsụ ndị gbara ya gburugburu; karịsịa ime ka k to sh nro na enweghị a- n'okwu ụfọdụ, dịka 'aka' (afus vs fus)
Northern Nigeria (Igbo Owuwa Anyawu Nigerian, Ugwu ndi Hausa) ma ala ndi no na owuwa anya wu nke no n'ala Naigeria
Obu ndi Hausa bi ebe ahu
The Northern Nigeria Gazette bụ akwụkwọ akụkọ gọọmentị maka ndị Britain na-achị mpaghara Naijiria nke ndị ugwu
E bipụtara ya n'agbata afọ 1900 ya n'afọ 1913
The Nigeria Gazette gara n'ihu na ya
Ụlọ ọrụ mbipụta nke mpaghara ùgwù Naijiria bụ otu n'ime ụlọ ọrụ na-ebipụta akwụkwọ kachasị ochie na mpaghara ugwu nke Naijiria na Zaria
Ụlọ ọrụ ahụ bụ ụlọ ọrụ mbipụta nke abụọ na mpaghara ugwu nke Naijiria mgbe Northern Provinces Newsheet guzobere na Kano nke na-ebipụta akwụkwọ na Ajami na Hausa

Ọtụtụ n'ime mbipụta ya lekwasịrị anya na Akwụkwọ Naijiria, ọkachasị Akwụkwọ ndị metụtara asụsụ Hausa, ụlọ ọrụ ahụ ebipụtala akwụkwọ maka ndị edemede Hausa a ma ama nke Mpaghara ugwu nke Naijiria, gụnyere Magana Jari Ce, Ruwan Bagaja nke Abubakar Imam, Ganɗoki nke Muhammadu Bello Kagara, Akwụkwọ ndị ọzọ gụnyere Shaihu Umar, Jiki Magayi
Ụlọ ọrụ ahụ bụ ụlọ ọrụ na-ebipụta akwụkwọ nke Naijiria mbụ mepụtara akwụkwọ Hausa n'afọ 1934 nke Bello Kagara kpọrọ Ruwan Bagaja
na akwụkwọ akụkọ Hausa kachasị ewu ewu Magana Jari ce
Northern Somali (Somali Af North) bụ olumba nke asụsụ Somalia ma bụrụkwa ntọala maka Standard Somali

Ihe karịrị 60% nke ndị Somalia dum na-asụ ya, na mpaghara okwu ya sitere na Djibouti, Puntland, Somaliland, Somali Region nke Etiopia, Northern Frontier District ruo ọtụtụ akụkụ nke Somalia Nkesa ọgbara ọhụrụ a sitere na ogologo usoro
mmegharị ndị bi na ndịda n'ime narị afọ iri gara aga site na Ọwara Oké Osimiri Adenn
Ihe karịrị 60% nke ndị Somalia niile na-asụ Northern Somali
Mpaghara okwu ya bụ isi sitere na Djibouti, Somaliland na akụkụ akụkụ ọwụwa anyanwụ na ndịda ọdịda anyanwụ nke Somalia
Nkesa ọgbara ọhụrụ a bụ n'ihi ogologo usoro mmegharị nke ndịda n'ime narị afọ iri gara aga site na Ọwara Oké Osimiri Aden

E kewara Northern Somali n'asụsụ atọ Northern Somali kwesịrị ekwesị (nke a na-asụ n'ebe ugwu ọdịda anyanwụ), otu Darod (nke a na-asụ n'ebe ugwu ọwụwa anyanwụ na n'akụkụ ọwụwa anyanwụ nke Etiopia), na otu Lower Juba (nke ndị ugwu Somalia bi na mpaghara ndịda osimiri na-asụ)
Ndị na-ede uri ndị Somalia ama ama na ndị ndọrọndọrọ ọchịchị na-ejikarị Northern Somali eme ihe, yabụ na-enwe ugwu kachasị na olumba ndị Somalia
N'ihi mgbasa nke ukwuu, ọ bụ ntọala maka Standard Somali
Ọtụtụ n'ime uri Somali oge gboo ka a na-agụ ma dee ya n'olumba Northern Somali
Olumba nke ezinụlọ-Isak nwere ugwu kacha elu n'asụsụ Somali ọ bụla ọzọ
Northern Somali nwekwara ọtụtụ okwu ndị Harari
Lamberti kewara Northern Somali n'ime obere obere atọ

Northern Sotho, ma ọ bụ Sesotho sa Leboa dị ka endonym, bụ asụsụ Sotho-Tswana a na-asụ na mpaghara ugwu ọwụwa anyanwụ nke South Africa A na-akpọ ya mgbe ụfọdụ Sepedi ma ọ bụ Pedi, olumba ya, site na synecdoche
Northwest Gbaya bụ asụsụ Gbaya nkè á na-asụ n'ofe Cameroon ná Central African Republic

Nosa Igiebor (amụrụ na ya na 25 Disemba n'afo 1952)
Ọ bụ onye nta akụkọ na onye nchịkọta akụkọ Naijiria
N'afọ 1993, o ritere onyinye International Press Freedom Award nke Kọmitii na-echebe ndị nta akụkọ maka magazin ya naTell banyere ọchịchị ndị agha Sani Abacha

Mgbe ọ gụsịrị akwụkwọ na mahadum nke di na Ghana akporo Ghana Institute nke Nta akụkọ, Igiebor malitere ọrụ ya na Naijiria Television Authority na Edo State, ebe ọkwá ikpeazụ ya bụ dịka onye nchịkọta akụkọ
Ebe ọzọ ọ ruru ọrụ bụ National Concord Group, ebe ọ bụ onye nchịkọta akụkọ
Ọ hapụrụ ebe ahụ ka ọ bụrụ osote onye isi nchịkọta akụkọ nke magazin akụkọ Naijiria Newswatch
N'afọ 1991, Igiebor bidoro otu magazin akụkọ nke onwe ya bụ Tell wee bụrụ onye nchịkọta akụkọ ya

Dị ka Igiebor, ọtụtụ n'ime ndị nta akụkọ Tell bịara na magazin ahụ site na Newswatch, mgbe onye nchịkọta akụkọ ya bụ Dele Giwa nwụrụ site na bọmbụ akwụkwọ ozi na usoro nchịkọta akụkọ ya wee ghara inwe obi ike
Tell bipụtara isiokwu na-akatọ gọọmentị na ndị agha, na-eme ka mmekọrịta magazin ahụ na onye ọchịchị ndị agha bụ Ibrahim Babangida na-esiwanye njọ

N'ọnwa Eprel afọ 1993, mgbe magazin ahụ gosipụtara ajụjụ ọnụ ya na General Olusegun Obasanjo lara ezumike nká dị ka akụkọ mkpuchi ya, gọọmentị weghaara mbipụta 50,000 nke Tell ma manyere ndị ọrụ ahụ ịga zoo
Ha gara n'ihu na-ebipụta dị ka akwụkwọ akụkọ, Otú ọ dị ugbua, Ọ horo 'nke mbụ n'ime akwụkwọ akụkọ Guerrilla nke Nigeria nke oge a'
Na 12 June 1993, Babangida kagburu nsonaazụ nke ntuli aka onye isi ala nke mba ahụ mgbe onye mmegide Moshood Kashimawo Olawale Abiola meriri
General Sani Abacha wee weghara ọchịchị wee chiba dị ka onye isi ala ọhụrụ nke Naịjirịa
Site na mmalite nke ọchịchị Abacha, Tell weere ụda nkatọ na akụkọ ya banyere ọchịchị ya
Igiebor setịpụrụ iwu na magazin ahụ agaghị akpọ Abacha 'onye isi ala', na-ahọrọ okwu 'junta' ma ọ bụ 'onye ọchịchị aka ike' iji kọwaa ọchịchị ya

Gọọmentị zaghachiri site na mgbasa ozi nke iyi egwu na ịtụ ndị ọrụ magazin ahụ mkpọrọ, yana ndị nta akụkọ sitere na akwụkwọ ndị ọzọ, na-eduga Kọmitii na-echebe ndị nta akụkọ iji wepụta akụkọ na-akọwa ndị nta akụkọ nọọrọ onwe ha na Naijiria dị ka 'nsogbu miri emi'

Na Machị 1995, e jidere George Mbah, osote onye nchịkọta akụkọ nke magazin ahụ, ma tụọ ya mkpọrọ maka ebubo nke 'ịgbalị ime ngagharị ọchịchị ndị agha', ma maa ya ikpe ịga mkpọrọ afọ iri abụọ na ise site n'ụlọ ikpe nzuzo nke ndị agha
N'abalị iri abụọ na ise n'ọnwa Disemba n'otu afọ ahụ, ka Igiebor na-apụ n'ụlọ ya na Lagos ịga ụlọ ọrụ Tell, ndị ọrụ nchekwa steeti isii jidere ya ma kpọga ya n'isi ụlọ ọrụ nchekwa steeti
Ndị ọrụ jidekwara mbipụta 55,000 nke mbipụta Krismas nke Tell nke nwere akụkọ mkpuchi na-akatọ Abacha
Onye nchịkọta akụkọ Tell, Onome Osifo-Whiskey, gara zoo
Ndị ọrụ fọdụrụnụ wepụtara nkwupụta mgbe e jidere ha, na-ekwu na 'Iyi ọha egwu steeti na omume egwu obi ọjọọ agaghị amanye anyị imebi nkwenkwe anyị na nnwere onwe, ikpe ziri ezi na iwu nke iwu
akwụkwọE tinyere Igiebor n'ụlọ mkpọrọ naanị ya ma jụ ya ịnweta ezinụlọ ya, onye ọka iwu, na nlekọta ahụike

Na 8 Jenụwarị 1996, Ụlọikpe Kasị Elu nke Federal dị na Lagos nyere iwu ka e kwe ka nwunye Igiebor, Harit Igiebor, gaa leta di ya iji nye ya ọgwụ dị mkpa, mana mgbe ọ gara ụlọ mkpọrọ ahụ n'echi ya, a jụrụ ya ohere
Ka e mesịrị n'ọnwa ahụ, gọọmentị kwupụtara na a ga-ebo Igiebor ebubo n'okpuru 'Decree 2 nke 1984 maka omume na-emebi nchekwa steeti'
N'ọnwa Febụwarị, ndị ọrụ nchekwa steeti weghaara akwụkwọ otu narị puku nke Tell, onye ọka iwu Igiebor gbara akwụkwọ megide gọọmentị etiti maka US $ 1,400,000
A tụrụ onye ọka iwu ahụ mkpọrọ n'enweghị ebubo obula
Kọmitii na-echebe ndị nta akụkọ malitere mkpọsa ide akwụkwọ ozi na-achọ ka a tọhapụ ya, dịka Amnesty International mere
Òtù nke ikpeazụ ahụ họpụtakwara ya onye mkpọrọ nke akọ na uche
A nọgidere na-ejide ya n'enweghị onye ọ bụla ruo ihe karịrị ọnwa isii, ruo ụbọchị iri abụọ na anọ nke ọnwa Juun afọ 1996, mgbe a tọhapụrụ ya na ndị mkpọrọ ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị isii ndị ọzọ
N'afọ 1993, Kọmitii na-echebe ndị nta akụkọ bu ulo oru International Press Freedom Award nyere Igiebor onyinye nnwere onwe mgbasa ozi mba ụwa, 'nkwanye ukwu maka ọrụ nta akụkọ nwere'
Bill Orme, onye nchịkọta akụkọ nke CPJ, kwuru, sị 'Ihe mere Nosa dị iche bụ na ọ ka na-emepụta ihe na nzukọ ya (Tell) ka na-akọ akụkọ ahụ n'ụzọ dị egwu ma na-alụ ọgụ'
N'afọ 1998, Nosa Igiebor na ndị ọrụ nke Tell magazine nwetara onyinye pụrụ iche maka Human Rights Journalism na okpuru Threat na Amnesty International UK Media Awards

Nkwupụta onyinye ahụ kwuru; 'Tell anọgidewo na-ebipụta n'oge ọchịchị aka ike nke Naijiria n'agbanyeghị egwu, iyi egwu na njide n'enweghị ebubo ma ọ bụ ikpe nke Maazị Igiebor na ndị isi ndị ọzọ nke ndị ọrụ Tell gabigara
Igiebor bụzi onye isi oche nke ulo mgbasa ozi TELL n'akụkụ Dele Omotunde na Osifo Whiskey
Mgbe oge ọchịchị ndị agha gasịrị na Naịjirịa, Igiebor na ndị nta akụkọ ndị ọzọ nọ na Naịjirịa lara azụ n'ọrụ nta akụkọ
Nosa Rex Okunzuwa, onye amara aha ya bụ Nosa Rex yana Baba Rex, bụ onye ihe nkiri Naijiria na onye na-eme ihe nkiri TV na onye na-eme ihe nkiri
A mụrụ Nosa Rex Okunzuwa na Benin City, Edo State, wee nweta nzere bachelọ na Mechanical Engineering na Mahadum Ambrose Alli dị na Ekpoma na 2009
Ọ malitere ịrụ ọrụ dị ka onye na-eme ihe nkiri n'afọ 2010 ka ọ rụchara ọrụ mba; ihe nkiri izizi ya bụ na Gazza Treasure nke Derek Osonwa dere
Na mgbakwunye na ọrụ ihe nkiri, ọ gbara Terwase na usoro TV Jenifa's Diary nke Funke Akindele kere
Ọ bụ CEO nke ụlọ mmepụta ihe nkiri Big Things Development
Okunzuwa nwekwara ahịrị uwe ma bụrụ onye na-ere ụgbọala; ọ na-enyere nwunye ya aka n'ahịa nri ya
Na 2020 ọ ghọrọ onye nnọchi anya akara maka aphrodisiac Mydsiac
Okunzuwa lụrụ Deborah Raphael Nwokocha na 22 Ọgustu 2015; ha nwere nwa nwanyị na nwa nwoke
Nosipho Dumisa (amụrụ n'afọ 1988) bụ onye edemede South Africa, onye nduzi na onye na-emepụta ihe
O guzobere ụlọ ọrụ mmepụta ihe a na-akpọ Gambit Films
O dere ma duzie ihe nkiri mbụ ya, ihe nkiri mpụ na-akpali akpali Nommer 37, nke mbụ dị ka mkpirikpi na 2014 wee soro ya na 2018
O mepụtara usoro Netflix Blood & Water (2020)
Ọ rụrụ ọrụ dị ka onye na-emepụta ihe nkiri na Afrikaans soap opera Suidooster
E gosipụtara ọrụ ya na South by Southwest
Ha emeriela ihe nrite mba ụwa
Ọ nọdụrụ na ndị ọka ikpe nke Neuchâtel International Fantastic Film Festival na Switzerland
Ọrụ ya na-egosipụtakarị Cape Town, ebe ọ bi, dị ka ọnọdụ
Dumisa si Margate, KwaZulu-Natal
Ọ bụ onye Zulu, mana ọ mụtara asụsụ Afrikaans n'ụlọ akwụkwọ
Na mbido ime ihe nkiri, njehie nchịkwa nke debanyere aha ya na usoro ihe nkiri kama ime ihe nkiri mere ka ọ chọpụta mmasị ya n'ihe na-eme n'azụ igwefoto
Ọ gụsịrị akwụkwọ wee nweta nzere Bachelor of Arts na Motion Picture Medium site na AFDA na 2009
Nosiviwe Noluthando Mapisa-Nqakula (amụrụ 13 Nọvemba 1956) bụ onye ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị South Africa nke na-eje ozi ugbu a dị ka Onye isi oche nke Mgbakọ obodo nile site na 19 Ọgọst 2021
Ọ na-ejidebu ọfịs nke Minister of Defense and Military Veterans site na June 2012 ruo Ọgọst 2021
Ọ bụkwa onye minista na-ahụ maka ime ụlọ site na 2004 ruo 2009 na onye minista na-ahụ maka mgbazi site na 2009 ruo 2012
Mapisa-Nqakula nwetara diplọma onye nkuzi praịmarị na kọleji ndị nkuzi Bensonvale
Na 1984, ọ hapụrụ South Africa ịga ọzụzụ agha na Angola ya na Soviet Union
N'oge a, ọ rụrụ ọrụ dị ka onye isi otu kọmishọna nke ANC hibere iji nyochaa mpụ ndị òtù ANC Umkhonto we Sizwe (MK) gbahapụrụ na United Nations High Commissioner for Refugees (UNHCR) na Angola
Ruo ọtụtụ afọ, ọ rụrụ ọrụ na ụlọ ọrụ agha ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị n'ime ANC a wee ziga ya ka ọ nyere aka wughachi ụlọ ANC
N'afọ 1993, ọ ghọrọ odeakwụkwọ ukwu nke otu ANC Women's League
Tupu a họpụta ya dị ka Minista na-ahụ maka ime obodo, ọ nọrọ n'ọnọdụ dịka osote onye minista na ngalaba ahụ
Ihé Hashtag #NotAllMen bụ ihe gbasara ịntanetị nke ụmụ nwanyị

Mkpụmkpụ nke ahịrịokwu ahụ 'ọ bụghị ụmụ nwoke niile dị ka nke ahụ', mgbe ụfọdụ a na-eme ka ọ bụrụ 'NAMALT', meme bụ satire nke nzaghachi ụmụ nwoke na mkparịta ụka banyere mwakpo mmekọahụ, ọdịiche ịkwụ ụgwọ nwoke na nwanyị, na nsogbu ndị ọzọ gbasara ụmụ nwanyị ebe a na-eji ahịrịokwu ahụ 'ọ bụghị ụmụ nwoke niile' mee ka echiche pụọ na isiokwu ndị a

Hashtag #NotAllMen malitere dị ka okwu n'etiti ndị na-akwado ikike ụmụ nwoke (MRAs) eji meghachi omume na mkparịta ụka nke ha hụrụ dị ka igosi ụmụ nwoke niile dị ka ndị na-asọ oyi ma ọ bụ ndị na-emetọ mmekọahụ
Okwu ahụ bụ 'ọ bụghị ụmụ nwoke niile dị ka nke ahụ' ejirila ya mee ihe n'ịntanetị kemgbe etiti 2000 dị ka ihe nchebe zuru oke nke ụmụ nwoke

[lower-alpha 1] Jess Zimmerman na-ede na tupu 2013, 'ọ bụghị ụmụ nwoke niile' anọghị na mkparịta ụka banyere usoro nkwụsị na-ewu ewu nke a na-eji na nzaghachi maka okwu ụmụ nwanyị; n'ọnọdụ ya bụ ahịrịokwu ndị dị ka “‘ kee maka ụmụ nwoke?' na 'patriarchy na-ewute ụmụ nwoke' - na-atọ ụtọ maka itinye, ọ bụghị maka nnwere onwe
Okwu a mèchàrà bụrụ ihe eji mee ihe dị ka ihe na-atọ ọchị nke mmeghachi omume nchebe nke ụmụ nwoke
McKinney na-ede na ahịrịokwu ahụ 'ndị feminists ejirila ya mee ihe ma ghọọ ihe a na-eme nke pụtara iji gosipụta njupụta ya na okwukwe ọjọọ
Okwu a gbasara n'ime afọ 2013 site na tweet satirical nke Shafiqah Hudson dere

N'ime afọ 2014, otu peeji nke Tumblr gosipụtara ihe oyiyi nke a gbakwunyere okwu okwu ahụ bụ 'ọ bụghị ụmụ nwoke niile' na shark si Jaws, chestburster si Alien, na ọtụtụ ihe nkiri ndị ọzọ; na Twitter, agbakwunyere okwu ahụ na ihe oyiyi nke nwoke Kool-Aid na-akụda mgbidi

N'otu afọ ahụ, onye na-ese ihe bụ Matt Lubchansky mepụtara webcomic na agwa 'Not-All-Man', nke 'onye na-agbachitere ndị na-agbachitere' na olu maka ndị na-agbawa windo iko iji kwụsị nwanyị nwere ntutu pink na-acha odo odo na-eme mkpesa banyere ụmụ nwoke
Emeghariri ihe ọchị ahụ ma na-edegharị ya 'ọtụtụ puku ugboro' dị ka Zimmerman si kwuo, ndị ama ama gụnyere Wil Wheaton, Paul F
Tompkins, Matt Fraction, na John Scalzi
Memes ndị ọzọ metụtara #NotAllMen gụnyere ntụgharị aka na Aquaman, Adventure Time, na Magic The Gathering

#NotAllMen bụbu hashtag Twitter nke onye ọrụ Twitter Sassycrass mepụtara tupu igbu Isla Vista n'afọ 2014, mana ọ nwetara nkwado ọzọ mgbe ihe omume ahụ gasịrị, maka ịkpọasị megide ụmụ nwanyị ndí ogbu ọchụ, Elliot Rodger gosipụtara (ọ bụ ezie na ọ bụ naanị mmadụ abụọ n'ime mmadụ isii ahụ nwụrụ anwụ bụ ụmụ nwanyị)

Na nzaghachi na hashtag #NotAllMen, onye ọrụ Twitter a na-amaghị aha mepụtara hashtag #YesAllWomen, iji gosipụta na ụmụ nwanyị niile na-emetụta mmekọahụ na misogyny, n'agbanyeghị na ọ bụghị ụmụ nwoke niile na-ahụ maka mmekọahụ
Ụmụ nwanyị jiri hashtag a mepụtara ọhụrụ mee ihe ngwa ngwa na mgbasa ozi ọha na eze iji kesaa ahụmịhe ha nke ịkpa ókè na mwakpo mmekọahụ
N'ịgbaso ogbugbu ahụ, a kọwara ọrụ Intanet nke onye mwakpo ahụ dị ka nke na-asọ oyi, a kpọkwara ịkpọasị ụmụ nwanyị asị dị ka ihe kpatara ogbugbu ahụ
N'ime ógè ogbugbu ndị ahụ, ụfọdụ ndị ọrụ Twitter gosipụtara eziokwu ahụ bụ na 'ọ bụghị mmadụ niile' dị ka nke a, ma ọ bụ ga-eme mpụ dị otú ahụ
Mgbe akụkọ banyere mmetọ ọtụtụ mmadụ na-eme na ememe Bengaluru New Year's Eve nke India, #NotAllMen bidoro na Twitter
O mere ka ụmụ nwanyị nwee mmeghachi omume iwe, ọtụtụ ụmụ nwanyị India na ụmụ nwanyị na-akatọ hashtag ahụ mgbe ha na-azaghachi na hashtag nke ha #YesAllWomen
Not Gay Sex Between Straight White Men bụ akwụkwọ Jane Ward dere n'afọ puku iri ise, ebe onye edemede ahụ kọwapụtara ihe omume nke ndị ọcha na-achọ mmekọahụ ya na ụmụ nwoke ibe ha ọ bụla, maọbụ abụọ

Onye e dere ede a bu Ward na-atụle omenala ndị dịka 'ịgagharị enyí', emume njikọ nwoke maọbụ nwanyị nke o kọwara dịka nke a maara ama n'usoro Gris' ebe 'ndi mmadụ ji penis onye ahụ jide ya bù penis wee nwee mkpọnwụ aka ukwuu ya n'ọnụ nwa okorobịa nọ n'ihu ha'
Omenala ndị dị otú ahụ nwere ike inye aka n'ịchịkọta ìgwè maọbụ otu ọnụ na ịnye mmetụta nke ịbụ onye
A pụkwara inweta nke a site na akara ebighi ebi n'ụdị egbugbu maọbụ ụdị

N'adịghị ka akụkụ ndị a nke hazing, ọ pụkwara ịghọ ihe na-emerụ ahụ maọbụ ọbụna mmegbu (gụnyere mkparị mmekọahụ), Ward chọpụtakwara mkpali nwere ike iduga ụmụ okorobịa ịchọ ịchịkwa onwe ya n'elu ndị ọzọ n'ụzọ dị njọ

Ihe atụ ndị ọzọ nke ya bù mmekọrịta mmekọahụ n'etiti ụmụ nwoke na-enwe mmasị heterosexual nyochara gụnyere okirikiri, ụmụ nwanyị kwụ ọtọ mgbasa ozi onlaini chọrọ ka ha soro ụmụ mmadụ ọcha mee ihe omume masturbation, yana 'akụkọ ogologo oge zoro ezo banyere ụmụ nwoke nkịtị ugboro mgbe niile maka ịmekọrịta onwe onye'

Ward na-enyocha ebumnuche nke ndị ikom a nakwa otu ha si mee ka omume ha kwekọọ n'ọdịdị nwoke maọbụ nwaanyị ibe ya n'ọnọdụ dị iche iche, nke gụnyere omenala ịbanye mu obodo ọhụrụ na 'ịhụnanya' ọnọdụ mmadụ dịka ụlọ mkpọrọ na agha
Akwụkwọ ahụ gosipụtara ihe ndị sitere na mgbasa ozi onwe onye nke Craigslist, ma kọwaa ọtụtụ ebumnuche mere ụmụ nwoke nwere ike ịchọ ya bù mmekọahụ n'ebe obibi ha nọ
Okwu ahụ bụ 'bro-job' (nke a na-akpọ okwu ndị dị ka bro ya na 'blowJob') na-ezo aka n'inwe mmekọahụ n'etiti ụmụ nwoke abụọ kwụ ọtọ nke na-abụkarị ezigbo enyi
Ward na-ekwupụta echiche ahụ bụ na 'ọrụ mkpuchi' abụghị ihe ngosi nke nwoke n'ezie, kama ọ bụ ụzọ maka ndị ikom nkịtị iji chọpụta njirimara mmekọahụ ha
N'agbanyeghị na a kwadoro ya ka ọ chepụtara okwu ahụ bụ bro-job, onye e seré ese a bu Ward mere ihe doo anya

Nothando 'Vivo' Vilakazi (amụrụ n'abalị iri abụọ na asatọ n'ọnwa Ọktoba n'afọ 1988) bụ onye na-agba bọọlụ na South Afrika nke na-agbachitere otu egwuregwu Spanish Primera División EdF Logroño na otu ụmụ nwanyị South Africa
A mụrụ Nothando Vilakazi na Middelburg, South Afrika, na 28 Ọktoba 1988
Ọ gbara bọọlụ maka otu ụmụ nwoke dị n'agbata afọ 9 na 14, mgbe ọ malitere iso ụmụ agbọghọ na-egwuri egwu
Mgbe ọ dị afọ iri na asaa, ọ malitere ịgba bọọlụ na Sasol League maka otu Highlanders
Ọ gụsịrị akwụkwọ na TuksSport High School, nke jikọtara ya na Mahadum Pretoria's High Performance Centre, nke a họpụtara ya mgbe ọ na-anọchite anya Mpumalanga na asọmpi
Vilakazi gbara bọọlụ maka Palace Super Falcons, ebe ọ gbara bọọọọlụ mbụ maka Moroka Swallows
N'egwuregwu bọọlụ, a na-akpọ ya 'Vivo'
O mere nke mbụ ya na mba ụwa maka otu egwuregwu bọọlụ ụmụ nwanyị nke mba South Afrika megide Ghana na 2007
Vilakazi abụwo ihe a na-ahụkarị n'òtù ahụ dịka Vera Pauw na-achịkwa ha
Vilakazi so n'òtù ndị na-agba ọsọ na 2012 African Women's Championship
Dị ka akụkụ nke ndị otu South Afrika, ọ gbara bọọlụ na 2012 Summer Olympics na London, United Kingdom, na 2016 Summer Olympics na Rio de Janeiro, Brazil
Ọ gbara bọọlụ n'egwuregwu isii niile nke South Africa na asọmpi 2016
Vilakazi gara n'ihu na-apụta na ndị otu maka mba ahụ na-esote mgbanwe na njikwa nke Desiree Ellis mgbe egwuregwu Olimpik gasịrị
Àtụ Navboxes colour
Noufissa Benchehida (a mụrụ n'abalị iri abụọ na atọ n'ọnwa Ọktoba n'afọ 1975) bụ onye France na-eme ihe nkiri na Morocco
A mụrụ Benchehida na Morocco n'afọ 1975 na Oujda
Ọ zụlitere mmasị maka ihe nkiri na nwata
Ọ gụrụ akwụkwọ na Cours Florent na Paris
Benchehida nwetara diplọma na ihe nkiri na Conservatory nke Casablanca
Ọ gakwara ụlọ akwụkwọ dị elu nke ụlọ oriri na ọṅụṅụ na njem nleta na Montpellier
Benchehida mere ihe nkiri mbụ ya n'afọ 2004, na Syriana nke Stephane Cagan duziri
Ọ ghọrọ onye a ma ama na-eme ka onye uwe ojii Zineb Hejjami na usoro TV El kadia n'afọ 2006
O kwuru na ọ masịrị ya n'ọrụ ahụ mana ọ chọghị ịghọ onye na-eme ihe nkiri na-eme ka ndị uwe ojii, ọ chọkwara ịpụta na ihe nkiri
N'afọ 2006, ọ nọ na usoro ihe nkiri TV nke Siria Moulouk Attawaif
N'afọ 2011, Benchehida nwere ọrụ dị mkpa dịka nwanyị na-eme mkpọsa maka ụmụ nwanyị a na-erigbu na Agadir Bombay, nke Myriam Bakir duziri
N'afọ 2015, o mere ihe nkiri Aida
N'afọ 2016, Benchehida pụtara na A la recherche du pouvoir perdu ('Na Search of Lost Power'), nke Mohammed Ahed Bensouda duziri
Ọ gosipụtara Ilham, onye na-agụ egwú cabaret nke na-eso onye ọchịagha lara ezumike nká
Ọrụ ya mere ka ọ nata Golden Sotigui na Sotigui Awards nke afọ 20 E nyekwara Benchehida ihe nrite Best Actress na Panafrican Film and Television Festival nke Ouagadougou
Benchehida na-asụ French, Arabic, na Bekee
Nouhaila Arif bụ onye si mba Morocco na-eme ihe nkiri
A maara ya nke ọma maka ọrụ ya na ihe nkiri Nabil Ayouch nke 2021 Casablanca Beats (French Haut et Fort), nke a họọrọ iji sọọ mpi maka Palme d'Or na 2021 Cannes Film Festival
Nouhaila Benzina (Àtụ Lang-ar; Amụrụ mmadụ 11 May 1998) bụ onye egwuregwu bọọlụ Moroccan nke na-egwu dị ka onye na-agbachitere maka Asfar na ndị otu mba ụwa
Benzina agbaala bọọlụ maka ASFAR na Morocco
Benzina emeela maka Morocco na ọkwa ndị na erubeghị afọ 20 na ndị okenye
Nour El-Sherif (Arabic; 28 Eprel 1946 - 11 Ọgọst 2015), a mụrụ Mohamad Geber Mohamad Abd Allah (Arabic) bụ onye Egypt a ma ama na-eme ihe nkiri
O nwere ihe nkiri isii na ndepụta ihe nkiri 100 kachasị elu nke Egypt
A mụrụ El-Sherif n'ógbè ndị ọrụ Sayeda Zainab na Cairo
El-Sherif lụrụ Poussi (1972X2006) ha nwere ụmụ nwanyị abụọ, Sarah na Mai
Ya na Poussi gbara alụkwaghịm n'afọ 2006 ma ha zukọtara na mbido 2015 n'oge nsogbu nke ọrịa ya
Ọ gbakwara bọọlụ tupu ọ họrọ ime ihe nkiri dịka ọrụ
A na-akpọ Nour El-Sherif mgbe ụfọdụ Nour El Cherif, Nour El -Cherif ma ọ bụ Nour Al-Sharif
Ọ nwụrụ n'abalị iri na otu n'ọnwa Ọgọstụ n'afọ 2015, na Cairo, Egypt
Nour El-Sherif nwụrụ site na ọrịa kansa akpa ume na Cairo mgbe ọ dị afọ 69 n'afọ 2015 mgbe ọ lụsịrị ọgụ siri ike na ọrịa ahụ
N'abalị iri abụọ na asatọ n'ọnwa Eprel 2021, Google mere emume ncheta ọmụmụ ya nke afọ iri asaa na ise na Google Doodle
Nour El Houda Bouregua (amụrụ 7, Mee 1992) bụ nwa agbọghọ Algeria na egwu volleyball
Ọ bụ otu n'ime ndị otu volleyball ụmụ nwanyị nke mba Algeria
O sonyere na 2015 FIVB Volleyball Ukwu ụwa Prix
N'ọkwa klọb ọ gbara bọọlụ maka WOC n'afọ 2015

Nour Imane Addi (Arabic ; amụrụ na 10 Junnu 1997) bụ onye Morocco na agba bọọlụ nke na agba dịka onye na agba ọsọ n'etiti etiti maka otu kọleji Amerika South Alabama Jaguars na otu ụmụ nwanyị nke Morocco
A mụrụ Addi ma zụlite ya na Oued Zem
Addi gara Mahadum nke South Alabama na United States
Addi agbaala bọọlụ maka ASFAR na Morocco
Addi emeela maka Morocco na ọkwa dị elu
Ntinye na nsonaazụ depụtara ihe mgbaru ọsọ Morocco nke mbụ
Noura Mint Seymali bụ onye Mauritania griot, onye na-agụ egwú nakwa onye na'ede egwu, na onye na-akpọ ngwá egwu
A mụrụ Noura Mint Seymali na Mauritania na nne na nna Dimi Mint Abba na Seymali Ould Ahmed Vall
Nne na nna abụọ ahụ bụ ndị egwu dị mkpa na Mauritania
Nna ya, Seymali, bụ onye Moorish na-ede egwu nke gbanwere ukwe mba Mauritania
Nne nne ya, Dimi, bụ otu n'ime ndị na-agụ egwú a ma ama na mba ya, a makwaara ya dị ka 'diva nke ọzara'
Mgbe ọ dị afọ iri na atọ, Noura malitere ide egwu maka nne ya, yana iso ya na-eme njem dị ka onye na-agụ egwu
Site n'aka ndị òtù egwu nke ezinụlọ ya, o nwere ike ịmara ardin, ụbọ akwara itoolu e debere maka ụmụ nwanyị, yana ime ka ụkwụ ya na-ede mmiri n'ụwa nke arụmọrụ
Mgbe ọ lụsịrị onye na-akpọ ụbọ akwara ya, Jeiche Ould Chighaly, Noura malitere iso ya na-akpọ agbamakwụkwọ
Site n'enyemaka nke di ya, ha guzobere òtù egwu mbụ ha n'afọ 2004
Mgbe a tọhapụrụ abọm abụọ n'ógbè ahụ, ha laghachiri na ụlọ ihe nkiri iji mepụta abọm mbụ zuru oke, Tzenni
E wepụtara abọm ahụ n`afọ 2014 site na Glitterbeat Records
Ìgwè ahụ na-aga n'ihu na-akpọ egwu na mmemme egwu gburugburu ụwa
A zụrụ Noura n'ịkpọ ardin, ngwá egwú ọdịnala Mauritania maka ụmụ nwanyị griots
Ọ na-ewere onwe ya na egwu ya dị ka ndị na-abụghị nke ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị
N'afọ 2018, Noura kwadoro otu egwu Malian Tuareg bụ Tinariwen n'oge njem ha na Mauritania, wee pụta na abọm ha n`afọ 2019 Amadjar
Noura Mint Seymali emeela ihe n'ọtụtụ ebe gburugburu ụwa kemgbe e guzobere òtù ha n`afọ 2004
Ụfọdụ n'ime emume ndị a ma ama ha mere bụ globalFEST dị na United States, Festival au Désert dị na Mali, na Hayy Festival dị na Egypt
Njikọ Noura Mint Seymali nke ụdị dị iche iche nke egwu Moorish na egwu pop enyewo ha nnukwu ikpo okwu nke ndị na-ege ntị
Òtù ya gụnyere Jeiche Ould Chighaly na guitar na tidinit, Ousmane Tour na bass, Matthew Tinari na drum, Ayniyana Chighaly n'olu nkwado na ardin, na Mayassa Hemed Vall na olu nkwado na ụda
Noura Mostafa Qadry, nke a maara nke ọma dị ka Noura, (amụrụ na June 18, 1954 dị ka Elweya Mostafa Mohamed Adry) bụ onye na-eme ihe nkiri Egypt lara ezumike nká
Ọ malitere ọrụ ya na ihe nkiri Egypt n'oge 1970s ma gaa n'ihu na-eme ihe nkiri ruo mgbe ọ lara ezumike nká na 1990s, ma na-eyi Hijab (Islamic Scarf), na-ebi ndụ okpukpe ugbu a
A mụrụ Noura na Cairo nye ndị nne na nna Ijipt na mpaghara Shubra
Ọ bụ nwanne nwanyị onye na-eme ihe nkiri bụ Poussi
Kemgbe afọ 1990, ọ jụrụ ọdịdị mgbasa ozi ọ bụla ma na-ebi ndụ dị jụụ dị ka onye Alakụba na-efe ofufe
Noureddine Daifallah (a mụrụ n'afọ 1960 na Marrakech ) bụ onye Morocco na-ede akwụkwọ
Ọ bụ onye nkuzi nke nka na Marrakech onye e gosipụtara ọrụ ya na Morocco, France, Italy na Portugal
Site na mmepụta ọhụrụ ya, ọ na-agbakwụnye mmetụ ọhụrụ na akwụkwọ ọdịnala Arabic

O meriri na Biennale de Turquie (International Commission for the Preservation of Cultural Heritage), Istanbul 1991, na Zémé Rencontre de la jeune Peinture Marocaine, Espace Wafa Bank, Casablanca 1991
Guggenheim Museum dị na New York nwetara ihe osise ya abụọ n'afọ 2002
ihe ngosi ọhụrụ nke uche ya meghere n'oge na-adịghị anya na London
Nouri Bouzid (amụrụ n'afọ 1945) bụ onye nduzi ihe nkiri na onye edemede ihe nkiri nke Tunisia
O duziri ihe nkiri asaa n'agbata afọ 1986 na afọ 2006
E gosipụtara ihe nkiri ya Man of Ashes na ngalaba 'Un Certain Regard' na 1986 Cannes Film Festival
Afọ atọ ka e mesịrị, e gosipụtara ihe nkiri ya Golden Horseshoes n'otu ngalaba ahụ na mmemme 1989
E gosipụtara Bouzid na ihe nkiri nke afọ 2009 banyere ahụmịhe ihe nkiri na ọdịbendị dị iche iche a na-akpọ Cinema Is Everywhere

Nouzha Skalli (amụrụ na Mee 25, na afọ 1950 na El Jadida, Morocco) bụ onye ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị Moroccan sitere na Party of Progress and Socialism onye jere ozi dị ka Minista nke Solidarity, Women, Family, and Social Development site na Ọktoba, na afọ 2007 ruo Jenụwarị, na afọ 2012 na gọọmentị Abbas El Fassi
Skalli nwetara akara ugo mmụta ya na ọgwụ na Mahadum Montpellier
Nouzha Skalli dere ọtụtụ isiokwu na ajụjụ ọnụ na akwụkwọ akụkọ mba na nke mba ọzọ
Àtụ Cabinet of Abbas El Fassi

Novemba bụ ọnwa nke iri na otu na penultimate na afo na Julian na Gregorian calendars, nke anọ na nke ikpeazụ n'ime ọnwa anọ nwere ogologo ụbọchị iri atọ na nke ise na nke ikpeazụ nke ọnwa ise ka ọ nwee ogologo ihe na-erughị ụbọchị 31
Novemba bụ ọnwa nke itoolu na kalenda Romulus c
750 BC
Nọvemba jigidere aha ya (site na Latin novem nke pụtara 'iteghete') mgbe agbakwunyere Jenụwarị na Febụwarị na kalenda Rome mpo777
Nọvemba bụ ọnwa mbubreyo n'oge opupu ihe ubi na mpaghara ndịda na ngwụcha mgbụsị akwụkwọ na Northern Hemisphere
Ya mere, Nọvemba na South Hemisphere bụ oge nke ọnwa Mee na Northern Hemisphere na vice versa
Na Rome oge ochie, e mere Ludi Plebeii site na Nọvemba 4–17, Epulum Jovis mere na Nọvemba 13 na ememe Brumalia malitere na Nọvemba 24
Ụbọchị ndị a adabaghị na kalenda Gregorian nke oge a
Ndị Anglo-Saxon kpọrọ Nọvemba dị ka Blōtmọnaþ
Brumaire na Frimaire bụ ọnwa ndị November dabara na kalenda French Republican
1 Novemba bu ubochi nke 1st (nke mbụ) na onwa ana kpo Novemba
Na Gregorian calender, 1 Novemba bu ubochi nke 305th (306th na afo nke ana-kpo leap year) na afo
Anyi nwere agugu ubochi 60 du mgbe afo na agwu
10 Novemba bu ubochi nke 10th (nke iri) na onwa ana kpo Novemba
Na Gregorian calender, 10 Novemba bu ubochi nke 314th (315th na afo nke ana-kpo leap year) na afo
Anyi nwere agugu ubochi 51 du mgbe afo na agwu

Novemba bụ ọnwa nke iri na otu na penultimate na afo na Julian na Gregorian calendars, nke anọ na nke ikpeazụ n'ime ọnwa anọ nwere ogologo ụbọchị iri atọ na nke ise na nke ikpeazụ nke ọnwa ise ka ọ nwee ogologo ihe na-erughị ụbọchị 31
Novemba bụ ọnwa nke itoolu na kalenda Romulus c
750 BC
Nọvemba jigidere aha ya (site na Latin novem nke pụtara 'iteghete') mgbe agbakwunyere Jenụwarị na Febụwarị na kalenda Rome mpo777
Nọvemba bụ ọnwa mbubreyo n'oge opupu ihe ubi na mpaghara ndịda na ngwụcha mgbụsị akwụkwọ na Northern Hemisphere
Ya mere, Nọvemba na South Hemisphere bụ oge nke ọnwa Mee na Northern Hemisphere na vice versa
Na Rome oge ochie, e mere Ludi Plebeii site na Nọvemba 4–17, Epulum Jovis mere na Nọvemba 13 na ememe Brumalia malitere na Nọvemba 24
Ụbọchị ndị a adabaghị na kalenda Gregorian nke oge a
Ndị Anglo-Saxon kpọrọ Nọvemba dị ka Blōtmọnaþ
Brumaire na Frimaire bụ ọnwa ndị November dabara na kalenda French Republican
