Ọktoba 1 bụ ihe nkiri 2014 Nigerian ihe nkiri mkpali obi Ihe gbasara ahụike uche gbara ọchịchịrị nke Tunde Babalola dere, nke Kunle Afolayan mebere ma duzie ya
Ọ gosiputara Sadiq Daba, Kayode Olaiya, David Bailie, Kehinde Bankole, Kanayo O
Kanayo, Fabian Adeoye Lojede, Nick Rhys, Kunle Afolayan, Femi Adebayo, Bimbo Manuel, Ibrahim Chatta and introducing Demola Adedoyin; ọ na-egosipụtakwa ọdịdị pụrụ iche site na Deola Sagoe
ma dozie ihe omimi ahụ tupu ebulie ọkọlọtọ Naijiria na October 1, ụbọchị nnwere onwe Naijiria

Onye isi ihe nkiri ahụ, Dan Waziri, nyere ihe ịma aka karịsịa n'oge nkedo, ebe onye nduzi nwere ọdịdị pụrụ iche ọ chọrọ maka agwa ahụ; Emechara họrọ Daba maka ọrụ ahụ mgbe enyochachara nyocha, wee bụrụ nlọghachi ya na nnukwu onyonyo mgbe ihe karịrị afọ iri nke mere na-anọghị na ụlọ ọrụihr nkiri
A gbara ya na Legọs na Ondo steeti ihe karịrị ụbọchị iri anọ site na iji RED Cameras, ka ọnwa anọ gachara

Emepụta imepụta ihe nkiri ahụ site na Pat Nebo, onye sokwala Afolayan rụkọọ ọrụ n'ọrụ ihe nkiri ya gara aga; ya na ndị otu ya mere ihe fọrọ nke nta ka ọ bụrụ ọkara nke ihe eji eme ihe na fim ahụ, ebe ihe ndị ọzọ dị ka ihe nkiri telivishọn sitere na 1950, Nkenke egbe na ụgbọ ala ochie, Ka a nwetara ma megharịa maka ihe nkiri ahụ
Golden Effects sokwa Haute Couture rụkọọ ọrụ iji nye ejiji a yiri na fim ahụ

Mgbe ọtụtụ ntọhapụ yigharịrị, ihe nkiri ahụ nwere ọtụtụ ihe ngosi pụrụ iche ma mesịa malite na 28 September 2014; mmalite ya nke akpọrọ 60s', chọrọ ndị ọbịa ka ha jiri ejiji na edozi isi sitere na 1960s
Ihe ngosi mbụ ahụ nyekwara nlegharị anya nke setịpụ, ma gosipụtakwa ihe eji eme ihe na ihe eji eme ihe nkiri

A zutere ihe nkiri ahụ na nnabata dị oke egwu dị mma, -etokarị maka mmepụta ya, ihe nkiri sinima na nyocha nke isiokwu gụnyere agbụrụ, Western imperialism, pedophilia, nwoke idina nwoke, Nigeria jikọrọ ọnụ, na ime ka njikọ siri ike n'etiti omenala ọdịda anyanwụ na ihe kpatara ọgụ Boko Haram nke oge a
Onye nyocha Danladi Waziri ( Sadiq Daba ) na-akpọ ndị agha Briten na-achị ka o wepụta akwụkwọ nke nchoputa ya banyere usoro igbu ọchụ na-amaghị nwoke nke mere na Akote
Mgbe o rutere n'ámá obodo, Danladi hụrụ ka ndị obodo na-eme ememe onye na-agba ịnyịnya, bụ onye Afonja mechara mara na ọ bụ Prince Aderopo (Demola Adedoyin)
Ọ ka si n’obodo ahụ lọta, dị ka onye mbụ gụsịrị akwụkwọ na mahadum n’obodo ahụ
Danladi na-achọpụta myirịta anụ ahụ na ọnọdụ ọnọdụ n'ime ụmụ agbọghọ na-amaghị nwoke nwụrụ anwụ, ma chepụta na ọ ga-abụrịrị igbu mmadụ
Danladi na Afonja gara n'ihu na nyocha ha; Ndị ọrụ ahụ gbara Agbekoya ( Kunle Afolayan ) ajụjụ ọnụ, onye bụ onye nwe ugbo ebe e gburu nwanyu ahụ
Agbekoya na-agọnarị ihe ọ bụla gbasara ihe omume butere igbu mmadụ ma emesịa tọhapụ ya site n'aka onye nleba anya Waziri n'ihi ihe mgbochi asụsụ dị n'etiti ha
Ndị uwe ojii megidere ọchịchọ ya ikwu eziokwu banyere onye bụ ezigbo onye na-egbu ya ma na-agwa ya ka ọ ghara ịgwa onye ọ bụla banyere ya
Ọ na-ala azụ ekweta ihe ha na-arịọ maka nnwere onwe udo
Kunle Afolayan chọrọ akụkọ e debere n'obere obodo; o mere ka ndị ode akwụkwọ nyefe edemede tupu ya ezute Tunde Babalola bụ onye mechara dee edemede maka ihe nkiri ahụ
Edere edemede ahụ na mbụ ya na aha Dust, ọkachasị n'ihi na edobere akụkọ ahụ n'obodo nwere uzuzu nke ukwuu
N'agbanyeghị na Afolayan achọghị ịrụ nnukwu ọrụ mmefu ego n'oge ahụ, ọ maara na o nweghị nhọrọ, ebe ọ chọrọ ịkọwa ọhụụ onye edemede nke ọma n'ihi na ọ bụ 'ihe nkiri mba nke nwere mmasị zuru ụwa ọnụ'
O kwuputara na akụkọ nke October 1 masịrị ya n'ihi na ọ bụ akwụkwọ mpempe akwụkwọ, nke ọ na-emetụbeghị mbụ na 'ọ dịkwa mkpa maka ọnọdụ Naijiria dị ugbu a'
N'ihi ya, o kpebiri inyocha ihe nkiri ahụ site n'ịgbakwụnye echiche nke ya na edemede ndị ọzọ nke edemede ahụ

N'ajụjụ ọnụ, Afolayan mere ka ọ pụta ìhè na October 1 abụghị naanị ihe nkiri ntụrụndụ, kamakwa ọ na-enye nkọwa 'Maka ndị agadi, karịsịa ndị bụ akụkụ nke nnwere onwe, ha ga-enwe ike ịhụ onwe ha na ihe nkiri a
Maka ndị na-eto eto ọ bụ ikpo okwu maka ọtụtụ n'ime ha na-amaghị akụkọ Naijiria' O kwukwara na 'Anyị chọrọ ka ndị na-eto eto mara ebe anyị si na ndị okenye mara ma anyị na-aga n'ụzọ ziri ezi'
Dị ka Afolayan si kwuo, ekwesịrị ịkpachapụ anya n'oge ihe nkedo n'ihi na ọ bụ otu n'ime isi ihe nwere ike ịme ma ọ bụ mebie ihe nkiri dị ka October 1
Nleta ihe nkiri ahụ nke mere na 6 June 2013 na Golden Effects Studios dị n'Ikeja dekọrọ ihe karịrị mmadụ 1000 bịara
Kunle Afolayan dị ka n'ihe nkiri ya gara aga e gosiri na October 1 dị ka onye ọrụ ugbo nke aha ya bụ Agbekoya
Maka ọrụ ya, ọ ga-ahapụ ntutu ya ruo oge ụfọdụ ka o wee hapụ ya ka ọ too
O kwukwara na mkparịtaụka ya na Toni Kan na Peju Akande na Africa Magic na-agwakwa ụfọdụ ndị na-eme ihe nkiri ka ha hapụ ntutu na ajị ha ihe dị ka otu afọ maka ihe nkiri a

Ise ihe nkiri a malitere na ochie Railway Quarters dị na Lagos ebe ha si na Ilara-Mokin, obere obodo dị na Ondo State; Onye nduzi ya na ụfọdụ ndị ọrụ na ndị ọzọ gara Ilara-Mokin ka ha chọọ ebe a ga ese ihe nkiri a na May 2013
Emekwara ihe nkiri na Federal College of Agriculture, Akure na obere obodo gbara agbata obi gburugburu Akure
Toyota Nigeria nyere ụgbọ njem maka ihe nkedo, ndị ọrụ na ịse ihe nkiri n'oge niile a na-ese foto
Ọ nyekwara ebe obibi maka nkedo na ndị ọrụ ụgbọ mmiri mgbe ha na-agbapụ na Ilara-Mokin, nke bụ obodo nke onye isi oche nke ụlọ ọrụ ahụ
Ejiri igwefoto RED gbaa ihe nkiri aE wepụrụ ihe nrụpụta ọgbara ọhụrụ ewepụtara n'oge ise foto bụ isi n'usoro dijitalụ n'oge nrụpụta
Ihe fọrọ nke nta ka ọ bụrụ ọkara nke ihe eji eme ihe na October 1 site na Pat Nebo, onye nduzi nkà na ndị otu ya
A na-esikwa na United States na United Kingdom weta ihe nkwado, gụnyere ihe onyonyo na nkenke egbe si na afọ iri ise dịka ha adịghị na Nigeria

Mgbe o degara ndị ọrụ uwe ojii Naịjirịa ọtụtụ akwụkwọ ozi ka ha rịọ maka ngwa agha na ihe eji eme ihe ochie, a chọpụtara na ngalaba ahụ edebeghị ihe ochie ya, nke mere na ebibiela ọtụtụ ihe ndị mere eme
Enweghị ụgbọ ala Toyota na Naijiria n'ime afọ iri isii; nke a mere ka Toyota Nigeria ghara inye ihe eji eme ihe nkiri
Ụfọdụ ụgbọ ala ochie ndị e ji mee ihe nkiri bụ ndị e nwetara na Naijiria; Ọtụtụ n'ime ha emezigharịrị maka ndị nwe ya ka e were ha mee ihe na fim ahụ
A na-edobe ihe eji eme ihe na fim ahụ ugbu a na Golden Effects Studios ma nwee ike ịgbazite ndị na-ese ihe nkiri ndị ọzọ nwere ike ịchọ ha n'ọdịnihu
E nwekwara ihe ngosi na mmalite nke ihe nkiri ahụ na-egosipụta ihe ochie eji eme ihe na October 1
N'oge ịse foto nke October 1, Mmalite foto na-mgbe niile wepụtara na ọha site na fim si na-elekọta mmadụ media peeji nke
E wepụtara akwụkwọ mmado mbụ maka ihe nkiri a na 9 June 2013, bụ nke na-egosi nchikota nke ọkọlọtọ Naijiria na Britain nke obodo oge ochie na-akwado

Na 11 Septemba 2013, Golden Effects kpugheere akwụkwọ mmado agwa maka ihe nkiri ahụ n'ụlọ ọrụ Toyota dị na Lagos; Ndị na-eme ihe na mmemme ahụ gụnyere onye isi ụlọ ọrụ Toyota Nigeria na Lagos State Secretary Permanent Secretary nke ọrụ pụrụ iche

E wepụtara ụgbọala na-adọkpụ nke mbụ nke ihe nkiri ahụ na 1 Ọktoba 2013, ụbọchị nnwere onwe nke iri ise na atọ nke Naijiria, ụbọchị ebidobere ka e wepụta ihe nkiri ahụ n'onwe ya; mgbasa ozi ihe nkiri a nwetara ihe nrite 'Best Fiction Film Trailer' na 2013 International Movie Trailers Festival Awards
A tọhapụrụ ihe nkiri na ihe ngosi ihe nkiri na YouTube na 27 Ọgọst 2014
October 1 pụtara na EXPO Center, Eko Hotel and Suites na 28 Septemba 2014; isiokwu nke mmemme ahụ bụ '60s, n'ihi ya, ọtụtụ ndị ama ama jiri ejiji ndị mgbe ochie
E nwere ihe ngosi nka na ngosi izizi, nke na-enye njem nleta nke setịpụ, ma gosipụtakwa uwe na ihe eji eme ihe nkiri
A na-agbasakwa mmemme na kapeeti uhie na ọwa Africa Magic DStv
Ebu ụzọ wepụta ihe nkiri a na sinima ahọpụtara na 1 Ọktoba 2014, ma mee ka sinima bulite ọnụ ahịa tiketi ha
Ọ gara na mwepụta izugbe na 3 October 2014
A na-enyocha October 1 na 2014 Cultural Confidence, New York na 11 October 2014; ahọpụtara ya n'ihu ọha maka 2014 Africa International Film Festival, ebe a kọrọ na a na-ere tiketi mgbe niile
Emere ihe nkiri a na United Kingdom na 3 November 2014 na 2014 Film Africa Festival na London
October 1 meghekwara izu ihe nkiri Africa nke anọ na Gris
Nollywood Reinvented kwadoro ihe nkiri ahụ 72% wee too ya maka echiche nganga ọ na-ahapụ onye na-ekiri ya na njedebe

Toni Kan nke ThisDay toro sinima ya, akụkọ na nkedo ya, kwubiri na ' October 1 na- akpalite ọtụtụ ajụjụ ma na-enye azịza ole na ole ma ihe na-enweghị mgbagha bụ na na njedebe nke ihe nkiri ahụ mgbe e wepụrụ foto nke Queen, Kunle
Afolayan, nwa Ade Love, echiri eze”
Onyeka Nwelue nke akwụkwọ akụkọ The Trent, toro ụdị nka nke ihe nkiri ahụ, ozi ndị dị nro ya, wee kwubie “Mazi Afolayan na-etinye eziokwu n'ime akụkọ ifo iji mepụta ọṅụ ebighị ebi n'ọrụ a
Ọ bụghị onye na-atụ egwu ịgagharị, ọ na-eme ya nke ọma
Ọ na-ewe oge iji kee ihe
Ọ na-ewepụta oge iji ghọta ndị ọ na-eme ihe nkiri
N'agbanyeghị otú Ọktọba 1 nwere ọgụgụ isi na-akpali akpali, onye ọ bụla nwere ike ịnụ ụtọ ya

N'ikpeazụ, mmadụ nwere ike ikwu n'ụzọ dị mfe, Mazị Afolayan nke October 1 bụ maka onye ọ bụla hụrụ nnukwu ihe nkiri n'anya' Sodas na Popcorn, toro usoro mmepụta ya, ihe ngosi sitere n'aka ndị na-eme ihe nkiri, iji ejiji, ma kọwaakwa sinima dị ka 'ọrụ nka kacha mma n'akụkọ ihe mere eme cinematic Nigeria'

Ọ jara ihe nkiri ahụ mma maka nlebara anya ya na nkọwa wee kwubie 'O doro anya na Afolayan nwere ọhụụ doro anya nke ihe ọ zubere ime ma kpalie ndị na-eme ihe nkiri ya iji nye ọrụ kacha mma ị ga-atụ anya n'aka ha
Otú ọ dị, ebube nke ihe nkiri ahụ dị n'eziokwu na akụkọ ahụ adịghị atụ egwu ịga ebe ahụ nyochaa isiokwu ndị na-adịghị agafe agafe nke okpukpe, agbụrụ agbụrụ, nrụrụ aka, mmegbu, ihe mgbu na ihe ùgwù
Ị nwere ike ilele nlebanya dị oke egwu na YouTube mmejọ 12 pụtara ìhè na October 1 site n'aka Dangambo, Hassan
October 1 nwere nnukwu ihe ịga nke ọma na Box Office
O nwetara ihe ruru nde ₦60 na sinima, ka ọ bụrụ ihe nkiri Naịjirịa nke abụọ na-akpata ego na sinima Naijiria n'oge ewepụtara ya, jikọtara ya na Half of a Yellow Sun

N’ihe dị ka n’ọnwa Jenụwarị afọ 2015, akwụkwọ akụkọ bụ́ The Nation na- eme atụmatụ na October 1 enwetawo ihe karịrị nde ₦140, bụ́ mgbe e ji ego a na-enweta n’ụlọ ọrụ n’ụlọ ọrụ chịkọta ihe ndị e nwetara site n’ọtụtụ nyocha pụrụ iche ya
N'ajụjụ ọnụ ya na Nigerian Entertainment Today na Febụwarị 2015, Afolayan kwukwara na ihe nkiri ahụ enwetala ihe karịrị nde ₦100 n'ime ọnwa isii
Sadiq Daba na N'ajụjụ ọnụ kwuru, sị 'Ọ [October 1] na-agafe na Nigeria dum wee laghachi n'oge ọchịchị anyị
Ọ na-ekwu maka mmekọrịta agbụrụ anyị na ọtụtụ ndị ọzọ'
￼￼Nke a na-eme ka uKoya jide kwere na 'n'ebe ọdịda anyanwụ mmụta bụ ihe ọjọọ', a slogan dị ka biko Haram
Tunde Babalola, onye odee edemede, Achoro m i banye Isiokwu ndị mmadụ achọghị ikwu
A chorom ede ihe ndị mmadụ chọrọ ikwu

Ọ kara m mma ede ihe dị mgbasara ise okwu ma bụrụ ihe ndị madụ ga na-eji okwu ya na ọtụtụ izu uka Victor Akande nke akwụkwọ akụkọ bụ́ The Nation na-ekwu, sị “October 1 depụtara ụzọ ụmụ okorobịa abụọ na-akpasu usoro ihe si eme (agụmakwụkwọ Western ) ) ha na-atụ anya na ọ ga-eme ka ha bụrụ ezigbo mmadụ, mana nke na-emecha mebie nzụlite ọdịnala ha; Nke ka njọ, site n'aka ndị nwoke nwere otu nwoke na nwanyị'ha na-atụ anya na ọ ga-eme ka ha bụrụ ezigbo mmadụ, mana nke na-emecha mebie nzụlite omenala ha; Nke ka njọ, site n'aka ndị nwoke nwere otu nwoke'
N'ọnwa Disemba 2014, ewepụtara October 1 na ọrụ DStv Explora Video-na-achọ
Na Jenụwarị 2015, a mara ọkwa na Netflix enwetala ikike nkesa n'ịntanetị zuru ụwa ọnụ maka ihe nkiri ahụ ma echere na ọ ga-amalite mpụta mbụ n'elu ikpo okwu na Machị 2015

Ọ gbaburu klọb na South Africa, Finland na Spain, tupu ọ banye na Glasgow City na 2021
O mere egwuregwu izizi ya na South Africa n'afọ 2014 ma bụrụ onye otu ha na 2019 FIFA Women's World Cup squad
A mụrụ ya na Democratic Republic of Congo, ya na ezinụlọ ya rutere South Africa dị ka ndị gbara ọsọ ndụ

Mgbe ọ dị afọ atọ, ezinụlọ ya hapụrụ mba ahụ n'ihi ọgba aghara wee gaa Angola dị ka ndị gbara ọsọ ndụ, tupu ha agaa Cape Town na South Africa n'afọ sochirinụ
Nna Fulutudilu enweghị ike ịchọta ọrụ na South Africa ma mesịa laghachi Angola, mana ọ hapụrụ ya ebe ahụ n'ihi na-ochere na ọ ga-enwe ọdịnihu ka mma n'ebe ahụ

Ndị odeakwụkwọ ukwu ruo ugbu a bụ;
Ọrụ iwu nke Nzukọ Ndị Omeiwu na-adụ ndị otu na ndị otu ọdụ n'ihe gbasara iwu Europe, na-enyere aka n'ịdepụta iwu na ịnọchite anya Nzukọ Ndị Isi na Ụlọikpe
Directorate-General for the Presidency (DG PRES) na-ahazi nnọkọ zuru ezu na maka ọrụ ndị ọzọ gụnyere usoro, akwụkwọ ozi, ndebanye aha, ebe nchekwa na nchekwa
Directorate-General for Internal Policies (DG IPOL) na-ahụ maka inyere ọrụ nke kọmitii ndị omeiwu na ndị isi oche ha aka yana ịhazi mmekọrịta na imekọ ihe ọnụ na ụlọ ọrụ ndị ọzọ na ndị omeiwu mba
DG na-enyekwa ndị otu na kọmitii ozi ọkachamara na nyocha
Nke a bụ ọrụ nke Ngalaba Iwu ndị na-emepụta ọmụmụ ihe, mgbe a rịọrọ ha, na isiokwu maka ndị otu
Otu ngalaba iwu a kapịrị ọnụ bụ STOA ngalaba nyocha nke Science and Technology Options nke na-adụ kọmitii na ndị otu ọdụ na isiokwu ndị dị otú ahụ

Directorate-General for External Policies (DG EXPO) na-ahụ maka inyere ndị nnọchi anya, kọmitii na ndị isi oche ha aka n'ọrụ yana ịhazi mmekọrịta na imekọ ihe ọnụ na ụlọ ọrụ ndị ọzọ, ndị omeiwu mba na ndị mba ọzọ
Ọ bụkwa ọkara nke odeakwụkwọ nke ACP-EU Joint Parliamentary Assembly, Euro-Mediterranean Parliamentary Assembly

Nke a bụ ọrụ nke Ngalaba Iwu nke na-emepụta ọmụmụ, mgbe a rịọrọ ya, na isiokwu maka ndị otu

Odia Ofeimun (amụrụ na ọnwa iri na isii Machị n'afọ otu puku narị iteolu na iri ise) bụ onye Naijiria na-ede uri na onye na-ese okwu, onye dere ọtụtụ mpịakọta nke uri, akwụkwọ edemede ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị na ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị ọdịbendị, yana onye nchịkọta akụkọ nke akwụkwọ abụọ dị mkpa nke uri Naijiria
A sụgharịrị ọrụ ya n'ọtụtụ ebe ma sụgharịa ya ma gụọ ma mee uri ya na mba ụwa
A mụrụ Odia Ofeimun na Iruekpen-Ekpoma, Edo Steeti, Naijiria, n'afọ otu puku narị iteolu na iri ise

Ọ rụrụ ọrụ dị ka onye nta akụkọ akụkọ, onye ọrụ ụlọ ọrụ na onye ọrụ gọọmentị tupu ọ mụọ sayensị ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị na Mahadum Ibadan, ebe uri ya nwetara ihe nrite mbụ na asọmpi Mahadum nke n'afọ otu puku narị iteolu na iri asaa na ise
N'afọ ahụ, ọrụ ya pụtara na akwụkwọ akụkọ Poems of Black Africa, nke Wole Soyinka dezigharịrị

Ofeimun rụkwara ọrụ dị ka onye nchịkwa na Federal Public Service Commission, dị ka onye nkuzi, dị ka odeakwụkwọ onwe onye ( ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị) nke Chief Obafemi Awolowo, onye ndú nke Unity Party nke Naijiria, yana dịka onye otu nchịkọta akụkọ nke The Guardian Newspapers na Lagos
Ọ gụrụ akwụkwọ na Mahadum Oxford na Commonwealth fellowship

[citation needed] Nlaghachi Naijiria na mwepụ nke ntuli aka afọ otu puku narị iteolu na iri iteghete na atọ, o dere kọlụm maka The Guardian On Sunday, Nigerian Tribune, yana inye aka n'ọtụtụ akwụkwọ akụkọ ndị ọzọ
Ọ bụ onye isi oche nke ndị nchịkọta akụkọ nke akwụkwọ akụkọ kwa ụbọchị, AM
News, yana magazin The News na Tempo

Ofeimun bụ odeakwụkwọ mgbasa ozi (n'afọ otu puku narị iteghete na iri asatọ na abụọ wetuo n'afọ otu puku narị iteolu na iri asatọ na anọ), odeakwụkwọ ukwu (n'afọ otu puku narị iteolu na iri asatọ na anọ wetuo n'afọ otu puku narị iteolu na iri asatọ na asatọ) na onye isi oche (n'afọ otu puku narị iteolu na iri iteghete na atọ wetuo n'afọ otu puku narị iteolu na iri iteghete na asaa) nke Association of Nigerian Authors
A họpụtakwara ya dị ka onye ndụmọdụ na PEN Naijiria Centre ma bụrụ onye guzobere Pan African Writers' Association
Ofeimun bụ onye dere ihe karịrị ọrụ iri anọ
Nchịkọta uri ya bipụtara gụnyere The Poet Lied (1980), A Handle for The Flutist (1986), Dreams At Work na London Letter and Other Poems (2000)

Abụ ya maka ihe nkiri ịgba egwu, Under African Skies (1990) na Siye Goli - A Feast of Return (1992), bụ nke Adzido Pan-African Dance Ensemble nyere iwu ma mee na UK na Western Europe na mbido afọ 1990, abụ ya kachasị ọhụrụ maka ihe nkiri egwu, Nigeria The Beautiful, emeela site na nnukwu obodo Naijiria iji too ya
N'afọ puku abụọ na iri, Ofeimun natara onyinye Fonlon-Nichols maka akwụkwọ edemede magburu onwe ya na mgbasa nke ikike mmadụ, nke African Literature Association nyere ya
West Virginia bu otu state no n'ime ala ndi United States of Amerika

Puku narị abụọ na iri atọ, narị atọ na irí ise ná otu na ngụkọ nke afọ 2006
Ọnụọgụ dị ugbu a dị ka nke afọ 2020 karịrị puku narị isii ka Ore Town na-aga n'ihu na-adọta ndị mmadụ ọhụrụ si n'akụkụ ọ bụla nke obodo ahụ
Ndị ọchịchị ime obodo Odigbo si n’agbụrụ Yoruba
Ndị a gụnyere ndị Odigbo, na ndị Araromi Obus bụ ndị na-emekarị omenala ndị yiri ya ma na-akwado otu omenala ndị Yoruba ndị ọzọ
Ndị ọchịchị ime obodo odigbo na-asụ asụsụ obodo dị nso na ondos

Ndị a na-ekpuchi obodo na ime obodo Ore, Agbabu, Lafe, Modebiayo, Isheba, Oke-Oluwa, Ayetedo, Ago Alaye, Ajebamidele, Ajebambo, Kajola, Aiyesan, Oniparaga, Imorun, Laleipa, Okefara, Ayetoro, Sidigi, Oke

Obodo kacha ukwuu n'ime ọchịchị ime obodo Odigbo bụ Ore Town, obodo a bụ isi obodo kewara ndịda ọdịda anyanwụ na ndịda ọwụwa anyanwụ
Ụlọ ọrụ gọọmentị ime obodo dị na Ore

Koodu nzipu ozi nke mpaghara ahụ bụ narị atọ na iri ise
Ọchịchị ime obodo Odigbo nwere nnukwu alaeze abụọ; Odigbo alaeze na Araromi-Obu alaeze
Onye ndu kacha n'aka eze Odigbo bụ HRM Orunja nke Odigbo ebe Onye ndu nke kacha na alaeze nke Araromi-Obu bụ HRM Ajobu nke Araromi-Obu
Isi obodo nọ na Odigbo local government bụ Araromi-Obu, Odigbo, Ajue, Ore, etc

Odigha Odigha bụ onye nkuzi Naijiria, onye na-ahụ maka gburugburu ebe obibi na onye na-eme ihe ike

Ọ bụ onye guzobere Nigeria NGO Coalition for the Environment E nyere ya Goldman Environmental Prize n'afọ 2003, maka mbọ ọ na-agba iji chebe oké ọhịa mmiri ozuzo nke Cross River State site na ịkpụ osisi
Dị ka Grist News si kwuo, o kwuru, 'Ọ bụrụ na ị lụọ ọgụ ma gbaa ọsọ, ị ga-adị ndụ ịlụ ọgụ ọzọ
Ọ bụrụ na ị nwụọ n'ọgụ a, ọgụ gị nwere ike ọ gaghị aga n'ihu
' Odigha lekwasịrị anya na nchedo nke oké ọhịa mmiri ozuzo nke Cross River na mmepe na-adịgide adịgide maka obodo ndị dị n'oké ọhịa nke malitere kemgbe afọ 1994
Dị ka onye na-eme ngagharị iwe, Odigha chụpụrụ ahụmịhe ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị nke jeere ya ozi nke ọma
Ọ bụkwa akụkụ nke obodo Ijagham nke Cross River State
Ya na gọvanọ nke Cross River State, Donald Duke, Odigha jisiri ike guzobe Kọmitii Ọhịa mbụ na Naịjirịa ma nweta oge mbụ a na-egbochi igbu osisi n'afọ 2000
Odigha gara St
Peter's Primary School, Ekpokpa, Ikom Local Government Area n'etiti afọ 1968 ruo n'afọ 1970 ma mesịa gaa St
Mary's Primory School, Agbaragba n'otu mpaghara Gọọmentị Obodo n'afọ 1971
Mgbe ọ gụsịrị akwụkwọ praịmarị, ọ gara St
Brendan's Secondary School, Iyamoyong na Obubra Local Government Area, Cross River State, site n'afọ 1972 ruo 1976
Ọ gakwara Mahadum Calabar, Cross River State, n'etiti 1976 ruo 1980 ebe ọ nwetara nzere BSc na Mathematics / Statistics n'afọ 1980
Ọ debanyere aha maka nzere MBA na Mahadum Lagos n'afọ 1983
Odigha bụ onye gụsịrị akwụkwọ na Mahadum Calabar na nzere bachelọ na mgbakọ na mwepụ / ọnụ ọgụgụ
O debanyere aha maka nzere MBA na Mahadum Lagos

Odili Donald Odita (a mụrụ n'ụbọchị nke ịrị na asatọ n'ọnwa Febụwarị n'afọ 1966) bụ onye Naijiria na-ese ihe na-adighi adị, nke bi ma na-arụ ọrụ na Philadelphia, Pennsylvania
Ọrụ ya na-enyocha agba ma n'ọnọdụ akụkọ ihe mere eme ihe atụ na n'echiche ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị
A kọwawo nnukwu ihe ndị na-enweghị atụ ya dị ka 'ndị na-eme ihe ngosi' ma na-ewere ya ka ihe na-ewelite ajụjụ banyere agbụrụ na ọha mmadụ
Ihe ka ọtụtụ n'ime ọrụ Odita sitere na mkpali nke sitere na akwa dị egwu nke obodo ya, Nigeria, agwakọta ya na ụkpụrụ sitere na ọdịda anyanwụ nke oge a
A mụrụ Odita na 18 Febụwarị 1966, na Enugu, Nigeria
N'afọ 1967, a manyere ezinụlọ ya ịgbapụ na Naịjirịa iji zere agha Biafra
Ha biri na Columbus, Ohio na United States
Malite mgbe ọ dị afọ ise, Odita malitere ịmegharị eserese site na akwụkwọ ndị na-atọ ọchị, na mgbe e mesịrị o jiri magazin ejiji
O kwuru, sị, 'Amaara m na m ga-abụ onye na-ese ihe mgbe m depụtachara ihe oyiyi site na ọtụtụ mbipụta / eserese nke nna m chịkọtara maka ọrụ ya dị ka ọkọ akụkọ ihe mere eme
' ehihie na abalị, Odita na-ada ruo mgbe ike ọgwụgwụ manyere ya ihi ụra
Odita natara BFA ya, na Distinction, site na Mahadum Ohio State na 1988, ebe ọ nwetakwara Ọkachasị na Arts Award
O nwetara MFA na Bennington College, Vermont n'afọ 1990

N'afọ ndị 1990 Odita rụrụ ọrụ dịka onye nkatọ maka Flash Art International, na onye nchịkọta akụkọ na onye edemede maka NKA, Journal of Contemporary African Art Site n'afọ 2003 ruo n'afọ 2005, ọ bụ onye nkatọ nleta na eserese na Yale University School of Art Site n'afọ 2002 ruo n'afọ 2003, ọ bụ Prọfesọ na-ahụ maka eserese na Mahadum South Florida, Tampa Site n'afọ 2000 ruo n'afọ 2006 ọ bụ Prọfesọ na-ahụ maka eserese na Mahadum Florida State, Tallahassee Site n'afọ 2006 ruo ugbu a, Odita abụrụla Prọfesọ na-ahụ maka eserese na Philadelphia na Tyler School of Art / Temple University
Odita bụ onye na-ese ihe, ma na-arụkwa ọrụ na foto ndị dabeere na foto na ntinye nka
Ọ nwalere usoro mgbasa ozi dị iche iche, mana ọrụ ya kemgbe afọ 1990 na-abụkarị nnukwu eserese na akwa na Plexiglass
Mgbe ụfọdụ, ọ na-ese ihe kpọmkwem na mgbidi iji gbanwee echiche nke ohere
A na-ahụkarị ọrụ ya dị ka ihe dị mkpa banyere agbụrụ na ọha mmadụ

Ọ bụ ezie na ọ na-ejikọkarị ndị na-ese ihe na-enweghị atụ dịka Helen Frankenthaler na Kenneth Noland, Odita kpachaara anya tinye onwe ya na ọdịnala nke ndị na-ese ihe na-enweghị atụ site na 1970s na 1980s
Ọ gụrụ akwụkwọ ma gbaa ọtụtụ ndị na-ese ihe ajụjụ ọnụ site n'oge ahụ nke gụnyere Howardena Pindell, Alvin D
Loving, Edward Clark, Frank Bowling, na Stanley Whitney

Odinạnị bu efefe ndi Igbo
N'iwu mba ụwa, ụgwọ na-asọ oyi, nke a makwa dị ka ụgwọ iwu na-akwadoghị, bụ echiche iwu nke na-ekwu na ụgwọ mba nke ọchịchị aka ike kpatara ekwesịghị ịbụ nke a pụrụ ịmanye
A na-ewere ụgwọ ndị dị otú ahụ site n'ozizi a dị ka ụgwọ onwe onye nke ọchịchị nke kpatara ha na ọ bụghị ụgwọ nke steeti
N'akụkụ ụfọdụ, echiche ahụ yiri enweghị ike nke nkwekọrịta ndị bịanyere aka n'okpuru mmanye

N'agbanyeghi ihe ndị bu ụzọ n'ime afọ 1800s na nkwado sitere na ngalaba dị iche iche dịka akụ na ụba, nkà ihe ọmụma, sayensị ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị, akụkọ ihe mere eme, na iwu, ụgwọ na-asọ oyi abụghị akụkụ nke iwu mba ụwa; n'eziokwu, '[n]o ụlọ ikpe mba ma ọ bụ mba ụwa ekwuola Ụgwọ jọgburu onwe ya dị ka ihe kpatara imebi ọrụ ọchịchị ghara ịdị irè
' Kama nke ahụ, iwu mba ụwa na-ejide gọọmentị n'ihe gbasara ụgwọ niile ndị bu ha ụzọ kpatara
[gịnị kpatara ya?]
E guzobere echiche nke ụgwọ na-asọ oyi na akwụkwọ edere n'afọ 1927 nke Alexander Nahum Sack, onye Russia na-ahụ maka iwu
Ọ dabeere na ihe atụ abụọ nke narị afọ nke iri na itoolu - Mexico jụrụ ụgwọ nke Eze Ukwu Maximilian, na ịgọnahụ nke United States nke ụgwọ Cuba maka ụgwọ nke ọchịchị ndị Spain
Sack dere, sị
Mgbe ọchịchị aka ike na-akwụ ụgwọ, ọ bụghị maka mkpa ma ọ bụ maka ọdịmma nke steeti, kama ọ bụ iji wusie onwe ya ike, iji gbochie nnupụisi a ma ama, wdg, ụgwọ a bụ ihe arụ maka ndị steeti dum
Ụgwọ a anaghị ejide mba ahụ; ọ bụ ụgwọ nke ọchịchị, ụgwọ onwe onye nke onye ọchịchị, n'ihi ya, ọ na-ada na ọdịda nke ọchịchị

Ihe mere ụgwọ ndị a na-asọ oyi enweghị ike itinye aka na ókèala nke steeti bụ na ha anaghị emezu otu n'ime ọnọdụ ndị na-ekpebi iwu nke ụgwọ Steeti, ya bụ na a ghaghị ịkwụ ụgwọ Steeti, na ego eji, maka mkpa na ọdịmma nke Steeti

Ụgwọ na-asọ oyi, nke a na-arụ ọrụ ma na-eji ya mee ihe maka ebumnuche nke, ka ndị na-agbazinye ego mara, megidere mkpa na ọdịmma nke mba ahụ, anaghị ejide mba ahụ - mgbe ọ na-enwe ihe ịga nke ọma n'ịkwatu gọọmentị nke mere ha - ọ gwụla ma ụgwọ ahụ dị n'ime oke ezigbo uru nke ụgwọ ndị a nwere ike inye

Ndị na-agbazinye ego emeela omume obi ọjọọ megide ndị mmadụ, ha enweghị ike ịtụ anya na mba nke tọhapụrụ onwe ya n'ọchịchị ọchịchị aka ike ga-ewere ụgwọ ndị a na-asọ oyi, nke bụ ụgwọ onwe onye ọchịchị
Sack kwuru na ụgwọ ndị dị otú ahụ enweghị ike ịmanye mgbe (nke mbu) onye na-agbazinye ego kwesịrị ịma na (nke abụọ) ụgwọ ahụ kpatara n'enweghị nkwenye na (nke ato) na-enweghị uru nye ndị mmadụ
E nwere ọtụtụ ihe atụ nke ịjụ ụgwọ yiri nke ahụ
Onye ọka ikpe ukwu William Howard Taft, na-arụ ọrụ dị ka onye na-ekpe ikpe, jiri ozizi ahụ chọpụta na Costa Rica ekwesịghị ịkwụ ụgwọ United Kingdom nke ọchịchị Federico Tinoco Granados kpatara

Patricia Adams, onye isi nchịkwa nke Probe International, otu ụlọ ọrụ na-akwado gburugburu ebe obibi na iwu ọha na eze nke Canada na onye edemede nke Ụgwọ dị egwu Mbinye ego na-adịghị akwụ ụgwọ, nrụrụ aka, na ihe nketa gburugburu gburugburu ụwa nke atọ, kwuru, sị 'site n'inye ndị na-akwụ ụgwọ mkpali ịgbazinye ego naanị maka ebumnuche ndị doro anya na nke uru ọha na eze, ndị ọchịchị aka ike n'ọdịnihu ga-efunahụ ikike ha iji nweta ego maka ndị agha ha, ya mere agha megide iyi egwu na ihe kpatara udo ụwa ga-aka mma
' Na nyocha iwu nke Cato Institute, Adams tụrụ aro na ụgwọ ndị Iraq nwetara n'oge ọchịchị Saddam Hussein bụ ihe arụ n'ihi na e mefuru ego ahụ na ngwá agha, ngwá ọrụ mmegbu, na obí eze
N'ọnwa Disemba n'afọ 2008, onye isi ala Ecuador bụ Rafael Correa nwara ịda ụgwọ mba Ecuador, na-akpọ ya ụgwọ na-akwadoghị, màkà na ọ bụ ọchịchị rụrụ arụ na ndị ọchịchị aka ike
O nwere ihe ịga nke ọma n'ibelata ọnụahịa nke akwụkwọ ozi ụgwọ tupu ọ gaa n'ihu ịkwụ ụgwọ ahụ

Ógè á kwaturu chárá Jean-Claude Duvalier nke Haiti n'afọ 1986, a kpọrọ oku ka a kagbuo ụgwọ Haiti ji ụlọ ọrụ dị iche iche, na-akpọ ya ụgwọ na-ezighị ezi, na Haiti nwere ike iji ego ahụ mee ihe maka agụmakwụkwọ, nlekọta ahụike, na akụrụngwa ndị bụ isi
Ka ọ na-erule ọnwa Febụwarị n'afọ 2008, Mkpebi Nkwụsị Ụgwọ Haiti nwere ndị nkwado iri isii na isii na Ụlọ Ndị Nnọchiteanya nke United States
Ọtụtụ òtù dị na United States nyere ịdọ aka ná ntị na Haiti Debt Cancellation Resolution, na akwụkwọ ozi Congressional na US

Chukwuemeka Ohanaemere (a mụrụ na abalị 9 Septemba 1982), nke a na-akpọkarị Odumeje, bụ onye ụkọchukwu Naijiria bara ọgaranya na-arụrita ụka nke ukwu na onye nlekọta izugbe nke The Mountain of Holy Ghost Intervention and Deliverance Ministry bụ onye a mara maka usoro ya na-ezighi ezi ọ si agwọ ma na ịchụpụ ndị e chere na ha nwere mmụọ ọjọọ
A mụrụ Odumeje na steeti Imo, Naijiria n'ezinaụlọ nwere ụmụ isii ma bụrụ nwa nke atọ a mụrụ
O nwere obere agụmakwụkwọ dịka ọ kwụsịrị akwụkwọ n'oge ọ bụ nwata wee kwuo na 'mkpachi ego' dị ka ihe kpatara ya
Tupu ọ ghọ onye ụkọchukwu, ọ kwagara Steeti Anambra ka ọ chọọ ndụ ka mma, bụ ebe ọ malitere azụmahịa dị ka onye na-ese akpụkpọ anụ na-agbasi mbọ ike, ọrụ ọ ga-emecha gbahapụ iji guzobe ụlọ ụka
Usoro ọgwụgwọ Odumeje na-adọta nkatọ na-adịghị mma dịka ọ na-agụnyekarị nhazi nke ọtụtụ oche na ịkụda onye chọrọ ọgwụgwọ n'oche, na mgbe emechara ya, kwupụta na a gwọọla ha kpamkpam
Uzo Odumeje si agwọ ọrịa nwetaara ya aha; 'Onye pastọ mgba'

Odumeje nwere esemokwu ya na onye bụbu nwanyị ya na ya na-arụkọ ọrụ ọnụ nke akpọrọ Ada Jesus onye boro ya ebubo na ọ bụ onye amụma ụgha na charlatan bụ onye jisiri ike rụọ ọrụ ebube site n'enyemaka nke onye na-eme ihe nkiri Naijiria, Rita Edochie, bụ onye nyere aka site n'inye ya ndị dị njikere ime ganeme ọrịa maka a ego
Odumeje gara n'ihu bụwa ya ọnụ ma kwupụta na ọ ga-ebute ọrịa na-enweghị ngwọta, na mberede, ọ dara ọrịa siri ike site n'ọrịa akụrụ nke mere ka ahụ kpọnwụọ ya kpam kpam ma mee ka ọ kwụsị ikwu okwu
Ọnọdụ ya megidere sayensị ahụike n'ihi na ndị ọkachamara n'ịgwọ ahụike enweghị ike ịkọwa ihe kpatara na n'agbanyeghị mbọ ha na-agba ịgwọ ya, ahụike ya nọgidere na-akawanye njọ
Dị ka ihe ikpeazụ ezinaụlọ Ada Jesus, kpọtara ya n'ọnọdụ ndina ya na ụlọuka Odumeje ma na-arịọ ya ka ọ gbanwee abụmọnụ ọ bụrụ ya

Odumeje kwenyesiri ike wee kwuo na ya agaghị agbaghara ya ma kwuo na ya ga-ahụ na ahụ ga-akpọnwụ ya na ndụ ya niile, ebe Rita Edochie kwuru na ahụ agaghị adị ya mma na ọ ga-anwụ n'oge erughi eru n'ọrịa ahụ
Odumeje kwukwara na ya ga-ahụ na otu ihe ahụ ga-adakwasị ndị ezinaụlọ ya niile

Ika ụka Odumeje gụnyere ịbụ abụ nke egwu Naijiria nke nwere okwu rụrụ arụ na ọdịnala iwu na-akwadoghị nke na-adabaghị na nkuzi na omume Ndị Kraịstlkaịụka Odumeje gbakokwara mmegbu a na-eme na naira Naijiria dika ọ na-efesa ego na-aga n'ihu na-azọ ya ụkwụ, nke a wetara nnukwu nkatọ nke mere na Human Rights Writers Association of Nigeria kpọrọ oku ka a nwụchie ya na afọ 2020

Alụmdinanwunye ya na nwunye ya nwere esemokwu n'ihi na ụlọ ọrụ mgbasa ozi Naijiria bipụtara akụkọ na-ekwu na ọ lụrụ ada Eddy Nawgu na ihe ọ bụla bụ ike ime mmụọ Odumeje nwere, ọ mụtara ma nweta ya site n'ịmụ akwụkwọ akụkọ nzuzo nke Eddy Nawgu bụ onye isi ojii, ọgba afa tupu e gbuo ya n'ihu ọha
Odumeje ji obi egwu gọnarị nke a ma kpọọ ya ihe ọjọọ na ima ụma kpachapụrụ anya mebie aha ya

Odumeje kwuru okwu mkparị banyere onye nwụrụ anwụ Pericoma Okoye bụ onye bụbu praịm minista Arondizuogu bụ onye o kwuru na ọ bụ ihe na-abaghị uru mgbe ọ dị ndụ na ọ nweghị ihe ọ rụpụtara dị mkpa karịa ị nweta aha ' ọdụm Nke Africa' na ime mgbaasị na-enweghị ike ịzọpụta ya n'ọnwụ
Odumeje kwakwara ndị Arondizuogu emo site n'ịkpọ ha obodo ịda ogbenye na-enweghị nde mmadụ ma bụrụ naanị ịgba afa bụ naanị ihe ha rụzuru
Odumeje nwetara nkatọ siri ike maka okwu ya ma mechaa rịọ ndị Arondizuogu mgbaghara

Odumeje kwuru na ya nwere ikike ime mmụọ na ọ ga-egbu onye ọ bụla dere ihe na-adịghị mma gbasara ya n'agbanyeghị otú ha si zochie njirimara ha, o kwuru na ya nwere ike ịmata ndị ha bụ n'ụzọ ime mmụọ ma na-aga n'ihu na-egbu ha na mmụọ

N'agbanyeghị nnukwu esemokwu nke na-eso Odumeje, ọ na-anọgide na-enwe mmekọrịta dị mma na ụlọ ọrụ ntụrụndụ Naijiria dị ka ndị na-eme ihe nkiri Nigeria, Flavor, Rita Edochie, Yul Edochie, na Zubby Michael, na-abịakarị n'oge ọrụ ụka Sunday ya ma ọ bụ na-ahụ ya na ha na ihe omume nzuzo
N'afọ 2019, Odumeje kwuru na ya nwere ike imebie iwu physics ma jee ije n'elu mmiri
O mechara gọnarị na o kwupụtaghị ụdị nkwupụta ahụ n'agbanyeghị ihe akaebe vidiyo mgbe ọ na-ekwu na a na-ebipụta ma na-ekesa ụdị ihe a na ọlụ ụka ya na mbara igwe
N'afọ 2020, Odumeje kwuru na ya nwere ike ịkpọlite onye ọ bụla ndị ọkachamara ahụike kwuru na ọ nwụrụ anwụ ma gosi na ọ nwụrụ anwụ

Odunlade Adekola gụrụ akwụkwọ na St John's Primary School nakwa St
Peter's College na Abeokuta, Ogun Steeti wee nweta ule asambodo ụlọ akwụkwọ West Africa tupu ọ gaa Moshood Abiola Polytechnic, 'MAPOLY) ebe ọ natara asambodo diplọma
Odunlade gara n'ihu na agụmakwụkwọ ya n'ọnwa Mee 2018, ọ nwetara nzere na Bachelors of Business Administration na Mahadum nke Lagos
Odunlade Adekola malitere ọrụ ihe ejije ya n'afọ 1996, n'otu afọ ahụ ọ sonyeere Association of Nigeria Theatre Arts practitioners
O meela ejije, dee, mepụta ma duzie ọtụtụ ihe nkiri Naịjirịa kemgbe ọtụtụ afọ
N'ọnwa Eprel afọ 2014, Adekola nwetara mmeri Africa Movie Academy Award maka onye na-eme ihe nkiri kacha mma n'afọ ahụ
N'ọnwa Disemba afọ 2015, ọ banyere n'ime ụlọ ọrụ egwu Naịjirịa
A na-eji foto Odunlade n'oge a na-ese ihe nkiri eme ihe n'ọtụtụ ebe dịka ihe ntanetị n'ofe webosphere Naijiria
N'abalị́ 17 nke Septemba, 2018, Odunlade Adekola ghọrọ onye nnọchi anya nke RevolutionPlus Property Development Company ọ bụ n'ezie ụbọchị dị ịrịba ama nye Ya
E kpughere ya dịka onye nnọchi anya ụlọ ọrụ ahụ nakwa ụlọ ọrụ Ikeja ha na Lagos

Oduor o bụ aha nna
Ndị ama ama nwere aha nna gụnyere
Oduro Ofrikyi (amụrụ n'abalị isii n'ọnwa Ọktoba n'afọ 1947) bụ onye ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị Ghana na onye otu ndị omeiwu mbụ nke mba nke anọ na-anọchite anya mpaghara Bekwai na mpaghara Ashanti nke Ghana
Ọ na-anọchite anya mpaghara na tiketi nke National Democratic Congress
A mụrụ Oduro Ofrikyi na 6 October 1947 na Dominase na mpaghara Ashanti nke Ghana
Ọ gara SDA Training College, Agona na Mahadum Cape Coast, ebe ọ nwetara nzere bachelọ nke Arts na Education
A họpụtara Ofrikyi n'ụlọ omeiwu na tiketi National Democratic Congress n'oge ntuli aka ndị omeiwu Ghana nke December 1992 maka mpaghara Bekwai na mpaghara Ashanti nke Ghana

Alexander Agyei-Acheampong nke New Patriotic Party nọchiri ya bụ onye na ntuli aka izugbe nke 1996, weputara vootu 28,313 n'ime ntuli aka ziri ezi nke 6310% megide Kwaku Poku-Agyeman nke National Democratic Congress (onye meriri ya na primaries)
) onye nwetara vootu 7,301 na-anọchite anya 1630%
Ọ bụ onye nkuzi site na ọrụ na onye bụbu onye omeiwu maka mpaghara Bekwai na mpaghara Ashanti nke Ghana
Ọ rụrụ ọrụ otu oge dị ka onye omeiwu maka mpaghara Bekwai
Ofada rice bụ aha maka osikapa sitere na obere obodo a na-akpọ Ofada na Obafemi Owode Local Government Area nke Ogun State
A naghị akụ ya naanị n'ime obodo, mana ọ bụ osikapa a na-akụ na South-West Nigeria mana aha ya bụ obodo Ofada
A na-eji ya eme nri dịgasị iche iche
Osikapa Ofada na-abụkarị ngwakọta, ụfọdụ n'ime ụdị osikapa dị na ngwakọta ahụ abụghị nke Afrịka; Otú ọ dị, ha na-enwekarị osikapa Afrịka
A na-akụ ya ihe fọrọ nke nta ka ọ bụrụ naanị na Ogun State, steeti dị na Southwestern Nigeria ma a na-akpọ ya aha obodo Ofada na Ogun Steeti
A na-akụ osikapa Ofada n'ala na-enweghị mmiri ebe tebụl mmiri dị n'okpuru mgbọrọgwụ nke osisi ahụ

Osikapa Ofada na-abụkarị ngwakọta, ma na-enwekarị Oryza glaberrima (osikapa Afrịka) yana osikapa Oryza sativa Asia a na-ahụkarị, a pụkwara ịhazi ya dị ka Ofada na'acha nchara nchara ma ọ bụ ọbara ọbara ma ọ bụ ọfada ọcha na-adabere na ụcha mkpụrụ a na-emeghị
Ogologo ọka, ọdịdị, na onyinyo dịgasị iche
Osikapa Ofada bụ nke a na-enweghị ntụpọ
Dị ka osikapa Afrịka siri ike ịpị na ịcha, a na-ahapụ ụfọdụ ma ọ bụ niile osikapa na ọka, na-eme ka ụtọ ya sie ike ma mee ka ọ dịkwuo mma
Osikapa na-acha nchara nchara na-enwekarị ísì ụtọ, ebe osikapa na na-acha ọcha na-enwetakarị ísì ụtọ
A makwaara ha maka ibu ibu ibu mgbe a na-esi ha
A na-edozi ya mgbe ụfọdụ site na iji fermentation, nke na-agbakwunye àgwà na-esi ísì ụtọ na ngwaahịa ahụ
Ofada rice na-adịkarị ọnụ karịa osikapa ndị ọzọ dịnụ, ụfọdụ ndị ewerela ya dị ka ihe nnọchianya nke ọnọdụ
N'oge a, a na-enye ya mgbe ụfọdụ na nnọkọ ndị isi
Otu n'ime ụdị osikapa a na-akụ na Naịjirịa a na-akpọ Ofada rice
Ụdị a nwetara aha ya site n'eziokwu ahụ bụ na a zụlitere ya ma dozie ya n'obodo nta ndị dị na South-West Nigeria nke Ofada na obodo nta ndị ọzọ na-emepụta osikapa
A malitere ịzụlite ihe ọkụkụ ahụ na Abeokuta, Ogun State, ma webata ya site na ọrụ ozi ala ọzọ n'etiti afọ 1850 na afọ 1970

Site n'ebe ahụ, a gbasara ya na mpaghara Lagos na Epe na Okitipupa; site n'ebe wana, a kwagara ya na mpaghara Ogoja na Abakaliki mgbe Agha Ụwa nke Abụọ gasịrị; ma n'ikpeazụ, a gbasara ọ gafee Sahara na n'ebe ugwu Nigeria site na azụmahịa Trans-Saharan
N'ihi ụtọ pụrụ iche na ísì nke ụdị dị iche iche nke na-eme ka ọ bụrụ ihe a ma ama karịa ụdị ndị ọzọ nwere ụtọ dị iche iche mgbe a na-esi ya
A na-akpọ osikapa Ofada aha obodo Ofada, ebe a malitere ikọ ya
Ofada bụ obodo dị na steeti Ogun
A na-enye osikapa Ọfada n'ime akwụkwọ uma (Thaumatococcus daniellii), na ofe nke ose, yabasị, agwa igurube, mmanụ nkwụ, na anụ
Ọ bụ nri oriri kama ịbụ ụdị nri kwa ụbọchị maka ọtụtụ ndị Naijiria mana ọ bụ nri okporo ámá kwa ụbọchị maka obodo Ikenne na Ilisan na steeti Ogun
A na-ejikarị ya na nri akwụkwọ nri nke nwere ike ịnwe ahịhịa igurube dị ka ihe eji eme ya
A na-ejikarị ya na stew 'designer' nke Ayamase ma ọ bụ Obe-ata-iru, ha abụọ kwadebere maka oriri osikapa Ofada
Soro nkume na unyi site na osikapa Ofada
Jiri nlezianya mee nke a dịka a maara osikapa Ọfada dị ka ihe ruru unyi ma jupụta na nkume, ọ bụ ezie na ọ belatara ka oge na n'ihi usoro mmepụta dị irè
Wụsa osikapa n'ime efere, sachaa ya ugboro ugboro, ruo mgbe agba mmiri ahụ gbanwere
Nlele a dabere na ọnụọgụ a na-akwadebe, tinye mmiri zuru oke, kwe ka esi nri na okpomọkụ dị ala ruo nke dị n'etiti maka nkeji iri na abụọ
Wepụ osikapa ahụ n'okpomọkụ ma sachaa starch ruo mgbe mmiri dị ọcha, ma tinye 1 iko mmiri ma sie ya ruo mgbe ọ dị nro
Ọ dị mkpa ile ya anya mgbe ọ bụla iji gbochie ọkụ ma ọ bụ ịta
Mgbe ọ dị nro, wepụ ya n'okpomọkụ ma ọ bụrụ na ị na-ejedebe na mmiri mgbe esichara osikapa ahụ n'ụzọ zuru ezu, wepụ mmiri n'ime colander, wee rie Ofada Sauce
Ofada stew bụ nri dị n'ógbè ahụ n'akụkụ ndịda Naịjirịa, ọ bụ ofe dị ụtọ a na-eri ya na osikapa ofada, osikapa nwere ogologo mkpụrụ na ihe ndị ọzọ
A na-akpọkwa stew Ofada dị ka Ata dindin

Ihe eji eme nri nke stew bụ Unripe habanero peppers (atarodo), Unripe tatashe peppers ma ọ bụ green bell peppers, Locust bean seasoning (Iru) / Ogiri, mmanụ, a yabasị Crayfish, Assorted meat and fish, beef, Shaki (cow tripe), Dry fish, and Stock fish

Iji mee ofe ofada, ọ dị mkpa ka ị kwadebe ihe ndị edepụtara n'elu, mgbe nke ahụ gasịrị, wepụ mmanụ ahụ maka nkeji ole na ole mgbe nke ahụ gasịkwara, ị gbakwunyere ngwakọta gị nke ose, yabasị e gbutụrụ n'ime efere
Stir maka nkeji iri ise wee tinye nnu na ihe ndị ọzọ na-esi ísì ụtọ iji nụ ụtọ
Ị nwere ike ịhọrọ isi anụ gị, àkwá gị na ọkụkọ gị iche iche tụpụ ị gbakwunye ya na nri e siri esi
Ayamase nke a makwaara dị ka Ofada sauce bụ ihe e ji mmanụ nkwụ mee nke yiri Ofada stew ma e wezụga na e ji ose na-acha akwụkwọ ndụ akwụkwọ ndụ mee ya nke na-enye ofe ụtọ pụrụ iche
Emume Ofala bụ emume nke ndi Onitsha na-eme kwa afọ nke ndi obodo ọzọ bụ ndi agbata obi ha dịka Nnewi n' Anambra State, SouthEastern Nigeria nakwa Ukpo nke Dunukofia na-emezi
Ọ bụ ụzọ esi tụgharia Obi/Eze ndụ mmanụ
Ọ dika Emume Igue festival nke Benin nakwa Ine , Osi or Ogbanigbe Festival n'ọtụtụ ala Igbo di iche-iche ndi di n' etiti ọdida anyanwụ nke ala Naijiria
Okwu a ofala, si n'okwu Igbo abụọ - ofo (English authority) n' ala (English land) A na-eji abali abụọ eme emume a nke kachasị nke n'ọnwa iri n'afọ nke onye na-eme ya bụ Obi maọbụ Eze (English king)

Dị ka ụfọdụ akụkọ akọrọ n'ọnụ 'oral history' siri kwuo, enwere ike weghachite aka chọpụta Emume Ofala na Narị afọ nke iri na isii gara-aga mgbe ndi Onitsha si Benin gaa n'ebe ndị dị n'Ebe Ọwụwa Anyanwụ nke osimiri Niger nke amaara ugbu a dị ka obodo Onitsha nke ha wetara omenala ndị ọzọ, nke ọdịnala nke eze bụ otu n'ime ha
Emume a dika emume Igue nke Ọba nke Benin na-eme kwa afọ
Ụfọdụ ndị ọkọ akụkọ ihe mere eme kwenyere na'ememe a metụtara Emume Iri Ji Ọhọọ n' Onitsha na ntinye nke Eze na nchekwa nke ndị ya
Ememme ahụ na-egosi njedebe nke oge ịla azụ a na-akpọ Inye Ukwu na Nlo mgbe ụfọdụ
Mgbe obi na-anọgide na-enweghị ike ikwuru onye ezi okwu ma na-enweta mmerụ ime mmụọ maka ọdịmma nke obodo
Mgbe ngwụcha izu ahụ gasịrị, Obi ga-apụta n'oge Ofala iji gọzie ndị ọ na-achị ma kpeekwa ekpere maka obodo
A na-eme ememme Ofala kwa afọ site na-echichi nke Obi ruo ọnwụ ya, nke a kpọrọ 'Ofala ikpeazụ'
Ememe a na-amalitekarị site n'omenala igba ọnụ egbe iri abụọ na otu, iku Ufie abalị niile (royal gong) esote ya iti igba, ịgba egwú n' omenala ndị ọzọ

N'ehihie, ndị nze n'ọzọ, ndị ọbịa sitere na mpaghara ndị ọzọ, ọgbọ dị iche iche, ndị inyom na ndị ntorobịa nke obodo na-agbakarị n'obí eze ma ọ bụ Ime Obi na uwe eji eme omenala a ma ọ bụ nke ya na emume ahụ bụ
A na-akpọ egwú eze ma ọ bụ Egwu Ota mgbe Ndichie na-abata ma ọ bụ ndị nze n'ọzọ na-abata mgbe igwe mmadụ gbakọtara ma kpọtakwa ụfọdụ n'ime ndị enyi ha na ndị òtù ha ka ha gaa n'ụlọ eze

Ihe omuma nke ememme a bụ mpụta nke Obi n'ihu igwe mmadụ n'ekike eze ya zuru ezu, otu ọnụ egbe ntụ na-ama ọkwa mbata nke Obi onye na-eyikarị uwe ṅwụdaị ma were mma agha ọla n'aka ya, ọ na-aga n'akụkụ n'akụkụ ebe egwuregwu ahụ ma ọ bụ otu ụzọ n'ụzọ atọ nke ebe egwuregwu ahụ na-ekweta na ndị na-enwe obi ụtọ nke nnọkọ ahụ
Emechaa nkea, Obi na-alaghachi n'oche ya, ndị isi nze n'ọzọ na-abia nye ya nsọpụrụ site na ntọrọ, mgbe nke ahụ gasịrị, Obi na ndị nze n' ọzọ na-apụtagharị ma agbacha otu ọnụ egbe ntụ ọzọ
N'oge nke abụọ, obi na-agba egwu n'ámá ahụ, ihe na-anaghị ahụkarị tinyekwara na nzọụkwụ ya gafere ebe dị anya karịa nke mbụ
Ndị nze n'ọzọ si mba ọzọ na ndị ọbịa na-enye Obi nsọpụrụ
Ememme a na-abụkwa oge Obi na-echi ndi tozuru etozu echichi
Egwú na nkà ihe omimi aghọwo akụkụ nke ememme ahụ
N'afọ 2015 enwere ihe ngosi nke akpọrọ Oreze III, ihe omume ahụ gosipụtara ngosipụta site n'aka ndị ọkpụkpọ 20 dị iche iche na-egosipụta ndị eze Onitsha nwụrụ anwụ
Ofe achara bụ ofe Igbo nke e ji Achara (ahịhịa Elephant) na mgbam (egusi balls) mee
Ofe N'asụsụ ahụ na-ezo aka na ofe
Ofe ahụ sitere na steeti Abia nke dị na mpaghara ndịda ọwụwa anyanwụ nke Naịjirịa
A na-eji yabasị na cubes na-esi anụ ehi ma ọ bụ azụ a na-ese anwụrụ ọkụ
Achara, egusi balls na achi iji mee ka ofe sie ike na ite jupụtara na mmanụ nkwụ
A na-agbakwunye akwụkwọ Okazi n'akụkụ crayfish, nnu, ose na mmiri na-agwakọta mgbe mmanụ ahụ na-ese n'elu ofe
Ofe Achara ka a na-eji fufu eme ihe
Ofe Achu bụ nri ọdịnaala na obodo Cameroon, ofe odo
A na-eji Mede eme ya
Ihe na-esi ísì ụtọ, mmiri, mmanụ nkwụ, na 'canwa maọbụ Nikki' (limestone), na azụ bụ ihe ndị ọzọ
Ofe anụ ewu, nke a na-akpọkwa 'goat meat pepper soup' na Naịjirịa
A na-eji anụ ewu eme ihe dị ka isi ihe, ụfọdụ nsụgharị nwere ike iji crayfish
Maka ọdịiche dị iche iche, a pụrụ itinye poteto, ma ọ bụ plantain
Ụdị ofe nwere ike ịbụ ihe na-esi ísì ụtọ ma na-ekpo ọkụ
A na-enye ofe ahụ ọkụ mgbe niile ma jiri ngwakọta nke ihe dị iche iche na-esi ísì ụtọ mee ya nke na-enye ụtọ na ụtọ dị ukwuu na ofe ahụ
A kọwawo nri ahụ dị ka nke kachasị ewu ewu n'ime ofe ose Naijiria niile
Ọ bụ ofe dị mfe nke a na-akwadebe mgbe niile n'ejighị mmanụ, a pụkwara ịṅụ ya n'ụdị ihe ọṅụṅụ
N'ihi ọdịdị nke ofe ahụ, a na-eri ya naanị ya mana enwere ike iso ya na nri a maara dị ka agidi (ụdị nri ọka nke a na-ewere dị ka nke kachasị mma na okra na ofe ose, n'otu aka ahụ)
Osikapa ọcha bụkwa nri a na-ejikarị eme ihe na ofe ose anụ ewu
A kọwawo ya dị ka nke na-ejikọta nke ọma na mmanya nkwụ na biya
A na-eri ofe ose anụ ewu n'afọ niile na Naịjirịa, n'oge okpomọkụ ma ọ bụ oge oyi
A na-azọrọ na ọ na-enyere aka belata influenza ma ọ bụ oyi ma ọ bụrụ na esi ya n'ụzọ kwesịrị ekwesị [nkọwa dị mkpa]
Ọ bụrụ na ejiri akụkụ dịgasị iche iche nke ewu mee ihe, ụfọdụ akụkụ nwere ike ịchọ ka esi ogologo oge karịa ndị ọzọ
E nwere ụdị ofe ose dị iche iche nke dịgasị iche dabere na mpaghara, yana ngwakọta dị iche iche na-esi ísì ụtọ
Dịka ọmụmaatụ, ndị Igbo, n'ebe ọwụwa anyanwụ, na ndị Riverians n'ebe ndịda ọwụwa Anyanwụ, na-eji tomato, yabasị na ihe na-esi ísì ụtọ na-akwadebe ofe ose ha
Ndị si Delta na-eji ataiko, uda, gbafilo, rigije, na akwụkwọ ahịhịa lemon emepụta ofe ose mgbe ụfọdụ
N'asụsụ Yoruba, a na-akpọ ofe ose anụ ewu mgbe ụfọdụ Ogun
E nwere ọtụtụ ihe dị iche iche a na-eji eme ihe dabere na mpaghara na nnweta
Ihe ndị a na-ahụkarị na ofe ose anụ ewu bụ anụ ewu, crayfish, Uziza, Ụda (nke a na-akpọkwa Uda Ewentia ma ọ bụ Enge) na nutmeg, dị ka Calabash Nutmeg (nke a makwaara dị ka Ehu ma ọ bụ Ariwo)
Ihe ndị ọzọ a na-ejikarị eme ihe mgbe enwere oke ịnweta ihe ọdịnala bụ bouillon cubes, yabasị, nnu, ose, basil na ose
Ụfọdụ nsụgharị na-ejikwa isi ewu
Nkwadebe na-agụnye ihicha na itinye anụ ahụ n'ime ya na iji yabasị a pịrị apị sie ya, mgbe nke ahụ gasịrị, a na-agbakwunye mmiri ma na-esi nri ahụ
Enwere ike iji ihe na-atọ ụtọ dị ka nnu, ose na basil mechie nri ahụ
Ofe Mkpụrụ ahụekere ma ọ bụ mkpụrụ ahụekere bụ mkpụrụ ahụike e ji ahụekere mee, mgbe na ihe ndị ọzọ dị iche iche
Ọ bụ nri dị mkpa nke nri Afrịka mana a na-eri ya n'Ebe Ọwụwa Anyanwụ Eshia (Taiwan), United States (karịsịa na Virginia) na mpaghara ndị ọzọ gburugburu ụwa
Ọ bụkwa ihe a na-ahụkarị na mpaghara ụfọdụ, dị ka Argentina n'ebe ugwu ọdịda anyanwụ, Bolivia na Peru, ebe enwere ike iji anụ ọkpụkpụ na obere pasta ma ọ bụ fries mee ya mgbe ụfọdụ
Na mba Ghana, a na-eri ya na fufu ma ọ bụ omo tuo ma na-atọ ụtọ mgbe niile
Groundnut soup bụkwa ofe nke ndị Benin (Edo) na Naịjirịa ma a na-eri ya na yam a pịrị apị
Ụfọdụ n'ime ihe ndị dị mkpa eji eme ya bụ Piper guineense (mkpụrụuziza) na Vernonia amygdalina (akwụkwọ na-egbu egbu)
A na-akwadebe ya site na mkpụrụ osisi nke a na-agwakọta n'ime ihie oriri, nke a na'ozuzu ya na-akpọ mkpụrụ osisi
A na-eri ofe mkpụrụ osisi na fufu, banku, kenkey na ihe ndị ọzọ
Ọ bụ nri dị ụtọ nke ndị Ghana na ndị mmadụ nọ na mba ndị ọzọ dị n'Afrịka na-eri, dịka na Sierra Leone

In Cameroon mbanga is made using fresh palm nuts
Outside the area canned nuts can be used

Temple Style, n'okpuru nduzi Okonkwo, na-egosipụta mkpokọta ha kwa afọ na mmemme izu Lagos Fashion and Design, nke mere na Vogue, Fashion Bomb Daily, Elle, Glamour, na CNN toro ya n'ihi ọhụhụ ya na uwe ụmụ nwanyị
Adebayo Salami nke a maara nke ọma dịka Oga Bello, bụ onye na-eme ejije, onye na-eme ihe nkiri, onye na-emepụta ihe nkiri na onye nduzi
Ọ bụ ezie na Salami bụ onye Kwara, a mụrụ ya na 9 Mee 1953 na Lagos Steeti ebe ọ gụrụ akwụkwọ praịmarị na sekọndrị
Ọ malitere ọrụ ihe nkiri ya n'afọ 1964, ya na otu a na-akpọ Young Concert Party, n'okpuru nduzi nke Ojo Ladipo, nke a maara dịka Baba Mero
Mgbe afọ ole na ole gasịrị, otu ahụ gbanwere aha ya na Ojo Ladipo Theatre Group, ma mesịa ghọọ Awada Kerikeri Theatre Group
Mgbe Ojo Ladipo nwụsịrị n'afọ 1978, Salami weere uwe nke onye ndu nke otu ahụ, nke mere ka ọ bụrụ onye a ma ama
O gosipụtara na ihe nkiri Yoruba mbụ, Ajani Ogun, nke Adeyemi Afolayan nwụrụ anwụ, nna Kunle Afolayan na Gabriel Afolayan, na-arụ ọrụ ndu

O mepụtara ihe nkiri mbụ ya, Ogun Ajaye, n'afọ 1985, site na ụlọ anụ ụlọ Awada Kerikeri
Kemgbe afọ 1985, ọ mepụtala, duzie ma gosipụta na ọtụtụ ihe nkiri Yoruba
Ọ bụ onye ọsụ ụzọ nke Association of Nigerian Theatre Arts Practitioners, ma bụrụkwa onye isi oche nke otu ahụ
Ogaga Ifowodo (amụrụ ya na Mee 14, 1966) bụ onye ọka iwu Naijiria, ọkà mmụta, onye na-ede uri, onye na'akwụkwọ akụkọ / onye na-akọwa ihe gbasara ọha na eze na onye na-ahụ maka ihe ndị ruuru mmadụ

E nyere ya onyinye PEN / Barbara Goldsmith Freedom to Write Award nke afọ 1998, e nyere ndị edemede “n’ebe ọ bụla n’ụwa bụ́ ndị jiworo obi ike lụọ ọgụ n’agbanyeghị ihe isi ike ihu maka ikike ikwu okwu
A mụrụ Ifowodo na Oleh, Delta State nke Nigeria
Ọ gara Federal Government College, Warri, maka agụmakwụkwọ sekọndrị ya
Ọ gụrụ akwụkwọ iwu na Mahadum Benin ebe o nwetara LLB n'afọ 1989
A kpọrọ ya ka ọ bịa n'ụlọikpe n'afọ 1991 ma rụọ ọrụ ọtụtụ afọ dị ka onye na-ahụ maka ihe ndị ruuru mmadụ na Naịjirịa Civil Liberties Organization (CLO)
Ọ gakwara Mahadum Cornell, ebe o nwetara PhD ya n'afọ 2008
O nwekwara Master of Fine Art (MFA) na uri, na PhD na Bekee (ọmụmụ akwụkwọ / ọdịbendị) site na Mahadum Cornell, New York
Ọ kụziri uri na akwụkwọ na Mahadum Texas State, San Marcos
A sụgharịrị ọrụ ya n'asụsụ German, Dutch, Romanian, Turkish na Italian
Ọ rụrụ ọrụ dị ka onye kọmishọna maka gọọmentị Naijiria site na'afọ 2016 ruo afọ 2019
Ọ ka na-arụsi ọrụ ike na ngalaba na-ahụ maka ihe ndị ruuru mmadụ, ọ na-arụkwa ọrụ iwu ugbu a na Naịjirịa
Ifowodo bụ onye a ma ama na-ede uri na onye edemede
O bipụtara isiokwu na ihe fọrọ nke nta ka ọ bụrụ akwụkwọ akụkọ niile dị na Naịjirịa
O dere kọlụm 'For Crying Out LOUD!' na Vanguard ruo Julaị 2016

O bipụtakwala akwụkwọ uri anọ na uri ya ka ebipụtala nke ọma n'ọtụtụ akwụkwọ akụkọ ọdịnala na akwụkwọ akụkọ n'ofe ụwa, gụnyere olu sitere n'akụkụ niile uri nwere ndetu na ihe omume, mgbakwunye akwụkwọ akwụkwọ Times Times, Poetry International, Massachusetts Review, Crazyhorse
, The Dalhousie Review, Atlanta Review, Mantis, Drumvoices Revue, na Migrations (ihe odide Afro-Italian nke Wole Soyinka họpụtara maka Ememme Black Heritage na Lagos)

N'afọ 1997, mgbe ọ na-alọta site na nzukọ ndị isi ọchịchị Commonwealth na Edinburgh, Scotland, ọchịchị ndị agha nke ọchịchị Sani Abacha jidere Ifowodo maka ịkpọ oku maka mmachi siri ike megide ọchịchị aka ike
A tụrụ ya mkpọrọ, ya na ndị ọzọ na-ahụ maka ihe ndị ruuru mmadụ, ndị edemede, na ndị nta akụkọ, gụnyere ndị enyi ya na onye edemede Akin Adesokan na Babafemi Ojudu
Ọ dịghị mgbe nwara ma ọ bụ tọhapụrụ ya ruo 1998, na-esochi mkpọsa nke Naijiria na mba ụwa na-ede akwụkwọ na ndị otu ode akwụkwọ

Enyere ya PEN/Barbara Goldsmith Freedom to Write Award, onyinye nturu ugo n'efu nke mba Netherlands nke sitere na Poets of All Nations wee nabata ya dika onye otu ugwu nke PEN Centers nke Germany, United States, na Canada
E bipụtara ihe ndị si n'ihe ndekọ ncheta ya na Gathering Seaweed African Prison Writing (Heinemann), na New Writing 14 (Granta), na akwụkwọ akụkọ Vanguard nke Naijiria, na African-Writingcom
N'afọ 2014, Ifowodo si na United States laghachi Naịjirịa ebe o mere ọmụmụ postgraduate ma kụzie ruo afọ iri na atọ
Ọ chọrọ nhọpụta nke All Progressive Party maka oche na House of Representatives mana, n'ihi enweghị ego zuru oke, ọ gafere primaries
Ọ gbalịrị n'enweghị ihe ịga nke ọma ịnakọta nde naira iri ise na asaa maka itinye ego ahụ
N'afọ 2016, a họpụtara Ifowodo na Ngalaba Ndị Nlekọta nke Niger Delta Development Commission (NDDC)
Ọ rụrụ ọrụ dị ka onye kọmishọna gọọmentị etiti maka Delta State ruo afọ 2019
Nchịkọta mbụ nke uri Ifowodo, Homeland and Other Poems ka Kraft Books bipụtara na 1998; mbipụta nke abụọ ka Africa World Press bipụtara na 2008
Ọ dị peeji 69 n'ogologo, nchịkọta 'nke edere na (ma na-adabere na) oge agha nke Nigeria
na-akọwa ọnọdụ nlelị nke obodo Naijiria n'oge oge a na-ekwu'
Dị ka ihe odide, ọ meriri Association of Nigerian Authors (ANA) Poetry Prize n'afọ 1993
A kpọrọ nchịkọta nke abụọ nke Ifowodo Madiba ma Africa World Press bipụtara ya
Ọ dị peeji iri itoolu n'ogologo
N'ime ya, Ifowodo 'na-ejide egwu, olileanya dara ada na enweghị olileanya nke ọgbọ a'
Nchịkọta ahụ meriri ihe nrite uri ANA / Cadbury n'afọ 2003
Nchịkọta nke atọ nke Ifowodo, The Oil Lamp, bụ nke Africa World Press bipụtara n'afọ 2005
A kọwara ya dị ka 'nkwado itinye aka na arụmụka Niger Delta'
Ọ meriri Ihe nrite 2005 maka ANA/Gabriel Okara
N'afọ 2016, Ifowodo wepụtara nchịkọta abụ nke anọ ya nke akpọrọ A Good Mourning (Parrésia Publishers)
Ọ bụ ọrụ nwere abụ iri abuo na isii karịa peeji 78
A na-eto ya dị ka 'ọrụ nke 'àgwà na-abanye n'ihu,' na 'ihe ijuanya a maara nke ọma
Eziokwu nke olu na ụda nke na-emetụta ahịrị ọ bụla, bụ ihe dị ukwuu ma na-adịgide adịgide nke e ji mee uri

A Good Mourning, onye edemede ahụ na-ekwu, bụ echiche uri ya banyere 'mmekọrịta nke ihe ọjọọ', ọkachasị ihe na-emebi uche nke ndị mmadụ kpatara site na mwepụ nke ntuli aka June 12, 1993 'site n'aka General Ibrahim Babangida, onye ọchịchị aka ike nke ndị agha
N'ọnwa Julaị 2017, edepụtara A Good Mourning maka Nigeria Prize for Literature, yana ọrụ iri ndị ọzọ nke ndị edemede Naijiria
N'ọnwa Ọgọstụ n'otu afọ ahụ, edepụtara ya, tinyere Tanure Ojaide's Songs of Myself na Ikeogu Oke's The Heresiad
Oke meriri ihe nrite ahụ, nke ruru Narị puku dollar
Ogbadibo bụ Obodo Gọọmentị nke Benue Steeti, North Central, Naijiria
O nwere mpaghara atọ ya bụ Orokam, Owukpa, na Otukpa
Isi ụlọ ọrụ gọọmentị ime obodo dị na obodo ọtụkpa
O nwere mpaghara nke 598 km2 na ọnụ ọgụgụ mmadụ 128,707 dị ka ọnụ ọgụgụ afọ 2006
Koodu ozi nke mpaghara ahụ bụ 973

Ogbako Asilomar Mba ụwa na ntinye onu na teknụzụ Ihu igwe bụ nzukọ nke Margaret Leinen nke Climate Response Fund mepụtara ma bụrụ nke Michael MacCracken nke Climate Institute duziri
Nzukọ ahụ mere na Machị 2010 ma bipụta aro ndị ahụ na Nọvemba n'afọ 2010

Ebumnuche ya bụ ịchọpụta ma belata ihe ize ndụ metụtara injinia ihu igwe (geoinjinia, ma ọ bụ ntinye aka ihu igwe), ma dabere n'afọ 1975 Asilomar Conference na Recombinant DNA nke tụlere ihe ndị nwere ike imebi ihe na nhazi nke biotechnology

Otu ìgwè nke ihe karịrị ndị ọkà mmụta sayensị na ndị injinia 150 gbakọtara na ndị ọka iwu, ndị na-ahụ maka gburugburu ebe obibi na ndị ọrụ enyemaka ọdachi na nzukọ ihu ọha iji zere ebubo nke nkata aghụghọ n'oge mkparịta ụka a
Nzukọ Asilomar a lekwasịrị anya naanị na mmepe nke ntuziaka mbelata ihe ize ndụ maka nnwale itinye aka na ihu igwe
Ogbaru bụ ọchịchị ime obodo na steeti Anambra, ndịda etiti Naijiria
Isi ụlọ ọrụ gọọmentị ime mpaghara ahụ dị na ọdụ ụgbọ mmiri nke Atani
Ndị Ogbaru bụ ndị ọrụ ugbo nakwa ndị dike ama ama site na akụkọ ya; Ndị Ogbaru na-ekekọrịta agbụrụ na oke n'etiti ndị Anioma na steeti Delta na ndị Ndoni na steeti Rivers
Ogbaru nwere ọdụ ụgbọ mmiri Naijiria, ọdụ ụgbọ mmiri nke ụlọ ọrụ mmepụta ihe, ebe a na-eme mmanụ ọkụ, okporo ụzọ gọọmenti etiti arụrụ arụ na-eduga na steeti Rivers na Naijiria
Ogbaru bụ okporo ụzọ njikọ a tụrụ anya n'akụkụ ndị ọzọ na mpaghara ndịda ọwụwa anyanwụ na mpaghara ndịda nke Naijiria nke nwere ọtụtụ okporo ụzọ njikọ dị n'ime ala yana ịrụ akwa mmiri Niger nke abụọ
Ndị Ogbaru na-ewere mmiri Niger-River nke na-agafe na mpaghara ya dị ka ala ha

Ogbaru gbara ya gburugburu n'osimiri Niger rue odida anyanwu, site na okpoko obodo rue Ogwu-ikpele oke ha na Rivers steeti (ngucha westi) na Orashi River rue na East sodobe Ogwu-aniocha na Osomari Forest Reserve (east end), Ogbaru boundary with Ihiala and na-aga Okija, Ihiala, Owerri Onitsha road, nakwa oke Ozubulu, Oraifite na Oba n'ebe ugwu ọwụwa anyanwụ ya

Ogbonnaya Onu (amụrụ na Disemba 1, 1951) bụ onye ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị ndị Nigeria, onye edemede na ọnye injinia
Ọ bụ onye ọchịchị gọvanọ mbụ nke Abia steeti na oge gara aga ọbụ Minista Sayensị na Teknụzụ, Federal Republic of Nigeria

A mụrụ Ogbonnaya Onu na ụbọchị nke mbụ nke ọnwa Disemba na afọ 1951 na ezinụlọ nke onye kacha dị elu, onye lagoro mmụọ bụ Eze David Aba Onu (Eze Adu nke Uburu) na Ohaozara Local Gọọmenti Ala nke Ebonyi Steeti, Naijiria
Ọ malitere agụmakwụkwọ ya na Izzi High School dị na Abakaliki, isi obodo Ebonyi State
N’ebea, o nwetara akara nke mbụ site na iche na Akwụkwọ Asambodo West Africa ya
Ọ lere ule nke ụlọ akwụkwọ sekọndrị na College of Immaculate Conception (CIC) Enugu, Ọ gụsịrị akwụkwọ dị ka nwa akwụkwọ kacha mma n'ozuzu ya
Ọ gara Mahadum nke Lagos wee nweta akara mmụta klas mbụ ya na Chemical Engineering na afọ 1976
Ọ gara maka akwukwo dọkịta ya na Mahadum California, Berkeley wee nweta PhD na injin na kemikalu na afọ 1980
Mgbe ọ gụsịrị akwụkwọ na Mahadum Lagos, Ogbonnaya Onu ghọrọ onye nkụzi na Seminari nke St
Augustine, Ezzamgbo, Ebonyi Steeti
Mgbe ọ gụsịrị akwụkwọ doctoral ya na Mahadum California, Berkeley, Dr
Onu ghọrọ onye nkuzi na Ngalaba kemikalu ịnjinia na Mahadum Port Harcourt, ma mesịa ghọọ ọsụ ụzọ nke Ngalaba ahụ
Ọ rụkwara ọrụ dị ka onye na-emebu Dean nke ngalaba nke injinịa ma ahọpụtakwa a ya dika onye otu Kọmitii na-achị isi nke Mahadum ahụ
beOgbonnaya Onu bidoro ọrụ Nchịkwa ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị ya dịka onye chọrọ ntuliaka oche ochie Senatorial na Imo Steeti n'elu ikpo okwu nke National Party of Nigeria (NPN)
Ọ zoro ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị maka ọkwa nke Gọvanọ nke Abia State na afọ 1991 n'okpuru nchedo nke National Republican Convention ma tụrụ ugo mmeri
E dọrọ ya iyi ọrụ dịka onye nchịkwa izizi nke Ọchịchị steeti ahụ na Jenụwarị n'afọ 1992

Ọ bụ onye isi oche mbụ, ogbako nke ndị gọvanọ Naijiria a họpụtara n'afọ 1999, ọ bụ onye na-eburu Onye Ndú ọchịchị ọkọlọtọ maka ọchịchị mmadụ niile mana ọ kwụsịrị ọkwá ya n’aka Chief Olu Falae mgbe ndị otu ya na Alliance for Democracy meriri Olusegun Obasanjo nke PDP
Ọ ghọrọ Onye isi oche nke National Party nke Ndị Nigeria niile n'afọ 2010

N’afọ 2013, ya na ndị otu ya ( ANPP ) jikọtara ọnụ na Action Congress of Nigeria (ACN), Congress for Progressive Change (CPC), Democratic People's Party (DPP) na ụfọdụ ndị otu All Progressives Grand Alliance (APGA) mepụtara nke ọma
All Progressives Congress (APC)
N’ọnwa Nọvemba afọ 2015, Onye isi ala bụ Muhammadu Buhari họpụtara ya ka ọ bụrụ Minister nke Sayensị na Nkà na ụzụ
na 21 Ọgọst 2019, Ejiri Mịnịsta nke Sayensị na Nkà na ụzụ nke Onye Isi Ala Muhammadu Buhari dọrọ ya n' iyi ọrụ ọzọ
Onu bụ onye ama ama na Council of the Regulation of Engineering in Nigeria, onye otu ụlọ ọrụ Naịjirịa nke Injinia, nke ndị otu Naijiria nke KemikaluII
Onu bụ onye ama ama na Council of the Regulation of Engineering in Nigeria, onye otu ụlọ ọrụ Naịjirịa nke Injinia, ☃☃ nke ndị otu Naijiria nke ndi Kemikalu ịnjinia

Dị ka onye Mịnịsta nke Sayensị na Nkà na ụzụ, ọ malitere Izuka Nkà na Ụzụ n'ala anyi nke mere mmemme mbụ ya na mkpụrụ ụbọchị ịrị na atọ wee rụọ na mkpụrụ ụbọchị iri na asaa nke ọnwa Eprel n'afọ 2017 na Abuja na mgbe ahụ na March n'afọ 2018 iji gosipụta ndị na-emepụta ihe na ihe nchọpụta
O binyere aka na ụlọ ọrụ mba atọ maka ibubata teknụzụ na nri
O tinyekwara aka na NASCO na nkwekọrịta iji na emepụta bisikiti n'snye ihe na ahụ na nnukwu na nnukwu

N'afọ 2016, o bidoro ihe mmemme nke akpọrọ “774 YOUNG NIGERIAN SCIENTISTS PRESIDENTIAL award PRESIDENTIAL (774-YONSPA)” nke ga agba ume ma zụlite mmasị ndị ntorobịa nke Naijiria na sayensị, teknụzụ, na ihe ọhụrụ (STI)
Dr Onu kwuru na Naijiria ga-ebido imepụta mkpụrụedemede ime obodo erule n'afọ 2018 nke o kwuru na ọ ga-eweta ọrụ puku iri ano
Site n'afọ 2019, ekwuputabeghi ụlọ nrụpụta pensụ
N'afọ 1999, tupu ntuli aka Onye isi ala na mmekorita nke ndi mmadu nile na ochichi nke ochichi onye kwuo uche ya, Dr
Onu tinyere aka na esemokwu nke juputara na APP / AD hoputara Chief Olu Falae dika onye nchikota onye isi ala
Christopher Michael Barrio Jr
(Jenụwarị 2, 2001-Mach 10, 2021) bụ nwa nwoke onye America dị afọ 20 nke e dinara n'ike ma gbuo na Brunswick, Georgia, na Machị 10, 2021
Achọtara ozu ya na Machị 15, 2021, naanị kilomita ole na ole site na ebe ọ na -efu
George, David na Peggy Edenfield boro ebubo ịtọrọ ma gbuo Christopher
Nwoke nke anọ, Donald Dale, onye eboro ebubo na mbụ na -etinye aka n'ihe akaebe na izo ozu, ekwuola na ọ mara ikpe ka ọ ghọgburu ndị uwe ojii
Onye ọka ikpe nke ụlọ ikpe kacha elu Stephen Scarlett nabatara nkwupụta ahụ wee bufee Dale n'ụlọ ọrụ ahụike uche wee chụpụ ya na Glynn County
Peggy Edenfield gbara akaebe megide di ya David ma kwenyekwara ịgba akaebe n'oge ikpe megide nwa ya nwoke, George
N'ịgbanwe akaebe, Peggy anaghị eche ikpe ọnwụ ikpe
Ikpe nke David Homer Edenfield (amụrụ 18 June 1948) malitere na 29 Septemba 2004 wee kwụsị na 5 Ọktoba 2004
Ndị gbara akwụkwọ gbadoro ukwu na nkwupụta vidiyo vidiyo Edenfield na akaebe nwunye ya
Dọkịta Jamie Downs, onye nyocha ahụike nke mere mgbapụta Christopher, gbakwara ama ruo oke mmerụ ahụ n'ahụ ya na ụdị ọnwụ ya, nke nkwenye Edenfield gosipụtara
Arụmụka mmechi malitere n'ụbọchị nke ise, e zigara ndị juri ka ha kpaa nkata n'ehihie
N'October 5, mgbe naanị mkparịta ụka were awa abụọ, ndị juri ahụ lọghachitere na mkpebi 'ikpe mara ebubo niile' N'October 6, a mara David Edenfield ikpe ọnwụ
N'August 12, 2006, George Edenfield ezughị oke maka ikpe ikpe wee zigara ya ụlọ ọgwụ steeti maka nyocha
Nke a ga -ekpebi ma ndị ọkà n'akparamàgwà mmadụ na ndị ọkachamara ahụike ọgụgụ isi ndị ọzọ ruru eru na Edenfield
E boro David Edenfield ebubo na 1996 na ya na nwa ya nwanyị nwere mmekọahụ ma rịọ ya ikpe
A mara ya ikpe ịnwale
A nwalere George Edenfield na ebubo abụọ nke mmetọ ụmụaka ma nye ya ikpe nkwụsịtụ na Mee 1997
Na Septemba 2012, e boro ya ebubo maka ịnwale njem maka 4,000 ụkwụ (erughị mita 5,900) site na ogige dị n'etiti Brownswick wee nye iwu ka a kpọpụ ya
Na Machị 10, 2006, ụbọchị ole na ole tupu atọrọ Christopher, a mara Edenfield ikpe ịnwale
Iwu steeti machibidoro ndị omekome mmekọahụ ịkwọ ụgbọ ala n'ogige ntụrụndụ, ebe egwuregwu, ebe a na -elekọta ụmụaka, ụlọ akwụkwọ, ụka, ọdọ mmiri na bọs ụlọ akwụkwọ ka enyere n'afọ 2012
Agbanyeghị, onye ọka ikpe gọọmentị gbochiri ụkpụrụ maka nkwụsị ụgbọ ala ụlọ akwụkwọ ka ọ na -eche mkpebi ya na akwụkwọ ikpe, na -ekwupụta ụkpụrụ ahụ na -akwadoghị
George Edenfield na ezinụlọ ya biri naanị mita ole na ole site na nkwụsị bọs ụlọ akwụkwọ ebe Christopher jere ije n'ụlọ akwụkwọ
N'October 2004, foto nke Christopher Barrio Jr
Pụtara na akụkọ ụlọ ọgwụ General Shift Night na netwọ ncha
N'ihe nkiri a, onye na -eme ihe nkiri Billy Di Williams natara akwụkwọ ozi na foto n'aka nwa nwoke ọ hapụrụ
Ndị na -emepụta ihe nkiri a kwuru na ejighị n'aka etu ha siri nweta foto a ma rịọ mgbaghara
Ha kwere nkwa na ha ga -ebipụta usoro mgbasa ozi ọha iji kwanyere Christopher ugwu
Ezinaụlọ Barrios gbara akwụkwọ gbasara obodo megide SOAPnet, nke na -eme opera ncha, na -ebo ebubo imebi nzuzo
Ogbunabali ( Igbo Ogbúnàbà ọrụ̀ [Ọ] na-egbu n'abalị) bụ otu n'ime ọdịnala ndị Igbo Death deity
A na-ewere dika nkọwa nke àgwà ya dị ka onye a sịrị na-egbu onye mejọrọ ya n' abali, ndia na-abụkarị ndi omekome maọbụ ndị mere ihe di njọ taboo
Ogbunigwe Oklahoma City bụ ogbunigwe ndị na-eyi ọha egwu ji ụgbọala tụọ na ụlọ gọọmenti Alfred P
Murrah Federal Building dị na Oklahoma, mba Amerika, na abalị iri na itoolu n'ọnwa Eprel, afọ 1995, ncheta nke njedebe nnọchibido Waco nke abụọ ya
Ọ bụ omume iyi ọha egwu kachasị njọ n'akụkọ ihe mere eme nke mba Amerika ruo mgbe mwakpo nke emere n'ọnwa Septemba n'afó 2001 mèrè
ọ ka bụkwa omume iyi ọha ọha egwu kachasị gbuo mmadụ n'akụkọ ihe mere eme na mba Amerika, yana nke abụọ kachasị gbuo n'ozuzu
Ogbunigwe a ọ bụ ndị ọcha abụọ na-emefe ihe ókè na-emekwa na ha kacha dị elu bụ Timothy McVeigh na Terry Nicholstụrụ ya

Ogbunigwe a dara mgbe o ji nkeji abụọ gafee elekere itoolu nke ụtụtụ, wee gbuo ndị mmadụ dị ótù narị na iri isii na asatọ n'ọnụ ọgụ, merụọ mmadụ narị isii na iri asatọ ahụ, wee mebie ihe karịrị ótù ụzọ n'ime ụzọ atọ nke ụlọ ahụ, nke meziri ka akutuo ụlọ ahụ kpamkpam
Ihe nkuri ahụ mebiri ụlọ ndị ọzọ dị narị atọ na iri abụọ na anọ n'ọnụ ọgụ ndị nọ n'àgbàtà otu ruo iri na isii na gburugburu ebe ahụ ogbunigwe ahụ dara
Ọ kụsakwara glaasị ụlọ dị narị abụọ na iri ise nà asatọ n'ọnụ ọgụ ma mebie ụgbọala dị irí asatọ na isii, nke mere na achịkọọ ya ọnụ, ogbunigwe ahụ mebiri ihe di ǹdè dọla narị isii na iri ise na abụọ
Ndị nnyemaaka ịzọ ndụ sitere na gọọmenti okpuru ọchịchị ruo na nke steeti, ruo na nke gọọmenti etiti, ruokwa na nke mba ụwa tinyechara aka n'ịzọpụta ndị mmadụ ka chi ụbọchị nke na-esote nke ahụ bọrọ

Ụlọ ọrụ Federal Emergency Management Agency (FEMA) zipuru ndị òtù ọrụ ha azụrụ iche maka ịchọ na ịzọpụta ndị ihe mberede dakwasịrị n'obodo ndị mepere emepe dị iri na otụ n'ọnụ ọgụ nke ndị ọrụ mejupụtara ya dị narị isii na iri isii na ise n'ọnụ ọgụ ndi nyere aka ịzọpụta na iweghachị ụfọdụ ihe
and killed 168 people, injured 680, and destroyed more than one-third of the building, which had to be demolished
The blast destroyed or damaged 324 other buildings within a 16-block radius, shattered glass in 258 buildings, and destroyed 86 cars, causing an estimated $652 million worth of damage
Local, state, federal, and worldwide agencies engaged in extensive rescue efforts in the wake of the bombing
The Federal Emergency Management Agency (FEMA) activated 11 of its Urban Search and Rescue Task Forces, consisting of 665 rescue workers who assisted in rescue and recovery operations

N'ime nkeji iri itoolu ka ogbunigwe ahụ dachara, onye ọrụ nchekwa nke ngaghari Oklahoma bụ Charlie Hanger kwụsịrị McVeigh maka ịkwọ ụgbọala na-enweghị asambodo ikike ịgba n'ụzọ, wee jide ya maka inwe ngwá agha ndị iwu na-akwadoghị
Ihe akaebe ndị omempụ gosiri na aka McVeigh na Nichols dị na mwakpo ahụ; E jidere Nichols, mechaa n'ime ụbọchị ole na ole, ebo ha abụọ ebubo
E mechara chọpụta na Michael na Lori Fortier so dị ka ndị nnyemaka
McVeigh, onye ọlụ agha Gulf na onye na-akwado ndị agha Amerika, bịanyụrụ ọtụtụ ogbunigwe juputara ótù ụgbọala Ryder agbazitere agbazite mgbe ọ kwụsịrị n'ihu ụlọ ahụ
Nichols nyere aka na nkwadebe nke ogbunigwe ahụ

N'ịbụ onye n'ahughị gọọmentị etiti mba Amerika n'anya nakwa enweghị obi ụtọ maka òtù gọọmentị ahụ jiri gaa ije okwu Ruby Ridge n'afọ 1992 nakwa okwu mwakpo awakporo Waco n'afọ 1993, McVeigh mere ka mwakpo ya ahụ na oge ncheta nke abụọ ya nke ọkụ ahụ kwụsịrị nnọchibido ámá David Branch dị na Waco, Texas gakọọ n'otu mgbe

Nnyocha FBI, nke a maara dị ka 'OKBOMB', gụnyere ajụjụ ọnụ dị puku iri abụọ na asatọ n'ọnụ ọgụ, 35 tọn mkpụmkpụ (3,200 kilogram) nke ihe akaebe, nakwa ụmụ kịrịkịrị ozi achikọtara ónụ nke fọrọ nke nta ka ọ bụrụ otu ijeri n'ọnụ ọgụ
Mgbe FBI wakporo ụlọ McVeigh, ọ chọtara nọmba ekwentị nke dugara ha n'ugbo ebe McVeigh zụrụ ihe maka bọmbụ ahụ
E kpere ndị na-atụ bọmbụ ikpe ma maa ha ikpe n'afọ 1997
N'ịbụ onye a mara ikpe ọnwụ, e gburu McVeigh site na ọgwụ na-egbu egbu na June 11, 2001, na ụlọ mkpọrọ gọọmentị etiti US na Terre Haute, Indiana
A mara Nichols ikpe ịga mkpọrọ ndụ ya niile n'afọ 2004

Michael na Lori Fortier gbara akaebe megide McVeigh na Nichols; A mara Michael Fortier ikpe ịga mkpọrọ afọ iri na abụọ maka ịghara ịdọ gọọmentị United States aka ná ntị, Lori nwetakwara nnwere onwe pụọ n'ikpe iji gbanwere akaebe ya
Ogbunigwe Oklahoma City bụ ogbunigwe ụgbọ ala ndị na-eyi ọha egwu tụrụ na ụlọ gọọmenti Alfred P
Murrah Federal Building dị na Oklahoma City, Oklahoma, mba Amerika, na abalị iri na itoolu n'ọnwa Eprel, afọ 1995, ncheta nke Njedebe nnọchibido Waco nke abụọ ya

Ọ bụ omume iyi ọha egwu kachasị njọ n'akụkọ ihe mere eme nke mba Amerika ruo mgbe mwakpo nke Septemba n'afó 2001, ọ ka bụkwa omume iyi ọha ọha egwu kachasị gbuo mmadụ n'akụnụ ihe mere eme na US, yana nke abụọ kachasị gbuo n'ozuzu
Oge-Pedic mba ụwa, Inc, nke bụzi akụkụ nke Tempur Sealy mba ụwa, bụ onye na-emepụta ma na-ekesa matarasị na ohiri isi e ji ụfụfụ mee
Ụlọ ọrụ ahụ nwere isi ụlọ ọrụ na Coldstream Nnyocha kamposna Lexington, Kentucky ma nwee ụlọ ọrụ mmepụta ihe nọr na mkpóró ndị ihe na Duffield, Virginia na Albuquerque, New Mexico
Tempur dabeere na nyocha NASA iji mepụta ihe ga-eme ka oche ụgbọ elu dị mma ma melite ịdị ndụ ma ọ bụrụ na ihe mberede
Ọ bụ Fagerdala World Foams, ụlọ ọrụ Swedish technical foam, webatara matarasị Tempur-Pedic mbụ
E webatara akara ahụ na United States na 1992 ma guzobe ụlọ ọrụ Tempur-Pedic, Inc
Ndị nkesa itoolu nke Fagerdala, gụnyere Tempur-Pedic, Inc, jikọtara na 1999 iji guzobe ụlọ ọrụ Tempur World, nke gbanwere na 2002 dị ka Tempur-Bedic mba ụwa Inc
Ụlọ ọrụ ahụ pụtara n'ihu ọha n'afọ 2003
N'afọ 2012, Tempur-Pedic na Sealy Corporation kwupụtara atụmatụ ijikọ
Tempur-Pedic kwụrụ $ 2286 nde, mana ụlọ ọrụ abụọ ahụ na-arụ ọrụ iche
N'afọ 2015, ụlọ ọrụ German Federal Cartel Office kwụrụ ụlọ ọrụ Tempur-Pedic nke Germany ụgwọ nde € 155 maka itinye aka na nhazi ọnụahịa kwụ ọtọ n'etiti Ọgọstụ 2005 na Julaị 2011
Àtụ Mattresses
Oge ụra Donald bụ ihe nkiri dị mkpirikpi nke Donald Duck nke e wepụtara na Mee 9, 1947, ma mepụta ya na Technicolor site na RKO Foto redio
Ọ bụ ihe nkiri nke isii na fim Donald iji gosipụta Daisy Duck
Ihe dị mkpirikpi ahụ na-agba gburugburu mbọ Daisy na-agba ịzọpụta Donald ka ọ na-agba ọsọ n'ihe ize ndụ nke esie osikapa na ụdị mgbe ọ na-ehi ụra
E wepụtara mkpirikpi ahụ na Disemba 11, 2007, na Walt Disney Treasures The Chronological Donald, Mpịakọta nke Atọ 1947-1950
Na sayensị ụra, ụra mmalite (SOL) bụ ogologo oge ọ na-ewe iji mezuo mgbanwe site na ịmụrụ anya zuru oke gaa n'ụra, na-abụkarị na nke kachasị mfe n'ime usoro ụra na-abụghị REM
Onye na-eme nchọpụta na ụra na Mahadum nke dị Stanford William C
Dement na-akọ mmalite mmepe nke echiche ahụ, na nke ule mbụ maka ya, Ọtụtụ ụraLatency Test (MSLT), n'akwụkwọ ya The Promise of Sleep
Dement na ímé ihe ọ bụla n'ime anyị si nọrọ anyị si egosi ndị ọrụ ibe ya gụnyere Mary Carskadon anọwo na-achọ ihe ziri ezi nke ụra ehihie iji nyere aka nyochaa mmetụta nke nsogbu ụra
N'oge a na-enyocha nsonaazụ nnwale, ha ghọtara na oge ọ na-ewe iji hie ụra n'àkwà ndị mmadụ n'ihe nwere njikọ chiri anya na ogo ụra nke ndị ahụ na-enyo onwe ha

'Nke a nwere ike ọ gaghị adị ka ihe na-eme ka ụwa maa jijiji, mana ịtụle na ịzụlite ihe ziri ezi nke ụra bụ ma eleghị anya otu n'ime ndị na eme ìhè ahụ n'ebe nile site n'ime ụmụ ndị nke dị ka onye isi oche n'ime ọganihu kachasị mkpa na ímé sayensị ụra, 'Dement na onye edemede Christopher Vaughn dere banyere nchọpụta na ímé ihe nọr ka ébé ahụ
Mgbe ha mepụtara MSLT na mbụ, Dement na ndị ọzọ tinyere ndị mmadụ n'ime ụlọ dị jụụ, gbara ọchịchịrị nwere àkwà ma gwa ha ka ha dina ala, mechie anya ha ma zuo ike
Ha kwuru na ọnụọgụ nke nkeji, site na 0 ruo 20, na ọ na-ewe onye na-ehi ụra

Ọ bụrụ na onye ọrụ afọ ofufo ka na-amụ anya mgbe nkeji iri abụọ gasịrị, a kwụsịrị nnwale na ímé ihe nọr na mkpóró ndị mmadụ n'ihe ndị mere n'oge gara maka nsogbụ ụra nke ukwuu n'ihi na ímé ihe ọ bụla n'ime anyị si nọrọ na nche ahụ ma nye onye ahụ ọkwa kachasị elu / obere ụra

Mgbe ndị ọkà mmụta sayensị gbochiri ndị mmadụ ihi ụra, ha chọpụtara na ogo ụra nwere ike ịdaba na ụdị nke ụwa họrọ site n'ime ụmụ ndị ikom abụọ ahụ a ịghọ ndị ozi n'okpuru 1, ya bụ, ndị mmadụ nwere ike ịda n'ihe na-erughị otu nkeji
Ọnụ ọgụgụ ụra furu efu nwere njikọ kpọmkwem na mgbanwe na akara ụra
Nnyocha ndị ahụ mechara mee ka Dement na Carskadon kwubie na 'ụbụrụ na-edekọ kpọmkwem ole a ga-ehi ụra'
Enweghị ụra zuru ezu n'oge ọ bụla a na-enye na-eduga n'ihe a na-akpọ ụgwọ ụra, nke na-ebelata akara ụra ma mee ka ndị na-enweghị ụra daa ụra ngwa ngwa
Maka nnwale n'ụlọ maka oge ụra dị ala na enweghị ike ihi ụra, ndị edemede na-ezo aka na usoro nke Nathaniel Kleitman, 'nna nke nyocha ụra'
Onye ahụ na-anọdụ ala n'ime ụlọ dị jụụ, nke gbara ọchịchịrị ma na-etinye aka na-ejide spoon n'akụkụ àkwà ma ọ bụ oche, na-etinye efere n'ala n'okpuru spoon
Mgbe ọ nyochachara oge, onye ahụ na-anwa izu ike ma hie ụra
Mgbe ụra ruru, spoon ahụ ga-ada ma kụọ efere ahụ, na-akpọte onye ahụ, onye na-enyocha iji hụ oge ole agafeela
Ọnụ ọgụgụ nke nkeji gafere bụ mmalite ụra n'oge ahụ n'ụbọchị ahụ
Dement na-adụ ọdụ ka ị ghara ime nyocha ndị a n'abalị mgbe ụra malitere nwere ike ịdị ala, ọkachasị n'etiti ndị agadi
Kama nke ahụ, ọ na-atụ aro ịnwale mmalite ụra n'ehihie, nke kachasị mma n'elekere 10 00 nke ụtụtụ, elekere 12 30 nke mgbede na elekere 3 00 nke mgbede

Oge ụra nke 0 ruo 5 nkeji na-egosi oke ụra, 5 ruo 10 nkeji bụ 'ihe na-enye nsogbu', 10 ruo 15 nkeji na-egosipụta obere ma 'a na-achịkwa' ụgwọ ụra, na 15 ruo 20 nkeji na-anọchite anya 'obere ma ọ bụ enweghị' ụgwọ ụra
Ndị na-eme nchọpụta n'oge a, gụnyere Paul Shaw nke Washington University School of Medicine na St
Louis, anọwo na-achụso mmepe nke ihe ngosi nke ihe ndị dị ndụ, ma ọ bụ biomarkers, nke ụra

N'ọnwa Disemba afọ 2006, Shaw kọrọ n'ịntanetị na The Proceedings of the National Academy of Sciences na ụlọ nyocha ya egosila na ọkwa amylase na-abawanye na nsị mkpụrụ osisi mgbe ụmụ ahụhụ na-enweghị ụra
O gosiputara na amylase mmadụ mụbara ka a na-anapụkwa ndị mmadụ ụra
Tiempo bụ mmemme nké na-enye mba ndị na-emepe emepe ozi dị mkpa iji meghachi omume nke ọma na nsogbụ mgbanwe ihu igwe
Tiempo na-enye ozi iji nyéré mba ndị a aka isonye na mkparịta ụka nkwekọrịta ihu igwe, yana ịchọpụta ma tinye n'ọrụ usoro mgbochi ikuku na mgbanwe kwesịrị ekwesị
Ọ na-enyekwa nzukọ màkà nkwurịta okwu na arụmụka ma n'ime mba ndị na-emepe emepe ma n'etiti mba ndị a na ụwa mepere emepe
Tiempo bụ nkè Stockholm Environment Institute na International Institute for Environment and Development jikọrọ áká hazie
Ọ bụ Swedish International Development Cooperation Agency na-akwado ya
Ébé nrụọrụ weebụ Tiempo na-enye ozi gbasara mgbanwe ihu igwe

Ọ na-agụnye 'The Tiempo Climate Portal', ndepụta nke ébé nrụọrụ weebụ ahọpụtara na-ekpuchi ihu igwe na mmepe na nsogbụ metụtara ya, na 'Tiempo Climate Newswatch', magazin na-adị n'ịntanetị kwa izu nwere akụkọ, atụmatụ na nkọwa gbásárá okpomọkụ ụwa, mgbanwe ihu igwe, ịrị elu nke oke osimiri na nsogbụ mmepe

Tiempo bụ magazin a na-ebipụta kwa nkeji iri na ise nkè na-enye ndị ọrụ na ndị na-agụ akwụkwọ akụkọ na ozi gbásárá nsogbụ mgbanwe ihu igwe, ma na-enye ohere màkà ndị édémédé mba na-emepe emepe iji gosipụta echiche ha
Ọ nọ na mmepụta na-aga n'ihu kemgbe afọ 1994
Mbipụta ọ bụla nke magazin ahụ nwèrè ihe nkiri, ụfọdụ n'ime ha abụwo arụmụka
Saleemul Huq, Hannah Reid, Sarah Granich, Mick Kelly na Johan Kuylenstierna na-edezi Tiempo ugbu a
Tiempo Afrique bụ asụsụ French nke Tiempo quarterly magazine màkà francophone West Africa
Ọ bụ ụlọ ọrụ gbụrụ-gbúrụ ébé obibi ENDA-TM na Dakar, Senegal mepụtara ya
Djimingue Nanasta, Jean-Philippe Thomas na Lawrence Flint na-edezi Tiempo Afrique ugbu a
Oge Afrịka (ma ọ bụ oge Afrịka) bụ ọdịbendị a na-ahụ anya, n'akụkụ ụfọdụ nke Afrịka na Caribbean maka àgwà dị jụụ karị n'oge
A na-eji nke a eme ihe mgbe ụfọdụ n'ụzọ mkparị, banyere igbu oge na nhọpụta, nzukọ na ihe omume
Nke a na-agụnyekwa ụdị ndụ dị jụụ, nke na-adịchaghị mma, nke a na-ahụkarị na mba ndị Afrịka, ọkachasị ma e jiri ya tụnyere ndụ kwa ụbọchị na mba ndị dị n'Ebe Ọdịda Anyanwụ
N'ihi nke a, ọ dị ka oge na mpaghara ọdịbendị ndị ọzọ na-abụghị nke ọdịda anyanwụ
Ọdịdị nke enweghị oge ma ọ bụ àgwà dị nro banyere oge n'Africa, nwere ike igosipụta ụzọ na usoro dị iche iche na ijikwa ọrụ, ihe omume, na mmekọrịta
A na-akọwakarị ọdịbendị Afrịka dị ka 'polychronic', nke pụtara na ndị mmadụ na-ejikarị ihe karịrị otu ihe n'otu oge kama n'usoro siri ike
A na-ejikwa mmekọrịta mmadụ na ibe ya n'ụzọ a, nke mere na ọ bụghị ihe a na-ahụkarị inwe ihe karịrị otu mkparịta ụka n'otu oge
A tụwo aro 'ịmara oge mmetụta uche' nke Afrịka nke dị iche na 'ịmara ihe na-eme n'oge' nke ọdịda anyanwụ
Na Caribbean, '[t]hings agaghị eme mgbe niile ngwa ngwa ma ọ bụ kpọmkwem dị ka ị nwere ike mara'
N'ihi mmetụta ọdịbendị nke 'oge Caribbean' ma ọ bụ 'oge agwaetiti', ndị obodo enweghị mmetụta nke nrụgide oge nke bụ akụkụ nke ọdịbendị ọdịda anyanwụ
Echiche nke oge Afrịka aghọwo isiokwu dị mkpa nke nkatọ onwe onye na Afrịka nke oge a
Dị ka otu onye edemede Ghana si kwuo,

N'ọnwa Ọktoba n'afọ 2007, mkpọsa Ivorian megide oge Afrịka, nke Onye isi ala Laurent Gbagbo kwadoro, nwetara nlebara anya mgbasa ozi mba ụwa mgbe emere ihe omume a na-akpọ 'N'abalị N'Abidjan iji mata ndị ọchụnta ego na ndị ọrụ gọọmentị maka ịnọ n'oge mgbe niile
Okwu mmeghe nke mkpọsa ahụ bụ Oge Afrịka' na-egbu Afrịka - ka anyị lụso ya ọgụ'
Reuters kọrọ na 'ndị na-ahazi ya na-atụ anya ime ka a mara etu nnọkọ, nzukọ ma ọ bụ ọbụna bọs na-egbu oge si belata mmepụta ihe n'ógbè ebe igbu oge bụ ihe a na-ahụkarị'
E kwuru na onye mmeri nke afọ a, onye ndụmọdụ iwu Narcisse Aka - onye natara $ 60,000 Villa iji kwado oge ya - 'dị mma n'ụzọ pụrụ iche na ndị ọrụ ibe ya na-akpọ ya 'Mr White Man's Time
Ụfọdụ ndị njem nleta ọdịda anyanwụ na Caribbean 'na-ewe iwe ma ọ bụrụ na ndị obodo anaghị azaghachi ngwa ngwa ma ọ bụ nke ọma na arịrịọ ọ bụla dịka ndị ọrụ ma ọ bụ ndị ọrụ na-eme n'ụlọ'
A na-egosi ọdịiche dị n'etiti oge Afrịka na oge ọdịda anyanwụ na ihe nkiri dị mkpirikpi Binta na Great Idea

Onye na-eme ihe nkiri ahụ, onye ọkụ azụ n'otu obere obodo dị na Senegal, enweghị ike ịghọta echiche ọhụrụ ndị enyi ya si Europe wetara; a na-eji elekere aka Switzerland eme ihe nnọchianya, nke na-ada n'oge dị iche iche maka obi ụtọ nke enyi ahụ, mana n'enweghị ihe doro anya
A na-egosi onye ọkụ azụ ahụ ka ọ na-agafe n'etiti ndị ọrụ dị iche iche na echiche ya, nke n'ikpeazụ bụ nkatọ siri ike nke ọdịbendị ọdịda anyanwụ na-etinye uche na arụmọrụ na ọganihu
Ogechukwu Olufunmilola Modie, onye amuru na abali iri na abuo na onwa Januari 1976, bu onye oru oyibo, burukwa onye isi ndi oru onye minister na afu maka ihe gbasara mmanu-ojiji na ala anyi
Na mbu, obu onye isi ndi oru nye onye isi na afu maka mmanu (Group Managing Director, GMD) na ngalaba Nigerian National Petroleum Corporation (NNPC)
Ka emesiri, ahoputa onye isi ndi GMD ka oburu onye isi oche ndi Board of Corporation ka esi dee ya na section 1(2) na akwukwo iwu ndi NNPC nke afo 1997, nke emeharizi na ubochi ano na onwa July 2016
Oru ya bu ihazi ka oru si aga na ngalaba ahu
Obukwazi oru ya ina enye Dr Emmanuel Ibe Kachikwu ntuziaka gbasara ufodu ihe
Omalitere oru na onwa August 2015
Tupu ihe ona ru mgbua, ha mere Modie onye isi CEO ni me NOIPolls no na Nigeria
E denere aha ya na Business Day Magazine ebe ha kporo ya 'nwanyi puru iche si te na kosi were oru ya wey kporo iheÀtụ Cn

Oge Okoye (amuru na abali iri-na-isii nke ọnwa Nọvemba n’afọ 1980) bu onye actress na Nigeria
A mụrụ Okoye na London, ma mesịa ya ndị ezinụlọ ya kwaga na Lagos Ọ gụsịrị akwụkwọ na Nnamdi Azikiwe University, Awka ma nweta nzere digiri Theatre Arts
N’afọ 2006, a họpụtara ya maka onyinye ihe nkiri African Movie Academy for “Best Actress maka nkwado ọrụ ya nakwa akparamagwa ya n'ihe nkiri a kpọrọ Eagle's Bride

Ogechi Ogwudu bụ onye Naijiria na-eme taekwondo
O ritere ọla nchara n'asọmpi African Taekwondo Championship nke afọ 2009 na n'udi -57kg
Ogechi Onyinanya bụ onye si n'obodo Naijiria na-eche goolu bọọlụ
