Ememme
Ememme Iria Ememme Iria malitere na narị afọ nke iri na isii; emume kwa afọ nke nwanyị bụ nke a na-eme n'ogige ahịa dị na Okrika, obodo ochie na Rivers Steeti, Naijirịa
A na-ahụ ụmụ agbọghọ na-akpú ara ka ndị mmadụ na-ebido ịghọ nwanyị
A na-ewepụta ụmụ agbọghọ na-amaghị nwoke ma debe ha n'ime ụlọ ebe a na-eri abụba, ebe a na-elekọta ha maka emumme
Ndị Okrikan dị ka ndị otu Ijo ndị ọzọ nke Niger Delta bụ ndị a na-ahazi ka ha bụrụ ụlọ agha-Canoe (Omuaru-wari) kwụụrụ onwe ya na nha nhata
Ndị ikwu na-ebikọ ọnụ n'otu mpaghara mejupụtara Ụlọ Agha-Canoe nke ọ bụla
Ọ bụ ezie na War-Canoe bụ ụlọ ọrụ ikwu, n'akụkọ ihe mere eme, ọ na-emetụta isi agha na nchekwa
Ụlọ agha-Canoe nwere ike ịdị iche n'ihe gbasara nha na ike mmadụ, Otú ọ dị
A na-ekerịta uru na akụ obodo n'ụlọ War-Canoe n'otu aka ahụ na adabereghị na ike ọnụọgụgụ ha
Ụlọ Agha-Canoe ọ bụla bụ onye isi nke onye isi na-enyere aka n'ọrụ dị iche iche site n'aka ndị isi ala
A na-akpọ onye isi dị ka 'Warinyanabo' ma ọ bụ 'Waridabo' na-egosi ọkwa ya dị ka onye isi nke ụlọ War-Canoe dum (Omuaru-wari)
Ụlọ Agha-Canoe ọ bụla nke a na-akpọkwa Omuaru-wari ma ọ bụ Warinyengi bụ nke ndị okpuru ọchịchị a maara dị iche iche dị ka 'Warikubu' ma ọ bụ 'Oko' mebere
Nke ọ bụla sub-unit (Warikubu ma ọ bụ Oko) bụ onye isi nke onye isi nke a maara na mpaghara dịka 'Oko-tibidabo'
A na-ekewakwa ngalaba nke ọ bụla (Warikubu ma ọ bụ Oko) gaa n'ezinaụlọ agbasawanye nke a maara dị ka 'Furo'
Ihe e ji mara ya bụ njikọ chiri anya siri ike, ndị Furo nwere ndị nna nna, nne na nna, nwanne nna, nwanne nna, ụmụnne nwanyị, ụmụnne nwanyị, ụmụnne nwanyị, ụmụ nwanne na ụmụ nwanne
Klasị Sistemu N'ime ụlọ ọ bụla War-Canoe, e nwere klas anọ maka ụmụ nwoke na atọ maka ụmụ nwanyị
A na-akpọ klas dị ka 'Mumbu'

A na-ekewa ndị ikom nọ n'ụlọ War-Canoe ma e wezụga Chief na King (Amayanabo) na 'Opu Mumbu' (nke mbụ), 'Ogbobiri Mumbu' 'nke abụọ), 'Kala Mumbu' ('nke atọ) na ' Owuapu-awo' (ndị nọ n'afọ iri na ụma n'okpuru afọ iri na asatọ)
N'otu aka ahụ, a na-etinye ụmụ nwanyị nọ n'ụlọ War-Canoe na 'Opu Mumbu' (nke mbụ), 'Kala Mumbu' 'nke abụọ) na 'Iria-Soka Awo' (Nwaanyị)
Usoro klas ahụ bụ usoro nhazi nkịtị, agbanyeghị na ọ na-eme ka ịrụsi ọrụ ike na ọganihu n'ime Ụlọ Agha-Canoe
Ọnọdụ na-adabere na afọ na ihe ndị ọ rụzuru
Otú ọ dị, isi ihe ndị na-ekpebi nkwalite na klas a nyere nwere ike ịdị iche n'etiti Ụlọ Agha-Canoe
N'adịghị ka usoro Caste, klas abụghị ihe nketa ma ọ bụ nyefee
Ya mere, ọ dịghị onye nọ n'ụlọ War-Canoe a mụrụ na klas
Ndị nọ n'elu klas ahụ nwere òkè ka ukwuu na uru na ibu arọ ego nke War-Canoe House mana mkpebi n'ime ụlọ War-Canoa bụ ọchịchị onye kwuo uche ya

N'akụkọ ihe mere eme, ndị Okrika n'oge ochie bụ ndị okpukpere chi na-ekwere n'ọtụtụ chi na chi
Ndị ọzọ ebe animist bụ́ ndị kweere n'ọtụtụ mmụọ gụnyere mmụọ mmiri na mmụọ nke ndị nna nna ha
A na-ewere Finibeso dị ka onye isi chi nke ndị Okrika oge ochie na onye ụkọchukwu ya ebe a na-asọpụrụ n'etiti ndị ụkọchukwu ndị ọzọ
Ụlọ nsọ Fenibeso kacha dị nsọ na nke dị nsọ
Na omenala, enweghị mmachi ọ bụla amachibidoro ife chi ọ bụla, n'ihi na enwere nnwere onwe ife ofufe na Okrika mgbe niile

Ọchịchị ime Obodo Okrika nwere nnukwu ego nke mmanụ crude na gas na-arụ ọrụ nke ụlọ ọrụ na-egwupụta mmanụ na nchacha ihe na-enye aka na akụ na ụba nke mpaghara ahụ
Ọzọkwa, ịkụ azụ bụ ọrụ akụ na ụba ọzọ na-ewu ewu nke ndị Okrika na-arụ dịka ọtụtụ osimiri na oke osimiri na-eme ka ha baa ọgaranya na nri oké osimiri
Ịkọ ugbo bụ ọrụ ọzọ e ji mara ndị Okrika na-akụ ọtụtụ ihe ọkụkụ nke gụnyere akpu, nkwụ mmanụ, ji, na imere
Tupu ebido ọrụ mmanụ na gas, ndị Okrika bụ ndị ama ama maka ịkụ azụ, ọrụ ugbo na ịzụ ahịa; ọrụ akụ na ụba ndị a na-akwado ihe ha ji ebi ndụ

Mkpu kwa ụbọchị ma ọ bụ nhụsianya nke ndị Okrika bụ na ha nọ n'aka ọnwụ na ndụ dị mkpirikpi n'ihi ya

Okwui Enwezor (akpọ /ɛ n w eɪ z ər / en-UZO -zər ) a mụrụ ya dị ka nwa nwoke ikpeazụ na ezinụlọ onye ọgaranya Igbo na Awkuzu na Naịjiria n'afo 1963
N'afọ 1982, ka a gụsịrị semester akwụkwọ na Mahadum Naịjiria, Enwezor kwagara naBronx, New York, mgbe ọ dị afọ iri na asatọ
N' afo 1987 ọ nwetara akara ugo mmụta bachelor nke Arts na sayensi ndọrọndọrọ ọchịchị na Mahadum New Jersey City
Mgbe Enwezor gụsịrị akwụkwọ, ọ kwagara n’obodo ọzọ ma were uri
Ọ rụrụ ọrụ n'ụlọ ọrụ Knitting na Nuorican Poets Café nke dị na ógbè East
Ọmụmụ Enwezor dere gbasara uri, duuru ya gaa n'ụdị usoro nka asụsụ dịka Conceptual Art gaa katọọ nka

Ndị otu ndị Africa na-akatọ Chika Okeke-Agulu na Salah Hassan sonyeere na 1993, Enwezor wepụtara Nka Journal nke Contemporary African Art n'ụlọ obibi ya dị na Brooklyn; 'Nka' bụ okwu ndị Igbo pụtara ịmepụta ihe
Ọ kpọtara ndị odeakwụkwọ na ndị ọrụ nka dịka Olu Oguibe na Carl Hancock Rux ka ha degharịa isi okwu ya wee dee maka ya
Mgbe o tinyechara obere ihe ngosi ihe nka ugboro ugboro, Enwezor mere ọfụma na afọ 1996 dịka onye na-enyocha In / n'anya, ihe ngosi mmadụ dị iri atọ na-ese foto Africa na Guggenheim Museum
Na / ihu bụ ọbụ otu n'ime ihe ngosi izizi nke ọ bụla iji tinye nka nke oge a site na Africa na usoro akụkọ ihe mere eme na ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị na ntopute nke steeti Africa nwere onwe ha
Enwezor bụ onye isi na Haus der Kunst, Munich, nke obodo Germany
O nwekwara ọrụ nke onye na-ahụ maka nnabata nke International Center of Photography na New York City, yana Joanne Cassulo Fellow na Whitney Museum nke American Art, New York City
N'afọ 2013, Enwezor ka a họpụtara ka ọ bụrụ onye nyochaa nke 2015 na Venice Biennale, e mee ka ọ bụrụ onye nchịkwa mbụ a mụrụ n'Africa na ngosipụta afọ otu narị na iri abụọ
Oge gara aga, Enwezor bụ onye ntụzi nka nke Documenta 11 na mba Germany (1998 --2002), dị ka onye mbụ na-abụghị Ònye ọcha nke nwere ọrụ ahụ

Ọ rụkwara ọrụ dị ka onye ntụzi-aka nke Abụọ Johannesburg Biennale (1996–97), Bienal Internacional de Arte Contemporaneo de Sevilla, na Seville na obodo Spain (2006), onye nke asaa Gwangju Biennale na obodo South Korea (2008), na Triennale d'Art Contemporain nke Paris na Palais de Tokyo (2012)
Ọ rụkwara ọrụ dịka onye nyocha nke Echigo-Tsumari Ihe osise Biennale na Japan ; Cinco Continente Biennale nke sere, Mexico City ; na obodo Stan Douglas Le Detroit, Art Institute nke mba Chicago
Enwezor ka a kpọrọ onye na-ahụ maka nyochaa na Art Institute nke Chicago na afọ 1998

Ọ rụkwara ọtụtụ ihe ngosi na ọtụtụ ihe ngosi nka ndị ọzọ dị iche iche gburugburu ụwa, gụnyere Ihe Omume nke Onwe Portraiture and Social Identity, The Walther Collection, Germany; Ahụ Ikpo Ebe Ihe iji dọkụmentị ahụ na Contemporary Art, International Center of Photography ; Century Short Nnwere Onwe na Nnwere Onwe Onye Na Africa, 1945-1994, Villa Stuck, Munich, Martin-Gropius-Bau, Berlin, Museum of Contemporary Art Chicago, na PS1 na Museum of Modern Art, New York ; Obodo Century, Tate Modern, London ; Edge nke Edge, Bildmuseet, Umeå, Sweden, Vancouver Art Gallery, Vancouver, Tramway, Glasgow, Castello di Rivoli, Torino ; Na / Sight Ndị na-ese foto n'Africa, 1940 – Ugbu a, Guggenheim Museum ; Global Conceptualism, Queens Museum, New York, Walker Art Center, Minneapolis, Henry Art Gallery, Seattle, Ndepụta Ọbá na MIT, Cambridge; David Goldblatt Afọ iri na ise, Museum nke Contemporary Art, Barcelona, AXA osisi, New York, Palais des Beaux Art, Brussels, Lenbachhaus, Munich, Johannesburg Art Gallery, Johannesburg, na Witte de Na, Rotterdam

Ọ haziri The Rise and Fall of apartheid maka International Center for Photography, na mba New York, na 2012 na 'Nzukọ nke isii , ihe ngosi ọtụtụ na mmemme 'nke mere n'obodo iteghete n'etiti ọdịda anyanwụ na mba North African na European, site na Ramallah rue Tangier rukwaa Berlin ”, ya nan

Ọ haziri The Rise and Fall of apartheid maka International Center for Photography, na mba New York, na 2012 ☃☃ na 'Nzukọ nke isii , ihe ngosi ọtụtụ na mmemme 'nke mere n'obodo iteghete n'etiti ọdịda anyanwụ na mba North African na European, site na Ramallah rue Tangier rukwaa Berlin ”, ya na Beirut Art Center na Eprel na afo 2011

Ihe ngosi ikpeazụ ya gụnyere 'El Anatsui Triumphant Scale,' ya na Chika Okeke-Agulu jikọtara aka ọnụ na onwa Maachị dị na mkpụrụ ụbọchị asatọ na afọ 2019 na Haus der Kunst, Munich, tupu ọ mepee na Mathaf Arab Museum na Modern Art na ọnwa Septemba dị na mkpụrụ ụbọchị iri atọ na afọ 2019

Enwezor rụrụ ọrụ n'ọtụtụ jịlị, ndị ndụmọdụ, na ndị otu nyochaa gụnyere ndị otu ndụmọdụ Carnegie International na afọ 1999; Venice Biennale ; Hugo Boss Prize, Guggenheim Museum; Foto Press, Barcelona; Carnegie chọr'inwe ; International Center nke Photo Infinity Awards; Onyinye Anya ; Onyinye dị Nkà nke Palestine, Ramallah ; na Cairo, Istanbul, Sharjah, na Shanghai Biennales
N'afọ 2004, ọ chịịrị ndị ọka iwu maka onyinye Artes Mundi, ihe nrite enyere iji kpalie mmasị na nka na Wales
N'afo 2012, ọ họpụtara ndị ọka nlebanya maka Vera List Center Prize maka Nka na ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị
Site na afo 2005 ruo na afo 2009, Enwezor bụ Dean nke Ọmụmụ Ihe Ọchịchị na Onye Isi Ọchịchị na San Francisco Art Institute
N'oge opupu ihe ubi nke 2012, ọ rụrụ ọrụ dị ka Prọfesọ Nleta Kirk Varnedoe na Institute nke Fine Arts na Mahadum nke New York
Dịka onye edemede, onye nkatọ, na onye ndezi, Enwezor bụ onye nyere aka oge niile na ọtụtụ akwụkwọ ndekọ ihe, akwụkwọ akụkọ
Ọ bụ onye guzobere onye nrụpụta na onye na-ebipụta akwụkwọ akụkọ dị egwu NKA Journal of Contemporary African Art eguzobere na afọ1994, nke Duke University Press bipụtara

Ihe dum ọ dere pụtara na ọtụtụ magazin, katilogu, akwụkwọ, na magazin gụnyere Third Text, Documents, Texte zọọ Kunst, Grand Street, Parkett, Artforum, Frieze, Art Journal, Research na African Literatures, Index na nnyocha, Emega, Glendora, na mba Atlantica
N'afọ 2008, akwụkwọ akụkọ German 032c bipụtara ajụjụ ọnụ nke Enwezor nke onye edemede akụkọ German Joachim Bessing duziri

Akwụkwọ ndị ọ dere gụnyere Contemporary African Art Kemgbe 1980 (Bologna Damiani, 2009) ya na Chika Okeke-Agulu dere ya, Antinomies nke Nkà na Omenala modernity, Postmodernity, Contemporaneity (Durham, NC Duke University Press, 2008), Ịgụ Agba African Art, site na Theory ruo n'ọma ahịa ( MIT Press, Cambridge na INIVA, London) na ihe ngosi Mega Antinomies of a Transnational Global form (Wilhelm Fink Verlag, Munich), Fever Archive Ojiji nke dọkụmentị na Art Art, na Amaghị ama Ọnọdụ Ihe Na-eme na Global Society

Ọ bụkwa onye ndezi nke akwụkwọ mpịakọta anọ nke Documenta 11 Plas Democracy na-enweghị nkwado; Nnwale na Eziokwu Ikpe Ziri Ezi na Usoro nke Eziokwu na Ndozigharị ; Creolité na Creolization ; N'okpuru Siege Obodo Afrịka anọ na Freetown, Johannesburg, Kinshasa, Lagos (Hatje Cantz, Verlag, Stuttgart)
Na afọ 2006, Enwezor natara Frank Jewett Mather Nturu gosi maka nkwarụ nka sitere na Otu Akwụkwọ Nlekọta Ndị Ahịa
Enwezor họọrọ onye nke iri a ọ na abụọ na ntụzịaka ArtReview maka onodu ogo otu narị kachasị ike na nka Ike 100 na afọ 2010
Na June 2018, Enwezor bịanyere aka na nkwekọrịta nkewa na Munich Haus der Kunst, akụkụ ya ụfọdụ n'ihi na ọgụ ya na ọrịa kansa nwere oge ịma aka
Okwui Enwezor nwụrụ na na mkpụrụ ụbọchị iri na ise na afọ 2019 mgbe ọ dị afọ iri ise na ise

Ola-Dele Kuku (a mụrụ n'ọnwa Ọgọstụ 8, 1963) bụ onye Naijiria na-arụ ụlọ na onye na-ese ihe nke Yoruba
Ọ bi ma na-arụ ọrụ n'etiti Nigeria na Belgium
Ola-Dele Kuku gụrụ akwụkwọ na (SCI-Arc), Southern California Institute of Architecture (1984 - 1986), na Los Angeles, California, US
na Vico Morcote, Ticino, Switzerland (1986 - 1988)
Ọ gakwara Architecture Intermundium na Milan, Italy, (1988 - 1990), maka ịmụ ihe owuwu dị elu, ebe ya na Daniel Libeskind rụkọrọ ọrụ na ọrụ City Edge (Berlin), na asọmpi Berlin Jewish Museum

N'ileghara ikike njedebe n'onwe ya anya, Kuku nwere mmasị dị ukwuu site na ọmụmụ nke nha ma mepụta ihe owuwu n'etiti mkparịta ụka a na-ahụ anya na mkparịta ụka a na-eche n'echiche nke na-etinye anụ ahụ na echiche nke ohere efu na-agbanwe echiche nkịtị nke ohere obibi na ịma aka ụlọ ọdịnala

Na mmepụta ihe a na-enweghị ihe ọ bụ, Kuku nwekwara ọrụ ndị ọzọ metụtara isiokwu ahụ dị ka 'Opera Domestica' usoro nke nwere ihe ọkpụkpụ osisi nke na-eme ka ihe owuwu na ọrụ nke ohere ụlọ dị na mbara igwe ihe
Ola-Dele Kuku esonyego n'ọtụtụ ihe omume na asọmpi mba ụwa nke ọma dịka
Ola-Dele Kuku akụziela ma nye nzukọ ọmụmụ ihe n'ọtụtụ ụlọ akwụkwọ na-ewu ụlọ
Jumoke Odetola bụ nwaafọ Naịjirịa na-eme ihe nkiri
Ọ malitere ọrụ ime ihe nkiri Nollywood na sinima asụsụ Bekee, tupu ọ sonye ime ọtụtụ ihe nkiri asụsụ Yoruba
Odetola gụsịrị akwụkwọ sekọndịrị na Abeokuta Grammar School

O nwetara akara ugo mmụta mbụ ya na Mahadum Ajayi Crowther, ka ọ nwetachara nzere mmụta bachalọ na Infọmeshọn na kọmunikashon Tekunọlọji gbakwunyere kọmputa sayensị ,ọ gafee Federal University of Agriculture, Abeokuta, wee gụcha akwụkwọ na nzere masters na Computer Science
Site na ajụjụ ọnụ Punch gbara ya, Odetola mere ka a mata na mkpebi ya ịsonye ime ihe nkiri megidere uche ndị mụrụ ya
Ma mmezu/ntozu oke ya na ụlọ ọrụ ntụrụndụ mere ka ha nakwere ọrụ ọ họọrọ
Ọ kọwakwara akparamagwa ya n' ihe nkiri 'somewhere in the dark'ihe nkiri nke gosipụtara Gabriel Afolayan dịka ọrụ ọ kacha nwee ihe ịma aka
Ọ họọrọ Majid Michel na Omotola Jalade Ekehinde dịka ndị ọ n'elegara anya oge ọ malitere dịka onye na-eme ihe nkiri ebe Abiodun Jimoh bụ onye nduzi ọ họtara kachasị na azụmahịa ihe nkiri
Na 2015, o meriri mkpughe nke otu afọ na BON Awards
Ọzọkwa, na 2016 na 2017 Africa Magic Viewers Choice Awards, Odetola meriri nturu ugo maka ihe nkiri asụsụ ụmụ amaala kachasị mma maka ọrụ ya na Binta Ofege na somewhere in the dark
Ọ jigidere ihe nrite ahụ ruo agba nke ise nke emume ahụ site na somewhere in the dark
O nwetakwara ńríte onye kachasị dị ka onye ndu ákpárámàgwà asụsụ (Yoruba) na 2017 Best of Nollywood Awards na Ogun State
Ihe nrịba ama nke 2017 City People Movie kwadoro Odetola ka o nweta nhọpụta maka onye nkwado kacha mma n'ihe nkiri asụsụ(Yoruba)
Jumoke Odetola bụ Nwanyị ahọtara Kachasị Mma na City People Movie Awards,na 2018
Ola (Arabic) bụ aha nwanyị Arabic nke pụtara 'ịdị elu', 'dị elu', na 'ịdị'
Ọ bụkwa aha mkpirisi a na-ahụkarị na Naijirịa (Olayemi), Norwegian na Swedish (ụdị Olaf)
N'asụsụ Polish ọ bụ ụdị obere aha ụmụ nwanyị Olga na Aleksandra

Olamide Brown, nee Orekunrin, bụ dibia bekee onye British - Nigerian , onye ji ego akwado ihe gbasara ahụike nakwa onye chọpụtara otu akpọrọ Flying Doctors Healthcare Investment Group na onye isi ndị ụlọ ọrụ Greentree Investment

Flying Doctors Healthcare Group na-etinye ego ma na-arụ ọrụ n'ofe usoro nlekọta ahụike n' ọrụ ụgbọelu ihe mgberede na lọjistik, nyocha / teknụzụ ahụike, ọrụrụ ụlọ ọgwụ, nyocha na akụrụngwa, njikwa ụlọ ọrụ ahụike n' ụlọ ahịa ọgwụ
A mụrụ Ola Brown na London, England, ya wee gaa Hull York Medical School

Mgbe ọ gụsịrị akwụkwọ, ọ rụrụ nnukwu ọgwụ na United Kingdom wee gaa n'ihu bụrụ otu ndị enyere mmụta n'efu nke mmụta Japanese MEXT nke nyere ya ohere ịga n'ihu ọmụmụ ya na Tokyo, Japan, na mmụta n'efu a, o lekwasịrị anya na nyocha nke ụlọ nyocha na mkpụrụ ndụ na-adọrọ adọrọ

Ugbu a, ọ na-agụcha akwụkwọ maka nzere masta ukwu na ego na amụma akụ n' ụba na Mahadum London ma nwekwa asambodo na ịmebe iwu akụ n' ụba n'ụlọ akwụkwọ azụmaahịa IE, Spain yana asambodo maka ịme mkpebi site na Mahadum Michigan na United Steeti
Mgbe ọ gụsịrị akwụkwọ, Ola rụrụ ọrụ nwa oge nta na National Health Service, United Kingdom
Site n'ọzụzụ ya pụrụ iche na nkà mmụta ọgwụ ụgbọelu, ọ rụrụ ọrụ nlekọta ahụike mgberede mbụ nke West Africa na Lagos, Nigeria; Flying Doctor Nigeria Ltd
Ola bu onye otu ndi American College of Emergency Physicians
E depụtara ya n'etiti ndị isi Global Young Leaders nke World Economic Forum na 2013
Ihe kpaliri Ola ịmalite Flying Doctors bụ mgbe nwanne ya nwanyị nwụsịrị ọnwụ n'okpuru ọnọdụ siri ike yana iji melite ọrụ ahụike na Nigeria
O bidoro Flying Doctors na Lagos, Nigeria n'afọ 2007
Na 2018, e bidoro ikpe megide Flying Doctors na Olamide site na ezinụlọ nke otu onye ọria nwụrụ anwụ bụ Hanga, ndị ezinụlọ ji aka ha kwụsi okwu n'ụka a
Ndị Flying Doctors na-ekwusi ike na ọ nwere ma na-aga n'ihu na-arụ ọrụ n'akụkụ azụmahịa nke ụlọ ọrụ, na mpaghara atụmatụ, azụmaahịa, itinye ego n' uto

Tinyere ọrụ ya na Flying Doctors, Dr Ola, Olabode Agusto na Abasiama Idaresit na- nwere ụlọ ọrụ venture kapital ka nọ na mmalite, Greentree Investment nke na-enye ụlọ ọrụ teknụzụ bidoro ọhụrụ n'Afrika ego otuto

Greentree Investment nwere Startup Lab nke na-akwado ndị ọchụnta ego ka ha nwee ike ịzụlite azụmaahịa na-akwụ ụgwọ ma na-etinyekwa ego ụlọ ọrụ mmalite nke Africa gụnyere Paystack, Precurio na Big Cabal Media wdg na pọtụfoliyo nke $80m nke gafere n'akụkụ dị iche iche gụnyere Ahụike, Fintech, Media, SaaS, Agri-tech, Mmepụta na e-commerce, na Edutech
Na 2019, ọ chọpụtara ụlọ Ọrụ Na-ahụ Maka Ahụike Flying Doctors, nke na-ahụ maka nlekọta ahụike na ahụike nke na-eme ka itinye ego na ọrụ ndị otu ya na-arụ na ahụike

Flying Doctors Healthcare Investment Company na-etinye ego ma na-arụ na nagalaba ahụ ike na ọrụ ụgbọelu mgberede & lọjistik, nyocha / teknụzụ ahụike, ụlọ ọgwụ, nyocha na akụrụngwa, njikwa ụlọ ọrụ ahụike na ụlọ ahịa ọgwụ na ugbu a tinye na Koniku, ụlọ ọrụ bioteknology & ụlọ ọrụ na-emepụta ọgwụ; Lifestores - agbụ nke ọnụ ahịa ọgwụ, Mdass - ụlọ ọrụ nyocha na ahịa ndị na-enweghị nchekwa na-enye nlekọta ahụike dị ọnụ ala; Chisco express - ụlọ ọrụ na-arụ ọrụ ngwa ngwa na mbugharị ngwa ahịa gụnyere ọgwụ ndị gafere West Africa na Helium Health - nyiwe telemedicine na Electronik Medical Records

Na elu nke Corona Virus Pandemic, Ola na ndị otu ya na FDHIC wepụtara ụlọ nyocha COVID-19 na nke na-ebelata mkpa dị ukwuu PPE ma belata ihe egwu nke ndị ọrụ ahụike na-ebute ọrịa site na ịnye ihe mgbochi n'etiti ọrịa nwere ike ibute ọrịa

Na July 2020, Ola kwadoro Mịnịsta na-ahụ maka Azụmaahịa na Ntinye ego nke Nigeria, Otunba Adebayo na mbipụta mbụ nke 'Mkparịta ụka' ahụ na Flying Doctors Healthcare Investment Company, yana mkparịta ụka gbasara mmepe ego na ohere na ngalaba ahụike

O kwuola okwu na nyiwe di iche-iche na uwa nile, tinyere World Economic Forum, TED Global Conference, Social Media Week Lagos, European Union, Switzerland Economic Forum, UN, World Bank, World Economic Forum, Massachusetts Institute of Technology, Mahadum Cambridge na Aspen Ideas Festival
E gosipụtara Ola na ọrụ ya na ntanetị mgbasa ozi dị iche iche

Ọ bụ onye editọ nke International Journal of Emergency Services ma bipụta akwụkwọ atọ - EMQ's in Paediatrics, Pre-Hospital Care for Africa and Fixing Healthcare in Nigeria; a Guide to Public Healthcare Policy
O dekwala akwụkwọ na British Medical Journal, Journal of Emergency Medical Services, Niger Delta Medical Journal, The New York Times na Huffington Post

Ọ gụrụ ihe owuwu na Mahadum nke Naịjirịa, ebe ọ rụrụ ọrụ iji nweta nzere masta na imepụta ụlọ anyanwụ na Tropics
Ọ kwagara United Kingdom maka agụmakwụkwọ dị ogo elu
Uduku nwetara nzere doctoral ya na Mahadum Cambridge, ebe ọ nyochara ihe ndị metụtara atụmatụ ụlọ akwụkwọ na Naịjirịa
Mgbe ọ nwetasịrị nzere doctorate ya, Uduku mechara ule ruru eru ya na Royal Institute of British Architects
A họpụtara ya na ngalaba nke Edinburgh College of Art
Afọ ole na ole ka e mesịrị, Uduku sonyeere Mahadum Strathclyde, ebe ọ nwetara Master of Business Administration
Uduku jere ozi dị ka Prọfesọ na Architecture na Dean maka Africa na Mahadum Edinburgh
Nnyocha ya na-atụle ụlọ agụmakwụkwọ na Afrịka
N'afọ 2001, Uduku ghọrọ onye guzobere ArchiAfrika, otu na-achọghị uru nke na-achọ imeziwanye akụkọ ihe mere eme nke oge a na Afrịka
O mepụtara ihe ngosi na Manchester School of Art nke nyochara ebe nchekwa Alan Vaughan-Richards
N'afọ 2017, a họpụtara Uduku dịka Prọfesọ nke Architecture na Manchester School of Architecture
N'ebe a, ọ na-eduzi mmemme nyocha maka ndi gụsịrị akwụkwọ na obodo, ihe nketa na nchekwa
Ọ tọrọ ntọala EdenAppLabs, otu ndị na-eme nnyocha na-eleba anya n'iji ngwa mkpanaka maka imepụta gburugburu ebe obibi

Olabisi ('Bisi') Afolabi (amụrụ n'abalị iri atọ na otu nke onwa oktoba n'afọ 1975 na Ilorin ) bụ nwanyị lagoro ezumike nká na-eme egwuregwu track and field si Naịjirịa; ọ bụkwa onye ọkachamara na 400 metres n'oge ọ na-arụ ọrụ
O so n'otu Naijiria ndị ritere medaal ọla ọcha na 1996 Olympics 4 x 400 metres relay
O meriri na World Junior Championships in 1994
O ritekwara medaal ọla ọcha na 1999 All-Africa Games na medaal ọla nchara na 1995 All-Africa Games

Olabisi Alofe Kolawole bụ onye uwe ojii Naijiria ma bụrụkwa nwanyị mbụ na-ahụ maka mmekọrịta ọha na eze (FPRO)
Ọ bụ onye gụsịrị akwụkwọ na Mahadum Ogun State ngalaba n'iwu ma gụchaa ụlọ akwụkwọ ndị uwe ojii Nigeria
O nwetara nzere Masters na Police Leadership and Management (PLM) na Mahadum Leicester, United Kingdom (UK)

Akpọrọ ya na ụlọ mkpem ikpe Naijiria na 2002 ma bụrụkwa onye nyocha na-enyere ụlọ ọrụ onye ọka iwu na International Criminal Court (ICC) na Hague na nyocha nke gbasara Mmekọahụ na ọdịdị okike dị ka mpụ mba ụwa
N'ọnwa ọgọstụ afọ 2015, onye Inspector General nke ndị uwe ojii, Solomon Arase họpụtara Olabisi Kolawole ka ọ bụrụ onye na-ahụ maka mmekọrịta ọha na eze ọhụrụ
Nke a mere ka ọ bụrụ onye uwe ojii mbụ a họpụtara ka ọ bụrụ ọnụ na-ekwuchitere ndị uweojii na mba
Ọ na-arụbu ọrụ dịka onye ndụmọdụ gbasara nwoke na nwanyị ndị uwe ojii na osote onye isi Directorate of Peacekeeping
Ọ ejewokwa ozi na ọkwa mba ụwa; ndị a gụnyere ije ozi na United Nations na East-Timor (2000), Kosovo (2004), Liberia (2006), na isi ụlọ ọrụ UN dị na New York (2007)
Olabisi Oreofe Ugbebor (née Grace Olabisi Falode, amụrụ na 29 Jenụwarị 1951) bụ nwanyị prọfesọ mbụ na mgbakọ na mwepụ na Naijiria
A mụrụ ya na Lagos, ọ gụrụ mgbakọ na mwepụ na Mahadum Ibadan na Mahadim London, ebe ọ nwetara PhD na 1976
A mụrụ ya na Lagos, Ugbebor gụrụ akwụkwọ sekọndrị na Queen's College, Lagos
Ọ gụsịrị akara ugo mmụta mbụ ya na mgbakọ na mwepụ na Mahadum Ibadan n'afọ 1972
N'afọ 1973, o nwetara diplọma postgraduate na statistics na University College London, tupu ọ gụchaa thesis ya na Sample Path Properties of Brownian Motion (1976) mgbe ọ dị afọ iri abụọ na ise
Mgbe ọ nọ na Unibadan, ọ bụ naanị nwa akwụkwọ nwanyị na klas ya
Ọ bụkwa nwanyị Naijiria mbụ nwetara PhD ma ghọọ prọfesọ na mgbakọ na mwepụ
N'afọ 2017, e mere ya Fellow nke Mathematics Association of Nigeria

A họpụtara Olabiyi Durojaiye (8 Febuwari afo1933 – 24 Ogustu afo 2021) ka ọ bụrụ Sinetọ na ahu maka mpaghara odida anyawu nke Ogun Steeti, Naijiria na mmalite nke Naịjirịa Republiki nke ano Naijiria, o zoro ochichi na Alliance for Democracy (AD)
Ọ malitere ọrụ na onwa Mee di na mkpuru ubochi 29 Mayna afo 1999
O jikwa aha agbụrụ Otunba dị ka ụdị aha, si otú a gosipụta ọnọdụ ya dị ka onye isi nke ndị Yoruba
Durojaiye nwetara nzere BSc na (Economics) na mba ofesi London, na LLB, London
A kpọrọ ya na Baa nke Naịjirịa n'afo 1979, ọ bụkwa onye ọka ikpe na Onye ọka iwu nke Ụlọikpe Kasị Elu nke Naịjirịa
Ọ gụsịrị akwụkwọ na Nnukwu ulo akwụkwọ nke iwu na usoro agum akwụkwọ di na obodo Kuru
Ọ rụrụ ọrụ afọ iri atọ na ise na ngalaba ọhaneze Naịjirịa, gụnyere afọ iri abụọ na asatọ dị ka onye isi nke ulo oba ego Central Bank of Naịjirịa na Nationalu Mint
Ọ rụrụ ọrụ na otu ulo oru International Monetary Fund, Federal Reserve System na mba USA
na City University London n'agbata afo 1964 and 1982
Durojaiye bụ onye a họpụtara na ogbe ya na afo 1988/89 na ulo ndi omebe iwu
N'afọ 1992, o zoro ọkwa onye isi ala Naịjirịa n'otu nke Social Democratic Party (SDP), nke MKO
Abiola meriri
General Ibrahim Babangida kagburu ntuli aka Abiola dị ka onye isi ala, nke mere ka ọ laghachi n'ọchịchị ndị agha

N'ọnwa Disemba afọ otu puku na nari itenani na iri itenani na isii, ọchịchị ndị agha nke Ochi Agha Sani Abacha jidere Durojaiye, ma tụọ ya mkpọrọ ụbọchị nari ise na iri isii ma mesoo ya ihe ọjọọ mgbe ọ nọ n'ụlọ mkpọrọ
Otu akụkọ Juun afo otu puku na nari itenani na iri itenani na asaa kwuru na onye ọka iwu ahụ dị afọ iri isii na atọ na-arịa ọrịa ma na-arịa ọrịa ọbara mgbali elu nke ọgwụgwọ ya kpatara
Amnesty International họpụtara ya ka ọ bụrụ onye mkpọrọ nke akọ na uche ma mee mkpọsa maka ntọhapụ ya
Durojaiye bụ onye a họpụtara ka ọ bụrụ Sineto nke Federal Republic of Naịjirịa (otu puku na nari itenani na iri itenani na itenani - puku abuo na ato)
Mgbe ọ nọsịrị n'oche ya na Sineti, a họpụtara ya na kọmitii na-ahụ maka ikpe, nhazi (onye isi oche) na ọrụ pụrụ iche
N'ọnwa Disemba afọ 2002, ọ tụrụ aro ka a tụọ onye ọ bụla mere aghụghọ ntuli aka mkpọrọ ndụ

O meriri na ntuli aka AD iji nọchite anya otu ahụ na mpaghara Odida anyawu Ogun na ntuli aka 2003, ọ bụ ezie na Chief Adamo Olayinka Yesufu, onye na-asọ mpi maka nhọpụta ahụ, yiri ya egwu na ọ ga-eme ihe iwu kwadoro
Onye na-azọ ọkwa PDP bụ Tokunbo Ogunbanjo meriri na ntuli aka ahụ
Nwunye Durojaiye bụ Florence Olufunso Adejoke nwụrụ na 6 Juun afo 2009, mgbe ọ dị afọ iri asaa na abuo, na Ikeja, ka ya na di ya mechara ọnwa abụọ ha mere ncheta agbamakwụkwọ ha nke iri ise
Ọ hapụrụ di ya, ụmụ isii na ọtụtụ ụmụ ụmụ

N'ajụjụ ọnụ nke Maachi afo 2010 Durojaiye, onye dị afọ iri asaa ugbu a, kwuru okwu megide ụzọ nzuzo nke a na-emeso ọrịa onye isi ala Umaru Yar'Adua, ebe onye isi ala na-alaghachi na Naịjirịa n'abalị ma ọ nweghị akụkọ ọ bụla e nyere banyere ọnọdụ ya
Durojaiye nwụrụ n'ihi COVID-19 n'ọnwa Ọgọstụ 2021
Oladapo (nke a na-asụgharịrị Ladapo) bụ aha Naijirịa nke sitere na Yoruba nke pụtara 'akụ̀ na ụba agwakọtawo ọnụ'
Oladejo Victor Akinlonu (amụrụ na Nọvemba 15, 1963) (nke a makwaara dị ka Dejak ma ọ bụ Dejak Artistique ) bụ onye amụrụ na Naijiria, onye na-ese ihe, onye ọkà ihe ọmụma na onye na-ere ahịa nka
Ọ bịara bụrụ onye a ma ama n'ihu ọha n'afọ ndị 1980 dị ka onye ọsụ ụzọ nke ọdịdị ala nkume mkpọmkpọ ebe
A makwaara ya maka ihe ọkpụkpụ ya nke a pụrụ ịhụ n'ebe ọha na eze nakwa n'akụkụ niile nke Naịjirịa na atụmatụ ya dị mgbagwoju anya na mmiri mmiri, isi iyi na nkume ili
A na-ahụta ya dị ka onye na-ese ihe nke na-agwakọta ihe ọkpụkpụ na osise ụkpụrụ ụlọ
N'afọ 1998, ndị nta akụkọ Naịjirịa nyere ya aha onye na-elekọta nka ma nye ya ọtụtụ aha ndị ọzọ n'ihi nnukwu onyinye ya nye ụlọ ọrụ nka na Naịjirịa na Afrịka n'ozuzu ya
Ọ bụ onye isi oche na onye isi nchịkwa nke Dejak and Associates nke nwere Bezalel Galleria na Dejak Artistique (ụlọ ngosi nka dị na isi obodo Lagos, dị adị ruo afọ iri abụọ)
Amụrụ ya nye onye ọka iwu, Gilbert Akinlonu, na onye ahịa, Grace Akinlonu na obodo Ondo, Ondo steeti, Dejo nwere ụlọ ngosi nka ya dị na Lagos, Ikeja, n'ala gọọmentị Lagos steeti nyere ya
Dejo bụ onye ama ama dịka onye na-akpụ ihe na onye na-ese ihe n'ala ma bụrụkwa onye a na-ele anya dị ka onye na-enweghị atụ
Abụọ n'ime ọrụ ya, eyo masquerade na Oba Adeniji Adele statue so n'ime ndị a ma ama n'ọrụ ya, ọ bụ naanị Sango nke Ben Enwonwu na Nigeria bịakwutere ịma ama ha
Chief Oladipo 'Ladi' Jadesimi bụ onye ọchụnta ego mmanụ Naijiria na onye guzobere Lagos Deep Offshore Logistics Base, ebe ọ na-eje ozi dị ka onye isi oche
Oladipo Jadesimi gụsịrị akwụkwọ sekọndrị ya na King's College, Lagos
Ọ gụsịrị akwụkwọ na Mahadum Oxford na 1966 na MA
na LLB
degrees na Jurisprudence, wee malite ịrụ ọrụ dị ka onye na-ahụ maka ego na Coopers na Lybrand na London
Ọ bụ onye otu Institute of Chartered Accountants na England na Wales (FCA)
Ọ bụ onye mmekọ na Arthur Andersen Nigeria, ebe ọ na-eje ozi dị ka onye ndụmọdụ ego na-enweghị onwe ya, na nnukwu onye na-etinye ego na Niger Delta Oil Company
A họpụtara ya ka ọ bụrụ onye nduzi nke Niger Delta Exploration and Production PLC na 2010 wee bụrụ onye isi oche nke Board na June 21, 2016
Ọ rụrụ ọrụ dị ka onye isi na-abụghị onye isi nke First City Monument Bank site na 1983 ruo 2011
Jadesimi bụ onye guzobere Lagos Offshore Logistics Base ma na-eje ozi dị ka onye isi oche
Chief Jadesimi lụrụ Alero Okotie-Eboh, onye mgbasa ozi na nwa nwanyị nke Chief Festus Okotie-Eboh
Nwa ha nwanyị, Amy Jadesimi, bụ onye isi ọrụ nke LADOL
Jadesimi na onye Bekee na-elekọta mmadụ Suzanna McQuiston nwere mmekọrịta nwoke na nwanyị mgbe ọ na-arụ ọrụ dị ka onye na-ahụ maka ego na London na 1980s
Site na mmekọrịta a, ọ mụrụ Emma Thynn, Marchioness nke Bath
Olaide Olaogun ma obu Olaide Omolola Olaogun Emmanuel (amuru ya na 9 Julai afọ 1986) bu onye ihe nkiri na ihe nlere na ndi Naijiria
Ọ bụbu onye nnọchi anya obodo Lux
A mụrụ Olaogun na Lagos na 9 Julaị afọ 1986
O nwere nne na nna na-akwado ya wee gaa African Church Model College
Ọ gara n'ihu gụsịrị akwụkwọ na Bekee na Mahadum Lagos
A mara ya na Naijiria na Ghana bụ mgbe ọ pụtara na-egosi 'Soul Sisters' nke Wale Adenuga maka TV ma ọ nọkwa na usoro ndị Yoruba nke Super Story
O were ọrụ n'aka Genevieve Nnaji ka ọ bụrụ ihu Lux na mkpọsa mgbasa ozi ha n'afọ 2007 wee gaa n'ihu n'ọrụ a rue afọ 2009
Ọ bụkwa onye nnọchi anya maka mgbatị ntutu Diva, ihe ọ Fụ Fụ Fuman na United Bank for Africa (UBA)
Ọ lụrụ Babatunde Ojora Emmanuel nafọ 2015 ma mụọ nwa na 2016
Ọ lụrụ Babatunde Ojora n'afọ 2019
Olaitan Ibrahim (ka amụrụ n'ụbọchị nke 14 n'ọnwa Febụwarị n'afọ 1986) bụ onye Naijiria na-eme egwuregwu Paralympic powerlifter
O ritere ọla nchara na ihe omume ụmụ nwanyị 67 kg na 2020 Summer Paralympics nke emere na Tokyo, Japan
Na 2019 World Para Powerlifting Championship nke emere na Nur-Sultan, Kazakhstan, o ritere nrite ọla ọcha na ihe omume ụmụ nwanyị 67 kg
Olaitan Soyannwo bụ onye Naijiria Prọfesọ nke Anesthesia na onye ndụmọdụ na Mahadum nke Ibadan na odeakwụkwọ mba ofesi nke Naijiria Academy of Science
Ọ bụbu onye isi oche nke International Association for Study of Pain
Olaitan Yusuf (amuru na afọr 12 Jenuarị 1982) bu onye okacha amara nke umunwanyi Naijiria nke na-egwu egwu n'iru
Ọ bụ onye otu egwuregwu bọọlụ ụmụ nwanyị Naịjirịa
Ọ bụ akụkụ nke otu na 2003 FIFA Women's World Cup
Àtụ Nigeria squad 2003 FIFA Women's World Cup
Olajumoke Olufunmilola Adenowo (amụrụ 16 Ọktoba 1968) bụ onye na- ese ụkpụrụ ụlọ Naijiria
Ọ malitere ụlọ ọrụ ụkpụrụ ụlọ nakwa ndozi ime ụlọ ya a kpọrọ AD Consulting n'afo 1994
Nne na nna Adenowo bụ ndị prọfesọ, otu bu prọfeso nke akụkọ ihe mere eme ebe nke ọzọ bu prọfesọ na Criminology
O biri na campus na Obafemi Awolowo University
Ọ bụ onye na-ese ụkpụrụ ụlọ azuru na Bauhaus aha ya bu Arieh Sharon mere ya site na1962 ruo 1972
Ibi nakwa igụ akwụkwọ na Mahadum gbara ya ume ibanye n'ihe gbasara ụkpụrụ ụlọ mgbe ọ dị obere
Mgbe ọ dị afọ iri na anọ ọ debanyere aha na Mahadum Obafemi Awolowo wee nweta nzere Bachelor of Science na Architecture mgbe ọ dị afọ iri na itoolu
Dị ka onye na-agụ akwụkwọ, o ritere ihe nrite dika nwa akwụkwọ nwere ihe eserese kacha mma
O nwetara nzere Master nke Sayensị na Architecture, site na otu mahadum ahụ n'afọ 1991

Ọ bụkwa nwata akwụkwọ guru akwụkwọ na Harvard Kennedy School (2019), Yale School of Management (2016), Lagos Business School Chief Executive Program (2002) na IESE Business School na Mahadum Navarranke dị na Barcelona, Spain (2005)
Adenowo ekwuola na mmasị ya na ihe owuwu ụlọ bụ njem nleta o gara na Paris na Palais de Versailles mgbe ọ bụ nwata, yana ibi na mahadum Obafemi Awolowo University
Ndị a kpaliri nkà ihe ọmụma imewe ya - ihe mmụta bụ isi bụ na n'ọrụ ya, ihe owuwu ụlọ ga-enwerịrị mmetụta maka ọnọdụ ihu igwe, teknụzụ, akụrụngwa na nke a na-ahukwa anya
Mgbe ọ gụsịrị akwụkwọ na mahadum, e goro Adenowo dị ka onye enyemaka na-arụ ọrụ n'ụlọ ọrụ Towry Coker Associates
Ọ mesịrị rụọ ọrụ dịka onye na-ese ụkpụrụ ụlọ na Lagos na Femi Majekodunmi Associates
Ọ rụrụ ọrụ na Federal Ministry of Finance Project na Abuja mgbe ọ dị afọ iri abụọ na atọ
Adenowo tọrọ ntọala ụlọ ọrụ boutique ya n'ihe gbasara owuwu ụlọ na 1994, aha ụlọ ọrụ ya AD Consulting ka ọ malitere mgbe ọ dị afọ iri abụọ na ise
Kemgbe mmalite ya, AD Consulting etinyela aka na nhazi na ịrụ ọrụ karịrị iri asaa
Ndị a gụnyere ụlọ gọọmentị Naijiria, ebe obibi nkeonwe, ụlọ ọrụ ahụike, ogige ụlọ ọrụ mmepụta ihe, yana ụlọ ọrụ na ụlọ ọrụ ego
Ndị ahịa AD gụnyere Coca-Cola na L'Oreal
Ọtụtụ n'ime mmemme ntọala ya na-elekwasị anya na ụmụ nwanyị na ụmụaka ndị dara ogbenye
ATF na-achikwa Camp Dawn, ogige agụmakwụkwọ, iji lebara mmụta maka ụmụaka ime obodo
Ọ na-achikwa Awesome Princesses, na-elekọta ụmụ agbọghọ si na mkpọmkpọ ebe nke Lagos bụ ndị nọ n'ihe ize ndụ nke mmetọ mmekọahụ na HIV / AIDS, na-enye nyocha ahụike na enyemaka mmụta
Akụ dị egwu na-adụ ụmụ nwanyị ọdụ maka ịbụ ndị isi mba ụwa na ịzụ ahịa site na ọzụzụ aka ọrụ, klaasị azụmahịa na ọzụzụ onye ndu nke na-ewere ọnọdụ n'ofe Naijiria
N'ime afọ iri na ise o ji malite, mmadụ puku iri asaa agaala nzukọ nke ATF na-ehibe maka ndị chọrọ ịbụ ndị isi
CNN kọwara ya dị ka 'Africa's Starchitect' ọzọ kwa The Guardian (Nigeria) kọwara ya dị ka 'ihu nke Architecture na Nigeria'
Na 2018 Royal Institute of British Architects (RIBA) nabatara ya dị ka otu n'ime ụmụ nwanyị na-akpali akpali na ihe owuwu taa
Adenowo egosila na akwụkwọ akụkọ Architectural Record
Pọtụfoliyo Adenowo gụnyere ọtụtụ ndị ahịa mba na ndị Naijiria nke gụnyere Coca-Cola, L'Oreal, The Nigerian Stock Exchange, Access Bank Plc na Guaranty Trust Bank
N'afọ 2019, a họpụtara Olajumoke Adenowo ka ọ bụrụ Prọfesọ nleta na Technische Universitat Munchen (TUM) na Germany
A kwanyere ya nkwanye ùgwù Laureate na onye ọkà mmụta sayensị ọbịa na oche nke Theory, History of Architecture na Art & Design na ngalaba Architecture nke mahadum
Emebere mmemme a na mmekorita ya na Bavarian Ministry of Education
N'otu aka ahụ ka ọ tọchara ntọala AD Consulting, Adenowo hibere ụlọọrụ Advantage Energy, ụlọ ọrụ na-ahụ maka mmanụ na gas
Ọ bụ onye mmekọ nke Chartered Institute of Arbitrators na onye otu African Leadership Network
Dị ka onye na-ekwu okwu n'ọha, Adenowo akụziwo ihe gbasara nka, ihe owuwu ụlọ, okwu gbasara nwoke na nwanyị, inye ụmụ nwanyị ike, na mmemme ọchụnta ego n'Africa
O kwuwo okwu na Global Women's Forum na Harvard Business School (African Business Club)
Ọ na-akwado ihe ngosi redio na-arutu aka na ịbụ onye ndu nke a kpọrọ 'Voice of Change'
Mgbasa ozi mba ụwa dị ka CNN na Fortune gosipụtara ya
Adenowo nwere ọtụtụ ọrụ ebere
N'afọ 1999, ọ tọrọ ntọala Awesome Treasures Foundation (ATF), otu nke UN kwadoro nke dị na Lagos, Nigeria
Ntọala ahụ nwere ọrụ ịkwalite ndị isi nakwa ndị ndụ dị mmadu otu puku tutu afọ 2030, ha na-arụ ọrụ karịsịa n'ebe ndị inyom na ndị na-eto eto nọ
Ọtụtụ n'ime mmemme ntọala ya na-elekwasị anya na ụmụ nwanyị na ụmụaka ndị dara ogbenye
ATF na-achikwa Camp Dawn, ogige agụmakwụkwọ, iji lebaa anya na mmụta maka ụmụaka ime obodo
Ọ na-ejikwa Awesome Princesses, na-elekọta ụmụ agbọghọ si na mkpọmkpọ ebe nke Lagos bụ ndị nọ n'ihe ize ndụ nke mmetọ mmekọahụ na HIV / AIDS, na-enye nyocha ahụike na enyemaka mmụta
Akụ dị egwu na-adụ ụmụ nwanyị ọdụ maka onye isi mba ụwa na ịzụ ahịa site na ọzụzụ aka ọrụ, klaasị azụmahịa na ọzụzụ onye ndu nke na-ewere ọnọdụ n'ofe Naijiria
N'ime afọ iri na ise mbụ ya, mmadụ puku iri asaa agaala nzukọ ndị isi ATF

Dịka onye a ma ama nakwa onye ndu echiche na Architecture, nka na ịbụ onye ịsị, ọ na-ekwu okwu mgbe niile na mgbakọ mba ụwa na ogbako nke gụnyere McKinsey & Company Leadership Forum, Global Women's Forum, SOLVE na MIT, Harvard Business School (African Business) Club), Mahadum Cambridge (African Society), Haust Der Kunst (Munich), Institute of Directors, the New African Woman Forum na ọtụtụ nyiwe ndị ọzọ
Adenowo na-akwado ihe ngosi redio n'usoro ihe omume kwa izu na Leadership - Voice of Change
Ihe nrite ya gụnyere

Award Gems Rare na njikọ nke United Nations Information Center na Women's Optimum Development Foundation (WODEF), maka ọrụ ya na inye ụmụ nwanyị ike; International Alliance for Women World of Difference 100 Award; Ihe nrite Ngwongwo Mba Nile (Kachasị Mma Ọha na-ahụ Maka Ọrụ Ọha, 2012); Ihe nrite ihe onwunwe nke Africa (Ihe nhazi ihe ejikọtara ọnụ kacha mma; Architecture Office kacha mma na ihe owuwu ọhaneze kacha mma, 2013); IDEA Awards (Onye Mmebe Azụmahịa Kachasị Mma 2012; Onye na-ahụ maka ime ụlọ kacha mma 2013); Ihe nrite steeti Ekiti, 2014; IDEA Awards (Best Institutional Architect 2014) na Cambridge African Society Award
N'afọ 1991, International Biographical Center dị na Cambridge, UK gunyere Adenowo na 'Who Will Be Who in The 21st Century'
O bụ onye ndu ndị isi olu dị mkpa yana onye otu Global Philanthropy Forum, African Philanthropy Forum na The African Leadership Network
A kwanyela ya ugwu dị ka onye nnọchi anya nke kacha mma maka mmezu pụtara ìhè na nhazi ihe owuwu na mmepe ụmụ nwanyị site n'aka ụlọawụkwọ ebe ọ gụrụ akwụkwọ

Adenowo nwetara onyinye nturu ugo nke New African Woman in Business Award ma bụrụkwa onye ahọpụtara maka ihe nrite West African Business Woman of the Year Award na CNBC All Africa Business Leaders Awards na 2014
A nabatara ya dị ka otu n'ime ndị Naijiria mmadụ otu narị kacha nwee mmetụta

Akpọrọ ya aha dịka otu n'ime ụmụ nwanyị otu narị kacha agba ume na Nigeria, otu n'ime ụmụ nwanyị iri kachasị ike n'Africa nke AFK Insider na Nwanyị Azụmahịa Kasị Mma nke Africa sitere na La Batisseurs Des Economie De L'Afrique
Ọ bụ onye otu ụlọ ọrụ Nigerian Institute of Architects ma bụrụkwa onye juri nke Cartier Initiative Awards
E gosiputara ya na Hall of Fame, Black History Month site na Mahadum West England, Bristol
Nnukwu ọrụ mbụ Adenowo mere bụ mgbe ọ dị afọ iri abụọ na anọ n'okpuru nduzi nke onyeisi ụlọ akwụkwọ ya bụ Chief Femi Majekodunmi nke Femi Majekodunmi and Associates
Ọ rụrụ ụlọ ọrụ Federal Ministry of Finance dị n'Abuja dị na isi obodo Naijiria
Ọrụ ndị ọzọ gụnyere
Ọ lụrụ Olukorede Adenowo
Ha nwere ụmụ nwoke abụọ
Olajumoke Akinjide (amụrụ n'ụbọchị nke anọ n'ọnwa Ọgọstụ n'afọ 1959) bụ onye ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị Naijiria si Ọyọ Steeti, Naijiria
Ọ bụ bu Minista nke Steeti maka Federal Capital Territory (FCT) nke onye bụbu onye isi ala Naijiria, Goodluck Jonathan họpụtara na ọnwa Julai, n'afọ 2011 ka ọ rụọ ọrụ na Cabinet nke Naijiria

A mụrụ Olajumoke Akinjide, nke a makwaara dị ka Jumoke Akinjide, na ụbọchị anọ n'ọnwa Ọgọst afọ 1959 na Ibadan, Ona-Ara Local Government Area nke Oyo steeti n'ime ezinụlọ nke onye na-ahụ maka iwu, Pa Osuolale Abimbola Richard Akinjide (SAN) nwụrụ anwụ

N'etiti ọnwa Mee 2001 na Septemba 2003 ọ rụrụ ọrụ dị ka onye enyemaka pụrụ iche nke onye isi ala na ihe FCT ma mesịa bụrụ onye enyemaka pụrụ anya nye onye isi oche na ihe G77 na ndị Naijiria nọ na Diaspora (NIDO) n'okpuru onye bụ bu onye isi ala Olusegun Obasanjo
Ọ bụkwa onye ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị na-enweghị isi ma bụrụ onye na-azọ oche ndị omeiwu, Oyo Central Senatorial District na ikpo okwu PDP n'afọ 2011, n'otu afọ ahụ a họpụtara ya ka ọ bụrụ minista

Akinjide gara Ụlọ akwụkwọ Maryhill Convent dị na Idi-Ape, Iwo Road, Agodi, Ibadan, site n'afọ 1963 ruo 1968, ebe ọ nwetara asambodo mbụ ya ma gaa St Louis Grammar School, Ibadan site n'afọ 1969 ruo 1974 ebe ọ nwetara West African School Certificate (WASSCE)
Akinjide nwere LLB (Hons) site na Kings College, Mahadum London, na Masters Degree na Law (LLM) site na Harvard Law School na United States
O nwere First Class Honours na English Solicitors Final Examinations
Akinjide nwere nzere abụọ dị ka onye ọka iwu na onye ọka iwu nke Ụlọikpe Kasị Elu nke Naịjirịa na dị ka onye ọkàiwu nke England na Wales
Ọ kwuola okwu n'ọtụtụ nzukọ iwu dị ka onye nkuzi ọbịa ma bipụta akwụkwọ na isiokwu ndị a
Akụkụ Iwu nke Nchebe Gburugburu Ebe Obibi nke Mba Nile (1996)
Okwu Iwu dị ugbu a maka mmepụta na ojiji gas na Naịjirịa (1997)
Olajumoke Bodunrin (a mụrụ na abalị asaa nke ọnwa Febrụwarị na otu puku afọ na narị iteghete na iri anọ na ise ( 7 Februarị 1945)) bu onye ọgba ọsọNaijiria lara ezumike nka
Omoba Olajumoke Abidemi Okoya-Thomas bụ onye otu ulo nke Federal House of Representatives of Nigeria
Ọ bụ onye so n'òtù ndị Ọchịchị All Progressives Congress na-anọchite anya Lagos Island I Federal Constituency of Lagos state, Nigeria
Nwa nwanyị nke Chief Molade Okoya-Thomas, onye bụ Asoju Oba nke Lagos, amụrụ ya n'abali iri abụọ na January 1957
O nwere diploma na Senior Managers in Government nke si na Harvard University na diplọma na sec
admin site na College nke Burleigh
Olajumoke Okoya-Thomas malitere ịrụ ọrụ na 29 nke April 2011 maka nnọkọ nke atọ na ụlọ ndị gọọmenti etiti nke ndị nnọchiteanya

Ihe gbasara iwu bụ isi gbasara 'Social Development of Women and Children' Ọ bụ ugbu a onyeisi oche nke kọmitii na Mgbasa Ọhaneze na onye otu kọmitii na 'Banking & Currency, Diaspora, Niger Delta and Women' na nzuko omeiwu
ọ bụbụrụ onye isi oche nke 'house committee of prisons'
Olajumoke Okoya-Thomas kwadoro iwu banyere inye umuaka ara n'afọ 2013

Iwu ahụ dara n'ihi na ndị nnọchiteanya 'Representatives' ahụ siri ọnwụ na ọ bụ ihe kachasị mma na ngalaba ọha na eze dị ka 'ọ dịghị nwanyị ga-amanye ịzụ nwa ya' ọ bụ ezie na ha kwetara na uru ahụike nke na-enye nwa ara adịghị anabata

Olajumoke Orisaguna (amụrụ ya na n'afọ 1989) bụ onye nlereanya Naijiria nke natara nlebara anya ọha na eze mgbe, mgbe ọ na-ere achịcha n'okporo ámá Lagos, n'amaghị ama ọ banyere n'ime nnọkọ foto nke onye egwu Britain, Tinie Tempah, nke onye na-ese foto Naijiria, TY Bello, maka magazin Nigeria's This Day
TY Bello, mgbe ọ na-edezi ihe, hụrụ ihe oyiyi nke Olajumoke na Tinie Tempah n'etiti foto ndị ahụ
Bello chọtara Olajumoke ma were ya foto
Ọ pụtara na mkpuchi nke magazin ahụ dị n'elu tupu e were ya n'ọrụ dị ka onye nlereanya
O mechara nweta ọrụ na ụfọdụ nnukwu ihe ngosi na ụlọ akwụkwọ
A mụrụ Olajumoke Orisaguna n'afọ 1989 ma zụlite ya na Ire, Osun Steeti
Ọ zụrụ azụ dị ka onye na-edozi isi ebe ọ zutere onye ọrụ nka aha ya bụ Sunday Orisaguna
Ha lụrụ n'afọ 2010 ma mesịa mụọ ụmụ abụọ
Ọ na-asụ Yoruba nke ọma
Jumoke dị ka a na-akpọ ya nke ọma, ya na otu n'ime ụmụ ya gara Lagos ebe ọ na-atụ anya inwetakwu ego na-ere achịcha
Di ya na nwa nke ọzọ nọrọ na Osun Steeti ebe ọ na-etinye ọnụ ụzọ na-agbagharị agbagharị maka ndụ
Mgbe ọ na-arụ ọrụ na Lagos, e jidere ya n'azụ foto nke onye na-ese foto TY Bello sere mgbe Bello na-ese foto onye egwu Britain bụ Tinie Tempah
Ka o mechara nyochaa ma dezie ihe oyiyi o were, Bello kpebiri na Orisaguna nwere ikike dị ka ihe nlereanya
Mgbe o bipụtachara na Instagram, Bello chọtara Orisaguna ma kwuo na ọ ga-amalite ọrụ ya
O mere ndokwa ka ihe osise Orisaguna pụta na mkpuchi nke magazin Style ma mee atụmatụ ịmepụta ihe nkiri banyere ya
E mechara nye Orisaguna nkwekọrịta ịme ihe ngosi na Few Model Management, ọzụzụ na ọrụ, n'agbanyeghị na ọ naghị asụ asụsụ Bekee nke ọma
Mgbe Orisaguna nwere ihe ịga nke ọma, di ya na nwa ya ọzọ kwagara Lagos
Na Naịjirịa, e toro Orisaguna na mgbasa ozi dị ka onye nlereanya
Dị ka CNN si kwuo, a ga-enye ya ụfọdụ agụmakwụkwọ na ụlọ akụ enyewo ya ịkwụ ụgwọ maka ụmụ ya ịga ụlọ akwụkwọ
Ọtụ ndị Sujimoto na Poise Nigeria nyere Olajumoke agụmakwụkwọ
Ọ ga-amụ Etiquette, Soft Skills, Social Graces na Communication na Poise Nigeria
Ọ bụ ọtụ Sujimoto malitere agụmakwụkwọ ahụ bụ ndị chọrọ ijide n'aka na Olajumoke kwadebere maka ndụ mgbe nlebara anya ozugbo ahụ kwụsịrị

Na vidiyo YouTube Olajumoke Sauce 7 Trends and Acceptance nke ebugoro na Febụwarị 2018, Orisaguna kwupụtara na ọ wụrụ ya akpata oyi n'ahụ n'ahụ n'eziokwu ahụ bụ na ụfọdụ ndị na-edina ụdị onwe ha ma nwee ikike ịlụ ndị nwoke ma ọ bụ nwanyị

Orisaguna kwupụtara na nwoke idina nwoke bụ 'un-Nigerian', ma kwuo n'asụsụ Yoruba, 'Amaara m na ọ dịghị onye Naijiria a mụrụ dị ka nwoke idina nwoke ma ọ bụ nwanyị na-edina nwanyị' O kwukwara na ọ na-esiri ya ike ihi ụra mgbe ọ chọpụtara na Facebook na ụfọdụ ụmụ nwoke na ụmụ nwanyị na-edina ụdị onwe ha na-eme atụmatụ ịlụ ndị nwoke na nwanyị
Nwaada Orisaguna yiri ka ọ na-eyi ndị LGBT egwu mgbe o kwuru na 'a ga-emeso ha n'ụzọ ị na-enweghị ike ichetụ n'echiche'
Na nzaghachi, onye na-eme ihe ngosi transgenda nke Naijiria bụ Veso Golden Oke tinyere vidiyo na-agbawa ihe nlereanya ahụ, na-adụ ya ọdụ ka ọ mụtakwuo banyere obodo LGBT
N'okpuru iwu Naijiria dabere na iwu ndị ọchịchị Britain, mmekọrịta nwoke na nwanyị n'etiti ndị LGBT ka bụ mpụ, na ntaramahụhụ kachasị elu sitere na mkpọrọ afọ iri na anọ ruo ntaramahụhụ ọnwụ
Ka ọ mechara bụrụ onye ama ama, di ya, Sunday Orisaguna, boro ebubo na kemgbe ọ ghọrọ onye ama ama, ọ na-akparị ya ma na-etinye alụmdi na nwunye ha n'ime ọgbayara
Na nzaghachi, o nyere ajụjụ ọnụ na The Punch na-ekwu na mmekọrịta ya adịghị mma, ọ bụ naanị Chineke ga-ekpe ikpe n'etiti di ya na onwe ya maka ajụjụ ọnụ ọ na-enye banyere ya

Olajumoke Yacob-Haliso bụ onye nchịkọta akwụkwọ Naijiria, onye nchịkọta akụkọ akwụkwọ agụmakwụkwọ, na prọfesọ mahadum nke ọrụ ya na-elekwasị anya na ụmụ nwanyị Afrịka na ọnọdụ esemokwu; nwoke na nwanyị na ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị; ọchịchị onye kwuo uche ya; ikike mmadụ; na ikike ndị gbara ọsọ ndụ
Ọ bụ onye nchịkọta akụkọ nke ọtụtụ akwụkwọ gbasara nsogbu ụmụ nwanyị na Africa, onye nchịkọta akụkọ nke Journal of Contemporary African Studies na Journal of International Politics and Development
Ọ bụ onye ngalaba na Babcock University, Nigeria, ma kụzikwara na ọtụtụ mahadum nke mba US
Yacob-Haliso nwere PhD na sayensị ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị na Mahadum nke Ibadan ma ọ bụ onye American Council of Learned Societies postdoctoral fellow na Mahadum Rhodes
Yacob-Haliso bụ osote prọfesọ nke sayensị ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị na Mahadum Babcock ebe ọ bụkwa onye isi oche nke Veronica Adeleke School of Social Sciences
Ọrụ ya na-elekwasị anya na ụmụ nwanyị Afrịka na ọnọdụ esemokwu; nwoke na nwanyị na ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị; ọchịchị onye kwuo uche ya; ikike mmadụ; na ikike ndị gbara ọsọ ndụ
Ọ bụ onye nchịkọta akụkọ nke Indiana University's Journal of International Politics and Development na onye nchịkọta akụkọ nke Journal of Contemporary African Studies
Ọ gara ma kụzie na Mahadum Iowa State, Mahadum Yale, na Mahadum Texas na Austin
Yacob-Haliso bụ onye nchịkọta akụkọ ma ọ bụ onye inyeaka nchịkọta akụkọ nke
Olalekan Jeyifous (a mụrụ n'afọ 1977), nke a na-akpọkarị Lek ( na-akpọpụta dịka 'Lake'), bụ onye na-ese ihe na Naijiria bi na Brooklyn, New York
Ugbu a, ọ bụ onye nkuzi nleta na Mahadum Cornell ebe ọ nwetakwara nzere bachelọ na Architecture n'afọ 2000
N'ịbụ onye a zụrụ azụ dị ka onye na-arụ ụlọ, ọrụ ya na-elekwasị anya na nka ọha na eze na azụmahịa
E nyebugo ọrụ ya ọrụ ọhụrụ maka Reconstructions Architecture and Blackness in America ngosi na Museum of Modern Art na New York nàkwà Amanda Williams, Walter Hood, na Mario Gooden
Ihe ngosi a na-enyocha mmekọrịta dị n'etiti ụlọ na oghere nke obodo ndị Africa America yana ndị Africa na ụzọ ndị a pụrụ isi mee ka akụkọ ihe mere eme pụta ìhè ma nwee ike iwulite nha
Ọrụ Jeyifous na-eche nsogbu mmekọrịta mmadụ na ibe ya ihu site na ntinye, nnukwu ihe osise, nnukwu ihe osise ọha na eze nakwa ụdị kọmputa 3D na-egosipụta echiche banyere Afrofuturism na dystopias ụlọ
Jeyifous nwere mmasị na nsogbu obodo na ọrụ na-agbanwe agbanwe obodo na-arụ na ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị, nka, ọdịbendị pop, na echiche nchịkọta

Banyere ihe ngosi ya gosipụtara na ihe ngosi Museum of Modern Art, “Reconstructions Architecture and Blackness in America,” Jeyifous na-enyocha eziokwu dystopian nke gbanyere mgbọrọgwụ na ndị isi ojii nọ ná mba ọzọ na ephemera obodo mepere emepe na-apụ n'anya na ụlọ nke Brooklyn

N'afọ 2020, New York Times kpọrọ Jeyifous dịka otu n'ime ndị na-ese ihe 5 ga-eso na Instagram n'etiti ndị na-ese ihe Kara Walker, Phyllis Galembo, Laylah Amatullah Barrayn, Alex Webb na Rebecca Norris Webb
Crown Ether bụ ihe ọkpụkpụ dị mita iri ise n'ogologo n'afọ 2017 Coachella Valley Music and Art Festival
Jeyifous bụ otu n'ime ndị omenkà ise a họpụtara maka ngosi ahụ
Mmekọrịta dị n'etiti njikọ na nkewa kpaliri ihe osise ahụ dị elu
Onye na-ese ihe kewara ụlọ elu okomoko dị elu nke dị elu site na obodo na-adịchaghị elu ma nwee ihe nketa dị n'okpuru, ebe ọ na-ejikọta obodo abụọ ahụ site na uru nke nchekwa na ndò
“!”Ngagharị iwe (2017) bụ ihe osise ọha na eze dị mita iri nke nwere nnukwu ihe ọkpụkpụ anọ na Public Square na obodo Cleveland, OH

N'ike mmụọ nsọ site na akụkọ ihe mere eme nke ngagharị iwe, nzukọ udo, na nnọkọ obodo nke mere n'ama Public Square, Jeyifous sere ihe osise oroma na-acha odo odo nke na-egosi ndị na-eme ngagharị iwe na-eyi ụja n'ime mpi ehi, na-enye akwụkwọ nta, ma na-amakụ
Akụkụ ahụ na-anọchite anya ngagharị iwe dị ka ikike ọchịchị onye kwuo uche ya site n'ịnabata ndị ọbịa ka ha nọdụ ala maọbụ zukọta okirikiri ikpo okwu oche ndị e wuru na ntọala ígwè nke ibe ọ bụla
The Boom and the Bust (2019) bụ ihe ọkpụkpụ dị mita iri abụọ na ise nke dịka ụlọ dị elu nke nwere ihe yiri àkwá n'etiti ya na-ejide nchịkọta obere ụlọ na-acha uhie uhie
Akụkụ ahụ na-ezo aka na ihe ịma aka nke ịkpa ókè ụlọ na enweghị nhata n'obodo ukwu, n'oge gara aga, na ugbu a

Wrought, Knit, Labors, Legacies (2020) bụ̀ ntinye n'akụkụ mmiri Alexandria Virginia nke na-edepụta akụkọ ihe mere eme nke Alexandria nke ndị Africa nakwa America site na oghere nke akụkọ ihe mere eme nke ụlọ ọrụ na ndị ahịa nke obodo ahụ site na narị afọ 17 ruo 20
Ọdịnihu anyị, ọchịchị onye kwuo uche anyị (2020) ga-abụ ihe mmekorita ya na onye na-ese ihe Amanda Williams maka mmeghe She Built NYC
Akụkụ ahụ na-echeta Shirley Chisholm, nwanyị ojii mbụ gara ozi na Congress

Onye na-ese ihe mere ihe ahụ iji kọwaa ihe ncheta nke narị afọ iri abụọ na otu, sọpụrụ ihe nketa Shirley Chisholm nke ịkpọkọta ndị mmadụ ọnụ, ma kwurịta ogologo oge ihe gbasara ọchịchị onye kwuo uche ya
A ga-ewu ya na Brooklyn's Prospect Park na nkuku Ocean na Parkside Avenues

Olalekan Olude bụ onye ọchụ ego nke obodo Naijiria, onye ya na onye ọzọ tikọtara aka nwé guzobere Jobberman, bụ ihe nchọgharị ọrụ kachasị ewu ewu na mpaghara ọwụwa anyanwụ, Africa Ọ bụ kwa onye ndụmọdụ pụrụ iche na ihe gbasara okike ọrụ na ihe gbasara ikwagide ndị ntorobịa nye Gọvanọ Ogun steeti Dapo Abiodun
E tunyeru Olude akara ugo nke otu n'ime ndị ntorobịa naarị ndị Naijiria a kachasị eto eto site na Avance Media na 2016
Olamide Gbenga Adedeji (a mụrụ n'abalị 15 n'ọnwa Maachị n'afọ 1989), bụ onye na-eti egwu na Naijiria
Ọ bụ otu n'ime ndị kachasị pụta ìhè na Afrịka
Ọ na-edekọ na Yoruba na Bekee
N'afọ 2011, o wepụtara abọm studio mbụ ya bụ Rapsodi mgbe ọ bịanyere aka na Coded Tunes
E wepụtara YBNL, abọm ya na-esote, n'okpuru akara akara ya 'Yahoo Boy No Laptop' aka YBNL Nation
Ndị egwu 'First of All', 'Voice of the Street', 'Stupid Love', na 'Ilefo Illuminati' kwadoro abọm ahụ
Na 7 Nọvemba 2013, ọ wepụtara abọm studio ya nke atọ Baddest Guy Ever Liveth
Egwu abọm ahụ gụnyere 'Durosoke' na 'Yemi My Lover'
N'abalị 17 ọnwa Julaị 2013, Olamide ghọrọ onye Naijiria mbụ bịanyere aka na nkwekọrịta nkwado na Cîroc
A mụrụ Olamide Gbenga Adedeji na Bariga, Lagos Steeti, n'abalị iri na ise nke ọnwa Maachị, afọ 1989
Ọ bụ nwa nke abụọ n'ime ụmụ atọ Pa Adedeji na nwunye ya nke abụọ, Ronke Osisanya Adedeji mụrụ
Olamide nwere ụmụnne abụọ, TemmyGold na Eniola Olamilekan (onye a makwaara dịka DJ Enimoney)
Olamide malitere ọrụ ya mgbe ọ wepụtara egwu izizi, 'Eni Duro,' n'afọ 2010
N'otu afọ ahụ, ọ rụrụ na The Hip Hop World Awards Ọ gụrụ maka nkwurịta okwu na Mahadum Tai Solarin mana ọ kwụsịrị n'ihi nsogbu ego
Adedeji lụrụ Adebukunmi Aisha SuleimanHa mụrụ ụmụ nwoke abụọ, Maximilian Boluwatife na Tunrepin Myles
Olamide kwuru na Maria Okanrende nwere nwa ịhụnanya, onye na-arụ ọrụ na The Beat 999 FM n'oge ahụ
Ọ bịanyere aka na ID Cabasa's Coded Tunes record label ma Toni Payne na-elekọta ya
N'afọ 2012, ọ hapụrụ Coded Tunes wee malite akara ndekọ nke ya YBNL Nation
E wepụtara abọm izizi nke Olamide bụ Rapsodi n'afọ 2011
Egwu ndu ya bụ 'Omo To Shan' gbara n'ọtụtụ ụlọ ọrụ redio na Lagos na n'ofe Naịjirịa
Onyinye izizi nke Olamide mere ka ya na ọtụtụ ndị na-agụ egwu, gụnyere Wizkid, ID Cabasa, 9ice, Reminisce na D'banj
E wepụtara abọm studio nke abụọ nke Adedeji bụ YBNL na Nọvemba 2012
Tyrone (onye na-emepụta ihe), Samklef, 2 Kriss, Pheelz na ID Cabasa na-ahụ maka mmepụta ya
Abọm ahụ gosipụtara ndị ọbịa sitere na Davido, Tiwa Savage, Kayswitch, Dammy Krane, Reminisce, Samklef, Buckwylla, Minus 2 na Base One
Ndị otu 'I lefo Illuminati', 'First of All', 'Stupid Love' na 'Voice of the Street' kwadoro ya
Baddest Guy Ever Liveth bụ abọm studio nke atọ nke Olamide

E wepụtara ya n'abalị 7 Nọvemba afọ 2013 site na YBNL Nation Olamide dekọrọ abọm ahụ n'agbata afọ 2012 na afọ 2013 wee debanye aha Pheelz, Buckwyla, Ketchup, Ice Prince, Pepenazi, Endia, Viktoh, BBanks, Phyno, Pele Pele na Bez ka ha pụta dị ka ndị ọbịa na ya
Ọ bụ Pheelz mepụtara abọm ahụ kpamkpam, ma e wezụga egwu nke iri na atọ 'Sitting on the Throne'
Baddest Guy Ever Liveth nwere egwu anọ 'Durosoke', 'Turn Up', 'Yemi My Lover' na 'Eleda Mi O'
Akwụkwọ akụkọ Premium Times tinyere abọm ahụ na ndepụta ya nke abọm ise a ka ga-ewepụta na Naijiria nke afọ 2013
Ọ nọ n'ọkwa nke iri na abụọ na ndepụta Afrikka Radio nke abọm iri na abụọ kachasị mma nke Naijiria nke afọ 2013
Baddest Guy Ever Liveth meriri Best Album of the Year n'afọ 2014 Nigeria Entertainment Awards, a họpụtara ya maka Rap Album of the Year na 2014 City People Entertainment Awards
O meriri Best Rap Album na Album nke Afọ na The Headies 2014
N'ọnwa Mee 2013, a kọrọ na Olamide bịanyere aka na nkwekọrịta ndekọ na DB Records
Olamide gara na Twitter iji kwatuo akụkọ ndị ahụ
N'ajụjụ ọnụ ya na Toolz nakwa NdaniTV's The Juice, o kwuru na ọ bụ 'oge' ka onye ọ bụla bịanye aka na ya
Na 14 Nọvemba 2014, Olamide wepụtara abọm nke anọ ya Street OT site na YBNL Nation Abọm a bụ ihe na-esote abọm Baddest Guy Ever Liveth nke afọ 2013
Tupu egwu akpọrọ 'Story For The Gods' na 'Goons Mi', Street OT gosipụtara ndị ọbịa si Pasuma, Lil Kesh, Chinko Ekun, Phyno, Don Jazzy, na Reminisce

Olamide Toyin Adebayo (ka amụrụ n'abalị iri abụọ na abụọ n'ọnwa Juun n'afọ 1976), bụ onye egwuregwu badminton na Naijiria
Adebayo ritere ihe nrite ọla edo na ụmụ nwanyị abụọ na 1996 African Championship, nke weere ọnọdụ na Lagos, Nigeria
N'afọ 1995, Adebayo meriri asọmpi mba ụwa ya na obodo ya, n'oge Nigeria International Badminton Championship na Abuja, na mmemme ụmụ nwanyị abụọ ya na Obiageli Olorunsola
O sonyekwara na 1995 na 1999 IBF World Championship
Ụmụnwanyị na-alụbeghị di
Ugboro abụọ nke ụmụnwanyị

Olanike Kudirat Adeyemo (17 Julaị 1970, Ịbadan, Naijirịa ) bụ prọfesọ onye Naijirịa nke ahụike anụmanụ ọhaneze na ọgwụ mgbochi ọrịa na Mahadum Ịbadan
Ọ bụ onye osote onye isi ọchịchị na-ahụ maka nyocha, mwulite ọhụrụ na mmekọrịta pụrụ iche, onye izizi nweta ọrụa na mahadum ahụ
Adeyemo bu nwanyi mbu na-ahụ maka ahụike anụmanụ a nabatara na African Academy of Sciences na Nigerian Academy of Science
N'afọ 2007, e mere ya Onye otu nke nakwazị n’afọ 2002, e mere ya Onye otu nke Leadership for Environment and Development program na UK
N’afọ 2010, e mere ya Onye otu nke African Scientific Institute ( California, USA) were pụta na mbipụta afọ 2011 nke “Black Achievers in Science and Technology
N’afọ 2011, a họpụtara Adeyemo ka ọ bụrụ ọkachamara n’ihe gbasara ọrịa na tọgzikọlọji na Joint FAO/WHO Expert Committee ( JECFA )
N’afọ 2012, e mere ya Onye otu nke African Academy of Sciences
N’afọ 2016, e mere ya Onye otu nke Nigerian Academy of Science
N'afọ 2019 e mere ya Onye otu World Academy of Sciences maka ọganiihu sayensị na mba ndị na-emepe emepe, na Onye otu nke Society for Environmental Toxicology and Pollution Mitigation

A mụrụ Adeyemo na Ibadan, Naijirịa n'ụbọchị 17 ọnwa Julaị afọ 1970 nye ezi na ụlọ nke Alhaji Moshood Akanni Salami Baale Ladogan lagoro mmụọ nke Iseyin, Ọyọ Steeti, na Madam Modupeola Aduke Salami nke Ile-Loosare, Igbajo, dị na Ọshụn Steeti
Site n'afọ 1975 rue afọ 1978, Adeyemo gụrụ akwukwo na LEA Primary School, Kigo Road, Kaduna; e mesia, site n'afọ 1979 rue afọ 1981, ọ gụrụ na CAC Primary School, Sango, Ibadan
Ọ gụsịrị ụlọ akwụkwọ sekọndrị na Ahmadiyya Grammar School (nke bụzi Anwar-Ul-Islam Grammar School) na Eleyele, Ibadan; ebe ahụ, o nwetara mpụrara West African Examination Council ya n'afọ 1986
Tupu a nabata ya na Mahadum Ibadan, Adeyemo metụrụ obere ọmụmụ Advanced Level na St Annes School, Molete, Ibadan
O nwetara nzere digirii mbụ ya na Ahụike anụmanụ na Mahadum nke Ibadan n'afọ 1994
O nwetakwara nzere masta na nzere dọktọreti site n'otu madadum ahụ n'afọ 1998 nakwa afọ 2005 n'otu n'otu
Site na Juun afọ 1994 ruo Mee afọ 1995, Adeyemo sonyere na mmemme National Youth Service Corps dị ka onye na-ahụ maka ọgwụgwọ ọrịa anụmanụ na okpuru ọchịchị Safana na Katsina Steeti
Ọ malitere ọrụ agụmakwụkwọ ya dị ka Lekchọra II n'afọ 1999 na Ngalaba Ahụike anụmanụ ọhaneze na Mahadum nke Ibadan mgbe o mechara masta degirii
N’afọ 2002, e buliri ya n’ọkwa nkuzi nke Lekchọra 1 ruo n’afọ 2005 mgbe e mere ya osote prọfesọ
N’afọ 2008 ka e mere ya Asọshiet prọfesọ, ma n'afọ 2011, e buliri ya n’ọkwa Prọfesọ
N’ọnwa Maachị afọ 2017, a hoputara Adeyemo n’ọfịs ọhụụ e meere onye osote onye isi ọchịchị otu na-ahụ maka nyocha, mwulite ọhụrụ na mmekọrịta pụrụ iche
Na mbụ, ọ bụbu onye isi ngalaba Ahụike anụmanụ ọhaneze na Ọgwụ Mgbochi
N’afọ 2020, n’oge ọrịa na-efe bụ COVID-19 na Naịjirịa, a họpụtara Adeyemo ka ọ bụrụ onye isi oche nke ndị Ọchịchị na-ahụ maka mkpocha na Mgbochi nke Ọyọ steeti
Adeyemo bu nwanyi mbu na Naijirịa nọ na ngalaba ọgwụ anụmanụ mmiri
N'ajụjụ ọnụ ya na The Punch, ọ kọwara myiri ọrụ ya dị ka ọrụ ndị nwoke , kọwaa onwe ya dị ka onye na-adịghị ka nwanyị, ma kọwaa na ya na ụmụ nwoke na-adị n'udo
Ọ kọwakwara na ọ rịrị n'ọrụ ya site n'ịrụsi ọrụ ike, na okike enweghị ihe jikọrọ ya na ya

Adeyemo bụ onye otu ọchịchị na Global Young Academy (2013), onye otu African Academy of Sciences 'Commission on Women in Science in Africa (2014-date), onye otu Mauritius Declaration on Ocean Sciences (2016), onye otu Nigeria Academy of Science Committee on Science Advice in Africa (2019), Expert Group of the High-Level Panel on Building a Sustainable Ocean Economy (2019)
Adeyemo bụkwa onye otu Society of Toxicology, World Aquatic Veterinary Medical Association, Wildlife Disease Association, na Nigerian Academy of Science
N'afọ 2020, e nyere Adeyemo nrite Scientist of the Year by the International Achievements Research Center (IARC)

E gosipụtakwara ya na “Women in Science - Inspiring Stories from Africa”, mbipụta nke Network of African Science Academies (NASAC); mbipụta a gosipụtara ụmụ nwanyị 30 sitere na mba 18 nke Afrịka, bụ ndị megoro ọfụma n'ọrụ STEM
Adeyemo na-alụ Biodun Adeyemo, onye na-ere ọgwụ, ma ha abụọ nwere ụmụ nwoke atọ na otu nwa nwanyị
O kwuola na ya 'a gọziri agọzi [inwe] di na ụmụ nwere nghọta'
O nwere mbipụta n'akwụkwọ agụmagụ, nakwa dị ka onye nyocha nye akwụkwọ agụmagụ ndị a ma ama na mba ụwa
Olaniyi Rasheed Akindiya, nke a makwaara dị ka Akirash, bụ onye na-ese ihe si Lagos, Nigeria
Ọ gụrụ nka na Institute of Textile Technology, Arts, and Design na Oregun, Lagos State
Ọ tọrọ ntọala ụlọ ọrụ na-anaghị achọ uru a kpọrọ ARTWITHAKIRASH na 2000, nke na-akpọ ndị obodo ka ha sonye na nka ya
Ọ kwagara Austin, Texas, n'afọ 2011
Otu ihe atụ nke nka ọhaneze ya bụ njem ya n'afọ 2013 site na CentralTrak gaa Magnolia Hotel na Dallas ebe ọ na-eyi teepu na karama mmiri
Mgbe ọ bịarutere na Pegasus Plaza na Magnolia Hotel 'ọ na-agagharị na-eyi nnukwu akwa nke e kpuchiri ya na akwa na ikpo ákwà ma jiri obere akpa Ziploc gbaa ya gburugburu

Akirash weghaara otu, gbagọọ ya ka ọ bụrụ akpa icing ma bituo nkuku ya, wee jide ya n'ogo amụ ma mee ka ọ na-acha agba n'elu akwa ahụ, na-agagharị n'ihu na azụ dị ka nwata nwoke na-apịa n'ime ọdọ mmiri
' Ọ kpọziri ìgwè mmadụ ahụ ka ha sonye na eserese
N'afọ 2018, Akirash tinyere ihe akpọrọ 'Masquerades Mythologies' na Lawndale Art Center
Olatokunbo Oduyinka Olopade, CON bụ onye ọka iwu Naịjirịa, onye a họpụtara ka ọ bụrụ onye ọka ikpe nke Ogun Steeti
Ọ bụ nwanyị mbụ na-ekpe ikpe enweghị nrụrụ aka kemgbe e guzobere steeti ahụ
A mụrụ Olopade n'afọ 1953
Ọ gụrụ akwụkwọ na Queens School, Ede na Adeola Odutola College, Ijebu-Ode n'otu n'otu
O nwetara akara ugo mmụta iwu ya na Mahadum nke Ife, a kpọkwara ya ka ọ bụrụ onye ọka iwu n'afọ 1976
Ọ rụburu ọrụ na ngalaba ikpe ziri ezi nke Edo na Lagos steeti
Tupu a họpụta ya dịka onye ọka ikpe ukwu, ọ bụ onye ndụmọdụ steeti (1978), onye nduzi nke ikpe ọha na eze (1993), mgbe ahụ onye ọka ikpe (2011)
N'ọnwa Ọgọstụ n'afọ 2018, ọ lara ezumike nká n'ọkwa ya ma onye nnọchi anya Honourable Justice Mosunmola Dipeolu na-eme ihe nkiri
Ọ bụ onye natara nsọpụrụ mba, Commander of the Order of the Niger

Ọlátúbọ̀sún Oládàpọ̀, nke a makwaara dị ka Túbọ́sún Ọládàpọ̀، ma ọ bụ Odíd__wol____wol____wol__ Ayékò (amụrụ n'ubochi irí na itoolu n'ọnwa Septemba, 1943), bụ onye na-ede uri, onye na-eme egwuregwu, ónyé na'egwú, ónyé redio / ónyé mgbasa ozi, ónyé édémédé, na ónyé nchọpụta si Naijiria ónyé ndị na-ege ntị ya na-asụ Yorbá ma biri na South-West Nigeria
A mụrụ Abraham Ọlátúbọ̀sún Ọládàpọ̀, ọ gara ụlọ akwụkwọ praịmarị Phillip na Ararọmi Owu, Osun State, n'afọ 1950, wee gaa St
James Olanla na Akinyele, Ibadan, site n'afo 1951 ruo 1954, ma mesịa gaa Mahadum Lagos
Ọ gàrà ọzụzụ na St
Luke's Teachers Training College, Ibadan, ébé ọ malitere ime uri na ngosi n'ụlọ akwụkwọ ahụ na mmemme nka nke afọ 1965, ébé ọ na-abụ abụ Ìjálá Yorùbá
Ọ gụsịrị nke ahụ na 1967 ma ziga ya na St
David's School, Kudeti, Ibadan
O kwùrù, sị 'Ọ bụ na St
Lukez ka a chọpụtara nkà m na ihe nkiri, ọ bụkwa n'ihi nke a ka e zigara m na Mahadum Lagos iji mụọ màkà diplọma na Yorùbá Studies n'efu
M pụtara na ọdịiche na mmemme ahụ

N'afọ 1969, ọ sonyeere 'The Sketch newspaper', GbounGboun, akwụkwọ akụkọ Yorùbá, ébé ọ rụrụ ọrụ otu afọ tupu ọ kwaga na 1970 na Western Nigeria Television (WNTV) na Western Nigeria Broadcasting Service (WNBS)
N'ébé ahụ, ọ zutere ndị dị ka Adebayo Faleti, ónyé nwéré mmetụta dị ukwuu n'ebe ọ nọ, na Prince Adebayo Sanda, ónyé na-egosi Kaaro Ooojiire na Tiwa Nītiwa
Oladapo gbara arụkwaghịm n'afọ 1977 iji guzobe ụlọ ọrụ ndekọ, Olatubosun Records, iji chọọ, kwalite, ma mepụta ndị na-ese ihe na ndị na-ede uri n'asụsụ ụmụ amaala gafee mba Yorùbá

O mepụtara ihe karịrị abọm iri ise na otu dị íchè íchè na ndị omenkà narị abụọ na akara ahụ, gụnyere Late Ọ̀jọ̀gbọ́n Ògúndáre Fọ́yánmu si Ògbómọ̀__ilo____ilo____ilo__, Odòlayé Àlɔ́mú si Kwara, Àyányẹmí Atoko wá gbowó__ ̆ the talking-drum specialist; Àlàbí Ògúdépò, na Duro Ladipo International Theatre, n'etiti ndị ọzọ
Abọm uri Yoruba nke onwé ya (ewì) na-egosipụtakarị uri Yorùbá nke a na-agụ n'elu ndị egwú nke egwu ọdịnala
Ndị na-agụ egwú nke Oládàpọ̀ gụnyere 'K-12 Voices,' a ma ama nke Diípọ̀ Ṣódiípọ̀ nwụrụ anwụ duziri
Oladapo bụ ónyé dere ihe dị ka akwụkwọ iri abụo na itoolu dị íchè íchè, ụfọdụ n'ime ha na-eji dị ka ederede a tụrụ aro n'ofe ụlọ akwụkwọ praịmarị na sekọndrị na mahadum na Naịjirịa na mba ofesi
Ọ bụ ónyé dere akwụkwọ édémédé abụọ, Àròyé Akéwì (1 na 2) na Àròfọ̀__ilo____ilo____ilo__
Ọlátúbọ̀sún Records Company (nke a na-akpọkwa Ọlátúgb̀sún mgbé ụfọdụ) bụ ụlọ ọrụ na-edekọ asụsụ ụmụ amaala nke Olatubosun Oladapo guzobere n'afọ 1977

O mepụtara ihe karịrị narị abụọ nkè ndị na-ede uri na ndị na-eme ihe nkiri asụsụ Yorùbá, gụnyere Odolaye Aremu, Batile Alake, Ogundare Foyanmu, Duro Ladipo, Alabi Ogundepo, na ọtụtụ ndị ọzọ - gụnyere Tubosun Oladapo n'onwe ya

Ojo Amos Olatunde (a mụrụ n'abalị 14 n'ọnwa Febụwarị n'afọ 1963), bụ onye Naijiria na-atụpụta ụkpụrụ ụlọ nakwa onye odeakwụkwọ ugbu a nke National Assembly of Nigeria kemgbe ụbọchị iri atọ n'ọnwa Septemba n'afọ 2020, ọ rụọla ọrụ dịka onye odeakwụkwọ site na 17 Julaị afọ 2020 mgbe ọ nọchiri Mohammed Sani-Omolori
A mụrụ Ojo na Ilobu, Irepodun, Oyo State, Nigeria
Ọ gụrụ akwụkwọ sekọndrị na Ilobu Secondary Commercial Grammar School, ebe ọ gụsịrị na 1983
Bido n'afọ 1985 ruo n'afọ 1990, ọ gara Mahadum Obafemi Awolowo ebe ọ gụsịrị akwụkwọ na nzere na iwu ụlọ, tupu ọ nweta nzere masta n'afọ 1992 n'otu mahadum ahụ
Ojo bidoro ọrụ ya na ọrụ onwe ya, tupu ọ banye na nzukọ mba nke Naịjirịa n'afọ 2004 dịka onye isi na-ewu ụlọ nke ngalaba ala na ọrụ
E bugotere ya n'ọkwa osote onye isi, mgbe nke ahụ gasịrị, ọ ghọrọ osote onye isi na onye isi
Ọ bụ onye otu Nigerian Institute of Architect, NIA na Architects Registration Council of Nigeria, ARCON

Oluwatoyin Victoria Adesanmi (amuru na ọnwa 10 Eprel 1992) bu onye ebuli elu Naijiria

Olawunmi Banjo (a mụrụ ya na n'ụbọchị 31 Julaị 1985) bụ onye na-ese ihe na Naijiria
O bi ma na-arụ ọrụ ugbu a na Lagos, Nigeria
A mụrụ ya na steeti Ogun
Olawumni Banjo gụrụ akwụkwọ na Mahadum Pan African
O meela ka ihe ọmụma nka ya dị omimi na Aina Onabolu Modern Art n'afọ 2005, malite iji acrylic na mmanụ na-ese ihe n'afọ 2006
Ọ na-arụ ọrụ ya na pensụl ma ọ bụ icheku ọkụ ma na-ese ihe na acrylic paint ma ọ bụ mmanụ na akwa
Nkà ya bụ nkọwa, ọrụ metalinguistic, na-ekwu maka onwe ya, ka ọha na eze wee nwee ike ịghọta ihe ọrụ ndị ahụ pụtara ma nwee ekele maka ya
Ọ bụ okike, ndị gbara ya gburugburu, ahụmahụ gara aga na nke ugbu a na ọrụ ndị ọzọ na-ese ihe, ọkachasị nke ndị nna ukwu Renaissance kpaliri ya
N'oge na-adịbeghị anya, ọrụ ya na-enwe mmetụta siri ike site na mmegharị nka surrealist
Olawumni bụkwa onye otu African Artists' Foundation

Olayinka Sanni (ka amụrụ n'ọnwa Ọgọstụ 21, n'afọ 1986) bụ onye egwuregwu bọọlụ bọọlụ Naịjirịa na Amerịka
A mụrụ ya na Chicago Heights, Illinois, n'oge na-adịbeghị anya, ọ gbara ọkwa etiti / ike n'ihu maka Phoenix Mercury na WNBA nakwa maka Charleville-Méz na France - LFB
N'afọ ya nke okenye na West Virginia, Sanni nwetara akara dị elu na akara kwa egwuregwu (162) na rebound kwa egwuregwu (71)
A họpụtara Sanni na 18th n'ozuzu ya na 2008 WNBA Draft site na Detroit Shock
N'ime egwuregwu iri atọ na otu ọ gbara n'oge bọọlụ ya, ọ malitere egwuregwu itoolu
Ọ gbara kpọmkwem 50% site n'ala (41-82) mgbe ọ na-eme nkezi obere ihe karịrị nkeji iri kwa egwuregwu
Ọ na-agbara Calais na France bọọlụ n'oge 2008–09 WNBA off-season
Ọ na-egwuri egwu ugbu a maka ESB Villeneuve-d'Ascq na France n'oge 2009–10 WNBA off-season
