Olley Tsino Maruma (nwụrụ n'afọ 2010) bụ otu n'ime ndị isi ojii na-eme ihe nkiri na mba Zimbabwe
O so na ndị isi ojii ole na ole mgbe nnwere onwe mba ahụ gasịrị n'afọ 1980 iji nwee ụlọ ọrụ mmepụta ihe
A na-eto ya maka uto na mmepe nke ụlọ ọrụ ihe nkiri nke mba Zimbabwe
A mụrụ Maruma na Zimbabwe
O dere akwụkwọ akụkọ ọkara akụkọ ndụ banyere afọ ndị a chụpụgara ya n'agha na nlọghachi ya na Zimbabwe nke a na-akpọ, Coming Home nke e bipụtara n'afọ 2007
Ọ nwụrụ n'afọ 2010

Oliver Wendell Harrington (ubochí irí na anọ n'ọnwa Febụwarị, 1912 ̊ rụo ụbọchị abụọ n'ọnwa Novemba, 1995) bụ onye America na-ese ihe nkiri na onye na-akwado megide ịkpa ókè agbụrụ na maka ikike obodo na United States
N'ịbụ ónyé si n'agbụrụ dị iche iche, Langston Hughes kpọrọ ya 'onye kacha eme ihe nkírí na-atọ ọchị n'Africa na America'
Harrington rịọrọ màkà mgbaba ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị na East Germany na 1961; ọ biri na Berlin màkà afọ iri atọ ikpeazụ nke ndụ ya
A mụrụ Herbert na Euzsenie Turat Harrington na Valhalla, New York, Harrington bụ nwa mbụ n'ime ụmụ ise
Ọ malitere ime ihe nkiri iji gosipụta nkụda mmụọ ya banyéré ónyé nkuzi na-akpa ókè agbụrụ nke na-akpa oke agbụrụ na klas nke isii ma gụsịrị akwụkwọ na DeWitt Clinton High School na Bronx na 1929

N'ikpu onwé ya na Harlem Renaissance, Harrington chọtara ọrụ mgbè Ted Poston, ónyé nchịkọta akụkọ ọbọdọ màkà Amsterdam News matara banyéré nnukwu nkà Harrington dị ka ónyé na-ese ihe nkiri na ónyé na-eme ihe nkiri ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị
N'afọ 1935, Harrington mepụtara Dark Laughter, ihe nkiri na-atọ ọchị, màkà mbipụta ahụ
E mechara kpọgharịa ya Bootsie, n'ihi onye ama ama ya, onye Africa America nkịtị na-emeso ịkpa ókè agbụrụ na US
Harrington kọwara ya dị ka 'onye obi ụtọ, ónyé na-eri nri nke ọma ma nwee obi ụtọ'
N'oge a, Harrington debanyere aha na Fine Arts na Mahadum Yale iji mezue akara ugo mmụta ya, mana ọ pụghị imecha ya n'ihi na United States banyéré n'Agha Ụwa nke Abụọ

N'abalị iri na asatọ n'ọnwa Ọktoba n'afọ 1941, ọ malitere ibipụta Jive Gray (1941 1910), ihe nkiri na-atọ ọchị kwa izu banyéré ónyé na-efe ụgbọelu Africa na America; ihe nkiri ahụ gara n'ihu ruo mgbe Harrington kwagara Paris
Harrington nwere ụmụ anọ
Ụmụ nwanyị abụọ bụ ụmụ amaala US; nke atọ bụ nwa amaala Britain
A mụrụ ha niile tupu Harrington akwaga East Berlin
A mụrụ nwa ya nke ikpeazụ, nwá nwoke, ọtụtụ afọ mgbè Harrington lụrụ Helma Richter, ónyé nta akụkọ German
A mụrụ Brooks nà St
Louis, Missouri, n'ọnwa Ọgọstụ 1872
A na-ahụkarị ihe osise Brooks, na mmanụ na pastel, na mgbidi nkè ụka, kọleji, na ụlọ akwụkwọ na Missouri, Kansas nà ọtụtụ ndị ọzọ
Ụlọ ọrụ yá dị nà Kansas City, Kansas
Brooks jikwa pensụl mée ihe na ụfọdụ n'ime ǹkà ya
Na Disemba úbọchị irí abụọ na atọ, 1896, Brooks lụrụ Loueva J
Simpkins
Ollie Anderson McLaughlin (March 24, 1925 na February 19, 1984) bụ ónyé America na-emepụta ihe ndekọ na ónyé nwé ákàrà ndekọ
Ọ chọpụtara Del Shannon, ma hazie ma ọ bụ mepụta ndekọ site na Dave Brubeck, Chet Baker, Dorothy Ashby, Barbara Lewis, na Capitols, n'etiti ọtụtụ ndị ọzọ
A mụrụ ya na Carthage, Mississippi, United States, mana ọ kwagara Ann Arbor, Michigan, dị ka nwatakịrị

Mgbè ọ gụsịrị akwụkwọ ma jee ozi na US Army n'oge Agha Ụwa nke Abụọ, ọ gụrụ akwụkwọ na Columbia College na Chicago, tupu ọ laghachi Ann Arbor na ngwụcha afọ 1940 iji rụọ ọrụ dị ka DJ na ụlọ ọrụ redio WHRV
Ya na nwanne ya nwoke kwalite egwu jazz na R&B

N'ọnwa Machị afọ 1954, ọ kwalitere egwú egwu nkè Dave Brubeck Quartet na Ann Arbor, nke a tọhapụrụ akụkụ ya na album Jazz Goes to College, ọnwa abụọ ka e mesịrị, ọ haziri egwu egwu Chet Baker, nké e wepụtara dị ka LP Jazz na Ann Arbour

N'afọ 1960, ọ nụrụ otu egwu ọbọdọ nke Charles Westover, nke a maara n'oge ahụ dị ka Charlie Johnson, ma dekọọ ihe ngosi nke otu ahụ, nke o zigara Harry Balk na Irving Micahnik nke Talent Artists na Detroit, Michigan
N'ihi ya, Bigtop Records bịanyere Westover aka, ma kweta ịgbanwe aha ya ka ọ bụrụ Del Shannon
McLaughlin mèrè ka Shannon dekọọ otu n'ime egwu ya na New York City, na-eji onye otu Max Crook's Musitron dị ka ngwá egwu, na otu egwu, 'Runaway', ruru No
1 na chaatị Billboard na Eprel 1961
McLaughlin mepụtara ọtụtụ n'ime egwu Shannon mechara, gụnyere 'Hats Off to Larry'
Na mbido afọ 1960, McLaughlin guzobere Karen Records, nke mbụ n'ime akara ndekọ atọ aha ya bụ ụmụ ya nwanyị, ndị ọzọ bụ Carla na Moira

N'etiti ihe ndekọ ndị ọ mepụtara na mbido na etiti afọ 1960 bụ 'Hello Stranger', 'Baby I'm Yours', na 'Make Me Your Baby' nke Barbara Lewis; 'Love Makes The World Go Round' nke Deon Jackson; na 'Cool Jerk' nke Capitols
N'ọnọdụ ụfọdụ, ekwere na mmepụta McLaughlin bụ nsonaazụ nke ọrụ nchịkwa ya maka ndị na-ese ihe metụtara
E mèrè ọtụtụ n'ime ihe ndekọ ya na Chicago na Detroit, n'ọnọdụ ụfọdụ site na iji ndị egwu nwèrè nkwekọrịta na Motown, ọtụtụ n'ụgwọ, ma wepụta ya site na akara Atlantic na Atco
N'etiti ndị egwu ndị ọzọ McLaughlin dere bụ Bettye LaVette, Richard Wylie, Ruth Copeland, The Soul Twins, Johnnie Mae Matthews, na Matt Lucas
E weputara ọtụtụ ihe ndekọ McLaughlin site na 1960s na Northern soul compilation records

Sarah Matawana 'Olly' Mlamleli (amụrụ n'afọ 1957) bụ onye ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị South Africa onye jere ozi dị ka onye isi obodo Mangaung Metropolitan Municipality site n'Ogost, na afọ 2016 ruo Ọgọst afọ 2020

Onye otu African National Congress, ọ rụrụ ọrụ dị ka onye otu Executive Council (MEC) maka Cooperative Governance, Traditional Affairs na Human Settlements site na Febụwarị na afọ 2012 ruo Ọgọst na afọ 2016
N'afọ 2020, a chụpụrụ Mlamleli dị ka onye isi obodo Mangaung ma jide ya n'ihi nkwekọrịta asbestos na-ese okwu nke sitere n'oge ya na MEC
Mlamleli was born in 1957 in Viljoenskroon in the Orange Free State Province
Oguru Akwụkwọ na Mphohadi College Ebe onwetara, akara ugo na nturu ugo na afọ 1976
Ogara n'ihu ịrụ ọrụ dị ka Onye nkụzi nke emechara nye ya onye nlekọta Uloakwukwo

O nwètèrè Dịploma na Bachelor of Arts, a Bachelors na Education ya na master's degree na education nke na eledo anya na agụmakwụkwọ ndị nlere anya nke United States and ￼￼Japan￼￼Na afọ 1996, e were ya na orụ dị ka onye nhazi na Free State Department of Education
Ahọrọ ya dika onye isi ndụ na ofis ndị na ahu maka ọkwa umunwanyi na afọ 2001
Premier Beatrice Marshoff appointed her as a coordinator of the Municipal Infrastructure Grants
A họpụtara Mlamleli dị ka onye otu Free State Provincial Legislature na afọ 2009
Ndị omeiwu họpụtara ya dị ka onye isi oche nke ụlọ ọrụ gọọmentị, ihe omume ọdịnala na kọmitii na-ahụ maka ebe obibi mmadụ
N'afọ 2012, onye isi ala Ace Magashule họpụtara ya dị ka MEC maka otu ọfịs ahụ, na-anọchi Mamiki Qabathe
Ọ nọgidere n'ọkwa ahụ mgbe ntuli aka afọ 2014 gasịrị
Mlamleli jere ozi dị ka onye isi oche mpaghara nke African National Congress Women's League
A na-akọwa ya dị ka onye na-akwado odeakwụkwọ ukwu nke ANC na onye bụbu praịm Magashule
A họpụtara Mlamleli dị ka onye na-azọ ọkwa onye isi obodo nke ANC maka Mangaung Metropolitan Municipality
ANC nọgidere na-enwe ihe ka ọtụtụ na kansụl na ntuli aka ime obodo nke Ọgọst, na afọ 2016
N'ihi ya, a họpụtara ya ka ọ bụrụ onye isi obodo mgbe kansụl ahụ gbakọtara ọzọ na 18 Ọgọst
Ọ ghọrọ nwanyị mbụ bụ onyeisi obodo ahụ
E mere emume mmeghe maka ya na Septemba
A họpụtara Mlamleli ka ọ bụrụ onye isi oche mpaghara SALGA na Nọvemba na afọ 2016
N'oge ọ bụ onye isi obodo, ụlọ ọrụ nyocha Moody's belatara obodo ahụ ka ọ bụrụ B3 n'ọnwa Ọgọstụ, na afọ 2019, na-ekwu na nnyefe ọrụ obodo ahụ nwere ike ịda ma ọ bụrụ na enweghị ntinye aka ozugbo
E belatara ya ọzọ ka ọ bụrụ Caa1 na Jenụwarị, na afọ 2020 n'ihi nchegbu nke ego na-adịghị mma
ANC nke mpaghara ahụ kpọrọ oku ka ewepụ ya, mana usoro mpaghara ahụ gbachitere ya
Gọọmentị mpaghara ahụ debere obodo ahụ n'okpuru nchịkwa na Disemba, na afọ 2019
Mlamleli lanarịrị mmegharị abụọ nke enweghị ntụkwasị obi
N'abalị asaa n'ọnwa Ọgọstụ afọ 2020, e mere nke atọ, ebe ndị otu mmegide kwuru na ewepụla ya
A na-egbu oge na mbụ n'ihi enweghị ndị otu
Onye na-ekwu okwu Mxolisi Ashford mara ọkwa na 14 Ọgọstụ na ndị kansụl 31 vootu maka mmegharị ahụ, 28 megide, ebe 9 mebiri vootu ha, na-ewepụ Mlamleli dị ka onye isi obodo
Lebohang Masoetsa bụzi onye na-anọchiteanya onye isi obodo ruo mgbe kansụl ahụ zutere iji họpụta ndị ndu ọhụrụ

N'abalị iri atọ n'ọnwa Septemba n'afọ 2020, ndị uwe ojii Hawks nke South Africa jidere Mlamleli maka ebubo mpụ sitere na nkwekọrịta asbestos na-ese okwu nke e mere n'oge ya na MEC ma jide ya n'ụlọ ọrụ ndị uwe ojii Bainsvlei
A ga-ejikwa ndị ọzọ a na-ebo Mlameli ebubo
Mmadụ asaa niile e boro ebubo na ikpe nrụrụ aka asbestos, gụnyere Mlamleli, ka e nyere mgbapụta
Olofin Adimula Oodua nke Ado-Odo bụ Onye Ọchịchị Ọdịnala na eze Yoruba nke Ado-Udo; a na-akpọkwa ya Oba nke Ado
Ado-Odo bụ isi ụlọ ọrụ nke Ado Kingdom na Ogun State, Southwestern Nigeria
Oba nke Ado bụ onye otu na-adịgide adịgide nke Ogun State Council of Obas ma ugbu a ọ nọ n'ọkwa na-esote Onye Ọchịchị Ukwu na Yewa Traditional Council

Olofin Adimula Oodua na-enwekwa ọnọdụ pụrụ iche nke klas mbụ na-ejedebe na nhazi oche n'ahịrị n'ihu ọ na-enwe n'akụkụ ndị isi anọ dị ugbu a na Ogun State Council of Obas na Onye isi oche nke Ado-Odo / Ota Traditional Council ma ọ bụ Obas Council
Oche ahụ tọgbọ chakoo ugbu a mgbe Eze Ukwu, Late Oba Abdul-Lateef Adeniran Akanni Ojikutujoye I onye sonyeere ndị nna nna ya na 7 Jenụwarị 2022
Ọ chịrị site na 2 Mee 2009 ruo ọnwụ ya

Oba nke Ado n'oge ọchịchị Oba Ogabi Akapo jere ozi dị ka osote onye isi oche nke Western House of Chiefs na mgbe e mesịrị onye isi oche na-adịgide adịgide, Ogun State Council of Obas maka Egbado Traditional Council mgbe e guzobere Ogun steeti na 1976 ma nọrọ n'ọfịs ahụ ruo ọtụtụ afọ ruo mgbe ọ nwụrụ na 1989
N'ịgbaso nkwupụta Chieftaincy a kwadoro dị ka akwụkwọ akụkọ gọọmentị mpaghara ọdịda anyanwụ si kwuo n'afọ ndị 1950, ụlọ anọ (4) na-achị achị ndị nwere ikike ocheeze dị ka ndị a
Ndị a bụ ezinụlọ ndị nwere ikike ịnata oche nna nna nke Olofin Adimula Oodua nke Alaeze Ado-odo
Ndị na-eme eze, mgbe ha nwesịrị mkparịta ụka kwesịrị ekwesị, na-ahọpụta onye na-esote onye ndu dị ka oba n'alaeze Awori oge ochie a na nke kachasị
E tinyere Olofin Adimula Oodua nke mbụ na 1050, nke bụ ihe dị ka afọ ise mgbe e guzobesịrị obodo ahụ
Oba Asade Awope, Olofin Otenibotemole nwere nsọpụrụ pụrụ iche nke ịchị alaeze Ado na Erekiti nke bụ ihe a na-adịghị ahụkebe n'oge tupu ọchịchị
Nkwado ya nke gara nke ọma n'ụlọ omebe iwu Lagos mgbe ndị Britain kpagburu ya maka ebubo na-enweghị ihe akaebe mere ka ọ bụrụ dike nke ịhụ mba n'anya na Naijiria
Na Gazette No
9 nke 1903 nke e wepụtara na 28 Febụwarị 1903, edepụtara Oba nke Ado dị ka otu n'ime okpueze iri abụọ na abụọ nke ala Yoruba (akwụkwọ akụkọ mbụ)
N'afọ 1863, Oba Adebami Agbojoye bịanyere aka na nkwekọrịta na-etinye Ado Kingdom na Alaeze Ukwu Britain
Na Nzukọ Berlin nke 1884 ruo 1885, Ado Kingdom bụ isi okwu n'oge esemokwu na nkewa nke Africa n'etiti ndị Britain, ndị Germany, ndị Ịtali, na ndị France

E webatara nzukọ kwa afọ nke ndị isi nke mpaghara ọdịda anyanwụ na 1937, Oba Adeteru Iso, Olofin Arolagbade gara nzukọ e nwere na Ijebu-Ode na 1941 na Alake nke Egbaland iji nọchite anya mpaghara Abeokuta
Akụkụ nke akụkọ ọchịchị nke 1940s kwuru na 'ọ bụ ihe a na-enyo enyo ma ọ bụrụ na e nwere na nkewa Ilaro niile, ezigbo Oba nke natara okpueze ya n'aka Ife
Ado yiri ka ọ na-enwe isi mgbe niile ma a maara ya dị ka Oba tupu ọbịbịa nke ọchịchị Britain
Ụlọ ọrụ Obaship dị na Ado sitere na Ife
Tụkwasị na nke a, Oba Jacob Ogabi Adebowale Fadeyi Akapo, Olofin Agunloye bụ onye otu na osote onye isi oche nke Western Region House of Chiefs site na 1956 ruo 1966
Mgbe ndị agha weghaara ọchịchị na Jenụwarị 1966, (nchịkwa ọchịchị nke Naijiria n'afọ 1966) a kwụsịtụrụ ọrụ ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị niile
Nke a hapụrụ ihe omume gọọmentị ime obodo niile n'aka ndị ọchịchị ọdịnala na Oba Akapo bụ isi akụ maka kansụl mpaghara Ado-Odo / Igbesa na ngalaba Ilaro nke Western State
N'ụzọ bụ isi, ìgwè anọ mejupụtara ndị isi obodo Ado nke a maara ugbu a dị ka ụmụ amaala Awori nke Ado-Odo
Ha bi n'akụkụ abụọ nke Osì na Ogona, nke e kewara n'ụzọ anọ nke Oke-Osi, Odo-Osi، Odojana, na Okejana
Ebe ndị a bụ ntọala nke mmekọrịta ọdịbendị, nwe ala, na ụlọ ọrụ Chieftaincy na Ado Kingdom
N'ịgbaso nkwupụta Chieftaincy a kwadoro dịka akwụkwọ akụkọ gọọmentị mpaghara ọdịda anyanwụ si kwuo n'afọ ndị 1950, ndị na-eme eze na ndị otu Oba-in-Council for Ado-Odo bụ ndị a
Nke ọ bụla n'ime Quarters ndị a mejupụtara ndị isi ọdịnala, ndị bụ ndị na-eme eze ma kenye ha ịrụ ọrụ ụfọdụ n'obodo ahụ
Bajomu, Osolo, Ira, Aro bụ ndị isi nke ndị isi obodo Awori Quarters nakwa ndị na-elekọta ebe nsọ n'ime ụlọ ha
A na-enye ndị eze anọ a ikike ịhọrọ eze (Oba) maka Obodo
Ememme Olojo bụ emume ochie a na-eme nw afọ n'Ife, Osun State, Nigeria
Ememme a bụ otu n'ime mmemme ewu ewu n'ala ndị Yoruba, Oba Adeyeye Enitan Ogunwusi kọwara ya n'otu oge dịka mmemme na-eme agbụrụ ndị isi ojii n'ụwa niile
Okwu Yoruba 'Olojo' pụtara 'Ụbọchị Ụbọchi Mbụ' nke na-akọwa obi ekele mmadụ nwere n'ebe ihe Chineke kere eke na ịdị adị nke mmadụ
Ememme Olojo bụ mmemme odinala na freekalenda nke Ile-Ife, Osun steeti nke dị na ndịda ọdịda anyanwụ Naijiria
Ọ bụ emume ncheta “ Ogun ”, bụ́ chi nke Ígwè, bụ́ onye e kweere na ọ bụ nwa mbụ Oduduwa, bụ́ nna ndị Yoruba
A na-eme mmemme ahụ kwa afọ na October
N'ubochi ta, Ooni (Eze Ife) na-aputa mgbe ubochi asa nke wezugara onwe ya na ngọnarị, na-ekwurịta okwu na ndị nna ochie na-ekpere ya ekpere maka ndị ya
Nke a bụ ime ka ọ dị ọcha nke ukeu ma hụ na ekpere ya bara uru
Tupu Ooni apụta, ụmụ nwanyị sitere na nne na nna ya na-ekpochapụ Obí, na-ewepụ Obí nke ihe ọjọọ
Ooni mechara pụta n’ihu obodo na eze Are (Okpueze), bụ nke a kwenyere na ọ bụ okpueze mbụ Oduduwa ji duru ndị isi ọdịnala na ndị ụkọchukwu na-eme emume na Shrine of Ogun
Oge ọzọ nke emume a bụ iduru igwe mmadụ gaa n’ụlọ arụsị Okemogun
N'ebe a, ọ na-arụ ọrụ tinyere mmeghari iyi, ịgba afa maka Ooni dị n'okpuru ugwu Oketage site Araba (Onyeisi Nchụàjà), yana iletakwa ebe dị mkpa akụkọ ihe mere eme
N'ụlọ arụsị ha, ndị isi ọmenala na mma agha nke ejiri nzu na osisi cam mara, na-apụta n'uwe emume na egwu egwu sitere na Bembe, ịgbà ọdịnala
Ụdị mkparị na abụ maka onye isi ọ bụla dị iche
Naanị Ooni nwere ike ịgba egwu a na-akpọ Osirigi
weEmemme Ifa bụ mmemme ụbọchị asaa na-eme kwa afọ na Satọde mbụ n'afo juun
Ifa (a na-akpọkwa Ọrunmila) bụ chi dị n’ọnụ na otu n’ime chi kacha mkpa ndị Yoruba

Ụbọchị mbụ nke mmemme ahụ gụnyere mmemme ndị dị ka Ijawe Ifa Ooni (a na-akpụ akwụkwọ maka ọnụ ọnụ Ooni) na Arisun Idana Afin (ihe na-eri nri n'ụlọ eze), ụbọchị nke abụọ a na-arara Bibo Ifa Ooni (àjà maka Ooni's oracle)
Ụbọchị nke atọ na nke anọ ka a na-arara nye Awo Oloju merindinlogun na-eme ememe (òtù nzuzo nwere ihu iri na isii)
Okwu ihu ọha na mkparita ụka okirikiri maka 'ụmụ nwanyị nọ n'Ifa' nakwa mmemme nke otu ụkọchukwu aha ya bụ Araba Agbaye na eme n'ụbọchị nke ise
Nnukwu mmetụ nke na-amalite na ubose Satọde ma dịruo n'isi ụtụtụ echi ya, gụnyere iwure (ngọzi/ekpere) nke Araba Agbaye (ọkpụkpụ azụ nke ụwa) na Araba ndị ọzọ, yana nri Ifa na nka nke afọ
AFjo ka na-ewu ewu n'Ile-Ife n'ihi akụkọ ifo na akụkọ ifo ya
Ọ na-akọwa ụbọchị n'afọ nke Olodumare (onye kere Eluigwe na Ala) gọziri pụrụ iche
Enwere ike ịtụgharị Olojo n'ụzọ nkịtị ka 'Onye nwe ụbọchị ahụ'
A na-ekpe ekpere maka udo na udo na Yoruba na Nigeria
Ndị ọgbọ niile na-esonye
Ihe ọ malitara bụ ijikọta ndị Yoruba
Odinala na-ekwu na Ile-Ife bụ ebe obodo ndị Yoruba, obodo ndị lanarịrị, oche ime mmụọ nke ndị Yoruba, na ala ndị mgbe ochie
Emume Olokun bụ aha emume ọdịnala kwa afọ na Naịjirịa nke ndị Yoruba dị iche iche na-eme na ala Yoruba niile, yana Edo
N'asụsụ Yoruba, Okun pụtara Oké Osimiri, ebe Osa pụtara Lagoon (oké osimiri gbara ogige)
Olokun bụ chi nwanyị / chi nke oké osimiri, ebe Olosa nke a makwaara dị ka Osara bụ chi nwanyị nke ọdọ mmiri na ebe mmírí jikọrọ
A na-eme emume ma na-asọpụrụ ha abụọ n'ememme dị iche iche
N'ọdịnala Yoruba, ụlọ nsọ Olokun dị na mpaghara Ilode nke Ile Ife

Dị ka Walode nke Ile-Ife Chief Kolawole Omotayo, onye bụ Abore (Onye isi nchụàjà) nke Olokun kọwara 'Olokun bụ chi nwanyị nke chịkọtara mmiri niile nke ụwa ọnụ, mgbe e kere ya, wee bufee ya n'ebe ọ dị ugbu a - n'oké osimiri
Na mbido ndụ, ụwa enweghị ọdịdị ma jupụtakwa na mmiri
Olodumare site n'aka Obatala, onyeisi Orisha, gara n'ụwa iji malite usoro nke iji ndụ mejupụta ya
N'ihi ya, Obatala, nke ji ịgba iwa, si n'eluigwe gbadata site na agbụ ígwè
Site na Ilode, ebe anyị guzo ugbu a, nnukwu chi nwanyị Olokun malitere ịdọrọ mmiri niile
Mgbe nke a gasịrị, ọ kwagara ihe niile site na Ilare gaa n'akụkụ dịpụrụ adịpụ nke ụwa mgbe ahụ nke bụzi oké osimiri nke taa
N'etiti ndị Ilaje bi n'ụsọ oké osimiri nke Ondo Steeti, a kwenyere na chi Olokun bụ chi nwanyị nke oké osimiri, onye nwere ike inye ụmụ nwanyị nwa
E kwenyekwara na ọ na-achịkwa ebili mmiri nke oké osimiri, ọ pụkwara imebi ụgbọ mmiri nke ndị na-eme ihe ọjọọ
Olokun bụkwa chi nwanyị nke akụ na ụba ma nwee ike ịba ọgaranya nye ndị na-efe ya
Ndị na-efe Olokun na-eyikarị uwe ọcha na-enweghị ntụpọ ebe ihu ha na-acha ọcha
Dị ka emume a ma ama n'etiti ndị Ilajes, a na-eme emume Olokun nke a na-akwanyere ùgwù dị elu, ebe ndị mmadụ kwenyere na ọ nwere mmetụta dị mma na ndụ ha
Ndị Edo na-eme emume nke ha na ngwụcha ọnwa Febụwarị ('ọnwa' mbụ mgbe ọnwa nke iri na abụọ gasịrị) nke na-ewere ọnọdụ na Usonigbe, ebe nsọ Olokun, na Edo State
A na-eme emume ọzọ, nke oge a na Lagos State na Nọvemba
Emume ikpeazụ, nke a na-eme kemgbe afọ 2002, bụ nke Olokun Festival Foundation haziri ma ghọọ ihe dị mkpa na-adọrọ mmasị ndị njem nleta na mpaghara
Ọ bụ Otunba Gani Adams na-eduzi ya, onye na-eduzikwa Oodua People's Congress

Olori Aiyivieruewinoya 'Ivie' Emiko-Atuwatse, nke a maara dị ka Olori Atuwatse III (amụrụ na 22 Mee 1986), bụ Ezẹ Nwanyị nke Alaeze Warri, onye ọka iwu, onye ọchụnta ego na nwunye Ogiame Atuwatse nke Atọ, onye na-achị alaeze Warri ugbu a, na Olu nke 21 nke Warri
Ọ bụkwa nwa nwanyị nke onye ọchụnta ego Naijiria, onye na-etinye ego na onye ọrụ ebere Captain Hosa Wells Okunbo
Mgbe e chiri ya ezẹ n'ọnwa Ọgọstụ 2021, Olu nke Warri nyere nwunye ya aha ọhụrụ, na-akpọ ya Olori Atuwatse III, ugbu a ọ bụ aha ya
A mụrụ Olori Atuwatse na Lagos ma gụọ akwụkwọ na Naịịria na United Kingdom
O nwetara nzere Bachelor of Laws na London School of Economics ma kpọọ ya na Naịjịria Bar na 2010
Olori Atuwatse III etinyela aka n'ọtụtụ mbọ na-elekwasị anya na ụmụ nwanyị na ụmụaka, gụnyere Captain Idahosa Wells Okunbo Stem Innovation Centre, nke o guzobere iji sọpụrụ nna ya

Ọ malitekwara ọtụtụ mmemme itinye aka maka ndị ogbenyé na Delta State, gụnyere nleta 2022 na Urejụ Community, ogige mmanụ jupụtara na ya na-ata ahụhụ mmetụta nke mmebi gburugburu ebe obibi na Iyara, obodo ogige ọzọ
Olori Atuwatse nke Atọ bụkwa onye na-akwado ikike ụmụaka, ọkachasị inye ụmụ nwanyị ikike
O nyela ọtụtụ narị ụmụaka agụmakwụkwọ, gụnyere atụmatụ 2022 maka ụmụaka 100 sitere na Nana Model Girls College Warri, Warri, Delta State

N'okpuru atụmatụ ahụike ya, Olori Atuwatse III akwalitewo ohere ịnweta nlekọta ahụike n'efu, ọkachasị maka ndị ogbenye, na Disemba 2021, malitere mgbasa ozi ahụike na ọdịmma Wuwu Ore, lekwasịrị anya na ụmụ nwanyị, ụmụaka na ndị agadi
E mere mbipụta nke abụọ nke mmemme ahụ na Ugbolokposo Community, na steeti Delta n'ọnwa Eprel 2022
Olori Atuwatse nke Atọ lụrụ Ogiame Atuwatse Nke Atọ na Nọvemba 2014
Ha nwere ụmụ atọ
Olorunsogo bụ ọchịchị ime obodo na Oyo State, Nigeria
Isi ụlọ ọrụ ya dị n'obodo Igbeti
O nwere mpaghara nke 1,069 km2 na ọnụ ọgụgụ mmadụ nke 81,759 na ọnụ ọgụgụ afọ 2006
Koodu ozi nke mpaghara ahụ bụ 212
Olowe nke Ise (Yoruba Ọlọ́wé of Ìse; c
1938) bụ onye ndị ọkọ akụkọ ihe mere eme na ndị nchịkọta nke ọdịda anyanwụ na-ewere dị ka otu n'ime ndị na-ese ihe kachasị mkpa na narị afọ nke iri abụọ nke ndị Yoruba nke bụ Naịjịrịa, Africa taa
Ọ bụ onye na-akpụ osisi na onye na-emepụta ihe n'ụdị atụmatụ Afrịka nke a maara dị ka oju-ona
A mụrụ Olowe dịka Olowere, na Efon-Alaiye, obodo a maara dị ka nnukwu ebe ọdịbendị na Yorubaland, mana ọ biri ọtụtụ ndụ ya n'obodo Ise
E were ya n'ọrụ na mbụ dị ka onye ozi n'obí Eze Arinjale, Oba nke Ise
Ọ bụ ihe esemokwu ma ọrụ nka ya amalitere dị ka mmụta ma ọ bụ bilitere naanị site na talent ya
O yiri ka mepụta ihe ya dị ka onye na-akpụ ihe malitere na Ise n'okpuru nkwado nke Arinjale tupu ọ gbasaa n'ebe ọwụwa anyanwụ Yorubaland

A kpọrọ Olowe na Ilesa, Ikere, Akure, Idanre, Ogbagi na obodo ndị ọzọ dị n'ime kilomita iri isii (9675 kilomita) iji mepụta ezinụlọ mara mma (dịka ọnụ ụzọ na veranda posts), ihe onwe onye na omenala maka ezinụlọ bara ọgaranya
Ndị ọgbọ ya dekọrọ ọnọdụ Olowe dị ka onye na-ese ihe na uri otuto Yoruba nke a maara dị ka oriki
Dịka ọmụmaatụ, e dekọrọ ihe atụ a nke otu n'ime ndị nwunye ya bụrụ na 1988
N'afọ 1924, e gosipụtara nka Olowe na mba ofesi na nke mbụ ya mgbe a họpụtara ọnụ ụzọ na lintel sitere n'obí eze dị na Ikere maka Pavilion nke Naijiria na British Empire Exhibition na Wembley, London
Ọrụ nka a mechara nweta site na British Museum
Rịba ama na e sere ihe ọkpụkpụ Olowe na mbụ, mana eserese ahụ emeela ochie kemgbe ahụ
Olowogbowo bụ mpaghara dị n'ebe ọdịda anyanwụ nke Lagos Island na Lagos, nke a makwaara dị ka Apongbon
Mpaghara ahụ dị na mpaghara azụmahịa

E guzobere obodo ahụ mgbe afọ 1851 gasịrị, mgbe a tọhapụrụ ndị Yoruba a dọọrọ n'agha na ụmụ ha ndị e debere n'ụsọ osimiri na Sierra Leone laghachiri na Lagos, ma nye ha ala iji biri na mpaghara Olowogbowo na Breadfruit nke agwaetiti ahụ

Aha Apongbon bụ nsụgharị na-adịghị mma nke okwu Yoruba a l'agbon pipon ('nwoke nwere afụ ọnụ na-acha ọbara ọbara'), aha e nyere William McCoskry, onye na-anọchite anya gọvanọ nke Colony nke Lagos e guzobere ọhụrụ na 1861
Egwú Jùjú malitere n'ógbè Olowogbowo n'afọ 1920, mgbe ụmụ okorobịa nọ na mpaghara ahụ na-ezukọta n'ụlọ ọrụ na-arụ ọrụ igwe iji ṅụọ ma mee egwu
Tunde King bụ onye ndú nke otu a, nke a na-ewere n'ozuzu ya dị ka onye guzobere ụdị ahụ
Ndị ọzọ a ma ama n'ógbè ahụ gụnyere
Olu nke umunwayi nke ndi mbaLibyan (VLW) bụ òtù na-abụghị nke gọọmentị (NGO) nke e guzobere iji kwalite ma chebe ikike ụmụ nwanyị na Libya
VLW nwere isi ụlọ ọrụ na Tripoli ma nwee alaka ụlọ ọrụ na Zawia na Misrata
VLW ka bụ òtù ndị ntorobịa na-eduzi nke na-aga n'ihu na-akwado mmepe ụmụ nwanyị na ịma ụkpụrụ ndị dị na obodo Libya aka
VLW na-arụ ọrụ iji gbasaa ozi na ọkwa mba site n'ịmepụta ndị otu mpaghara nke ndị mmadụ n'otu n'otu na òtù
E hiwere VLW n'ọnwa Ọgọstụ afọ 2011 iji meghachi omume na mgbanwe ọchịchị nke Febụwarị 17
Alaa Murabit, onye dọkịta na-eto eto na onye na-ahụ maka ihe ndị ruuru ụmụ nwanyị, guzobere ya na Tripoli
Murabit nọ n'afọ ikpeazụ ya n'ụlọ akwụkwọ ahụike ma mgbe mgbanwe ahụ gasịrị, o chere na e nwere 'windo ohere maka ụmụ nwanyị na mba Libya'
Ka ọ na-erule n'ọnwa Nọvemba, otu ahụ haziri Nzukọ Ndị inyom Mba Nile nke mbụ na Libya
Ọzọkwa, n'ime oge dị mkpirikpi, VLW mepụtara ụlọ ọrụ ụmụ nwanyị na Tripoli ma na-enye klas
Murabit kwuru na VLW nwara iji 'ụdị mba ụwa' maka otu ha, mana ha chọtara naanị ọnụ ụzọ mechiri emechi na ndị na-agbaso omenala, nke Sunni Arab bi na Libya
malite n'ịgbanwe ụzọ ha si eme ihe na iji nkọwa udo nke Islam n'ọrụ ha, ha chọtara olu ka ukwuu n'etiti ụmụ nwoke na ụmụ nwanyị
Ụzọ VLW, iji okpukpe 'inweta nkwado mpaghara,' abụwo ụzọ pụrụ iche iji mee mgbanwe na Libya
Otu olu nke mere na Nọvemba 11-15, 2011 bụ nke VLW haziri ma bụrụ nzukọ ụmụ nwanyị mba ụwa mbụ e mere na Libya

Nzukọ ahụ gụnyere isiokwu gbasara ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị, okpukpe, akụ na ụba ma nwee nnọkọ ikpeazụ, mechiri emechi maka ụmụ nwanyị naanị na isiokwu ndị dị ka ahụike ụmụ nwanyị na ime ihe ike metụtara okike
Nadia El-Fallah nyere aka malite oru Noor na 2013, ma nwee olileanya na ọ nwere ike ịbụ 'ngwá ọrụ maka ịkpali mkparịta ụka n'ụlọ ndị mmadụ, ụlọ alakụba, (na) ụlọ ahịa kọfị'
Palestine na Jọdan rịọrọ VLW ka ọ mepụta oruNoor na mba ha
Ubochi Ozuru uwa onu nke odo odo Hijab bụ ihe omume ebe ụmụ nwanyị na-eyi hijab na-acha odo odo iji gosipụta 'ihe ncheta nke nguzo siri ike nke Islam megide ime ihe ike n'ụlọ'
Murabit na-ekwu na 'ubochi odo odo nke Hijab na-emegide ikike a na-eche na onye Alakụba nwere imegbu nwunye, nwa nwanyị, nne, ma ọ bụ nwanne nwanyị'
Ụbọchị odo odo Hijab mbụ na Libya bụ na 2012 na ihe omume 2013 hụrụ ndị Libya 13,000
Ụbọchị odo odo Hijab (Satorde nke abụọ na Febụwarị) na-ewere ọnọdụ iji cheta ogbugbu nke Aasiya Zubair, onye bụ nwanyị na-ese ụkpụrụ ụlọ nke di ya na-emegbu Muzzammill Hassan mara mma ma gbupụ ya isi
A na-agba ndị ikom na ndị na-eyighị hijabs ume ka ha yiri akwa na-acha odo odo, tie ma ọ bụ eriri na ubochi odo odo Hijab
Olu Ajayi bụ onye Naijirịa na-ese ihe, Onye na-ese foto na onye nyocha nka nke a mụrụ na 1963
Ọ bụ onye isi oche gara aga nke Society of Nigerian Artists, Lagos chapter ma bụrụ onye guzobere Guild of Professional Fine Artists E gosipụtara ya na Who's who in Nigeria online biography
A mụrụ Olu na Ọgọọst 18, 1963 ma bụrụ onye Ososo, na Akoko Edo LGA nke Edo Steeti
Ọ gụsịrị akwụkwọ na Auchi Polytechnic na 1984 na HND na Fine Arts
Olu Ajayi gosipụtara Xanti site n'aka Neville Ukoli, na Aboki Comic Strip nke Defunct The Sunday Observer Newspapers
Ọ bụkwa onye na-ese ihe osise n'ime ụlọ nke Defunct The Nigerian Observer Newspapers
Olu Ajayi bụ otu n'ime ndị ọsụ ụzọ mbụ nke eserese agba mmiri na Naịjirịa

Mgbe ọ ghọchara onye otu Society of Nigerian Artists (SNA), ọ biliri wee bụrụ Onye isi oche nke Lagos Chapter n'etiti 2008 - 2014 wee guzobe ihe omume October Rain na Art Café nke na-egosi mmemme SNA kwa afọ
Ọ bụkwa onye guzobere Guild of Professional Fine Artists na ọrụ ya maka ọtụtụ ụlọ ọrụ gụnyere ụlọ akụ azụmahịa, ụka, ụlọ ngosi na ụlọ ọrụ na-acha anụnụ anụnụ
E gosipụtara ọrụ ya na Nigeria, Africa na Europe ma jee ozi dị ka onye ndụmọdụ n'ofe mpaghara na mba ụwa

Ọ nyochala 'A Promise of Harvest' nke Funnso Ogunlade, 'A New Pride' nke Humphrey Bekaren, 'Painting a New Order' nke Abraham Ogbodo, 'A Blaze of Colour' nke Chinwe Uwatse na 'Eccentric Paintings' nke Sunday Times Newspapers, Lagos
Market by the Palace (1999) mmanụ na eserese bụ ọrụ ya kachasị elu nke e rere na Arthouse Contemporary Limited na 2008

Olu Amoda (a mụrụ n'afọ 1959) bụ onye Naijiria na-akpụ ihe, onye na-ese ihe osise, onye na-emepụta ngwá ụlọ, na onye na-ese ihe nkiri nke a maara nke ọma maka iji ihe ndị ahịa a tụfuru atụfu dị ka ntu nchara, efere ígwè, bolts, pipes, spoons na mkpanaka iji mepụta ihe ọkpụkpụ, ahịhịa na anụmanụ iji gosipụta nsogbu mmekọrịta ndị Naijiria na ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị na ọdịbendị site na mmekọahụ, ndọrọ ọchịchị, agbụrụ na esemokwu na nkesa akụ na ụba
Ọ bụ onye guzobere Riverside Art and Design Studios na Lagos, Nigeria
A mụrụ Amoda na Warri na Niger Delta n'afọ 1959 site na nna ya bụ onye na-akpụ ọla edo
Ọ gụrụ ihe ọkpụkpụ na Auchi Polytechnic na Auchi, Nigeria, n'afọ 1983, na 2009, ọ nwetara nzere masta na nkà nka na Georgia Southern University na Georgia, USA
A na-ewere Amoda dị ka otu n'ime ndị na-ese ihe n'oge a na Naịjirịa
na Jenụwarị 2020, a mara ọkwa ya dịka onye nduzi nka nke ngosi Now Sculpture 2020, site n'aka Sculptors Association of Nigeria, maka nzukọ mba 2020 nke ScAN haziri
N'ihi mmegharị nka ya, Amoda so na ndị nyere aka na akụkọ ihe mere eme nka ọha Zaria (Zaria Rebels) na Nọvemba 2019, na Victoria Island, Lagos
N'afọ 2000, ọ rụrụ ọrụ dị ka onye na-ese ihe na Villa Arson na Nice, France, na Bag Factory na Johannesburg, South Africa n'afọ 2003
Ọ rụkwara ọrụ na Appalachian State University, na Boone na New York Design Museum, n'afọ 2006 n'afọ 2010 n'otu n'otu

O sonyere n'ọtụtụ ihe ngosi, gụnyere na Newark Museum na New Jersey, USA, Museum of Art & Design, USA; Skoto Gallery, New York; Georgia Southern University, USA; Villa Arson na Nice, France, na ụlọ ọrụ ebe mmepụta akpa na Johannesburg, The World Intellectual Property Organization (WIPO) Headquarters, Switzerland; Didi Museum, Nigeria; 6th Biennale de L'Art African Contemporain, Senegal; Newark Museum, Fondation Blachère na Sindika Dokolo Foundation, Victoria & Albert Museum, UK, n'etiti ebe ndị ọzọ
E gosipụtara ọrụ ya na Lend Me Your Dream, ihe ngosi pan-Africa nke Ntọala maka mmepe nke Omenala Africa nke oge a haziri
n'afọ 2017, ọ tọrọ ntọala Riverside Art and Design Studios na Yaba, Lagos
wee malite ọrụ nkuzi ya n'afọ 1987, ebe ọ kụziri ịkpụ ihe na ịse ihe na ụlọ akwụkwọ nkà, Design and Printing na Yaba College of Technology na Lagos kemgbe ahụ
Amoda enwetala ọtụtụ ihe nrite a ma ama gụnyere
Oludotun Baiyewu Jacobs, (onye a mụrụ 11 July 1942), amara site n'ezi ngosipụta àgwà dị ka Olu Jacobs, bụ Omee nke Nigeria na ezekutiv fiim
O meela ọtụtụ ihe nkiri onyonyo nke telivishọn Britain na ụfọdụ ihe nkiri mba ofesi

Ọtụtụ ndị etoola Olu Jacobs dịka otu n'ime ndị na -eme ihe nkiri Afrịka kachasị ukwuu na nke a na -akwanyere ùgwù na ọgbọ ya, tinyere Pete Edochie, ọtụtụ ndị mgbasa ozi, ndị na -akọwa ihe nkiri, ndị nkatọ na ndị na -eme ihe nkiri na -ele ya anya ka ọ bụrụ otu n'ime ndị na -eme ihe nkiri Afrịka kacha nwee mmetụta n'oge niile, a na -ewerekwa ya dị ka akara ngosi ọdịbendị
A na -ahụ ya dị ka ókè dị n'etiti ndị na -eme ihe nkiri ochie na ndị ọhụrụ
Jacobs emeela akara ya na ụlọ ihe nkiri Naịjirịa

N'ime ihe karịrị afọ iri anọ ọ na -eme ihe nkiri, a na -ahụ ya dịka ókè dị n'etiti ụdị ndị na -eme ihe nkiri ochie na ndị ọhụrụ A zụrụ ya na Royal Academy of Dramatic Arts, dị na England, ya na ụlọ ihe nkiri dị iche iche arụkọla ọrụ na Britain ma gosipụtakwa na ụfọdụ ihe nkiri mba ụwa
N'afọ 2007, o nwetara nturu ugo ihe nkiri 'African Movie Academy Award' maka onye na -eme ihe nkiri kacha mma onye isi oru
Olu Jacobs akọwapụtala onwe ya dị ka nna nna na Nollywood, na -emeghe ụzọ ịga nke ọma nye ọtụtụ ndị na -eme ihe nkiri na ndị na -eme ihe nkiri na amalite amalite

Mmasị na ịhụnanya ọ nwere maka ime ihe nkiri sitere na mkpali nke onye na -eme ihe nkiri ama ama laarala mmụọ bụ, Hubert Ogunde na - emume oriri kwa afọ nke emere na Colonial Hotel dị na Kano, emesịa, ọ gawara England ebe ọ gụrụ maka ime ihe nkiri na Royal Academy of Dramatic Arts na London
A kọwara ya dị ka 'otu n'ime ndị na -eme ihe nkiri Nollywood kacha mma, onye ntụgharị okwu kacha mma na onye na -ejikwa okwu kacha mma'

Maka ntunye uchu ọtunyere n'ọrụ ime ihe nkiri ihe karịrị afọ iri ise, a kwanyere ya ugwu site na nturu ugo ụlọ ọrụ nyere ya maka ọ pụrụ iche nke ọ pụrụ abịa n'ihe gbasara ihe ngosi na Africa Magic Viewers Choice Awards nke afọ 2013
Ọzọkwa, AMAA nyere ya ihe nrite nturu ugo gụrụ gawa na ndụ ya na 2016
Olu Jacobs lụrụ nwanyị na -eme ihe nkiri bụ Joke Silva
Di na nwunye ahụ hiwere ma nwee ụlọ ọrụ Lufodo Group, ụlọ ọrụ mgbasa ozi nke mejupụtara mmepụta ihe nkiri, akụ nkesa na ụlọ akwụkwọ Lufodo ebe ana akuzi gbasara emume ihe nkiri
Oludotun Baiyewu Jacobs bụ onye amụụrụ nne na nna si Egba Alake
Ọ nọrọ ndụ nwata ya na Kano wee gaa Holy Trinity School ebe ọ bụ onye otu arụmụka na ihe nkiri
A kpaliri ya ka o were ohere ime ihe nkiri mgbe ọ gara otu oriri egwu Chief Hubert Ogunde kwa afọ na Colonial Hotel dị na Kano
N'ikpeazụ, o nwetara visa wee gaa England ka ọ gụọ gbasara ihe nkiri
Na England, Jacobs bụ onye azụrụ na Royal Academy of Dramatic Arts na London
Ọ pụtara na ihe ngosi telivishọn Britain dị iche iche na usoro n'afọ 1970 (gụnyere The Goodies, Till Death Do Us Part, Barlow at Large, The Venturers, Angels, 1990, Ndị Echi na Ndị Ọkachamara )
Na 1978, ọ rụrụ ọrụ ngosipụta àgwà nke Onye isi ala Mageeba na ihe ngosi Michael Codron nke egwu Sir Tom Stoppard Night na Day

N'ime afọ 1980 gawazie Jacobs pụtara na ọtụtụ ihe nkiri mba ofesi, gụnyere ihe nkiri John Irvin The Dogs of War, Roman Polanski 's adventure-comedy Pirates (1986) na ihe nkiri ezinụlọ Baby Secret of the Legend Lost (1985)
Na telivishọn, ọ bụ onye otu emume na TVS ' The Witches and the Grinnygog
Jacobs emechaala gosipụta ihe nkiri Nollywood karịrị otu narị na iri abụọ
A na -ahụta ya dị ka otu n'ime ndị na -eme ihe nkiri Nollywood nke Naịjirịa
Jacobs lụrụ onye na -eme ihe nkiri Nollywood Joke Silva kemgbe 1989
Ha nwere ụmụ
Mgbe a jụrụ ya ihe kpatara na nwunye ya ka na -aza aha nwa agbọghọ ya, Jacobs zara, sị “Ọ bụ onwe nke aka ya
Mgbe m zutere ya, ọ bụ onye na -eme ihe nkiri a maara dị ka Joke Silva yabụ kedu ihe kpatara ịlụ m ga -eji gọnarị ya na ndị na -ege ya ntị aha ya
Ọ bụ Miss Joke Silva onye bụ Oriakụ
Joke Jacobs
Ọ dị mfe dị ka nke ahụ
Ndị mmadụ na -amalitezi ikwu ihe masịrị ha
Ha ededịla na anyị kewapụrụ onwe anyị na ụdị ihe niile
Mgbe ọ na -arụ ọrụ, ọ bụ Joke Silva mana ọ bụ Oriakụ
Joke Jacobs n'ụlọ
Olu Jacobs nwetara ihe nrite ụlọ ọrụ maka ihe ịga nke ọma ha na -eme na 2013 Africa Magic Viewers Choice Awards
Olu Oguibe (amụrụ n'abalị iri na anọ n'ọnwa Ọktoba n'afọ 1964) bụ onye Amerịka amụrụ na Naijiria

Prọfesọ nke Art na African-American Studies na Mahadum Connecticut, Storrs, Oguibe bụ onye isi nke Vera List Center for Art and Politics na New School, New York City, na Smithsonian Institution na Washington, DC
Ọ bụkwa onye na-akọ akụkọ ihe mere eme, onye nlekọta nka, na onye na-eduga na-enye aka na post-colonial theory na ọmụmụ teknụzụ ozi ọhụrụ

A makwaara Oguibe dị ka onye ọkà mmụta a na-akwanyere ùgwù na ọkọ akụkọ ihe mere eme nke nka ndị Africa na ndị Africa America nke oge a ma kwanyere ya ugwu na State of Connecticut Governor's Arts Award maka ịdị mma na ndụ ya na 15 June 2013

A mụrụ ya na 14 Ọktoba 1964 na Aba, Nigeria, Ọ natara ahụmịhe nka mbụ ya site n'aka nna ya onye a maara dị ka onye nkwusa, onye bụbu onye nkụzi ụlọ akwụkwọ, onye na-akpụ osisi, na onye na-ese ihe ịrịba ama
Agha obodo Naịjirịa mebiri ndụ Oguibe n'afọ 1967-1970, mana ezinụlọ ya lanarịrị, onye na-ese ihe mechara sonye na ọrụ nka ọdịnala n'obodo ndị Igbo ya
Oguibe sitere n'ike mmụọ nsọ Black Arts Movement nke na-eme n'etiti afọ 1965-1975
O nwetara ọtụtụ n'ime mkpali ya site na mmegharị a iji mepụta ihe osise ya pụrụ iche
Ka ọ na-erule afọ 1980, Oguibe chọpụtara mgbanwe na mmegharị a dị ka ndị oji na-ese ihe na-egosi, na-enwe ụlọ ngosi ojii ha, na ebe ọdịbendị ojii
Ka ọ na-erule afọ 1990, Black Arts Movement na Britain fọrọ nke nta ka ọ kwụsị
Oguibe gụrụ akwụkwọ na Nigeria na England
N'afọ 1986, o nwetara nzere bachelọ na Fine and Applied Arts na Mahadum nke Naịjirịa

N'afọ 1992, ọ natara PhD na akụkọ ihe mere eme site na School of Oriental and African Studies University of London maka edemede ya 'Uzo Egonu An African Artist in the West' (ọ bụkwa aha akwụkwọ ya nke afọ 1995)

Ka ọ dị ugbu a, e gosipụtala nka ya na nnukwu ụlọ ngosi ihe mgbe ochie na ụlọ ngosi ihe ngosi nka gburugburu ụwa gụnyere Whitney Museum of American Art; Whitechapel Gallery na Barbican Center na London; Migros Museum, Zurich; Irish Museum of Modern Art, na Bonnefantenmuseum, Maastricht, n'etiti ọtụtụ ndị ọzọ; yana na Havana, Busan, na Johannesburg biennials, na nso nso nso a na 2007 Venice Biennial
Enwere ike ịchọta ọrụ nka ọha ya na Germany, Japan na Korea
Oguibe akụziela na ọtụtụ kọleji gụnyere Mahadum nke Illinois na Chicago na Mahadum nke South Florida ebe o nwere oche Stuart Golding Endowed na African Art
E nyere nnukwu ihe ọkpụkpụ ọha ya, Monument to Strangers and Refugees, ọrụ maka Documenta 14 (2017)
Obelisk konkiri, nke e dere na ọla edo na amaokwu sitere na Matiu 25 35, 'Abụ m onye ọbịa ma ị kpọbatara m,' na German, English, Arabic, na Turkish, e mere maka Königsplatz (King's Square) na Kassel
Maka ọrụ ahụ, e nyere Oguibe ihe nrite Arnold Bode na July 2017
The Time Capsule bụkwa ihe osise ọzọ nke Oguibe mere nke e si na ya chepụta ọrụ abụọ ahụ a kpọtụrụ aha n'oge nsogbu ndị gbara ọsọ ndụ na-eme n'afọ 2014 na 2015
A maara nsogbu a dị ka oge dị egwu na akụkọ ihe mere eme nke Germany na akụkọ ihe mere eme nke Europe ebe ọtụtụ narị puku mmadụ gbapụrụ agha, ịda ogbenye, na arụrụala ndị ọzọ
N'afọ 1995, Oguibe kwagara United States ma kụzie obere oge na Chicago campus nke Mahadum Illinois
Ọ na-akụzi ugbu a na Mahadum nke South Florida na Tampa
Ọ rụkwara ọrụ dị ka onye nlekọta ma ọ bụ onye nlekọta maka ọtụtụ ihe ngosi

Ndị a gụnyere 2nd Biennale of Ceramics in Contemporary Art na Genoa na Albisola, Italy, na 2003; Vidarte 2002 International Video and Media Art Festival na Palacio Postal, Mexico City, na 2002; Century City na Tate Modern, London, na 2001; Authentic / Ex-centric Africa in and out of Africa for the 49th Venice Biennale na 2001, na Five Continents and One City 3rd International Salon of Painting na Museo de la Ciudad, Mexico City, na 2000
Ọ rụrụ ọrụ dị ka onye ndụmọdụ maka Dakar, Johannesburg, na Havana biennials na dị ka onye nkatọ na-ebi na Art Omi International artists' residency

Ihe odide Oguibe dị oke mkpa na nke echiche pụtara n'ọtụtụ mpịakọta dị mkpa gụnyere The Dictionary of Art, Art History and its Methods, Art in Theory 1900-2000, The Visual Culture Reader, Finding a Place Nigerian Artists in the Contemporary Art World, Photography, and the Substance of the Image, The Third Text Reader on Art and Culture, The Black British Culture and Society Reader, na Theory in Contemporary Art From 1985 to the Present, yana ọtụtụ usoro dị ka Frieze, Flash Art International, Art Journal, Texte zur Kunst, Zum Thema, Third Text and Criterios
Akwụkwọ ya kachasị ọhụrụ gụnyere Reading the Contemporary African Art from Theory to the Marketplace (MIT Press, 2000) na The Culture Game (University of Minnesota Press, 2004)

Cuba Project na Matanzas, Cuba, na 2019; 2nd Biennale of Ceramics in Contemporary Art na Genoa na Albisola, Italy, na 2003; Vidarte 2002 International Video and Media Art Festival na Palacio Postal, Mexico City, na 2002; Century City na Tate Modern, London, na 2001; Authentic / Ex-centric Africa in and out of Africa for the 49th Venice Biennale na 2001; Five Continents and One City 3rd International Salon of Painting na Museo de la Ciudad, Mexico City, na 2000, na The Poetics of Line Seven Artists of the Nsukka Group na 1997
Olubunmi Olateru Olagbegi, OFR bụ onye ọka ikpe Naịjirịa na onye bụbu onye ọka ikpe nke Ondo Steeti, Naịjirịa
Ọ bụkwa onye na-agụ akwụkwọ na Mahadum Afe Babalola
A mụrụ Justice Olubunmi n'ime ezinụlọ Omitowoju na Ile Ife, obodo dị na Osun Steeti nke Naijiria
A lụrụ n'ime ezinụlọ Olagbegi, ezinụlọ eze na Owo Ondo Steeti Naịjirịa
Ọ gara Mahadum nke London ebe ọ nwetara nzere bachelọ na nzere doctorate na Iwu A kpọrọ ya na ụlọ ọrụ England n'afọ 1973 na ụlọ ọrụ Naijiria n'afọ 1974
Ọ bụ onye a na-akwanyere ùgwù nke Lincoln's Inn, London
N'afọ 1990, a họpụtara ya ka ọ bụrụ onye ọka ikpe nke ụlọ ikpe dị elu nke Ondo State Judiciary ma n'afọ 2003, ọ ghọrọ onye ọka ikpe ukwu nke ụlọ ikpe steeti
Ọ rụrụ ọrụ a ruo afọ asaa tupu ọ laa ezumike nká na Ọktoba 26, 2010
N'abalị iri abụọ n'ọnwa Disemba n'afọ 2008, Chief Olusegun Obasanjo, onye bụbu onye isi ala Naịjirịa nyere ya nsọpụrụ mba nke onye otu gọọmentị etiti

Oluchi Mercy Okorie (a mụrụ n'ụbochi iri abụọ na asato, n’ọnwa Ọgọstụ n’afọ 1981 na Legọsụ) bụ onye egwuruegwu boolu nkata na-asọmpị n’ime otu egwuregwu bọọlu nkata First Bank BC na ndi otu egwuregwu bọọlu nkata mba Naijiria
Ọ nọchitere anya Naijiria n'afo 2005, 2006, na 2007 na FIBA Africa Championship
Site n'ubọchi iri abuo n'onwa Disemba ruo n'ụbochi iri abuo na asato n'egwuregwu Indoor Sports Hall na Abuja, Naịjirịa nke FIBA Africa Championship for Women in 2005 haziri
N'egwuregwu ahụ, Oluchi nọchitere anya Naịjirịa, were nweta ihe nrite ọla edo
N'asọmpi 2006 FIBA Africa Women's Clubs Champions Cup nke o sonyere na ya, Oluchi nwetara ihe nrite ọla nchara
Oluchi Onweagba-Orlandi onye amụrụ na abali mbụ n’onwa nke asato n'afọ 1980 ,bụ onye ihe nlere anya nke Naịjirịa
Onweagba tolitere na ala mgbalị nke Lagos, Naijiria, ya na ụmụnne ya ụmụ nwoke abụọ na ụmụ nwanyị
Ọ bụ nwa nwanyị nke nne ya bụ nọọsụ na nna yabụ onye ọrụ obodo
Mgbe ọ gbara afọ iri na asaa, enyi ezinụlọ ha gwara Onweagba ka ọ banye na nyocha mbụ nke M-Net “Face of Africa” n’ụlọ ọrụ M-Net dị na Victoria Island, Lagos
ụlọ ọrụ ahụ zulitere ya ka ọ bụrụ otu n’ime ndị batara ọhụrụ maka asọmpi a 1998 (nke a na-akpọzi Nokia Face of Africa)

Nke a n'agbanyeghị mgbe ọ na-etolite, ọ nọgidere na-amaghị ihe banyere ejiji na ịme ngosi uwe Mana na nkwado nke ezinụlọ ya na ndị enyi ya, o kpebiri ka o sonye asọmpi mbipụta mbụ nke Face of Africa na 1998
Nke a bụ asọmpi mbụ nke kọntinenti niile, nke ndị South Africa na-ahazi M-Net na mmekorita ya na Elite Model Management Ọ meriri n'asọmpi ahụ
Mgbe ọ kwagachara New York City, ebe ọ ka bi, ọ malitere ịpụta na nchịkọta akụkọ maka American na Italian Vogue, Harper's Bazaar, Marie Claire, Allure,Nylon na W

O jerela Gucci, Carolina Herrera, John Galliano, Missoni, Tommy Hilfiger, Chanel, Bottega Veneta, Christian Dior, Alessandro Dell'Acqua, Jeremy Scott, Helmut Lang, Fendi, Anna Sui, Givenchy, Kenzo, Giorgio Armani, Céline, Nina Ricci, na Diane Von Furstenberg ije nlereanya Azụmahịa

Ọ gosiputakwala na mgbasa ozi Azụmahịa nke Gianfranco Ferré, Lancôme, Ann Taylor, Clinique, Bergdorf Goodman, Nordstrom, Macy's, Banana Republic, Gap, Express, L'Oreal, Coca-Cola ,ma gaa n'ihu irụrụ Victoria's Secret maka afọ asaa na ihe ngosi ejiji Victoria Secret kwa afọ

Ya na ndị ọrụ foto dịka Steven Meisel, Nick Knight, David LaChapelle, na Patrick Demarchelier rụkọrọ ọrụE wezụga ịme ihe ngosi ejiji ,Onweagba na-agba mbọ ije ozi dị ka onye nlereanya maka ndị ọzọ nwere ọnụnụ ọkụ n'obi na Naịjirịa, ọkachasị ụmụ agbọghọ Ọ wepụtara onwe ya na oge maka ndị otú ọrụ akwụ ụgwọ NGO dị ka LEAP Africa (ndị ọzụzụ maka akụ onwe) na NIPRO

Ọ malitekwara agụmakwụkwọ ya dị elu, ebe ọ gụbuuru maka akara ugo mmụta dịgri na usoro agụmakwụkwọ New York CityMgbe nkwekọrịta ya na Elite nọrọ afọ atọ bịara na njedebe, Onweagba binyere aka na DNA Model Management ọ gosiputala na 'Sports Illustrated Swimsuit Issue' ugboro atọ

N’afọ 2008, ọ butere ụlọ ọrụ n'ahụ maka ihe nlereanya na South Africa, OModel Africa, nwee isi ụlọ ọrụ na Johannesburg na nso nso Cape Town Onye mmeri nke M-Net Face nke Africa, Kate Tachie-Menson na 2008, nyere OMDel Africa nkwekọrịta mbupute US $ 50,000 ọ bụ ugbu a onye ọbịa na onye isi ọka ikpe nke Africa Next Top Model
Aha mbụ Onweagba sitere n’asụsụ Igbo ma pụtakwa “Ọlụ Chukwu”
N’afọ 2006, Onweagba lụrụ onye Italian fashọn dizaina aha ya bụ Luca Orlandi
Ha nwere ụmụ nwoke abụọ
Oludamola Bolanle ('Damola') Osayomi ( amuru 26 June 1986 na Ilesha, Osun State ) bu onye oso nke Naijiria nke ọkachamara na otu narị mita na 200 mita
Ọ bụ onye nwetere ọla edo ugboro anọ n'asọmpị Afrịka n'egwuregwu wee nweta ihe nrite ọlaọcha Olympic na Nigeria na ọsọ mita 4 × 100 na asọmpi Beijing 2008
Ọ merikwara otu narị na narị abụọ m sprints na 2007 All-Africa Games
Ya kacha mma na 100 m bụ 1099 sekọnd, nke edobere na São Paulo na 2011
Ọ gụrụ nchịkwa azụmahịa na Mahadum Texas na El Paso wee nọchite anya ụlọ akwụkwọ ya na egwuregwu na 2006
Ọ bụ onye mbụ meriri na 100 m na 2010 Commonwealth Games mana ewepụrụ aha ya ma machibido ya mgbe ule doping ya laghachitere nke ọma maka na-akpali akpali methylhexanamine
Mgbapụta izizi mba ofesi Osayomi na Naịjirịa bịara na asọmpi egwuregwu ndi ntorobịa mba ụwa nke afọ 2003 ebe ọ bụ ọkara ikpeazụ n'ime otu 100 m na 200 mita
Ọ malitere ịsọ mpi n'asọmpi dị elu n'afọ na-eso ya dịka akụkụ nke otu egwuregwu ịgba ọsọ mita 4 × 100 nke Naijiria
Na mpụta mbụ n'egwuregwu Olympic, ndị otu ya bịara nke asaa na asọmpi ikpeazụ nke ụmụ nwanyị na 2004 Athens Olympics na otu ahụ kwughachiri ọnọdụ ahụ na asọmpi egwuregwu ụwa nke 2005 n'afọ bịara ọzo
Osayomi gosipụtara onwe ya n'otu n'otu na egwuregwu 2007 All-Africa site na iji 100/200 m ihe nrite ọla edo okpukpu abụọ tupu enyere ndị otu agba anọ aka na nrite ọla ọcha
Na mpụta mbụ ụwa ya na 100 m na 2007 World Championships in Athletics, ọ gara n'ime agba ikpeazụ (mechara nke asatọ) wee tọọ nkeonwe kacha mma nke 1115 sekọnd na okpomọkụ ahu
Ụmụnwaanyị Naịjirịa eruteghị asọmpi ịgba agba n'oge ahụ
O mepere oge ime ụlọ nke 2008 site na iji 719 kacha mma Sekọnd n'ime mita 60 wee gaa n'ọzọ nke isii na ngwụcha nke mmemme ahụ na asọmpi ime ụlọ nke ụwa nke 2008 IAAF
N'asọmpi Afrịka n'afọ 2008 ọ ghọrọ onye mmeri kọntinent abụọ, na-emeri ọla edo na 100 m n'otu n'otu na ọsọ agbagharị agbagharị, yana ị nweta ihe nrite ọla kọpa na 200 m

Ọkachasị mma ya abụọ bịara n'asọmpi Naijiria nke afọ ahụ, dịka o siri nweta otu narị m aha na 1108 Sekọnd (nakwa ihe ndekọ izute) wee merie 200 m na 2274 sekọnd (ọkara nkeji n'ihu onye na-agba ọsọ Gloria Kemasuode )
Nke a nyere ya ohere ịnọchite anya Naijiria na asọmpi Summer Olympics nke afọ 2008 na Beijing
Ọ bụ 100 m ọkara ikpeazụ na 200 m nkeji iri na ise
Ya na Kemasuode, Agnes Osazuwa na Ene Franca Idoko sokwa so na 4×100 m relay
N'ọkụ agba nke mbụ ha tinyere nke anọ wee ruo na nke ikpeazụ dịka ndị na-agbaghị ọsọ ọsọ
Halimat Ismaila nọchiri Osazuwa maka otu ikpeazụ ha wee gbapụ ruo oge 4304 Sekọnd, na-ewere ọnọdụ nke atọ na ihe nrite ọla n'azụ Russia na Belgium
N'afọ 2016, ndị otu Rọshịa kwụsịrị ma napụ ha ọla edo ha n'ihi mmebi iwu doping nke otu n'ime ndị na-agba ọsọ Rọshịa bụ Yuliya Chermoshanskaya mere, si otú ahụ kwalite Nigeria n'ọkwa ọlaọcha

Ọ bụghị otu ụdị na oge 2009; E wepụrụ ya n'oge okpomọkụ nke sprints na relay na 2009 World Championships na Athletics na oge kachasị mma nke 1131 na 2341 sekọnd, ma atọrọ na FBK Games, dị nnọọ nwayọọ karịa afọ gara aga
N'afọ 2011, oge kachasị ọsọ ya n'afọ bịara na asọmpi egwuregwu 2010 nke Africa, ebe ọ meriri 200 m, were 100 m ọla, ma debe ndekọ asọmpi asọmpi n'akụkụ Blessing Okagbare

A họpụtara ya ka ọ nọchite anya Africa na 2010 IAAF Continental Cup na soro ọnọdụ nke ise na 200 m, o meriri ihe nrite ọla kọpa n'otu otu nwere narị anọ kacha elu m ndị ọgba ọsọ sitere na asọmpi Africa ( Ruddy Zang Milama nke Gabon na ndị obodo ya Osazuwa na Okagbare)

Na 2010 Commonwealth Games na New Delhi, Osayomi meriri 100 mita nke ụmụ nwanyị mana ọ tụfuru ihe nrite ọla edo ya mgbe nlele B ya nwalere ihe dị mma maka methylhexanamine, bụ nke etinyere na nso nso a na ndepụta amachibidoro World Anti-Doping Agency
N'ụzọ na-eju anya, tupu a machibido ya iwu, o kwuru, sị 'Amaghị m ihe mere ha ji kwe ka ndị mmadụ sonye n'asọmpi ahụ ma ọ bụrụ na ha enweghị ike ịgbaso iwu'

Olufemi Adetokunbo Majekodunmi (a mụrụ n'ụbọchị nke 1 n'ọnwa Mee n'afọ 1940) bụ onye Britain na Naijiria na-ewu ụlọ
A mụrụ Olufemi na 1 Mee 1940 na mba London, England nye Moses Majekodunmi na Tomi Agbebi
Otú ọ dị, ọ tolitere na Naịjirịa wee gaa St Gregory's College, Lagos
O mechara laghachi United Kingdom iji mụọ ihe owuwu na Glasgow School of Art, Kingston College of Art (nke bụzi Kingston University) wee gụchaa akwụkwọ n'afọ 1966

Mgbe ọ gụsịrị akwụkwọ, Femi rụrụ ọrụ ruo ọtụtụ afọ n'ụlọ ọrụ dị na Washington, DC Mgbe nke ahụ gasịrị, ọ laghachiri Naịjirịa ma soro Godwin na Hopwood Architects, Lagos rụọ ọrụ tupu o guzobe ụlọ ọrụ ya, mgbe ahụ Femi Majekodunmi Associates, ugbu a FMA Architects Ltd, na Naịjirịa na 1973
Ụlọ ọrụ ahụ etolitewo na nnukwu ọrụ, na alaka ụlọ ọrụ na Botswana na South Africa
Ya na òtù dị iche iche na-ewu ụlọ rụkọrọ ọrụ iji kwalite omume nke ụkpụrụ ụlọ na mba dị iche iche n'Africa
O nwere njikọ chiri anya na ọtụtụ ụlọ ọrụ na-ewu ụlọ
Ọ bụ onye isi oche mbụ nke Nigerian Institute of Architects, odeakwụkwọ mbụ nke African Union of Architects na onye isi oche gara aga nke International Union of Architects site na 1990 ruo 1993

Ọ bụ onye otu Nigerian Institute of Architects na onye otu Royal Institute of British Architects Ọ bụ onye ọka ikpe maka ọtụtụ asọmpi nke gụnyere WAN Awards for World Architecture Ọ bụ Prọfesọ na-ahụ maka ihe owuwu na Mahadum nke Lagos
Ọ lụrụ Victoria Majekodunmi
Ha mụtara ụmụ anọ

Olufemi Obafemi (amụrụ ya n'ụbọchị nke anọ n'ọnwa Eprel n'afọ 1950) Ọ bụ onye Naijiria na-ede abụ, onye na-ede egwuregwu, onye edemede na Prọfesọ nke Bekee na Dramatic Literature na Mahadum Ilorin kemgbe Ọktoba n'afọ 1990
Ọ bụ onye nke 76 natara onyinye Nigerian National Order of Merit (NMOM) (2018)
Ọ bụ onye isi oche nke Nigerian Academy of Letters n'etiti afọ 2016 na 2018, mgbe Francis Egbokhare nọchiri anya ya
A mụrụ Olu Obafemi (dị ka a na-akpọkarị ya) na Akutupa-Kiri, Kabba/Bunu Local Government Area nke Kogi State, Nigeria
Ọ gụrụ akwụkwọ elementrị na Kabba tupu ọ kwaga ụlọ Akwụkwọ Gọọmenti Sekondiri, Dekina na mgbe e mesịrị Titcombe College, Egbe maka agụmakwụkwọ sekọndrị ya

N'afọ 1975, ọ nwetara nzere Bachelor of Arts na Bekee na Mahadum Ahmadu Bello, Zaria ma mesịa gaa England, ebe ọ nwetara nzere MA na Bekee (1975) na Mahadum Sheffield, na PhD (1981) kwa na Bekee Na Mahadum Leeds

O bipụtara ọtụtụ egwuregwu ndị ọzọ dị ka Nights of a Mystical Beasts (1986), The New Dawn (1986), Suicide Syndrome (1993), Naira Has No Gender (1993), The Love Twirls of Adiitu-Olodumare (2016), na Iyunade (2016)
E kwenyere na Obafemi bụ onye ọsụ ụzọ na-eme nnwale maka ịma mma mgbanwe n'Afrịka, na-egosipụta ihe nkiri nke ọgbọ nke abụọ nke ndị Naijiria na ndị Afrịka na-eme ihe nkiri
Ọrụ ya emetụtawokwa nkọwa nke ihe nkiri dị egwu n'etiti ndị ọkà mmụta ihe nkiri na West Afrịka na 1980s na 90s
O nyekwara aka n'ịkwalite okwu gbasara ihe mara mma nke ụmụ nwanyị na ihe nkiri Naịjirịa na itinye aka na nghọta ihe onwunwe nke ọha mmadụ
Ọ bụ onye ndụmọdụ nchịkọta akụkọ na onye edemede n'ọtụtụ akwụkwọ nta akụkọ mba Naịjirịa
Olufemi Obafemi bụ onye isi oche nke Association of Nigerian Authors (ANA) Kwara State, na 2004, ọ ghọrọ onye isi oche mba nke òtù ahụ

Ọ bụkwa onye nduzi nyocha na National Institute of Policy and Strategic Studies (NIPSS), onye bụbu onye isi oche nke òtù nke Nigerian Authors na onye isi oche nke ndị nduzi nke National Commission for Museums and Monuments
Ugbua Ọ bụ Onye isi oche mba nke Nigerian Reproduction Rights Society of Nigeria (REPRONIG) [June 2019]
Olufunmilayo Aduni Olayinka, née Famuagun (20 June 1960 – 6 April 2013),
bu onye ọru ọba ego na Naijiria ma buru kwa onye ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị nke ruru ọru dika osote gọvanọ nke Ekiti State
Amụrụ Olayinka na Ado-Ekiti, Ekiti State Ogụrụ akwụkwo na Holy Trinity Grammar School Ibadan ebe onwetere nzere first school leaving, ogo distinction
Omechara ga Olivet Baptist High School, Oyo State, Nigeria ebe onwetara nzere Higher School (HSC)

O nwetara nzere Master's na Public Administration na nzere Bachelor na Business Administration Marketing nke onwetara na mahadum Central State University, Edmond, Oklahoma, United States n'afo 1981 na kwa afo1983[Tinye edensibịa] O nwetara Honour roll nke Dean ugboro atọ

O bu onye Marketing Analyst na Strategist nke bidoro aka ọrụ ya n'ọrụ ọba ego nke First Bank of Nigeria Plc n'afo 1986, ọwere mecha ruo orụ dika Relationship Manager nke Kọpret Akaunts na Access Bank, ụlọ ọrụ Merchant Banking Corporation [MBC] nke mechirigoro emechi ya na United Bank for Africa Plc
N'ọnwa Ogọst nke afo 2002, obidoro ọrụ na Kọpret Kọmunikashọns tupu o rigoro ibu onye isi Kọpret Afes Divishon, United Bank for Africa

O mechara buru onye isi, Brand Management na Corporate Affairs, ebe o duru ndi ọrụ ha bu icheputa atumatu ogbara ohuru n'ulo ọrụ United Bank for Africa nke nyere aka ikwalite usoro ọrụ ọba ego ahu ma nyekwa ha ezigbo aha[Tinye edensibịa]
Olayinka bu kwa osote onye isi nke abuo nke nzuko Kopret Maneja jikoro oba ego nile site n'afo 2002 ruo afo 2004[Tinye edensibịa]
Olayinka ruru nnukwu oru na njiko United Bank for Africa nke ochie ya na oba ego Standard Trust ebe oso na ndi isi atumatu ogbara ohuru
O rukwara oru dika onye otu bara uru na otu Midia Rilashons
Tupu aroputa ya dika osote Govano nke Ekiti State, o bu onye isi Kopret Savisis, Ecobank Transatlantic Inc ebe oru ya bu igbasa ozi gbasara oru oba ego ahu, ihu maka
njikwa mmekorita di n'etiti ulo oru ya na oha na eze ya na igwa ndi
njikwa maka ihe gbasara otu oha na eze si ahu oba ego ahu
Ozo kwa, ohuru maka General Internal Services Unit nke oru ya bu nchikota ndi oru n'ile na oba ego ahu

Mgbe emechara ndoro ndoro ochichi govano nke afọ 2007, akpọputara Mazi Segun Oni, onye òtù ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị nke n'achi Naijiria roputara maka ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị dika onye mmerri Olayinka na Kayode Fayemi gara ụlọ ikpe ichoputa maka nroputa ahu emere
Na 14 Oktoba, 2010, dika

afọ atọ na ọkara gachara after n'ulo ikpe ntuli aka nke nọ na Ilorin, Kwara State, Nigeria chupuru ochie Gọvanọ Segun Oni nke Peoples Democratic Party (PDP) ma kwupụta na Dr Kayode Fayemi nke Action Congress of Nigeria (ACN) bu onye mmeri na ntuli aka gọvanọ nke Ekiti State

Oriaku Olufunmilayo Olayinka ṅụrụ iyi mbata dika osote Gọvanọ nke Ekiti State maka na oso Dr Kayode Fayemi zọ ntuli aka nke 2007 O bu nwanyi nke abuo n'akụkọ ihe mere eme na Ekiti State nke nọrọ n'ọnọdụ osote Gọvanọ nke ala ahu
O bu onye otu Action Congress of Nigeria
Mgbe ya na ọria cancer gbasiri mgba tere aka, Olayinka nwụrụ na mgbede nke 6 Eprel, 2013, elie ya na Ado-Ekiti
Olayinka bu onye otu Christian kwusiri ike O hapuru nne ya, di ya na umu atọ
Asụsụ Kuku, nke a na-akpọkwa Kutuk na Kuku (asụsụ Kuku) bụ nke otu asụsụ Karo, nke alaka Nilotic nke ndịda ọwụwa anyanwụ nke ezi na ulọ asụsụ Nilotic na Southern Sudan na Northern Uganda
Enweghị usoro ederede maka Kuku; a na-ede ya mgbe ụfọdụ site na iji mkpụrụ akwụkwọ nke asụsụ yiri ya dị ka Bari ma ọ bụ Kakwa, na mgbakwunye nke ihe odide iji gosipụta ụda ndị na-adịghị n'asụsụ ọzọ
Dịka ọmụmaatụ, enwere ike idozi mkpụrụedemede Bari maka iji ya mee ihe na Kuku site na ịgbakwunye digraphs gb na kp iji gosipụta ụda olu na ụdaolu na-enweghị ụdaolu, n'otu n'otu
Mkpụrụ akwụkwọ okwu Kuku

nke nwere digraph abụọ a na-adịghị ahụ na mkpụrụedemede okwu Bari
Kuku bụ asụsụ ụda
Ọ nwere ọdịdị okwu aglutinative, na nkwụsịtụ dị ukwuu
A na-ekewa aha n'ụdị abụọ
E nwere usoro nkwekọrịta ụdaume nke na-agụnye ọdịiche ATR
Ihe dị iche n'etiti Kuku na Bari gụnyere ndepụta fonim, nnọchiaha, ụda ụdaolu, na nhazi oge
Ihe kachasị dị ịrịba ama nwere ike ịbụ na ọrụ nke morpheme dị mma, nke a na-eji egosi ọdịiche doro anya / na-enweghị njedebe na Bari, mana ọ na-egosi ọdịiche dị iche na Kuku
Asụsụ Kuku nwere okwu dịgasị iche iche a gbazitere
ụfọdụ okwu bụ nke Kisawahili, na asụsụ Arabic nke a gbanwere ntakịrị iji dị iche
Taa, ọtụtụ okwu yiri ka ndị na-agụ akwụkwọ na ndị Kuku si na Bekee nweta
Ndị Kuku gụrụ akwụkwọ na-agwakọta asụsụ na ụfọdụ Bekee na ya dịka ọmụmaatụ ma ọ bụrụ na ha chọrọ ịsị 'ị naghị ekwu eziokwu' ha na-ekwu 'Mee mb'an sirias'
Ukwe ọdịnala nke ndị Kuku bụ Bula na Kore
A na-abụ abụ ndị ahụ ma na-akụ ọkpọ ọdịnala na opi dị ka ngwá egwu
Egwú ahụ gụnyere ịnya ụkwụ na ịsụ ngọngọ maka Bula, na ụdị ụfọdụ nke ịwụli elu maka Kore
Egwú nke oge a bụkwa ihe a na-ahụkarị n'etiti ndị Kuku
N'ihi ọtụtụ afọ nke agha obodo, ọdịbendị ahụ nwere mmetụta dị ukwuu site na mba ndị gbara ya ogige South Sudan
Ọtụtụ Kuku gbagara Kenya na Uganda ebe ha na ụmụ amaala na-emekọrịta ihe ma mụta asụsụ na ọdịbendị ha
Maka ọtụtụ n'ime ndị fọdụrụ na mba ahụ, ma ọ bụ gaa n'ebe ugwu Sudan na Ijipt, ha mụtara omenala Arabic nke ukwuu
Ọ dịkwa mkpa ịmara na iburu n'uche na ọtụtụ ndị Kuku nọgidere na-enwe isi ọdịbendị ha ọbụna mgbe ha nọ na mba ọzọ
A na-akwado ọdịbendị ọdịnala nke ukwuu ma na-elekwasị anya nke ukwuu n'ịmara mmalite na olumba mmadụ
Ọ bụ ezie na asụsụ ndị a na-asụkarị bụ Arabi Juba na Bekee, Kuku bụ asụsụ na-ejikọ
Ọtụtụ ndị na-ese egwu si Central Equatoria na-eji Bekee, Kiswahili, Arabi Juba, Kuku ha ma ọ bụ ngwakọta nke ihe niile
Ndị na-eti egwú a ma ama si Kuku dị ka Reflections BYG, olu ọhụrụ mara mma na-eme ka ala Zouk na egwu mbụ ya bụ Ng'ume nke pụtara Smile nwetara nnukwu ihe n'ime ụbọchị ole na ole mbụ nke ntọhapụ ya
O nwere olu siri ike dị ịtụnanya maka Jazz a ma ama ya na Afrobeat na Hip Hop; De-vine bụ onye ọhụrụ na-agụ egwú si n'otu obodo Kajo Keji na-abụ R&B na Zouk
Ọ bụ ezie na ụmụ nwanyị anaghị anọchite anya nke ọma, talent abụọ a na-etinye steeti ahụ na chaatị
Emmanuel Lasu bụ otu n'ime ndị nwoke a ma ama nke etiti Equatoria mepụtara
Loki (Boloki), ma ọ bụ Ruki, bụ asụsụ Bantu a na-asụ na Democratic Republic of the Congo
Ọ dị nnukwu nso na Lingala
A na-akpọ ndị Boloki (Baloki) aha Osimiri Ruki; ha bi n'akụkụ ọ bụla nke Osimiri Congo ebe Ruki sonyeere ya

Olumba Olumba Obu (amuru; 1918) bu onye ndu okpukpere chi nke Naijiria kwuputara onwe ya na ya bu Chineke n'udi mmadu ma burukwa onye malitere “Brotherhood of the Cross and Star” ọgbakọ nke akọwara ha abụọ dị ka ajọ òtù ụmụnna na okpukpere chi ọhụrụ
Olumba mgbe ọ dị ndụ e boro ya ebubo na ọ na-eme mgbaasị
Ndị otu ime mmụọ ya na-ekwu na Olumba Olumba abụghị mmadụ kama ọ bụ akụkụ nke mmadụ na akụkụ mmụọ
Akwụkwọ kacha mma nke Naijiria nke e bipụtara na 1993 akpọrọ Occult Grandmaster Now in Christ , nke Iyke Nathan Uzorma dere nke bụ ihe nkpughe banyere mgbaasị, kọwara Olumba Olumba dị ka 'ịbụ'
Oworo (Aworo) bụ olumba ndi Yoruba nke a na-asụkarị na Oworo distrikti nke di n'okpuru ọchịchị Lokoja, Kogi Steeti Naịjiria
Ọ dị nso na olumba Abinu (Bunu), Ikiri, Owe, Yagba na Ijumu nke a maara dị ka Okun
Olumba ndị Okun na-aghọta ibe ha
O diri ka e nwere iwu doro anya na nke siri ike nke mgbanwe sitere na (f) na Yoruba (na olumba ndị ọzọ nke Okun) gaa na (h) na Oworo
Mgbanwe ndị yiri ya na-eme n'ọtụtụ ụdaume ndị ọzọ na consonants nwere obere nkpagide
Dịka ọmụmaatụ, a na-asụgharị okwu funfun, ìfẹ́ na òsì nke pụtara ọcha, ịhụnanya na aka ekpe dịka hunhun, ìhẹ́ na òhì na Oworo n'otu n'otu
N'ihi ọnọdụ ala nke ndị Oworo, Nupe, Igala, Hausa na asụsụ ndị ọzọ ha na ya gbara agbata obi emetụtala olumba Oworo
Mmetụta nke ndi Nupe dika ọ bụ ya kachasị ukwuu nke nwere ike ị bụ site na agha Nupe nke narị afọ nke iri na itolu

Wasa, nke a makwaara dị ka Wassa na Wasaw, bụ asụsụ a na-asụkarị nke ndị Wasa na otu olumba nke ndi mba Akan
A na-aghọta Wasa na asụsụ atọ ndị isi Akan nke Fante, Asante, na Akuapem, abụọ ikpeazụ a maara dị ka Twi, ọ bụ ezie na ọ dị ka asụsụ Abron
narị puku abụọ na iri asaa na atọ na-asụ ya na ndịda ọdịda anyanwụ Ghana, ọkachasị na mpaghara Wasa Amenfi West na Wasa Amenfi East

Olumide Akpata (a mụrụ n'abalị asaa n'ọnwa Ọktoba n'afọ 1972) bụ onye ọrụ iwu Naịjirịa
Ọ bụ nnukwu onye mmekọ na onye isi nke ụlọ ọrụ na azụmahịa na ụlọ ọrụ iwu Templars na Naịjirịa
Ọ ghọrọ onye isi oche mbụ na-abụghị Senior Advocate of Nigeria nke Nigerian Bar Association na July 2020
A mụrụ Akpata na October 7, 1972, na Edo Steeti nke Naịjirịa
O nwetara nzere bachelọ na iwu na Mahadum Benin, Edo steeti n'afọ 1992 ma kpọọ ya ka ọ bụrụ onye ọka iwu n'afọ 1993
Ọ rụrụ ọrụ na National Youth Service Corps na Kano Steeti
Akpata malitere ọrụ iwu ya na Delta steeti n'okpuru nkuzi nke Dr
Mudiaga Odje, Senior Advocate of Nigeria, OFR, onye bụ otu n'ime ndị na-ekpe ikpe n'oge ya
N'afọ 1996, Akpata kwagara Lagos ma soro nwa nwanne nna ya, Oghogho Akpata, onye guzobere ụlọ ọrụ iwu Templars n'afọ gara aga

Akpata sonyeere na nhazi nke Templars mgbe ọ dị afọ iri abụọ na atọ, ma mee ka ụlọ ọrụ ahụ ghọọ ihe ọ bụ taa, dịka otu n'ime ụlọ ọrụ iwu kachasị ukwuu na Naịjirịa nwere ndị ọrụ ruru otu narị ndị ọka iwu, gụnyere ndị ọka iwu abụọ nke Naịjirịa, ha abụọ na-arụ ọrụ nke ọma na mpaghara dị iche iche nke iwu Naịjirịa
Akpata bụ onye otu ndi ísí na onye isi nke Corporate & Commercial Practice Group of Templars ugbu a
O sonyere na ụfọdụ n'ime nnukwu azụmahịa ndị mepụtara iwu azụmahịa na Naịjirịa na n'ezie akụ na ụba Naịjirịa
Ọ bụ onye isi oche nke Nigeria Bar Association Section on Business Law (NBA-SBL)

N'ọnwa Julaị 30, 2020, a họpụtara ya dịka onye isi oche nke Nigerian Bar Association mgbe ọ nwetasịrị ngụkọta nke votu 9,891 n'ime ngụkọta votu 18,256, merie onye iro ya kacha nso Babatunde Ajibade (SAN) onye nwetara votu 4,328, na Dele Adesina (SAN) onye nwetara votu 3,982
Scott Olumide Durojaiye (a mụrụ n'ụbọchị nke 20 n'ọnwa Ọktoba n'afọ 1992) bụ onye Naijiria na-agba bọọlụ nke na-agbara Dartford bọọlụ
Ọ gbara bọọlụ ndị ntorobịa maka Tottenham Hotspur na Norwich City, tupu ọ banye n'akụkụ Falkirk na Brechin City nke Scotland
Ọ gbakwara klọb ndị na-abụghị ndị otu Enfield Town, Hayes & Yeading United, Hungerford Town, Haringey Borough, Welling United, Braintree Town, Maidstone United na Woking
Durojaiye sonyeere Tottenham Hotspur mgbe ọ dị afọ asaa ma rụọ ọrụ ya ruo n'ọkwa ruo n'okpuru 18 dịka onye na-agba bọọlụ
Mgbe a na-enyeghị ya nkwekọrịta ọkachamara, ya na Cheltenham Town, Brentford nke Oxford United nwalere tupu ọ kwaga Norwich City n'ọnwa Ọgọstụ afọ 2012
Ọ bịanyere aka na nkwekọrịta ọkachamara otu afọ mana a tọhapụrụ ya na njedebe nke oge ahụ
N'ọnwa Julaị afọ 2013, Durojaiye bịanyere aka na klọb Scottish Championship Falkirk
Ọ nọrọ oge abụọ na klọb ahụ tupu a tọhapụ ya na Mee 2015
N'abalị 20 Febụwarị afọ 2015, Durojaiye sonyeere Scottish League One n'akụkụ Brechin City na mgbazinye ego maka oge fọdụrụnụ
Durojaiye sonyeere klọb Isthmian League Premier Division Enfield Town tupu oge 2015-16
O nwetaghị akara maka klọb ahụ na mpụta iri na abụọ ma a tọhapụrụ ya na mbido Nọvemba
N'ọnwa sochirinụ, ọ kwagara Haringey Borough
N'ọnwa Febụwarị afọ 2016, Durojaiye sonyeere Hayes & Yeading United wee malite ịrụ ọrụ nchebe
Mgbe obere oge gasịrị na Hungerford Town tupu afọ 2016-17, ọ laghachiri Hayes & Yeading nke ugboro abụọ na Ọktoba 2016
Ọ gara n'ihu nye goolu ugboro abụọ na egwuregwu iri abụọ maka klọb ahụ
N'ọnwa Disemba afọ 2016, ọ laghachiri Haringey Borough
Durojaiye mere egwuregwu iri abụọ maka klọb ahụ, gụnyere na Isthmian League Division One North play-off semi-final, ma nye goolu megide Bury Town na Great Wakering Rovers
N'ọnwa Ọgọstụ afọ 2017, Durojaiye sonyeere National League South clọb Welling United mgbe ọ masịrị ya na ule tupu oge
N'ụbọchị nke ise n'ọnwa Ọgọstụ, o mere nke mbụ ya dochie Toby Ajala na mmeri 3–2 nke Truro City
Durojaiye sonyeere Braintree Town maka oge 2017–18
Na 10 Septemba afọ 2018, a mara ọkwa na Durojaiye ahapụla otu egwuregwu ahụ n'agbanyeghị na ọ malitere egwuregwu asaa niile
Na 21 Septemba 2018, mgbe ọ hapụrụ Braintree, Durojaiye kwetara isonyere ndị otu National League, Maidstone United
N'abalị 26 Febụwarị afọ 2019, Olumide kwetara isonyere National League South nke Woking, na-esote oge laghachi na Haringey Borough
N'agbanyeghị na ọ nwetara nkwalite n'oge ya na Woking, tupu mkpọsa afọ 2019-20, Durojaiye họọrọ ịlaghachi Haringey Borough ọzọ
Na 22 Jenụwarị 2021, Durojaiye sonyeere National League South nke Welling United Na 18 Machị afọ 2022, Welling United kwupụtara na Durojaiye bụ otu n'ime ndị egwuregwu ise hapụrụ klọb ahụ
N'abalị 26 ọnwa Machị afọ 2022, Durojaiye sonyeere Dartford
O mere nke mbụ ya na klọb ahụ n'otu ụbọchị ahụ, na-abata dịka onye nnọchi anya oge nke abụọ na mmeri 1-0 na Princes Park megide Hampton & Richmond Borough
Durojaiye ruru eru igwu egwu maka Naịjirịa na England ma kwupụta ọchịchọ ya ịnọchite anya Naịjirịa
A kpọrọ ya na ndị otu mmepe nke Under-20

Olumide Idowu (nke a makwaara dịka Mr
Climate), bụ onye ntorobịa Naijiria na-eme mkpọsa na onye na-akwado mgbanwe ihu igwe
Ọ bụ onye guzobere International Climate Change Development Initiative (ICCDI Africa), Climate Wednesday na Nigerian Youth Climate Coalition

Olumide bụ onye otu Atlas Corps, State International Visitor Leadership Program (IVLP) Alumni, onye ọrụ mgbasa ozi na nkwukọrịta maka Association for the Development of Education in Africa Triennale 2017 na Senegal, na onye isi nkwukọrịta maka African Youth Initiative on Climate Change (AYICC)

Ọ bụ onye otu Kọmitii na-ahazi maka 7th Global Platform on Disaster Risk Reduction (DRR) na Mexico, African Youth Champion maka United Nations International Strategy for Disaster Reduction (UNISDR) ma nata afọ 2015 Save the Children Award of Contribution towards (in) Sustainable Development in Nigeria

Olumide bụ Youth Focal Point Nigeria UNDP Small Grant Program, onye isi ndị ntorobịa na-ede akwụkwọ maka Global Environment Outlook (GEO) nke UN Environment na onye nhazi ndị isi maka African Youth Initiative on Climate Change (AYICC)
Ọ bụkwa onye òtù dị iche iche nke obodo na nke mba ụwa
Isi ihe ọ na-elekwasị anya gụnyere ike ndị ntorobịa, gburugburu ebe obibi, mgbanwe ihu igwe, nkwukọrịta, Nlekọta & Ntụle na nsogbu mmepe na-adịgide adịgide
A mụrụ Idowu n'aka onye ọrụ ugbo Naijiria
Ọ gụrụ Statistics na Mahadum nke Abuja, Nigeria ebe ọ nwetara Bachelor of Science (BSc) n'afọ 2010
Olumide ghọrọ onye otu ndị isi na onye isi mpaghara Africa nke International Youth Federation (IYF) n'afọ 2016
N'afọ 2018, Olumide rụrụ ọrụ dịka onye njikwa mba Naịjirịa maka Climate Scorecard, atụmatụ nke Global Citizens' Initiative (TGCI) na EarthAction
N'ọrụ a, ọ mepụtara mba News Brief kwa ọnwa nke a na-akpọ Action Alert na-egosipụta ọrụ ndị na-egbochi mmejuputa nkwekọrịta Paris, ngwọta na ndị dị mkpa iji mee ihe dị mkpa
N'otu afọ ahụ, ọ rụrụ ọrụ na ngwa mkpanaka maka ụmụ amaala na-akọ akụkọ banyere Waste Management na Disaster Risk reduction
Ọ bụ onye isi na-ahụ maka nkwukọrịta, African Youth Initiative on Climate Change (AYICC) wee bụrụ onye nhazi ndị isi na Jenụwarị, afọ 2022
Ọzọkwa, ọ bụ onye ọkachamara na-akwado mgbasa ozi nke Save the Children Nigeria, onye nhazi ọrụ nke TUNZA Nigeria, na onye nyocha na akụkọ nke West African NGO Network
Olumide bụ Youth Focal Point na Nigeria maka UNDP Small Grant Program, na Youth Lead Author Global Environmental Outlook (GEO6)
Olumide Idowu malitere njem ihu igwe ya na AIESEC na Nigerian Youth Climate Coalition n'oge ọ na-agụ akwụkwọ nke mere ka ọ sonye na nnọkọ mmeghe nke National Assembly (Nigeria)
N'afọ 2013, ọ tọrọ ntọala atụmatụ Climate Wednesday nke emere na Wednesday iji kụziere ndị mmadụ banyere mgbanwe ihu igwe na usoro mgbanwe ya
O guzobere International Climate Change Development Initiative (ICCDI Africa) n'afọ 2016 n'ebumnobi iwulite ọgbọ ihu igwe dị mma site na mkparịta ụka okike na ihe ọhụrụ
Ọ rụrụ ọrụ na atụmatụ ndị na-eduzi ngwọta na-elekwasị anya na nsị, ahụike ụmụ nwanyị, njikwa mkpofu, na mkpochapu mmanụ n'etiti ndị ọzọ na Lagos na Rivers steeti Naịjirịa
A nabatara Olumide n'afọ 2015 Save the Children Award of Contribution towards Sustainable Development in Nigeria

A họpụtara ya maka State International Visitors Leadership Program (IVLP) site na US Embassy na Nigeria, na African Youth Champion maka United Nations International Strategy for Disaster Reduction (UNISDR)
na onye ọchụnta ego na -elekọta mmadụ

Ọ bụru onye isi ọrụ maka The Initiative for Equal rights (TIERS) na ugbu a onye isi mmemme maka Initiative Sankofa d'Afrique de l'Ouest (ISDAO), otu onye na-akwado ndị na-akwado mpaghara na-akwado otu mmadụ na-enweghị nsogbu na ime ihe ike na ikpe na -ezighị ezi site n'inye ego maka nzukọ obodo
Na 2016, Makanjuola nwetara onyinye nturu ugo nke ndị isi ndị Eze Nwanyị maka ọrụ ya n'ime obodo LGBTI+ ma bụrụkwa onye ahọpụtara na 2012 Future award na nke kacha mma iji nkwado
Ọrụ Makanjuola enyerela aka nke ukwuu na nkwalite ikike LGBTIQ na Naịjirịa, a na -ahụta ya dị ka onye ọsụ ụzọ nke ọtụtụ atụmatụ wee nye aka n'ịgbanwe okwu ọha gbasara ikike na okwu LGBTIQ
Onye gụsịrị akwụkwọ na nchịkwa azụmaahịa sitere na ulo akwukwo teknụzụ steeti Ogun, Njikwa atụmatụ atụmatụ na Mahadum Anglia Ruskin yana Asambodo njikwa mmeghe na Mahadum City, London,

Makanjuola rụkọtara akwụkwọ maka ihe ọ pụtara ịbụ nwoke idina nwoke na Naịjirịa n'afọ 2014 ka Onyeisiala Goodluck Jonathan bịanyere aka n'akwụkwọ machibidoro alụmdi na nwunye nwoke na nwanyị iwu n'ime yana mekwara Veil of Silence, Hell or High Water, Ihe niile dị n'etiti, Anyị anaghị ebi ebe a ọzọ na Ije ije na Onyunyo emegharịrị n'akwụkwọ Jude Dibia bipụtara na 2006

Ọ sonyeere The Initiative for Equal rights (TIERs) na Ọktoba 2006 dị ka onye ọrụ afọ ofufo obodo wee too n'ọkwa ka ọ bụrụ onye isi nchịkwa ya na Septemba 2012 nke o jere ozi ruo Machị 2018 mgbe ọ gbara arụkwaghịm wee rụọ ọrụ dị ka ọkachamara nọọrọ onwe ya
gaa na Ọfịs Nkwado mgbapu nke Europe na onye otu bọọdụ na Equality Hub, otu ndị otu ụmụ nwanyị na-eduzi

Ọ na-eje ozi ugbu a dị ka onye isi oche onye isi oche nke Ọrụ Ọdịnihu kemgbe 2015 na na Machị 2019 ghọrọ onye isi mmemme maka Initiative Sankofa d'Afrique de l'Ouest (ISDAO), ego West African Philanthropic na-arụ ọrụ iji hụ na West Africa nke ziri ezi na nke na -agụnyeghị ime ihe ike na ịkpa oke
Olumide gara King's College, Lagos na Mahadum Lagos
Ọ gụsịrị akwụkwọ na mahadum Babcock na June 2017
Olumide bidoro ọrụ ime ihe nkiri ya mgbe ọ dị afọ isii na usoro telivishọn nke Everyday People

A makwaara ya maka àgwà o na egosi dị ka 'Tari' na Africa Magic Series nke akpọrọ 'The Johnsons' Ọ na esonyekwa n'usoro telivishọn ndị ọzọ dị ka The Patriot, The Men In Her Life, Hammer, Stolen Waters and New Son
Olumide gosipụtara agwa 'Weki' na usoro ihe ngosi nke Mtv Shuga Base, agba nke atọ na anọ
Ọ bụkwa onye na -egosi ihe na onyonyo
Olumide enwetala ọtụtụ ihe nrite gụnyere Mr
Popularity na asọmpi Model of Africa 2012, nturu ugo 'Nollywood Revelation of the Year' na ihe nrite nke Scream Awards 2014 na 'The Most Promising Youth Actor' award na Ping Awards Na 2014
Ọ meriri onye na -eme ihe nkiri kacha mma na 2015 Best of Nollywood Awards na onye na -akwado ihe nkiri kacha mma maka ọrụ ya na ihe omume Soldier's Story na 2016 Africa Magic Viewers Choice Awards
Olumide Oyedeji (a mụrụ n'abalị iri na otu n'ọnwa Mee n'afọ 1981) bụ onye egwuregwu èpèléǹkàtà na Naijiria nke gbara bọọlụ na National Basketball Association (NBA) maka oge atọ
Oyedeji gbara bọọlụ n'afọ 1999 na 2000 Nike Hoop Summits
Ndị Seattle SuperSonics họpụtara ya, na agba nke abụọ (nke iri anọ na abụọ n'ozuzu) nke 2000 NBA Draft
Ọ gbara ngụkọta nke egwuregwu 93 n'oge 3 na NBA, ma nwee ọrụ nkezi nke akara 14 kwa egwuregwu, 21 rebounds kwa egwuregwu, 01 na-enyere aka kwa egwuregwu, na 02 na-ezu ohi kwa egwuregwu
Emere egwuregwu NBA ikpeazụ ya na Eprel 1st, 2003 na 105 - 118 ọnwụ na San Antonio Spurs ebe ọ na-edeghị stats
Ọ ọ tụkwara èpèléǹkàtà na Spanish League na Granada
Oyedeji na Shanxi Zhongyu tụrụ èpèléǹkàtà na Chinese Basketball Association
Ọ tụrụ na Changwon LG Sakers nke Korean Basketball League n'afọ 2011
Otú ọ dị, a tọhapụrụ ya na ndị otu ahụ, n'agbanyeghị na ọ na-enweta akara 108, 150 rebounds, na 17 blocks kwa egwuregwu
Oyedeji bịanyere aka na London Lions, bụ ndị na-asọmpi na British Basketball League, n'afọ 2015
Oyedeji bụ onye otu ndị isi otu egwuregwu èpèléǹkàtà ụmụ nwoke Naịjirịa kemgbe afọ 1997
O nyere aka nke ukwuu na ndị otu mba ya sonyere na FIBA Africa Nations Cup n'afọ 1997, 1999, 2001, 2003, 2005, 2007, 2011, 2013 na 2015
O duuru Naịjirịa gaa iko AfroBasket mbụ ya na Tunisia n'afọ 2015
Oyedeji ritere ọla ọcha n'afọ 1997, 1999 na 2003 n'otu n'otu n'oge FIBA Africa Nations Cup
O ritere ọla nchara na 2005 FIBA Africa Championship nakwa 2011 FIBA Africa Championship
Oyedeji anọchitela anya obodo ya na All Africa Games na-enweta ọla nchara n'afọ 1999, 2007 na 2015, ọla ọcha na 2003 na ọla edo n'afọ 2011
Ọ tụrụ èpèléǹkàtà na FIBA World Cup na 1999 na 2012 Summer Olympics
Oyedeji gosipụtara na asọmpi ịkpọ òkù na South Africa ebe ọ bụ onye isi ndị otu ahụ ma duru ha gaa mmeri na njedebe
Ndị otu egwuregwu Naịjirịa, D'Tigers, pụtara n'ozuzu ha meriri n'asọmpi èpèléǹkàtà mba anọ nke afọ 2015 nke South Africa kwadoro na Sọnde 22 Machị 2015
Oyedeji, onye isi ndị otu ụmụ nwoke Naịjirịa, pụtara MVP nke asọmpi ahụ
D'Tigers meriri Mozambique 72-59 na egwuregwu ikpeazụ ha iji merie asọmpi mmeghe emere na Wembley Indoor Arena na Johannesburg
Ọ lara ezumike nká na otu egwuregwu basketball nke Naịjirịa ọtụtụ izu tupu 2016 Summer Olympics na Rio de Janeiro
Oyedeji enwetala ihe nrite dị iche iche maka mbọ enyemaka ya na ọrụ ebere ya
Ọ bụkwa onye nnọchi anya Laureus Global, onye Naijiria mbụ na onye Afrịka nke atọ e nyere nsọpụrụ a
Maka mbọ ya n'igbochi mpụ égbè na mma n'etiti ndị ntorobịa na ime mkpọsa megide ndị otu, a kwanyeere Oyedeji ùgwù dịka onye uwe ojii London Metropolitan
Oyedeji gụrụ akwụkwọ sekọndrị na Loyola College, Ibadan ebe ọ malitere igwu egwu dịka onye otu egwuregwu èpèléǹkàtà nke ụlọ akwụkwọ ahụ
Oyedeji lụrụ Adegoke Fajemisin
