Precious Oluoma Nwoke Bichiri (amụrụ na mkpụrụ ụbọchị iri na isii, n'ọnwa Julaị na-afọ 1987 na Abuja) bụ onye Naijiria na-eme egwuregwu track nakwa field, onye ọkacha mara na mita 400
Nwoke sonyere maka asọmpi 4 × 400 m nke ụmụ nwanyị na afọ 2008 Summer Olympics na Beijing, ya na ndị otu ya Folashade Abugan, Joy Amechi Eze, na Muizat Ajoke Odumosu
Ọ gbara ọsọ na ụkwụ nke atọ nke okpomọkụ nke abụọ, na oge nkewa nke 5183 sekọnd
Ya na ndị otu ya mechiri relay na nke anọ maka oge kachasị mma nke 3 2410, na-enye ha oghere iru eru maka agba ikpeazụ dabere na arụmọrụ
Ka ọ na-erule ụbọchị na-esote, Nwoke na ndị otu ya nọ n'ọnọdụ nke asaa na ngwụcha, na oge ọzọ kachasị mma nke oge nke 3 2374
Dr Oluranti Adebule, onye amụrụ na Novemba 27, 1970 na Lagos state bụ onye na-esote onye isiala nke iri na ise nke Lagos state
Dr Idiat Oluranti Adebule bidoro agụm akwụkwọ ya n' Awori college, Ojo
O mechara gaa Mahadum nke Lagos State, Ojo ebe ọ gụru Islamic Education na 1992
O mekwara Mastas digri ya na curriculum studies n'otu Mahadum ahụ
O mechakwara nweta Doctorate degree n'otu Mahadum a na 2012
O bidoro ọrụ ya dika onye Nkuzi nke nta na Michael Otedola College Of Primary Education, Epe na ngalaba Religious Studies
O mechara gafere na ngalaba nke Curricular activities na Lagos State University
A họpụtara Dr Adebule ka ọ bụrụ ode akwụkwọ Gọọmenti nke onye Isiala Lagos, Mr Babatunde Raji Fashola (SAN) na July 2011
Ọ ṅụrụ iyi dị ka onye na-esote onye Isiala steeti Lagos na May 29, 2015 na Ọka Ikpe nke Lagos 2015
Lagos state Government Deputy Governor (23 November 2016)
A mụrụ Remi Oyo na ụbọchị iri na otu ka ọnwa Ọktoba nke afọ nari iri itoolu iri ise na abụo na Ilorin, Kwara Steeti, mgbago ugwu etetiti Naijiria
Ọ gara ụlọ akwụkwọ praịmarị Katọlik St
James na Ilorin na ụlọ akwụkwọ sekọndrị St
Louis na Bompai, Kano State
Ọ gara Mahadum Lagos na-enweta nzere bachelọ na Mass Communication na Journalism
O nwetara diplọma post-gụsịrị akwụkwọ na International Relations na Nigerian Institute of International Affairs
Ọ gara n'ihu nweta nzere masta na International Relations na Mahadum Kent, Canterbury na United Kingdom

Ọ bụ onye nta akụkọ Naijiria nke oge ochie N'akụkụ ọrụ ọkachamara, a họpụtara ya dị ka onye enyemaka pụrụ iche / onye na-ekwuchitere, (Media na Publicity) nye onye isi ala Naijiria n'oge ahụ bụ Olusegun Obasanjo n'afọ puku abụọ na atọ
A họpụtakwara ya ọzọ n'afọ puku abụọ na asaa ma kpebie na ọ rụrụ ọrụ nke ọma na ikike ahụ
N'ụlọ ọrụ mgbasa ozi, a na-akpọ ya onye nduzi mgbasa ozi raara onwe ya nye na nke nwere omume enyi
Ọrụ ya na akwụkwọ akụkọ malitere dị ka onye nta akụkọ na afọ nari iri itoolu iri asaa na atọ na Nigerian Broadcasting Corporation NBC, ugbu a, Federal Radio Corporation of Nigeria (FRCN)
Mgbe ahụ, ọ sonyeere NAN dị ka onye nchịkọta tebụl na afọ nari iri itoolu iri asatọ na otu
Ọ bilitere ghọọ onye isi nchịkọta akụkọ ya
A na-ekwu na ọ bụ nwanyị mbụ nwetara ọkwa dị elu na NAN tupu ya emechaa pụọ na afọ nai rir itoolu iri asatọ na ise
Site na NAN, ọ sonyeere Inter Press Service News Agency (IPS) dị ka Onye isi ụlọ ọrụ Naịjirịa ma mesịa ghọọ Onye isi ụlọ akwụkwọ IPS nke ọdida anyanwu Afịka
O bu ụzọ rụọ ọrụ dị ka odeakwụkwọ nke Nigerian Guild of Editors (NGE)
Ka e mesịrị, ndị ọrụ ibe ya họpụtara ya dị ka nwanyị mbụ ịbụ onye isi oche nke NGE
O mechara rụọ ọrụ ugboro abụọ n'usoro site na afọ naarị iri itoolu iri itoolu na itoolu ruo afọ puku abụọ na atọ
Ọbụna a na-eto ya maka ịmaliteghachi ọkụ nke ọkachamara n'ụdị njikwa ya na NAN Ọ jere ozi oge abụọ zuru ezu tupu ọ gaa n'ihu

Onye bụbu onye isi ala General Abdulsalami Abubakar, bụ onye mbụ kwusiri ike ịhụ mba n'anya ya mgbe ọ họpụtara ya ka ọ bụrụ onye otu Kọmitii Na-edepụta Iwu Iwu nke afọ nari iri itoolu iri itoolu na itoolu
N'afọ puku abụọ na isii, onye isi ala Olusegun Obasanjo nyere ya onyinye mba OON
O mechara nata onyinye ndị ọzọ, dị ka National Council of Catholic Women Organisation of Nigeria, Nigerian Institute of Management (NIM), na Nigerian Institute for Peace Administrators

Mgbe ọ dị afọ iri isii na abụọ, ọ nwụrụ n'ihi ọrịa kansa mgbe ọtụtụ agha na ọgwụgwọ na United Kingdom gasịrị ka ọnwa Oktoba dị na otu na afọ puku abụọ iri na anọ, mgbe ọ nwụsịrị n'agha iji zọpụta ndụ ya

Bemoaning her passage, Otome, her son said Even her colleagues in the media were not left out of the scores of accolades showered on the woman who had made diverse impact to the Nigerian media Just as national leaders and others mourn her passage
Oluremi Tinubu (amumuruya 21 Septemba1960) nwuye onye isi ala mana ugba obu onye okaiwu na Lagos State
Obu onye otu pati All Progressives Congress (APC)
Oluremi Tinubu bu nwa ikwpeazu na ime umu iri na abuo; Azuruya na Ogun State

Tinubu ritere BS na mmuta na mahadum no na lfe nke anakpo University of Ife, na nzere ozo ndi oyibo na akpo National Certificate of Education n'ime osisi akumaku na umuanuma nu site na ulomuta Adeyemi College of Education
Oluremi Tinubu ghoro nwanyi mbu nke obodo Lagos mgbe di ya Bola Tinubu meriri na akwa ndoro ochichi ibu onyeisiala na Lagos state
Dika nwayi mbu ,o hiwere ogbaku ana - akpo New Era Foundation, nke na arara enye nguzowe ogbako nke na ahu maka nlekota ndi na etoetao na mata ihuoha ime nchekwa mgburumguru ebe obidi na oru obodo'
Mgbe aghoputara Tinubu, amara aka na ulo ikpe uloikpe nke uloikpe mkpesa nke ga-emesi kpokota maka kwado nhoputa ndi ochichi na afo 2012
Tinubu bu otu onye n'ime out nari ndi okaiwu ahoputara na nzuko asato n'ime afo 2015
Otuodina, nani umunwanyi isii ka aghoro Ndi nke ozo bu Stella Oduah na Uche Ekwunife, ndi nochitere anya Anambra, Fatimat Raji Rasaki, Rose Okoji Oko na Binta Garba
Oluremi bu nwunye onye wubu oneye isiala na onye okaiwu Lagos State, aha ya bu Bola TinubuObu onye otu karist
Olusegun Adejumo bụ onye na-ese ihe na Naijiria, nke a maara maka eserese nwanyị ya na eserese ndi ozo ya
Ọ bụ onye nduzi nke One Draw Gallery ma ugbu a ọ bụ onye isi oche nke Guild of Professional Fine Artists Nigeria
A mụrụ Adejumo na onwa itolu abali iri ato nke , 1965 na Lagos
Ọ gara Yaba College of Education n'afọ 1982 ruo n'afọ 1987 ma gụsịrị akwụkwọ na Higher National Diploma (HND) na eserese
Site n'afọ 1987 ruo n'afọ 1988, ọ rụrụ ọrụ dị ka onye enyemaka onye nkuzi na-ese ihe na Lagos State Polytechnic
Ọ rụkwara ọrụ dị ka onye na-ese onyinyo na Advertising Techniques Limited na 1988
Olusegun Mimiko (Yoruba Olúṣ*́gun Mímikò; a mụrụ ya na 3 Ọktoba 1954), bụ onye zọrọ ọkwa onye omeiwu nke Zenith Labour Party maka Ondo Central District na ntuli aka 2019
Ọ bụ onye ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị Naịjirịa nke jere ozi dịka onye nkịtị nke iri na isii, na nke ise, Gọvanọ nke Ondo Steeti, Naịjirịa, site na Febụwarị afọ 2009, ruo Febụwarị 2017
Gọvanọ mbụ nke oge abụọ nke Ondo steeti na gọvanọ mbụ nke Labour Party na Naịjirịa
Mimiko bụbu onye ozi gọọmentị etiti maka ụlọ na mmepe obodo, odeakwụkwọ nke Gọọmentị Ondo Steeti, na Kọmishọna Ondo Steeti maka Ahụike ugboro abụọ
A mụrụ Mimiko ma zụlite ya na Ondo Town, Ondo State, South West Nigeria
Ọ malitere inwe mmasị na ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị mgbe ọ dị obere

Ọrụ ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị ya malitere na ụlọ akwụkwọ ahụike na Mahadum Ife (nke bụzi Mahadum Obafemi Awolowo), ebe ọ bụ onye otu Students' Representatives Council (Parliament) ma jee ozi dịka onye na-ahụ maka mmekọrịta ọha na eze nke International Students' Association nke ụlọ ọrụ ahụ site n'afọ 1977 ruo afọ 1978
Mgbe ọ gụsịrị akwụkwọ na mahadum n'afọ 1980 ma gachaa afọ National Youth Service Corp, Mimiko malitere ịgwọ ọrịa
N'afọ 1985, o guzobere MONA MEDICLINIC na Ondo Town nke na-arụ ọrụ dịka ụlọ ọrụ ebere obodo

Nhọpụta ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị mbụ nke Mimiko bụ dịka kọmishọna nke ahụike na ọrụ mmekọrịta mmadụ na ibe ya na Ondo Steeti site n'afọ 1992 ruo n'afọ 1993 mgbe ọchịchị ndị agha kwụsịrị ọchịchị onye kwuo uche ya nke atọ nke Naijiria
Mgbe a laghachiri ọchịchị onye kwuo uche ya na Naịjirịa, Mimiko jere ozi ọzọ dịka kọmishọna ahụike na Ondo Steeti site n'afọ 1999 ruo afọ 2002
N'afọ 2003, a họpụtara ya ka ọ bụrụ odeakwụkwọ nke Ondo State Government (SSG)
Ọ nọrọ n'ọkwa a ruo ọnwa Julaị afọ 2005, mgbe a họpụtara ya dịka onye ozi gọọmentị etiti nke ụlọ na mmepe obodo
Mimiko gbara arụkwaghịm dịka onye ozi gọọmentị etiti iji zọọ ọkwa gọvanọ nke Ondo megide onye nọ n'ọkwa, Olusegun Agagu na ntuli aka nke afọ 2007
Mimiko meriri na ntuli aka a na-asọmpi nke ọma
Mana, site n'aka onye isi ala Olusegun Obasanjo, Independent National Electoral Commission kwupụtara Agagu dịka onye mmeri

Mimiko gbara ihe si na ntuli aka ahụ pụta n'ụlọ ikpe n'ihe mechara bụrụ esemokwu iwu nke afọ abụọ nke mere ka a kpọọ ya onye mmeri n'ezie na ntuli aka gọvanọ site na mkpebi otu olu nke Ụlọikpe Tribunal, na Ụlọikpe Mkpegharị n'afọ 2009
Ọ gara n'ihu merie ntuli aka ọzọ n'afọ 2012, na-emeri onye kacha emegide ya, Olusola Oke nke People's Democratic Party
N'oge Mimiko bu gọvanọ, a ghọtara mgbanwe ya na ahụike, agụmakwụkwọ, mmepe obodo, mmegharị obodo na iji teknụzụ na ọchịchị na mba na mba ụwa
Mgbe ọ hapụsịrị ọrụ, Mimiko nọrọ otu afọ na-ekwu okwu ihu ọha ma na-akwado maka ahụike zuru ụwa ọnụ na ezi ọchịchị na Nigeria, London, na Washington DC
N'ọnwa Septemba afọ 2018, o kwupụtara ebumnuche ya ịzọ ọkwa onye isi ala Naịjirịa na ntuli aka nke afọ 2019
O nwetara nhọpụta dịka onye na-azọ ọkwa onye isi ala nke Labour Zenith Party na Ọktoba, 2018
Na Nọvemba 14, 2018, Mimiko kwupụtara na ọ na-akwụsị mgbasa ozi onye isi ala ya, ụbọchị ole na ole tupu e mepee oge mgbasa ozi ahụ
O nwetara tiketi sinetọ nke Zenith Labour Party maka mpaghara Ondo Central
Mimiko bi ugbu a na Ondo City, ebe a mụrụ ya
A mụrụ Rahman Olusegun Mimiko, nke a makwaara dịka Iroko, na October 3, 1954, na Ondo Town nke Ondo State, Nigeria
Nna ya, Atiku Bamidele Mimiko, bụ nwa Pa Famimikomi, nwa Chief Ruwase Akinmeji, na nwa nwa nke High Chief Adaja Gbegbaje nke Ondo Kingdom
Nna Mimiko bụ onye njikwa osisi nakwa onye ọrụ ugbo koko
Ọ bụkwa onye na-akọwa mmekọrịta mmadụ na ibe ya na mmepe mba na ụwa na onye na-enyere ndị mmadụ aka
Nne ya, Muinat Mimiko (née Ogunsulie) bụ onye ahịa ruo mgbe ọ lara ezumike nká
N'afọ 1990, Mimiko lụrụ Olukemi Adeniyi onye gụrụ asụsụ French na Mahadum Obafemi Awolowo, Ile Ife
Ha mụtara ụmụ anọ
Mimiko malitere ụlọ akwụkwọ na St
Joseph's Primary School Aponmu dị nso na Akure, St
Patrick Primary School, Yaba na Ondo na mmalite afọ 1960
Ọ gara St
Joseph's College, Ondo site n'afọ 1966 ruo 1971
Ọ bụ nwa akwụkwọ Higher School Certificate (HSC) na Gboluji Grammar School, Ile-Oluji n'etiti afọ 1971 na 1972
Mimiko malitere ụlọ akwụkwọ ahụike na Mahadum Ife n'afọ 1972

Ọ bụ Student Representative Council (parliament) 1975-1976 na onye isi oche nke Special Honours Committee (1976-1977), onye otu Student's Union Electoral Commission 1976-1977, na onye ọrụ mmekọrịta ọha na eze nke International Students Association nke afọ 1977-1978
O nwetara BSc
Health Science Degree na 1976, na Bachelor of Medicine, Bachelor of Surgery n'afọ 1980
E debara aha Mimiko na Nigerian Medical and Dental Council dịka onye na-ahụ maka ahụike
Mimiko bụ onye ọrụ ụlọ na Ondo State Health Management Board nke ọ rụrụ ọrụ na General (nke bụzi State Specialist) Hospital, Ado Ekiti n'etiti afọ 1980 na 1981
Ọ rụrụ ọrụ na Nigerian Navy College (NNS Onura), Onne, Port Harcourt (1981–1982) tupu ọ laghachi n'afọ 1982, n'ụlọ ọgwụ dịka onye ọrụ ahụike
Ọ rụrụ ọrụ na Lagos dịka onye ọrụ ahụike na Apagun Clinic, Yaba na onye isi ahụike na Alleluyah Hospital, Oshodi site n'afọ 1983-1984
N'afọ 1985, o guzobere ụlọ ọrụ ahụike nke onwe ya MONA MEDI-CLINICS na Ondo City
Olusegun Obasanjo bula onye president Naigeria, soto Abdulsalami Abubakar
Obu ya bu onye ndi madu mere elect mgbe Abdulsalami mere vote
Olusegun bu onye Yoruba
A muru ya na 5 Maachị 1937, ebe Abeokuta, Ogun State
O tinyere ishi na Army la 1958 ha me head of state
N'ọnwa Ọgọst 2021, otu ndị Afrịka họpụtara Olusegun Obasanjo ka ọ bụrụ onye nnọchi anya nnọchite anya udo na mpaghara Afrịka

Oluseyi Bajulaiye, onye mba Naijiria, bụ onye isi ọrụ United Nations nwere nzụlite na ọrụ UNHCR na-emetụta ndị gbara ọsọ ndụ na mmemme enyemaka
Kemgbe afọ 2005, ọ bụ osote onye nhazi na onye nhazi ọrụ ebere na Sudan

Na-esote ọpụpụ nke onye nhazi obibi na onye nhazi ọrụ ebere Manuel Aranda da Silva na Juun, na afọ 2007, ọ bụ kemgbe oge ahụ ka ọ bụ onye nhazi na onye nhazi nke ọrụ ebere - ọrụ nke na-ebukwa aha onye nnọchi anya pụrụ iche nke odeakwụkwọ ukwu, nke bụkwa ọkwa kachasị elu nke United Nations na mba ahụ, ma e wezụga nke onye nnọchianya pụrụ iche nke onye odeakwụkwọ ukwu Ashraf Qazi (onye a họpụtara na Septemba, na afọ 2007, na nke na mbụ)
N'oge ọ nọ na Sudan, ọ nọ n'ihu n'ịhazi nzaghachi nke ndị United Nations maka idei mmiri Sudan nke afọ 2007
Karịsịa, ọ rịọrọ ndị mba ụwa ka ha kwado nzaghachi ahụ n'ego karịrị US $ 20 nde

N'ọnwa Septemba afọ 2007, ọ bụkwa onye ọrụ gọmentị na-anabata nleta nke odeakwụkwọ ukwu nke United Nations Ban Ki Moon, ọ nyekwara aka hụ na nsogbu nke ịnweta ndị ọrụ ebere na ichebe ndị nkịtị dị na atụmatụ
A họpụtara ya dị ka onye otu Board Lagos State Teaching Hospital, Lagos Nigeria 2018
Olusoji Adetokunbo Fasuba (amuru 9 Julaị 1984) bu onye oso na Naijiria nke mara nma na otu narị mita
Ọ bụ onye ji akara Afrịka na mmemme ahụ jiri 985 sekọnd ruo mgbe Akani Simbine mebiri ya na Julaị 2021 jiri 984 sekọnd
Ọ bụ onye otu ndị Naijiria meriri ihe nrite ọla kọpa n'ọsọ 4 x 100 n'egwuregwu Olympic nke afọ 2004
N'otu afọ ahụ ọ meriri asọmpi 100 nke Africa
Ọ meriri nrite ọlaọcha na 2006 Commonwealth Games n'azụ Asafa Powell ma bụrụ onye mmeri ime ụlọ n'ime ụlọ ihe karịrị mita 60 na 2008, ghọrọ onye Africa mbụ mezuru ihe ngosi ahụ
A mụrụ Fasuba na Sapele, Delta State na Nigeria, ọkpara n'ime ụmụaka atọ
Sprinting bụ akụkụ nke ndụ ezinụlọ ya dị ka nne ya, onye Jamaica, bụ onye na-agba ọsọ n'oge ntorobịa ya na ọ bụ nwa nwanne nna Don Quarrie, onye 200 mita ọla edo Olympic
Nne na nna ya gbara ya ume ka ọ gbaa ọsọ site na nwata, ọ na-agbakwa ọsọ nke ukwuu nke mere ụlọ akwụkwọ sekọndrị ya ga-agwa ya ka ọ g asọmpi maka ha, n'agbanyeghị na ọ bụ nwata akwụkwọ praịmarị
Ọzọkwa, ọ bụ onye maara egwuregwu bọọlụ nke ọma, volleyball ma ọ bụ basketball na, n'ihi ya, ọ jisiri ike gaa ụlọ akwụkwọ sekọndrị Merit Mixed site na agụmakwụkwọ egwuregwu
Ọ na-achịkwa mmemme egwuregwu nke ụlọ akwụkwọ ahụ, na-emeri ọ bụghị naanị asọmpi sprint kamakwa ọwụli elu na mwụ elu ogologo
Fasuba gara n'ihu n'agụmakwụkwọ ya na mahadum Obafemi Awolowo dị n'Ile-Ife mana ọrụ ahụ siri ike
N'ịbụ onye nne ya na-agba ume, o kpebiri ịhapụ usoro agụmakwụkwọ na-akwado egwuregwu egwuregwu, oke mmasị ya
Fasuba nwere afọ ọganihu ya na 2003, malite na ule mba 2003
A họpụtara ya maka ịgba ọsọ mita 4 x 100 na asọmpi egwuregwu ụwa nke 2003 wee soro ndị otu Naijiria mechaa nke anọ
Fasuba mechiri afọ site na mmeri na 100 m na egwuregwu mbụ Afro-Asia

Na 2004, ọ gara n'ihu na-emeri na 2004 African Championships in Athletics, ma nweta nrite mbụ ya ọnwa ole na ole ka e mesịrị - ihe nrite ọla kọpa Olympic dị ka akụkụ nke 4 × 100 m relay otu na 2004 Athens Olympics
N'afọ sochirinụ, ọ gbara asọmpi na 100 na 200 m n'asọmpi mba ụwa, mana o ruteghị nke ikpeazụ
Na mmalite 2006 ọ gụchara nke ise na World Indoor Championship na nke abụọ na Commonwealth Games

O wee guzobe ndekọ Africa ọhụrụ na 985 Sekọnd sitere na Doha Grand Prix na Mee, na-emebi ndekọ ochie nke Frankie Fredericks nke 986 Site na 1996, ọsọ Fasuba dị ịrịba ama n'ihi na ọ fọrọ nke nta ka ọ dị mkpụmkpụ karịa ọtụtụ ndị ọzọ na-agba ọsọ, a na-eche na ọ nwere otu n'ime ọsọ n'egwuregwu
N'agbanyeghị na ọ nwere nsogbu mmerụ ahụ n'oge niile, Fasuba gbachitere aha mpaghara ya na 2006 African Championship
Maka mmezu ya n'afọ 2006, ndị otu egwuregwu na-eme egwuregwu na Naịjirịa họpụtara ya dị ka onye egwuregwu nwoke na-eme egwuregwu Naịjirịa nke afọ
Ọ meriri nrite ọla edo abụọ na 2007 All-Africa Games, na-emeri na 100 m na 4 × 100 m relay

Otú ọ dị, mmemme ahụ mebiri site na oku a na-akpọ ka a machibido ya n'òtù Nigeria n'ihi nghọtahie Fasuba zubere iji ọkọlọtọ Nigeria mee ememe ma ọ ghaghị ịhapụ ememe ahụ mgbe a kpọchara ya ka ọ gaa nyocha ọgwụ
Na 26 Ọgọst 2007, ọ gụchara nke anọ na 100 m na asọmpi ụwa nke 2007 na 1007 s
Fasuba meriri asọmpi ime ụlọ nke ụwa 60 m sprint na 8 Maachị 2008 n'oge nke 651 s
N'egwuregwu Olympic nke afọ 2008 na Beijing ọ meriri na 100 m wee tinye nke abụọ na okpomọkụ ya mgbe Tyson Gay gasịrị na oge 1029 s
O tozuru maka agba nke abụọ nke ọ kwalitere oge ya na sekọnd 1021
Agbanyeghị, ọ nweghị ike iru eru maka ọkara ikpeazụ ka ọ gụchara n'ọnọdụ anọ nsote Richard Thompson, Gay na Martial Mbandjock gachara
Fasuba banyere n'ime 100 m na 2009 World Championships, mana arụmọrụ ya dị obere, wepụrụ ya na agba nke abụọ mgbe ọ gbasịrị 1025 sekọnd
Mgbe mmalite ya dara ogbenye na 2010, ahọpụtaghị ya iji chebe 60 m aha na 2010 IAAF World Indoor Championship ka Sunday Bada nke Athletic Federation of Nigeria kwuru na ọ nọghị n'ụdị
Fasuba bụ nwa mbụ Olumide na Evelyn Fasuba, ma nwee nwanne nke obere (Kayode) na nwanne nwanyị nke nta (Yinka)
Ọ zutere Ngozi Nwokocha, onye na-agba ọsọ 400 mita, n'ogige ọzụzụ egwuregwu mba mbụ ya na 2003 ma ha lụrụ ugbu a Ha nwere otu nwa nwanyị
N'April 2011 Olusoji sonyeere Royal Navy na-etinye akwụkwọ site na Royal Navy Careers Office na Oxford, wee malite ọrụ dịka Logistician (Supply Chain) Rating
Ọ na-atụ anya ịga n'ihu na egwuregwu dị ka ihe ntụrụndụ na ịsọ mpi maka Royal Navy
O kwuru na ihe kpatara nke a bụ na ya na-achọ ka ezinụlọ ya biri ebi
Ugbu a onye ọkachamara tozuru oke
Emelitere ikpeazụ Eprel 2009
N'ịbụ onye meriri akara Frank Frederick gara aga, Fasuba bụ 100 m onye njide ndekọ Africa nwere 985 s
Ọzọkwa, nke a debere ya dị ka onye nke itoolu kacha ọsọ 100 m onye na-agba ọsọ mgbe ọ bụla na onye na-agba ọsọ kachasị na mpụga mpaghara NACAC
O nwekwara oge nke anọ kachasị ọsọ site n'aka onye na-agba ọsọ Africa na 60 mita na 649 s; naanị Leonard Myles-Mills, onye Naijiria Deji Aliu, na Morne Nagel agba ọsọ karịa
Àtụ Footer World Indoor Champions 60m MenÀtụ Footer All-Africa Champions 100 m MenÀtụ Footer All-Africa Champions 4 × 100 m relay MenÀtụ Footer African Champions men's 100 metres
Olusola Obada (amụrụ na 27 June 1951) bụ onye ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị na onye ọka iwu Naijiria

Ọ rụrụ ọrụ dị ka osote Gọvanọ nke Ọ́sun Steeti site na 2003-2010, dị ka Minista nke Naịjirịa maka Nchebe site na 2011-2012 wee bụrụ Minista nke Nchebe Naịjirị site na 2012-2013 n'okpuru Kọmitii nke Onye isi ala Goodluck Jonathan

A mụrụ Olusola Idowu Agbeja n'ezinụlọ Agbejanlabofa nke Obodi na Ijeshaland na 27 June 1951, ọ gụsịrị akwụkwọ ya na UMC Demonstration School, Ibadan na agụmakwụkwọ ụlọ akwụkwọ sekọndrị ya na Queen's School, Ede, Ọ́sun State

Ọ bụ onye gụsịrị akwụkwọ na Watford College of Technology, Watford, United Kingdom ebe ọ gụrụ Advertising Administration tupu ọ gaa Mahadum Buckingham, Buckingham (United Kingdom) iji mụọ Iwu ma mesịa kpọọ ya na Naịjirịa Bar na 1986
Obada malitere ọrụ ya dị ka onye na-ahụ maka mgbasa ozi na Nigeria Airways tupu ọ hapụ ụlọ ọrụ ahụ ka ọ rụọ ọrụ dị ka onye isi na Olusola Agbeja and Co
N'afọ 1990, o guzoberé Iron Gate Finance and Trust Company Limited, ụlọ ọrụ ego na itinye ego nke onwe ya ebe ọ rụrụ ọrụ dị ka onye isi nchịkwa
N'afọ 1996, e were ya n'ọrụ dị ka onye isi nchịkwa, ego na nchịkwa nke Materials Management Services Limited ma mesịa ghọọ onye isi nchịwa ụlọ ọrụ ahụ
N'afọ 2003, a họpụtara Obada dị ka osote Gọvano nke Ọsun Steeti na Olagunsoye Oyinlola dị ka gọvanọ ruo na 27 Nọvemba 2010 mgbe ọ hapụrụ ọkwa ahụ
Na Jenụwarị 2011, a họpụtara Obada ka ọ bụrụ onye nduzi, na-ekpuchi South-West nke Naịjirịa maka Goodluck na Sambo Presidential Campaign Organisation

N'ọnwa Julaị n'afọ 2011, mgbe Jonathan meriri na ntuli aka onye isi ala, Goodluck Jonathan họpụtara Obada ka ọ bụrụ Minista nke Nchebe, wee jee ozi na kọmitii Jonathan dị ka Minista Nchebe n'ezie ruo mgbe nnukwu mgbanwe na Septemba 2013
Na 6 Machị 2014, Goodluck Jonathan họpụtara ya dị ka otu n'ime ndị okenye ise kacha elu na Naịjịrịa na 2014 National Conference, Naijiria
Na 29 Septemba 2014, Goodluck Jonathan sọpụrụ ya na Commander of the Order of the Niger (CON) mba award
Na Jenụwarị 2, 2015, Goodluck Jonathan họpụtara ya ka ọ bụrụ onye nduzi maka mkpọsa ntuli aka onye isi ala nke afọ 2015
Na 6 Mee 2015, a họpụtara ya ka ọ bụrụ Onye isi oche nke Mahadum Federal, Dutsin-Ma Governing Council, otu n'ime nhọpụta ikpeazụ nke Onye isi ala na-apụ apụ Goodluck Jonathan mere
Obada lụrụ Babatunde Obada onye ha nwere ụmụ anọ
Ọ bụ onye isi ọdịnala nke nwere ihe dị ka utu aha ọdịnala ise gụnyere nke Erelu nke Ijeshaland, Eyaloje nke Argidi nke Atoko, na Yeye Asiwaju nke Ibodi

Olusola Abubakarpronunciation (help·info) Sarakipronunciation (17 Mee 1933 14 Nọvemba 2012) bụ onye ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị Naijiria, onye bụ Senator na Republik nke Abụọ nke Naijiria (1979-1983)
Ọ bụ onye nwere utu aha onye isi nke Waziri nke Ilorin Emirate, ma bụrụkwa onye Agoro dị na Agbaji
A mụrụ Olusola Saraki na 17 Mee 1933 na Kwara Steeti ma nwụọ na Legos na 14 Nọvemba 2012
Nne ya si Iseyin na Oyo Steeti na nna ya si Mali, mana ọ gụrụ Islamic Studies (Ile-Kewu) na Ilorin
Ndị nna nna ya bụ ndị Fulanis si Mali bịa ihe dị ka afọ 150 ruo 200 tupu mgbe ahụ
Olusola Saraki gụrụ akwụkwọ na Eko Boys High School
Ọ gara Mahadum nke London, na St George's Hospital Medical School, London
Ọ rụrụ ọrụ dị ka onye ọrụ ahụike na General Hospital, Lagos na Creek Hospital, Lagos

Olusola Saraki batara na ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị mgbe ọ sonyere na ntuli aka ndị omeiwu nke 1964 maka Ilorin dị ka onye nweere onwe ya, mana ọ meriri mgbe ntuli aka ahụ gasịrị, ọ laghachiri n'ọrụ ahụike ya na Lagos, naanị laghachi na ndọrọ ndọrọ nke otu ndọrọ ọchịchị na 1978/79
Olusola Sakari nwụrụ na Wednesday 14 Novemba 2012 na Lagos mgbe ọ dị afọ 79 mgbe ọ meriri n'ọgụ kansa
E liri ya ka ọ zuo ike na Ilorin
N'afọ 1977, a họpụtara Olusola Saraki dị ka onye otu Constituent Assembly nke mepụtara iwu 1979
N'afọ 1979, a họpụtara ya ka ọ bụrụ onye omeiwu nke Republik nke Abụọ, wee bụrụ onye isi ndị omeiwu
N'afọ 1983, a họpụtara Saraki ọzọ na Senate na National Party of Nigeria (NPN)
O sonyere na ọkwa onye isi ala n'okpuru Social Democratic Party (Nigeria) (SDP) na mba nke atọ ma bụrụ onye otu Kọmitii maka nkwekọrịta mba (CNC) n'oge mmemme mgbanwe Abacha
N'afọ 1998, Olusola Saraki ghọrọ onye ndu mba na onye otu Board of Trustees nke All People's Party (APP), na-enye aka na ihe ịga nke ọma APP na Kwara na Kogi States
O nyeere Mohammed Alabi Lawal aka ịghọ Gọvanọ nke Kwara Steeti

N'afọ 2001 ọ bụ onye isi otu sitere na Arewa Consultative Forum, otu ọdịbendị na ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị nke Northern, nke e zigara izute ma kwurịta ebumnuche ya na ndị gọvanọ steeti Northern na ndị isi ndị ọzọ

Mgbe e mesịrị, Saraki gbanwere nkwado ya na Peoples Democratic Party (PDP), na ntuli aka 2003 kwadoro nwa ya nwoke Bukola Saraki dị ka onye na-azọ ọkwa gọvanọ nke Kwara steeti n'ọnwa Eprel afọ 2003, na nwa ya nwanyị Gbemisola R
Saraki dị Ka onye omeiwu nke Kwara Steeti Central n'ọnwa Apreel afọ 2003
Ọ bụ onye otu Kọmitii maka Nkwekọrịta Mba (CNC) n'oge mmemme mgbanwe Abacha
Nwa ya nwoke Bukola Saraki ghọrọ onye isi oche nke Senate nke Naijiria na 9 June 2015 na Senate nke asatọ nke Naijiria
Otú ọ dị, Bukola Saraki sonyere ọzọ maka oche Senatorial na ntuli aka nke Febụwarị 2019 mana Dr Ibrahim Oloriegbe nke All Progressives Congress (APC) meriri ya
Olusola Teniola (amụrụ 10 Julaị 1966) na London, bụ onye na-anụ ọkụ n'obi maka teknụzụ dabere na Lagos, Nigeria
Olusola Teniola na-arụ ọrụ ọhụrụ dị iche iche ugbu a na West Africa
Ọ bụla Nigeria National Coordinator for Alliance for Affordable Internet (A4AIorg) kamgbe Nov 2019
Ọ bụ onye isi oche ozugbo nke otu Association of Telecommunications Companies of Nigeria (ATCON)

Na mbụ ọ bụ onye mmekọ ahịa na Detecon International, onye enyemaka nke Deutsche Telekom, Germany; na-ahụ maka Naijiria na West Africa[] Ọ bụkwa onye isi / MD na onye isi oche nke IS Internet Solutions (ụlọ ọrụ Data Dimension) na Lagos, Nigeria, site na March 2013 ruo June 2016
N'etiti Jan 2010 ruo Mar 2013, ọ bụ COO na Director of Engineering na Phase
3 Telecom, Abuja[ He was also CEO/MD and a board member of IS Internet Solutions (a Dimension Data company) in Lagos, Nigeria, from March 2013 to June 2016
In between Jan 2010 to Mar 2013, he was the COO and Director of Engineering at Phase 3 Telecom, AbujaKpọpụta njehie Closing tag]

Ọ bụ obere oge onye isi nchịkwa (CEO) nke Phase3 Telecom[] [

Ebe mkpofu ahịhịa Olusosun bụ ebe mkpofu ahịhịa nke dị otu narị acre na Lagos, Lagos Steeti, Naịjịrịa
Ọ bụ nke kachasị ukwuu n'Africa, yana otu n'ime ndị kasị ukwuu n'ụwa
Ebe ahụ na-enweta ihe ruru tọn pụkụ ịrị nke ihe mkpofu kwa ụbọchị
A na-ebukwa ihe mkpofu sitere na ụgbọ mmiri narị ise na saịtị ahụ, na-agbakwunye akụkụ dị ukwuu nke ihe mkpofu eletrọniki
A na-eji kemịkal na-edozi ụfọdụ n'ime ihe ndị a iji wepụ ngwaahịa ndị a na-eji eme ihe ọzọ nke na-eme ka anwụrụ ọkụ na-egbu egbu pụta
Ihe dị ka otu pụkụ ụlọ dị na saịtị ahụ n'obodo ndị dị n'ime ụlọ, nke ndị bi na ya na-arụ ọrụ n'ebe a na-ekpofu ahịhịa maka ihe mkpofu iji ree
Olusosun ebe a na-ekpofu ahịhịa dị na mpụga ebe ndị mmadụ bi
N'agbanyeghị nke a, Lagos, n'afọ ndị na-adịbeghị anya, enweela nnukwu mmụba, nke na ebe azụmahịa na ebe obibi gbara ebe ahụ gburugburu ugbu a

Olutosin Araromi (amụrụ ụbọchị asatọ nke Jenụwarị na afọ nari iri itoolu iri itoolu na atọ) bụ onye Naijiria-Amerịka na-eme ihe ngosi na onye na-eme asọmpi ịma mma, e kpuwere ya okpueze kacha mma na Naijiria Universe afọ puku abụọ iri na itoolu
Ọ nọchitere anya Naijiria na Miss Universe nke afọ puku abụọ iri na itoolu
A mụrụ ya ma zụlite ya na New Jersey, United States, o nwere nzere bachelọ na Health and Human Services na Mahadum Montclair State
Ọ meriri Nwa agbọghọ Kachasị Mma Na Nijiria Universe na afọ puku abụọ iri na itoolu, emume a mere ụbọchị iri na otu nke onwa October na Gabriel Okara Cultural Center Yenegoa, Bayelsa
ọ nọchitere anya Taraba steeti
Olutosin nọchitere anya Naijiria na asọmpi Miss Universe nke iri isii na asatọ, nke emere na Disemba 8, 2019, na Tyler Perry Studios na Atlanta, Georgia ebe o tinyere n'elu iri abụọ

Olutoyin 'Toyin' Augustus (amuru n'ụbọchị iri abụọ na anọ nke ọnwa Disemba afọ 1979) bu onye ọsọ ihe mgbochi Naijiria n'eme asọmpi nke ọsọ ihe mgboch100 mita
Ọ malitere ọrụ ya site na mmeri n'asọmpi asọmpi Africa na nka ịgba ọsọ n'afọ 2006, na-emeri onye mmegide ya na ọsọ ihe mgbochi 100 mita
Ọ gara n'ihu na-ịnọchite anya Africa na iko mba ụwa IAAF nke afọ 2006, ebe ọ mechara n'ọkwa nke onye asatọ
N'afọ 2007, ọ gbakwụnyere aha egwuregwu Africa niile na kọntinent ya, na-egbochi ihe ịma aka sitere n'aka onye ibe ya Jessica Ohanaja
Ọ nwerekwara asọmpi siri ike na ọkwa kọntinent , dịka Fatmata Fofanah weere ọsọ ihe mgbochi nke 100 mita ahụ n'asọmpị Afrịka nke afọ 2008, hapụ Augustus ka ọ nọrọ na ihe nrite ọlaọcha
Ọ gbara ọsọ n'asọmpi egwuregwu ịgba ọsọ mba ụwa nke afọ 2009, na-ekere òkè na asọmpi ihe mgbochi yana asọmpi ịgba ọsọ ụmụ nwanyị relay 4 × 100 n'aha Nigeria
O ruru agba nke ọkara ikpeazụ n'ime ọsọ ihe mgbochi ahụ mana emesịa mee ka ọ ghara iru eru nke mere oji mechaa n'ọkwa nke iri na isii n'ozuzu na mmemme ịgba ọsọ relay
Na Asọmpi mba ụwa emere na Berlin, Augustus nọ n'okpuru ule ọbara na mmamịrị maka WADA
Ọbara ya enweghị ihe nchọpụta na-adịghị mma edepụtara, mana ihe nlele mmamịrị ya nwalere ihe dị mma maka ọkwa testosterone dị elu
Echiche IAAF Dọkịta kwuru na 'Nchọpụta a nwere ike dakọtara na nchịkwa nke testosterone na / ma ọ bụ prohormones metụtara'

Usoro nyocha na ule nke onye ọkachamara MD na-ahụ maka ọrịa gynecology na endocrinology na USC (Mahadum nke ndịda California) Ụlọ ọgwụ chọpụtara na Augustus nwere otutu cysts ovarian nke dọkịta jikọtara ya na nsogbu a na-akpọ Polycystic Ovary Syndrome ma ọ bụ PCOS
PCOS bụ dysfunction nke mmekorita na-akpata ọgba aghara nke hormonal na elu DHEA, hormone na-ebute ụzọ na hormones ndị ọzọ na-amụ nwa dị ka testosterone
Iji zọchite ule nti ọgwụ ike ma gbachite okwu ya, Augustus (onye bi na United States) chọrọ ịga ule nlele B nke emere na Germany
Ọ bụrụ na sample B dịkwa mma, ọ ga-efega Naịjirịa ka ọ gaa gosi kọmitii ndị otu egwuregwu obodo ya họpụtara
Kọmiti a ga-abụ òtù na-achị ikpe ya
Ọ bụ ezie na dọkịta na USC kwubiri na nsogbu PCOS mere ka ọkwa DHEA dị elu na mmamịrị Augustus, ndị kọmitii Naijiria jụrụ nchoputa ndị a
Enyere Augustus iwu ka ọ rụọ ọrụ mmachibido iwu afọ abụọ na asọmpi egwuregwu IAAF kwadoro
A na-enyocha okwu Augustus ruo ọtụtụ ọnwa, na-abịa na njedebe n'afọ 2010
N'ime oge a Ọgọstọs gara n'ihu na-asọ mpi mba ụwa, mana ọ kwụsịrị n'asọmpi na Belgium mgbe ọ mara ọkwa na a jụrụ ikpe ya
Agbatịpụrụ mmachibido iwu ya ruo ọnwa February nke afọ 2012 ka achọpụtara na ọ gbara asọmpi n'oge na-erughị eru

Egosiputala Toyin n'oge na-adịbeghị anya n'ụdị ihe onyonyo dị iche iche maka Xfinity 3D, ị nwere amamihe karịa onye grader nke ise? na nke kachasị NCAA ebe ya na ụmụ akwụkwọ ndị ọzọ na-eme egwuregwu na-agbagha akụkọ ifo nke ogbi jock mkparị
Oge kacha mma nke onwe ya bụ sekọnd 1285, nke o nwetara n'afọ 2009 na Nantes
Ọ na-eje ozi ugbu a dị ka onye isi nke Diversity, Equity, Inclusion na Belonging na Ụlọ akwụkwọ Oakwood na Los Angeles, California
Na mbụ, ọ bụ onye ọzụzụ bọọlụ na egwu na Phillips Exeter Academy

Oluwafunmilayo Olajumoke Atilade (a mụrụ na abalị iri abụọ na anọ nke ọnwa Septemba afọ 1952) bu onye ọka iwu Naijiria na onye bụbu onye isi ọka ikpe nke Lagos State
Ọ bụbu onye ọka ikpe na Ụlọ ikpe ukwu (High Court) nke Steeti Lagos
A mụrụ Atilade na Septemba 24, 1952 na London, England nye onye ọka ikpe nwụrụ anwụ James Oladipo Williams na Henrietta Aina Williams, onye ọkaikpe steeti Lagos
O nwetara asambodo ule akwụkwọ West Africa na Anglican Girls Grammar School dị na Surulere, nnukwu obodo Lagos
O nwetara nzere bachelọ na iwu na Mahadum Lagos na 1975 ewee kpọọ ya na ọrụ ikpe na afọ 1976
Ọ mèchàrà ọrụ ife ala nna ya otu afọ na Ministry of Justice na Benin obodo
Ọ malitere ọrụ iwu ya na 1977 na Federal Ministry of Justice dị ka onye ndụmọdụ steeti
O mechara sonye na ọrụ ndị ọrụ ọdụ ụgbọ mmiri Naijiria dịka onye isi ọka iwu na 1979
Ka ọ rụrụ ọrụ afọ atọ na ọdụ ụgbọ mmiri, e zigara ya na ngalaba ikpe Legọs steeti dị ka Senior Magistrate tupu o mechaa bụrụ Chief Magistrate Admin na ụlọikpe Magistrate Apapa
N'ọnwa Julaị 1996, a họpụtara ya Onyeikpe nke Ụlọikpe Kasị Elu nke Lagos n'okpuru ọchịchị onye nlekọta ndị agha, Mohammed Buba Marwa
Na Ọgọọst 20, 2015, a họpụtara ya dị ka onye ọka ikpe site n'aka Babatunde Fashola, Gọvanọ Lagos State ka ọ nọchie nwanne ya nwanyị Ayotunde Phillips
Atilade bụ onye isi ọkaikpe nwanyị Legọs nke ise
Oluwaseun Adegbola (amuru 23 Septemba 1999) bu onye okacha amara n'egwuregwu bọọlụ Naijiria na- agba Enyimba
Oluwaseun Ayodeji Osowobi bụ onye Naijiria na-ahụ maka ihe ndị ruuru ụmụ nwaanyi
O bu onye guzobere Stand to End Rape (STER) Mmalite
N'afọ 2019 ọ bụ nwaanyi Naijiria nke abụọ a kpọrọ aha na Time 100 Next list, ọ bụkwa onye ntorobia Commonwealth n'afo ahu
A mụrụ Osowobi ma zụlite ya na Naijiria, ebe nne ya kpaliri ya ịghọ onye nkwado
O nwetara nzere bachelọ na gọọmentị ime obodo na ọmụmụ mmepe na Mahadum Ahmadu Bello tupu ọ banye na Mahadum Swansea maka nzere masta na International Relations
Thesis ya lekwasịrị anya na nha nhata nwoke na nwanyị na mpụ mmekọahụ megide ụmụ nwanyị na ụmụaka
N'oge ọ na-arụ ọrụ na National Youth Service, Osowobi rụrụ ọrụ maka Independent National Electoral Commission na ntuli aka 2011
Mgbe ọ na-arụ ọrụ, o kwuru, 'ndị obodo na ndị obodo
setịpụrụ ọnyà maka (ya) ka otu n'ime ụmụ nwoke obodo ahụ dinaa ya n'ike' mgbe ọ jụrụ iri ngo
Mgbe nke ahụ gasịrị, o guzobere Stand to End Rape (STER) na 2013
Omume a na-achọ imeziwanye mmata banyere ime ihe ike megide ụmụ nwaanyi n'inye nkwado maka ndị a wakporo
Site n'afọ 2019, oge mere atụmatụ na nzukọ ahụ eruola ihe dị ka ndị Naijiria Puku nari naira abuo
Osowobi nwetara onyinye Genius Grant site na John D
na Catherine T
MacArthur Foundation na 2017
N'afọ 2019, a kpọrọ ya aha dị ka otu n'ime ndị Time 100 Next nke afọ, bụrụ nwaanyi Naijiria nke abụọ mere ndepụta ahụ
A kpọkwara ya onye ntorobịa Commonwealth nke Afọ 2019
Oluwatomi Somefun (amụrụ Ọktoba 2) bụ nwanyị na azu ahia na Naijiria nakwa onye ọrụ ụlọ akụ
Ọ na -aru oru ugbu a dị ka onye isi nchịkwa na onye isi oche nke Unity Bank plc
Ọ nwetara BEd
na Asụsụ Bekee na 1981 site na Mahadum Obafemi Awolowo, Ile-Ife dị na steeti Osun na otu ndị gụsịrị akwụkwọ na Harvard Business school na University of Columbia Business School, New York
Somefun malitere ọrụ ọkachamara ya na Peat Marwick na Co
ma mechara gaa biri na Arthur Andersen (ugbu a KPMG) tupu ọ bụrụ onye isi nchịkwa na Unity Bank plc
Oluwatoyin (Toyin) Asojo bụ onye nsote prọfesọ na onye isi oche nke Ngalaba Chemistry na Biochemistry na Mahadum Hampton
Ọ bukwara onye nsote Prọfesọ nke Pediatrics-Tropical Medicine na Baylor College of Medicine
Ọ na-arụ ọrụ na 'ngalaba jikoro mgbakọ na mwepụ, kemistri, bayoloji, mgbakọ' Ọ bụ onye na- ese kristal ma nwee mmasị na ọmụmụ ihe nhazi nke protein sitere na ọrịa ọrịa na-efe efe a na-eleghara anya
A mụrụ Asojo na Naijiria, ma o wepụtara onwe ya iru oru n'ụlọ ebe ụmụ enweghi nne na nna nọ mgbe o no n'ụlọ akwụkwọ
Nna ya bụ onye isi laboratori sayensị na mahadum nke Ibadan, ọ na-anọkwa ọtụtụ awa n'izu n'ụlọ nyocha

Ọ gara International School Ibadan wee tinye akwụkwọ maka agụmakwụkwọ United World College nke ga-enye ya ohere ịgụ akwụkwọ na mba ofesi, ma o buru otu onye n'ime naanị mmadụ asaa sitere na puku iri a ahọpụtara
O nwetara diploma Baccalaureate International na 1989 site na Pearson College UWC
Na 1993 Asojo mechara akara ugo mmụta Dual Honors na Mahadum Trent, o guru nChemistry na Economics
Asojo nwetara PhD na Mahadum Houston na 1999
Asojo emeela nyocha na ụlọ ọrụ, agụmakwụkwọ na gọọmentị
Mgbe ọ gụchara akwụkwọ, a họpụtara Asojo ka ọ bụrụ onye otu postdoctoral na National Cancer Institute
Ọ nọrọ otu afọ dị ka onye ọrụ sayensị na Tibotec na Rockville, Maryland
Na 2003, Asojo sonyeere Mahadum Nebraska Medical Center dị ka onye na nsota Prọfesọ
Ọ na-elekọta ụlọ ọrụ X-Ray crystallography n'otu oge na Eppley Institute Maka nchoputa cancer na oria na efe efe
N'ebe a, ọ mụrụ ihe na-edozi ahụ nke akpụkpọ ahụ na- etinye aka na nguzogide ọtụtụ ọgwụ
Enyere ya onyinye enyemaka abụọ nke National Institute of Health na 2005, na-agu usoro ọgwụgwọ ọzọ maka ọrịa Hookworm
Ọ nọrọ n'ọkwa ọzọ na mahadum Olabisi Onabanjo
Asojo nọ ugbua na Mahadum Hampton dị na Hampton, VA ebe ọ bụ osote prọfesọ nke Chemistry na Biochemistry
Asojo noro na Baylor College of Medicine, ebe eguzoberea ụlọ nyocha ya maka imepụta, ịdị ọcha na kristal nke protein
Ya na Sabin Vaccine Institute na ekerita akorongwa
Bido na 2001 ,ọ chịkọtara ọrụ nchoputa oge mkpomọkụ maka ụmụ akwụkwọ sekọndrị na-enwe nsogbu site na American Chemical Society Project SEED
Ọ meriri Carnegie African Diaspora Fellowship na 2016
Kemgbe 2014, Asojo abụrụla onye nchịkọta akụkọ maka akụkọ Sayensị Sayensị Nature na onye na-edekọ ihe na-akpakọrịta ọkachamara na crystallography maka BMC Structural Biology
2016 - Ọkachamara Fulbright
2016 - Society for Science & the Public Science Advocate Grant program
2016 - Carnegie African Diaspora Fellowship na 2016
2017 - Baylor College of Medicine Norton Rose Fulbright Faculty Excellence Award in Teaching
Akwụkwọ ndị Asojo kacha akpọtụrụ gụnyere
Oluwatoyin Temitayo Ogundipe (amuru 31 Mee 1960) bu nwa akwukwo Naijiria, odee na Prọfesọ nke ihe omumu
Ọ bụ 12th substantive Vice-Chancellor of University of Lagos
A mụrụ Ogundipe na ọnwa Mee 31, na afọ 1960
Ọ gara mahadum nke Ife (nke bụzi Obafemi Awolowo University) ebe ọ nwetara nzere Bachelor of Science (BSc) na Botany
O nwetara nzere masters na botany na mahadum Ife na nzere doctorate (PhD) na mahadum ahụ
Mgbe nke ahụ gasịrị, ọ nwetara nzere masters na Business Administration na Mahadum Lagos na asambodo ịga na mahadum nke Reading na 1998
Prọfesọ Ogundipe malitere ọrụ agụmakwụkwọ ya na Mahadum Lagos dịka onye nkuzi ebe O
Ọ ruru ọkwa prọfesọ nke Botany na 2002
Ọ bụ Dean, Ụlọ Akwụkwọ nke Postgraduate Studies site na August 2007 ruo July 2011 na onye isi, Ngalaba Nhazi Ụlọ Akwụkwọ site na Eprel 2012 ruo Eprel 2016
A họpụtara ya dị ka osote onye isi oche nke Mahadum Lagos na Nọvemba 2017 ka ọ pụtachara nke ọma na ajụjụ ọnụ e mere, na-eti Prọfesọ Olukayode Amund, na Prọfesọ Ayodeji Olukoju n'ọkwa ahụ
Ruo oge nhọpụta ya na Nọvemba, ọ bụ osote osote onyeisi ụlọ akwụkwọ mahadum Lagos
Oluwatoyin Ogundipe nwere ụmụ atọ
Ndị otu na-achị mahadum wepụrụ Prọfesọ Ogundipe dị ka osote onyeisi ụlọ akwụkwọ mahadum Legọs n'ihi ebubo eboro ya maka enweghị ego na-ezighi ezi na nnukwu omume rụrụ arụ
Mana onye isi ala Muhammadu Buhari weghachiri ya n'ọrụ dabere n'atụmatụ otu ndị nyocha nke chọpụtara na ewepụghị ya site n'usoro ziri ezi

Oluyemisi Oluremi Obilade (amụrụ na 14 Nọvemba 1958) bụ onye isi ala nke agụmakwụkwọ na Naijiria
A mụrụ Obilade na Osun Steeti n'afọ 1958
Ọ nwetara akara ugo mmụta nke mbụ ya na Naịjirịa tupu ọ gawa masters ya na Harvard Business School na US wee nweta nzere doctorate na Judge Business School na Cambridge, United Kingdom
Prọfesọ (MrsOluwayemisi Oluremi Obilade ghọrọ osote onye isi nke Mahadum Mmụta Tai Solarin (TASUED) na Jenụwarị 2013
Ọ nọchiri Anya Prọfesọ Segun Awonusi
Ahịa azụ Oluwo bụ ahịa azụ dị na Epe, Lagos Steeti, Naijiria
A makwaara ya dị ka Epe Fish Market
Ahịa azụ a dị n'ụzọ dị mma bụ nke kachasị ukwuu na Lagos ma kọọrọ na ọ dị ka obodo Epe n'agbanyeghị na ụbọchị a malitere ahịa ahụ bụ 10 Nọvemba afọ1989
Aha ahịa ahụ sitere na aha ezinụlọ nke rere ala ọ bi na gọọmentị steeti - ezinụlọ Oluwo ebe 'Chief' nke ọtụtụ ndị obodo na-akpọ ya (ahịa), bụ aha ọdịnala nke Oluwo
A na-ekwu na ahịa ahụ dị na mbụ n'ihu Marina, (ebe dị mkpirikpi site na ebe obibi dị ugbu a) tupu ọ dị obere iji nweta ọnụ ọgụgụ ndị ahịa

Maka onye ọ bụla nụrụ na a na-akpọ obodo Epe 'nkwata azụ nke steeti ahụ', mgbọrọgwụ nke aha ahụ dị na mkpa ahịa azụ a dị ka onye isi na-emepụta ma na-ebupụ azụ n'akụkụ dị iche iche nke steeti nne na nna ya - Lagos na Naịjirịa n'ozuzu
Ụdị nke ọtụtụ ihe oriri a na-ere n'ahịa na-eme ka ọ daba n'ụdị ahịa mmiriAzụ yana anụ ọhịa, nke a maara dị ka 'anụ ọhịa' bụ ihe a na-ahụkarị n'ahịa Oluwo Fish
A na-eweta ụmụ anụmanụ ahụ na ndụ ma ọ bụ nwụrụ anwụ ma na-erekwa ha n'ụdị kachasị mma nke onye zụrụ ya na-ahọrọ

Otú ọ dị, ntiwapụ nje virus COVID-19 mepụtara akụkụ ọzọ maka ịdị adị nke ahịa azụ Oluwo na Lagos Steeti, ebe enwere nchegbu dị elu banyere ahịa mmiri ịbụ ebe ọkụ maka ọrịa zoonotic na-akpata nje dịka COVID-19
Nke a dugara na mmechi dị mkpirikpi nke ahịa azụ site na Ministri Ahụike nke Lagos Steeti iji belata ohere nke ntiwapụ ọrịa zoonotic ọzọ na steeti ahụ
N'afọ 2021, Gọọmentị etiti nke Naịjirịa malitere imezigharị ahịa azụ Epe iji mezuo ụkpụrụ mba ụwa, e mere mmelite ahụ iji nye ahịa Epe iji zute ụkpụrụ mba ụwa
Oba Oluwole (nwụrụ n'afọ 1841) chịrị dị ka Oba nke Lagos site n'afọ 1837 ruo 1841
Nna ya bụ Oba Adele
Mmalite nke Oba Oluwole na esemokwu nwa eze Kosoko yiri ka ọ gbanyere mkpọrọgwụ na asọmpi ha maka Obaship nke Lagos mgbe ọnwụ Oba Adele
Mgbe Oluwole ghọrọ Oba, ọ chụpụrụ nwanne nwanyị Kosoko, Opo Olu na Lagos Steeti, ọbụlagodi mgbe ndị na-akọ ọdịnihu chọpụtara na aka ya dị ọcha n'ime amoosu

Ọzọkwa, mgbe Oluwole kwụsịrị nnupụisi ndị agha Kosoko nke a maara dị ka Ogun Ewe Koko ('akwụkwọ nke agha coco-yam'), Oluwole zigara onyeisi agha ya - Yesufu Bada - n'ọrụ agha iji weghachite ihe ndị e kwatara n'ogige Kosoko
Oluwole nwụrụ n'afọ 1841 mgbe àmụ̀mà kpatara mgbawa n'ebe Oba nọ
A gbagburu ozu Oluwole ma nwee ike ịmata ya naanị site na beads eze ya na-achọ ahụ ya mma
Oluwole Olumuyiwa (1929–2000) bụ onye Naijiria na-ewu ụlọ
Oluwole gụrụ Architecture na City Planning na Mahadum Manchester site na 1949 ruo 1954, na-enweta akara ugo mmụta nke mbụ

O nwere afọ anọ nke ọzụzụ nzere na ọtụtụ ụlọ ọrụ Europe dịka Architects Co-Partnership na London, ụlọ ọrụ Van den Broek na Bakema na Rotterdam, mmepe obodo ọhụrụ na Emmen (Netherlands), Stevenage (England) na Switzerland
O nwetakwara ọzụzụ bara uru na atụmatụ ụlọ ọgwụ
Oluwole bụ onye Naijiria mbụ gụsịrị akwụkwọ na Architecture iji laghachi Naịjirịa site na mba ofesi na 1958 wee guzobe ọrụ; Oluwole Olumuyiwa na Associates na Lagos, Nigeria, n'afọ 1960
Ọ bụ onye isi oche mbụ nke Architects Registration Council of Nigeria (ARCON)
Oluwole bụ onye nduzi nke nyocha mbụ nke Africa 'The West African Builder and Architect'
Ọ bụ onye nnọchi anya Naịjirịa na nzukọ CAA n'afọ 1964 ma mesịa bụrụ Onye isi oche nke Association
O tinyekwara aka na ụlọ obibi na ụlọ ọha na eze; na-emepụta ọtụtụ ụlọ ọhụrụ nke Naịjirịa n'oge ahụ, ọkachasị ụlọ akwụkwọ

Ambassador Oluyemi Adeniji (iri abụo na asaa Julaị 1934 Ō iri abụo na asaa Nọvemba 2017 na London) bụ onye na-arụ ọrụ na Naijiria na onye ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị bụ onye nnọchi anya pụrụ iche nke odeakwụkwọ ukwu na United Nati
ons
Mission na Sierra Leone (UNAMSIL) site na Nọvember 19, 1999 ruo Julaị 16, 2003
O mechara bụrụ Minista Na-ahụ Maka Mba Ọzọ nke Naijiria site na July 2003 ruo June 2006, mgbe ahụ Minista na-ahụ maka ihe ndị dị n'ime obodo site na 21 June 2006 ruo May 2007
Adeniji nwere nzere na akụkọ ihe mere eme

Ọ rụrụ ọrụ na Ministry of Foreign Affairs na Naijiria embassies na Washington, DC, Freetown, Sierra Leone, na Accra, Ghana
Ọ lara ezumike nká n'ọrụ na 1991 mgbe ọ rụchara ọrụ dị ka onye isi nchịkwa nke ngalaba na-ahụ maka ihe gbasara mba ọzọ
Ruo afọ ise ọ bụ onye nnọchi anya Naijiria na France
Adeniji bụ onye nnọchi anya pụrụ iche nke odeakwụkwọ ukwu nke United Nations maka United Nations Mission na Central African Republic (MINURCA)
Ọrụ ahụ bụ ọrụ inye nchekwa na Bangui na ịhazi ntuli aka ndị omeiwu na nke onye isi ala e mere na 1998 rue n'afọ1999
A họpụtara ya ka ọ bụrụ onye nnọchi anya pụrụ iche nke ode akwụkwọ ukwu nke United Nations maka Sierra Leone na onye isi nke United Nations Mission na Sierra Leone (UNAMSIL)

Na mgbakwunye, ọ rụrụ ọrụ na Commission of Eminent Persons on The Role of the IAEA to 2020 and Beyond, nke Ernesto Zedillo bụ onye isi oche ya, onye a malitere akụkọ ya bụ Reinforcing the Global Nuclear Order for Peace and Prosperity na June 2008

Oluyemi Fagbamila (amụrụ na 23 Febụwarị 1983) bụ onye Naijirịa na-agba ọsọ lara ezumike nká nke bụ ọkachamara na mita 400
Ya na ndị otu relay nke Naijirịa 4 × 400 mita meriri ọlaọcha na 2002 African Championships ma họrọ ya maka 2003 World Championships, mana ndị otu ahụ mechara ghara ịmalite asọmpi ahụ
N'otu n'otu, ọ mechara nke asatọ na 2002 World Junior Championships
O sonyere na 1999 World Youth Championships (100 na 200 m) n'erughị nke ikpeazụ
Oge kachasị mma ya bụ 2346 sekọnd na mita 200, nke o nwetara na Mee 2002 na El Paso; na 5219 sekọnd n'ime mita 400, nke o nwetara n'ọnwa Mee 2002 na Houston
O meriri na Mahadum Texas na El Paso

Olympia Brown (Jenụwarị 5, 1835 Ọktoba 23, 1926) bụ onye ozi America na onye na-akwado ụmụnwanyị
Ọ bụ nwanyị mbụ a họpụtara dị ka ụkọchukwu site na nkwenye nke ụka ya
Brown bụkwa onye na-akwado ikike ụmụnwanyị na otu n'ime ndị mmeri ole na ole nke ọgbọ mbụ nwere ike ịtụ vootu site na ntinye nke Ndezigharị nke Iri na itoolu
A mụrụ Olympia Brown n'ọnwa Jenụwarị 5, 1835 na Prairie Ronde Township, Michigan
Brown bụ nwa mbụ n'ime ụmụ anọ
Nne na nna ya, Lephia na Asa Brown, bụ ndị ọrụ ugbo n'ihe a na-ewere dị ka ala ókèala n'oge ahụ
Ha bụ nwanne nne nne na nwanne nna, n'otu n'otu, nke Onye isi ala US Calvin Coolidge
Lephia zụlitere ụmụ ya n'ezinụlọ nke weere okpukpe na agụmakwụkwọ dị ka ihe dị ezigbo mkpa
Nke a pụtara ìhè site na iwu ụlọ akwụkwọ na mpaghara Brown
Mgbalị maka agụmakwụkwọ nke nne Brown kụnyere manyere ya ịgụcha ụlọ akwụkwọ sekọndrị ma gaa n'ihu na mahadum
Brown na nwanne ya nwanyị nke obere Oella kpebiri ịga Mount Holyoke Female Seminary
Ugwu Holyoke na agụmakwụkwọ kọleji bụ ihe Brown tụrụ anya ya
Mmetụta obi ụtọ ya mere ka ọ ghara ịdị n'ihi ihe mgbochi a na-etinye ụmụnwanyị na Mount Holyoke
Ihe mgbochi ndị a gụnyere ndepụta nke iwu iri anọ, mwepụ nke òtù agụmakwụkwọ nke Browns guzobere, na ihe mgbochi okpukpe
Ikekwe ihe atụ kachasị mma nke echiche ụlọ akwụkwọ ahụ bụ okwu nke prọfesọ Chemistry, 'A naghị atụ anya na ị ga-echeta ihe a niile, mana naanị iji mee ka ị nwee ọgụgụ isi na mkparịta ụka'
Brown, onye marala na ọ nwere ike izute ihe ịma aka nke agụmakwụkwọ dị elu, lere anya n'ebe ọzọ
N'iwepu ahụmịhe ya na Mount Holyoke, Brown debara aha ya na Antioch College
Ozugbo Brown malitere agụmakwụkwọ ya na Antiọk, ọ ghọtara na ọ ga-enweta ụkpụrụ dị elu
Brown mụtakwara na n'agbanyeghị ọdịdị na-aga n'ihu na Antiọk, a ka nwere ụdị ịkpa ókè
Dịka ọmụmaatụ, na klas Bekee nke Brown, a chọghị ka ụmụnwanyị buru okwu n'isi
N'omume nnupụisi, Brown kwuru okwu ya site n'icheta, dịka ndị ikom ahụ mere
Ikekwe ihe kachasị mma nke oge Brown na Antiọk bụ ikike ya ime ka dike ya, Antoinette Brown Blackwell, kwuo okwu na Antiọk
Ozugbo Brown gụsịrị akwụkwọ na Antiọk, o kpebiri na ọkpụkpọ ya bụ ịbụ onye ozi
Mgbe a jụrụ ya ọtụtụ ugboro, a nabatara ya na Theological School nke Mahadum St
Lawrence, ọ bụ ezie na onye isi ụlọ akwụkwọ ahụ, Ebenezer Fisher, mere ka o doo anya na ya ekwenyeghị na ụmụnwanyị kwesịrị ịbụ ndị ozi
Ọ bịarutere na campus n'afọ 1861 wee gụsịrị akwụkwọ n'afọ 1863, na-aghọ nwanyị mbụ gụsịrị akwụkwọ n'ụlọ akwụkwọ nkà mmụta okpukpe
Ọzọkwa, Brown chere mmegide sitere n'ọtụtụ akụkụ ihu
Nke a gụnyere ụmụ akwụkwọ ibe ya na ndị nwunye nke ngalaba ahụ
Brown weere ya niile dị ka ihe ịma aka
Mgbe afọ mbụ ya gasịrị, Brown nwetara nnabata ma gụchaa akwụkwọ ya
N'agbanyeghị na ọ gụsịrị akwụkwọ, ma nweta otu afọ nke ozi ọma na Congregations na Marshfield na Montpelier, Vermont, Brown ka zutere mmegide megide nhọpụta ya
Ngalaba St
Lawrence jụrụ ịhọpụta ya
Brown kpebiri ịrịọ arịrịọ na Kansụl Universalist, wee gaa Malone dị nso, New York, iji gosipụta ikpe ya na Northern Universalist Association
Arịrịọ Brown bụ arịrịọ dị mfe maka ịha nhata
Otu onye otu Council nụrụ okwuchukwu Brown n'izu gara aga, wee hapụ nkwado ya
N'ụzọ tụrụ ọtụtụ ndị n'anya, kansụl ahụ vootu iji họpụta ya
Ya mere na Juun 25, n'afọ 1863, Olympia Brown ghọrọ nwanyị mbụ a họpụtara dị ka onye ozi na Chọọchị Universalist
Ndị ọkọ akụkọ ihe mere eme arụrịta ụka ebe o nwere n'akụkọ ihe mere eme nke nhọpụta ụmụnwanyị
Ụfọdụ na-ewere nhọpụta ya, nke Association mpaghara ya kwadoro, dị ka ihe dị mkpa karịa nke Antoinette Brown Blackwell, nke Chọọchị Congregational Church na South Butler, NY họpụtara n'afọ 1853
Brown Blackwell enweghị nkwado iwu na ụka ya karịa ọgbakọ dị n'ógbè ahụ
Olympia Brown bụ nwanyị mbụ a họpụtara site na nkwado gọọmentị site na otu ụka mba
Mgbe a họpụtara ya, Brown gara Vermont, na-ekwusa ozi ọma na ụka dị iche iche
Ọ nọrọ oge ụfọdụ n'ụlọ ya na ezinụlọ ya na Michigan, tupu ọ malite ọrụ pastọ mbụ ya na Weymouth Landing, Massachusetts
E debere ya n'ọrụ na Julaị 1864, ma jee ozi n'ọgbakọ ruo ọtụtụ afọ
Ọ gara n'ihu na-eje ozi na chọọchị dị na Bridgeport, Connecticut, ọgbakọ ahụ were ya n'ọrụ n'agbanyeghị na ọtụtụ ndị parish na-achọghị inwe nwanyị pastọ
N'afọ 1878, ọ nabatara oku gaa na chọọchị dị na Racine, Wisconsin, ebe ọ ga-eje ozi dị ka onye ụkọchukwu ruo n'afọ 1887
N'ihe niile ọ na-eje ozi, a na-akwanyere ya ùgwù dị ka onye nkwusa
Onye nta akụkọ maka Superior Daily Leader kọwara ya dị ka 'nwaanyị Beecher nke rostrum'
Ebumnuche nke a bụ ka otuto dị elu, ebe ọ bụ na a na-ewere Henry Ward Beecher dị ka onye nkwusa kachasị mma na United States n'oge ahụ
Site n'oge Brown bụ nwata na mmegide abolition ruo na ahụmịhe nke Brown na ịkpa ókè, Brown maara mgbe niile banyere ịchọ ikike nhata
N'ihi ikike ikwu okwu siri ike na nkwenkwe Brown, Susan B
Anthony nọgidere na-achọ itinye aka na Brown
Site na agbamume nke Lucy Stone na di ya, Henry Blackwell, Brown kpebiri ịga Kansas iji kwuo maka ikike ụmụnwanyị
N'oge ọkọchị, Brown kwuru ihe karịrị okwu 300 n'agbanyeghị na ọ na-eche ọtụtụ ihe isi ike ihu
Ọ bụ ezie na nke a bụ nnukwu ahụmịhe, Brown kpebiri ịlaghachi n'ozi, ruo mgbe ọ gbanwere obi ya n'afọ 1887
Ugbu a Brown raara ndụ ya nye òtù ahụ, ọ chọrọ ime ihe niile o nwere ike ime
Nke a gụnyere ịmepụta New England Women's Suffrage Association, na-eduga Wisconsin Suffrage League ma bụrụ onye isi oche nke Federal Suffrage Society site n'afọ 1903 ruo n'afọ 1920
N'agbanyeghị ihe ndị a niile, Brown hụrụ mgbanwe ole na ole na-ewere ọnọdụ
Brown kwenyere na ọgbọ nke abụọ nke ndị suffragists tara ahụhụ site na ndị ndu na-adịghị mma ma jiri njehie lekwasị anya na mbọ ha na steeti
Ọ bụghị ruo n'afọ 1913 ka a kpọrọ Brown ka ọ sonye na Union Congress for Woman Suffrage, nke Alice Paul na Lucy Burns ga-akpọ National Woman's Party
Ìgwè a lere anya imezigharị na ọkwa gọọmentị etiti ma kwe nkwa iji usoro siri ike
Atụmatụ ọhụrụ ndị a mere ka e nye ndị Congress ikike ụmụnwanyị ịtụ vootu ma mee ngagharị n'ihu White House
Onye isi ala Wilson zutere ngagharị abụọ ahụ n'ihu White House na enweghị obi ụtọ
N'ihi ya, a ga-atụ ụmụnwanyị ndị a mkpọrọ
Mmeso ọjọọ a na-emeso ụmụnwanyị ndị a tinyere nnukwu mgbasa ozi mere ka ha nwekwuo nkwado maka mmegharị ahụ
N'ikpeazụ, Congress kwadoro iwu ahụ
Otú ọ dị, na nkwado ka dị mkpa, Brown na ndị ọzọ rutere n'ụzọ mkpọsa otu oge ikpeazụ
Njem ikpeazụ Olympia Brown mere bụ n'afọ 1920 Republican National Convention
A ga-emecha kwado Ndezigharị nke iri na itoolu na August 25, 1920, na-egosi oge mbụ Olympia Brown na ọtụtụ ụmụnwanyị ndị ọzọ nwere ike ịtụ vootu
Brown lụrụ John Henry Willis na 1873; ọ họọrọ idebe aha nwa agbọghọ ya
Ha zụlitere ụmụ abụọ Henry na Gwendolyn
Ụmụ ha abụọ ghọrọ ndị nkuzi
Brown nọrọ afọ ikpeazụ ya na ezinụlọ ya na Racine, Wisconsin
Ọ gara n'ihu na-akwado ikike ụmụnwanyị na Women's International League for Peace and Freedom
Ọ nwụrụ na Baltimore n'ọnwa Ọktoba 23, n'afọ 1926
N'afọ 1963 iji kwanyere otu narị afọ nke nhọpụta Brown ùgwù, ụlọ akwụkwọ nkà mmụta okpukpe nke Mahadum St
Lawrence debere ihe ncheta na chọọchị ọ na-azụ na Racine, Wisconsin
Ihe odide ahụ mechiri, 'Ọkụ nke mmụọ ya ka na-ere ọkụ taa'
N'afọ 1989, a gbanwere aha chọọchị ahụ ka ọ bụrụ Olympia Brown Unitarian Universalist Church

N'afọ ndị 1970 Susan Hester na Fran Kaplan guzobere Olympia Brown League iji nyere ikike aha ụmụnwanyị aka na Milwaukee, na nzaghachi maka mkpebi ụlọ ikpe megide ụmụnwanyị na-achọ idebe aha nwa agbọghọ ha mgbe ha lụrụ di; Brown debere nke ya mgbe ọ lụrụ di
N'ụzọ doro anya, ikpe na mkpebi ụlọ ikpe ahụ bụ Kruzel v
Podell (1975), nke Ụlọikpe Kasị Elu nke Wisconsin kpebiri na nwanyị mgbe ọ lụrụ di na-anakwere aha nna di ya site n'iji aha ahụ eme ihe mgbe ọ lụsịrị di, mana o kwukwara na ọ dịghị iwu chọrọ ya
A gụrụ ụlọ akwụkwọ elementrị dị na Racine aha iji sọpụrụ Brown n'afọ 1975
N'afọ 1999, a nabatara ya na Michigan Women's Hall of Fame

A na-edebe akwụkwọ na akwụkwọ nke Olympia Brown na ọrụ ya na Schlesinger Library na Cambridge, Massachusetts, State Historical Society of Wisconsin, na akwụkwọ nke National Woman's Party na Library of Congress
A na-akpọ usoro ihe omimi Olympia Brown aha ya
Ememme Omabe bụ kwa mmemme pụrụ iche nke dị iche na ọtụtụ mmemme a na-eme kwa afọ, a na-eme mmemme Omabe a kwa afọ ise ọ bụla
Ememe a bụ ihe dị oké ọnụ ahịa nye ndị obodo Imufu, mpaghara NSUKKA, Ezike dị n'Enugwu steeti
Ememme a adịla kemgbe ọtụtụ narị afọ ma bụrụkwa ihe dị ukwuu nye ndị Imufu dịka ọ na-eguzokwa dị ka ihe ngosi nke ime ka ọ dị ọcha na sachapụ obodo ahụ n'ihe ọjọọ

Ekwenyere na onye na-ebu Masquerade na-eguzo dị ka onye etiti ime mmụọ, na nkpuchi mgbe ọ pụtara na-ekpochapụ obodo site n'ihe ọjọọ ma n'ime mmadụ ma nke mmụọ n'ihi na a na-ahụ ya na ọkụ na-apụta, obodo ahụ nwere ihe karịrị otu masquerade, nke ụfọdụ n'ime ha
ha bu eshiwe, obele monwu, Oshagenyi, Eji, eshiwe, Mgbedike, mukwu monwu, Ajulaka, Agbe-Eji, Ajiya, Agelle
Ekwuru na oha a nwere ihe dịka 600 masquerades
WeEmemme a na-amalite n'isi ụtụtụ mgbe niile, dịka elekere ise nke ụtụtụ, n'oge a, a na-ahụ masquerades na-apụta iji gosi
Usoro nke ha na-apụta bụ site na obere na nnukwu masquerades
Masquerades na-eweghara n'okporo ámá dị ka ihe nnọchianya nke nlọghachi nke ememe Omabe ka afọ ise gachara, ihe ngosi dị ike nke masquerades na-egosi otú ha siri chere ememe ahụ n'ihi ogologo oge ya
Ha na-eme ma na-atọ ndị mmadụ ụtọ, na-ekerịta ha n'ụdị dị iche iche na usoro ịgba egwu yana anwansi ma ọ bụ aghụghọ iji mee ka ndị mmadụ na-eche
Mgbe obere masquerades masoko ọrụ, nnukwu masquerades na-apụta iji gaa n'ihu na ngosi ahụ

N'etiti ehihie, masquerades dị ize ndụ na-apụta dị ka a na-ekwu na ụfọdụ ndị mmụọ na-akwagharị mana ha na-eme ka ndị enyi enyi gbaa ha gburugburu ka ha ghara ịkụ ha ife, na-achụ ndị mmadụ na-akpata ọgba aghara

Ufodu masquerades dị ka Mgbdike na-apụta n'uwe ọdịnala mara mma ofuma, beads, akpụkpọ anụ ebe a na-amata ha dị ka nnukwu akwa akwa, ọ na-aga n'ime obodo mgbe obere masquerades ndị ọzọ na-agbaso otu ihe nkiri
A na-anụ ụda site na nso na n'ebe tera aka site na ebe a na-eme ememme, ụda ịgbà, egbe, ọjà, olu na ngwa egwu ọdịnala ndị ọzọ
Mgbe e mesịrị, ndị masquerades na-aga ozugbo n'ụlọ ndị okenye nwoke iji kwụọ ụgwọ

Ebe ọ bụ na a na-ewere Masquerades dị ka mmụọ na Imufu, n'ihi ya, a na-ahapụ ha ịkwaga ma rụọ ọrụ otu afọ site n'ụbọchị ememme dịka ndị okenye na-ekwu na ọ na-ewe otu afọ tupu mmụọ nsọ pụọ na ndị ikom tupu ya apụ na ụwa ndị mmụọ ruo afọ ise na-esote
Nke a bụ nkwenye na e nwere ndị nna ochie na-abịa inoreyere ha otu onwa na obodo na-enweta udo na ịdị n'otu ma emesịa
A naghị ekwe ka ụmụ nwanyị na-abịaru nso nso na ebe masquerades ka a na-ewere na ha nwere ikikere omimi
Omagwa bụ obodo dị na Ikwerre nke dị na mpaghara gọọmentị ime obodo nke Steeti Rivers, Nigeria
Onye na-achị Omagwa bụ HRH Eze Achinike Amadi
Ọdụ ụgbọ elu Port Harcourt International na Domestic dị na Omagwa
Omah Lay, onye ezigbo aha ya bụ Stanley Omah Didia bụ onye na-agụ egwu, na-ede abụ, na-arụkwa ụda egwu
A mụrụ ya na Mee 19 1997
Ọ ghọrọ onye ama ama na 2020 mgbe egwu izizi ya “YOU” gbasara ngwa ngwa na ịntanetị
Ọ malitere dị ka onye na-emepụta egwu na onye na-ede egwú na Port Harcourt mana ọ mecha kpebie ịmalite ịgụ egwu mgbe ọ ghọtara na ya enwetaghị otuto zuru oke maka egwu ndị o nyere ndi ozo aka mepụta
Ọ mepụtara ma wepụta egwu dị ka 'Do Not Disturb' na 'Hello Brother' na obodo ya Port Harcourt nke meghere ya ụzọ ka ọ wee banye KeyQaad
A mụrụ Omah Lay na Port Harcourt nime Southern Nigeria
Ọ tolitere na agbata obi nke Marine Base
Omah Lay agaghị abụ onye mbụ na-eme egwu na ezinụlọ ya
Nna nna ya bụ onye n'eti igba nke onye egwu Highlife nke nwụrụ anwụ, bụ Celestine Ukwu
Omah Lay banyere n'egwú dị ka onye rapper na agbata obi Marine Base
Aha ọkwa ya n’oge ahụ bụ Lil King
O mechara kpebie ịmụ otú e si emepụta egwú
O bu ụzọ gosi akara ya na egwu mgbe o mepụtara ọtụtụ egwu ndị wuru ewu na redio
Na May 22, Omah Lay wepụtara EP mbụ ya 'Get Layd' nke nwere egwu dịka “You” na “Bad Influence”
EP ya rere nke ọma na ahịa
Ọ ghọrọ otu n'ime oba egwu Afrobeat kacha mma na ịntanetị wee gaa n'ihu ime Omah Lay Apple Music Favorite New Artiste nke ọnwa June na Africa
Na Septemba 2020, Omah Lay pụtara na egwu DJ Tunez 'Pami' n'akụkụ Wizkid na Adekunle Gold
N'otu ọnwa ahụ, Ọ weputara vidiyo egwu ya bụ “Damn”
Omaha bụ ama ukwu kárírí na ivụ mádu ímé nkeji obodo Nebraska, Njikota Obodo Amerika, na ȯ bụ ochíe ndi íshí Douglas County
Ȯ nọr na Odida-etítì Njikota Obodo na Oshimiri Missouri, nke rúrú mile 20 (30 km) shí olile anyanwu ónú Oshimiri Platte
Omaha bụ íkú na àlà Omaha-Council Bluffs ama sárā, nke nwéré Council Bluffs, Iowa, gáfèrè Oshimiri Missouri shí Omaha
Ȯ nọr na olile Kansas City, Missouri shí mile 190
Na í kà àkà 2009 shí ỌgüMàdu nke Njikota Obodo, Omaha nwèrè mádu rúrú 454,731, nke méré ya ama ukwu nke sáráasá gbárá 40
Í jí ámá úlọ ya, Omaha kèrè onwe ya Í gba 60 na ama sárā ímé Njikota Obodo na afọr 2000, jírí mádu ha kàrà àkà rúrú 837,925 di nà nkeji ya di asáatọ
Mádu bírí ya rùrù nde 12 dírí ya gbụrụgbúrụ mile 50 (80 km) shí etítì ama ukwu, nke kéré Ámá Omaha Ukwu
Omaio (Omaiyo) bụ asụsụ Dorobo nke ndi madu amaghị ama nke obodo Tanzania
Dị ka ajụjụ ọnụ ya na ndị ọkà okwu si kwuo, a chụpụrụ ndị mmadụ na Serengeti n'afọ ndị 1950 iji mee ka ogige ahụ nwee ohere
Ka ọ na-erule afọ 2018, ndị na-asụ ya atọ na-echeta ụfọdụ okwu nke asụsụ ahụ, ọ bụ ezie na a naghị asụ ya kemgbe ha bụ ụmụaka
Dabere na narị okwu na ahịrịokwu ole na ole a chịkọtara, a kọwaghị asụsụ ahụ
E nwere ihe akaebe nke okwu ndị a pụrụ ịchọta site na ịkpọtụrụ ndị na-asụ asụsụ Maa na Datooga, yana okwu ochie nke sitere na ezinụlọ Southern Nilotic nke nwere ike ịbụ ihe nketa ma ọ bụ nke agbaziri
Anita Ifeoma Isede, nke a maara dị ka Omalicha (nke a na-akpọkwa 'Omalisha') bụ onye Agbor na Delta steeti, Naịjirịa
Ọ bụ onye ngosi na olu a ma ama na Rhythm 937 ebe ọ na-akwado 'morning drive', 'ihe ngosi ụtụtụ mgbede (faji Friday),' 'Hola at the seaside (a request show)' na 'seaside'
Omalisha bụ onye gụsịrị akwụkwọ na French na Mahadum nke Lagos
O bu ụzọ dekọọ olu ya na laptọọpụ Cobhams Asuquo, mgbe ọ nọ n'ụlọ akwụkwọ ọnụ, dị ka obere olu ọdịyo nke mechara nweta nlebara anya nke Rhythm FM ebe ọ malitere ọrụ ya
Ọ na-eme atụmatụ inwe Vlog ma malite azụmahịa isi nri
Omalisha dị ka a maara ya nke ọma na ikuku bụ onye kasị okenye n'ime ụmụnne atọ na naanị nwa agbọghọ nke ezinụlọ ya
Ọ bụ onye Agbor, Delta Steeti nke Naịjirịa
Ọ lụrụ enyi ya DJ Alex Hughes (DJ X-el) n'afọ 2016
Ọ gbara Prof
Yemi Osinbajo, osote onye isi ala Naịjirịa n'oge ntuli aka ha n'afọ 2015

Na 21 Disemba na afo 2015 Rhythm FM redio, Omalicha kwere nkwa ọlụlụ na enyi ya nwoke Alex Hughes nke a makwaara dị ka DJ X-EL N'ọnwa Ọgọstụ afọ 2016, On-Air-Personality gara na peeji Instagram ya iji kwupụta afọ ime ya
Chukwudi Paul Ossai a na -akpọkarị Chuks Omalicha (amụrụ Mee 5, 1985) bụ onye na -eme ihe nkiri na Naịjirịa, onye ọchụnta ego na onye mmepụta ihe
A maara ya nke ọma maka àgwà ọ gosipụtara dị ka 'Derick' na ihe nkiri 2011, bụ Rain Drop, nke Ini Edo, John Dumelo na Artus Frank sonyeere
Omalicha si na Delta State, Nigeria
Ọ gara òtù ụlọ akwụkwọ Heritage, Benin City maka ụlọ akwụkwọ praịmarị ya, yana ụlọ akwụkwọ sekọndrị nke UNIBEN, maka ụlọ akwụkwọ sekọndrị ya
Ọ malitere mmụta diplọma na Laboratory Science na Mahadum Benin ma mechaa nweta nzere Master of Art na Biomedical Science na Delta State University
Ọ malitere ọrụ aka nka na 2010
Agbanyeghị, ọ nwere ihe ịga nke ọma na fim Chiweuba Nneji nke akpọrọ 'Rain drop' ebe gosipụtara dị ka Derick
Ọ pụtala n'ọtụtụ ihe nkiri Nollywood, gụnyere Helped, Rule no 1, Where my heart lies
Na 2017, a họpụtara ya maka ome ihe nkiri kacha mma na -abịa n'afọ nke (Bekee) nke City People Movie Award
Ọ meriri na 2015 City People Movie Award Most Promise Actor of the Year (Bekee)
Omar Badsha (a mụrụ n'ụbọchị irí abụọ na asaa n'ọnwa Juun n'afọ 1945) bụ onye South Africa na-ese foto, onye na-ese ihe, onye ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị na onye ọrụ na onye ọkọ akụkọ ihe mere eme
Ọ bụ onye na-ese ihe n'onwe ya
O gosipụtala nka ya na South Africa na mba ụwa

N'afọ 2015, o ritere Arts & Culture Trust (ACT) Lifetime Achievement Award for Visual Art N'afọ 2017, ọ natara nzere doctorate Doctor of Philosophy (DPhil), n'ihe banyere ọrụ ya na-enweghị atụ na ngalaba nke foto na South Africa

E nyekwara ya nsọpụrụ onye isi ala The Order of Ikhamanga na ọla ọcha n'ihi 'Nkwado ya banyere ichekwa akụkọ ihe mere eme nke mba anyị site na nyocha na-enweghị isi na nke ziri ezi, na nchịkọta profaịlụ na ihe omume nke ọgụ maka nnwere onwe'
A mụrụ Badsha na Durban, KwaZulu-Natal n'ubochí irí abụọ na asaa n'ọnwa Juun n'afọ 1945
Ọ bụ ọgbọ nke atọ nke South Africa nke sitere na India ma si n'ezinụlọ Gujarati Muslim Sunni Bohra
Nna ya bụ Ebrahim Badsha bụ otu n'ime ndị ọsụ ụzọ ndị oji na South Africa na onye guzobere òtù Bantu, Indian, Coloured Arts (BICA) nke ndị na-ese ihe na Durban bịdọrọ n'afọ 1951
Mmasị nna ya nwere maka akwụkwọ edemede Arabic, ihe osise nke Cecil Skotnes na mgbe e mesịrị, na ndụ site na ọrụ Dumile Feni metụtara nka ya

Ná mbido afọ ndị 1960, Badsha mepụtara 'ihe ngosi mmegide' ma merie ọtụtụ onyinye gụnyere Sir Basil Schonland prize n'afọ 1965 na Oppenheimer award na afọ 1969 mgbe e gosipụtara ọrụ ya na Johannesburg ngosi Artists of Fame and Promise Ihe osise Badsha gosipụtara n'ọtụtụ ihe ngosi n'afọ 1970, e mere ihe ngosi izizi ya na Artists Gallery na Cape TownỌ ghọrọ onye na-emegide ịkpa ókè agbụrụ n'oge ọ nọ n'ụlọ akwụkwọ sekọndrị
Ọ bụ otu n'ime ndị na-eme ihe ike nke kpọlitere Natal Indian Congress n'oge afọ 1970s na otu ndị ọrụ aka ekpe nke sitere na mwakpo Durban a ma ama n'afọ 1973
Badsha guzobere ma bụrụ odeakwụkwọ mbụ nke Chemical Workers Industrial Union
N'oge a, a tụrụ ya mkpọrọ ma kpagbuo ya
A jụrụ ya paspọtụ ma ghara ikwe ka ọ gaa mba ọzọ ruo n'afọ 1990
N'afọ 1982, Badsha hiwere nzukọ agbụrụ dị iche iche Afrapix
Ha were foto ndị na-ese foto nke mmetụta na mmetụta nke ịkpa ókè agbụrụ na ebumnuche ịmepụta ọbá akwụkwọ foto na 'kpalite foto akwụkwọ'
N'afọ 1987, o nyere aka guzobe The University of Cape Town's Centre maka foto
Badsha bụ onye isi nke ngalaba foto nke Kọmitii Carnegie nke Abụọ na Ogbenye na Mmepe
Nnyocha ahụ chọrọ ịmegharị nsonaazụ nke nyocha izizi nke ụlọ ọrụ site n'inyekwu nnyocha banyere ịda ogbenye na South Africa nke ga-elekwasị anya na ndị ojii na ndị ọcha South Africa
E mere ihe ngosi nke foto ndị ahụ gụnyere na nyocha nke abụọ Carnegie Commission on Poverty and Development na Mahadum nke Cape Town
Badsha enweghị ike ịga mmeghe nke ihe ngosi ahụ ebe a tụrụ ya mkpọrọ
E mechara mee ihe ngosi ahụ na United States niile wee bụrụ akwụkwọ akpọrọ South Africa The Cordoned Heart
Ọ bụkwa onye guzobere South African History Online SAHO, nke ọ tọrọ ntọala n'afọ 1999 ọ bụ ebe nrụọrụ weebụ akụkọ ihe mere eme kachasị ukwuu na South Africa
Badsha na-agba ọsọ SAHO n'afọ 2009 ebe nrụọrụ weebụ ahụ meriri na South African NGO Coalition's NGO Web Awards na ngalaba nke Best Use of Social Web
Ọ bụ onye dere ọtụtụ akwụkwọ foto
Akwụkwọ mbụ ya na Fatima Meer dere bụ A Letter to Farzanah Ọ bụ Institute for Black Research, na Mahadum Natal bipụtara ya
A machibidoro akwụkwọ ahụ ozugbo e bipụtachara ya n'afọ 1979
Ọ dabeere na akwụkwọ ozi o degaara nwa ya nwanyị Farzanah
Akwụkwọ ahụ nwere foto iri isii na asaa nke ụmụaka ojii bi na apartheid South Africa tinyere isi akwụkwọ akụkọ

E bipụtara akwụkwọ ya Imijondolo A Photographic Essay on Forced Removals in the Inanda District of South Africa n'afọ 1985 Akwụkwọ ahụ sitere n'ike mmụọ nsọ site na ọrụ ya dị ka onye na-ahụ maka ihe banyere mgbanwe mmekọrịta mmadụ na ibe ya na Inanda informal settlement nke dị na mpụga Durban, South Africa
Omar El-Nagdi (1931-2019) bụ onye Egypt na-ese ihe ngosi na cubist na-ese ihe
N'ọnwa Machị 16, 2016, e rere ihe osise ya nke afọ 1992 Sarajevo maka $ 1,145,000
Omar Fetmouche (Arabic) (a mụrụ na Bordj Menaïel na 27 Eprel 1955) bụ onye Algeria na-ese ihe, onye na-eme ihe nkiri na onye na-ede egwuregwu
A mụrụ Fetmouche n'afọ 1955 n'obodo Bordj Menaïel na ala Kabylia, mgbe ọ gụsịrị akwụkwọ na obodo ya
Ọ gara Mahadum Algiers ebe ọ nwetara ikikere na French tupu ya edebanye aha maka nzere Magister na akwụkwọ French
Fetmouche malitere ọrụ nka ya site na okike n'afọ 1976 na Bordj Menaïel nke Menaïli ihe nkiri ihe nkiri n'ime usoro ihe nkiri amateur
N'ịbụ onye na-eche ihe ịga nke ọma nke ndị otu ihe nkiri ya ihu, o mepụtara n'afọ 1982 ụlọ akwụkwọ ihe nkiri a ma ama na Bordj Menaïel iji mee ka ndị na-eto eto nwee ịnụ ọkụ n'obi maka nka ihe nkiri
E kpuwere apotheosis nke ọrụ nka ya okpueze n'afọ 1990 mgbe o mepụtara ụlọ ọrụ nka 'Sindjab' n'obodo ya
Ihe ịga nke ọma ya na nka mere ka a họpụta ya n'afọ 1998 dịka odeakwụkwọ ukwu nke netwọk Algeria nke International Institute of Mediterranean Theater

N'ihu ọkachamara nke Fetmouche, a họpụtara ya n'ọnwa Ọgọstụ afọ 2004 dịka onye isi nke ụlọ ihe nkiri mpaghara nke Béjaïa na ọkwa nke Anna Lindh Euro-Mediterranean Foundation for the Dialogue Between Cultures
Fetmouche bụ onye otu ndị ọka ikpe maka mbipụta nke 42 nke National Amateur Theater Festival nke Mostaganem nke emere n'ọnwa June 2009

Ọ bụ otu n'ime ndị ọrụ nka a na-akpọ 'Network-Passerelles' nke ndị ọkà mmụta na ndị nkatọ nke nka na-eme ihe nkiri guzobere, ma duzie arụmụka n'oge 47th National Amateur Theater Festival of Mostaganem haziri n'ọnwa Mee afọ 2014
Ọ bụ otu n'ime ndị otu kọmitii na-ahazi 9th Arab Theater Festival nke mere n'ọnwa Jenụwarị afọ 2017 na Oran na Mostaganem
Fetmouche sonyeere ndị Sinjab na 14th National Professional Theater Festival (FNTP) nke a haziri n'ọnwa Machị 2021 na Algeria National Theater Mahieddine Bachtarzi (TNA) na Algiers
N'oge ọrụ nka ya, Fetmouche dere ọtụtụ ihe nkiri, gụnyere
E nyela Fetmouche onyinye maka mmepụta nka ya n'ọtụtụ ememme
Omar Kabbaj bụ onye ndụmọdụ nke Eze Mohammed VI nke Morocco kemgbe 22 June 2006
Ọ bụ onye isi oche nke African Development Bank site na 26 August 1995 ruo 1 September 2005

Tupu nke ahụ, ọ bụ onye otu ndị isi nke International Monetary Fund (1980–1993) na onye otu ndị isi nke World Bank (1979–1980) na onye nnọchi anya onye ozi na praịm minista nke Morocco, na-ahụ maka akụ na ụba, site na 1993 ruo 1995
Omar Kabbaj bụkwa Knight nke Order of the Throne of Morocco
O nwere nzere masta na njikwa na Toulouse Business School

Omar Kaboré (a mụrụ n'ụbọchị nke 30 n'ọnwa Ọgọstụ n'afọ 1993) bụ onye Burkinabé na-agba bọọlụ na Lusaka Dynamos na Zambia ebe ọ sonyeere dị ka onye nweere onwe ya site na CF Mounana
Kaboré sonyeere El Raja SC nke Egypt Premier League na Septemba 2017
Omar Khorshid (Arabic; April 9, 1945 May 29, 1981) bụ onye Egypt na-akpọ ụbọ akwara, onye na-agụ egwú, onye na'agụ egwú
A mụrụ ya na Cairo, Khorshid bụ onye a ma ama na-akpọ ụbọ akwara nke sonyeere ọtụtụ ndị na-agụ egwú, gụnyere Farid Al Atrash, Umm Kulthum, Mohamed Abdel Wahab, nakwa Abdel Halim Hafez
Dịka nwatakịrị, Khorshid kụziiri onwe ya violin, guitar na piano, nke mesịrị duga ya n'ụlọ akwụkwọ egwu onwe onye na etiti Cairo maka agụmakwụkwọ ọzọ
N'afọ 1966, Khorshid na ndị enyi ya guzobere otu egwu a na-akpọ 'Les Petits Chats' (The Small Cats), otu egwu na-akpọ egwu nke ụda ọdịda anyanwụ metụtara
Ìgwè ahụ na-egwuri egwu na obere ebe ma mesịa rụọ ọrụ ha n'ihe gbasara ịbụ ndị a ma ama n'Ijipt

N'ịgbaso ọgba aghara ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị Egypt; na afọ anọ site n'afọ 1973 ruo 1977, a manyere Khorshid ịhapụ ma kwaga Lebanọn wee malite idekọ abọm n'okpuru aha nke ya maka ụlọ ọrụ ndekọ Lebanọn dịka Voice of the Orient na Voice of Lebanon
Na-arụ ọrụ na injinia ọdịyo Nabil Moumtaz na Polysound Studios na Beirut, Khorshid rụsiri ọrụ ike iji nwee ọganihu n'ụdị egwu ya

N'afọ 1977, onye isi ala Egypt Anwar Sadat kpọrọ Khorshid ka ọ rụọ ọrụ na United States na White House maka onye isi ala America Jimmy Carter, n'otu n'ime emume nkwekọrịta udo n'etiti Egypt na Israel, ebe Korshid ji obi ụtọ nabata ọkpụkpọ òkù ahụ ma bụrụ otu n'ime ndị na-akpọ ụbọ na emume ahụ

Ọ bụ ezie na ọtụtụ ndị hụrụ arụmọrụ a dịka nke udo, ndị na-agbaso omenala na Middle-East bụ ndị hụrụ United States dịka ndị Zionist lere ya anya dịka omume na-ezighi ezi na ọtụtụ mba kwụsịrị mmekọrịta ha na Egypt mgbe nkwekọrịta udo ya gasịrị
N'afọ 1978, Khorshid nọrọ otu afọ na Syria, na-eme ihe nkiri ma na-eme n'ebe dị iche iche
N'afọ 1979, n'ihi ọchịchọ ka ukwuu maka mmezu ihe nkiri, Khorshid laghachiri n'ala nna ya bụ Egypt iji chụsoo ọrụ ihe nkiri
Ọ duziri ma mee ihe nkiri ma mee ihe ngosi ruo mgbe ọ nwụrụ n'afọ 1981
Khorshid na-asụ Arabic, French, na Bekee nke ọma
Ọ lụrụ nwanyị ugboro anọ
Mgbe ọ dị afọ iri abụọ na isii, ọ lụrụ nwanyị ọchụnta ego Egypt, Amina El-Sobky; alụmdi na nwunye ahụ dị site n'afọ 1971 ruo 1972
Ha abụọ gbara alụkwaghịm n'udo
Alụmdi na nwunye nke abụọ ya bụ onye Egypt na-eme ihe nkiri, Mervat Amin, alụmdi na nwunye ọzọ were otu afọ nke mechakwara na ịgba alụkwaghịm
N'oge na-adịghị anya mgbe nke ahụ gasịrị, Khorshid zutere nwanyị ọchụnta ego na Lebanọn aha ya bụ Dina ma ha malitere mmekọrịta; ha kwere nkwa ọlụlụ n'afọ 1975 wee lụọ na mbido afọ 1977
Otú ọ dị, mgbe ha ka lụrụ di na nwunye, Khorshid zutere onye Egypt na-ese ihe na onye bụbu onye na-agụ egwu Maha Abu Ouf n'oge ọ na-eme ihe nkiri ya na ndị Egypt Four M
Ha na-akpachi ibe ha anya, mgbe ha na Dina ka lụrụ, Khorshed lụrụ Abu Ouf na mbido afọ 1981
Abu Ouf dị ime mgbe e gburu Khorshid, ọ bụ ezie na ọ tụfuru ime mgbe ọ chọpụtara banyere ọnwụ ya
Na Mee 29, 1981, Khorshid na-akwọ ụgbọala na ọsọ ọsọ na El Haram Street na Giza, Egypt na nwunye ya nke atọ, Dina, mgbe Khorshid tụfuru ikike nke ụgbọala ahụ wee kụọ ọkụ ọkụ n'okporo ámá
Ọ bụ ezie na Dina nwere nnukwu mmerụ ahụ, ọ lanarịrị
A chụpụrụ Khorshid, mgbe ọ kụrụ, n'oche ya ma nwee mmerụ ahụ na okpokoro isi ya, olu ya, na ọkpụkpụ azụ ya, na-egbu ya ozugbo

Omar Sharif[lower-alpha 1] (Arabic عمر الشريف Egyptian Arabic pronunciation [ˈːomɑɾ eʃʃɪˈɾiːf]; a mụrụ Michel Yusef Dimitri Chalhoub , 10 Eprel 1932 ː 10 Julaị 2015) bụ onye Egypt na-eme ihe nkiri, nke a na-ewere n'ozuzu ya dịka otu n'ime ndị nwoke kachasị na fim na mba ya
Ọ malitere ọrụ ya na mba ya n'afọ ndị 1950, mana a maara ya nke ọma maka ngosipụta ya na British, American, French, na Italian productions
Ọrụ ya gụnyere ihe karịrị 100 ihe nkiri gafere afọ 50, ma wetara ya ọtụtụ otuto gụnyere Golden Globe Awards atọ na César Award maka onye na-eme ihe nkiri kacha mma

Sharif so Peter O'Toole rụọ ọrụ dịka Sherif Ali na David Lean epic Lawrence of Arabia (1962), nke mere ka a họpụta ya na Academy Award maka onye na-akwado ihe nkiri kacha mma, ma gosipụta ọrụ aha na Lean's Doctor Zhivago (1965), na-eme ka ọ nweta Golden Globe maka onye na'eme ihe nkiri kacha kyau
Ọ gara n'ihu na-eme ihe nkiri ịhụnanya, na ihe nkiri dị ka Funny Girl (1968) na The Tamarind Seed (1974), na ndị akụkọ ihe mere eme dịka ndị otu aha na Genghis Khan (1965) na Che! (1969)
Ọrụ ime ihe nkiri ya gara n'ihu ruo n'oge agadi, yana mgbanwe a nabatara nke ọma dịka onye Alakụba Turkish na ihe nkiri French Monsieur Ibrahim (2003)
O mere ihe nkiri ikpeazụ ya n'afọ 2015, afọ ọ nwụrụ

Sharif, onye aha nna ya pụtara 'onye a ma ama' ma ọ bụ 'onye a na-akpọ ama', a mụrụ Michael Yusef Dimitri Chalhoub (Arabic ) na Alexandria, Alaeze nke Egypt (nke bụzi Arab Republic of Egypt), n'ezinụlọ Melkite Catholic nke sitere na Lebanọn, na-eme ka ya na ezinụlọ ya bụrụ ndị Antiochan Greek Christian (nke a makwaara dị ka Rûm)
Nna ya, Yusef Chalhoub, onye na-ere osisi dị oké ọnụ ahịa, na nne ya kwagara n'ọdụ ụgbọ mmiri nke Alexandria na mmalite narị afọ nke 20 site na Zahle na Lebanọn
A mụrụ Sharif mgbe e mesịrị na Alexandria
Ezinụlọ ya kwagara Cairo mgbe ọ dị afọ anọ
Nne ya, Claire Saada, bụ onye ama ama na-elekọta ndị ọbịa, Eze Farouk nke Egypt bụ onye nleta oge niile tupu ewepụ ya n'afọ 1952
N'afọ 1954, Sharif malitere ọrụ ime ihe nkiri ya n'Egypt site na ọrụ na Sira' Fi al-Wadi (1954) ('Mgbalị na Ndagwurugwu')
Ọ nọkwa na Shaytan Al-Sahra ('Ekwensu nke Ọzara')

Ọ ghọrọ onye ama ama ngwa ngwa, na-apụta na Our Beautiful Days (1955), The Lebanese Mission (1956) (ihe nkiri French), Struggle in the Pier (1956), Sleepless (1957) ('[La Anam]'), Land of Peace (1957), Goha (1958) (ihe nkiri Tunisian nke gosipụtara mmalite nke Claudia Cardinale), Strugcle on the Nile (1958), A Beginning and an End (1960), A Rumor of Love (1960), Sayy al-Qasidat (1960), Anna Karenina adaptation The River of Love ('Nahr El Zul-H)
Ya na nwunye ya so mee ihe nkiri n'ọtụtụ ihe nkiri dị ka ndị na-ahụ n'anya

Sharif nwere ihe ịga nke ọma site na ihe nkiri ndị ọzọ dị ka Struggle on the Nile (1959), A Rumor of Love (1960), na There is a man in our House (1961), nke mere ka ọ bụrụ nnukwu onye na-asọ mpi na Salah Zulfikar, Shoukry Sarhan na Rushdy Abaza, ndị dike ihe nkiri Egypt n'oge ahụ
Sharif biri n'Egypt site na mgbe a mụrụ ya ruo mgbe ọ kwagara Europe n'afọ 1965
Ọ kọrọ na n'afọ 1932, nna ya 'abụghị nwoke bara ọgaranya', mana 'ọ nwetara ego buru ibu'
Tupu Mgbanwe Egypt nke 1952, Eze Farouk na-agakarị n'ụlọ ezinụlọ Sharif, wee bụrụ enyi na onye egwuregwu kaadị nke nne Sharif
Nne ya bụ onye ọbịa mara mma ma mara mma nke nwere obi ụtọ na njikọ ahụ n'ihi na o nyere ya ihe ùgwù nke 'ịkwado naanị ndị isi' nke ọha mmadụ Ijipt
Sharif kọwakwara na azụmaahịa osisi nke nna ya nwere ihe ịga nke ọma n'oge ahụ n'ụzọ Sharif kọwara dịka ndị na-adịghị akwụwa aka ọtọ ma ọ bụ omume rụrụ arụ
N'ụzọ dị iche, mgbe afọ 1952 gasịrị, Sharif kwuru na akụ na ụba gbanwere aka n'Egyptn'okpuru iwu mba Nasser na azụmahịa nna ya 'mere ihe'
N'afọ 1954, Sharif pụtara na ihe nkiri Struggle in the Valley na Faten Hamama, onye ya na ya nwekọrọ ọnụ ọ bụ ezie na ọ jụrụ isusu ọnụ na ihuenyo
Ha abụọ hụrụ onwe ha n'anya; Sharif ghọrọ onye Alakụba, gbanwee aha ya, wee lụọ ya
Ha nwere otu nwa nwoke, Tarek Sharif, amụrụ n'afọ 1957 na Egypt, onye pụtara na Doctor Zhivago dịka Yuri mgbe ọ dị afọ asatọ
Di na nwunye ahụ kewara n'afọ 1966 ma alụmdi na nwunye ha biri na ịgba alụkwaghịm n'afọ 1974
Sharif alụghị di ọzọ; o kwuru na mgbe ịgba alụkwaghịm ya gasịrị, ọ hụghị nwanyị ọzọ n'anya ọzọ
Tupu ịgba alụkwaghịm ha, Sharif lụrụ ndị na-eme ihe nkiri Pat Sheehan na Dodie Marshall
Omar Sharif Jr
(a mụrụ na 28 Nọvemba 1983) bụ onye Canada na-eme ihe nkiri, ihe nlereanya, onye edemede na onye na-agbachitere nwoke na nwoke nke bi na United States ugbu a
Sharif bụ nwa nke nne onye Juu Canada, Debbie, na nna onye Egypt, Tarek Sharif
Nne na nna nna ya bụ Omar Sharif na Faten Hamama, ha abụọ bụ ndị na-eme ihe nkiri n'Egypt nne na nna nna nna ya bu ndị Juu lanarịrị Holocaust
N'oge ọ bụ nwata, a na-ebugharị Sharif n'etiti Montreal, Paris, na Cairo
O nwere BA
site na Queen's University, Master's na Comparative Politics site na London School of Economics na nzere na Performing Arts site na Lee Strasberg Institute

Sharif arụwo ọrụ dịka onye na-eme ihe nkiri, na-apụta na 2000 Egyptian miniseries Wagh el qamar, 2005-6 French-asụsụ Canadian usoro Virginie, 2008 Egyptian film Hassan wa Morcus n'afọ 2016 Irish film The Secret Scripture
Mgbe ọ ghọrọ onye na-eme ihe nkiri, nna nna ya gwara ya, sị 'Anye m gị aha m, enye m gị ọdịdị m
Agaghị m enye gị ihe ọ bụla ọzọ
Ị ga-eme ya kpamkpam n'onwe gị
Ọ pụtara na ihe nkiri mkpirikpi nke afọ 2017 11th Hour, nke a họọrọ maka ngosipụta na TriBeCa Film Festival
Ọ rụkwara ọrụ dịka ihe nlereanya Ọ bụ ihu Coca-Cola maka ụwa Arabic ma pụta na nnukwu mkpọsa mbipụta Calvin Klein na Egypt
Ọ bụ onye na-eme ihe ngosi na 83rd Annual Academy Awards n'afọ 2011, n'oge ọ na-eme sketch na-atọ ọchị na Kirk Douglas
N'afọ 2012, Sharif pụtara dịka nwoke na nwoke na The Advocate, akwụkwọ akụkọ nwoke na nwoke

N'ịhụ na ntuli aka ndị omeiwu na-adịbeghị anya n'Egypt nwere ihe na-emebi ihe, o kwuru na ọhụụ nke nnwere onwe, nke hà nhata karịa Egypt bụ ọhụụ nke ọtụtụ ndị na-eto eto hụrụ mba ha n'anya nyere ndụ ha iji hụ na Tahrir Square
A na-ekwu na ọ bụ onye mbụ pụtara n'ihu ọha dị ka nwoke na-edina nwoke n'ihu n'ihu na Arab World
Nkwupụta ya dugara na nkatọ zuru oke na egwu ime ihe ike
Mgbe Sultan nke Brunei weputara iwu iji nkume nkume mee ka ndị na-edina nwoke ibe ha na Eprel 2019, Sharif Jr
mara ya aka ụbọchị ole na ole ka e mesịrị
Ọ bụrụ na Sultan ga-egbu nwa ya nwoke na-edina nwoke ibe ya, Sharif Jr
ga-egbu onwe ya
Ka ọ na-erule afọ 2012 ọ bi na Cairo, mana n'oge na-adịghị anya mgbe nke ahụ gasịrị, obi erughị ala banyere Egypt ọhụrụ, ọ hapụrụ mba ahụ
Ọ bi na Los Angeles ugbu a
A na-asọpụrụ ya dịka otu n'ime ndị na-eme ihe nkiri n'afọ 2012, '40 Under 40' nke The Advocate n'afọ 2014 na 2015, wee merie 'Inspiration Award' nke Attitude Magazine n'afọ 2016

Omawumi Megbele (a mụrụ n'ụbọchị nke 13 n'ọnwa Eprel n'afọ 1982), nke aha ya bụ Omawumi maara, bụ onye Naijiria na-agụ egwu na onye na-eme ihe nkiri nke agbụrụ Itsekiri Ọ bụ onye nnọchi anya Globacom, Kongacom, na Malta Guinness Ọ sokwa na mkpọsa a kpọrọ 'Rise with the Energy of Africa'
O nwetara nlebara anya dị ka onye na-esote 2007 na West African Idols, ihe ngosi TV nke akụkụ nke Idols franchise
A kọrọ na abọm nke abụọ ya, The Lasso of Truth, bụ ihe ịga nke ọma na azụmahịa na Naịjirịa
A mụrụ Omawumi na 13 Eprel n'afọ 1982 nye Chief Dr
Frank na Mrs
Aya Megbele
Ọ malitere agụmakwụkwọ ya na Nana Primary School n'oge ọ bụ nwa akwụkwọ, ma mesịa gaa College of Education Demonstration Secondary School
Ọ gụsịrị akwụkwọ na Mahadum Ambrose Alli na nzere iwu
Mgbe ọ gụsịrị akwụkwọ n'afọ 2005, ọ kwagara Port Harcourt, Rivers Steeti, ebe ọ rụrụ ọrụ na ụlọ ọrụ iwu ezinụlọ ya nke a na-akpọ 'OS Megbele & Associates'
Ọ gụkwara French na Alliance Francaise
Ọ lụrụ Tosin Yusuf na 13 Jenụwarị n'afọ 2018
Omawumi ghọrọ onye a ma ama dị ka onye asọmpi na Idols West Africa
A họpụtara Omawumi ka ọ bụrụ onye nke mbụ na asọmpi ahụ mgbe ọ kwụsịrị na Mee afọ 2007
Kemgbe ahụ, ya na ndị egwu dịka P-Square, 2face Idibia, Phyno, D'Banj, Banky W, MI, Sasha, 9ice, Chaka Demus na Pliers, Carl Thomas, Angie Stone na Donell Jones, Angelique Kidjo, tinyere ndị ọzọ
Na Septemba afọ 2008, Omawumi wepụtara egwu izizi ya 'In The Music'
E wepụtara abọm ya bụ Wonderwoman na Nọvemba 11, 2009
E wepụtara abọm The Lasso of Truth na Eprel 10, 2013
The Lasso nke Eziokwu
E wepụtara egwu ya bụ 'Lituation' na Mee 22 n'afọ 2020
ọ emepụtara abọm studio nke anọ ya nke akpọrọ Love Deep High Life (LDHL) ma nwee atụmatụ sitere na phyno, waje, Brymo, na Ric Hassani

Ọbụna tupu Omawumi amalite ọrụ izizi ya na ụwa nke ime-kwere, ọ na-etinyekarị ihe ngosi ọhụụ na ihe ndị dị egwu na vidiyo egwu ya nke n'aka nke ya, na-ewere ya dị ka onye ruru eru ịbụ onye na-eme ihe nkiri na ọrụ ihe nkiri nke bịara ya
Ọ malitere site na ọrụ na ogbo na mbipụta 2009 nke V-Monologues
Ọrụ edemede nke ezubere iji gosipụta nsogbu na mgba nke ụmụ nwanyị na Naịjirịa
O mechara gaa n'ihu nweta ọrụ na Olurumbi, akụkọ ọdịnala na egwu ndị Yoruba
O mere ihe nkiri izizi ya n'afọ 2010 na nnukwu mmefu ego AMAA award-winning film, Inale
Ọ pụtara nke abụọ ya na Ice Prince, na ihe nkiri Ghana akpọrọ 'House of Gold' nke Yvonne Nelson mepụtara ma Pascal Amanfo duzie na 2013
N'afọ 2019, ọ malitere ịbanye na mmepụta ihe nkiri ka ya na Waje sonyeere ọrụ na ọrụ ihe nkiri dị ka ndị na-emepụta ihe nkiri
‘She Is’ na-eme njem site na ụkpụrụ ọha mmadụ, atụmanya na mgbochi nwanyị Naijiria na-aga nke ọma na-eche ihu n'ime Naịjirịa
Ọ pụtara na ihe nkiri ahụ, ya na onye na-emepụta ya

Ombrotrophic ('igwe ojii na-enye nri'), site na Grik oge ochie ːaμβρος (ómvros) nke pụtara 'mmiri ozuzo' na τροφή (trofí) nke pụtara' nri'), na-ezo aka n'ala ma ọ bụ ahịhịa nke na-enweta mmiri na ihe oriri ha niile site na mmiri ozuzo, kama site na iyi ma ọ bụ isi iyi

A na-ekewapụ gburugburu ebe obibi dị otú ahụ site na ala gbara ya gburugburu, ebe ọ bụ na mmiri ozuzo bụ acidic na obere ihe na-edozi ahụ, ha bụ ebe obibi nke ihe ndị dị ndụ na-anabata acidic, ebe na-edozighị ahụ
Ahịhịa ahịhịa nke ombrotrophic peatland na-abụkarị ahịhịa, nke Sphagnum mosses na-achị

Mmiri mmiri nke gburugburu ebe obibi ndị a na-emetụta kpọmkwem na ihu igwe ha, n'ihi na mmiri ozuzo bụ mmiri na ihe oriri na-edozi ahụ, na okpomọkụ na-egosi otú mmiri si esi ngwa ngwa na-esi na usoro ndị a

Ọnọdụ ombrotrophic nwere ike ime ọbụna na ala ndị nwere limestone ma ọ bụ ihe ndị ọzọ na-edozi ahụ dịka ọmụmaatụ, n'ebe mmiri ozuzo dị elu, a ga-eji ahịhịa ahịhịa ombrotrophic acid kpuchie nkume limestone
Epiphytic ahịhịa (osisi na-eto eto na osisi ndị ọzọ) bụ ombrotrophic
N'adịghị ka gburugburu ombrotrophic, gburugburu minerotrophic bụ ndị mmiri na-esikarị na iyi ma ọ bụ isi iyi
Mmiri a agafeela ma ọ bụ site na nkume na-enwetakarị kemịkal ndị a gbazere agbaze nke na-ebuli ọkwa nri ma belata acidity, nke na-eduga na ahịhịa dị iche iche dị ka fen ma ọ bụ fen na-adịghị mma

Omeife bụ robot yiri nwanyị nke Uniccon Group of Companies mepụtara iji sụọ asụsụ na olu Pidgin, Yoruba, English, French, Arabic, Kiswahili, Hausa, Igbo na Afrikaans na robot humanoid mbụ nke Africa
A kpughere Omeife na n' ụbọchị iri n' ọnwa Ọktoba na afọ puku abụọ na iri abụọ na abụọ na mmemme nke teknụzụ GITEX na Dubai World Trade Centre, UAE
A na-ebu ụzọ chepụta robot Omeife na afọ puku abụọ na iri abụọ ma wuo ya dị ka nwanyị Igbo nke na-aghọta ma na-asụ asụsụ asatọ dị iche iche site na Uniccon Group of Companies
Ọ na-akwado site na algọridim ọgụgụ isi nke nwere nghọta miri emi banyere ọdịbendị Africa na ụkpụrụ omume
Ọ bụ nwanyị dị mita isii n'ogologo nke ebumnuche ya bụ inye asụsụ dị ka ọrụ maka azụmaahịa chọrọ ijikọ ndị na-ege ntị Africa
