Omenaala Igbo bụ, emume na ọdịnala nke ndị Igbo na ọdịda ọwụwa anyanwụ Nigeria
Ọ na-agụnye omume ndị gboo ya na echiche ọhụrụ ndị
agbakwunyere n' omenaala Igbo site na-okpukpe omenala ma ọ bụ site n'ọbịbia ndị ọcha
Omenala na ọdịnala ndị a gụnyere ihe ndị Igbo na-ahụ anya, egwu na-ite egwu, uwe ha, nri na asụsụ olu ndị
N'ihi ọtụtụ subgroups dịgasị iche iche, Omenaala ọdịbendị na-abawamye
Ndị Igbo nwere ọtụtụ ngwa egwu pụrụ iche na-asọ ụsọ ha na-eji egosipụta egwú ha bụ nke ha ji igwe arụpụta
Ngwa ndị ọzọ gụnyere opi, nke a na adị ka ọjà, igba, na ichaka
Egwu ọzọ na-ewu ewu n'etiti ndị Igbo bụ egwu highlife bụ nke gbadoro ụkwụ n'egwu Jazz na egwu omenala nke a na-ewu ewu na West Africa
Egwu highlife a gụnyere ọrụ ndi dika Prince Nico Mbarga Dr Sir Warrior, Oliver De Coque, Bright Chimezie, na Chief Osita Osadebe, ndị a bụ ụfọdụ na-eti egwu highlife n'oge senturi a

Ọ bụ ezie na taa ndị Igbo bụ Ndị ụka Kraịst, Okpukpe ndị gboo ka a na-akpọ Odinani
N'asụsụ Igbo, nke bụ akụkọ okpukpe ndi mgbe ochie, a na-akpọ Chineke kachasị elu Chukwu ('nnukwu mmụọ'); Chukwu kere ụwa na ihe niile dị na ya ma jikọta ihe niile dị n'ụwa
Mgbe ochie, ekere Ụwa ụzọ anọ dika nkwenye ndị igbo si di ma bụrụ ihe ịtụ n'anya
Alusị, nke a na-akpọ Arusi ma ọ bụ Arushi, bụ obere chi ndị a na-efe efe ma na-agọ agọ n' akụkọ ifo Igbo na nkwenye ndị igbo
Enwere ọtụtụ Alusi dị iche iche mana nke ọ bụla nwere ọrụ ọ na-arụ

Ejiji omenala Igbo ,nke ugbu a metụtara efe ụmụnwoke bụ efe isiagụ bụ nke ana- akwa ka Dashiki ndị Africa
Isiagụ (Ishiagụ) bụ ụdi akwa akpara isiagụ n'ahụ ya niile, Ọ na-achakarị oji, a na-ejikari uwe ụkwụ tụraọza na okpu echichi eyi ya mgbe ụfọdụ
(a fez aha ya bụ okpu agu ma ọ bụ agwu), maọbụ okpu ọdinaala (nke yiri Bobble hat )
Maka ụmụ nwaanyị, ejiji nke ha gunyere uwe obi akpara ihe nke nwere aka kpọfụ (nke ọbiaaia ndị ọcha Europe wetara) ma tinyere ukwu akwa abụọ(nke akpọrọ Hollandis) nakwa ịchafụ isi
Ụmụnwoke na Ụmụnwaanyị mezuru maọbụ tozuru etozu n'emume maọbụ ndozi obodo ka ana-echi Ọzọ maọbụ Nze

Omenka Gallery bụ ụlọ ngosi nka nke oge a na Naijiria, nke na-anọchite anya ndị na-ese ihe na Naijeria na mba ụwa na ebe ngosi ya na Lagos
Omenka Gallery tọrọ ntọala na steeti Lagos N'afọ 2003 site n'aka onye Naijiria na-ese ihe, onye nlekọta na onye nchịkwa nka Oliver Enwonwu
Nna Enwonwu, Ben Enwonwu (Ben Enwonwu), (1917-1994) bụ otu n'ime ndị isi Naịjirịa, narị afọ nke 20, ndị na-ese ihe nke oge a
Kemgbe afọ 2003, mmemme Omenka Gallery nke ihe ngosi onwe onye na nke otu ewebatala ọrụ ọhụrụ site n'aka ndị na-ese ihe na Naijiria na mba ụwa

Ihe ngosi, dị ka ihe ngosi nke N'afọ 2009, ihe ngosi nke dị omimi Nigerian photography, lekwasịrị anya n'ịzụlite ihe omume na nka nka nke Naijiria site na igosi amaghihe ọhụrụ, dị ka George Osodi (b1974), n'akụkụ ndị nna ukwu a ma ama dị ka JD

Asụsụ Ometo nke Etiopia bụ ụyọkọ olumba nke ezinụlọ Omotic, nke a na-anabatakarị dịka akụkụ nke ezinụlọ asụsụ Afro-Asia
Ha gụnyere asụsụ Omotic kacha nwee mmadụ, Wolaytta, nwere nde mmadụ abụọ na-asụ ya
Asụsụ ndị ahụ nwere ihe ruru nde anọ
Bender (2000) kewara ha dị ka,
Hayward (2003) gbakwunyere Basketo na Central Ometo wee kpọọ nsonaazụ 'North Ometo', ọnọdụ Blench sochiri ya (2006)
Blench (2006) depụtara ọtụtụ asụsụ North Ometo agbakwunyere, wee depụta Chara ka enweghị nkewa n'ime ezinụlọ
Ọ depụtakwara Balta, aha mpaghara maka Wolaytta, dị ka asụsụ enwere ike iche
Ommo Clark bụ onye nrụpụta sọftụwia Naijiria, onye ọchụnta ego nke nka, ọkà okwu ọha, onye isi na onye tọrọ ntọala nke iBez Nigeria

iBez Nigeria bụ ụlọ ọrụ teknụzụ amaala nke na-egbo mkpa nke azụmaahịa na ahịa na-apụta nke na-enweghị nchekwa, site na ịmepụta ngwa ngwanrọ na nyiwe ịntanetị ma na-azụkwa ndị mmepe ngwanrọ na usoro mmepe ngwanrọ
IBez bụ onye na-emepụta Handy-jack, otu na-ejikọta ndị omenkà na ndị na-ahụ maka ọrụ ọkachamara na ndị na-achọ ha
Clark bụ onye gụsịrị akwụkwọ na Mahadum London Guildhall UK ebe o nwetara nzere Bachelors (Hons) na nchịkwa azụmahịa
O nwekwara MSc na Information Systems si na Mahadum Brunel UK
Ommo nwere obere ọrụ na mmepe mba ụwa mgbe nke ahụ gasịrị, ọ rụrụ ọrụ dị ka onye na-ahụ maka nkwado ngwa na Real Asset Management UK
Ọtụtụ afọ ka e mesịrị, ọ sonyeere ụlọ akụ itinye ego, Lehman Brothers UK wee rụọ ọrụ dịka onye ndu otu na ngalaba nke Mortgage
Afọ anọ ka e mesịrị, ọ sonyeere ụlọ akụ Icelandic Investment Bank UK ka ọ hapụsịrị Lehman Brothers ebe ọ rụrụ ọrụ dị ka onye njikwa ọrụ IT
N'afọ 2008, ọ laghachiri na Naijiria wee soro ụlọ ọrụ ngwọta ngwanrọ rụọ ọrụ dịka onye isi nke nnyefe na nkwado ọrụ
Ọ sonyeere International Development Company dị ka onye Chief Operating Officer (COO) na 2012
N'afọ 2013, Ommo kpebiri ịmalite iBez Nigeria, ụlọ ọrụ nkà na ụzụ nke ya, iji kwalite na igosi ngwa ngwa ngwa nke emepụtara n'obodo a
Ngwaahịa nke iBez mepụtara gụnyere
Ommo si na laptọọpụ ya malite atụmatụ azụmahịa ICT ya
Omo-Love Branch (a mụrụ ụbọchị nke 10 n'ọnwa Jenụwarị afọ 1974) bụ onye egwuregwu bọọlụ Naịjirịa onye gbara bọọlụ dịka onye na-agbachitere ndị otu egwuregwu bọọlụ ụmụ nwanyị Naịjirịa
O so n'òtù ahụ na mmalite iko ụmụ nwanyị mba ụwa nke afọ 1991 nke FIFA yana iko ụmu nwanyị mba ụwa nke afọ 1995 nke FIFA
Princess Adenrele Ademola ma ọ bụ Omo-Oba Adenrele ademola (amụrụ n'afọ 1916) bụ nwa eze Naịjịria na nọọsụ
Ọ zụrụ dị ka onye nọọsụ na London n'afọ ndị 1930, ma nọgide na-arụ ọrụ n'ebe ahụ n'oge Agha Ụwa nke Abụọ
Ọ bụ isiokwu nke ihe nkiri, Nurse Ademola, nke Colonial Film Unit mere ma ugbu a a na-ewere ya dị ka furu efu
A mụrụ Omo-Oba Adenrele Ademola na Jenụwarị 2, 1916
Ọ bụ nwa nwanyị Ladapo Ademola, Alake nke Abeokuta
Ọ bịarutere na Britain na 29 June 1935, ma nọrọ na mbụ na ụlọ oriri na ọṅụṅụ nke West African Students Union na Camden Town
N'afọ 1937, ya na nna ya na nwanne ya nwoke, Adetokunbo Ademola gara nnọkọ ndị eze na Britain
Ọ gara ụlọ akwụkwọ na Somerset ruó afọ abụọ, na Jenụwarị 1938 amalitela ọzụzụ dị ka onye nọọsụ na Guy's Hospital
N'afọ 1941, ọ ghọrọ onye nọọsụ edebanyere aha na Guy's
O mechara nweta nzere Central Midwives Board, ma rụọ ọrụ na Queen Charlotte Maternity Hospital na New End Hospital
O doro anya na ndị ọrịa Ademola kpọrọ ya 'fairy' dị ka okwu ịhụnanya
'Onye ọ bụla nwere obiọma n'ebe m nọ', ka ọ gwara ndị nta akụkọ n'oge ahụ
N'afọ 1948, ya na onye ọchụnta ego Adeola Odutola na-eme njem
A maghị ọrụ ya mgbe afọ 1940 gasịrị

Omo Ghetto (nsụgharị Bekee Child of the Ghetto ) bụ ihe nkiri mpụ na-atọ ọchị nke Niajiria nke afọ 2010 nke Naijiria nke Abiodun Olarenwaju duziri, nke Funke Akindele, Rachel Oniga, Taiwo Hassan, Yinka Quadri na Eniola Badmus sonyere
Olusegun Michael nke Modern Ghana toro Ndịna akụkọ a, ndị nsonye, isiokwu na nkọwa nke ọrụ na fim ahụ, na-akọwa ya dị ka ihe nkiri 'n'akụkụ ihe, na-atọ ụtọ na nke na-ekpughe ihe'
Na 2017, Azeezat Kareem maka Encomium Magazine depụtara Omo Ghetto dị ka otu n'ime ihe nkiri abụọ chawapụ̀tara Eniola Badmus n'isi na ụlọ ọrụ ihe nkiri Naijiria
E tinyekwara ya na ihe nkiri Legitng ise ' nke Funke Akindele akacha echeta
Usoro ihe nkiri ahụ akpọrọ Omo Ghetto The Saga pụtara n'abalị iri abụọ na ise nke ọnwa Disemba ,2020
Omo Ghetto The Saga akpọkwaara dị ka Omo Ghetto 2 bụ ihe nkiri Niajiria nke a'ewepụtara n'afọ 2020 bụ ihe nkiri ntọchi nke ndị otu ama ama,nke Funke Akindele na JJC Skillz so duzie
Ndị gosipụtara agwa n'ihe nkiri a bụ Funke Akindele, Chioma Akpota, Nancy Isime, Eniola Badmus, Bimbo Thomas, Deyemi Okanlawon na Mercy Aigbe na ndị isi ọrụ
Nke a bụ ihe nkiri nke abụọ na franchise Omo Ghetto ma bụrụkwa usoro ihe nkiri 2010 bụ Omo Ghetto

Esekwara ụfọdụ akụkụ ihe nkiri ahụ na Dubai, United Arab Emirates nke mmepụta ihe nkiri ahụ n'ihi ọrịa COVID-19 nyere ya ihe ịma aka n'ihu
E gosikwara onye na-agụ egwu ama ama Naira Marley n'ime ihe nkiri a na-eme ihe nkiri na mpụta mbụ site na ihe nkiri a
Yemi Alade, onye na-agụ egwú mekwara ihe ngosi mbụ site n'ihe nkiri a ma rukws ọrụ dị mkpa
N'ime izu nke abụọ ya, ihe nkiri ahụ gara n'ihu n'eru ogo dị elu ndekọ ụlọ ọrụ site n'itinye ihe karịrị otu nde naịra na iri atọ na abụọ na ụma anọ

wee nọrọ n'ogo kacha n'igbe ego ụlọ ọrụ nke Nigeria wee weta mkpokọta izu abụọ ya na ndekọ ego nde narị naịra atọ na iri abụọ na abụọ wee tinye ya dị ka ihe nkiri nke anọ kachasị elu iweta ego n' ihe nkiri Nigeria

N'ime izu nke atọ ya, n'agbanyeghị na ọ hụrụ mbelata nke pacenti iri anọ na atọ site na izu gara aga, Omo Ghetto ka nọ n'ogo dị elu n'igbe ụlọ ọrụ wee nweta nde naịra iri asaa na ise n'achịkọta mgbakọta ya ịbụ nde narị naịra atọ na iri iteghete na asatọ ka izu atọ gachara
Omo Ghetto wuru ewu nke mere na ọ ruru ihe dịka pacenti iri isii na ise na nke igbe ụlọ ọrụ na Nigeria
Omo Ghetto gara n'ihu na-achị n'ogo n'ụlọ ọrụ igbe Naijiria, na-ebili ruo nchịkọta nde naira iri anọ na ise ,n'ụma ise

O wetara ọnụ ọgụgụ igbe ụlọ ọrụ ruru nde narị naira anọ na iri anọ na anọ, n'ụma ise nke ya ihe nkiri Nollywood nke abụọ kacha enweta ego mgbe naanị izu anọ gachara, Omo Ghetto the saga bụ ugbu a ihe nkiri Nigeria kacha enweta ego nke bụ nde pụrụ nde 468,036,300 naanị ihe karịrị otu ọnwa

Omo Ghetto gara n'ihu na-achị igbe ụlọ ọrụ n'ime izu nke ise ya na-enweta narị atọ na ise, n'ụma asaa wee weta mkpokọta ya nde narị naịra anọ na iri asato n'ụma ise wee bụrụ ihe nkiri Nollywod kacha enweta ego n'oge niile n'agbanyeghị ọrịa COVID-19
N'akụkọ ihe gara aga, ọ ghọrọ ihe nkiri Nigeria mbụ nwetara nde narị naịra ise n'igbe ụlọ ọrụ Nollywood
eweta mkpokọta ya ka ọ bụrụ nde narị naịra ise na iri atọ na iteghete , n'ụma isii

Omo Ghetto meriri igbe ọrụ n'izu nke asatọ, itoolu na nke iri n'otu n'otu wee bụrụ naanị ihe nkiri nke abụọ na n'ogige Ọdịda Anyanwụ nke Afrika n'asụ asụsụ bekee gafere nde narị naịra isii ka Black Panther gachara

Omobola Olubusola Johnson (onye amuru na 28 June 1963) bu Nigerian technocrat na Honorary Chairperson of the global Alliance for Affordable Internet (A4AI) obubu Minister nke na fu maka ngbasa ozi na oge nki President Goodluck Jonathan
Ogara akwo na International School Ibadan ya na University of Manchester (BEng, Electrical and Electronic Engineering) na King's College London (MSc, Digital Electronics)
Onwere nzambodo na Business Administration n ime Cranfield University
Tupu emeya manager,obubu managing director na accenture, Nigeria
kembe 1985 óruru oru na accenture na oge obubu Andersen Consulting
Johnson bu onye izizi bidoro ulo olo communication technology ministrybu nke ekewaputara dika agenda nke edozighari obodo
Johnson so we bido organization nke umu nyeanyi, WIMBIZ na 2001
oweta otutu onyinye sitele na aka ndi obodo n ime 2011

nka sotere ike nile opara mana ike kasha puta ihe bu mmepe nne anapo NigComSat-IR Satellitenka eyeneaka nikwanitere nbo obodo anyi na agba igi humaka nmekorita site na ihe mbasa ozi na ikuku ministiri a nwere umu akwukwo ndi sekondiri di nari asaa komputa ka ha we guakwukwo nihi omumu aporo; school access programme(asp)ebe mahaduna otu na irieteoru na ato na obodo anyi nubua were ikike intenet ugbua site na tertiary institution access programme (tiap) na kwa community di otu nari iriano na isi nwetara ebe nzikorita ozi di iche iche na obodo nigeria
Omolabake Adenle ( amụrụ 1982) bụ onye injinia, onye ọchụnta ego na onye nhazi n'ihe gbasara ego
Ọ bụ onye tọrọ ntọala ma jidekwa ọkwa Chief Executive Officer (CEO) nke AJA
LA Studios, ụlọ ọrụ na-enye ọsịsa nye nsogbu nke dijitalụ maka asụsụ Africa

Adenle chepụtara ma meputa ngwa 'SpeakYoruba App' nke nwetara ya ihe nrite na Diversity, Equity and Inclusion (DEI) in Voice site na Women In Voice (WiN) 2021 e wee depụtakwa aha ya maka ihe nrite Innovation Foundation nke Africa Innovation for Africa ( IPA) na 2017
Omolabake Adenle nwere PhD
na Injinia sitere na Mahadum Cambridge, UK
A mụrụ Adenle na Lagos Steeti, o tolitekwara na Lagos Steeti, Naijiria
Adenle na-amụ PhD na Bayesian Signal Processing si na Mahadum Cambridge ebe ọ bụ National Science Foundation Graduate Research Fellow na Tau Beta Pi Honors Fellow

Mgbe ọ gụchara akwụkwọ ya, Adenle rụrụ ọrụ Morgan Stanley ọrụ dị ka osote onye isi ala ha maka atụmatụ ọnụọgụ na usoro ihe, mgbe ahụ, ọ na-arụ ọrụ n'onwe ya n'ịrụ ngwa sọftụwia mmụta asụsụ Africa, nke a kpugheere ya na ngalaba nhazi asụsụ maka ndị Africa na ndị ọzọ dị ala
asụsụ
O mechara malite AJA

Omolade Akinremi (onye amuru na abali iri-na ato n’ime onwa itolu afọ 1974) bu onye lara ezumike nká na eme ọsọ egwuregwu na Naijiria
O sonyere na nfanye 400 mita nke ụmụ nwanyị na 1996 Summer Olimpik
Omolara Omotosho (amuru 25 Mee 1993 na Akure, Nigeria ) bu onye oso na Naijiria nke ọpụrụiche na 400 mita
Ọ nọchitere anya Naịjirịa na asọmpi Summer Olimpik nke afọ 2012
Ihe kacha mma nkeonwe ya na mmemme ahụ bụ 5128 sekọnd (Calabar 2012)

2 Akwụsịla ya na ọkara ikpeazụ
Omololu Falobi (1971-Ọktoba 5, na afọ 2006) bụ onye nta akụkọ Naijiria, na onye na-ahụ maka ọrịa AIDS
N'afọ 1997, o guzobere JAAIDS
E mepụtara Omololu Falobi Award n'aha ya
N'afọ 1998, o guzobere JAAIDS, otu na-abụghị nke gọọmentị na-achịkọta ndị nta akụkọ si n'akụkụ niile nke mba ahụ iji kụziere ndị mmadụ banyere ihe ize ndụ nke ọrịa AIDS na otu esi egbochi ya
N'afọ 2004 na afọ 2005, ọ bụ onye nnọchi anya na bọọdụ nke Joint United Nations Programme on HIV / AIDS
E gburu ya n'Oktoba 5, na afọ 2006 na Lagos, n'ihe dị ka elekere iri nke ehihie; ọ ka hapụrụ isi ụlọ ọrụ ya na Lagos
A na-ekwu na ndị gburu ya sooro ya ma gbaa ya égbè ọtụtụ ugboro
Ọ lụrụ Aderonke Falobi ma bụrụ nna ụmụ atọ, Ayomide, Olamide, na Aramide Falobi
Omondi Abudho (a mụrụ n'ụbọchị nke 15 n'ọnwa Mee n'afọ 1982) bụ onye Kenya na-ese foto / onye nduzi mgbasa ozi
Ọ na-ese Afrịka na ndị ya foto
Omondi Abudho (a mụrụ n'ụbọchị nke 15 n'ọnwa Mee n'afọ 1982) bụ onye Kenya na-ese foto / onye nduzi mgbasa ozi
Ọ na-ese Afrịka na ndị ya foto
Ọ gara ụlọ akwụkwọ praịmarị na Kibuye na Kisumu City, Sekondiri Skool na Kisumu Boys High School, Tertiary Training na Buruburu Institute of Fine Arts na Higher learning na Daystar University
A kpọrọ CV nhazi igbe ya otu n'ime mmegharị okike kachasị mma nke afọ 2009 ma họrọ otu n'ime CV kachasị okike n'oge niile
O kwuru na o chere echiche ahụ mgbe ọ na-azụ kọfị
Mmalite ndụ na mmụta
A mụrụ Oboli na Benin City, Edo State
O bụ nwa Mosogar na Delta State
Omoni Oboli gụrụ Asụsụ Mba Ọzọ (nke hiwere isi na French) na Mahadum Benin, ebe o nwetara nturu ugo na nsọpụrụ (Nkewa nke klaasị nke abụọ di elu)
Omoni malitere ọrụ ihe nkiri ya na fim mbụ ya na Bitter Encounter (1996), ebe ọ pụtara dika odeakwụkwọ
Ọ gaziri n'ihu n'ihe nkiri n'ibụ nwanyi no na isi n'ihe nkiri atọ buru ibu; Not My Will, Destined To Die na Another Campus Tale
Mgbe o nwetachara ọnụ na obere oge o tinyere na orụ fim na 1996, Omoni hapụrụ ọrụ ihe nkiri iji wee gụchaa mahadum
Ọ lụrụ di ozugbo ọ gụchara akwụkwọ nke na o laghachighi azụ na ọrụ ruo mgbe afọ iri gachara

Omoni nwere ọtụtụ ihe ngosi na mbọ ọ gbara, nke tinyere ihe nkiri ya bụ Wives On Strike ya na The Rivals, ihe nkiri ya na enyi ya mepụtara ma nweta ihe nrite maka ejije kacha mma na mba ofesi na New York International Independent Film na Video Festival
Ọ bụ ihe nkiri Naịjirịa izizi emere kemgbe emume mmemme fetivalụ bidoro na 2003[Tinye edensibịa] E nyere ihe nkiri ahụ kpakpando-atọ site na aka mmadụ anọ ndi mmemme ikpe
[Tinye edensibịa]
Omoni putara ihe na otutu ihe nkiri dika onye ji isi oru nke gunyere The Figurine (2009), Anchor Baby (2010), Being Mrs Elliot, na Fifty (2015)
Ọ bụkwa nwanyị mbụ na-eme ihe nkiri siri Nollywood nwetara nturu ugo onye kachasi mma na ejije na emume festivalu mba uwa abuo, (nke ndị Naijiria ma ọ bụ ndị Africa na-ahazighị), n'otu afọ (2010)
Nke a ka o mere na Harlem International Film Festival na ihe nkiri nturu ugo nke Los Angeles Movie Awards maka onye isi na ihe nkiri ya na Anchor Baby
Na afọ 2010, o ritere ihe nrite maka onye ejije kacha mma na Best Actress Narrative Feature na Los Angeles Movie Awards, ya na onyinye maka okacha mma naHarlem International Film Festival
A hoputara Omoni maka onye Kachasị Mma na Africa Movie Academy Awards
Na afọ 2014, o ritere okacha mma na nwanyi na-eme ihe nkiri na afo nke Big Screen, na 2014 ELOY Awards, maka ihe nkiri ya bụ Mrs Elliott
Na afo 2015, Omoni ritekwara onyinye ndi Sun Nollywood “Personality of the Year”
O duziri otutu ihe nkiri dika Being Mrs Elliott, The First Lady, Wives on Strike, na Okafor's Law
Na 14 Ọgọstụ 2017, Omoni Oboli weputara na ihu instagram ya nkesa okwu ozi gosiputara oru ohuru ya dika Brand ambassador nke Olawale Ayilara LandWey Investment Limited
Omoni Oboli pụtara na ihe nkiri Iwu Okafor , nke bidoro na abali iri na abuo nke Machị 2017
Makaosiladi, e nweghị ike i gosiputa ihe nkiri ahụ ka oru izizi n'ihi na ụlọ ikpe nyere ikike injunction
E boro Oboli ebibo ida iwu ederede infringement site n'aka Jude Idada onye kwuru na ya dere otu akụkụ akuko Okafor's Law
E mepụtara ihe nkiri ahụ na 31 Machị na afọ 2017

Omoni Oboli guzobere otu ụlọ ọrụ ebere, 'The Omoni Oboli Foundation ' iji ọkwá ya dị ka onye a mara ama n'ihe nkiri i wetara enyemaka dị mkpa maka ọnọdụ nke ụmụ nwanyị na ụmụaka ndị uwa na-atu n'onu na obodo Nigeria
Ntọala ahụ a bigidera enweela ike ịmalite ọtụtụ ọrụ nke gụnyere ihe ndị a
Omony o bụ aha nna
Ndị ama ama nwere aha nna gụnyere
Tolulope ' Jordan ' Omogbehin ( bu onye amuru na onwa May 16, n'afo 1994) bu onye mgba mgba nke Naijiria-Amerika ma burukwa onye bubu onye egwuregwu basketball na koleji
Ọ bịanyere aka na ya ugbu a na WWE, ebe ọ na-arụ ọrụ na Raw brand n'okpuru aha mgbanaka Omos
Ọ gbara maka Mahadum South Florida na Mahadum Morgan State, yana ọrụ basketball kọleji ya sitere n'afo 2014 ruo n'afo 2015
Omogbehin bịanyere aka na WWE na Jenụwarị 2019
Ọ bụbu onye mmeri Raw Tag Team na WWE, ji AJ Styles jide aha n'oge ọkọchị nke 2021
Omogbehin bu onye amuru na onwa Mee 16, n'afo 1994 na Lagos, Nigeria

Mgbe ezinụlọ ya kwagara United States, Omogbehin gara ma gụchaa akwukwo ya na Atlantic Shores Christian School na Chesapeake, Virginia, oge n'ile ono na ụlọ akwụkwọ sekọndrị, ọ na-egwu rgwu basketball ma gaa n'ihu na egwuregwu ahụ mgbe ọ họọrọ ịga Mahadum South Florida ebe ọ na-egwuri egwu na ọnọdụ etiti
Omogbehin na-ekwu na ya zutere dike basketball Hakeem Olajuwon n'oge njem otu USF Bulls na Houston, Texas na 2014
Omogbehin sokwa na-egwuregwu basketball na Morgan State University na Baltimore, Maryland ka o si na USF gafere; ọ gbara etiti maka Morgan State Bears site n'afo 2014 ruo n'afo 2015
E deputara na akwukwo ozi na onwa nke mbu na Jenụwarị n'afo 2019, na WWE bịanyere aka na Omogbehin na ndị egwuregwu isii ndị ọzọ ka ha zụọ na WWE Performance Center
Na onwa Julaị 18, n'afo 2019, Omogbehin mere mpụta mbụ ya n'ime mgbanaka n'oge ihe ngosi ụlọ nke Julaị 18, na-emeri otu 20 n'egwuregwu nkwarụ abụọ na otu
Ọ ga-anọgide na-agba mgba na ihe ngosi ụlọ n'ime ọnwa ndị na-esote
Na onwa June 15, n'afo 2020, o mere mpụta ihe onyonyo ya n'oge mmemme Mọnde Night Raw, ebe egosipụtara ya dị ka onye otu n'anya nke otu ninja nke Akira Tozawa

N'igosi dị ka onye kachasị ogologo na ngalaba ahụ, a kpọrọ Omogbehin naanị dị ka 'Giant Ninja' ka ọ na-eguzo na ringside n'oge mkpado otu Tozawa megide The Street Profits na The Viking Raiders, Otú ọ dị, a ga-eweghachi ya dị ka onye nche obere oge ka nke ahụ gasịrị, na-eje ozi dị ka onye nche ọnụ ụzọ na bouncer nke Shane McMahon 's Raw Underground
N'onwa Ọktoba n'afo 2020, ka akagbuchara Raw Underground, Omogbehin malitere ịkpakọrịta na AJ Styles wee guzobe onwe ya dị ka ikiri ụkwụ
Na Survivor Series, Omogbehin ji aha mgbanaka ọhụrụ Omos wee bata

Na TLC Tebụl, Ladders na Chairs, Omos tinyere aka na WWE Championship egwuregwu na ụkpụrụ dị iche iche, na-egbochi The Miz iru aha na idobe ya na tebụl etinyere n'èzí mgbanaka tupu ịchụ John Morrison n'azụ
Na Royal Rumble, n'oge egwuregwu Royal Rumble 2021, Omos tinyere onwe ya site n'igbochi AJ Styles na oge ole na ole
Omos kpochapụrụ Big E na Rey Mysterio n'agbanyeghị na ọ nọghị na egwuregwu ahụ
Ọ ga-aga n'ihu na-enyere ndị Styles aka ịbanye n'egwuregwu mkpochapụ n'oge tupu onye ọrụ WWE Adam Pearce chụpụ ya

Na onwa Machị 15, n'afo 2021, ihe omume nke Raw, Omos kwupụtara na ọ ga-eme mpụta mbụ ya na televishọn na mgbanaka WrestleMania 37 n'akụkụ Styles megide The New Day ( Kofi Kingston na Xavier Woods ) maka WWE Raw Tag Team Championship
Na mmemme ahụ, Omos na Styles meriri The New Day wee nweta aha ha, ka Omos jiri ogbunigwe kpagbuo Kingston wee tụnye ya
Na SummerSlam, Omos na Styles tụfuru Raw Tag Team Championship na aka RK-Bro ( Randy Orton na Riddle )
Na Oke Iwu, Omos na Styles jikọtara ya na Bobby Lashley iji merie na New Day na egwuregwu 6-man tag otu egwuregwu, nke Styles, Omos na Lashley furu efu
Mgbe nke a gasịrị, a mara ọkwa na Styles na Omos ga-eche RK-Bro ihu na rematch maka aha otu mkpado na Crown Jewel
Na mmemme ahụ, ha enwetaghachighị aha ndị ahụ
Na Survivor Series na onwa Nọvemba 21, n'afo 2021, Omos sonyeere n'agha eze nwere akara mmadụ iri abụọ na ise iji sọpụrụ ncheta afọ 25 nke mpụta mbụ nke Rock na 1996 Survivor Series
Omos nwere mkpochapụ kachasị na 12 wee merie egwuregwu ahụ site na iwepụ Ricochet na ikpeazụ

Mgbe izu ụka nke esemokwu dị n'etiti ya na Styles, gasiri na onwa December 20, n'afo 2021 episode of Raw, Omos jụrụ mkpado n'ime egwuregwu ha megide Rey Mysterio na Dominik Mysterio, nke a furu ha egwuruegwu n'ikpeazụ
Ọgụ dara n'etiti ha abụọ, kwụsị njikọ ha nke ọma mgbe Omos tụgharịrị ihu AJ Styles ugbu a
Na onwa Jenụwarị 3, n'afo 2022 ihe omume nke Raw, otu izu mgbe kewasịrị na Styles, e hiwere egwuregwu n'etiti ha abụọ, ebe Omos meriri Styles

Na onwa January 29, na Royal Rumble, Omos banyere aha egwuregwu aha na oge mbụ na ọrụ ya dika nọmba 11, ebe ọ kpochapụrụ Montez Ford, Angelo Dawkins, na Damian Priest tupu e wepụ ya site na Styles, Austin Theory, Chad Gable, Dominik Mysterio, Ricochet na Ridge Holland
Omogbehin maara nke ọma n'ịsụ bekee na French
Omosede Gabriella Igbinedion bụ onye ọkaiwu Naijiria na onye ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị
A mụrụ Igbinedion na mmalite 1980s n'ime ezinụlọ nke Esama nke alaeze Benin
Nna ya bụ Ichie Gabriel Igbinedion
Ọ gara Igbinedion Education Center, ebe ọ nọ de ule asambodo ụlọ akwụkwọ sekọndrị (SSCE) na 1998
Ọ gara mahadum Cambridge dị na United Kingdom ebe ọ nweta nzere A-Level wee nweta nzere bachelọ nke iwu (LL
B) sitere na Mahadum Kent na 2003
O nwetara akara ugo mmụta masters na ọmụmụ diplomatic na Mahadum Westminster na 2005
Ọ laghachiri Naijiria wee gaa ụlọ akwụkwọ iwu Naijiria, ma kpọọ ya na Bar na 2007

A hoputara Omosede dika nwatakiri nwanyi n'ime ogbako nke asato nke ulo nnochi anya Naijiria (Nigeria) na 2015, ebe o na-anọchite anya ogbe ovia Federal nke mejuru Ovia North-East na Ovia South-West Local Government Area nke Edo State n'okpuru n'usoro ochichi Peoples Democratic Party (PDP)

Ọ bụ osote onyeisi oche ụlọ enyemaka na Ụlọ Nnọchiteanya na onye so na ndị na-esonụ kọmitii Mpaghara Content, Aviation, Downstream Petroleum, FCT, Judiciary, Rural Development, umunwanyi na nzuko omeiwu
Omosede lụrụ Aven Akenzua afọ abụo, onye eze Benin na nwa nwa Akenzua II
Ha nwere otu nwa nwoke
Omoseye Bolaji bụ onye edemede Naijiria nke nyere aka na uto nke akwụkwọ Afrịka na Saụt Afrịka, ọkachasị na Free State
Bolaji abụrụla onye nchịkọta akụkọ nke akwụkwọ South Africa gụnyere Free State News, Kopanang magazine, E and E magazine, na CHOICE magazin
Bolaji tolitere na England, Nigeria, na Sierra Leone
Ọ gara ụlọ akwụkwọ sekọndrị na Lagelu Grammar School na Ibadan, Nigeria, ma mesịa gụọ akwụkwọ na Mahadum Obafemi Awolowo nke Naịjịrịa

Ndị nyocha nke akwụkwọ Bolaji (na ụfọdụ n'ime ọmụmụ ndị e bipụtara n'okpuru ebe a) na-ekwu na ndị edemede dịka Sidney Sheldon, Dick Francis na Agatha Christie emetụtawo ya nke ukwuu,Ha bụ ndị na-egosipụta ihe a na-atụghị anya ya na ọrụ ha

Maka ihe atụ na Impossible Love, otu nwoke na-adọrọ mmasị na mberede hụrụ onwe ya n'anya n'amaghị ama na nwa ya nwanyị n'amaghị ama; na People of the Townships, ụmụ okorobịa na-agụ akwụkwọ abịawo nwee ọmịiko n'ikpeazụ kpughere dị ka onye na-egbu ọchụ na-enweghị obi ọjọọ; na Tebogo Investigates, nwa agbọghọ mara mma, nke nwere obi ụtọ na-aghọ onye na-egbu mmadụ n'enweghị obi
Nnyocha ndị e bipụtara na ọrụ edemede Omoseye Bolaji bụ Omoseye Bolaji Ihe odide ya / ọrụ ya dị ka ihe mkpali maka FS Writing
Site n'aka Pule Lebuso (2001); Omoseye Bolaji Echiche na ọrụ edemede ya
Site n'aka Flaxman Qoopane (2003); Omoseye Bolaji Channelling one's thoughts onto paper
Site n'aka Charmaine Kolwane (2005); Tebogo on the prowl a study of Omoseye Bolaji's series of books based on private sleuth, Tebogo Mokoena
Site n'aka Petro Schonfeld (2006)
The Triumph (2007) ISBN 978 - 0 - 620 - 38207 - 6 nke Urbain Tila dere, na-akọwapụta ihe omume n'abalị gala ebe Omoseye Bolaji natara Lifetime Achievement Award

Nnyocha ndị e mere n'oge na-adịbeghị anya banyere ọrụ edemede ya gụnyere Omoseye Bolaji Further perspectives (2009) nke Julia Mooi, OMOSEYE BOLAJI (2010) nke Hector Kunene, na BOLAJI IN HIS POMP (2013) nke Pule Lechesa

Ihe nrite na nsọpụrụ Bolaji gụnyere Onye edemede egwuregwu nke Afọ (2000), site n'ikike nke Eclectic Writers Club of Bloemfontein; onye natara onyinye Community Publishing Project (CPP) (2003) site na Cape Town's Centre for the Book; Free State Author of the Year (2003) maka akwụkwọ akụkọ ya, People of the Townships; Asambodo maka ide akụkọ ifo na-adọrọ adọrọ (2006), site n'ikike nke Phoenix Literary Club, Ladybrand; na 'Lifetime Achievement Award' (2007) site na Free State Department of Sport, Art and Culture
N'ọnwa Septemba afọ 2007, Mahadum nke Free State nyere Omoseye Bolaji ihe nrite Chancellor, iji kelee onyinye ya na ịgụ na ide na akwụkwọ
Olubadan nke Ibadanland na Naịjirịa enyewokwa Bolaji ọkwa onye isi Afrịka, ọzọ maka onyinye ya na akwụkwọ Afrịka
N'afọ 2009, obodo Mangaung kwanyeere ya ùgwù 'N'ịghọta onyinye bara uru maka akwụkwọ na Free State'
E nyere Bolaji ihe nrite Lifetime Achievement ọzọ na Mbali Literary Awards (2012) na Clocolan
A na-asọpụrụ Omoseye Bolaji na 'Exquisite Calabash' na Ikire, Nigeria (2020)
Omotade Alalade (amụrụ c
1985) bụ onye ọchụnta ego na- elekọta mmadụ na Naijiria na ọkachamara gbasara nsogbu amụghị nwa
Ọ bụ onye nhiwe na onye isi oche Beibei Haven Foundation, ọgbakọ na-abụghị nke gọọmentị na-enye nkwado ọmụmụ nye ụmụ nwanyị na ndị di na nwunye
A mụrụ Omotade dị ka Omotade Sadare na Marina, Lagos steeti, Nigeria
Ọ gara ụlọ akwụkwọ praịmarị na sekọndrị na Legọs wee gụọ akwụkwọ na mahadum Lagos State University
N'ihi ahụmahụ nke onwe ya na mgba ndụ Alalade gabigara na-amụghị nwa, ime, ime ọpụpụ na ọnwụ nwa ọhụrụ, o kere ụlọọrụ Beibei Haven Fertility Foundation nke a na-anaghị akwụ ụgwọ
Ntọala ahụ na-enye nkwado maka ụmụ nwanyị na ndị di na nwunye na-agbalị ịtụrụ ime
Ntọala ahụ na-enyekwa onyinye na nkwado nye ezinụlọ ndị na-ahụ maka mfu nke afọ ime ma ọ bụ ndị na-enweghị ọmụmụ
Omotade lụrụ Funmilade Alalade na 15 October 2011
Dị ka Omotade si kwuo, ka ọ lụchara, ọ chọpụtara na ya na di ya bụ ndị bu ọrịa sickle cell anaemia
Nke a pụtara na ha nwere ike ịmụ ụmụ nwere ọrịa sickle cell anaemia
Di na nwunye ahụ nwere ọtụtụ mgbalị ịtụrụ ime site na IVF, bụ nke na-akpasu iwe

Na Nọvemba 2018, ka ọ na-ekwuputa akụkọ akaebe ya, o dere site na profaịlụ Instagram ya, 'Mgbe m mefuru ihe karịrị nde naira iri na otu na ọgwụgwọ IVF mụ na di m mechara jiri ejima mezuo ezinụlọ anyị'
Omotayo Akinremi (a mụrụ na ụbọchị iri na atọ, ọnwa Septemba afọ 1974) bụ onye Naijiria bụrụkwa onye gbara oso ya na ọsọ ihe mgbochi n'oge gara aga
Ọ sonyere na asọmpi nke mba ụwa n'egwuregwu ịgba ọsọ ebe ọ nochitere anya Naịjirịa

O nwetara ihe nrite ọla edo n'asọmpi asọmpi afọ 1992 na 1993 nke Afrịka n'asọmpi egwuregwu mita narị anọ, o nwetakwara ọla nchara na mmemme afọ 1990, na n'egwuregwu Africa niile nke 1991 ọ nwetara nrite ọla n'asọmpi mita narị anọ
Emily merikwara na mita 200 na asọmpi egwuregwu egwuregwu Oceania afọ 2000
Ọzọkwa, o sonyeere n'otu egwuregwu ndị ọsọ mgbagharị nke 4 × 400 obodo Naijiria bụ ndị nwetara ihe nrite ọla na 1993 Summer Universiade na Olabisi Afolabi, Omolade Akinremi na Onyinye Chikezie

Omotayo Aramide Oduntan (amụrụ na ọnwa isii na-afọ 1957),bụ nwa-afọ obodo Naijiria na onye ndọrọ-ndọrọ ọchichi na-anọchite anya Alimosho II konstituenci na ụlọ ome-iwu Lagos Steeti na okpuru ndi otu ndọrọ-ndọrọ All Progressives Congress
A mụrụ ya na Lagos State, Southwestern Naijiria, ebe ọnọrọ na-agum-akwụkwụ primari na sekọndiri
Onwere asambado na ihe gbasara idozi na ijikwa nri site na Royal Institute of Public Health

Olụrụ ọlụ dika onye enyemaka Govanọ Lagos Steeti na ihe gbasara ime-obodo mgbe ọ na-alụ dika onye ome-iwu na ụlọ ome iwu Lagos Steeti site na-afọ 1999-2003 na-afọ 2011-2015 Ọ na-eje ozi ugbua dika Chief Whip na 8th Assembly nke ụlọ ome iwu Lagos steeti
Asụsụ Gimojan
Asụsụ Omotic bụ otu asụsụ a na-asụ na ndịda ọdịda anyanwụ Etiopia, na mpaghara Osimiri Omo
A na-eji edemede Ge'ez dee ụfọdụ asụsụ Omotic, edemede Latin maka ụfọdụ ndị ọzọ
Ha na-agbakọta ọnụ ma nwee usoro ụda dị mgbagwoju anya (dịka ọmụmaatụ, asụsụ Bench)
Asụsụ ndị a nwere ihe dị ka nde mmadụ 62 na-asụ ya
A na-ahazi ìgwè ahụ n'ozuzu ya dị ka nke ezinụlọ asụsụ Afroasiatic, mana ụfọdụ na-arụ ụka na nke a
Glottolog 40 na Güldemann (2018) nabatara otu 'Omotic' anọ dị iche iche Ta-Ne-Omotic, Dizoid (Maji), Mao, na Aroid ('South Omotic')
A na-amata alaka North na South Omotic ('Nomotic' na 'Somotic') n'ụwa nile, na-enwe arụmụka ụfọdụ gbasara nhazi nke North Omotic
Nrụrịta ụka bụ isi bụ maka ntinye asụsụ Mao
Bender (2000) na-ahazi asụsụ Omotic ka ndị a
Ewezuga okwu okwu, nke a dị iche na Fleming (1976) n'ịgụnye asụsụ Mao, onye njikọ ya na mbụ na-arụrịta ụka, na n'ịkagbu otu 'Gimojan'
[Nkọwa dị mkpa] Enwekwara ọdịiche dị na subclassification nke Ometo, nke anaghị ekpuchi ebe a
Hayward (2003) kewapụrụ asụsụ Mao dị ka ngalaba nke atọ nke Omotic wee kewaa Ometo–Gimira
Blench (2006) na-enye nhazi agnostic
Bosha† akpák akpák; Ethnologue depụtara ya dị ka olumba Kafa mana o kwuru na ọ nwere ike ịbụ asụsụ dị iche
A na-ahụta Omotic ka ọ bụrụ ngalaba dị iche iche nke asụsụ Afroasiatic
Greenberg (1963) ekewapụtala ya dị ka ngalaba Cushitic nke ọdịda anyanwụ

Fleming (1969) rụrụ ụka na kama ekwesịrị ka ekewa ya dị ka ngalaba nọọrọ onwe ya nke Afroasiatic, echiche nke Bender (1971) guzobe na afọ ojuju ọtụtụ ndị ọkà mmụta asụsụ, n'agbanyeghị na ndị ọkà mmụta asụsụ ole na ole na-edobe ọnọdụ Cushitic West ma ọ bụ na ọ bụ naanị South Omotic na-etolite alaka dị iche
, ebe North Omotic fọdụrụ na Kushitic
Blench (2006) kwuru na Omotic na-ekerịta okwu metụtara mmanụ aṅụ na ndị ọzọ nke Afroasiatic mana ọ bụghị okwu metụtara ehi, na-atụ aro na nkewa ahụ mere tupu ọbịbịa nke ịzụ atụrụ
Ndị ọkà mmụta ole na ole welitere obi abụọ na asụsụ Omotic bụ akụkụ nke ezinụlọ Afroasiatic ma ọlị, na Theil (2006) tụrụ aro ka a na-emeso Omotic dị ka ezinụlọ nwere onwe ya
Agbanyeghị, nkwenye n'ozuzu, dabere n'ụzọ bụ isi na ihe akaebe morphological, bụ na etinyere otu onye na Afroasiatic nke ọma
Hammarström, et al
na Glottolog anaghị ewere Omotic ka ọ bụrụ otu jikọrọ ọnụ, ma ọ naghị ewerekwa otu ọ bụla n'ime otu 'Omotic' ka ọ bụrụ akụkụ nke phylum Afroasiatic
Glottolog na-anabata ihe ndị a dị ka ezinụlọ asụsụ nwere onwe
Güldemann (2018), onye na-enwe obi abụọ banyere ịdị irè nke Omotic dị ka otu
Bender (1987), na-eweghachi ụdị ndị a maka Proto-Omotic na Proto-North Omotic, nke ikpeazụ nke a na-ewere na ọ sitere na Proto-O motic

Omotola Jalade Ekeinde mụrụ Omotola Jalade, (amuru 7 Febuwari 1978) bu Onye omee Naijiria Kemgbe ihe nkiri Nollywood mere mpụta mbụ na 1995, Omotola apụtala na ihe nkiri 300, na-ere ọtụtụ nde ihe nkiri a na akpọ vidio

ka ha nwetasịrị ọtụtụ ihe nrite dị elu, malite ọrụ egwu, na ịkpakọba ndị na-akwado ndị na-anụ ọkụ n'obi, ndị nta akụkọ akpọwo ya dị ka ezigbo Afrika MagicOmotola bụ onye mbụ ama ama n'Afrịka nwetara mmasị karịrị otu nde na ibe Facebook ya

Ebumnobi Omotola na mbụ bụ ịrụ ọrụ na njikwa azụmaahịa, ebe ọ na-eche nsonaazụ ya na mahadum, ọ malitere ime ihe ngosi iji kpata ego

Akpọbatara Omotola Jalade ka ọ na-eme ihe nkiri site n'iso otu enyi ya gaa ebe nkiri

Omotu Bissong (onye amụrụ Cecilia Ohumotu Bissong ) bụ onye ihe nlere anya ndi Naijiria, onye nlere onyonyo, na onye na eme ihe ejije, a kacha mara ya dika Funke Lawal na ndi Desperate Housewives Africa
Ọ bụ nwa afọ Yala, Cross River State
Bissong malitere ọrụ nlere anya ya mgbe ọ bụ nwata
Ọ gara ụlọ akwụkwọ Nigerian Navy Primary school na Nigerian Navy Secondary school, ha abụọ di na obodo Navy [Navy Town, Lagos], nke ikpeazụ ka ọ gụsịrị mgbe ọ dị afọ iri na anọ
O mechara debanye aha ya dịka nwa akwụkwọ nke Mahadum Calabar ebe ọ gụrụ Economics

Na 2003, Bissong - dika e si akpọ ya mgbe ahụ ka Celia Bissong - mere ihe akụkọ site na ịbụ onye mbụ nwetara akara Nwanyị Kachasị Mma na Naijiria siri na South-South (Ọ bụ ezie na Regina Askia nwere aha ahụ na afọ 1989, mana ọnwetachaghi mmeri ahụ n'ezie)
Ihe ikpo okwu ya bụ ime ka amara maka ọria HIV/AIDS, na nkwalite njem nleta Tourism, ma ọchichi ya buru ya ga asọmpi na Miss Universe na Miss World
Bissong rụrụ ọrụ dị ka ihe nlere na Nigeria tupu ọ kwaga America, ebe ọ debanyere aha ya na ụlọ ọrụ ihe atụ ọzọ ka ọ na-agụ Accounting na City University of New York

Na ajụjụ ọnụ nke ndi The Vanguard na 2008, Bissong katọrọ ịkpa oke megide ndị ojii na arụ ọlụ ihe nlele na ụlọ ọrụ ejiji America, ma kwetakwa na ọ na-echebiri asọmpi siri ike[Tinye edensibịa] Mgbe ọ laghachitere Naịjirịa, ọ mepere ụlọ ọrụ na-ahụ maka ihe nlere iji wee weghachite ọkachamara na ụlọ ọrụ ahụ
Kemgbe ọ laghachiri na obodo ya na 2009, Bissong arụola ọrụ na telivishọn, na-egosi The Peak Talent Hunt Show, na Africa Awakes na DSTV

Dị ka onye na-eme ihe nkiri, Bissong nọ na ihe nkiri Ghanaian bụ Be My Guest yana Nadia Buari na Chris Attoh, ọ nọkwa ugbu a sonyekwara ejije nke Africa nke Desperate Housewives dị ka nne nọ n'ụlọ na Funke Lawal nke dabere na Lynette Scavo na usoro mbụ
Omowale Akintunde bụ onye African-American na-ede akwụkwọ, onye nduzi ihe nkiri na agụmakwụkwọ nwere mmasị na mpaghara agụmakwụkwọ, agbụrụ, na ọdịiche

Ọ bụ onye isi oche nke Ngalaba Ọmụmụ Ndị Ojii na Mahadum Nebraska na Omaha site n'afọ 2008 ruo 2011 ma nọrọ na kọmitii nchịkọta akụkọ nke Journal of the National Association for mmụta omenala dị iche iche
N'afọ 2010, Akintunde natara Emmy Award maka ihe nkiri ogologo oge An Inaugural Ride to Freedom nke ọ duziri

Akintunde dekwara ma duzie ihe nkiri Wigger (2010) nke na-agbaso ndụ nke 'onye ọcha onye ntorobịa na-enweghị ike nke nwere nna Nazi na ezigbo enyi bụ onye ojii,' onye na-anabata ndụ na ọdịbendị ndị Afrịka na Amerịka
A mụrụ Omowale Akintunde na Disemba 20, 1956 (née Darrell Vincent Lewis) nye Sir Alfred Lewis, onye ọrụ nzipu ozi, na Annie Lewis (née Woods), onye na-elekọta ụlọ
Akintunde gụsịrị akwụkwọ na Williamson High School na Mobile, Alabama n'afọ 1974
E nyere ya ihe nrite uru agụmakwụkwọ na Mahadum Alabama State ebe ọ gụrụ akwụkwọ na agụmakwụkwọ egwu ma bụrụ onye otu egwu Marching Hornets a ma ama
N'ebe ahụ, ọ ghọkwara onye otu Gamma Beta nke Phi Beta Sigma fraternity

Mgbe ọ gụsịrị akwụkwọ na Mahadum Alabama State n'afọ 1979, magna cum laude, Akintunde kụziri ụlọ akwụkwọ elementrị na New Orleans, Louisiana O jere ozi site n'afọ 1981 ruo 1984 na Ndị Agha ndị United States
Ụlọ ọrụ ikpeazụ ya bụ na Fort Meade, Maryland
Mgbe ọ gachara ọrụ agha, e goro Akintunde dị ka onye nkuzi egwu ụlọ akwụkwọ sekọndrị na Anacostia Senior High School na Washington DC
N'ebe ahụ, ndị otu ya nwetara ọdịiche site n'igosi ya na akụkọ dị na Washington Post ma dekọọ abọm ndekọ n'okpuru nduzi ya
Akintunde kụzikwaara na Forestvilleụlọ akwụkwọ sekọndrị na Forestville, Maryland
N'afọ 1992, Akintunde nwetara agụmakwụkwọ iji gụọ akwụkwọ maka nzere masta na Mahadum Alabama State
Mgbe ọ natara nzere Master of Music Education otu afọ ka e mesịrị, e nyere ya Gus T
Ridgel fellowship iji gụọ akwụkwọ doctoral ya na Mahadum Missouri-Columbia
A kpọrọ akwụkwọ doctoral ya mmetụta maka iji egwu rap mere ihe nkụzi ntuziaka nke ụdị egwu ya na ụmụ akwụkwọ sị mba Afrịka-Amerika n'obodo mepere emepe
Ọ bụ na Mizzou ka Akintunde sitere n'ike mmụọ nsọ site n'aka onye ọkà mmụta Africa-American Sunidata Chajua ịgbanwe aha ya site na Darrell Vincent Lewis gaa Omowale Achebe Akintunde
N'ikpeazụ, ọ natara ihe nrite maka nkụzi pụrụ iche nke Anderson na onyinye ụmụ akwụkwọ gụsịrị akwụkwọ kachasị elu
Mgbe ọ gụsịrị akwụkwọ na Mizzou na PhD
na usoro ọmụmụ na ntụziaka summa cum laude n'afọ 1996, Dr
Akintunde nabatara nhọpụta prọfesọ mbụ ya na Mahadum nke Wyoming dị ka osote prọfesọ na College of Education
N'ebe ahụ, ọ rụkwara ọrụ dị ka onye isi oche nke Ngalaba Mmụta Africa-American
N'afọ 2003, Dr
Akintunde ghọrọ prọfesọ na Mahadum nke Southern Indiana ebe ọ nwetara ọrụ
N'afọ 2007, a nabatara Akintunde na New York Film Academy na Universal Studios na Los Angeles, California ma hapụ ya ka ọ gụọ akwụkwọ n'ebe ahụ na ezumike
Mgbe ọ na-agụ akwụkwọ n'ebe ahụ, Akintunde zutere Meshach Taylor, onye na-eme ihe nkiri Emmy-award na kpakpando nke usoro telivishọn Designing Women
Taylor ghọrọ onye ndụmọdụ na ezigbo enyi Akintunde ma ga-arụ ọrụ dị ukwuu n'ịkwalite ọnụnọ ya na ụwa ihe nkiri
Taylor kwetara ka ọ bụrụ onye na-eme ihe nkiri Akintunde, Wigger, ọrụ ọ ga-emegharị na nsụgharị ihe nkiri ahụ
Mgbe ọ gụsịrị akwụkwọ na New York Film Academy, Akintunde nabatara ọkwa dị ka onye isi oche nke Ngalaba Black Studies na Mahadum Nebraska, Omaha
N'afọ 2008, Akintunde mepụtara ma duzie ihe nkiri mbụ ya, 'An Inaugural Ride to Freedom'
E wepụtara ihe nkiri a n'afọ 2000 wee nata Emmy ihe nrite maka omenala akwụkwọ akụkọ kacha mma
A tọhapụrụ Wigger n'afọ 2010, ya na onye nkatọ ihe nkiri Leo Biga dere na nyocha na 'Wigger sonyeere Omaha's A Time for Burning na ịghọ ihe nkiri abụọ kachasị mkpa na agbụrụ
' Onye ndụmọdụ Akintunde ọzọ, Bill Duke haziri nyocha mbụ na Los Angeles
N'afọ 2013, Akintunde mepụtara ma duzie ihe nkiri okporo ụzọ nke abụọ na-echeta nraranye nke abụọ nke Barack Obama na ihe nkiri mbụ ya na PBS iji kwanyere ihe omume ahụ ùgwù
N'afọ 2018, Akintunde lara ezumike nká na Mahadum Nebraska wee bụrụ onye ndụmọdụ oge niile na onye na-eme ihe nkiri
Ọrụ ya kachasị ọhụrụ bụ akụkọ ifo na-echere Sissy Killer (Trafford Publications) na sitcom pilot, It Takes a Village, nke onye na-eme ihe nkiri oge ochie bụ Ernest Harden, Jr
Akintunde na-eme ihe nkiri na pilot nke o dekwara, mepụta, ma duzie
Omowunmi Dada bụ onye na- eme ihe nkiri Naijiria, nke a kacha mara amara maka ọrụ ya dị ka Folake na usoro onyonyo M-Net Jemeji

Ọ só na ihe nkiri asụsụ Yoruba 2017 Somewhere in the Dark, bụ nke meriri ihe nrite maka ihe nkiri kacha mma na 2017 AMVCA Awards, na nke ọ nwetara nhọpụta maka onye na-eme ihe nkiri kachasị mma na Ọrụ Nkwado (Yoruba) na Onyinye kacha mma nke Nollywood na 2017
N'afọ 2018, Dada kwuru okwu jiri olu nke agwa na ihe nkiri ngosi ogologo oge mbụ nke Nigeria, Sade
Omowunmi Dada bụkwa onye nka olu, onye ngosi na ihe nlereanya
Onye na-eme ihe nkiri nwere nkà na-achọ ịbụ onye nduzi ihe nkiri na onye mmepụta otu ụbọchị
Ọzọkwa, ọ bụ onye nnọchi anya akara maka Jumia Nigeria

A mụrụ Dada na steeti Legọs, ebe ọ gara ụlọ akwụkwọ Ifako International Nursery na Primary maka ụlọ akwụkwọ praịmarị ya, n'oge ahụ, ọ ghọrọ onye otu ndị Yoruba Cultural Troupe ; Ọ gara Command Day Secondary School, Oshodi, maka agụmago akwụkwọ sekọndịrị ya wee mụọ Creative Arts na Mahadum Lagos
Dada malitere ọrụ ime ihe nkiri, na-ewere obere akụkụ na egwuregwu ogbo mgbe ọ nọ na mahadum
Ihe ngosi izizi n'ala ihe isi o mere bụ na egwuregwu Moremi Ajasoro, nke Femi Oke duziri

N'afọ 2013, ọ malitere ọrụ ihe nkiri ya na ihe nkiri Oya n'akụkụ onye na-eme ihe nkiri Naijirịa bụ Tunji Sotimirin, wee gaa n'ihu n'ime ihe nkiri ndị ọzọ ama ama gụnyere Kunle Afolayan duziri Omugwo n'akụkụ Patience Ozokwor na Ayo Adesanya
N'afọ 2018, a tụbara Dada n'ọrụ Sade, na ihe nkiri ogologo oge mbụ nke Nigeria akpọrọ SADE nke edobere maka mwepụta na 2019
Na Desemba 2017, ahọpụtara ya maka onye nkiri kacha mma na afọ na Nigeria site na meriri-ihe nrite Nigerian fonye na-emeputa ihe nkiri na nkatọ, Charles Novia
Dada bụ onye nnọchi anya maka ụmụaka Daivyan Cancer Foundation nke na-akwado maka mmata na nkwado maka ụmụaka nwere ọrịa kansa
Ọ bụkwa onye nnọchi anya Brian Wotari Foundation nke lekwasịrị anya na itinye aka na ime ka ndụ ndị ntorobịa baa ọgaranya
Omowunmi Akinnifesi (amụrụ na Disemba 4, 1987) bụ nwanyị Naijiria na-azụ ahịa na onye nnọchi anya gburugburu ebe obibi na Lagos

A mụrụ nwa nwanyị nke onye bụbu onye isi ụlọ akụ Central Bank of Nigeria, Akinnifesi na 4th nke Disemba, 1986 na Lagos mana ọ nọrọ afọ mbụ ya na Sierra Leone tupu ya na ezinụlọ ya alaghachi obodo ya bụ Nigeria
Ọ gara Queen's College, Yaba, ebe o ritere ọtụtụ ihe nrite maka ọrụ nka ya

N'afọ 2008, Akinnifesi gụsịrị akwụkwọ na Mahadum nke Lagos na nzere na Geography na Regional Planning, N'afọ 2012, Akinnifesi nwetara nzere masta na Environmental Monitoring, Modelling, na Management na King's College London

N'afọ 2005, Akinnifesi dị afọ iri na asatọ bụ onye e chiri nwa agbọghọ kachasị mma na Naịjirịa, nke mere ka o ruo eru ịnọchite anya mba ya na Miss World Pageant na China n'otu afọ ahụ, ebe ọ na-arụ ọrụ ịkụ osisi maka gọọmentị China
Akinnifesi pụtara onye nke mbụ na nsụgharị Naijiria nke Strictly Come Dancing, Celebrity Takes 2 tupu ọ malite mmekọrịta ọha na eze ya na azụmahịa Elle Poise
A na-eto Aknnifesi dị ka akara ngosi ejiji n'afọ ndị na-adịbeghị anya, a na-asọpụrụ ya na 2011 Allure Style Awards
Ọ bụ n'oge a ka o kpughere na ọ nwetara mgbasa ozi afọ isii nke iyi egwu site n'aka onye na-eme ihe ike
N'afọ 2016, Akinnifesi wepụtara akara uwe ya nke akpọrọ, 'Omowunmi'
Àtụ Miss World 2005 delegates
Omowunmi 'Wunmi' A
Sadik (amuru 19 June 1964) bu onye okachamara Naijiria, onye na-echeputa kemist na onye na-emepụta ihe na-aru oru na Mahadum Binghamton
O mepụtala microelectrode biosensors maka nchọpụta ọgwụ na ihe mgbawa ma na-arụ ọrụ na mmepe nke teknụzụ maka imegharị ion ígwè site na mkpofu, maka iji na gburugburu ebe obibi na ngwa mmepụta ihe
N'afọ 2012, Sadik kwadoro otu Sustainable Nanotechnology Organisation nke anaghị akwụ ụgwọ
A mụrụ Sadik na 1964 na Lagos, Nigeria
Ezinụlọ ya gụnyere ọtụtụ ndị ọkà mmụta sayensị, bụ́ ndị kwadoro mmasị ya na physics, kemistri, na bayoloji
Ọ nwetara nzere bachelọ na kemistri na mahadum Lagos n'afọ 1985, wee nweta akara ugo mmụta masters na chemistry n'afọ 1987
Sadik wee gaa mahadum Wollongong dị n'Australia
Na 1994, ọ nwetara PhD
nzere na kemistri si Wollongong
Mmekọrịta postdoctoral sitere na National Research Council kwadoro ya dị ka onye nyocha na US Environmental Protection Agency site n'afọ 1994 ruo 1996
Ọ natara ọkwa dịka osote prọfesọ kemịkalụ na Mahadum Binghamton dị na Binghamton, New York
A kwalitere ya ka ọ bụrụ prọfesọ na-akpakọrịta n'afọ 2002, na prọfesọ zuru oke n'afor 2005
N'oge ahụ, ọ ghọkwara onye nduzi nke Center for Advanced Sensors & Environmental Systems (CASE) na Binghamton
Ọ na-eleta ngalaba na ngalaba nyocha Naval, Mahadum Cornell na Mahadum Harvard
Sadik na-amụ elu kemịkalụ, na-elekwasị anya na mmepe nke biosensors maka ojiji na kemịkalụ gburugburu
Ọ chọpụtala na ndị na-eduzi polymer na-ekwe nkwa karịsịa maka iji na-achọpụta ngwa
Ọ ewepụtala microelectrode biosensors nke nwere mmetụta na-achọpụta ọnụọgụ akụrụngwa, teknụzụ nke enwere ike iji maka nchọpụta ọgwụ na bọmbụ
Ọ na-amụkwa usoro mkpofu ihe mkpofu dị ka ogige organochlorine na gburugburu ebe obibi, na ebumnuche nke ịmepụta teknụzụ maka imegharị ion ígwè site na mkpofu ụlọ ọrụ na gburugburu ebe obibi
N'otu ọrụ, enzymes microbial mụbara ngbanwe nke chromium (VI) na-egbu egbu na chromium na-adịghị egbu egbu (III) site na 40% ruo 98%
A nabatara Sadik na akwụkwọ nyocha na ngwa patent karịrị 135 ndị ọgbọ nyochara
Ọ na-ejide patent US na ụfọdụ ụdị biosensors
N'afọ 2011, ọ bụ onye isi oche nke ọgbakọ mbụ Gordon Conference on Environmental Nanotechnology
N'afọ 2012, Sadik na Barbara Karn kwadoro Sustainable Nanotechnology Organisation, nke na-abụghị uru, ọha ọkachamara mba ụwa maka iji nanotechnology eme ihe n'ụwa niile
Sadik bụ onye a họpụtara na Royal nzuzo of Chemistry (2010) na nke American Institute for Medical and Biological Engineering (2012 họpụtara)
Ọ bụkwa onye otu American Chemical Society
Ọ na-etinye aka na Ụlọ ￼Ọrụ Hebe gburugburu ebe obibi na National Science Foundation, ma bụrụ akụkụ nke National Institutes of Health Study Panel on Instrumentation and Systems Development
Ọ na-etinye aka na mmekorita mba ụwa na UNESCO International Center of Biodynamics na Bucharest, Romania, Mahadum Ege na Turkey, na Mahadum Fukui na Japan

N'ụbọchị nke atọ n'ọnwa Ọgọstụ n'afọ 2019 ndi oru nchekwa steeti Naịjirịa (SSS) jidere Sowore maka ebubo ịgba ọchịchị mgba mgbe ọ kpọsịrị maka ngagharị iwe akpọrọ RevolutionNow E jidere ya ọzọ ma tie ya ihe n'oge ngagharị iwe na Abuja na Jenụwarị 1, 2021
Onye uwe ojii merụrụ Sowore ahụ n'oge ngagharị iwe na Abuja na Mee 31, 2021
Yele Sowore si Ese-Odo, Ondo Steeti na South West Nigeria
A mụrụ Sowore na mpaghara Niger Delta nke Naijiria (nke gụnyere steeti isii na mpaghara South-South, Ondo, Abia na Imo Steeti) ebe a zụlitere ya n'ụlọ nwere ụmụ iri na isii
Mgbe ọ dị afọ iri na abụọ, ọ mụtara ịnya ọgba tum tum ka o wee nwee ike ịga ọdọ mmiri ahụ ịga azụ maka nri maka ezinụlọ ya dum kwa ụtụtụ tupu ọ gaa ụlọ akwụkwọ
Mmasị na ọchịchọ Sowore na ihe gbasara mgbasa ozi kpaliri n'oge ochichi ndi agha na Naijiria

Sowore gụrụ Geography na Planning na Mahadum nke Lagos site na 1989 ruo 1995 na mmemme agụmakwụkwọ ya gbakwunyere afọ abụọ ọzọ mgbe a chụpụrụ ya ugboro abụọ n'ihi emume ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị na ụmụ akwụkwọ
Ọ bụ onye isi oche nke Mahadum nke Lagos Student Union Government n'afọ 1992 ruo 1994 ebe o tinyere aka na mmegide otu nzuzu na mmegide nrụrụ aka
Sowore nwere nzere masta na Public Administration na Columbia University
N'afọ 1989, o sonyere na ngagharị iwe ụmụ akwụkwọ na-eme ngagharị iwe maka ọnọdụ ego International Monetary Fund (IMF) biiri Naijiria bu $120 nde iji mee ihe maka pipeline mmanụ ụgbọala
Tinyere n'ime ọnọdụ nke ego IMF, bụ mbelata ọnụ ọgụgụ mahadum na Naịjirịa site na 28 ruo 5
Sowore duru ụmụakwụkwọ 5,100 mee ngagharị iwe megide ọchịchị Naijiria na 1992
Mkpesa a mere ka ndị uwe ojii jiri mgbọ wee gbuo ndị ngagharị iwe asaa
E jidere Sowore ma taa ya ahụhụ
Omoyele tinyekwara aka n'ịchọ ka gọọmentị onye kwuo uche ya weghara ọchịchị ndị agha na June 12, 1993
Nke a butere ọtụtụ njide nga na mmeso ndị na-eyi ndụ egwu site n'aka ndị ọrụ gọọmentị
Na Jenụwarị 12, 2017, ndị uwe ojii na Lagos Steeti jidere Sowore n'ihi mkpesa nke onye na-ebipụta magazin, Lekan Fatodu
Ka e mesịrị n'uhuruchi nke otu ụbọchị ahụ, Sowore kwadoro ihe mere na vidiyo o tinyere na Facebook ya ebe ọ boro ndị uwe ojii ebubo na ha na-akwado Fatodu mgbe ọ wakporo ya na Area F Police Command
Ndị DSS jidere Sowore na-abali ato nke Ọgọstụ 2019 tupu ngagharị iwe nke akpooro #RevolutionNow
Gọọmentị mechara kweta na o ha jidere ya, nke a mere Wole Soyinka, Oby Ezekwesili na ọtụtụ ndị ọzọ na-eme ihe ike katọrọ ha
E mechara kwuo na ọ na-agba izu ịgba ọchịchị mgba na ịkparị onye isi ala bu Muhammadu Buhari'
N'abalị iri abụọ na anọ n'ọnwa Septemba afọ 2019, Ụlọikpe Kasị Elu nke bu Federal High Court di na-Abuja nyere Sowore mgbapụta, n'ọnọdụ na ọ ga-enyefe paspọtụ mba ụwa ya
Ndị DSS ajụla ịhapụ Sowore na-ekwu na ha amaghị iwu ụlọ ikpe ahụ
Ihe ahu butere ngagharị iwe na UN Plaza na New York nke nwunye Sowore duziri ma kpalie nkatọ zuru ụwa ọnụ banyere ọchịchị onye kwuo uche ya nke Naijiria dara ada
Na 29 Septemba 2019, Sowore pụtara nke mbụ ya n'èzí kemgbe a tụrụ ya mkpọrọ
Ọ kọwara mmeso ọjọọ mgbe a kpọchiri ya n'ime mkpọrọ n'enweghị ìhè anyanwụ
O kwukwara na 'ndị ọchịagha Boko Haram na-eme emume di egwu nwere ohere ịnweta ekwentị, igwe onyonyo n'ime ụlọ mkpọrọ ha' ebe a na-egbochi ya ohere dị otú ahụ
Ụlọ ikpe ahụ tọhapụrụ Sowore ọzọ na 5 Disemba 2019, na-akwado na o meela ndokwa mgbapụta ya
E mechara tọhapụ ya na 24 Disemba 2019
Edere na-akụkụ nke iwu ha Sahara anaghị anabata mgbasa ozi na nkwado ego site n'aka gọọmentị Naịjirịa
Na 25 Febụwarị 2018, Sowore kwupụtara ebumnuche ya ịzọ ọkwa onye isi ala na ntuli aka Naijiria nke 2019
N'ọnwa Ọgọstụ n'afọ 2018, o guzobere otu ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị, African Action Congress (AAC), nke ọ ga eji azọ ọchịchị na 2019
Na 6 Ọktọba 2018, ka emechara ntuli aka praịmarị nke AAC, Omoyele Sowore ghọrọ dị ka onye na-azọ ọkwa onye isi ala n'enweghi onye gbochiri ya
Mgbe ọ gara ọtụtụ steeti na Naịjirịa, na-eleta ndị ama ama dịka Emir nke Kano na Wole Soyinka, Sowore malitere njem ego na gburugburu ụwa niile gụnyere Australia, United States of America na UK
Ọ nọ na Luton, England, na 10 Nọvemba 2018

Onye isi ala Muhammdu Buhari nke All Progressives Congress (APC), nwetara vootu 15,191,847 iji merie ebe onye osote ya, Atiku Abubakar nke People's Democratic Party nwetara vootu 11,264,977 iji bụrụ onye nke abụọ

Sowore bịara onodu nke ise na votu 33,953 n'ihu ndị ọzọ batara ọhụrụ n'ọsọ ahụ dịka Fela Durotoye nke Alliance for New Nigeria (ANN), onye nwetara votu 16,779, na Kingsley Moghalu nke Young Democratic Party (YPP), onye nwetara votu 21,886
Na 1 Maachị 2022, Sowore kwuputara ebumnuche ya ịzọ ọkwa onyeisiala 2023 Nigerian general election
Sowore na ezinụlọ ya abụrụla ndị bi na Haworth, New Jersey
N'ọnwa Septemba n'afọ 2021 ka ekwuru na ndị na-achị ehi ma ọ bụ ndị ntọọrọ agbagbuola nwanne Sowore n'Edo steeti

Omu Okwei ma ọ bụ Okwe nke Osomari (1872-1943) bụ eze nwanyị Naijiria na-azụ ahịa bụ onye Osomari
A mụrụ Omu Okwei n'afọ 1872 n'aka nwa eze Igbo Osuna Afubeho na otu n'ime ndị nwunye ya, nwa nwa nke eze Abo Obi Ossai
Mgbe ọ dị afọ itoolu, nne ya zigara ya ka ya na otu n'ime ụmụnne nne ya bụ ndị Igala biri
Ọ mụtara usoro azụmaahịa dị mkpa, ma na-ere mkpụrụ osisi, ji na ọkụkọ
Mgbe ọ dị afọ iri na ise, mgbe nna ya nwụsịrị, ya na nne ya biri na Atani, obodo dị n'Osimiri Niger
N'afọ 1889, ọ lụrụ Joseph Allagoa, onye ahịa si Brass
Ezinụlọ ya ekwenyeghị na nhọrọ ya ma enyeghị ya onyinye alum di
Di na nwunye ahụ mụrụ nwa, Joseph, ma gbaa alụkwaghịm n'afọ sochirinụ
Ọ gafere Osimiri Niger, na-ere uwe, ite, da oriọna
Ọ gbanwere ngwaahịa ahụ maka nri nke ọ resịrị ndị Europe
N'afọ 1895, ọ lụrụ Opene nke Abo, onye nne ya bụ Okwenu Ezewene (1896−1904), nwanyị ọzọ bara ọgaranya na-azụ ahịa
Okwei nwere nwa nwoke nke abụọ, Peter
Gọọmentị ndị Britain na-achị mba ahụ kwadoro ụlọ ọrụ ụmụ nwoke ka ha na'imebi nke ụmụ nwanyị
Ndị ọrụ gọọmentị nyere ndị ikom akwụkwọ ikike nke nyere ha ikike ịnọdụ n'ụlọ ikpe ụmụ amaala
Okwei bụ otu n'ime ụmụ nwanyị ole na ole e nyere akwụkwọ ikike ma jee ozi na Ụlọ ikpe amaala nke dị na Onitsha site na 1912 ruo n'afọ 1930
E nyere ya utu aha nke omu nke Osomari n'ọnwa Ọgọstụ afọ 1935
N'ọchịchị ọdịnala nke nwoke na nwanyị, omu bụ onye ndú kachasị elu nke nzukọ nke ndị isi nwanyị
A họpụtara ya dịka Lọọlọ Ahịa, Onye isi oche nke nzukọ ndị Nne ka ọ kpakọchara akụ
Ọ bụ eze nwanyị ikpeazụ na-azụ ahịa tupu ndị Britain dochie ọrụ ọdịnala nke nzukọ ndị Nne na-ahụ maka ịzụ ahịa
Ọ bụ nnukwu nnenne nke onye ọbụ abụ Naijiria-Britain Ikstarr
Okwei nwụrụ na afọ 1943 na Onitsha, Naịjirịa

Climate Policy Initiative (CPI) bụ otu nyocha nọrọ onwe ha na-enweghị uru na nzukọ iwu ihu igwe nke mba ụwa nke dị na San Francisco, California na ọfịs ndị ọzọ n'ụwa niile
CPI na-akwado nke ọma site na òtù ndị ọrụ ebere na ego mmepe gọọmentị
Site na ihe karịrị otu nari ndị nyocha na ndị ndụmọdụ, ụlọ ọrụ na-eche echiche ihu igwe na-arụ ọrụ iji melite ike na iwu iji ala eme ihe gburugburu ụwa, na-elekwasị anya na ego
A na-ewere ya dị ka otu ndị ọkachamara na-eduzi n'ịgbaso ego ihu igwe mba ụwa
Malite na Landscape of Climate Finance (2011), CPI ebipụtala usoro akụkọ kwa afọ nke na-enyocha maka ego ọha na eze na nke onwe na mb ụwa niile
CPI na-ebipụtakwa nyocha ikpe miri emi banyere ịhazi ụlọ ọrụ ọha na eze nke itinye ego onwe onye
Ka ọ na-erule 2021, CPI kọrọ na ego metụtara ihu igwe na n'etiti mba na-eme naanị ihe dị ka 07% nke GDP ụwa, nke dị ala karịa ego a na-atụ anya na ọ ga-adị mkpa maka mbelata ihu igwe na mgbanwe
San Giorgio Group (SGG), otu ọrụ nke CPI na ndị ọzọ guzobere na 2011, na-elekwasị anya n'ụzọ ego nwere ike ịkwado itinye ego na-acha akwụkwọ ndụ akwụkwọ ndụ
E kwesịghị ịgbagwoju atụmatụ iwu ihu igwe anya na atụmatụ iwu na ọchịchị mgbanwe ihu igwe (ICCG), nke bụbu (ruo 2017) International Center for Climate Governance
Thomas Heller guzobere na 2009, CPI nwere isi ụlọ ọrụ ha na San Francisco (United States)
O nwekwara ọfịs na Rio de Janeiro (Brazil), New Delhi (India), Jakarta (Indonesia), na London (United Kingdom)
N'afọ 2020, onye isi nchịkwa ụwa nke Climate Policy Institute bụ Barbara Buchner
CPI ebipụtala ihe dị ka ọmụmụ 200 na mpaghara nyocha ndị edepụtara na mbụ, ọkachasị na oyibo, na ụfọdụ na Portuguese na Bahasa Indonesia (Malay)

Onalenna Oabona Baloyi (amụrụ na Mee 6, na afọ 1984 na Mahalapye) bụ onye na-agba ọsọ n'etiti etiti Botswana, onye ọkachamara na mita 800

Ihe omume mba ụwa mbụ nke Baloyi bụ na afọ 2005 World Championships in Athletics nke emere na Helsinki, Finland, ọ gbara ọsọ na mita 800 ma mechie nke asaa na okpomọkụ ya site na ndị mbido asatọ ka o wee ghara ịga n'ihu na agba ọzọ

Otu afọ mgbe e mesịrị, ọ gara asọmpi na afọ 2006 Commonwealth Games nke e mere na Melbourne, Australia, ọ banyere ọzọ na mita 800 ma n'oge a ọ mechara nke atọ na okpomọkụ ya nke dị ngwa iji ruo eru maka nke ikpeazụ, na nke ikpeazụ ọ gbara 10 sekọnd nwayọ karịa okpomọkụ nke ya wee mechie nke asatọ
Baloyi nọchitere anya Botswana na afọ 2008 Summer Olympics na Beijing, ebe ọ na-asọmpi maka mita 800 nke ụmụ nwoke

Ọ gbara ọsọ na okpomọkụ nke abụọ megide ndị egwuregwu isii ndị ọzọ, gụnyere Abubaker Kaki nke Sudan, onye gosipụtara onwe ya dị ka onye ọkacha mmasị na onye nwere ike ịbụ onye kachasị elu na ihe omume a
Ọ gwụchara ọsọ ahụ n'ọnọdụ nke anọ site na ụzọ anọ n'ụzọ iri nke abụọ (040) n'azụ Dmitriy Bogdanov nke Russia, na oge nke 1 4789
Otú ọ dị, Baloyi enweghị ike ịga n'ihu na ọkara ikpeazụ, ebe ọ nọ n'ọnọdụ nke iri atọ na asatọ n'ozuzu, ma nọrọ n'okpuru oghere abụọ maka agba ọzọ

N'afọ 2010, ndị IAAF kwụsịtụrụ Baloyi afọ abụọ maka iji ihe na-eme ka ọ rụọ ọrụ nke ọma, mgbe ọ na-azụ na Germany, ọ gara onye na-ahụ maka ọgwụ maka ihe ọṅụṅụ ya na-aṅụkarị mana ha ereela ma nye ya ihe dochie anya nke nwere ihe ndị a machibidoro iwu
Mgbe afọ ise gachara n'ọzara, Kọmitii Olimpik Mba Botswana kpọrọ Baloyi ka ọ nọrọ na panel nke ụlọ ọrụ na-emegide ọgwụ ọjọọ ma ka na-atụ anya ịlaghachi na egwuregwu

Ọ bụkwa onye bụrụ onye isi na-ahụ maka ego na ụlọ ọrụ na Ogun State

Ọ zụrụ dị ka onye Sociologist ma gụọ akwụkwọ na London School of Economics and Political Science na Mahadum Manchester

Ana ahuta ya ka akuku ahu zoro ezo ma buru kwa nke diiri onye (private part)
One Million Boys bụ aha koodu nke otu ndị ohi a maara maka ọrụ izu ohi ya a ma ama gburugburu Lagos na gburugburu ya

N'ịbụ nke otu ìgwè nke ihe dị ka ụmụ nwoke iri abụọ guzobere na Ajegunle na ebumnuche nke 'ịlụ ọgụ megide ikpe na-ezighị ezi n'obodo ahụ', ụfọdụ ndị otu ahụ weghaara otu ahụ ka ha tinye aka na izu ohi, ndina n'ike na nkwarụ
E wepụtara ihe nkiri akpọrọ 1 Million Boyz na 2014 dabere na ohi na ọrụ ha

N'abalị itoolu n'ọnwa Ọktoba n'afọ 2012, ndị uwe ojii Lagos State Police Command jidere ihe dị ka mmadụ otu nari na iri atọ a na-enyo enyo na ha bụ ndị otu ahụ n'oge mwakpo a wakporo Apapa na Ajegunle

Ongota (nke a makwaara dị ka Birale, Birayle) bụ asụsụ na-akpa ike na ndịda ọdịda anyanwụ Etiopia

UNESCO kọrọ na 2012 na n'ime ngụkọta agbụrụ nke 115, ọ bụ nanị 12 ndị agadi na-asụ asụsụ obodo fọdụrụ, ndị fọdụrụ n'ime obere obodo ha nke dị n'akụkụ ọdịda anyanwụ nke osimiri Weito nakweere asụsụ Tsamai kama
Usoro usoro ndabara bụ isiokwu-ihe-ngwaa
Nhazi nke asụsụ ahụ edoghị anya (Sava & Tosco 2015)
N'oge ha nọ na mpaghara Maale, nke dị taa n'ebe ugwu ha, a chụpụrụ mkpokọta ndị ezinụlọ na ndịda n'ihi ịchụ nta ha na-achụ anụ Maale
Ha soro n'akụkụ osimiri Weito ruo mgbe ha rutere Arbore, ebe a tụgharịrị azụ azụ n'ebe ugwu wee biri ebe ha nọ taa
Akaụntụ a dị iche na nke Maale, ndị na-ekwu na ndị Ongota bụbu akụkụ nke Maale nke kwagara mba ọzọ na-alaghachighị

Ongota nwere ihe ndị dị na asụsụ Afroasiatic na Nilo-Saharan nke na-agbagwoju nhazi ya anya, na ndị ọkà mmụta asụsụ na ndị ọkà n'ihe gbasara ụmụ mmadụ enwebeghị ike ịchọpụta n'ụzọ doro anya mgbọrọgwụ asụsụ ya ruo ugbu a
Savà na Tosco (2007) na-ekwu na ọdịdị Ongota bụ Ts'amakko nakwa na ~50% nke akwụkwọ ọkọwa okwu nwere ike ijikọta ya na mgbọrọgwụ Ts'amakk
Ha kọwakwara na Aklilu Yilma nke Mahadum Addis Ababa weere Ongota dị ka onye Creole pidginised
Ha na-ekwu na 'nkwubi okwu a siri ike site na akụkọ ifo obodo na-ekwu ete Ongota sitere na ite agbụrụ dị iche iche

' Ha gara n'ihu na-akọ na Lionel Bender weere Ongota dị ka Cushitic, Václav Blažek (1991, 2001, na ndị ọzọ) [ntụgharị zuru ezu dị mkpa] Nilo-Saharan, na Cushitist Maarten Mous (2003) [ntụgharị niile dị mkpa] kwuru ya dị ka asụsụ dịpụrụ adịpụ

Savà na Tosco (2003, 2007), n'onwe ha, kwenyere na ọ bụ asụsụ East Cushitic nwere Nilo-Saharan substratum, nke pụtara na ndị na-asụ Ongota gbanwere gaa East Cushitaic site na asụsụ Nilo-Daharan mbụ, nke a ka na-ahụ
Fleming (2006) weere ya dị ka alaka kwụụrụ onwe ya nke Afroasiatic
Bonny Sands (2009) kwenyere na aro Savà na Tosco bụ aro kachasị mma
Sava & Tosco (2015) hapụrụ ya na-enweghị aha, ma eleghị anya ọ dịpụrụ adịpụ ma eleghị pele mmetụta nke superstrate metụtara ya nke na e kpuchiri njikọ mbụ nke asụsụ ahụ
Isi usoro na-akpata ọdịda Ongota bụ alụmdi na nwunye na obodo ndị ọzọ
N'ime njem dị nkenke na mbido 1990, ọtụtụ ndị nchọpụta mere nchọpụta na ọtụtụ ndị ikom Ongota lụrụ ụmụ nwanyị Tsamakko
Nwatakịrị ga-etolite na-asụ naanị asụsụ nne, mana ọ bụghị nke nna
(Mikesh, P
et al, 1992–1993) Omume a gara n'ihu n'ime afọ ndị na-adịbeghị anya
Onias Mupumha (a mụrụ n'ụbọchị nke 23 n'ọnwa Febụwarị n'afọ 1978) bụ onye Zimbabwe na-akpụ ihe ọkpụkpụ

Onitsha bụ akwụkwọ akụkọ sitere n'aka odee Nobel Laureate nke France JMG Le Clézio
E bipụta ya na mbụ n’asụsụ French n’afọ 1991, e wepụtakwara nsụgharị English n’afọ 1997
Ahịa Ọnicha nke a makwaara dị ka Onitsha Main Market na bekee bụ otu n'ime ahịa kacha ibu na ọdịda anyanwụ Afrịka dabere na nha ala na oke ngwongwo ahịa a n'ere ebe ahụ
Ahịa ahụ dị n'ime obodo Onitsha, nke bu isi obodo azụmaahịa nke steeti Anambra nke dị na ọdịda ọwụwa anyanwụ Naịjirịa
Ndị na achịkwa ma na elekọta ahịa ahụ bụ otu a na akpọ na bekee Onitsha Market Traders Association (OMATA)
Ndị OMATA (aha ịchafụ) bụ otu ndị ahịa, ọchụnta ego ndị nke so na otu akacha asọpụrụ na kọntinent Afrịka na ihe gbasara ịzụ ahịa
Ọtụtụ n'ime ndị na-azụ ahịa ma na-ebubata ngwongwo ahịa dị iche iche na mpaghara ọwụwa anyanwụ Naịjirịa nwere isi ụlọ ọrụ ha n'ahịa Ọnicha
A maara na ndị ọchụnta ego nọ n'ógbè ahụ dịka ndị na-ebubata ma ọ dịkarịa ọbere, ngwa ahịa nke tọn iri anọ ugboro isii na ihe dị ka nnukwu igbe nke ga eru ogologo iri anọ kwa afọ ọ bụla
Ụfọdụ ndịa na-ebubata ngwa ahịa nke tọn iri anọ ihe karịrị ugboro narị abụọ na otu afọ
Ngwa ahia ndị a gụnyere ọla ụdị dị iche iche, uwe, ngwongwo ezinụlọ, akụrụngwa eji ewu ụlọ ebe obibi na nke eji ewu ụlọ ọrụ na ebe a na emepụta akụrụngwa dị iche iche
Ahia nke a di n'akụkụ Osimiri Niger na otu mpaghara ma nwee njikọ n'akụkụ ọdịda anyanwụ yana Fegge na okporo ụzọ nke gafere Osumaru
Ahia Ọnicha nọ na nchekwa ndị Onitsha Main Market Vigilante ndị nke na -arụ ọrụ n'okpuru na nkwado nke ndị uwe ojii Nigeria
Enwere ike ịkọwa ahịa a n'ụzọ ziri ezi dị ka ụlọ ike azụmahịa nke West Africa niile

Ndị ahịa nọ na mpaghara ECOWAS na gburugburu ya na-akwado ya nke ukwuu gụnyere Accra, Abidjan, Douala, Niamey na Cotonou na ebe ndị ọzọ na kọntinent ahụ, site na ahịa ha na azụ na nnukwu Ahia Ọnicha ahụ
